name: 1-bedroom in heart of Williamsburg!
summary: Hi there, and welcome! This second-floor spacious apartment is owned by me, has 2 A/C units (living room and bedroom), 2 Juliet balconies, and lots of space to relax. At Bedford Ave and South 1st Street, so you're in the heart of Williamsburg!
space: This is a spacious (approximately 725 square feet) one-bedroom with a queen-sized bed. The unit will comfortably accommodate 2 adults (additional guests are not permitted). There is one bathroom with a shower and tub. The kitchen is generously-sized for a city apartment, and is equipped with a dishwasher. There are two Juliet balconies, if you prefer to open the doors and let some light and air in.
description: Hi there, and welcome! This second-floor spacious apartment is owned by me, has 2 A/C units (living room and bedroom), 2 Juliet balconies, and lots of space to relax. At Bedford Ave and South 1st Street, so you're in the heart of Williamsburg! This is a spacious (approximately 725 square feet) one-bedroom with a queen-sized bed. The unit will comfortably accommodate 2 adults (additional guests are not permitted). There is one bathroom with a shower and tub. The kitchen is generously-sized for a city apartment, and is equipped with a dishwasher. There are two Juliet balconies, if you prefer to open the doors and let some light and air in. PLEASE NOTE: The rooftop, gym, and any other common areas (except for lobby, elevator, and stairs) are strictly OFF-LIMITS to guests. Also: in case anyone in my building asks (which probably won't happen), please just say that you're friends visiting from out of town.  The apartment is on the second floor, and can be accessed via the stairs or elevator
neighborhood_overview: It's Williamsburg! The address is within walking distance to terrific restaurants (like Diner/Marlow&Sons, Wythe Hotel, Dumont Burger), bars (Commodore, Maison Premiere, and Donna), shops (Bird, In God We Trust, J.Crew), and other location attractions like Whole Foods, Equinox Gym, and Apple Store.
notes: I've got the basics covered: pillows, bed sheets, soap, shampoo, towels, toilet paper, and cleaning supplies. Please do not use my personal items.
transit: The best part is that you're an easy 10-minute walk to both the L (Bedford Ave stop) and J/M trains (Marcy Ave stop). You're also on the same block of the B62 bus line. And cabs and car services (Uber and Northside) are readily available in my neighborhood.
access: PLEASE NOTE: The rooftop, gym, and any other common areas (except for lobby, elevator, and stairs) are strictly OFF-LIMITS to guests. Also: in case anyone in my building asks (which probably won't happen), please just say that you're friends visiting from out of town.  The apartment is on the second floor, and can be accessed via the stairs or elevator. No need to haul luggage up and down several flights of stairs.
interaction: I am usually easy to contact via email/text/call. I will do my best to make sure you have everything you need. I only rent my place out when I'm traveling. Key exchange is done via a service called KeyCafe, which allows the guest to pick up and drop off at a nearby deli, just one short block away. After booking, please send your email, and I can send you the deli address and access code.
house_rules: Please treat my home with the same care and respect you would treat yours. Take off your shoes at the door. No smoking. No pets. No parties. Please be respectful of my neighbors at all times.

host.host_about:
I'm a freelance writer, so I'm on the road a bit. (But I'll always call Brooklyn and this apartment my home.) 

Though I only rent out my home when I'm traveling, I'll do my darned best to make sure your visit is nothing short of comfortable and lovely.

reviews.comments: The apartment was very spacious and very clean. It was everything we needed and more! Katie was pleasant and easy to deal with. Thank you for your amazing apartment and I will be recommending you to all my friends!

Katie's apartment was outstanding! Clean, spacious, and welcoming, located perfectly for Brooklyn exploration and an easy walk (or Metro) to the City. Great places to eat all located within walking distance (especially brunch at The Rabbit Hole and coffee at The Sweatshop.) Katie was flexible with our arrival/departure times and we were thoughtfully welcomed with a box of personal care items to use during our stay. We would be happy to stay at this apartment again, and plan to recommend it to all of our friends!
Katie was an amazing host.  She made me feel welcome and was completely helpful.  Her apartment was spacious, clean and super convenient.

This was my first experience with airbnb. I thought it was pretty neat that she used keycafe, which I learned was a key exchange service provided by a nearby cafe. It was easy to get the keys once proving your identity, so everything is super secure. Katie's apartment located a few steps away was just what we needed. Cozy, clean, and in the heart of Williamsburg. She had anything and everything you need to make yourself comfortable. she didn't bother us but was eager to help i.e. suggest great food places when we asked. Even though we didn't meet her face to face, the experience was smooth, completely convenient and secure especially for two young ladies roaming around NYC. I can't wait to rent from her again.

Katie's apartment is very spacious and luminous and located walking distance to restaurants and cafes. The bed is big and comfortable and the kitchen is well equipped. Katie was very flexible with our arrival and departure hours which was very important to us. We definitely recommend her apartment for our friends.

Katie's place is in a really fantastic location - right in the thick of it in Williamsburg! The apartment was very spacious, clean and stylish. We had a lovely stay! Being in such a great location it can get a little noisy at night so pack some ear plugs if you're a light sleeper.

Perfection- From my first contact with Katie, to the apartment itself, the area its in, to our overall stay, it was absolutely great. 

Host: Katie is great! She was quick to communicate, very friendly, and we felt very welcomed in her home. Thanks for everything! 

Apartment: The place is so nice. It's comfortable, clean, and  overall awesome.

Location: I was obsessed with this neighborhood, close to the subway, great places to eat, bars, shops, etc. It was my first time staying in Williamsburg and I'm so glad we stayed in Brooklyn versus Manhattan this trip.

The listing was wonderfully accurate. Katie had awesome communication, there were no questions left unanswered. The apartment was perfectly located close to everything we wanted to see in Williamsburg. We had a wonderful time and thanks to Katie everything was just that much better.
Katie was a most excellent host. The apartment was amazingly clean, spacious, and most importantly, convenient!  I would recommend her place for anyone wanting to spend a great time in Brooklyn.

Een heerlijk appartement in Williamsburg! De advertentie komt geheel overeen met de werkelijkheid. Het ophalen van de sleutel via Keycafe werkt heel goed. Het appartement van Katie voelt als thuis. Het was schoon en ruim voor twee personen. Het bed, het matras is erg goed we hebben heerlijk geslapen.
Het appartement is midden in Williamsburg wat een erg fijne, creatieve wijk in Brooklyn is. Heel veel hippe restaurants en cafe's zijn in de buurt.
Een echte aanrader!

Dank Katie voor je gastvrijheid.

A Katie foi super gentil e atenciosa, mesmo quando eu, que nunca tive uma banheira na vida, não entendi nada como se usava o chuveiro e ela me explicou pacientemente e prontamente. O apartamento é muito bom, equipado e receptivo. A esquina é perfeita, perto de tudo, o bairro é maravilhoso.

Katie is a lovely host, we actually met her just at the end of our permanence, but she's been always nice and rapid to answer any doubt or question. 
The apartment is really nice and clean, and the position is great.
I would definately recommend it.
Katie's apartment was very comfortable and conveniently located. It was definitely as pictured on the website. There is no Internet.
Very nice apartment in a great location.

A spacious apartment in a great central location - we have definitely fallen in love with Williamsburg. Unfortunately, it was very cold in NY while we were visiting and there was no heating in the apartment. Also the WIFI supplied was a dongle which didn't really work properly or fast enough and made it difficult to check/reply to emails.  Overall, great apartment and communication with Katie was easy - just a few issues.

My friend and I had a wonderful, comfortable stay! It was our home away from home. Katie was quick to answer any questions we had. They key pick up location was very convenient. I would stay here again!

This is a wonderful apartment.  It was exactly as advertised.  It has plenty of space.  It is very comfortable and in a very nice location.  I will gladly book again next time I visit Williamsburg.  And Katie was wonderful to deal with.  Perfect communication and professional.  Thanks Katie.

Our stay at Katie's apartment was great! To get the keys was super easy, no worries! When we look at the map we thought it might be far from the metro but when we got there we saw that is very close, as the neighborhood is beautiful it was great to walk to the subway! The location is super safe, we did not feel unsafe at any time, even at night! The apartment Katie is beautiful, spacious and very clean! Made orders over the internet and Katie was very helpful and quick to doubts as to receive the package! The only thing I have to score is on the bed of Katie who is very good and we could not wake up early to enjoy it haha! I have no doubt where to stay next time in NY!

We had a great stay at Katie's place!  Would definitely stay again. Apt was neat and the location is prime, right in the heart of Williamsburg within walking distance of tons of great restaurants, cafes, shops and bars.
Second stay in this nice apartment :)

Katie was quick to respond to all inquiries and the apt was adorable.  Gorgeous, open living space and huge bedroom.  Key pick up was a few blocks from her place.  Smack dab in the center of Williamsburg and all it has to offer.  My only caveat is the (Website hidden by Airbnb) location is on the corner of a very busy street so at night we had to sleep with our white noise app on.  Other than that, perfect.

The apartment is better then advertised!
Very comfy
Very big
Great location
Quick to the subway 
I suggest BUNK for sandwich or Lucky Dog for a drink
The key pick up and drop off is via something called key cafe.
It sounded weird but was very easy.....
Great apartment and neighborhood! Katie was very welcoming and responsive. Her home is clean and lovely to stay in. Highly recommend!

Katie's place was great! Perfectly located in the heart of a happening neighborhood, just a few blocks from several subway stops. Everything was super easy to use - the heat, the shower. We loved staying there and felt right at home. Hoping this place is available every time we come back to NYC!
This apartment is awsome ! It is located in heart of williamsburg ! Katie was there for us all the time ! Thank you so much again for your hospitality !
Katie's apartment was huge, clean and in a great location! Was great, we loved it. Recommendations were great as well for restaurants and shopping ect. Would definitely come back!

A estadia no apartamento da Katie foi bem boa. Ela nos passou todas as orientações e tudo ocorreu como combinado. Tinha tudo o que precisávamos. A localização é ótima, perto do metrô e com muita oferta de comércio e restaurantes em volta. As únicas coisas que foram um pouco incômodas foram: o aquecedor, que talvez por falta de conhecimento eu não conseguia ajustar, e estava bastante frio. A internet é muito limitada, e, mesmo só com emails, era bastante lenta (viajantes muitas vezes dependem da internet!). O fato de não haver ganchos ou qualquer espaço para colocarmos nossas coisas e casacos, além das próprias malas, o que fez com que nossas coisas ficassem bem bagunçadas.

We had an AMAZING time staying at Katie's place. The key transfer was super easy, and the location in Williamsburg is absolutely ideal. Her recommendations for restaurants were super helpful. The couch is super cozy - we enjoyed the apartment as a little escape from the chaos of the city. Wonderful place to stay!

Very spacious, clean and welcoming apartment in an prime spot in Williamsburg.  Location was perfect and within walking distance of everything  Williamsburg has to offer.  Make sure to look into Katie's recommended spots in the neighborhood, as they were excellent!  Couldn't be happier with our stay and would love to come back.

Katie's apartment is in a brilliant location (my girlfriend felt very safe in the area), close to the subway, there was a fully set up kitchen and is in general, a spacious/beautiful apartment. She was very accommodating and we had a great stay. The only downside about this place is that there is not very good internet, so no watching netflix to relax at night (though it's fine for researching the area).

Amazing location, in the heart of Williamsburg. Great apartment in a nice building. Windows overlooking Bedford Av and South 1st. Apartment has everything that is needed to cook. I would definitely come back. It's a no brainer!!!
The host canceled this reservation 116 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Katie's place is in the perfect location for catching the subway to Manhattan or for exploring Brooklyn. There are many restaurants and shops nearby. The apartment was roomy and comfortable. There needs to be some hooks or hangers for guests to put clothing. A place in the bathroom to place toiletries would have been helpful.  Also, a coffee maker would have been nice.
This apartment is in a terrific location in Williamsburg, close to many restaurants and shops. It's a safe area and a secure building. It worked out well for our three-night stay.

Katie was a good host via text. We had an issue with the back door but she got the groundsman to lock it for us. Overall, great apartment and great location. We felt safe and lots of cool bars and nice restaurants!

Katie's apartment was lovely - clean, spacious, and overlooks the streets of Williamsburg. The place was as described and include a goodie box of various toiletries. There were also a few guides on what to do in BK. We had a great time calling this apartment home for a week!

Great place in Williamsburg, just one subway stop away from Manhattan. The neighbourhood is lively, full of nice cafes, bars and restaurants. The apartment is great, with a fully equipped kitchen, a big living room and a big super comfortable bed. It is spacious and in great condition. Katie was very helpful when we asked for help and she even let us check out at 5 p.m. so we wouldn't have to look for a locker where we could store our two big luggages. If you are planning to spend time in New York I definitely recommend you to stay at Katie's.

La communication par mail avec Katie a été très fluide et il a été très simple de récupérer les clés de l'appartement. Nous avons passé un super séjour chez Katie. L'appartement est idéalement situé, au cœur de Williamsburg, c'était très agréable de se retrouver dans Brooklyn le soir et de pouvoir faire une pause avec la frénésie de Manhattan. Le quartier est très animé (bars, restos, boutiques). L'appartement de Katie est tout à fait conforme aux photos, je recommande vivement!

nous avons beaucoup apprécié le quartier de williasmburg,
l'appartement colle parfaitement au photo.
nous n'avons pas vu katie mais nous avons eu toutes les informations nécessaires et le système de clefs est très pratique.
notre séjour fut très agréable dans son appartement.
Katie's place have great location and really clean, center Williamsburg is very nice for hang out but also quite noizy, but it's your choose to live here. We are really happy about our stay :D
Appartement propre et bien équipé, agréable et bien situé dans un quartier vivant de Brooklyn Williamsburg.

Amazing apartment on Bedford Avenue, main street of Brooklyn. Just three stops away from Union Square. Within steps of all kinds of great restaurants and coffee shops on every corner. Our favorites were Joe's Pizza across from Fabian's coffee shop, brunch at Sweet Chick and Rosamunde's Sausage Grill. 
Katie is helpful and we got all help we needed. 
If you are traveling to JFK airport try booking UBER since other taxis cost about $42. 
Hope you enjoy staying there, we would definitely go back ! :)

I've lived up in New York for 7 years, now back in the South where I grew up. Two of those years was spent in Brooklyn, one of my favorite places on earth. I knew when I was planning my trip that I would prefer to be around Bedford Ave in Williamsburg. Finding Katie's apartment was awesome it was in the exact location I wanted to be, right near the L, you can't find a better spot. Katie's apartment is an absolute gem. It's near some of the greatest food and bars not only in Brooklyn, but the whole island of Manhattan (**make sure to try Rabbit Hole's eggs benny if you're a brunch lover). Her bed and that lovely couch were so comfortable and inviting to come back to after a long day walking around. My sister and I had everything we needed for our stay and she was incredibly quick with responding to any questions we had about key pick up and drop off. Thank you Katie for letting us live in your world for a little while, what a fun place to be!!! Rent this place ladies and gents, you will NOT be disappointed.

Katie is a really kind host and even if we didn't have the pleasure to meet her personally she has been very present via e-mail for any necessity since the very first contacts. 
The apartment is beautiful, large and confortable, perfect for 2 people and for short or long stay. It is situated in Williamsburg that is perfect for the nightlife and surely one of the most interesting districts in New York. The metro is very close (5 minutes walk) and in very short time you can get in Manhattan (1 stop!).
I strongly recommend Katie's apartment to any of you!!!!!
My friend and I had a wonderful stay at Katie's beautiful, tidy home in the heart of Brooklyn! The apartment was a short walk to the subway that brought us straight into Manhattan.

Katie's place was just as described. In the best location for exploring Brooklyn and super quick into Manhattan. Lots of shops etc near by and we never once felt unsafe.
Will be looking to make this my regular NY pad should it be available on my next visits!
I felt very welcome and was kept up to date about getting the key! a very nice place in the heart of Williamsburg! Highly recommend ! Thank you for your hospitality !
Great apartment in one of the best locations in Brooklyn, spacious, warm, it has everything you would want to feel right at home

katie was easy to work with, her place is spacious and most importantly, you cannot beat the location. the subway is super close and the area itself is amazing. plenty of shops and places to eat and drink nearby. i would absolutely recommend this spot to anyone who wants to experience NYC but likes a bit of a reprieve from the intensity of manhattan.

This was a great place in very good location. It's located off a main road with numerous bars, cafes and restaurants within blocks of Katie's place. The subway line is .4 miles away and you're only one stop from Manhattan. Highly recommended!

Katies place was exactly how she describes it. Close to public transit and in a safe, secure building in a great neighborhood. Tons of places to go and shop and eat within walking distance. Personally I enjoyed Joes Pizza and Vanessa Dumpling house. My overall FAVORITE place in the neighborhood was Marthas Country Bakery. They have great selections of amazing desserts along with excellent coffee for a great price. Katies place was roomy and comfortable and she made communication with her very easy. The stay was very enjoyable and if I ever come to Brooklyn again ill be sure to stay at Katies.

Staying at Katie’s home in Williamsburg was the best decision ever! Conveniently located on Bedford Avenue with easy access to the L train, this is the perfect place to discover Williamsburgh, Brooklyn and Manhattan from. The apartment looks exactly as on the pictures, very cosy and inviting and perfectly comfortable for 2 people. We slept well in the very comfortable bed and enjoyed nice relaxing evenings on the huge sofa. I can only recommend this place and will stay there again next time I come to NYC!
Great place to stay

Great place my only issue was the noise. The place is not double glazed glass so you can hear the street and what's happened pretty clearly. I had to use ear plugs to fall asleep as it was just to disturbing for me. That would be my only negative as everything else was great.

Hi there, Katie's place was exactly as she described it. Excellent ubication, everything you might need is available steps away from the apartment. We had some issues when we were arriving but thankfully we were helped by the guy at the Deli called Muhammad. So please buy something to him if you choose Katie's apartment what I'm sure you will.
Katie was a great host! The apartment was clean and in a great position! We loved our stay in Brooklyn.

First stay in Williamsburg and Katie's place was ideal! Katie was on point with communication and process of checking-in and checking-out was seamless. 

Katie's home is central, comfortable, and relaxing. Proper stay all around! We shall be back!
Great apartment
Great experience. Katie was very accommodating with our early arrival. The apartment was very clean and in an awesome location. Thanks!

Great apartment for anyone who is looking to stay in the heart of Williamsburg. Great location in relation to bars, restaurants, shopping, etc. The apartment was exactly how it was advertised and extremely cozy! We would definitely go back again!

Katie's place was amazing. It was clean, comfortable, and perfectly located in the heart of Williamsburg. The check-in and check out process was incredibly smooth and Katie was very responsive to any questions. If we're ever in Williamsburg again we will definitely try to stay at Katie's.
Location is very convenient.  Staying here worked out perfect and Katie is very easy to get a hold of and communicate with.
Katie was great. Really accessible and the apartment was a great resting place in a hopping part of the city. If you want to hang in a busy, loud, vibrant neighborhood than this is your spot.
Fab stay!

Katie's apartment in Williamsburg was absolutely perfect for me and my boyfriend's stay in New York City. The neighborhood itself is great and there is no shortage of places to eat and drink steps away from her apartment. There was a subway station about 4 blocks away which made it very easy to get to anywhere in NYC we wanted to go. The apartment itself was very clean and comfortable. Thank you Katie for a perfect stay!
Great stay at Katie's place! Very clean and comfortable and great location, close to shops and restaurants and very close to the L train!
Very clean and nice place, good location.

Host was available through message and email, while we were in the apartment.  Truly a great value.  Did not meet host in person, but the "KeyCafe" service worked well and the guys at the Deli were great where the keys were left for us.  We would go back and we have already referred apartment to others.
An excellent place to stay. Plenty of space, clean, and great communication from the owner. I would definitely stay here again

My sister and I stayed at Katie's place for our first visit to New York! It was a lovely apartment, in a great, fun, and safe location. Very comfortable and Katie was a fantastic host. Would certainly recommend her place and would love to stay again!

If you want to be in Williamsburg - this is the place to be! It's unbelievably central - you're in the heart of it all here. Walk to shops, restaurants, cafes and bars with minutes. The apartment was perfect for a weekend trip - comfortable, cozy, and airy. The space has everything you need for a stay, including great views of Bedford Ave. The building felt safe and secure. Saturday night street noise did get a bit lively so you may want to bring some earplugs if you're a light sleeper. Katie was so great to communicate with every step of the way. We would definitely come back here next time we're in NY!
Big apartment all to yourself! Hip, trendy location. 30 minutes to downtown New York by bus!
Excellent stay. Katie was an amazing host. Also very beautiful location!

Really enjoyed staying at Katie's place. Only stayed two nights, but everything was really easy and straightforward, including finding the place and the key pick-up. The place was clean and comfortable, and very easy to relax in. The location was fantastic -- lots of amenities, shops, eateries, etc all along the street, yet the place seems well insulated so wasn't disturbed by noise. Would definitely recommend it and would love to stay here again.
Great place to stay in NYC area!! Katie is a great host, amazing value for a very comfortable apartment in the hippest neighborhood in Brooklyn!
There are so many amazing restaurants here. 24 hour stores makes it super convenient as well :) Great town and the apartment is really nice!
Great apartment!  Clean, bright, good location.  Katie was very responsive.
Kind And respecfull host .good location and clean rooms. Many thanks . Regards

Katie's place was perfect for us, as it was right in the heart of vibrant Williamsburg, and the Bedford Avenue L-Train which we knew we'd be using a lot. It's even bigger that it looks in the pictures. The sofa is comfy, the shower is powerful and the bed is huge. Only thing I would recommend is to pack some hangers as being a woman I had lots of things to hang up! Katie was efficient with the booking, and the key-code details were sent a few days before we arrived, and key pick-up was easy. A great base, and even better with the use of a dishwasher, the apartment being situated in a secure block and near to essential transport links including of course Williamsburg Bridge!
Katie's place is amazing. Spacious and close to amazing places to eat/drink. Will definitely request to stay again next time I go to New York. Thanks Katie!
The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We loved staying at Katie’s apartment. It was spacious, clean and beautifully decorated. The location was perfect for the Williamsburg wedding we were attending nearby, and it was directly across the street from one of my favorite coffee places in the area, Black Brick Coffee.

We highly recommend staying at Katie's place.  We spent three wonderful days there.  The apartment is very well located:  close to many stores, restaurants, bars, including a spacious Whole Foods.  It is easy to get to Manhattan since the apartment is only a five-minute walk from the subway station.  The apartment is clean, quiet, and well-equipped.  The only problem that we encountered was our inability to turn on the television despite Katie's explanations.  (The problem may have been related to our digital ineptitude.)  Katie accomodated our request to remain in the apartment for an extra five hours, at no additional charge, which we really appreciated.
Great neighborhood. Great apartment. Close to everything. Bars, restaurants. Sunday. Stay here!
The apartment is lovely. We stayed for 3 nights and our stay was absolutely perfect. About 7/8 minutes away from  the subway. Katie is helpful and nice.
Very accommodating! And great location!!
A nice place in a great location. Would definitely recommend.
Great place and host! Will definitely stay again.

Kate's house is a very charming apartment located in a nice area with a large number of stores, cafes and restaurant. It was nice to stay in a lived apartment, it made us feel at home. However, we were a bit puzzled over by her list of do's and don'ts - it was very long and demanding, especially if we consider that the house wasn't that clean in the first place.

Katie has an amazing place! It’s super clean and fresh, with everything you need for a stay in NYC. This neighborhood has so much to explore and there seems to be somewhere fun and interesting on almost every block. Katie responds so quickly and cares about making your stay as smooth and as perfect as possible. She even extended my check out 4.5 hours due to the snow. Also, I had a FREE parking spot out in front of the building for the entirety of my stay!

Was very happy with the place. It’s a spacious apartment next to plenty of great shops & restaurants. You can hop on the J or L & be in Manhattan in no time at all, or just hang in the neighborhood, which has everything you need.

Katie's apartment is fantastic as well is its location. You can get a wrong first impression with all rules Katie's ask you to follow on her place but it's easy to get used to it.

The check-in and check-out process is very convenient, you just have to go to a deli nearby (open 24x7) to get the keys and drop off on the same location in a locker.

Me and my wife had a wonderful week there and would love to come back as soon a we have a new opportunity.
Great location and spacious! Thanks so much for letting us stay in your home.
Katie’s apartment was even nicer than the photos suggested. Great vibe. Great neighbourhood. Flexible with check-in/check-out too
We enjoyed Katie's place. Loved the neighborhood and it was easy to subway into Manhattan. Apartment with spacious with lots of natural light and a good kitchen.

name: Large Studio Apt -Downtown Montreal
summary: Cozy and well-decorated large Studio Apartment located on Durocher and Sherbrooke Streets in the heart of Montreal downtown area.  The apartment is fully furnished. Kitchen has everything you need (utensils, pots, pans, microwave, toaster, etc.)
description: Cozy and well-decorated large Studio Apartment located on Durocher and Sherbrooke Streets in the heart of Montreal downtown area.  The apartment is fully furnished. Kitchen has everything you need (utensils, pots, pans, microwave, toaster, etc.)

name: Beachy style, comfort & convenience
summary: Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment. Walking distance to Coogee Beach and Village (5-10 mins). Fast and efficient bus ride into the CBD (20 mins). Stylish but with all the comforts and conveniences of home. Maximum 2 guests.
description: Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment. Walking distance to Coogee Beach and Village (5-10 mins). Fast and efficient bus ride into the CBD (20 mins). Stylish but with all the comforts and conveniences of home. Maximum 2 guests.

Near North-South Highway,  2 minutes from Devesas (main north-south) train station and public transport right on the doorstep. Obs: *shared Kitchen and Living Room. It is not allowed to cook meat or fish (Vegan Friendly)
space: Private Room, Office Room and WC for 1 single person in new and modern apartment in Vila Nova de Gaia (other side of Oporto Douro River). 2 minutes from Devesas (main north-south) train station and public transport right on the doorstep. 2 minutes from Gaia Shopping open until 24h. Close A1 North-South highway. If you have a car this is the best option to stay, because you not need to go to the city center. Free car parking. Shared Kitchen and Living room. Obs: It is not allowed to cook meat or fish in the house( Vegan Friendly)

house_rules: No big rules, just treat the house like it was your home! Check in until 00:30 am.

summary: I'm renting out private room in my apartment. Although it is in the middle of everything, neighborhood is safe and quiet. Kadikoy is a special area of Istanbul. Its green and peaceful with lively young night life. It is preferred rather than Besiktas

name: 2bedroom Waikiki Sweet home
summary: Fully renovated condo conveniently located in the gateway of Waikiki with easy access to shops, restaurants and the beach. Swimming Pool, Sun Deck, BBQ.
space: My condo was renovated and is fully furnished with full kitchen.  Relax on your personal lanai overlooking the city. Free Wi-Fi, Cable TV, Flat screen TV. The newly renovated kitchen includes a full size refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, flatware, utensils, wine opener and more... Welcome to our tastefully upgraded and vacation outfitted two bedroom, one bath, It is a short stroll to the beach, local eateries, and shopping.  Located at the gateway to Waikiki, with easy access to the Kalakaua Avenue Strip, and Honolulu's renown Ala Moana Shopping Center and beach park are walking distance. Enjoy the best honolulu and Waikiki have to offer. Waikiki beach via Fort DeRussy Park is two and a half blocks away, 8-10 minutes on foot. Vacation like a tourist, live and dine like a local from this versatile location!  The condo is outfitted with all you'll need for a comfortable stay. Your suite has central air conditioning, free Wifi, digital cable TV. Nice floor plan and separ

My condo was renovated and is fully furnished with full kitchen.  Relax on your personal lanai overlooking the city. Free Wi-Fi, Cable TV, Flat screen TV. The newly renovated kitchen includes a full size refrigerator, stove, oven, microwave, coffee maker, flatware, utensils, wine opener and more... Welcome to our tastefully upgraded and vacation outfitted two bedroom, one bath, It is a short stroll to the beach, local eateries, and shopping. Enjoy the best honolulu and Waikiki have to offer. Waikiki beach via Fort DeRussy Park is two and a half blocks away, 8-10 minutes on foot. Vacation like a tourist, live and dine like a local from this versatile location!  The condo
neighborhood_overview: Walk to: Waikiki Beach, Royal Hawaiian Shopping Center, Ala Moana shopping, Hillton village Hotel fireworks, shops and restaurants. 10 minute walk: all of Waikiki Hike Diamond Head, Koko Head, Manoa Falls, Ka'au Crater
notes: Great location in Waikiki with just blocks away from: Waikiki Beach Hawaii Convention Center Ala Moana Shopping Mall Ala Moana Park
transit: Honolulu airport to Waikiki: About 20-25 drive.   A taxi is approximately $35~45.
access: Royal Aloha has a security guard on duty in the evening and a key is necessary to gain entrance to the elevators from lobby and to the unit. The city bus lines can take you to Ala Moana Shopping Center, Hanauma Bay, around the island and breath taking places in the spectacular island of Oahu.
interaction: Enjoy the ground floor with swimming pool, sun deck and BBQ. Next to the canal and only very short distance of walk to world famous Waikiki Beach and Ala Moana Shopping Center.
house_rules: *No smorking in the condo *Mahalo for removing your shoes in the room *Please dump your trash daily *Lost of security key is $150 of charge

host.host_about:
I love random road trips, traveling the world, and experiencing different cultures. I am a hard working, outgoing, fun loving person who love to have a great time. I enjoy spending time with people who have a sense of humor, and live life to the fullest. 
我会说中文. 
夏威夷是一个度假天堂, 欢迎你们来玩

reviews.comments: Loved the stay. Joanne was an excellent  host. Place was really neat and tidy when we arrived. The Location is perfectly located in downtown Waikiki. Walking distance to many nearby attractions and restaurants. Check in was very easy. Also, the free parking space saved us a lot of money since Parking is normally $20/night.

Joanna was a great host.The apartment was only a 5 minute walk to the beach. She was open, warm, and welcoming ..
I will look forward to seeing her if I ever visit Honolulu again.
Thank Joanna.
The location was super-close to the beach, the check in was easy and convenient, and the apartment has all the basics you'll need for some time in Waikiki.

We had a wonderful time in Joanna's condo. Perfect location. The condo was exceptionally clean and had everything we needed. Beds were comfy too. The parking space was a life saver as you really need a car to get the full benefit of the island. Couldn't rate the place high enough
非常愉快的体验!房间很干净,风景也不错~这是我第一次使用这个软件,留下了深刻印象｡房主人好有耐心的跟我讲解如何拿钥匙及入住~下次去夏威夷还想住他们家~
房间的位置非常的好,距离海滩走路只要十分钟周围的便利店和大型超市以及餐厅都特别的多了对全程的旅行带来了很大的方便,房东的安排非常的周到,准备了全套的厨房用品和当地的果汁作为欢迎备品,房间打扫的一尘不染,毛巾和浴巾也非常的充足,对于十天的住宿绰绰有余,最主要的是提供免费的车位,这在夏威夷旅行无疑是最大的财富!房间的小阳台景观非常好,总之这间房子给我们的旅行增添了最美的一笔,谢谢房东joanna
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice apartment, clean and comfortable, all we needed was there.
Wonderful! We enjoy the house and everything very much. Highly recommended!
Jooannah的公寓地处繁华地段,出行方便安全｡公寓漂亮干净,很有家庭气氛｡Jooannah很热情,我的航班晚点了,她一直等到我｡还有免费车位,停车很方便｡以后有中国朋友去夏威夷旅游,我会推荐jooannah的公寓,因为她讲中文沟通方便｡
The location is very convenient,  the apartment is very clean, the rate is reasonable.  We had a nice stay.  And I can always reach Joanna.

Jooannah's '2bedroom Sweet Home Sleeps 6' is walking distance to the beach and many shops/restaurants.  My parents and I were in Honolulu for a quick 2-night stay to see the Pearl Harbor memorials, so we liked that the building was on the Northern side of Waikiki, closer to the harbor... but that means we did have to take a cab to go the restaurants/bars closer to central Waikiki.  The unit was spacious and clean.  It was nice to have the central air conditioning.

I had a wonderful week long stay at Jooannah's comfortable condo.  The unit was very clean and well located.  An easy walk to the beach and the heart of Waikiki.  Jooannah, was very nice to deal with, incredibly accommodating and very responsive.  I had a great time in Oahu with this as my base and would book it again on my next trip.
Great experience

The apartment is exactly as the photos. It takes several minutes to walk to the waikiki and Alamoa Center and several restaurant. Since the host can speak Chinese, it was so easy for us to communicate with her. We had a really good time staying in Ouhu island.
The trip was fantastic! We had a great time and the condo was impeccable. Would absolutely recommend this for anyone who wants sun and sand!

The place was so nice and clean! It looks exactly as the picture shows. the location is great too - 10 minute walk from Waikiki beach and also great if you are driving. Getting on to the main highway (H1) is so easy. Jooannah was a wonderful host - she was very proactive and responsive and made everything easy. I would absolutely recommend the place.

I'd say the house was good. BUT, SO MANY BUGS. That's what came into our sight when we first opened the door. Bugs were all over the kitchen, dinning table, walls, on the ground and even in the bathroom. I would recommend  the host to hire a pest control company. That was definitely a disgusting experience. Also, the host did not reply to messages on airbnb after accepting the request. I felt a bad communication with the host. In a word, I would not recommend this property.

The process to get settled and leave was pretty simple and painless with the use of pinned lockboxes. No need to wait or meet up. All the amenities are are updated and modern. The place was very clean. Location was great, it was walking distance or close to a bus stop to reach any location we wanted to go. One problem might be the black mold/stain on the ceiling in the bathroom. The other problem was the bugs, but that's not a host problem, there were notices everywhere around the building notifying of a pest control sweep about to happen so this might be a non-issue by now. Overall it was a great experience and would rent from any of her locations again.
Thanks for being a great host. Mahalo

Nous avons adoré notre expérience chez Jooannah. Ce condo était douillet et on se sentait vraiment à la maison. Jooannah nous écrivait un message à tous les jours pour s'assurer que tout se passait bien et que l'on ne manquait de rien.

Jooannah's place was awesome! Just as pictured on the website, excellent location, a very short walk or Uber ride to Waikiki beach. AC was nice to have, and we found the apartment to be very peaceful for being in such a busy part of town. She was not available when I checked in but gave me contact info ahead of time for someone else who was very helpful in getting me into the apartment. Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking!
公寓离威基基海滩10分钟路程,一路上很热闹,房东非常详细的介绍了周边情况,下次有机会去夏威夷一定再入住
The apartment is nice and spacious. It's located close to the beach and there are many restaurants nearby. Unfortunately there are many bugs in the apartment!

Jooannah was a wonderful host. She never missed a call and followed up to make sure check in/out went smoothly. The apartment is centrally located and very secure. The pool isn't much but with the beach within walking distance, it's not an issue. Make sure to clean up after yourself as any apartment in Oahu has little buggies that can out at night.
The apartment was located in the most convenient area, the facility was nice and clean. We certainly enjoyed our stay in Johanna's place. Recommended!
Apartment was as listed.
Great little apartment in a fantastic location.
The apartment was very comfortable and nice location. We had very good vacation.

As advertised, in a great location within walking distance to everything. Stocked w/essentials (pots, pans, utensils, body wash, etc.) to make your stay as comfy as possible. Stayed a week and spotted two roaches but none after that. It wasn't bad enough to the point of not staying. Host was very helpful when needed. Wasn't a fan of having to use the key for everything in the building but got used to it. I would definitely stay again. Thanks Jooannah.
Nice place
Thanks had a great time.

This is a clean, well located condo within 15 min walk of everything. Public transport across the road and hotels nearby for booked tours. Building is safe and secure and Jooannah has made the place very comfortable and welcoming. Easily sleeps 5 without everyone getting on top of each other and plenty of hot water. Light sleepers would need earplugs in the front room as the road below can get pretty busy on Friday and weekend nights. Overall we had a great stay and would highly recommend Jooannah's place as a great place to base yourself during your holiday.
Perfect spot for our family holiday and the price matched our budget but was above our expectations. A good location and set up for a family with school aged children to stay.
Thanks for everything

The apartment was clean and centrally located, it looked
exactly like the photos and was stocked with just about  everything you need.
Jooannah was a good host who was ready to answer our questions.  We stayed there with a group from work and there was enough room for 6 of us. There are lots of shops, beaches, bus stops and places to eat within walking distance if you don't rent a car. We would recommend this place to groups or family's looking to save a bit on expenses.
The place was great. Very roomy and clean. Jooannah provided great instructions and helpful tips. I can't recommend more highly
We love your place next time to Honolulu we book your place again.

I stayed at Jooannah's place while attending a function at the Hawaii convention center. The location couldn't have been more convenient. The cleanliness of the apartment and the communication of the host was excellent. I can recommend this for both business and vacationing families.
It was a nice place to stay, clean and cute decor. Lots of extras that were helpful. No beach towels or chairs. Bring earplugs for sleeping. One of the bedrooms had a lot of outside noise.
I would recommend this place to anyone who visits. Close to everything in Waikiki
很棒的房子 ,很棒的房東 ,也謝謝Julie來協助!一切都是完美的 !

Jannah's place is exactly like the picture shows. We didn't get the meet her in person. But she communicates well thought email and text to make sure we check in ok. Place is about 15 minutes walk to the beach. One thing is not very convenient is the park. Either you have to pay $30 a day for parking or steer parking is not that easy to find.
是小两室一厅,有厨房,可做饭｡离会议中心走路几分钟就到,离海滩走路十几分钟｡屋里有蟑螂,冰箱有异味｡入住的话自己要注意入住时间和退房时间,没有人提醒,我们因为没注意退房时间被罚了25刀｡临街侧晚上过车会比较吵｡床上用品质量一般｡别的都不错,感觉挺安全的｡
房子的地理位置非常好,距离waikiki沙滩十几分钟的路程｡开车去沃尔玛也很快｡停车场每天25美元,在离房子5分钟路程的地方｡房东十分亲热,细心的解答我们各种问题｡附近有家餐厅叫tony roma's,价廉物美｡
Close to Waikiki beach, and the host is nice, but there's a lot of noise comes from the traffic, even we wore the earplugs
Great location for access to the conference center. Good value for money. However, can be noisy due to traffic outside - windows are not very sound proof!
Third floor so we got road noise but unit as clean and comfortable. Easy walking to shops, bus and only ten to fifteen minutes walk to beach.

Great spot in Waikiki. Walking distance to beaches and shopping. Loved having access to BBQ for making our own meals. 
Would definitely stay here again
Great place to stay and excellent location close to everything
Beautiful spot!
Jooannah is really responsive for my last minute call. It's easy to check in. Great location close to beach, city life, and airport. Nice place with a lot of space! We are very happy for everything!
We loved staying here! The location is perfect. Not far from several beaches and great shopping within walking distance.
Good location! Perfect place for family group! Apartment little bit old but inside the room quite clean!
Very good location but super noisy early in the morning everyday. It's a bit too crowded for 5people. Close to 7-11.
Nice location, easy to communicate with host, parking challenging....

This condo is very clean and in a great location, close to the beach, shops and awesome restaurants.  The cheeseburger restaurant across the street has a great breakfast and a great menu with very friendly staff.  We had an awesome week in Waikiki and truly enjoyed the location and the area.  We also took the island tour and visited Pearl Harbour which was truly amazing.
Jooannah is a great host. Thanks!
Hat alles wunderbar geklappt, das Appartement liegt in Gehweite von Strand, Shopping und Restaurants.
A fantastic location, 10-15min from the beach, within Wikiki, close to the harbor
Good place to live and walk to honolulu downtown!
Great location. Good communication, very timely. Very safe place to stay.

Great apartment, easy walking distance to most things. Bit of noise from the road, the windows aren’t very soundproof but very clean and well appointed. David and Jooannah were great hosts, very helpful, we particularly appreciated David showing my husband around the neighborhood.

Jooannah’s condo was exactly what we were looking for for our girls trip to Waikiki. The location was great, only a short walk to shopping, breweries, the beach, etc. The condo is adorable and clean. Jooannah was extremely accommodating with our late request for both check in and check out, and we greatly appreciated that! Though she was physically around, she was easy to communicate with, and has set up a point person to assist us.
I’d definitely recommend staying here!
Thanks again, Jooannah!:)

The apartment was located in a little bit if a shady area. Homeless lunatics wandering the street outside yelling and screaming was a daily part of our routine. There was also the sound of ambulances and fire trucks to serenade us to sleep. The apt is close to Waikiki beach but the building is dank and run down. I was not thrilled with the roaches that greeted me as I opened the microwave door each morning or the kitchen cabinets. I understand that Hawaii has a lot of roaches on the Island we can’t always control what our neighbors do. It is extremely difficult to control each facet of an apartment especially when you are out of town. The cleaning service was mainly to blame for the bugs.I entered the apartment and opened a cabinet door to find opened chips and other snacks left over from the last guest. There was grime and filth next to the garbage, fridge and stove. The cabinets were sticky and the counters weren’t properly wiped down. The one good thing I can say about my experience was that Joanna and Dave were sympathetic to our plight and send an exterminator and an extra deep cleaning service. I wish I would have chosen a different apartment.
Great place and location. Enjoyed our experience here. Can get a bit noisy tho while trying to sleep (very close to busy roads etc).
Jooannah's place was great location for money value however as previously mentioned in reviews    traffic noise was very loud but we found it almost unbearable in front bedroom.

This accommodation is amazing!! And I'd love to emphasise that the owner was so kind. He helped us a lot a lot a lot despite of we needed to book the day before! Thank you very much! If you have chance to get Hawaii, just book here!
Close to Waikiki Beach. The apartment building is old and has a funny smell, but the unit is clean. Liked having the balcony. We were only here for a night, but we enjoyed it. Thanks!

Great location and just as described.  Front bedroom suffers from some road noise, but we enjoyed our stay.  Jooannah was a terrific host and worked hard to make our stay enjoyable.  I would recommend both host and accommodation for an enjoyable stay.

하와이에서 별하나도 아까운집입니다 일단 저희가 일정이 꼬여 급하게 예약하고 메시지로  당일 입실가능하다기에 예약하고 airbnb에서는 당일숙박이 선택되지 않아 그중 하루는 현금 120불 달래서 주었습니다 숙소는 시끄럽고 주변이 모두 일방이라 조금만 벗어나도 찾기 어려웠고 사진과 달리 어둡고 오래된 낡은 아파트에요 수영장은 있지만 좁은 풀에 남자들이 가득해서 사용하고 싶지 읺았어요. 문제는 그날 동생이 아파서 급하게 한국으로 돌아가는 항공권으로 변경하고 다음날분 수수료 50프로 패널티를 감안하고 취소했구 단 하룻밤을 묶었습니다 호스트는 에어비엔비 메세지 대신 계속해서 전화로 대화를 시도했습니다.동생이 아프고 예민해진 상태라 통화를 할수없었는데 호스트의 항의로 하룻밤에 계속 추가결제가 이루어져 모두 700달러 가까이를 지불한 샘입니다 원래 가격은 260달러였습니다 이 문제로 상의하자고 9시30분에 만나기로 두번이나 통화 해놓고 약속시간에 여러번 전화해도 받지 않고 한참 기다린 후에야  다른 대리인이 와서 airbnb랑 대화해보라는 말만 반복하였습니다. 가격은 저렴하지만 밤새 도로소음이 시끄럽고 지저분하고 치안도 위험하고 접근이 불편하며 매우 악질적인 호스트이므로 추천하고 싶지 않습니다 참고하세요. 주차는 25달러 옆건물 주차빌딩을 사용하기 위해서는 여러번의 일방통행도로를 거쳐야 합니다
We really enjoyed our stay! Place was tidy and clean! Host was also amazing and helpful.
great place!

Handy location to the Convention Centre and walkable to Waikiki shopping strip and beach areas. Clean and well presented apartment in an older complex. Comfortable beds, good kitchen facilities, great internet and TV. There can be a lot of street noise at night. The complex is well managed with good tight security access.
This unit is located in a great spot with close walking distance to all the shops and beaches in Waikiki. Johannah provided quick responses and was a pleasure to communicate with.

Jooannah was a great host! She gave us detailed recommendations on where to go and what to do. She responded quickly to any questions I had and made check in very easy in a new city.

The location is exactly where my friends and I wanted to be. We were walking distance to everything we wanted to do in Waikiki. There’s a scooter rental company and restaurants adjacent to the  Royal aloha complex and a 7-11 and abc stores across the street. Also super close to the airport.

The place is great. Very nice and clean. On some Airbnb’s I’ve stayed in the pictures are a bit misleading but not Jooannah’s. The pictures were spot on as to what you get. Plenty of room in common spaces and a nice balcony overlooking downtown Waikiki. Next time I visit Waikiki I am definitely staying at Jooannah’s again.
N/a
Cute place! The room on the street side is a bit noisy and the 4pm/10am check-in/check-out time is quite tight but otherwise great.
Great place!

Awesome place to stay if you want to take part in the activities of Downtown Waikiki. Easily Accessible through Uber or Lyft and not far from many nice beaches and venues. I thoroughly enjoyed my time staying here

There was five of us and we fit comfortably in the apparent.  The facilities were great.  However the selling point is how close it is to  restaurants and public transport. Thank you for a great stay.

There is a 7/11 right next door, an ABC store around the corner and a couple local restaurants. It was A bit noisy at night sometimes if you are a light sleeper. We left some pool floats in the kitchen along with some sunscreen for future airbnbers. There is WiFi and lots of outlets around the condo!
Great place and location for price. Bring your own toiletries and towels if you’re particular.

Jooannah was a great host, she answered quickly and was very accommodating towards me and my guest. The location of the Airbnb is located at a great location that is close to Waikiki with just a few minutes of walking. Basic needs and necessities can be found in the apartment. 

The only issue with this place was that their was a slight pest problem, which I know is out of the hosts hands if it comes from an old building.

All in all it was a great stay! Thanks again for your hospitality!

Clean, comfortable, good location,


Good hotel!

I want to say she is such a great hostess; she was super accommodating.  She met up with us and Explained everything in the apartment and gave us tips on where to go and what to do.  During the hurricane threat she even called and checked up on on us.   She even accommodated to our checkout time due to understanding that I had my elderly parents with me.   My mom loves her and wants return back to Hawaii and would only want to stay at her place.  We stayed there for eight nights. She had enough towels and toiletries to last us our entire stay. Her kitchen was equipped to make your own meals there and have your coffee.   She has central air and the two bedroom more spacious enough to fit about six people in that 2 bedroom apartment.  We Only had a party of three and it was a perfect size . loved it.

We had a lovely stay.  The apartment is small but sufficient. There is air conditioning, a small pool and a bath tub which was great for our little boy. The apartment is quite noisy from the air conditioning and the road, however I guess that is due to the conveniently central location. Joannah was very helpful, accommodating and informative. Overall we had a great stay in Sweet Waikiki.

This is a great find, condo is clean and has everything you need. Parking is cash only just a heads up if you use the parking suggested. Get up before sunrise and walk a across the street to the North and watch it rise over the canal, simply stunning!
Everything was good.
生活很方便 屋内应有尽有 很好的体验
Good location, great price, we experienced mechanical and plumbing issues with the unit and owner resolved the issues with speed and professionalism so we could continue our vacation in paradise.
I had the best time at Jooannah’s place, clean, respectable and very rapid response also might i add Walkable to everything :)

Jooannah is kind, prompt with her responses and a honest host. Her place is within walking distance to the beach and food places. If you want to get to central beach, it’s a $7 Lyft drive. The outside area isn’t super desirable but the inside of her place is clean, cutely decorated and plenty of sleeping space. I would recommend it to others!

It was located in a very convenient spot to access to either beach or fwys. Jooannah was also very cooperative for communication. Couple things I could say are... we were only given 1 towels per guest for entire 4 days... luckily i did bring some of my own towels. Also, starting from big to tiny cockroaches were welcoming us which wasn’t quite pleasant.

Jooannah's place was incredibly clean! The location was pretty great spot, pretty central to everything.  We didn't realize street parking was so troublesome, so if you have a car, it is a huge headache to constantly search for parking unless you want to pay for the hotel parking ($25/night). 

We had some small roaches that came out at night but I think this is just because the building is old and will probably see this all around Oahu. 

Overall, Jooannah was very responsive and a great host for our lovely stay.
The place is as advertised. My family and I had a relaxing stay.
Good place to stay and visit beach and shopping mall under 15min by walk.
Great place to stay near everything! As mentioned there was some traffic noise during the night but this was okay considering the location. Very well equipped kithcen and even sand toys for the kids!

The apartment is really very good located in Honolulu. You can go to all restaurants and bars by feet and don't need to risc your driving license. The apartment is also nice and cosy, only the room to the front (main road) is a bit loud, but it is Honolulu and normal.

徒歩でﾜｲｷｷにも近く 室内は清潔でとってもお洒落です｡
対応も早く この価格で泊まれるますからお勧めです｡
Alert the bedding hygiene.

Great host! Johanna always was in contact with us assisting and recommending us all we needed for enjoying Honululu. 
100% recommendable. Don’t hesitate, contact Joohanna and book her apartment!
A cozy apartment in a convenient location, and a good value.
お部屋は清潔でした｡ﾍﾞｯﾄのｽﾌﾟﾘﾝｸﾞも快適!立地もなかなか良かったﾃﾞｽ!

If you like a place that’s low maintenance and independent from involvement of others, this is your place in the heart of Waikiki. We really enjoyed our time and people watching from the balcony. Perfect for us who wanted to play all day and come ‘home’ to relax.

Joannah two bedroom condo is in a good location-walking distance to restaurants and the beach. Paid parking ($25) is around the corner. Although the address is on Ala Wai the entrance is on McCully with a short flight of stairs. Check in was a bit confusing. The building is old and dated but has a wonderful coffee shop next door. The decor of the condo is dated but is very clean. We had plenty of room for our family of 4 plus infant. It was very convenient to have the washer and dryer down the hall. Even though there was a fee of $50, with an infant we appreciated Joannah allowing us both an early and late checkout.
great spot, excellent location. would love to stay here again.

Neighborhood: My flat located in the center of Nisantası which is the most stylish suburb in Istanbul, H
neighborhood_overview: Neighborhood: My flat located in the center of Nisantası which is the most stylish suburb in Istanbul, Home to some of the city's prominent artists and intellectuals as well as many expats. It is well known as the fashion district and it is considered to be one of Istanbul's most exclusive neighbourhoods. The district hosting variety of exclusive brands and shops offering Turkish and international designer labels, art galleries, restaurants of international cuisine, cafés and nightclubs.
transit: Location: While your stay, you will be 8 minutes walking distance to Osmanbey Metro Station. (aprox.400 meters) 10 minutes walking distance to Maçka Demokrasi Parkı , unrevealed in term of one the biggest greenery in Istanbul which is great for jogging and to hangout. 2 kms (15-20 min walking distance) to Taksim Square There is dolmus (shared cab) option at beginning of street across from tesvikiye mosque which is just 250 meters away from my flat that leaves you on Taksim square, in front of Gezi pastry shop for 1 euros. 20 minutes walking distance to Zeytinburnu-Kabataş Tram Line (T1) which is undoubtedly the most interesting line for tourists because it connects the historical part of Istanbul with the modern part of Istanbul by crossing the Galata Bridge. Süleymaniye Mosque), Beyazıt and Cemberlitaş (gates of the Grand Bazaar and famous hamam), Sultanahmet (plenty of sightseeing spots), Eminönü (Spice Market, New Mosque and Scenic Bosphorus Cruise & Kadıköy ferry dock), Karaköy (wi
access: The guests will be provided with a very detailed guidebook,that will help you experience Istanbul as a native.
interaction: I'm always available to answer questions and help before, during and after your stay.
house_rules: No pets allowed. No Smoking.

host.host_about: My Name is Onur Salih. I graduated at AIB University at Bolu. I would like to travel historical places, playing basketball with my friend and online chess tournament. I really cant wait to meet my new guest.

reviews.comments: As a frequent traveler, this was was one of the most great experience, mister Onur Salih was helpful since my arrival at the airport, by guiding the taxi all the way to the hotel. Once arrived to the hotel, all the friendly staff took care of us and baggage, the room was as described very comfortable and clean, we asked for few things for the kitchen and extra pillows, we got them right away, I recommend this place to everyone looking for very good value for money.

It was a very good and comfortable experience. There was everything which can be expected from a suit hotel. It is also very close to metro station and central regions of Istanbul. I can suggest very strongly.

We are very satisfied! Grat apartment and very nice team, very centrally located.Supermarket nearby, to shop and cook for themselves. We recommend it with a clear conscience. Nisantasi has many fine restaurants and cafes. Louis Vuitton, Burberry, Prada all luxury shops are in the near.Nice Place :)
We enjoyed our stay in the apartment very much. The location is very convenient, the host was very helpful and I can definitely recommend it!

Everything was great, Onur Salih was very helpful in every way possible.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A good place for singles who wish to cover many areas in Istanbul
It was really great to stay at Carina Suites Hotel. I was happy to live there for couple of weeks. Really advice everyone who wants to stay in Osmanbey. =)
Me and my two friends stayed at carina park and we loved it! Great staff avaliable to help 24/7. Also suitable for big families.

name: Sun-Drenched Williamsburg Apartment
summary: We are a warm, ebullient couple looking to rent our apt on a quiet street in the heart of Williamsburg, filled with trendy shops, restaurants, & boutiques. Our home is 650 sq ft. It is spacious, clean, & well-decorated with a beautiful outdoor deck.
description: We are a warm, ebullient couple looking to rent our apt on a quiet street in the heart of Williamsburg, filled with trendy shops, restaurants, & boutiques. Our home is 650 sq ft. It is spacious, clean, & well-decorated with a beautiful outdoor deck.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Kind, warm, respectful

reviews.comments: Alyssa was very nice and able to help with our requests. Her place is nice and conveniently located to explore Williamsburg and Brooklyn. I'd recommend this place!

name: Park Slope Garden Level Studio
summary: Newly renovated garden level, brownstone 800 sq ft studio, eat-in kitchen and shared garden.  Easy access to subway, Prospect Park, shops and restaurants.  Enjoy this clean, quiet, spacious retreat from the area's attractions.  3 night minimum.
space: This space was newly renovated in January.  It is a very large (800 sq ft) studio, with a spacious eat-in-kitchen.  The living space has a queen size bed and pull out sofa, to accommodate up to a family of four.
description: Newly renovated garden level, brownstone 800 sq ft studio, eat-in kitchen and shared garden.  Easy access to subway, Prospect Park, shops and restaurants.  Enjoy this clean, quiet, spacious retreat from the area's attractions.  3 night minimum. This space was newly renovated in January.  It is a very large (800 sq ft) studio, with a spacious eat-in-kitchen.  The living space has a queen size bed and pull out sofa, to accommodate up to a family of four. 1/2 a block from the F train; 2.5 blocks from the R train. $100 cleaning fee for stays of one week or longer.
notes: $100 cleaning fee for stays of one week or longer.
transit: 1/2 a block from the F train; 2.5 blocks from the R train.
house_rules: No gatherings other than of guests permitted on the shared garden space.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: This place is awesome. It is located on the garden level of a classic brownstone on a tree lined street just a few steps away from the "F" line subway. It's about 15 minutes ride into lower Manhattan. There are great restaurants nearby and Prospect Park which is totally amazing, having been designed by the same guy who designed Central Park. The hosts are great communicators and attended to all our needs. The back patio was a great respite after many miles of walking in the city. Highly recommend.

Christina and Gustavo were very nice and accommodating. The apartment was clean and is in a beautiful area and even though I set up the apartment alarm by mistake late at night once, which woke them up, they were very nice. They were also flexible in my departure time. I definitely recommend.

Great hosts & the apartment was everything that we needed for a six week temporary solution while we were waiting for our own place nearby to be ready. Conveniently located a few steps from the F train, close to many restaurants and bars with a delicious cake store on the corner, I gained 10 pounds!

I highly recommend Christiana and Gustavo's place! They are incredible hosts, always doing anything they can to make you feel at home. The studio is just as described, super clean, spacious and cozy and the location is great!
Great apartment and great location.
Great place! Right in the middle of everything, and a very comfortable bed!
Great location and clean space!

Christiana and Gustavo were kind and helpful hosts - it was easy to communicate, they made sure we had everything we needed and live upstairs from the apartment. The apartment is the basement flat of a classic brownstown, it is spacious but does not get that much light during the day. Then again, it has access to the pretty backyard. The area is brilliant, lots of exciting dining options and bars right nearby, and Prospect Park is 3 blocks away. It is also super close to the F and G train. A great place to stay in Park Slope!

Fantastic place! Big rooms and a great garden. We have had breakfast there nearly every morning. Between de birds and squirrels. Lovely,
,  Beautiful neighborhood with many supermarkets and coffe to ga places. Subway around the corner. For us uncomfortable beds for 4 persons. (To soft for us) for the rest; cannot imagine a better place to be. Near the parc, near the city near the beach.
Simple but good apartment. Good location. Close to many shops, restaurants, bars and train stations. Great hosts. Would recommend.
The location was fantastic and Christiana was very responsive when we had questions! Really enjoyed our stay.
The house is clean and comfortable and the neighborhood is perfect for families, quite, safe, close to the park and Metro.
Nice place, cleans, subway around the corner!
Christiana's home is a reliable place to stay. Its simple, clean, and close to the subway. Christiana was always quick to respond to our questions and needs.

Superb location, really convenient with subway within 1 min walk and many things around and yet a very residential and friendly neighborhood. Studio is very clean and had everything we needed, we had a great experience and would definitely stay there again. Thanks again Christiana and Gustavo!
Simple, comfortable, basic, and cozy apartment, great for 1-2 people. Easy logistics and communication, great value.

This is a cozy studio in an ideal Park Slope location. It's a garden unit so it doesn't get a lot of light, but it's very comfortable and has everything you need. My mother stayed there for six weeks and it very much became a second home for her. She loved it.
Excelente!! Ubicacion y departamento
Nice clean accommodations in excellent location in Park Slope area.   Owners responsive to texts.   Would stay here again!
Excellent value in an amazing location. This is a great home base to explore both Manhattan and Brooklyn.
Small, cozy apartment in a lovely neighborhood. Would definitely come back to Park Slope.

El departamento de Christiana es precioso, tal como se describe en la publicación. Es espacioso, muy bonito, confortable y en una ubicación espléndida. Lo disfrutamos con mi esposo y mi hija de casi dos años. 
Hay supermercados a unas cuadras, estaciones de subte que conectan con la cuidad rápido y fácil. Parques, restaurantes, tiendas. Incluso fuimos y volvimos en subte al aeropuerto. Súper recomendable!

Christiana‘ apartment is beautiful, as described. Spacious, lovely, confortable and on a great location. We’ve enjoyed it with my husband and little girl.
There are supermarkets a few blocks away and subway stations very near that can take you to the city fast and easy. Parks , restaurants and stores nearby. We even took the subway to the airport both times.
Highly recommended!
Best place we ever stayed in NYC! Clean, pretty near to F-train, nice neighborhood. Can’t wait to go back!

The Appartement is very clean and very well located. The garden is very pleasant. The subway is only 2 mn walking.
The Wifi works very well.
It's perfect for two persons, but not well adapted for two people because of the inconfortable sofa bed.
Great location in Brooklyn, great communication from hosts, overall good value to visit New York and stay in a safe neighborhood and easily and quickly get around.

Christiana’s  place was great for our family of four.  Both beds are comfortable. We used the electric pump provided for the sofa bed and the kids were very happy. Great location, plenty of shops just a short walk away. Being So close to prospect park was an added bonus. And very easy to get to manhattan on the F Line.

We had a very comfortable stay at Christiana's place. The house is located in a very safe neighbourhood with a CVS pharmacy and many options to eat just around the corner. Its a walk away from the beautiful prospect park. The house has all the basic amenities and Christiana and Gustavo were there to answer our queries anytime we needed anything. Its a great place if you are visiting NYC.
Christiana was a super helpful and amazing host. the place is very well located and super safe and well connected neighborhood
Excelente ubicación!!

We had a great stay in Christiana’s apartment. It was slightly unclear on what we did on arrival and departure but she was quick to respond to all our queries. Would definitely recommend this place to others!
Spacious apartment with great amenities and excellent location - Christiana's place was perfect for our family of four!

Le logement était propre et fonctionnel
A 2 min des bus et métros 
Plusieurs restaurants bien sympathiques à proximité 

Boys avons passé un très bon séjour

Appartement bien situé dans Park Slope, métro et tous les services à proximité. Lit un peu étroit mais ok pour quelques nuits. Salle de bain propre. Cuisine complète. Bon rapport qualité-prix si vous recherchez un simple pied-à-terre pour dormir à Brooklyn.
Great place to stay! Super close to the subway! Just one line to get into the city! Would stay again.
Perfect for my mom. No stairs!
Great neighborhood, clean house, great for our family of 4. Quiet and comfortable place. We definitely could return. Thanks!

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the "Place Des Arts"  downtown Montreal. It is one of the most famous place in the city.  Walking distance to St-Laurent street, McGill, St-Catherine street, McGill University.  The is a unique neighbourhood because it's safe, full of day and night activities, existing, and most importantly, it is where every events are taking place.  Shopping, restaurants, wine bar, parc, and so much more is available at your door.  This is the perfect spot to discover Montreal, to spend nice and exiting vacation.
notes: From the airport, there is the Bus 747 that take you not far from the appartement.
transit: There is plenty of convenient public transit. Public transportations will take you everywhere around the city.  - 10 meters Walk to Subway Metro - 24 Hour Bus stops right out front of apartment - 5 mins to Jeanne Mance Park - Apartment right on Place des arts Festivals - 7 minutes walk to Eaton Center (Mall) -  Restaurants, shopping, bars, entertainment, all walking distance from apartment (Crescent street, Saint Catherine boulevard, etc)  - 24 Hour Restaurants, 24 Hour Grocery, 24 Hour Pharmacy, 24 Hour Bus, all walking distance.
access: Everything
interaction: I'm 24/7 available by text, phone, email and AirBnb.  Don't hesitate to contact me, if there is anything I can do to help you.
house_rules: No Smoking in the appartement

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed Leyla's apartment! It's spacious and lies right in the heart of Montreal, has a nice view and the pool and fitness room are great. The apartment was clean and everything went smooth and uncomplicated! Thank you!
The place was in a very convenient location. We walked to pretty much everywhere within downtown. The place is nice and spacious - just as it is in the pictures.
The location was great and just as advertised.  The apartment was very nice and the photos were an accurate depiction of what we were getting.  We had a great stay.

The apartment was amazing, comfortably furnished and well located right in the city center. Metro station "Place des Arts" and Bixi station (Montreal system for cheap biking through the city) was situated just next door. Leyla was very friendly and helped us with every information we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: The 2-BDRM WAIKIKI VIEW - Sleeps 4
summary: • 10-Day minimum • 2-BDRM / 1-Bath / 784 Sq. Ft / Sleeps 4 / 11th Floor • AC in Master BDRM / Ceiling Fans in both Bedroom • Diamond Head, Mountain and Ala Wai water views • Safe & Secured building • Spacious, Open Concept, Beautifully Decorated, Bright and Breezy with floor to ceiling windows • 2-blocks to famous Waikiki beach • Parking Available - $15/day • Pool & BBQ area • Final Price Includes all Taxes & Fees Check In - 3PM Check Out - 11AM
space: The Monte Vista building is in the heart of and centrally located in Waikiki on Liliuokalani Ave between Kuhio Ave on the corner of Ala Wai Blvd.  It’s a high-end, clean with a very beautiful, spacious and welcoming lobby with 2-elevators and lobby seating.  It’s a highly secured building of entry, elevator and parking structure. Superb location with minutes walk to EVERYWHERE including Waikiki beaches, Diamond Head, Restaurants, Shopping, Grocery stores, Entertainment, the Zoo, the main strip of Kalakaua, Bus stops, Taxi stands and minutes to Ala Moana Shopping Center. The fully renovated kitchen and bath with granite counter tops, cabinets, sink, faucets and mirrors gives this unit the WOW factor that it deserves.  Each bedroom has its own bathroom vanity with shared shower and toilet.  This unit is on the 11th floor in a secured building of entry, elevator and parking garage.  It is fully equipped with kitchen, bath, bedroom and beach amenities for all your cooking and eating needs.
