It’s a highly secured building of entry, elevator and parking structure. Superb location with minutes walk to EVERYWHERE including Waikiki beaches, Diamond Head, Restaurants, Shopping, Grocery stores, Entertainment, the Zoo, the main strip of Kalakaua, Bus stops, Taxi stands and minutes to
neighborhood_overview: The Monte Vista building is on the Ala Wai canal with Diamond Head, mountain and water views.  It's 2- blocks to famous Waikiki beach as well as many restaurants, night life and shopping.  It's just far enough from the hustle and bustle which makesl the Monte Vista building a very quiet area.
transit: Uber, Lyft, taxi or public transportation.
access: EARLY CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT OPTION: (If Schedule Allows) * Normal Check-In 3PM.  Early check-in option from 9AM - $50 Fee * Normal Check-Out 11AM.  Late check-out option until 6PM - $50 Fee RESERVED PARKING STALL: * Reserved Parking Stall Available @ $15/day * DOOR TO DOOR AIRPORT PICK-UP & DROP-OFF SERVCE - $40 to $50 depending on pick-up and drop-off time (If schedule allows) You will save on expensive taxi fare and the confusion of “where do I go" “how do I get the key" and checking in, etc.  Also a great way to welcome, greet and meet my guests and get to know one another on the drive to Waikiki.
house_rules: HOUSE GUIDELINES: This is NOT A HOTEL but some one's personal home that should be given the utmost respect during your stay and left in the condition you found it or better. DURING YOUR STAY:  • Wash dishes at all times, unwashed dishes and food attracts bugs   • Respect and keep the noise down especially between 9PM-9AM • Wash sand off and shake towels at the beach before coming to the apt  • Please advise Derek if anything breaks or malfunction during your stay • Cash payment will be paid directly to Derek if any items get broken • Maintain the apt in an orderly, clean and tidy fashion during your stay.  It makes an easier and efficient check-out as well ensure that no personal items are forgotten • Make yourself at home and enjoy your stay!!! UPON CHECK-OUT: • PLEASE… do a full apartment sweep of Bedroom, Drawers, Closets, Bathroom, Kitchen, and Fridge to ensure no personal items are forgotten • PLEASE… throw away and discard all open foods from fridge • PLEASE… empty all trash in t

host.host_about:
ALOHA, I am the President & CEO of Derek Daniels Productions & Entertainment Company.  I am also own 5-condos in Waikiki offered on AirBnB, a free-lance interior decorator, a real-estate stager and a personal property manager.  I am world-traveled master hula instructor, a professional Broadway dancer, choreographer, entertainer and costume designer.  I’m fluent in Japanese and French due to world travel.

Being in the entertainment industry, I am a people person and love meeting new people.  I was born and raised in Hawaii and I love to help my guests of “where to go and what to do” from a locals point of view and what Hawaii has to offer.  
 
I take my hosting very serious and offer only clean, safe, comfortable and beautiful accommodations to my AirBnB guests.  

I look forward to your staying and enjoying my home will in Paradise. 
Mahalo Nui Loa,
Derek

reviews.comments: Derek was extremely kind and helpful throughout our visit. The apartment was just as pictured. We were very close to beach and the main tourist area in Waikiki. He even brought in more linens and soap for us.
Great place and Derek was a great host. Place was as described and free parking was icing on the cake. Very good location as well. Highly recommended!

The 2 bedroom is in an old building in a great location. The bathroom, mainly the shower, is very old and a bit dingy. We also encountered a number of cockroaches, which, given that it's Hawaii is not shocking. That said I think the place can be a bit cleaner and less musty. There is only one air conditioning unit, which means one of the bedrooms isn't air conditioned. But all this said, the apartment is decent for a short period of time. Having a kitchen, washer and dryer while on vacation is fantastic, after all.

The main thing that made our stay a bit weird was Derek's communication. My mother, who I was traveling with, asked if we could have a few more beach towels as there weren't enough for the 4 of us. After he said that he didn't, my mother texted that he should probably have more. Granted, I have no doubt that my mother's tone could have been better. But I don't think it excuses his response. In response he called her, mad that she texted rather than called (it was late), raised his voice and said things like "I don't have a thousand towels to give you." The conversation ended with him hanging up on her. The experience made us avoid communication with him for the rest of our stay.

Derek's apartment was excellent.  He greeted us at 3:00am due to flight delays and yet he greeted us with with open arms.  The location is central to Waikiki to food and shops all in walking distance.   Derek was extremely easy to get a hold of via text or by phone.   He would follow up to ensure our stay was comfortable and accommodating.   The apartment was clean and very nicely furnished.  And to top it off, we had a great view!   I will be definitely back again.

Derek had an awesome place for us to stay at. It made our whole vacation. With a 5 minute walk to Waikiki, what more can you ask for. Walking distance to great shops, restaurants, marketplaces, we couldn't ask for more. Hardly interacted with Derek with exception to receiving the keys and handing them off but that's exactly what we wanted. Definitely a place I would recommend staying at.

Derek was incredibly friendly in welcoming us into his home, he made sure that all of our needs were taken care of and helped us feel like he was in contact if there was anything that could possibly arise.

He made sure we knew the fun island hotspots and helped us with our beach gear.

Derek is a great host and I highly recomend him.

We enjoyed staying in this perfectly situated property in Waikiki. Great location, perfect space for 4 adults with car parking bonus. Fully furnished with cooking utensils. Derek's hospitality made our experience so much better! Thank you!

Derek was very friendly and responsive. He was very easy to contact through text or call. The apartment had all the basic necessities. The parking spot was very convenient. The location was very good- close to the beach, shopping and ABC stores.

Derek was absolutely wonderful! He helped us out when needed and made us feel more than welcome. He was also available whenever we called. His condo is exactly like the pics and we definitely loved the location. Quietly tucked away from the action of Waikiki beach but only a 5 minute walk from the beach. Derek, our stay an the rental was just perfect!!

Derek was super welcome and friendly! My plane was delayed an hour so he had to wait for us extra but he didn't seem to be annoyed at all. his place is clean, tidy and cuzy. the location is great! it's only a short walk away from the beach, many restaurants (an amazing musubi place included), an outdoor mall and many convenient stores.  I stayed there with my husband and my parents. the layout of the place was perfect for 2 couples. it's not big but every inch of the place was leverage to its full potential. Derek stocked up on everything we needed there including shampoo, conditioner , body wash (he used legit brands), towels, snorkel gears and etc. i definitely recommend Derek's place.
房主很和气｡地理位置不错,走10分钟可到威基基海滩｡有固定的车位｡房间干净整洁,只有一个房间有空调｡

Derek was great. Super communicative, very prompt, very charming.
Place was exactly as promised, very secure building.
Gave us great recommendations of places to eat & go to.
Place was all stocked up, loved that it had a washer/dryer (so nice when you go to the beach and walk around Honolulu a lot when it's really humid).

Would definitely use this place again and recommend to friends.

My family & I enjoyed our stay. The place was nice, clean & had everything we needed. The building was very secure & safe and it was great having a parking stall. Derek was super nice and helpful. He let me know that we could check in early and he accomodated for us changing our check out time. The location is close to the main part of Waikiki. I would definitely recommend this rental. We plan to come back next time we are in town.

Derek was a perfect host. The condo was exactly as shown on airbnb - beautifully furnished, very clean, great view, safe and close to everything you could possibly need (ABC-Store, shopping, dining, beach...). Derek answered all our questions about Hawaii when we checked-in - he gave us tips on what to do while on Hawaii. Long story short: everything was perfect. We definitely recommend this rental. Thanx for the wonderful time, Derek :-)

Derek was such a great host! He was able to meet us when our flight had been delayed. He made me and my family's stay very comfortable with a beautifully furnished condo along with amenities; he went over and beyond for leaving us the necessities in a home. This place was convenient and close to literally everything. I spent every morning walking to the beach (only a 5 minute walk), and was close to many restaurants and shopping in the area. He was very responsive and friendly to my family and I. Would definitely consider coming back to stay again, we had an awesome time. Thank you!

Derek was very welcoming on our arrival to Hawaii and even though we arrived from the airport earlier than first anticipated, he had no issues in meeting us earlier and welcoming us to the apartment!  

The apartment is in a great location with just a 400 metre walk to the beach!  Derek was very helpful with our queries and an excellent host.  It's the little things that stand out and Derek had everything covered, even providing snorkeling equipment for our trips to the beach!   Would definitely recommend staying with Derek and will definitely be contacting him when I return to Hawaii.  

Thanks for everything Derek - I really enjoyed my time in Hawaii!

When we arrived Derek was away but he'd arranged for his friend Donovan to meet us who was helpful and welcoming. Having said that, Derek was really good at communicating beforehand so there were never any concerns or problems. The apartment was nicely decorated and had a lovely outlook over the canal. Location was great as it was a short walk to the beach and close to the Waikiki shops.

Derek was really nice and great to work with.  He was able to check us in with no issues and check out was a breeze.  The condo was just as described in the ad.  Everything was within walking distance and with a parking stall included is a huge plus especially in Waikiki!

We enjoyed our stay in Derek's home. It was clean and the size was perfect for ourselves and our 2 children. The apartment is at the back of Waikiki, but we never felt unsafe at all. Would stay again.

We had a great time staying at Derek's property.  It was perfectly located with a short stroll to the beach front.  

The property is well maintained and has all the features you require to enjoy your stay.

The pool and bbq area was a great chill out zone.

We stayed here with my mom for our 6 days trip. It is a nice size for 3 ppl with everything you need from basic kitchen utensils, beach towels and snorkeling equipments. Condo was little outdated and not as clean as I expected, however the location is unbeatable. About few blocks walk to waikiki beach, restaurants and grocery store. Very convenient! In addition, this building is very secured. We feel very safe during our stay. We would recommend this place for sure.
전체적으로 와이키키 비치와 다운타운과의 근접성이 좋고 상대적으로 조용한 커널쪽에 위치해서 심야에는 취침하기에 상대적으로 좋았어요

There is a lot to like about this rental: quiet, convenient location a few blocks from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki Beach, overlooking the Ala Wai Canal, pleasant view of the Honolulu hills from the balcony. Nicely furnished, comfy beds, plenty of hot water.  The "ABC" convenience store is a quick walk for food and sundries. The AC in the master bedroom works well, but it can get a little warm in the second bedroom if the doors are closed.  The provided fan helps to ameliorate the heat. Also, we misconstrued the "one and a half bathrooms" wording.  There are (as shown in the pictures) two vanities adjacent to a central room with one shower and one toilet.  That said, Derek is a responsive, pleasant host, and we can certainly recommend this place.

We really enjoyed our stay at Derek's home. He was a true
gentleman and went out of his way to be helpful and make our stay memorable. Derek gave us great advice and made us feel welcome. The condo is very pretty and resembles all of the pictures. The location is only 4 blocks (5 minutes) from the beach and close to several grocery stores. There is also parking spot at the condo that is quite convenient.  When we return to Honolulu, we will most certainly stay with Derek again and so should you!

Derek's apartment was clean, spacious and in a great location.  He corresponded with us constantly prior to arrival and his friends met us at the front door due to other commitments Derek had on the day.  The beds were very comfortable and everything worked well in the apartment.  Two bathrooms worked very well for us and our teenage son.  We found all the information left by Derek in the apartment to be very helpful.

Great location, walking distance to beach, restaurants and shopping. Very clean, roomy apartment perfect for two couples. Apartment had everything you need, would definitely recommend staying here when visiting Waikiki.

Derek did a great job welcoming us and giving us a tour of the condo.  He gave us good advice on restaurants and nearby activities.  We appreciated the chairs, mats, bogie boards and other beach needs. Convenient to beach and Waikiki. (easy walking distance)  Nice to have an off road parking space.  Would definitely stay there again if in Honolulu.  Our family of four, two college kids, fit well in the condo.
We had a great stay in Derek's apartment in Waikiki. It was spacious, clean and had all that we needed. Derek was friendly and maintained contact throughout our stay.

Derek is a great host, responding to all communication promptly and welcoming us warmly to his home.  The condo is compact but very comfortable for four and is conveniently located near the Ala Wai Canal.   The parking space is a real bonus and there is a small pool area within the complex. Derek is a lovely guy and happy to provide his guests with local information, eg good eating spots etc. If you need to contact Derek from the airport make sure you have some data as the airport doesn't have great wifi connectivity. We enjoyed our stay.

깔끔하고 편리한 숙소! 위치도 아주 좋아요.
와이키키해변까지 도보로 접근이 가능합니다
부기보드와 스노쿨링 물품등도 구비되어 있어  좋았고 파킹이 무료인건 정말 최고 장점이에요.
Nice and wonderful and safe house. Perfect location to waikiki. There are so many convenience item for beach in house.

Derek's place is in a great location. The apartment has great stuff for use at the beach (chairs, umbrella, snorkel and surf gear) The beach access at the top of the street is great! 
Communication was always very prompt. 
We enjoyed the stay!

We had a great stay at Derek's condo in Waikiki. The location was perfect and the place was very cozy and had everything we needed for our stay. We could walk to the beach, shopping mall and supermarket in five minutes. He was very friendly and welcoming. Great host. Would definitely stay again!

We were a party of 4 adults sharing the 2 bedroom apartment. The host was excellent in all aspects of the booking. He also provided transport eg airport transfers etc. He was informative and very welcoming. The apartment is well located and most services are within easy walking distance. Local buses are also nearby for accessing services beyond Wiakiki. It is if a good 4 star standard and was comfortable.

Derek was a wonderful host during our stay in Waikiki. He provided awesome supplies like beach towels and snorkeling gear for free! The apartment is in a great location with really nice decor, and is kept in great shape. I highly recommend this listing for anyone visiting Hawaii

Great location.  Short walk to the beach and shops of Waikiki. Very comfortable accommodation with everything you could possibly need. There was even beach gear to use. Derek was there to let us in and show us around the condo. He was very friendly and quick to respond to all communication. I would recommend this place to anyone and would stay here in a heartbeat again.

We had a great and memorable experience in Waikiki.  Derek was a great to work with and his apartment had everything we needed.  We loved the snorkeling gear and boogie boards that he made available to us.  He also had great recommendations for local dining and entertainment.  My friends and I happily recommend Derek and his home to anyone looking for a place to stay in the area.
Sincerely,
Ryan R.
Great experience. Derek had everything and was super friendly and helpful. Place worked great for us. I'd recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 74 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Omg! Derek is the BEST host I ever met in my airbnb experiences. His house literally so clean and well organized! Modern+Hawaiian touch interior such a chic!  If you looking for vacay house near Waikiki, you must pick this place. Many thanks to Derek!

Four of us stayed at Derek's condiminium for 3 nights. The location was great, only 5 minutes walk to Waikiki beach & shops & restaurants by the score.

The place is comfortable. Derek was overseas when we arrived however he organised a friend  to let us in & show  us the place. 

From the females point of view the only things missing were an ironing board & a kettle. We would stay there again next visit. Paul & Margaret
What a fantastic location! Derek's apartment is extremely well looked after and has everything you need for a short or extended stay. If stay here again for sure.

Derek met us when we arrived.  He showed us where everything was and how to operate the gate and elevator.  The room was clean and just as it appeared in the pictures.  Derek had water and ice in the fridge for us.

Three older women on a dream vacation to Waikiki and this place was awesome! Two block walk to the beaches, close to the zoo, and freeway but it faces the beautiful canal. Wonderful breezes flow through every room, we were very comfortable. The kitchen is fully stocked, and we loved having our morning coffee on the balcony. Having a washer and dryer in the condo was very convenient too. Derek is so welcoming and provides you with beach towels, snorkels,  boogie boards, even sunscreen! What a wonderful host he is. Thank you so very much for helping to make our dream come true.
Great place to stay, easy access to everything, regular host communication, clean and plenty of amenities. Loved our trip . Mahalo

Derek's place was wonderful,.
We had parking in the building, his description was accurate.  We could walk to the beach, shops, restaurants.
 He was a great host!

Derek's place is fantastic! My friend and I spent 4 weeks here and it truly could not have been a better, more comfortable stay. Derek is so sweet and helpful, and was always very easy to reach via text/call. 

Pros:
-Quiet but literally 1.5 blocks from all the hustle and bustle (restaurants, bars, ABC stores, groceries, shopping, beach, etc.)
-Gated very secure building. We kept the front door open most days while we were home and the worst thing that ever happened was we had an adorable toddler come visit us
-Balcony with table/chairs and a gorgeous view of the canal
-All kinds of beach supplies (chairs, umbrella, snorkel gear, floaties, beach towels)
-In unit washer/dryer
-Fully stocked kitchen (pots, pans, dishes, coffee maker, toaster, blender, etc, even some tupperware and plastic/paper supplies)
-One sink in each room (shower/toilet are shared)
-Reserved parking space in gated lot

Cons:
-Mattresses are fairly firm (plus or minus depending on your preference)
-The smaller bedroom has shutters separating it from the kitchen/living room. My friend and I had similar schedules so this was never an issue but the shutters really don't block out any sound.
-WiFi is not the fastest. Pages take a second to load. We were able to stream Netflix some days, other times not at all.
-There's only 1 AC unit and it's in the master. While I was very concerned about this before our trip, we hardly ended up using it. If you open the front and balcony doors, there's there's a strong cross breeze that cools the apartment well. Also there's a large fan in the smaller bedroom which I used at night.
-You can't receive mail/packages here

It was a great vacation.

Derek met us at the airport and took us to the apartment.

He showed us the place where we will live, answered our questions, advised the places that should be visited.

The presentation was excellent, we immediately liked the apartments.

The location of the apt is very convenient, a few minutes walk to the ocean, in the neighborhood there are several shops, at night it is very quiet, so nothing will interfere with your sleep.

The apartment is fully consistent with the photos. Two bedrooms, kitchen and living room, toilet and shower. There is air conditioning, refrigerator, stove, washing machine, and everything else that is necessary for a comfortable stay.

We really enjoyed staying at Derek's apt. To all who are going to have a good vacation in Hawaii, we definitely can recommend this place.
可步行至Waikiki,购物或者去Waikiki海滩都很方便｡
The apartment was great. Nice, clean, great view, great location. Derek was very nice, helpful, and very quick to respond.

The condo is just as pictured: very stylish and comfortable.  We appreciated the cleanliness and convenient location.  Be mindful that with the convenient location comes street/traffic noise. (You're in the middle of a large city, after all.)  It was our choice to have the windows open to enjoy the breezes, so we were aware of the traffic.  But, you could use air conditioning.  This comment would likely apply to any apt. near the beach/downtown. 

The kitchen was extremely well equipped--right down to rubber gloves for tidying up!  We had a rented car part of the time, and the parking space was an added plus.  Highly recommend this condo.  Derek is an enthusiastic and welcoming host, always available if there are questions.   I would rate this 10 stars if I could.

Derek was terrific!  He picked us up at the airport, gave us sightseeing tips and was very friendly. The apartment had many extras including snorkel equipment, beach mats and towels and the kitchen had everything we needed. We could easily walk or take the bus anywhere!  Great location and the host was great too!
Appartement très bien situé,très bien décoré et très propre. Avec tout le nécessaire dans la cuisine.
Derek was a lovely host, very hospitable. The unit is nice and so close to the beach.

We stayed in Derek's unit for 9 days and it as lovely. Had everything we needed. So close to Waikiki beach 5 Min walk and all the great eateries. Derek is so full of information it was great. Will definitely  be staying here again.
Stay and relax at Derek's condo.

Great place and close  to the beach. We loved the pool deck and the grill area. Some noise from the main road but that is expected in a downtown setting. Will definitely stay again and recommend to friends.

Derek's place is comfortable and great location. His unit is only a five minute walk to the beach. Derek provided everything we needed for our trip including beach supplies. It was quiet at night time and the building is secure. The parking is also convenient for using your own vehicle to see the island.
Great apartment at an awesome location. Just far enough off the Main Street of Waikiki to get some good downtime, yet close enough to everything to feel the pulse of the city.

What a great place to call home "hale" for a extended stay while visiting Oahu-  Comfortable space that will meet all your needs.  It is centrally located in Waikiki if you want the Waikiki experience and also perfect to have as home base while you explore the island.  Derek is an exceptional host as well.  We will be back and hope its available for our next visit to what we consider our island home!
Location is great. Host is great. Needs more ac required . Needs little more fixing

Derek is a good host.  The condo is well located at the east end of the Waikiki strip, close to shops and conveniences.  It's smallish for two couples but would be excellent for a young family.  The unit is functional and well equipped for beach activities including folding chairs, boogie boards and mats.  Overall, good value for the location and accommodation.

name: Centrally Located Studio - Times Sq
summary: Our large alcove studio has a lot of natural light and is located steps away from Central Park and Theater District. The sleeping area is separated from the living area, and we have a full kitchen.
space: Our space is extremely well suited to a single traveler, a couple or two people. We have full sized bed along with a sleeper couch (for additional guests).
description: Our large alcove studio has a lot of natural light and is located steps away from Central Park and Theater District. The sleeping area is separated from the living area, and we have a full kitchen. Our space is extremely well suited to a single traveler, a couple or two people. We have full sized bed along with a sleeper couch (for additional guests). Our guests will have access to our bedroom, living room, dining room and kitchen. However our closet, storage space and chest of drawers in the bedroom is private. Our friend will be available to answer any questions that you may have during your stay. Our apartment is located between Times Square and Hell's Kitchen. There are several fabulous restaurants close by, several grocery stores and shops too. We will be happy to provide our guests with recommendations. Our home is very well connected to the city through the subway (A, C, E, 1, N, Q, R, B, D) and the bus. Taxis are also easily available outside. There is a car rental service acro
neighborhood_overview: Our apartment is located between Times Square and Hell's Kitchen. There are several fabulous restaurants close by, several grocery stores and shops too. We will be happy to provide our guests with recommendations.
notes: We have several neighbors and are respectful of their space. No loud music or noise is acceptable late at night, and smoking is not permitted in our apartment.
transit: Our home is very well connected to the city through the subway (A, C, E, 1, N, Q, R, B, D) and the bus. Taxis are also easily available outside. There is a car rental service across the street and several parking garages close by.
access: Our guests will have access to our bedroom, living room, dining room and kitchen. However our closet, storage space and chest of drawers in the bedroom is private.
interaction: Our friend will be available to answer any questions that you may have during your stay.
house_rules: No smoke and no pets are permitted in the apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a Consultant living in New York City. I travel frequently for work.

reviews.comments: Prerna was a fantastic host! Her responses prior to our visit were fast, informative, friendly, and thorough. From the very beginning of our conversations to the end of our stay, she was helpful and available. Prerna went above and beyond by giving us numerous local recommendations for attractions, dining, etc...and even left some yummy cookies for us upon arrival with our check-in information! The apartment was clean and as described in the listing.  We were happy to have a doorman and an elevator in the building - very safe and convenient! Everyone we encountered on building staff were also very helpful and friendly. The apartment was a perfect fit for my husband and I. It was extra spacious for an NYC studio apartment with a well-appointed kitchen, dining, living, "bedroom", and bathroom. Prerna has done a nice job of creating separation and privacy between the bedroom area and the living area, which was a plus! The bed was comfy. We had all the linens we needed and access to dishes, internet- based TV services and wifi without any problems. There was a lot of natural light, and the apartment was centrally located within walking distance of Times Square (7-10 blocks), Central Park (about 7 blocks) and theatres (1-8) blocks. We walked or took public transit everywhere. No need for cabs unless you just want to use them. Overall, a wonderful experience and would recommend this listing highly to others!

name: Manhattan, near subway, quiet street in LES!

No more issues with the Chromecast :) **UPDATE Mar 14, 2018** My internet has been upgraded to 200mbps!  **UPDATE  Mar 11, 2018 ** I've added water filters to the kitchen faucet - PUR water filters are certified to remove 99% of Lead, 92% of certain pesticides and 96% of Mercury.  **UPDATE Jan 16, 2018** I just switched my electricity to 100% wind energy. Rest easy tha
neighborhood_overview: I used to live in a 50 story high rise in Midtown next to Times Square and thought it was mad awesome until ... I found the Lower East Side.  This area is still free from large flashy signs and has a lot of amazing restaurants and bars to offer. The BEST in the country! You've even got chic clothing boutiques, hip coffee shops, and parks in case you want to take a jog. Don't know where to find the boutiques? I'll circle them on the map for you. THIS IS STILL A VERY "LOCAL" NEW YORK SPOT. In fact, you can see the transition taking place right now. Is it safe? YES. There's a primary school across the street. You'll hear the kids playing when you're outside when school is in session. There's also a police department a few blocks south east. In general, New York is pretty safe. The movie depictions are pre-1990's The Williamsburg bridge is right nearby for a relaxing walk over the water! Gorgeous view from the rooftop :) More photos to come!
notes: *DO NOT knock on other people's doors or ask residents where I live. They do not know and can get spooked that strangers with suitcases are roaming around the building. PLEASE read the instructions and follow them exactly*  Airbnb is *not* illegal in New York but residents may not share our sense of adventure :). ***I've recently installed home cameras facing the two entrances for our safety and the safety of the guests.*** ***The sofa bed is not available for two person bookings. To use it, you must ask if you are in a situation where you need it before booking, otherwise the strict cancellation policy still applies.*** ***If the first person that arrives is not the same person that booked, it will be your responsibility to pass on any information, manuals, directions, or otherwise.*** This apartment is on the first floor and the room is downstairs, yes there is an elevator. Like most New York apartments that *are not highrises* there is indirect sunlight. Most guests that book are us
transit: In the reservation email there will be a super detailed document that shows you how to get around and how to enter the apartment.  PLEASE LOOK FOR THIS. The F/M/J/Z trains are two blocks away from my apartment and lead you all over Manhattan.  The F/M will take you uptown towards  *** North *SoHo (Shopping!) 15 min *West Village (Brunch places) 20 min *Korea Town/Herald Square (Macy's) 30 min *Times Square 30 min *Rockefeller Center (Empire State) 30 min *Central Park (Bergdorf, FAO Schwarz, Apple Store) 35 min *** South *DUMBO 15 min *Red Hook 20 min *Atlantic Ave 30 min The J/Z will take you to  ***West *China Town 10 min *Financial District 10 min ***East *Williamsburg 15 min There's a transfer point at Broadway-Lafayette for the 6 train which runs along the east part of Manhattan going through  *** North *Astor Place/NYU 20 min *Union Square (Sunday Farmer's Market, Forever 21, Barnes & Noble, Best Buy, Regal Cinemas, Panera, impromptu dance battles) 25 min *Flatiron/Gramercy/Madis
access: The sofa bed is NOT available for only a two person booking If members of your group arrive before you, you are responsible for their expectations and providing them any directions or document sent. I have sent away guests that came in complaining to me and demanding things because their friend didn't prepare them with what Airbnb was. You have full access to the * Kitchen, pots/pans/utensils/plates/spices/sauces.. * Basement/Livingroom * 1.5 Bathrooms * Shared backyard with grilling equipment! - currently messy because of construction  * Rooftop - currently closed * Coin laundry room * Shower upstairs * Books & magazines
interaction: If you want your privacy I totally get it but I know what it's like to travel on your own so if you want someone to chat with or need advice on your fancy outfit for your night out on the town I'm here to help!  Phone calls, sms, or (Hidden by Airbnb) is okay, but I communicate mostly through the Airbnb app during normal hours (9AM-5PM please!) I'm multilingual! English, Mandarin, Spanish ( better at written/listening -- terrible at speaking ). If my girlfriend is around, she speaks Korean. Any issues in the apartment please come talk to me! I work from home so will most likely be right upstairs if you need me unless I'm out traveling.
house_rules: I'm open minded but please, no parties, however I have a bottle of rum that has been here for about a year you can  - No shoes in the apartment. - No unexpected overnight guests. - One towel per guest - The door should be closed when you leave - Maximum occupancy 4 people - Sofa bed is for groups more than - Minimize the any confusion by reading the instructions to enter: (Website hidden by Airbnb)  Be respectful of neighbors.. don't knock on random peoples' doors please!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm a data strategist and web designer and have been living in NY for 8 years now. Favorite airport is MIA because Priority Pass' restaurant per diem. Favorite city is Paris.

I'm a pretty chill and honest person who likes to keep clean and is very respectful of other people's space. I love traveling and have stayed at many friends' couches internationally before as well as domestically and always appreciate a homey place to stay. For those that visit me I try to make sure they're as comfortable as possible! 

I'm working on refurnishing the downstairs to make it easy for visitors to come, friends, family, and airbnb'ers alike. If you do stay here please give as much feedback as possible. I'm hoping to provide everything necessary to make you feel like you're at home. Don't worry about offending me. You can tell me if the furniture is in the wrong place or if the paint is ugly. I really have terrible interior design skills and just wish someone would magically fix that for me.

reviews.comments:
My stay with Tanner was fantastic!

He works from home, so check in and all other communication was super easy. The apartment is incredibly easy to get to and the neighborhood is super vibrant and safe. It's right next to an elementary school and within walking distance of tons of great restaurants and bars. However when you're in the room it's very very quiet.

The room is on the basement floor, has it's own entrance, and a very comfortable bed. My only complaint is that you don't get much light from the window.

For the location, comfort of the room, and quality of the host, the price of this listing was a steal. I would definetly recommend Tanner's apartment and hope to return soon.

Don't second guess about anything and take it. The host is an awesome chill guy and maintains a quite neat (Website hidden by Airbnb) even provided bottled water and fresh towels which was awesome! The room and accommodations cannot be beat for the price .I just needed to crash for a night with a couple of friends and I was more than content with this place.I was planning on coding all night but the place felt so secure and comfortable that I couldn't help falling asleep.

Tanner was, hands down, the best host ever. Being unbelievable friendly and always trying to help you to get the most out of your days in NYC. He mapped out everything we needed to see in the city, showed great hospitality and made us feel like home in New York. 

The apartment is located on Lower East Side, in a really nice neighborhood with tons of good restaurants, close to subway stations and shops/groceries from all over the world right around the corner. It is possible to walk all the way up to Central Park and see all the great things the city has to offer on the way up, me and my friend did it. 

I must say that Tanner fulfills his goal of creating a feeling of “Home Away From Home” with ease, and I highly recommend everyone to stay at this place when visiting the great NYC!

Tanner was a great host, he really went out of his way to make us feel welcome and was helpful and open for any questions. The room - although it really doesn't get any daylight - is clean, quiet (especially for being pretty close to many cool restaurants and bars in the LES) and really close to Essex/Delancey subway. We can definitely recommend staying at his place, especially if you spend most of your time exploring Manhattan!

Omg if you do not book this room you're loosing your mind. 
Clean, very comfortable bad & the best location there is! You do not need to walk more then one minute in order to get to great bars, parties and tons of restaurants. 
Tanner is amazing. Once we arrived he set with us and explained about the city and where to go. Was really wonderful ! Helps whenever and very kind always. 
The price was very cheap to this location. We walked to China town, little Italy and Soho. All are very close. 
Very good place to stay for a fantastic time in NY !

Tanner and his roommate are very nice and welcoming hosts. Our arriving has never been so well prepared thanks to tanner's emails and manuals (very good practice !!). The flat is quiet and well located (near subway and in a cool area with lots of nice bars and restaurants). The room grants in the lower level grants privacy. We enjoyed a lot and had a blast in New York! Thank you Tanner!!!

We arrived early AM to discover that the streets were barren and very grungy. At first we thought that we made such a mistake booking the Lower East Side... and then we realized that is how New York City is. The character is tough and it grew on us the longer we stayed!

Tanner's apartment was in a fantastic location and the price was really great because it was right in the middle of where the action is yet it was a quiet and safe street with a school right next door. I'm glad we were at his place considering that we just came from beautiful outdoors of Utah to the city.

Tanner himself was a amazing host as he spent a lot of time to speak to us about things we could do in the city. The recommendations he gave were perfect and the distance of the attractions from his apartment were exactly as written in the description.

Thanks again Tanner for letting is be your guests! Hope to see you soon!

Our stay at Tanner's was great!  He made it so easy to find (and in NYC that's not always true).  We had a fun time in the city and enjoyed the quieter neighborhood his apt is located it. Thanks Tanner!

Best place to stay in NYC))) the location is convenience , 5min walk to subway , the room is very clean and so is the bathroom, you'll feel very comfortable when staying there .Tanner is being awesome host all the time , if you have any question you can just ask him and he will help you out , he just complete our trip in NYC so much )))))))
交通超方便附近很多很可愛的咖啡店跟酒吧, 房間很乾淨, 房東人很親切
提供很多旅遊的建議,住在那裡很舒服沒有壓力,來紐約一定要住在這裡｡

Tanner was home to greet me at the apartment and set up a manual with directions and tips/hacks and maps that became invaluable for a first time visitor like myself. Fell in love with the LES neighbourhood and wish I'd stayed longer!

Tanner was a great host, helpful when we needed it and out of the way when we wanted privacy.  We were only there for one night so we didn't get to take advantage of the rooftop garden or any of the other amenities but the bedroom and bathroom were clean and comfortable.  We would definitely stay with Tanner again.

We had a great time in Manhatten. Tanners appartment is a very nice, quiet and safety place in the middle of everything. 
Tanner answered within short time all our questions. The informations we already received in the approach was very extensive and clear.
Unfortunately we didn`t see the roof deck, we didn`t have enough time ;-) 
We would recommend Tanners place in any case! Thank you very much.
This was our first time Airbnb experience and fantastic. Big thank you to Tanner being a great host.

Tanner and roomate Coy were superb hosts.  We had difficulty with our devices and Tanner was accessible in getting us there.  We were very disappointed in the accomodations.  We walked from the subway stop after dark around 8 PM and the neighborhood was seedy an felt unsafe.  The block prior to the unit was full of trash and there was a trash dump next door that was rat infested.  The unit may work for younger people, but was not comfortable for a couple like us in our 70's.  We would not return and leave it up to see other reviews to make your decision.

Tanner was the perfect host! He is a very kind and friendly guy, always ready to help with advice. The apartment ist clean and the room is big, having its own toilet gives you some privacy, it's actually a little apt. by itself. We would absolutely stay there again and warmly recommend it. Lower East Side is the place to go out in NYC and it's the perfect starting point to discover the lower half of Manhattan as well as Brooklyn.

The appartment was nice and clean and even though we did not see Tanner much, I can say that he is a nice and friendly host. We basically found everything we needed in the apartment, including a good location in Manhattan. Can only recommend!

Merci Tanner pour cet accueil à New York City !  Ce fut une super expérience, nous avons apprécié la gentillesse et la culture Newyorkaise même si nous avons encore beaucoup à appréciée de cette ville. Pour l' appart, c était idéal, un super emplacement pour bouger dans NYC, c'était agréable de retrouver Lower East Side après de longues journées de marche, et le métro Delancey à 100 m; c'est (Website hidden by Airbnb) mêle que tous les restos et bars du quartier. J espère que nous nous reverrons à NYC ou Nantes, qui sait... ce serait un plaisir de te faire découvrir notre ville. Encore merci Tanner. Jean Baptiste

I had a nice stay. The room was very basic, but that's all that I needed. You have a lot of privacy and your own entrance which is really great. In addition to the room, you also have your own bathroom and sitting area. Being walking distance from the subway and shopping/restaurants was awesome. I would stay here again.

We had a great stay at Tanner's place. The location was great for us - plenty of bars and restaurants within walking distance and easy to get all over New York via the subway (stop about 2 mins away from the apartment). We had the whole basement area to ourselves which was more than enough room, and the views from the rooftop were great. Tanner was a great host, and even helpfully printed out our Knicks tickets. Definitely recommend his place.

From our first contact on AirBnB to arrival, to our departure this was a super experience. Tanner was very helpful and hospitable. He helped me find parking foe the duration of our stay which proved a very good saving. He provided site seeing brochures which were very useful. His own notes left for us were additionally useful. The room and them apt were very clean and comfortable. This is our first time not staying in a major hotel in NY. Compared to previous visits the apt and location in Lower East Side enabled us to feel the soul of NY. We would definitely stay here on a future visit.

Bien... el lugar es tal cual lo describe Tanner... pasamos 7 dias y nos quedo al pelo. Se encuentra en un lugar estrategico... Barrio tranquilo (para lo que es Manhattan ) con muchos lugares para comer. Etc... recomiendo lean la guia que Tanner realizo... es genial!!!!....
Lean las evaluaciones (Website hidden by Airbnb) hay mas nada que agregar... obviamente volveria a este lugar...
Si queres vivir NYC y queres controlar tu presupuesto.. es la mejor opción. ..

Solo agregaria a la guia de Tanner, si vas a estar mas de 3 dias... saquen la metrocard semanal... 

Saludos (Website hidden by Airbnb) proxima charlamos más! ! Ajjajjaa
Tanner is a very good host. He was always reachable for questions and help in general. The apartment was clean and it is very well situated. And also, Tanner's roommate is very nice.

Tanner and roommate Toy were delightful hosts, generous, welcoming and quick to respond to any questions we had. Apt extremely clean and neighborhood quirky but fun and vibrant with a great coffee shop (Marm) just around the corner. Had a bit of trouble getting into the place but that was my mistake not reading the attachment Tanner sent ahead so don't forget to open the directions attachment before you go. Thankyou Tanner for a great experience!

This was my first time to use Airbnb because I've always been worried about staying with a stranger.  Tanner made this experience so comfortable and easy that if all hosts are like him, I'll never stay in a hotel again! His place was very clean, he kept to himself just enough to give me the hotel- feel of privacy, but was responsive and helpful with everything I needed.  He sent a packet of very detailed info that not only helped me find his place, but to get around, have things to do, etc. 
I was there with two short days to find an apartment of my own and he actual volunteered some advice and helped me know which trains to take. Tanner is an amazing host and you will not regret staying with him.  If I wasn't getting my own place in Manhattan I would stay with him every time!

This place had everything we needed: comfortable bed, private half bathroom, close to the subway and plenty of food choices! We didn't feel unsafe AT ALL in this area. Having the school across the road meant that the street was quiet at night which was great. Tanner is a very approachable and friendly host. Definitely recommended!

We only stayed one night in Tanner's place, as we arrived jetlag from Europe. The place is well located. The street and the area are safe but we were disappointed with the general cleanliness of the streets around. 2 weeks before we arrived, Tanner send us very detailed and useful information on how to get to his place. This was great and made us find the place very simple. The place was well equipped and we found it as described by Tanner... One draw back for us, as we were jetlag: the hours of operation of the clothes washer and dryer effected our sleep.

Tanner does a excellent job of communicating before the stay and during the time we were in NY. He made me feel relaxed and welcome. His place is very clean, near, comfortable and in a great location. Having the private enterance, and bathroom was perfect for my little get away. I would have liked to go upstairs and meet Tanner and check out the rest of the apartment, but my partner was not so keen on meeting people, which worked out fine for him! This is the best Airbnb experience I've had yet! Thanks Tanner, and best of luck! You are a wonderful host!

Tanner was a great host! He was super knowledgeable about New York, and even gave my girlfriend and I some awesome recommendations for places to eat around town. The neighbourhood was safe - we definitely had our doubts at first, but once you get used to it (coming from Vancouver, BC), it was all good.

The listing description was accurate. Tanner's place is nice, clean and very close to the subway station (ll be done within a couple weeks.

I would definately recommend this place. The appartment is in Lower East side, on a really nice location! The room is nice! You have privacy, but if you want Tanner is around for a chat. We will definately come back!

We've been one week in Tanner's place and I have nothing but good comments. The apartement is really comfy and clean, the location its really near from the subway and Tanner is such a great host. We're glad of chosing Tanner's place, I'd definitely recommend staying here.

Great experience at tanners apartment in downtown NYC close to the subway, restaraunts, cafes, bars, delis and hotel. Felt like I had the place to myself because of double level apartment room. Highly recommend tanner, he's awesome.

Tanner is a really nice guy and he is very easygoing.  The location of his place is perfect, very close to the metro station of Essex. The apartment is a cozy nest with everything you need and with good privacy. There are several free parking spaces nearby which are very precious in NY. Perfect place and defenitely good choice when I go to NY next time.

Great and friendly host Tanner, you re very helpful and kind, a very knowledgable New Yorker. His area is nice and safe, close to nyc attraction. East village, brooklyn bridge & pier to liberty islands.

We arrived at midnight, Tanner prepared all for us even with two chocolate, so considerate. The street is a little dirty and you can see big mouse running outside but the apt is clean and neat without any mouse, everything is reachable and convenient.Once I locked myself out of the apt, Tanner's roommate came back to helm me go back to the apt. Great roommate! 
The apt is basement and next to the laundry, someone do some washing at night and morning, so it's noisy sometime.But if you have a sound sleep, no problem. 
The subway is convenient and there are some fast food nearby.  

I recommend Tanner's apt to my friends and I will be back again.

Tanner was great!!!  His instructions to get to his place couldn't have been more accurate and on point.

His place was super clean and the location (Lower East Side) is perfect.

I will definitely be staying here again!

Tanner was a lovely host. The apartment is very cozy and private. We were provided with clean linens and towels, a private bathroom, and the bed was quite comfy. I highly recommend coming to stay here as it truly is the best you can get in the city, especially at this price.
Tanner was an amazing host and his spot was incredibly clean! I'd definitely stay here again. Thanks for being accessible Tanner!

Staying at Tanner's was really great. Easy accessible from JFK by metro. In a way first stop on Manhattan with J and Z line. Room was clean and ready upon arrival. Really liked the private entrance. Location is really fine for explorimg manhattan. Walking distance Soho and west village. And don't forget to visit the east village. A borough which people forget to visit! Would come back to this place without hesitation.

It was great! Tanner gave us great explanations about everything beforehand. Even though we had a little date mix up - my fault - he was super flexible and took us in (thanks again for that!).
The location is a perfect starting point for exploring the city either walking or just hopping on the subway, which is really close to the apartment. It was clean, comfy and quiet, so exactly what we needed after a long day out. There are nice coffee shops and bars around the area. Loved the rooftop! Would definitely stay again!

My girlfriend and I had an amazing stay at Tanners place. We arrived earlier than the planned check-in time but he worked with us and already had the room cleaned and ready for our stay. The apartment was very accommodating and Tanner made everything very simple and easy to find. The location was perfect as it had many bars, restaurants and little shops around it and was right by a subway entrance that will basically take you anywhere you want to go in the city. Tanner was very hospitable and was willing to help us when we had any questions or needed any suggestions on where to go.

My friend and I had a great time in NY. Tanner's place is very cozy, convenient, in a safe community. Although Tanner was out of town, his roommate helped us a lot and kindly lets us to leave our luggage until the night on our check out date. Thanks a lot. I do recommend this place!

Tanner's detailed information pack made life really easy getting to the apartment and navigating our way around it and the local area. Ideally located in the lower east side, easy to walk to the great bars and restaurants of this quite gritty, but cool neighbourhood. 
The apartment was very comfortable, nice size bedroom with a great bed and lovely crisp linen. As someone who has problems sleeping. I slept really well here. The downstairs private bathroom was a bonus. Nice shower in the shared upstairs bathroom. Although we didn't cook," just made tea" the kitchen was very well equipped.
Unfortunately Tanner was away during our visit we only got to meet him briefly as we were leaving. Toy his flatmate was very helpful and made us feel welcome. I would definitely stay again. Love the Cow painting in the living room!

Absolutely recommended. The apartament isn't the Rich hotel but is very clean and arranged. It is in a good neighborhood with good restaurants, close to subway. It is close to Williamsburg bridge and East River Park...amazing place for running!!
Tanner is a very friendly guy. He give you a very usefull guide with instructions about the apartment and neighborhood. It was a pleasure, absolutely recommended.

Tanner was an excellent host and very helpfull. He makes it feel like a hotel. The room got everything a couple needs, and it is place real close to a great subway. If you wanna live like a real New yorker this is the place to be! Thanks again Tanner :)
Great space, awesome location, very welcoming host and overall a great stay. Very recommended!

The room was perfect and clean.
Tanner has been very welcoming and gave us good advices.
I would definitely recommend this place and come back if I can!!!

We stayed at Tanner' for our girls trip and we really enjoyed it. Tanner was a very welcoming and helpful, decent room, ares was good,and location was easy to get off and on from the subway which was a plus!
Accurate description. Good experience!

Lest euch unbedingt das Appartment Manual durch, damit ihr auf jeden Fall Zutritt zu der Wohnung habt, im Idealfall druckt ihr euch es aus. 
Wir waren insgesamt etwas enttäuscht von dem Zimmer, weil wir wohl überlesen hatten, dass es im Keller liegt und man nur sehr wenig Licht hat. Es fehlt ein Platz für die Koffer, sodass wir unsere Sachen für die Zeit nur auf den Boden legen konnten. Auch unter der Beschreibung des super sauberen Zustandes hatten wir uns ehrlich gesagt etwas anderes vorgestellt. Das Zimmer liegt direkt neben dem Raum für Waschmaschinen und Trockner, sodass es durchaus relativ laut werden kann.
Leider haben wir Tanner nur am Anfang kurz gesehen und hätten damit gerechnet, zumindest die Wohnung kurz gezeigt zu bekommen, was nicht der Fall war. Das nächste Mal haben wir ihn bei unserem fünftägigen Aufenthalt erst bei unserer Abreise zu Gesicht bekommen.
Die Lage der Wohnung ist super, die Lower East Side ist ein belebtes und sicheres Viertel mit vielen Kneipen und Restaurants, die noch erschwingliche Preise bieten. Wenn man Lust hat, ist man auch schnell in Williamsburg (Brooklyn), von unserer Seite aus definitiv empfehlenswert.

Excelente atención!
Muy buena ubicacion, cerca del metro, y en un area muy segura. Habitación muy limpia y ordenada, y una cama muy cómoda. Tanner fue muy amable y servicial. Solo nos quedamos 1 noche, pero definitivamente es una excelente opcion para ir de vacaciones. 100% recomendado! Gracias Tanner!

Una gran experiencia, Tunner lo tiene todo muy bien organizado para acogerte y la descripción cumple todas las expectativas. Es muy simpático, te ayuda en todo lo que puede y al mismo tiempo te da tu espacio para que puedas ir cómodamente por la casa.  Tienes el metro muy cerquita del piso y esta muy bien conectado.

Tanner is a very helpful host! nice staying experience in here. The room is very clean and Tanner provides helpful instructions for entering the room and the environment around.
房东的人很好,房间也很干净!Tanner提供了详细的周围游览的建议以及进入房间的信息,十分有帮助,谢谢!

Perfectly located apartment, very clean and a lot of space - very helpful arrangements in terms of access to the apartment and lots of information provided. Tanner is a very helpful host and gets back quickly on any questions - thanks a lot!

My mother and I stayed at Tanner's place for 1 night and enjoyed our stay very much. Before the stay, Tanner provided us with detailed information about how to get to his apartment and to retrieve the key, which made the check in process very easy. We found the apartment very nice and clean - probably cleaner than my own house ever gets. It was very convenient to have a half bath right off our bedroom. We also  loved the location with so many great bars, cafes, and restaurants nearby and an easy access to subway. Last but not least, Tanner seemed like a very nice person and a dedicated host willing to go the extra mile to make his guests comfortable. We really appreciated the possibility to leave our luggage in the apartment past the check-out time. Would absolutely recommend Tanner's place and stay here again!

We stayed at Tanner’s place for 17 days and enjoyed the friendly and polite nature of Tanner and his flatmate. It was a pleasure to meet both of them. Besides Tanner provides excellent structured information for his guests. During our stay the whole apartment (incl. the shared bathroom with the shower tub) and also the rented room with the separate restroom were very clean. The bed was very comfortable, what is important especially for a longer stay.
cosy nice room in the basement,good for hot summer days,good located to public transport and lots of restaurants and bars!
The room is clean and comfortable , Tanner is welcoming and helpful. There are many bars and restaurants near by, if you like these that will be a good choice.

Tanner was the best, super easy to get a hold of him even though he was out of the country during our stay. Great place, AC was on point in June in Manhattan, clean, really close to lots of food/bars. Thanks for everything man!

We loved this space and location. It is right around the corner from some fantastic bars and restaurants. Also, the subway is very close. There is a great market just up the street and we used that as an option to have a few meals at the apartment. The apartment itself is comfortable and spacious. The ground level was primarily our space with a bathroom and bedroom. The shower is upstairs, but this was not an issue at all. The space is super clean, too. Tanner was a great host from afar! He's easy to get in touch with and will answer questions or concerns very quickly. The Lower East Side is a primo part of Manhattan. With really no other lodging options, save one Comfort Inn, Airbnb saved the day (As did Tanner!).

Although we did not get to meet Tanner, he was very helpful and answered many of my questions via email before and during our stay. 
The bedroom was comfortable and clean, with a lot of tips on the neighborhood (bars and restaurants nearby). 
We had the whole floor to ourselves and had a very quiet stay. 

Thanks for everything Tanner!
Nice place, great location, super accommodating host

Me and my friend were for just one night at Tanner's place, but it was perfect for us. It is a big apartment and it's very clean! It is in the basement, so you have just a little window. But it was no problem for us because we were there just for one night to sleep. The advantage of the basement is that the room is very chilly during the warm days! 
Tanner is a very friendly host and trustworthy! He helped us with ecerything we needed.
We have enjoyed our staying!

Great location on LES. only 2 blocks away from subway, and the walk is on Delancey st which is big, so it always felt safe walking back. Even though it wasn't a full apartment rental, we had more privacy than we expected since we had the full lower floor of the apt, which was great! Also, Tanner provides clear manuals for apartment use, and has guiding sticky notes,  which is a huge plus as you feel like you can get all your questions answered without the need to ask too many questions.

Thanks, Tanner! :)

We really enjoyed staying at tanners apartment! It very much felt like our own space with a private entrance and our own floor of the apartment. Everything was very clean and as represented in his profile. We would definitely stay again!

Tanner is a communicative and accommodating host. He provides lots of information to make his guests' arrival and stay effortless. Everything about the space and amenities was as described in the listing. I especially appreciated the great light for reading in bed--one of my pet peeves many places. I became a regular at a local coffee spot and loved the proximity to many restaurants, cafes and bars. Travel around Manhattan was easy from the nearby Delancey/Essex station. Overall a great stay.

Great location - for the subway, getting to Brooklyn, restaurants and shops. In an area that certainly has a lot of character! 
Tanner is very friendly and approachable and his apartment is great; own entry so you can come and go as you please. 
I would 100% recommend booking this!
Great place, perfect location, very welcoming and friendly. Will definitely stay here again if we're ever back in New York.

Tanner was very welcoming to us, we were able to message him with questions and he responded quite quickly which was nice.
The room was nice, even in hot weather the room was comfortable (with the AC on). Even though there's more people in the apartment, we didn't feel like it affected our privacy!
I would definitely come back!
Excellent bed, excellent location, clean and very quiet ! I recommend this place and location. It is very easy to find and to enter the building. Thanks Tanner
Our stay at Tanner's place was awesome, he was a lovely host and it was the perfect spot, with everything we needed. Would definitely stay with him again. Thanks so much!

Tanner is very friendly and welcoming. He recommended some nice places and always answered to our questions quickly. His apartment manual made the check-in easy. It also had some insider tips for people who have never visited New York. 
The apartment itself is really cozy and clean. We had our own floor. Therefore, enough space and our privacy. The location was perfect to walk around and the subway is very close. It is definitely a quiet place if you keep in mind that you're in the Big Apple. 
Thank you for the great time, we would highly recommend this place!

Tanner est un hôte sympathique très à l'écoute qui fait en sorte que notre séjour se passe bien. 
Attention toutefois à bien lire l'ensemble du descriptif du logement pour ne pas être surpris lors de votre arrivée.
We didn't actually get to meet Tanner while we stayed, but it was perfect for what we needed and he was always quick to respond through Airbnb to help answer my questions. Place was clean and quiet.

We had a splendid time at Tanner's place - the place itself was lovely and clean, the neighborhood was very safe and with easy access to transit.

We loved everything about our trip and also had a very comfortable stay in Tanner's home (and a lovely chat)!

Full-heartedly  recommend this listing to anyone visiting NYC! :)

The stay at Tanner's was awesome. We didn't had any problems checking in or in our whole stay. The apartment is as in the description and pictures and you have a lot of privacy.  Even though we didnt interact a lot with Tanner, he left a lot of useful tips for our stay. I would recommend 100% staying in the apartment

Had a great experience staying with Tanner!  The room was as described, and it really is a quiet street in an otherwise lively and bustling neighborhood, which was great after a long day of walking around and experiencing NYC!  Sleeping area felt very private and this was also a major plus.  Tanner clearly puts a lot of hard work and love into hosting his place, and it sure shows!  I will totally stay again if I have the opportunity in the future.

I love here so so so much. Always feel like in my room. Tanner is so so so nice! I'm so regret not to book a few days more until I leave New York. It's so convenient to get the train and you can get fruit or ingredients to make food. I enjoy talking with Tanner. Agree with him so much. Anyway if you want to find a cozy room in Brooklyn. Don't hesitate, Here is the best choice! ^u^

Wir haben uns sehr wohl in Tanners Zuhause gefühlt.
Die Wohnung war super sauber und mit jeder menge Privatsphäre.
Die Umgebung ist sehr belebt und man findet alles was man benötigt in Fussweite. Wir haben uns "fast" wie New Yorker gefühlt ;)
Très propre et accueillant en plus d'être bien situé. Les indications de l'hôte sont très claires et la chambre est confortable et invitante. Je recommande à tous. Merci Tanner!

Stay at Tanner'place was great! 
Great location very close from the subway, nice places to eat. 
Room is as described, not big but spacious enough for two people. I really appreciated the small attentions on the room and living room. 
I recommend it for any stays in NYC!
Too bad we didn't see Tanner much, but he is very convenient, and tried to help us as much as he can. Thanks again for your hospitality!

Tanners place is amazing! It's super close to all the good eats and subway. His detailed description and quick communication made everything super easy for us. The bed is super comfy which is a plus for me and I really enjoyed how the Williamsburg bridge was right in front. We found ourselves taking morning walks across the bridge into Brooklyn for breakfast. I also ran into an old childhood friend who ended up living at the building next door! I highly recommend this place for anyone who is in town. Thanks for everything Tanner!

The place was as described. The neighbourhood was cool, quiet, still lively and everything in walking distance. Some hidden gem side streets around the corner with amazing food places. Really started to like Eastvillage a lot. Slept in the most comfortable bed apart from mine. : ) Appreciated the provided chargers and cleaniness of the place. Tanner seems to know the city well. Didn't get the chance to chat a lot. Crossed path with hin at the subway and he introduced us to his event platform. Tanner is a friendly host.

We stayed in the appartment for 10 days. The appartment is located in one of the best parts of Manhattan. A 3 minute walk to the Subway station, to the grosery store and around the corner you have several lunchrooms, night bars and coffee corners.

The appartment is clean, quite and good. 

The host of the appartment was very friendly, he answered quick to all our questions and gave us a very clear discription, how to get to the appartment by car, subway or taxi.
Tanner was a gracious host! He made sure everything was ready upon arrival and left handy notes around the place to make sure we got and found everything we need. We'd definitely stay here again!

We had a great stay at tanners place. He was very accomodating and helpful and the apartment was perfect for what we were looking for. Very quiet and secure location, yet very close to an amazing local selection of drink and food spots. Close to public transport and a awesome base for exploring the city.

Though we didn't meet Tanner during our stay, it was still very easy to reach him (and our problems were solved so quickly!). The indications are clearly posted around the appartement and it's very clean and spacey. Plus, we Love this area so much since it was very close to a perfect brunch place on the Clinton street that we ended up going there every day. LOL 
Thank you Tanner for offering us such a lovely place !
Staying in Tanner's allowed for a very affordable option to explore NYC. It was the perfect place to just sleep at, and could have easily lounged around as well.
Super location to reach all highlights in New York very fast. Theres also a very nice bar around the corner called Nitecap.
We had a wonderful time at Tanner's place in NYC. Great location and value! Private and clean! Good communication! Easy and clear instructions. Thank you thank you!!
Tanner's place was overall wonderful with great location. The room was clean and tidy. It was pleasant to stay and we had an nice experience at Tanner's apartment. Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Tanners place. Would highly recommend to anyone looking to stay in New York! all the rooms were tidy and extremely well equipped, Tanner has literally thought of everything you could need during your stay. Even though we didn't have the pleasure of meeting Tanner, he was super responsive and communicated with us regularly. 
The locations as also great. Very convenient and close to some great food and NY nightlife while still being quiet. all in all a great experience!
Thank you Tanner for making our first stay with Airbnb such a great experience! It's definitely a good place to stay at if you plan to visit New York.

Tanner was a great host!  He has thought of absolutely everything and he's very detailed in all of his instructions and correspondence.  The rooms is extremely clean and the location just off the Williamsburg Bridge and only a couple of blocks from the Essex subway station truly couldn't be much more convenient.  This was my 12 year old niece's first visit to the City and she was so happy with everything.  Thank you Tanner for being a part of Airbnb.

Tanner's apartment is very well located, very close to subway station, to nice brunch places, restaurants and bars. Apartment is clean and bed ultra comfortable! It is almost private place since except bathroom that is shared, Tanner is living on first floor and guest place is on basement, with two different entrances. Communication with Tanner using (Hidden by Airbnb) (wifi available) has been very easy and efficient. I definitely recommend.

Really good located apartment in Manhatten with lots of affordable bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. You can explore large parts of the city in walking distance. Tanner is an excellent host, extraordinary service-oriented with lots of tips and discounts for non-locals. The apartment matches the description and the check-in is very easy and flexible. Communication is excellent and always with direct responses. Tanner really cares about having a great stay. Highly recommended!
Great!

Everything here couldn't have been easier. The room was spacious, access in and out of the flat was super easy, and it is in the middle of everything cool that is the LES. Tanner was really quick and responsive to any questions or requests, instructions were super detailed so that we could find everything we needed, even though sadly we didn't get a chance to meet in person. Thank you so much for being such a considerate host, Tanner, and hope to see you soon!
Great location, Tanner's place is right next to a subway station. And numerous convernient restaurants. Tanner is very accommodating and very helpful

저희는 20대 여자 초반 여자 2명이서 일주일넘게 숙박했습니다.
뉴욕의 이스트빌리지에서 숙박을 고민하시는 분이라면 추천드려요.
 위치는 초등학교 근처 스쿨존이고 NYPD차가 자주 지나다니는 곳이라 안전합니다.
 
숙소안에는 거실과 본인 방 그리고 위에 부엌을 사용 가능합니다. 거실 소파도 적당하고 구석구석 세심하게 포스트잇으로 표시를 해줘서 왠만한건 사용하는데 문제가없어요. 
 
 방안에는 디자인 사진만큼 이쁘고 침대도 푹신하고 이불도 도톰합니다. 겨울에 추위를 못느꼈어요. 그치만 옷 거는곳이 많지않아 옷을 걸어두셔야하는 분은 염두해두세요.

 하루 마치고 돌아와서 요리해먹기도 좋아요 왠만한 주방도구와 스파이스등을 사용 가능하게 되어있습니다. 

그리고 무엇보다 호스트인 테너가 정말정말정말 친절해요 (말로 표현 못할듯)
주변에 맛집도 추천해주고 숙소 처음 체크인 할때도 문서들을 보내줘서 문제없이 셀프체크인을 했습니다. 뉴욕에어비엔비에 굉장히 좋은 인상을 남겨줬어요 ㅎㅎ
여성분들이여도 전혀 걱정 안하셔도되요.

I travelled by myself on Feb 2017, stayed for 9 nights at tanner's place.
Tanner offered everything I need and more, the place is almost a separate apartment even counting with its own entrance. Making it perfect 100% private, which is great when you come back from a long day around the city. 
He as a host respected my space and privacy and let me be the one who approached him in case I needed something or go for a drink. 
Everything is set out for you to be confortable, placing post-it’s all around the place showing tips for everything. As for amenities, you count with hair dryer, shampoo, even wash soap and advil. So there are really no complaints.
It's a great apt to travel by yourself as it is located in the Lower east side, close to the subway.
Thank you tanner for a great stay!

Sin dudas, el apartamento de Tanner está más que equipado para recibir huéspedes. Tiene todo pensado: desde un lugar cómodo para dejar el equipaje hasta una fibra para marcar nuestras cosas en la heladera. Sin duda, uno de los mejores Airbnb's en los que nos quedamos.

El barrio es ideal por su ubicación, ni tan cerca del ruido de Times Square, ni tan lejos. Igualmente con el metro puedes estar en cualquier lado en 20 minutos. La línea F será tu salvación.

La limpieza y la veracidad de las fotos son un 10. Diría que incluso el apartamento se ve mejor en persona que en las fotos.

Tanner es un anfitrión muy atento, ya que ante cualquier problema por más mínimo que sea, estaba dispuesto a ayudar. ¿Mi opinión? Si estás buscando una opción económica con comodidades de un hotel 4 estrellas, encontraste lo que estabas buscando.
Great location, Tanner was helpful when we communicated otherwise I would have never known he was there; he allowed us our own space & offered suggestions when requested!

Everything about this place was great! The location is perfect with close-by subway connections and LES is just a really cool neighbourhood in general. Tanner is a friendly and communicative host, and the room(s) were clean and comfortable. Definitely the place to stay in downtown!

Le logement est parfaitement situé , bien équipé et de belle taille
Le lit est parfait
Tanner, l'hôte, est disponible , à l'écoute, discret et compréhensif ( patient...)
Le métro est à environ 100m avec une ligne qui dessert Times square en 20min à peine c'est un vrai plus!

Tanner was an excellent host! He was incredibly thorough in providing info regarding how to get into the apartment, where to get food, where do laundry, etc. The apartment was absolutely pristine and felt very homey. Being right by the subway was great, especially after a long day of walking around, it was nice to get off the subway two blocks from home. Overall a great stay!

We spent most of our time out exploring the city so we really just needed a place to sleep and shower.  Tanner's place exceeded our expectations.  You can tell he has put a lot of care into making sure his guests have everything they need from plenty of charging ports to Aleve.  The room is quiet, comfortable, really close to the subway, and within walking distance to restaurants and shops that are more local and less touristy.  I highly recommend staying here!

Tanner is an outstanding host. His instructions are extremely thorough and thoughtfully detailed. I arrived late at night after a long flight and little details I could have gotten confused by were completely mitigated by his proactive care -- I found it and got in without a hitch. Everything is clean and perfectly organised. I really appreciated so many extra touches. The moment I'd think of something I needed, there it was in the most intuitive place, with a clear helpful label! Tanner is a lovely and friendly person and his arrangement gave me the peace and quiet to come and go as I needed, and to get lots of work done in his downstairs room (complete with it's own bathroom directly across). The location speaks for itself, and is close to a huge array of delicious restaurants and convenient transport. Thanks so much Tanner for going to so many extra miles to make a tranquil haven in the middle of the city.
We had a pleasant stay at Tanner's place who is a great hist. The terrace and the rooftop are really nice!  I Would definitly recommend the place.
Great location!

Tanner is a very nice and helpful host. Location is perfect! Beds are very comfortable! which is very important when you are visiting all day long...
Overall I can say it is worth staying at Tanner's place.
Tanner's house is in a great location. He was also a friendly host. Very neat

Tanner is one of the best hosts I've booked with. He truly has guests in mind, providing everything from detailed directions to the apt and tips for NYC first-timers to the little things you probably forgot to pack (or didn't know you'd need!). 

Upon arrival, Tanner was personable and friendly. We had a nice chat, and he was genuinely interested in helping us find the unique city experiences we were seeking. He even texted us ideas a day later!

The space itself is smallish and minimal, but it's everything you need. It is quiet, with no street noise. The loudest thing was the adjacent laundry room, which people seem to use 24/7.

Overall, a great stay. You'd be lucky to book Tanner's place!

The place is in a great location for exploring New York. Also, very close to supermarkets, subway and bars and restaurants. The apartment is very clean and well equipped with everything that you may need, plus Tanner was added extra few touches, such as vitamins or earplugs which shows that he cares for his guests:). Tanner is very pleasant and helpful. I would stay again here for sure.
Everything was great, thanks for all ! We will recommend your place to our friends !

It is a nice and clean room in a basement, very quiet for New York and quite fresh in summer. It has an independent door convenient to feel free to come and go as we want. It is also close to the subway so easy to visit Manhattan or Brooklyn. The neighborhood of Lower East side is nice with a lot of coffee houses and restaurants. So in summary, a very good base location for our visit in New York.
Tanner's place was really nice and cosy. He was so welcoming and friendly, such a cool and understanding and helpful host. Definitely will come back, I recommend his place!

We had a great time staying at Tanner's place. Location is great and we had everything we needed.
Tanner also helped us a lot with his notes. We felt welcome and was very easy to move around the city.

This was the most detail-oriented Airbnb I've been in. As such, it's the perfect place for travellers who have never in the US or NYC before. A lot of information provided and Tanner is extremely helpful, friendly and communicative. If you're worried about being a big city, Tanner is a great host who will guide you along. This was also the cleanest Airbnb I've been in, with many amenities provided. The bed was extremely comfortable and the shared living place was a great place to relax after a day out in the city. The location was personally ideal for me as well! Secluded enough from the noise of NYC but also easily accessible to the best of the Lower East Side (Chinatown, Little Italy and the East Village are all walkable). The Williamsburg Bridge is right outside, as well. Depending on the time of the year, I'd definitely recommend doing a run or walk on it and exploring Brooklyn on the other side.
