Great location and great place to stay! Tanner provided a lot of usefull information before and during our stay. Everything was like expexted and even better! Some good restaurants and breakfast places nearby! Easy subway use and walkable as well! Would recommend this to all.

Tanner's place is great! Tanner, you were so kind to us! We definitely recommend staying at your place. Exactly like shown in the pictures. You gave us a lot of organized tips about NY prior to our arrival and arranged for us to drop our luggage a little earlier - what allowed us to enjoy NY since the moment we arrived. Lots of amenities (fast internet, good quality bed sheets, comfortable mattress, air conditioning and lots of others!). So close to subway station, amazing restaurants nearby, safe neighborhood. You deserve the title superhost! Thanks again! If you need anything from Brazil, let us know if we can help! God bless you!
Mal velmi hebky hajzlak a to sa ceni :)
Tanner was a wonderful host, and gave lots of great suggestions of things to do in the city. He was very helpful in answering any questions that we had. Definitely would recommend!
Tanner is a great host! The room was cozy and the place was convenient and close to the subway and local shops.
It was very Nice

Traveling with my wife and kids and had a great time at Tanner's. He is the best host and attention to details of our stay was second to none. We loved the neighborhood. Walkable to so many great restaurants, parks and transit, while still being on a very quiet street. Highly recommended.
We enjoyed staying in Lower East Side near restaurants, cafés and a lovely neighborhood.  Tanner was very welcoming and helpful.
Excellent location, safe, fun and vibrant neighborhood. Shared shower and kitchen which fit our needs perfectly.  Tanner was helpful, considerate, and unobtrusive. Don't stay in a hotel, stay local.
Great location with a private room, downstairs area and bathroom.  Can't beat the space for NYC.
When you enter in Tanner's place you can see everything is useful. He place maps, metrocards, some guides, earplugs, garbage bags, and a ton of things very useful when you travel. Awesome!

Tanner was a very lovely host. The location was fantastic, right in the heart of Little Italy. We had a great time checking out great food and music venues that Tanner suggested. The space that Tanner provided was spacious and very clean. I would definitely recommend staying with Tanner as he was very accommodating. He basically thought of everything, including providing slippers lol. Cheers mate!

Tanner's place is an airbnb gem in NYC! His posting was not only witty, but also very honest and accurate. The location was great- right in the lower East Side with tons of great restaurants and only a few blocks away from the subway. We had a little trouble with the electronic lock, but Tanner was super responsive and helpful so no problem! Other great pros: comfy bed, very clean bedroom/restroom, and also near New York classics like Russ and Daughters, Kossar's bagel, and only a 1 mile ish walk to the Strand.

If you are looking for a quiet, clean and comfortable airbnb in NYC this is the place for you. We recommend Tanner's place without reservations and would book again in the future!

I think the best way to encompass the level of detail that Tanner went to in ensuring we had a great stay is to mention the step-by-step instuctions WITH photos explaining how to enter his apartment. It was a incredibly inviting neighborhood and home, that was incredibly close to the subway, and other modes of transportation.

Tanner was proactive in providing the details of the stay as well as the local guide details.

This was our first experience with airbnb and Tanner hospitality made it feel great.

We did have privacy and felt safe , comfortable.

Thank You. Best wishes .

Tanner's apartment is very comfortable. It has two floors, and this offers more intimacy to the guests.
Photos are very accurate, and the apartment is very clean.
Location is quite good, close to a subway station. It is an area full of restaurants and bars.

Tanner is a very good host.
It has everything prepared. It gives you all the information you'd need.
Better of that being in a hotel.

We recommend it.

We loved our stay in NYC in Tanners apartment, we appreciated all the communication and helpful tips. If we were to return we would book-in again. We found the subway the best way to get around and located conveniently close to the apartment.

The room was nice and clean, convenient location (only a few steps to the Metro), all facilities included - kitchen etc., large room (NY measurements) and privat Bathroom. That was so much privacy! Would deffinately recommend it!

When coming to Tanner's place you can see that its really accomodated to suit foreign travellers. Happen not to be able to enter the place? The WiFi details can be found at the door. Suitcases taking up a lot of space in the room? Not at his place, the bed is slightly higher so you can put them underneath the bed.

We had a great time at Tanner's place.  It's a great location - lively, near the subway, lots of good restaurants, jazz clubs, and colorful street life.  The bedroom was surprisingly quiet, given the neighborhood and the fact that there's a construction site next door.  In a week, we were awoken 2 or 3 times early in the morning from construction noise or the laundry room next door.  But each time we fell back to sleep.  The place is very clean; the bed is very comfortable; the kitchen is adequate and we appreciated the private bath and entrance.  We would definitely return.

CONS - None

PROS - Comfiest bed EVER seriously... The location was cool and funky and conveniently close to subways, this made it a breeze getting around. We also found it relatively safe coming home late at night as the apartment street entrance was pretty well lit up. Just note that the shower is upstairs and is shared between other house guests, this was not a problem for us. You do have your own private toilet.  

We didn't get a chance to meet Tanner, however all communications prior and during our stay was excellent. We had some trouble entering the apartment initially and Tanner was all over it and fixed the issue :)

Our only regret with staying at Tanner's place would be that we didn't get a chance to go through his awesome guide book...
Een fijne plek, met veel privacy. Eigen toilet en wasbak was erg fijn. Alles binnen handbereik. Netjes en verzorgd.
Super nice location, super helpful host for visiting NYC. Would reccomend to anyone staying in New York.

We had a fabulous stay in Tanners apartment, extremely clean and tidy! Your bedroom and toilet are downstairs in the apartment, adjacent to the living room but we managed not to see anyone for the four nights we stayed as we were out and about all day long so it felt very private. Shower upstairs which is fine! Couldn't recommend more!! The area is residential but also lively, round the corner is a great ramen  restaurant and seriously tasty 99 cent pizza slices if you're hungry on the way in! A couple of blocks down you get in to the heart of the lower east side, so many restaurants, bars etc. Highly recommend Dudley's for brunch and Mr Purple if you want a cocktail with a great view. The perfect place to stay if you want SoHo but cannot afford it, just ten minutes walk away if that, but what we found is you don't need SoHo!
Great location in downtown! Easy access, quiet street, nice place!

Great choice if you're looking for a base in Manhattan. Place was clean and comfortable and Tanner left us lots of useful tips. Check in and out was very good and access to the apartment was very straightforward. I would stay again.
This place is clean and convenient. Tanner is an excellent host!

Tanner knows how to make a pleasant and easy stay.
Everything was explain to us before our arrival thanks to his tips sent by email.
The room and the building is under code, which facilitate a lot of things if you are more than 2.
The localisation is perfect to discover NYC. Many things to do around the appartment 
Only one things to know, is that it's on the basement. But you forget very quickly with the welcoming of tanner and the fun that you live in this fabulous city

While we didn’t get to meet Tanner, his place was exactly as described. He was very responsive to our questions and had everything ready for us. The place is a little off to the side in the neighborhood, but just a block away are some great eats and fun places. Thanks, Tanner!

This is a very clean, cozy, and private space in a duplex apartment. Having a half bath to yourself is very nice. The shower is shared (a quick spiral staircase trip upstairs) and is very clean as well. This place is very close to the subway (Tanner's suggestion of the citymapper app is a godsend). The neighborhood has great eating (Clinton Street Bakery is yummy) too! Tanner is a great host. Highly recommended.

We had a great stay at Tanners. The apartment was perfect with its own separate entrance and even tho its in a hip neighborhood and near the Williamsburg bridge, it was very quiet and cozy. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed. Tanner was very helpful with restaurant recommendations and was quick to reply every time I reached out. I have no complaints at all. It was a perfect lower east side NYC place to stay for us.
Good place with subway nearby
We had a great stay at Tanner‘s apartment. Everything went perfect. Tanner is a super host.

Tanner's apartment in NYC was definitely a great place to stay with. Perfect location, reasonable place and lively neighbourhood will make your trip wonderful. Tanner cleaned his apartment well and everything was in a great order. Tanner provides detailed guide for his home and the surroundings so you will feel just like a local. Tons of amenities was also provided including ear plug and cold reliefs. Wifi speed is also pretty decent even you have multiple device to connect with. We met some problems at first when checking in but Tanner is being responsive and helped us solved the problem in a timely manner. I will definitely recommend Tanner's place to other Airbnb's travellers.
Lastly, thanks Tanner for being such an great Airbnb's host.
-Eric Qian from San Francisco

Tanner's place is a great find for New York - the local area is awesome and it's great value for money.  We had some trouble with the lock to get in but Tanner was quick to resolve and answer any questions when we were there.  We didn't actually meet Tanner - but his housemate was in, in all honest it felt like you were renting a whole flat rather than just a room which was great!  We had a great stay in NY - i'd just strongly recommend reading every instruction Tanner sends to get in!

Place exactly as described. Clean, thoughtful amenities, and a great location! Would recommend earplugs if light sleeper as it sometimes gets a bit noisy (laundry + elevator sound). More so happens on Fridays + weekends as people are out and about. Again, this is disclosed beforehand. 

Although we didn't see Tanner in-person, he was courteous and prompt in his communication. Thanks for the great stay!

We enjoyed our time at Tanner’s place. The location of his apartment is amazing! There are a lot of restaurants/bars and a subway station nearby but it’s also a very safe and quiet neighborhood. He has everything organized for you and is thoughtful on what you may need. The bed is extra comfy too. Thank you again Tanner for the hospitality.
Tanners place is in a great location, is a great room, and he is genuinely the most helpful host I have ever stayed with!

Tanner’s apartment was very clean and exactly as described. The apartment was located right around the corner from the subway which was very helpful while traveling the city. He was a wonderful host and provided plenty of information about the city, places to eat, how to get around, etc. There was little to no noise at night which was extremely nice, especially since I expected to be hearing the bustling city all night! I would recommend Tanner’s apartment to anyone who is looking to stay in the lower east side!
Our stay at Tanner's was great! He left very clear instructions and great recommendations. Great location and everything was clean and organized.

Tanner was more than great!

I encountered many difficulties to go to New York after a snowstorm. 
Tanner has been a very great help to me in finding solutions, support but also thanks to these many tips to help me manage the situation. 
He was always present by phone even at late hours.

Moreover, before going to NY, Tanner gave me a lot of informations to avoid any difficulties to find his home and he also gave me a lot of very good tips to visit New-York.

I highly recommend staying in Tanner's apartment, I'm sure you would be more than happy. When I will come back to NY I will definitely ask to stay in his home again.
If you want to fell like at home go to tanner’s place! We will definitely come back

Great place with many restaurants and bars around the area. Tanner was a great host who provided me with all the important information ahead of time and let me leave my luggage before the check-in time.

We had a wonderful time at Tanner's place. The location of the apartment is perfect, and the apartment itself is very clean, spacious and comfortable. The apartment is equipped with everything you could possibly need. We really enjoyed having quiet and privacy at the apartment, while stepping right into Manhattan's vibrant Lower East Side as soon as we walked out the door. Tanner is a great host, who answered all of our questions and welcomed us with a detailed guide to the neighborhood and to the apartment. Highly recommend this place to anyone visiting NYC!

Tout était génial, emplacement parfait dans Lower East Side, à proximité du métro qui peut nous amener assez rapidement à tous les "classiques" de New York. L'appartement est original et atypique, le lit était très confortable. Que dire de plus sinon que nous pouvons que vous recommander d'aller chez Tanner ! Son colocataire était aussi très sympathique. 
Merci pour tout et à une prochaine j'espère !

The place was cozy,warm,clean and close to the metro station that brings to the center. Tanner helped us checking in (since we had some problems downloading the documents with the instructions) and the house has anything you need for your stay.

We had a great weekend at Tanner's place! One of the best experiences on Airbnb that we've had. The space was clean, had amenities clearly labeled, check in was easy, and Tanner was very responsive. Great value for the location too. Highly reccomend! Thanks! :)
Really enjoyed my stay in New York and Tanner's place is extremely well located for easy access to Manhattan and very close to the subway system for quick access to central New York City.
Loved Tanner's place! It's got an awesome New York City vibe to it!

Tanner's place is pretty perfect for those traveling on a budget. Great location - close to multiple subway lines, restaurants (Rizzo's Pizza, Ivan Ramen, Clinton St Bakery), bars, music. Apartment is clean and comfortable, and it really is as quiet as he says. Would definitely stay again!

Tanner is an amazing host and his place is great. You can already see that he is a considerate person from the very detailed listing. Well, everything matches exactly what is advertised and this level of detail and consideration persists throughout the stay. He provided a ton of information (in the form of a house manual, instructions for check in, tips on getting around the city, etc) that helped us have a smooth stay and enjoy the city a lot. The apartment is very clean and the bed is comfortable. The eletronic lock is convenient for check in and check out. Although we didn't stay around the neighborhood much, it seems quite nice. We never felt unsafe, even arriving at 2-3 AM by subway. It was a pleasant experience overall and my wife and I would definetly stay at Tanner's place again.

Tanner was a brilliant host - I’d definitely recommend staying here! The location could not be more perfect - close to some awesome bars, cafes and restaurants. Thanks so much Tanner - we’ll come visit again :)

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit bei Tanner in New York. Die Kommunikation lief super unkompliziert, die Lage der Wohnung ist mega zentral zu vielen coolen Läden, trotzdem ist es Nachts in der Straße sehr ruhig. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und super ausgestattet, Tanner ist immer hilfsbereit und hat stets gute Tipps zum Ausgehen! Wir kommen immer wieder gerne!

Tanner is a great host. We spent few nights in his appartment which is well located. We had our own space and own entrance. Tanner was neither intrusive or cold, just welcoming and helpful. Thank you Tanner.

Tanner 's house is very clean and comfortable. There is everything you need. The metro station is near so it's easy to go out. It's almost the same as I expected. I think Tanner 's house suits for the travelers who want to experience New York deeply very much.

기대했던 것 보다 훨씬 좋았습니다! 깨끗하고 안락했어요. 특히 침대가 너무 편해요.... 일어나고 싶지 않을만큼.... ㅎㅎ 숙소까지 오는 방법, 체크인 방법 모두 상세히 설명해 주어서 숙소에 쉽게 찾아갈 수 있었습니다. 미드타운, 브루클린, 소호 어느 곳과도 멀지 않고 지하철로 쉽게 이동할 수 있었습니다. 무엇보다 호스트 Tanner가 엄청 친절했어요 =) 다시 뉴욕에 방문한다면 또 머물고 싶은 숙소입니다!

A gracious and detail-oriented host, Tanner has really thought everything through in this quiet and well apportioned space. He was quick to greet us and unobtrusive afterwards and provided amenities above and beyond expectations. Don’t hesitate to book.
Cheap and close to transports

This place is exactly as described! Tanner took a lot of time to write out descriptions for his guests, so please READ THEM ALL! The location was great for us. We loved the Lower East Side neighborhood. It was the perfect launching point for all the things we wanted to do in Manhattan and Brooklyn. It felt so safe to stay here, being right across from a school and a police station. You have your own basement entrance and your own half bathroom. The shared TV room is also in the basement next to your room, but Tanner nor his roommate came down to watch TV during our stay. It was very private! The only "inconvenience" is that the shower is upstairs on the first floor and you have to share with Tanner and his roommate. This is CLEARLY stated in Tanner's description, so I do not have any issue with this-- just want to point it out again. Also, there is NO closet in the room and again this is clearly stated in the description. He does have  a hanging bar with hangers where we put our clothes. Tanner is very quick at responding and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable! I wish we could've stayed even longer

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à trois.
Logement bien situé pour visiter Manhattan et Brooklyn, proximité métro. 
Logement propre, toilette et lavabo privatif, terrasse aménagée côté court agréable.
Bon accueil, merci à Tanner pour la réactivité aux demandes d’informations. En amont, beaucoup d’indications claires et détaillée intéressantes.
Quelques bémols, à savoir, logement situé en sous-sol, pièce de vie ou deuxièmement chambre, complètement dans l’obscurité.
Deuxième bémol, laverie près de la chambre, et le bruit des machines en fonctionnement tard le soir est vraiment gênant.
Il serait peut être bien d’instaurer un règlement avec une plage horaire pour éviter cette nuisance.

Nice appartement, well located in Manhattan (20min max to almost all location in Manhattan, and close to Broadway too). Because the appartement is almost "underground". Don't go there for a view on NYC (the appartement in half "underground"), but very good to have good sleep with almost no noise (calm neigbourhood ; only the washing machine in the building, but no pb with that during night)
Tanner est un hôte très attentionné. L'endroit est bien situé et calme. Je le recommande à tous

Tanner is  a nice guy. Through his instructions you can check in by yourself quite easily.  You also can get much help for that instructions for foods and transportation in New York. And the room is cozy and tidy, we have a good stay here!

We had a very good time at Tanner's place. I'd highlight the cleanliness, the seamless check-in info and the fact the bed was super comfy. 

The documentation provided was exceptionally detailed (never seen this on an Airbnb host) which helps set expectations and make everything run smoothly. There were absolutely no bad surprises: 100% transparent and honest host.

If you're looking for a place to stay in Manhattan and budget is a concern, you can't go wrong with this one.

Tanner is a great host. Reply fast, gives good recommendation, great discussions and always  ready to do a joggingg with us in the city. The place is in a great neighbourhood with ton of shops and restaurents to discover. The room was clean and ready when we came in.
This apartment is just as described and in a convenient location.  Tanner is not only a great host but a cool individual. I would definitely stay again.

Tanner’s apartment is comfortable and a great place to stay. It was super quiet, and we felt safe in the neighborhood. There were little touches like Advil and slippers that we appreciated! Tanner was easily accessible and helpful whenever we needed anything! I would stay there again.
This place is perfect for anyone.    Close to subway and lots of great restaurants in walking distance.

Tanner is an available yet non-trespassing host, his appartment has a lived-it touch.
The neighborhood is great, the private access is a reality.
In short, we fully enjoyed our (also short) stay at Tanner's in the lower east side !
appartamento pulito. un po' meno la parte comune che accede all'appartamento. doccia in comune. toilette privata. nn possibile aprire la finestra. l'appartamento è in seminterrato
Tanner thought of everything. You will love his place, guaranteed.  Highly recommend you stay here if you're considering it. Location, amenities... everything is spot on.
Tanner is a cool guy. THANK YOU

Tanner's place was very clean and all the stuff you could need for a comfortable stay were here.  Tanner was very friendly and offered a lot of tips on how to make our stay enjoyable and also value friendly.  His communication was spot on as he described the location, secured entrance into his place and also an accurate description of his Apartment.  Great for two people!
Great location and Tanner was very helpful at all times!
un super acceuil chez Tanner !

Great amount of space and having the entire lower floor is a plus.  The slippers are a well appreciated touch!  Great location with plenty of amenities in walking distance but also on a quiet street.  Tanner’s place is a great way to experience Manhattan’s Lower East Side!  He’s a great host who genuinely wants his guest’s to have a good experience.  I would stay here again!

We had a great stay at Tanners apartment. It felt really private given that you had your own basement entrance and a toilet across our room. It was also practical that we could regulate the air conditioning in our room. Tanner was really helpful.
I have used Airbnb many times but Tanner was one of the best host.
Clean and furnished place, not in the best area but certainly not the worst . WiFi was slow. Overall not too bad.
Tanner's apartment was in a great location, was very clean, and had all amenities required. It was also fairly private with a separate half bath for guests. Would recommend for trip to New York
Tanner is a great host and he has a great place, everything was in order and we had everything we needed. It is greatly located!

Tanner's place is a perfect spot for a trip to NYC. You'll be near the heart of the vibrant Lower East Side that has lots to see, eat & drink. Be sure to check out the Tenement Museum and grab a slice! The subway is very convenient and an easy hop to downtown or midtown.
Nice, clean place! Close to the subway.

A great place to stay! Loved how convenient it was to take the subway from Tanner’s place. Also really enjoyed that we basically had the whole basement area (where our room was) to ourselves. It was just as we expected thanks to the reviews and Tanner’s detailed instructions. You MUST go to Clinton Street Baking Co. if you stay here. I had the best waffles of my life there.

Everything was perfect.
I totally recommend.
Super clean, very convenient to public transport, Tanner was quick in answering questions and providing some suggestions.

Tanner est très sympa et communique bcp.
L’adresse du logement est top!!
Tanner is a SUPERHOST⭐️
Tanner est très réactif et prévenant. il est toujours disponible pour donner des conseils avisés et des informations sur New-York et de bonnes adresses.

Hi everybody, I stayed 3 nights at Tanner's appartment, and I can recommend it for your short NYC holiday. Anyway it would be better to know beforehand that the room is in the basement of the building and there is the laundry near the apartment. That's ok if the laundry doesnt' work at night or early in the morning, otherwise it would make noise. The room and bathroom was very clean, and Tanner is a very welcoming host. And it's really comfortable to enter the apartment independently because the lock is automatic and tuned to your own code.

Great location, safe with a lot to do and see, but still quiet. Clear instructions. The guidebook was very helpful. Tanner was helpful when there were issues. We had some cleaning issues but Tanner was quick to wave the cleaning fee. Issues with Chromecast that were never resolved. No issues with the WiFi other the Chromecast not being on the same network. I would recommend this for anyone looking for an affordable place to stay if you’re more or less just looking for a place to keep your things and sleep.

Tanner's place was GREAT! He was great at communicating prior to, during and post arrival. Great, quiet, secluded space. Super easy to and from work on the subway each day. And ventured out and found a few great restaurants and a lounge to grab some drinks at. Highly recommend.
entire basement to yourself including .5 bathroom, with shower upstairs. fantastic location, with great local eats/bars nearby
Great place. Just a bit more compact than expected. Great amenities and very clean.
Tanner’s place is very nice and in a great location! Everything is very close by subway.
very good location and very confortable bed.
Very nice pre-trip info from Tanner!

Great place to stay. Close to the tourist attractions. Great places to eat nearby as well. The rooms were clean and since we were a party of 3 they prepped the 2nd bed and neatly made it up. provided night lights so we can find our way to the bathroom and kitchen and nearby attractions details too.

Affordable place and exactly as mentioned! Metro is close and was pretty convenient and close to some places I wanted to visit anyways! Tanner had quick responses through the app and even let us store our luggage until our flight when we checked out!

Tanner's place is located near a Subway which allows you to get around the city quick and easy. If you're staying for a few days I'd recommend the unlimited seven day metro pass. Tanner is quick to respond. For the price though you'd save more by going to the Hotel Pennsylvania, or other likewise hotels. The kitchen wasn't clean, and Tanner never came and spoke with us. He did reach out to us through messages to see how things were going though. All in all it was an okay experience, but if a friend asked me for advice I'd recommend a hotel over Tanner's place.
Great location! Close to Little Italy, Chinatown, Brooklyn Bridge and transit to everywhere. Great place to stay!
Lots of great places nearby. Really close to subway. Tanner responded very quickly every time.

Tanner's place is quite big and interesting, the living room is downstairs but the kitchen and the bathroom are upstairs. The location is good, near Chinatown and subway station. I didn't meet Tanner during the time there but he was polite, replied messages fast and answered questions.
Super clean, very functional spot in an awesome and safe location. Good value for the price by NYC standards and walking distance to lots of great restaurants, bars, etc.
Tanner's place was very clean and conveniently located (next to a subway station). I'd stay here again
Great place to stay! Tanner is a really great host and the place is in a perfect location to explore the city from. Would definitely stay again the next time I'm in New York.
My friend and I enjoyed a very pleasant stay.

The location and check-in explanation were good and easy to find. Tanner was very friendly and explained  a tour guide  and everything. The room is clean and cozy. The bed was very comfortable and I slept well. I highly recommend it and will stay again if I come to New York next time.

name: Very close to Taksim İstiklal St.
summary: Very central flat, also not in the crowd.  5 minutes to İstiklal St. Taksim, 10 minutes to Şişhane subway.  There are families, single people and foreigners living in the area.  Very safe, you can walk 4 am in the morning from Taksim.
space: Hi, my name is Burcu! I'm a 32 year old female, I work at an advertising agency but also in a dog training facilitiy and wish to rent one of my rooms to a responsible, tidy and reliable person (male or female). There is a good, fast & UNLIMITED wi-fi connection, a very clean recently renewed bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, stove, fridge, plates and all the other stuff..), 24/7 hot water, washing machine in the apartment, etc etc.  The room is fully furnished (single bed, wardrobe, bedside drawers, table & chair etc.), you need to bring your personal items only :), big enough for one person, not dark but I can't say sunny. The flat is in a secure location, only 5 mins away by foot to Istiklal Street (the main center of interest in Taksim, with great cafes & bars) and 10 mins to Sishane metro station. Located in Tepebasi very close to Flas TV. I live with my 2 lovely cats and a very cute dog so you MUST LOVE animals! ;)  And i also want you to be respectful to the ne

Very safe, you can walk 4 am in the morning from Taksim. Hi, my name is Burcu! I'm a 32 year old female, I work at an advertising agency but also in a dog training facilitiy and wish to rent one of my rooms to a responsible, tidy and reliable person (male or female). There is a good, fast & UNLIMITED wi-fi connection, a very clean recently renewed bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, stove, fridge, plates and all the other stuff..), 24/7 hot water, washing machine in the apartment, etc etc.  The room is fully furnished (single bed, wardrobe, bedside drawers, table & chair etc.), you need to bring your personal items only :), big enough for one person, not dark but I can't say sunny. The flat is in a secure location, only 5 mins away by foot to Istiklal Street (the main center of interest in Taks
notes: There are 2 cats and 1 lovely dog in the house. If you're not an animal lover please do not even be interested :) They are not going to sleep with you nor go in to your room, no worries.  Please see the pictures of the animals first ;)
transit: 5 minutes to İstiklal Street on foot 10 minutes to Şişhane subway on foot Bus stop is very close and the area is very centeral to go any where you want
access: There is a good, fast & UNLIMITED wi-fi connection, a very clean recently renewed bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, stove, fridge, plates and all the other stuff..), 24/7 hot water, washing machine in the apartment, etc etc.  The room is fully furnished (single bed, wardrobe, bedside drawers, table & chair etc.), you need to bring your personal items only :), big enough for one person, not dark but I can't say sunny.
house_rules: House Rules Please... - Be respectful to the neighbours. - Wash the dishes after you cook something.  - Use your own towel.  - Do not use my personal things.  - Keep the fridge clean.  - Keep the kitchen / bathroom / sink / toilet clean after using it.  - Replace it if you break something.  - Keep your shoes in your room.  - Do not leave anything around, If you do, I am not responsible if Joy eats your stuff.  - Lock the door when leaving the house and even if you're in. Do not leave your keys on the lock, so that i can open the door.  - Do not feed the pets! - Feel free to ask for help  ***Anybody wishing to live or stay here is expected to follow the house rules. If you can’t, you will be asked to leave.

host.host_about:
Hi, my name is Burcu!
I love all creatures with 4 legs but especially dogs and cats. I don't like to party at home, when I am not working, most of my time I am out with my Joy.
I'm a 34 year old female, I work at a pub but also in a dog training facilitiy and wish to rent one of my rooms to a responsible, tidy and reliable person (male or female).

There is a good, fast & UNLIMITED wi-fi connection, a very clean recently renewed bathroom, a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, microwave, stove, fridge, plates and all the other stuff..), 24/7 hot water, washing machine in the apartment, etc etc.

The room is fully furnished (single bed, wardrobe, bedside drawers, table & chair etc.), you need to bring your personal items only smile ifade simgesi, big enough for one person, not dark but I can't say sunny.

The flat is in a secure location, only 5 mins away by foot to Istiklal Street (the main center of interest in Taksim, with great cafes & bars) and 10 mins to Sishane metro station. Located in Tepebasi very close to Flas TV and Kasımpaşa Stadium.

I live with my 2 lovely cats and a very cute dog so you MUST LOVE animals! wink ifade simgesi 
Other wise please DO NOT BOTHER!
And i also want you to be respectful to the neighborhood and the other tenants in the building.


*****If you are interested PLEASE write me a short descrpiton about yourself!!! 
Where are you from? What do you do in here? How old are you? How long you intend to stay!*****

reviews.comments: I had the absolute best time with Burcu! She's so fun, sweet, genuine, and welcoming that you'll feel right at home. I stayed a month and now she's not just a host - she's a good friend. And she's right in the description... If you're not an animal lover/cuddler, don't even bother! :P

I've lived there for 1 month and I didn't have any problems with the place or the locals. The room is cozy and in good condition. The place is just 5 mins away from the main street - Istiklar. 

If you want to move around town, there are several bus stops, a metro and tram station very near the place. I didn't use public transpiration at all, you discover more by walking. It would take me ~15 mins to reach Taxim square and 45 mins to reach Topkapi  Palace. 

Burcu is a great host. She'll help you if you need anything and her English is really good (which is can be an issue with most of the locals). Her 2 cats and the dog (Joy) are friendly and like people. They won't bother you at all. 

The room looked exactly like what I saw on the pictures online. Of course it's not a fancy place, but the location is just perfect. Plenty of shops, bars, restaurants and clubs around.

name: Salim Bey Apartments
summary: Apart otelimiz istanbulun göbeği taksim meydanına yürüyerek 5 dakikalık mesafededir.Dairelerimiz son derece lüks ve sizin rahat edebilmeniz için bütün lanaklar sağlanarak dekore edilmiştir . Apartımız 24 saat güvenliklidir.
space: Only 300 metres from the lively Taksim Square and Taksim Metro Station, Salimbey offers comfortable accommodation with its fully equipped apartments
description: Only 300 metres from the lively Taksim Square and Taksim Metro Station, Salimbey offers comfortable accommodation with its fully equipped apartments Decorated with colourful furniture and paintings on the walls, the apartments of Salimbey offer a cosy environment. They all include a seating area and LCD TV. The private kitchen of each apartment has a dishwasher, electric kettle and a refrigerator. Some apartments also feature a balcony. A washing machine is also included. we are at your service in order to help you to have a mor confortable with our personel who know more than one foreign languages by blending our debonairness, customer satisfaction as primary principle and our experience. Salimbey apartments is at your service for a safe and peacful holiday Salimbey apartments is in taksim, centre of istanbul. our hotel which is only 200 metredss from taksim squere , is 4 km away from sultanahmet, 2 km to bosphorus of istanbul ,20km to atatürk airporti 40km to sabiha gökçen airport.

The private kitchen of each apartment has a dishwasher, electric kettle and a refrigerator. Some apartments also feature a balcony. A washing machine is also included.

name: Tailored Studio in Williamsburg BK
summary: Brand new renovation. A modern studio on the lower level of my historic townhouse. Queen-size bed, washer/dryer, mini-fridge, microwave. High ceilings and concrete floor with radiant heat. It's clean, stylish, and efficient. Did I say stylish?
space: I'm an interior designer and live in the unit above this apartment.  The studio has a separate entrance to the street and is completely private.  I designed it to feel like a lofty hotel suite, both minimal and comfortable.
description: Brand new renovation. A modern studio on the lower level of my historic townhouse. Queen-size bed, washer/dryer, mini-fridge, microwave. High ceilings and concrete floor with radiant heat. It's clean, stylish, and efficient. Did I say stylish? I'm an interior designer and live in the unit above this apartment.  The studio has a separate entrance to the street and is completely private.  I designed it to feel like a lofty hotel suite, both minimal and comfortable. This street in Williamsburg is very quiet, even on weekends, but it's only a few minute's walk to bars, restaurants, shops and supermarkets.  The subway is 1.5 blocks away.  Union Square is 15 minutes away on the subway, and Grand Central is less than 30 minutes away.  There is also a Citi-bike station 1.5 blocks away if you'd like to explore the city on a bicycle. There are many great food options in the neighborhood to choose from, including a high-end deli that will deliver anything you may need (including toiletries) to yo
neighborhood_overview: This street in Williamsburg is very quiet, even on weekends, but it's only a few minute's walk to bars, restaurants, shops and supermarkets.  The subway is 1.5 blocks away.  Union Square is 15 minutes away on the subway, and Grand Central is less than 30 minutes away.  There is also a Citi-bike station 1.5 blocks away if you'd like to explore the city on a bicycle.
notes: There are many great food options in the neighborhood to choose from, including a high-end deli that will deliver anything you may need (including toiletries) to your front door.  There is a also an upscale supermarket that is open 24 hours a day nearby.
house_rules: 1. This building observes Quiet Hours from 12am-8am 2. Smoking (or vaping) is NOT allowed in the unit. Smoking is allowed outside only. 3. People other than those in the Guest party may not stay overnight in the property. Any other person in the property is the sole responsibility of Guest. The Homeowner has not represented this unit as an event facility, therefore, there is a limit to the number of any visitors at any one time (in addition to registered occupants) of four (4). At no time may any of these visitors remain overnight or assume any guest privileges whatsoever, including but not limited to the use of the kitchenette and shower. 5. The Homeowner is not responsible for any accidents, injuries or illness that occurs while on the premises or its facilities. The Homeowners are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings or valuables of the guest. By accepting this reservation, it is agreed that all guests are expressly assuming the risk of any harm arising from their use

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Feel free to email me for more information or check me out on Instagram- MichaelGarveyInteriors

reviews.comments:
Michael's BF Dan met to pass over the keys. 
SOOOO NICE!!!! I couldn't have asked for a better experience at Michael's place! 
The hood is cool and everything is super accessible. 
I would totally book this again (if it's avail) I have a feeling it will be a hot rental!

Michael was very helpful and answered all my questions immediately.   Very thought full with the details:  fluffy towels, soap in the shower, etc. The place is exactly as pictured.  Very clean, modern and new.  Public transportation to the city is very close as well as restaurants and small shops.

I had a very pleasant stay at Michael's Tailored Studio. Michael was a very gracious and friendly host, walking me through the essentials and offering suggestions for cafe's and grocery stores nearby. The studio was very tastefully appointed, clean and comfortable. It was very private. The area was very quiet and safe. I would definitely recommend this listing to anyone.

The studio was perfect for a weekend in New York. The location is great, just a couple blocks from the train that goes straight into Manhattan and also just a couple blocks from a street full of cute restaurants and cafes.  It's also under a 30 minute walk, or a couple train stops, away from "downtown" Williamsburg, which is a really cool, hip neighborhood.  The space itself was impeccable - very clean, efficiently designed, with surprisingly plentiful storage between the closet and the space under the bed for our luggage. Having a full washer/dryer was convenient as well, and the bathroom was plenty spacious for two people to share. Plus, the studio is gorgeous!

Michael was a fantastic host. He was flexible with my check in time and the place is great. New bed and amazing remodelled bathroom. Just 5 minute walk from the L train. I will stay again for sure!! A+

Getting the key and into Michael's was easy, he was very helpful when I locked myself out of the apartment and responsive to my request for a fan.  The space is in the basement so walking up and down the stairs wasn't easy, but the decor and super nice finishes made up for it. Good neighborhood!
The apartment is small but very nice. The hosts are super friendly and helpful. The location is quiet yet convenient.

I stayed at Michael's for a month. Michael is very nice and courteous. The place is well decorated and immaculately clean. Close to subway. Just be aware that there is only a mini fridge and microwave (I should have read the details more carefully).
Michael met us as planned and gave us a tour of the studio as well as a map to the closest train and some restaurant suggestions. The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe.

This is a great place, Michael is a fantastic host and very accommodating. The space is small, but everything is brand new and super clean - just like a good capsule hotel room. Perfect for anyone just looking for a place to crash at night while making the most of the city. Right around the corner from the L, walking distance from so many great bars & restaurants in Williamsburg, Greenpoint, Bushwick...really can't recommend it enough for anyone looking for a solid Brooklyn experience.

Our stay in Michael's studio was great!  The space was cozy, clean and welcoming - very modern and boutique-y.  Michael was very accommodating and he made the stay easy and enjoyable.  We definitely recommend a stay in this Williamsburg retreat!

My boyfriend and I really loved staying at Michael's place it was the perfect place for us. Very clean and a nice big bathroom, it was a lot like staying in a hotel. We never did meet Michael but he made our check in and check out extremely easy! Micheal was quick to answer any questions we had, he also left a map of places to eat close by. We really enjoyed staying here and recommend it to anyone else looking for a clean safe place to stay :)

The place was very clean and well laid out. Very quiet without a lot of outside noise. Great neighborhood with a quick walk to restaurants, bars and subway. The only tricky part to the stay were the steep steps leading down to the apartment. Probably best for spring, fall and winter as the only cool air is from a fan. The host was very responsive and easy to work with and helpful.

Michael was very helpful in providing instructions about how to get into the apartment. The apartment itself is a small self-contained studio in the basement of a nice building - bigger than many NYC hotel rooms, though not very spacious. The bed is incredibly comfortable, and shower excellent. Cooking facilities quite basic (kettle, microwave, fridge) but perfectly adequate for our needs, i.e. just breakfast and occasional snacks. Extremely quiet location but very close to lots of shops, restaurants etc. The area to the west towards Graham Ave. and beyond is great (Williamsburg) but going east less so. We really enjoyed our stay and also found it very convenient for Manhattan, just a few stops on the L subway line.

Michael was great at communicating throughout our booking and stay. The apartment was  exactly as described. Very clean and modern. As listed it was small, but perfect for our stay. We found parking easily, just need to watch the signs for street cleaning days and school times across the street. Nice stay in Brooklyn.
Great location, and a good value for the money. Michael was attentive and professional. Would definitely recommend it.

For our first air BnB experience Michael has set the bar high! His apartment is the perfect size for a couple and it is immaculately presented. Conveniently located about a 5 min walk from the L train in Brooklyn and loads of restaurants and bars. Take advantage of the restaurants Michael suggests on the little 'info' sheet he leaves for guests, he knows what he's talking about! We didn't get the chance to meet Michael but he was very communicative throughout our whole stay, he made us feel welcome and was easily accessible if we had any problems. Can't rate this place highly enough, we will definitely be back!
Clean efficient and well located spot.  Close to transit (subway) and lots of bars/restaurants.

Upon arrival and during your stay we didn't meet Mickael but he sent us all the information we needed before and during our trip. He answered quickly by email.
The apartment is simple, clean and modern. It corresponds perfectly to the photos. We loved this place. It looks like an upscale hotel room as there is no kitchen but just a microwave and fridge. The only downside is for people like us who love to walk barefoot on the way home, the floor is concrete. There are no tiles or parquet. It is gross feeling is not very pleasant.
The descent to the apartment is hard with suitcases so not for the seniors :)
In summary, I highly recommend this flat, well located near public transportation apartment.

Great place to stay. Super convenient to the L train subway stop which takes you directly to Manhattan. Never met Micheal but he was very attentive and quick to respond to our needs. Loved the area. Lots of places to eat and explore within walking distance. The room is perfect for two people. I actually love how it's at garden level. Almost feels like you're going to your own little private bungalow! Would definitely stay here again if the opportunity comes again.
The neighborhood was great

Michael's communication before and during our stay was like nothing we have ever experienced from AirBnB hosts, his responses were speedy and kind, key hand-overs were pain free and convenient.

The flat was small and yet had more than enough space for 2. Very modern and functional, conveniently near the subway and some shops!

Michael was very accommodating with any questions we had and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

My wife and I enjoyed our (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was excellent. The location is good with close proximity to the subway. The place is as described and fulfilled all our needs. Highly recommended.
He contacted us the day before we came with instructions.  He checked on us during our stay to see if we needed anything. The description was accurate. The neighborhood was great!!
日本に戻りました｡お部屋はとても綺麗で清潔でした｡ｱﾒﾆﾃｨも不便なく揃っていましたし､洗濯機があったのが嬉しかったです｡ｴﾘｱも便利で気持ちの良い場所でした｡Michaelさん､ありがとうございました!
Convenient location and very clean. Michael was very easy to coordinate and communicate with.
The studio was a great space to relax and the shower was amazing! Great to be able to walk straight into it after a long day in the heat.
Smooth arrival, everything in order.  Would definitely stay here again.

The studio was clean, cozy, well-designed and a very short walk away from the Grand Street (L) station. Although it's in a quieter area in Williamsburg, it's only minutes away from the bustling parts of Williamsburg and Manhattan. Michael was very responsive and left a welcome sheet, which included some great local places to try.
Michael is a great host! the studio was cozy with a modern feel. Michael was very accommodating and even had a list of nearby restaurants and bars with a few menus! would definitely stay here again!

Everything was just like described and communication was easy and fast. The apartment was very clean. It was pretty warm this time of year but the airconditioning was good. The neighborhood wasn't the most beautiful part of Williamsburg, but it was safe and quite quiet. The subway station was nearby, but obviously it took some time to get to Manhattan. Thanks!

Excellent stay. Michael's place is tastefully decorated, quiet and clean. Location is excellent, close to a subway station. The neighborhood offers many affordable food options for vegans, which was a pleasant surprise for us.

Overall, I highly recommend Michael as a host, and I hope to be back soon!

Belle expérience dans le nouveau studio de Michael!
Il n est pas très grand mais tous les espaces sont très bien utilisés. Il y a tout ce dont on a besoin. Jusque dans les petits détails (merci pour la prise US iPhone!). 

Le studio est donc très confortable, très moderne et très propre. J y reviendrai sans aucun doute lors de mon prochain voyage à NYC.

Le quartier est plutôt résidentiel (calme, sécurisant) donc peu de restaurants tout près (mais ok pour des diners et petite restauration) mais la station de métro est juste à côté (3min à pied) et à 2 arrêts de Bedford Av. et Bushwick où il y a tout.

Michael est adorable, serviable et à l écoute de ses invités. La communication à ete excellente avant et pendant le séjour.

Je recommande donc ce logement à 100%!
Small but well-designed basement studio in a fun part of Brooklyn. Easy access to L train to get to Manhattan. Host always responded quickly to questions.

Great location, easy to get around and very close to subway . Very clean and exactly as was in the photos. Michael was very responsive and provided everything we needed for a great stay. Also, great to have a washing machine as it was a two week stay for us.

The only significant downside for us was the studio is small (main room not much more space than the double bed) and had very little natural light. As such it's not good as a time-out location for when you need to take a day off on an extended visit. Also, the entrance is below ground and very steep. The studio will be unworkable if you are infirm or disabled.

Overall, really great for up to a week stay. It's clean, private and easy to get around NYC from. If you're staying longer you might want to consider somewhere a bit larger.
Michael's place was awesome and had everything we needed and more. The train is a block down and made it easy for our commute to Manhattan. You will absolutely love the shower!!

A nice studio for the ones who want to be close to the hustle and bustle of Bedford Avenue and those who are in search of a good night sleep. The location of the studio offers you the best of both worlds. Quiet neighborhood, original interior design, flexible owner and a good chance you find the perfect place for the perfect bagel in the morning (Bagelsmith), an original Sunday brunch (Okonomi) or a decent Pad Thai in the evening (Sage - be sure to get there before the kitchen closes at 22:30 as they they are unbelievably rigid). All within walking distance. Same goes for the nearest Subway station.
Michael was the perfect host and his apartment was a great place to stay.

A clean, comfortable and stylish apartment in a convenient yet quiet location. There's lots of great bars and restaurants nearby & Williamsburg is one of the best suburbs in Brooklyn. I highly recommend staying here.

Communication was prompt and the studio true to the description. Loved the interior details, newly renovated shower, nice subtle architectural detailing and even the scented room (exactly the same as my own home). Michael's apt is close to all the action in Wburg and getting to Manhattan ain't a hassle as subways are really close. It was so comfortable we slept too long tbh :D
Amazing host, very accommodating, welcoming, insanely fast communication. All the little touches made the studio perfect and felt at home.

L'host è stato molto discreto, ma sempre disponibile. Abbiamo comunicato esclusivamente via email (per comodità), e Michael ha sempre risposto nel giro di pochi minuti. Lo studio è carino e accogliente, molto pulito e dotato di quello che serve (asciugamani morbidi e abbondanti, saponi e shampoo, anche un microonde e un bollitore), armadio a muro, e riscaldamento a pavimento. Bagno grande, pulito e moderno. Si tratta però di un interrato, quindi la luce viene solo dalla portafinestra di ingresso. Inoltre, il pavimento è in cemento (con tappeti), il che guasta un po' l'atmosfera. D'estate potrebbe diventare parecchio caldo, ma c'è l'aria condizionata e un ventilatore. Il quartiere è tranquillissimo e di notte non si sente un rumore (che, per NY, è incredibile). Lo studio si raggiunge in 5' dalla fermata Grand St della L, camminando lungo la Powers (la strada consigliata da (Hidden by Airbnb) è meno indicata). Il quartiere non offre un gran che, ma già a qualche blocco di distanza si arriva a Soho e Noho che sono molto più carini. Per arrivare a Manhattan ci vogliono circa 30', da casa a Time Square, via metro. Noi siamo rimasti 3 giorni, e dopo un po' di disorientamento iniziale, che credo sia inevitabile per chi arriva a NY per la prima volta, siamo rimasti molto contenti della posizione dello studio, in quanto è comoda al centro, servita dalla metro a tutte le ore, in un quartiere tranquillo e silenzioso. Noi siamo sempre rientrati dopo mezzanotte e non abbiamo avuto alcun problema ne' in metro ne' per strada. Michael è stato anche disponibile a tenerci le valige l'ultimo giorno, anche se abbiamo lasciato l'appartamento la mattina. Le abbiamo recuperate la sera, in quanto lo studio è lungo il tragitto in metro per andare verso al JFK.

Michael was a great host. He was always responsive and helpful regarding our stay. The studio was compact but had many added amenities that we didn't expect. And the location couldn't be beat. We had a wonderful stay and would do so again.
Michael was a fantastic host! He had everything set up when we arrived, and checked in with us throughout the trip to make sure everything was going well. We would definitely stay here again.

The stay at Michael's place was great. It has everything you need and is in a great neighbourhood that is only a 2 minute walk from the train. The legs were a bit loose on the bottom of the bed and Michael fixed the issue right away. My flight also didn't leave until midnight the day I was checking out and Michael was very accomodating and let me leave my luggage in the apartment and keep the keys until I had to
catch my flight. Everything was extremely convenient and painless.

Michael's place was clean, comfortable, and convenient. The design of the room was on fleek. The only thing that I wish could have been better was the door. I struggled with unlocking and locking the door.

My stay was fine, having only used the property 4/6 nights. Although self-contained; probably unfair to categorise as "entire home" category. It is essentially a converted basement, separated from the owner's property upstairs by a single door. Footsteps/noise (having heard two very clear phone calls in the room above) from upstairs are pretty clear, so do not expect full noise privacy in this regard. Michael was moderately responsive to enquiries by text. Nitpicking; but there was only 1/2 a roll of toilet paper in bathroom on arrival.

That said; very close to subway, <10 mins to the island. Williamsburg a good spot.

Michael's place is perfect for a couple looking for a quiet and clean place in a great part of town. The design and layout  is awesome, super modern and clean. The bed is very comfy and the shower is top notch.  My favorite thing about this place is how quiet it is at night. Even on a Saturday! It made getting a good night's sleep more than easy. The subway station is only a five minute walk away, making it super easy to get around town. Michael also checked in on us to make sure we were settled in. Key pick up and check in is easy as well. Overall, I highly recommend this place!
El departamento es lindo y está cerca de la estación de subte. Michael fue muy amable con nuestras consultas y flexible con el horario de salida. Lo recomiendo!
Beautiful studio with comfortable bed and wonderful bathroom in a quiet part of East Williamsburg -- off the main road.  It is centrally located, just two blocks from a subway to Manhattan.
Michael's place is just as described, it was very clean and  cozy! No complaints!

Amazing, amazing, amazing! First timer in Brooklyn, loved the area, loved the studio and the set up. Michael communicated and was attentive, and checked up on our stay. The place is walking distance from the L train, which is a quick ride to Manhattan.  The location is also near coffee shops, bodegas, and plenty of places to eat.

Michael's studio was just what we needed and exactly as described/pictured in the post. A wonderful, cool (both well-designed and temperature) space – found in the heart of East Williamsburg – with great things to do nearby and so close to the subway, so you can easily get anywhere. We loved living like a local again, while being back in our old neighborhood for a wedding and Michael's apartment served as a great place to rest and recharge between festivities. We would definitely stay with Michael again!
Great place. My girlfriend and I enjoyed.
Great little apartment in a nice and quiet part of Brooklyn. Michael is a very responsive and attentive host.

Michael's place is very well designed and thought out for being a studio space. There's even a washer/dryer in one closet which comes in handy for a longer stay. There isn't a proper kitchen but there is a mini fridge and a coffee (Website hidden by Airbnb) is very convenient to the L train. Michael was a great host and quite flexible with check out since he didn't have another guest coming in that evening.  I'd definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a place in Bklyn.

Was impressed with this Air BnB was a first time user, my original rental unit was canceled on me the night before my trip to Brooklyn, Michael was extremely easy to get into contact with which was great since i had to find a place to stay short notice the night before my trip.

On my arrival the check in and grabbing the key was easy which was great since i checked in a little later than expected, this is close to public transportation so navigating out of Brooklyn is quick. The area felt safe for my first time being in New York, the space is very nice and cozy would recommend checking out Michael's place if you are in the area and need a spot to stay!

Spent 2 weeks here and not once I was disturbed by the owner, it felt like having my own place! 
However Michael was very available via messages, responded very quickly and was very helpful.
Everything worked out great! The place was clean and had everything we needed. Checking in and out was very smooth. Michael was very kind and open to questions. Can only recommend it!

Michael's apartment is exactly as pictured!  Clean, modern lines!  Comfy bed and stylish interiors!  I throughly enjoyed my stay here!  Lots of great restaurants nearby, namely Mesa Coyacan, probably my favorite Mexican in all of NYC!  Cheers!
Great service, awesome host.. highly recommended for a weekend pad.
Michael's place was very clean and the location was perfect for NYC travel. He was very good at quick response and really easy to communicate. Overall great place and I had a great time.

Michael, was great host and could not have been more helpful.  The accommodation was in a perfect location for access to the L train subway to the city and a ten minute walk to great restaurants.  Excellent WiFi connection.
Michael’s place was very neat, clean and cosy in a very quiet and cute neighborhood. Perfect for a short stay.
Michael tuvo una atención espectacular. Siempre estuvo atento a los mensajes que le envié por mis preguntas o necesidades. El estudio está muy ordenado y limpio.

Todo estuvo excelente, un lugar con una ubicación perfecto a 5min del metro y a 20 min de viaje de Manhattan, la verdad la pase increíble, totalmente recomendado para personas que viajen por negocios y para viajeros solitarios.

This is a great spot for a quick stay! I’m not sure if it’s stated in the listing, but there’s a French press for coffee which I used every morning. Michael was quick with responses & very accommodating!
Amazing Studio! Would highly recommend. Michael was a fabulous host, check in/out was done with little fuss. Great location only a few minutes away from the metro.
very satisfied with this place. very cozy and wonderful!
Michael's place in Brooklyn is situated in a quiet neighborhood and has all the essentials needed for a stay.  We would gladly stay in his flat again.

I really enjoyed my stay in this apartment. It was lovely, cosy and clean. It's really close to the subway and it only took about 25 mins to get into the centre of Manhattan from there. It's also really close to cool places to shop and eat in Brooklyn. Michael was a great host and really helpful. I would definitely stay here again!

Very convenient to the L train. You can get easily in and out of Manhattan in 20 minutes.  

The studio was sparking clean.  The bedding and towels were very fresh and plenty of useful amenities. Would definitely book again.
Michael was a great host! He was kind enough to let us check out later than noon. Heated floor was a bonus!

Vi havde nogle dejlige dage i Michaels lejlighed. Der var rent, pænt og indbydende. Michael var en god vært og hurtig til at svare på spørgsmål. Kan absolut anbefale andre at bo der, hvis de skal til New York :)
Reals good
Michael’s studio is beautifully designed and very clean. It is located in a quiet area and the closest subway station is only 10 minutes away. We had a great stay!
Location is very good, host very attentive and rapid response.

Great location for taking the subway! There were some nice little coffee shops within walking distance as well. The suite is well organized, clean and had everything we needed. We REALLY appreciated early check in after a red eye flight and the ease with which we checked in. The mattress is quite firm and there was some upstairs noise but only ever during the day. Would def stay again! Thanks Michael!

Nice place to stay. Nearby metro and supermarket and in quiete neighborhood. Michael is a good host. But he mentioned the wrong door to us to open when arrived. We arrived 2 am and couldn’t reach him. Therefore we needed to book a hotel for the first night, because we coudn’t enter the appartement. The next day he called us to say sorry and gave us a refund for the hotelcosts. And a few days there was some noice upstairs beginning around 9 am. Michael was installing new cabinets in his house. But he warned us, and for us that was no problem because we where already awake. The appartement was clean, stylish and there were good facility’s.

Nice, stylish appartement. Great location, close to the L-line (15 min to Manhattan), walking distance to great shops and restaurants in Brooklyn. Wifi was down sometime. We couldn't enter the appartement straight away because of absence of the key - but Michael helped us right away. If you're looking for the "AirBNB experience" aka get to know someone, search further. If you're looking for a nice apartment and you don't mind not meeting the renter, this one is great.
Michael’s space is cozy and clean! Both Michael and Danny were great hosts and very attentive.

Michael’s apartment is lovely, stylish and super clean. Situated close to the buzzing center of Williamsburg. Public transportation is easy to reach. Collection of keys was very easy and stress-free. We would stay again anytime. Thanks!

This place is perfect for a visit to the city. So nice to come back to a quiet neighborhood after a day in the buzz of the city. 
Its really closeby the L train and Citi bikes! Very nice bed and bathroom. Would def recommend staying here to everyone!
Nice studio space, quiet area. Short walk to Champs diner and Dunwell which sold me.
Really nice and clean apartment in a very quiet area. Very flexible and nice host.

Nous y avons séjourné 4 nuits. Notre objectif était surtout de visiter Brooklyn, alors tout était accessible à moins de 10 minutes en City Bike. Pour notre seule visite de Manhattan, le metro est facilement accessible. Le logement est très pratique, super propre et très confortable. Merci Michael!

Cozy studio, very clean, local restaurants and cafes, walk distance to the station Grand Street, it has a wash and dryer that for me was excelente coz I am staying over 2 weeks travelling and didn’t want to carry big luggage. It fitted my needs and requirements for the time been.
Quiet space. Great location. Michael made everything really easy!
Michael’s place is clean, comfortable, and close to the train — what everyone wants and needs when they visit NYC. Would highly recommend.
This is a great room and has everything you need plus a lot of nice extra touches. It’s easy to get anywhere and very nice
Very nice and quiet place. Great location close from the L-line. Would go back for sure!

Super clean and minimalistic design. Love it! Our event ended up getting canceled, but we had lots of options and places to go to around the area. The studio has plenty of mirrors and lighting for bomb selfies, and the shower was glorious. We did go in a rainy weekend so definitely watch your step going up and down the stairs.

Comfy stylish room and private bathroom with a luxurious shower. I stayed here one week while I was in town for work and it was the perfect place to recharge, very quiet all through the night and a lightswitch within reach from the bed. Thanks again Michael!

Absolutely amazing space, really makes you feel apart of Brooklyn. There are lots of shops and bars within walking distance and the Train into Manhattan is just a few blocks away. The space was clean and stocked with all you need. Michael is a very nice guy and was super quick in replying to messages, will defiantly stay again when I’m back in the city!

Un studio au niveau de toutes nos attentes. Bien équipé, bien décoré, et bien localisé, ce logement est parfait pour visiter New York. Il est à 2 pas du métro qui va directement à Manhattan. Le lit est très confortable et la salle de bain est impeccable. Nous recommandons vivement le logement de Michael qui pour sa part à toujours était présent au bon moment.
Stylish studio apartment with thoughtful extra touches in a great location. Easy to access the subway and the rest of Brooklyn. Would happily stay again.
Michael’s place was perfect for my boyfriend and me. It was conveniently located near the subway station and some local shops. It was also very clean and well organized.

We stayed in the studio for 3 nights and had a good time. The studio is located in a nice area, Cafés, restaurants, etc. are in walking distance. The studio is small, but well equipped and nicely designed. It was very clean. It’s perfect for one person and also applicable for a couple.

We really enjoyed our stay at Michael's apartment! It was comfortable, clean, and stylish! Very quiet neighborhood, and we loved that it was so close to the L! Made it easy to get into Manhattan. They were very accommodating, and surprised us with having the apartment available early! The shower was awesome! Would recommend!

- very nice small appartment located in the basement of the hosts' house
- check-in, check-out and communication in general was absolutely smooth and hands-on
- exploited available (limited) space very sophisticated by making use of small niches
- everything that is necessary for a short trip to NYC is provided (fridge, hairdryer, etc.)
- good matress
- generous rain shower and, in general, best equipped bathroom we had during a 3-weeks-roundtrip (including 4* hotels)
- location ideal for exploring Brooklyn and close to Manhattan (20-25min)
- travel time to JFK approx. 1 hour by Metro and AirTrain
- maybe only downside (which is, however, not applicable in most cases): no real sound insulation between bathroom and main room. OK for a couple, might be more challenging for travellers who are less familiar with each other.. ;)
--> fully recommend Michaels and Dannys place, we'd come back for sure
Thanks once more
Great experience! Everything was exactly as described, and the hospitality was outstanding.
Fantastic host! Super easy check-in/out, great location, top quality amenities. Thank you !
Great studio space that felt like a cool little hotel room. Super convenient getting into lower Manhattan and around Brooklyn.

It was a real pleasure to stay in Michael and Danny’s studio flat. We have been for a week in Williamsburg and we found everything we needed in the studio. 
It is probably the most stylish place we have visited through airbnb, cosy, very clean and well located in the borough (the L line to Union Square is less than 5 minutes by walk and Bedford avenue is only 3 stops).We didn’t have problems with the check in and check out and it was very easy to contact Michael and Denny which have been very helpful. Great experience!
Super locatie, je bent zo bij de metro (L lijn). In de buurt zelf zijn ook genoeg restaurantjes en is een supermarkt. De verhuurders helpen waar nodig en reageren snel op een bericht.

Michael’s place was situated in the best location! Walking distance from transit, close to spectacular restaurants (vegan/non vegan), and local businesses  making it an ideal spot for tourists. Michael was very quick to respond with inquiries and was very helpful. Will be booking here again if given the opportunity!
Michael was very pleasant and accommodating. Studio was clean and bed was comfy. Great location. Would recommend.

The studio is just like the pictures. Very nice and tidy. Plenty of towels and pillows. The shower was my favorite! Communication was easy and he never took long to reply. Location was nice. Close to the L train and a lot of stores. Overall I’m very satisfied with my stay.

Michael was a fantastic host!  Clear and communicative and super helpful.  Every little detail had been thought through and the studio was incredibly comfortable. It was the perfect base for my week in NYC.

The bed was more comfortable than my own at home and the shower was epic!  Loved it!

Great studio! Great location! Walking distance to bars, and restaurants. Michael was thoughtful and left recommendations in which I tried for two nights and was not disappointed. Will definitely stay here next time when I visit again.
Nice, clean, private, quiet, ...

The location of Danny & Michael property is perfect, it is close to the trendy part of Williamsburg. The line L is very close and the connection to any other line to go to Manhattan and arounds is very good. The place is very cozy, the bed is comfortable and we could rest properly after busy touristic days. Danny was very attentive to our needs. If we return to NY, we would like to stay again in Danny & Michael place
Great place in a great part of town with very friendly and helpful hosts. Would recommend to others visiting in future.
Book this Airbnb now, I seriously have no complaints, the cleanest, most stylish Airbnb I have ever stayed in. Hosts are super fast to respond and so helpful.

Michael’s place is great! Very close to the subway, clean, cozy, and has wonderful amenities such as refrigerator, microwave, and washer/dryer. Also, Michael was able to hold our bags before and after check in which was a life saver. Would stay here again 100%!

This studio is a great place to stay, we were there for 8 days. Michael and Danny were great hosts and made check-in/-out incredibly easy. The former was especially convenient as we weren’t arriving into New York until very late in the evening. The studio itself is super cute, small but has everything you need and is very well laid out. The bed is incredibly comfortable and we were provided with everything we needed (spare towels etc). The washing machine was a great bonus too and saved us having to take much luggage. As other reviewers have mentioned it’s a great location - very easy and quick to get to Manhattan on the subway. Walking distance or just 1-2 subway stops from loads of great bars and restaurants in Williamsburg and other parts of Brooklyn. Highly recommend staying here.

Michael’s place is great. It is very cosy and clean, the bed is comfortable and the shower/bathroom is a great size.
Check in and out was easy and the apartment is in a cool part of town (with good transport links to Manhattan)
Would recommend to anybody wanting to stay in Brooklyn  and would stay here again!
This apartment was spotlessly clean when we arrived and had absolutely everything we needed. We had a great stay, and the apartment was close to some amazing food places!
Great place - stylish & exactly as described!

Great studio apartment! Space is well organized and stylish. My husband enjoyed the repetition of lines throughout the space. It is close to a subway so very easy to get into Manhattan. We enjoyed the restaurants and bars within walking distance: Interboro, Grimm, Masha and the Bear. Our hosts had great communication skills and were attentive.

neighborhood_overview: 法拉盛(Flushing)目前是紐約最安全的地區之ㄧ,無論是白天或晚上,在路上行走相當安全.,24小時營業商家陸續增加中,是一個適合旅客停留的城市. Flushing current is one of the safest areas in New York, no matter day and night are very safe on the road. 24-hour business continue to increase in this area, it is one of the most suitable places for travelers to stay in.
notes: 1.進出本大樓請儘量低調和安靜,如有任何人詢問,請說來拜訪朋友,避免提及airbnb 2.房客都有鑰匙, 所以請不要開門讓陌生人或者沒鑰匙的人進入  1. Please enter and leave the building as low as possible and keep quiet, if any person asked, please say to come to visit friends, to avoid mention airbnb 2. The tenant has a key, please do not open the door for any strangers or any no keys person to enter in the apartment.

Around 40 minutes arrived in Time Square, around 25 minutes to JFK airport, around 15 minutes to LGA airport(Lagardia airport)

house_rules: 1.  客房禁烟     (Rooms are non smoking) 2. 安静的时间:下午11点 - 早上7点      (Quiet time 11Pm - 7Am. ) 3. 不在房間的時候請關閉空調以及其他的電源.     When not in the room, please turn off air conditioner and other      electric  appliances.  4. 出入請確實關上公寓大門.
