host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: 從台灣移民來紐約12年

reviews.comments:
Chuck is a very kind host. He was very helpful when my airplane company lost my baggage and someone had to wait for them 1 entire day, Chuck did that for me. 
His place is located 15 min walking from the subway number 7, which goes straight to the Times square. And 1 min to the bus stop to the bus Q65.
The room is little hot because it does not have windows.
I had to talk with Chuck's sister because he does not speak english.
Chuck was nice met me outside to give me keys and had an extremely enjoyable experience and pleasurable night.
The room was nice and clean, the host was kind and welcoming.  The room was a little hot.  Overall a good experience.
Notre hôte nous a très bien accueillis et nous a très bien facilité l'accès au logement. On recommande ce pied à terre à proximité de New York!!!

Chuck is a very nice and considerate host.  The house was clean and it was pretty cozy living there.  The place is at central Flushing and you can access a lot of dining place within walking distance.  Overall it was a great experience.  I recommend the host.  Btw the rate was very reasonable.
很好的房间,很好的房东,因为空调坏了第二天还立马买了个新的换上,房东一家人都很热情,周围的交通餐饮都很方便且便宜｡总的来说,是一次很好的住宿体验,非常适合去纽约短途旅行的人,强烈推荐!

The host is a very nice and kind. He also offer a lot of assistance for local information. This private room is clean and tiny. It may take less than 15 mins to reach main grocery stores and Chinese restaurants via walking. Generally speaking, it will be a excellent choice based on the rate for single traveler. Highly recommended!
房間乾淨,房東和善,附近華人聚集...適合不會英語的人入住!
房间干净明亮,距离地铁站大概10分钟路程,周围有很多中国超市,可以买到中国才有的东西｡房东人也非常好,热情招待了我们,虽然是共用的洗手间,但是没有任何不便,非常希望能下次再到纽约来玩的时候住在这里｡
还算方便 第一次坐如此古老的电梯

The host was very considerate and accommodating -- he even gave my friend and me some cherries for breakfast! The room was clean and very comfortable. It was about a 10 minute walk to public transportation, and then a quick 30 minute ride on the subway to Times Square -- quite convenient!
great price, nice host, and convienient neighborhood,
Good neighbourhood. Nice room to crash in for couple of days. Comfortable bed

Une place agréable, peu chère et à environ 30 minutes de Manhattan. Il est difficile de communiquer avec l'hôte qui ne parle pas anglais mais globalement tout le monde est très serviable. A essayer pour un arrêt à NYC pour un prix bas.

The host was nice and the place was clean, however there were a few unpleasant and unexpected things from my experience here.  
First, I needed to park and was told there was street parking.  When I arrived, there was none to be found until I called and spoke to a girl who spoke english and gave me a tip.  Would have been helpful if I got this in the original emails.  
Second, the room is some walls built up in the middle of the small apartment, with about a foot or two of open space at the top.  Therefore, you can hear everything.  They built an air conditioner, but the hot air went out to the main apartment and then this just blew up over the space at the top of the "walls".....very strange.  
Third, I counted about 6 people living there.  One of them spoke some english, so it was a full space of people and kind of hard to communicate.  There is one bathroom and at one point there was a line for it.  Again, you can hear everything, even over the "air conditioner", and a few of these people were talking late and cooking early in the morning.  I didn't sleep, and was only there for one night of sleep before my flight.   This was also due to the fact that the bed was as hard as a rock.  :(
Finally, the internet went in and out, which I only used for about an hour.
I think people should be aware of what they are getting, which is why I'm sharing my experience.

The host family was very nice. The place was small but cozy enough. The next door guest was a little bit noizy only one night, so it was a little pity but all in all, we are satisfied with the stay! Thank you so much!!!

Chuck did his best to provide a convenient stay for us in his apartment. He and his wife were very friendly and generous.
Unfortunately, the weather was really hot during our stay and so was the flat and our room. The AC helped but was pretty loud, so we had the choice between a very warm or loud room. Although, the walls were quite thin, so we heart nearly everything our neighbor was doing, which made sleeping difficult from time to time.
Connection to Manhattan and other parts of the city a nearly perfect, bus and metro stations are right around the corner. 
The house is situated in a colorful and interesting neighborhood with a great choice of Asian shops and restaurants.
The host for this room is nice and friendly!

The room was exactly as described and shown on the photo.  I was able to do my work in the room during daytime and then went out for fun at night.  I enjoyed the experience and recommend others to use the service.  

In addition, my flight to New York city way delayed for 2 to 3 hours, and by the time I arrived the location, it's already midnight.  Mr. Chow was willing to accommodate and waited until I arrived.  He's a pretty awesome host!

Thanks for the place!

Host is pretty nice,  and offers a lot of good info during my stay,  the room is clean and bed is comfortable evevn for 2 people, 
Would visit again next time definitely !

Very nice strategic location which is close to the subway and plenty of restaurants within the area . 
Will be back again if I happened in Queens .

Chuck is very friendly and welcoming. The roomis very neat and clean. The apt is a about 1 min to the bus stop  and will connect you to the subway and you can go to Manhattan in 30 mins. I highly recommend chuck's apt. Thanks chuck

This room is quite good for 1 person, if 2, that will be a little narrow because of the room space. And another concern is, this room has bad voice-block from each room, so after 11, you will be asked to be extremely quiet (nearly no sound), so 1 person is good.

The kitchen is good, the bad is good, bathroom is clean and in good condition, you should share all of these with the host and the other guests
.
The place is little far away from subway(10~15mins walk), but i think this area is safer than the area around subway.

The host, Chuck is willing to solve your problem, he live just next to you.

One drawback for me is, you will be asked not to chat more with the  neighborhood, so it'll be  just a living place.

i'll recommend this room if you have only 1 person and not hate to walk. 

(oh, it's very easy for you to get good and cheap food around!!)

Zhengchuan is a very nice and friendly host and make me feel like home. The place is good and clean enough for sleep. It has air conditioner, hot water, and hair dryers. While ear plugs and eyeshade sometimes would help. The neibourghood is near the Main Street, which is the perfect location to explore authentic asian food.

Very good landlord, wearing a pair of glasses, Sven, people are very warm, the room is clean and bright, although it is separated out of the room, the bathroom is shared, but without any inconvenience. Around the transportation and catering are very convenient and there are a lot of Chinese supermarkets. Overall, it is a very good accommodation experience, very suitable for people who travel to New York, strongly recommended!

O Chuck eh um ótimo anfitrião, nos deixa muito a vontade e pudemos contar com ele no que foi preciso. Estadia muito agradável, bem localizada e numa vizinhança segura. Nos sentimos em casa até porque ficamos 17 dias, esperamos conseguir retornar ano que vem!
It's a very nice apartment! The home owner is helpful and great!
房间非常干净整洁,房东也很友善,周边有很多很地道的中餐馆,很棒的体验,谢谢｡

Great place for a single male traveling alone who needs a crash pad. Clean, convenient, Chinese food nearby. Visual but you can hear everything going on outside the walls. I had a great stay- Zheng Hao is very friendly!

The host is very nice and helpful. The location is convenient and safe, walking distance to the Main Flushing Metro Station, that will take us to Times Square and many other attractions are linked to the metro lines. Nearby has a lots of restaurants. The room is clean, bed is so comfortable. We have a great time staying at 正川 house.  Big thanks to 正川 for offering such a nice room for traveller like us.

The owners Mr and Mrs Chuck are very kind, generous and very helpful to make my stay feel comfortable and easy. Mr Chuck even assisted with my laundry. 

The room is very comfortable, big enough for two persons. 

The location is very safe. I walked back and forth from the subway station during midnight without any trouble. 

The place is located in an Asian community with a variety of Chinese restaurants at cheap price.

I will definitely come back for my next trip to New York.
Chuck is a good guy and I had good experience for my first time using Airbnb.
Good location ...host accommodating...clean...

Mr. Chuck is a very nice guy. He was very welcoming.  The description was accurate and the neighborhood was like any other in New York. Busy busy, busy:)
Room was very clean and nice. Wifi speed was good. Bathroom was fully equipped and clean. Overall excellent to place, if you have some work in the Queens area in New York.  
For doctors who have currently applied for residency, this place is very near to the Queens Area Hospital and Flushing Hospital.

Chuck is very cooperative guy. He allowed me to use his address and phone number to order some things from amazon. Also, He is very kind, He always there when you need something. The location of his house is a bit far since it is located in the end of subway line 3. But, if you could catch the express train, it would be no problem. Overall, it was a very good stay.

Mr. Chuck and his wife are very nice. We told them the room was a little hot and he gave us the fan right away. The room is comfy and the location is good. It only takes u about 10 mins waking to the train station, or you can also take bus. There are a lot of restaurants or cafes around, very convenient. Definitely will stay here again when I come to New York next time!
Very nice people. Easy to check in and out and everything was great. The location is very convenient as described.
The host was very helpful. The room was adequate. Worth the price.

HORRIBLE ! HORRIBLE !! HORRIBLE !!!
There are COCKROACH  in the bedroom !!!!!! We have pictures !!!!  
The negative aspect: First I think all the previous reviews were written by fake accounts, otherwise it is not possible!
The room is not even a piece as such! There is no ceiling, only 4 wooden planks cobbled together to make 4 walls ... thereby having an intimate moment is absolutely impossible: the Chang family hears you and you constantly hear. There is no ceiling, so we constantly feel the smell of food in your room: This IS DISGUSTING !!It is IMPOSSIBLE to sleep !!! From the first night we are annoyed because they turn on the light at 4am, and they do not die !! NO RESPECT ! Besides the snoring of the Chang family ...There are people who enter the house early in the morning, or a big bell in the middle of the afternoon when you go rest. They excrement DIRTY! NOT RECOMMENDED !!!!!!!

The place was great,  you have your own space and  the flat is organized.

The host was so nice and gives to you all the information you need.
I totally recommend this place!!

I stay there two night. I have to say it is a wonderful experience.
Pro: cozy room, clean toilet, and useful information from host.
Con: the sound-proofing of wall isn't so good but the host move very gentle. It's not a big problem. 
Hard to get there by bus for traveler without internet in the night exactly unless you do pretty pay attention on counting each station.
Anyway, it's pretty worthy to stay there with such low price.
我在正川的房間待了兩天,有兩晚很舒服的睡眠｡他給的資訊相當有用,房間相當舒適,廁所很乾淨｡

小缺點:
房間隔音沒有很好,但是正川先生與家人的動作非常輕巧,不影響睡眠｡
晚上搭巴士要很注意是否到站,對於在紐約沒有網路的人來說｡

我個人相當推薦這房源,以這個價錢來說,絕對超值｡

Well equiped house and is quite better than how it appear online. In addition, if you take the bus on time and catch express subway everyday, you will be able to reach Manhattan in 30 mins. Only a few blocks away from Flushing main street where you can find a lot of restaurants especially asian cuisine. Overall, highly recommended.
房子的位置非常好,距离flushing的main street步行就可以到达,周边治安很好,房子很干净,也很温馨,房东先生人特别好,推荐了很多游玩攻略和美食｡相谈甚欢,可以说是很美好的旅途｡谢谢房东｡
very great experience in airbnb,great host,great location,about 10 mins walking to metro and 25 mins ride to center of NYC,loads of restaurants and safe neighborhood, definitely will come back again
The location is convenient, and the host is very nice and friendly, offered lots useful and helpful information, I had a good time.

The 3/4 walls were odd and allowed you to hear EVERYTHING going on in the next room. From snoring to romance you're a witness to it all. Or if you're like me and arrived late and still needed to create a plan for the next day the light shines over the wall and wakes up the couple in the other room.
It's an inexpensive room in an expensive market so you just roll with it.
房东夫妇很热情,nice,有厨房可以使用,公寓离地铁很近,直通曼哈顿｡周围很多美食,超市｡

He waited for me at door ad was quick to explain the apt. I loved the room with air conditioning system. Wifi was always working and shower was hot. I would say stay here. Very cheap and mall was only 1 mile away. Coffee not too far and laundry 1 block.
Great! The apartment was clean, accessible, and the host was very friendly. The room maybe could've been a bit more soundproof, but was fine otherwise.

I rented the place for my parents who are seniors and from outside of U.S.   The host was very nice, friendly and thoughtfully.   The host communicated with me very well and helped my parents during their stays.  Thank you.
It was great. Nice guy. Not much English.
I stayed for one night. The stayed was very comfortable and the host was caring and friendly.

It was my very first time using airbnb and was worried a lot in the beginning. However Mr.Chuck and his wife was super nice and replies fast. I stayed only one night and would like to go to his place again if I need to crash in ny! For this price, I personally think it is really worth it!
Such a great host very nice and friendly made me feel so welcome everything was so nice and neat when I arrived! Definitely recommend to stay here

Well worth the money! Chuck is a very excellent host. English is not his primary language but he tried everything in his power to accommodate our requests and make sure everything was up to standard. We arrived pretty late for check-in (10:30pm) and he waited patiently while we arrived. Thank you.

The place is small but very cost effective.

Great location very close to the center of downtown Flushing. Host was very welcoming and courteous, showed us around the house. Room is exactly as shown in the photos: spotless, cozy, and had all the necessities; the bed was extremely comfortable. I highly recommend staying at this location if you are looking for a tidy convenient place to stay at more than fair price.
Mr.Chuck and his wife were welcoming me with a bowl of watermelon. Lol, that's so kind of them. The room is great, I got two fans in my room. Thanks
方便整洁 交通便利 适合到法拉盛或纽约短暂停留的旅客

Very good

I stayed here for 3 nights during the US Open. Good location, 10min walk from the subway (direct line to central Manhattan), this is almost at the heart of the Flushing Chinatown.
The owner contacted me before my arrival to explain me how to get to his apartment. The building is a bit old but the apartment and the room are clean. The description is accurate, the room is small but it's enough, there is AC and wifi (working well), you can use the bathroom and the kitchen. The host has been welcoming and made his best to speak in English.
I would recommend this place if you're staying in the area, it's definitely good quality for the price!
Stayed at Chuck's place for one night while attending the US open and it was exactly what we needed. Thanks for the great stay, Chuck!
The room is clean but small. You can hear the voice from the next room. In short, It's still a good place which is match its price.
Chuck is nice person ! Chucks flat is ideal for travellers, all is clean . Safe locality on subway to centre . Shops and restaurant near house . Thank you !!!

Warning: MATTRESS IS HARD AS A ROCK!!! It quite possibly was just a box spring. Might as well have slept on the floor. The prior reviews are correct in that the room is very small and in the living room constructed out of plywood panels, providing visual privacy but no auditory privacy. The host, however, was very nice and responsive in communication prior to checkin. Limited street parking but lucked out finding a spot after circling several times around. If rickety elevators are a phobia of yours, this is not the place for you. The kitchen also stunk of old/rotting food the next morning, so we got out early... But, we booked this place because it was cheap and 2 miles away from Citi Field, so it fulfilled its purpose. However, I would not stay here again.
老板很好很热情啊,房间的位置也是蛮好的,就是隔音有点点差,但性价比高啊,还是慢推荐的｡
鬧中取靜的純住宅區,交通方便,房東貼心的細小處都使得住宿非常便利,希望下次還有机會入住,非常感謝!

房屋离中国城很近,出行方便｡房间内非常干净,房东热情｡如果再来我还是会住在这里｡
The house is very close to the Chinatown, and it is convenient to go out. The room is very clean and the host is warm. If I come NYC again, I will stay here.
Small but cozy place. The location is great, easy to go to subway, and easy to find food around there. 正川 is very warm-hearted person.
Well, nice and clean but the rooms don't keep the sound from the other rooms. Other pros is convenient to walking to Flushing Main Street. And host, he is a nice person.
I have to say it is a very pleasant experience. The room is clean. The host is very friendly. The traffic is convenient. Flushing is amazing. I like there very much.
第一次通过airbnb预订住宿｡感受很好｡房主邹先生非常热情细致,之前一直联络｡位置距地铁较近,交通方便,留下有便利店餐厅等｡房子干净舒适,床舒服,房间储物空间大!隔音略不足但能克服!性价比较高,值得推荐!

When I arrived it was 10pm at the house and it smelled like a pet store. I honestly felt sick from the horrid smell that was coming from his home. The room is extremely tiny he built it himself. He is rude and doesn't leave his guests alone. ALL NIGHT and the next morning he came knocking on my door and wouldn't leave my boyfriend and I alone to sleep or even enjoy our stay. This was one of the worse air BNB experiences of my life. To make matters worse the man doesn't speak a lick of English so it's hard to communicate with him. He should post this problem in his ad. He also keep asking my husband and I for $6 extra dollars which he requested through air Bnb. Word of advice STAY AWAY from this guy and his home. Not worth the aggravation and time. Just get yourself a nicer place around the area. Complete waste of money and time. I left crying because the man kept harassing my husband and I about $6 extra for what? I have no clue.
It was a real good place to stay. Its a colorful Asian Neighborhood!

Kohl's department, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Junction Blvd Rego Park, NY (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Gel Memory Foam Mattress Topper $36-$49. store pickup or free shipping over $50 Good luck.
A very clean apartment. Perfect pick for the price.
Everything I love the service communication the stay good family I loved, thanks.

My overall stay with Chuck was great. He was kind, the place was clean, and location is pretty good. The only thing was that the rooms are not sound proof that I was able to hear other people staying in the room next to me. So, I guess if you get loud "neighbor" airbnb guests, it could bother you but during my stay it was not bad at all. Chuck was very nice during my stay, and the room is very clean. It's a small room but it has everything you need to stay that I could see how considerate Chuck is. I think this place is definitely worth staying :)
房東非常熱心,入住前會充分的進行溝通告訴你入住的相關事項或是任何與房子有關的信息｡房子的地點也很方便,既不像Main St.那麼喧鬧,步行走過去又很近｡離地鐵站步行距離,房子很乾淨整潔｡

I didn't really feel welcomed. They opened the door, pointed to the room I would be staying in and that's it. The bed was really hard and the light from another room was on all night so it was hard to sleep.
Zhengchuan is nice and friendly. It's worthy the price.
The place is a good walk from the train station but my stay here was great, almost no disturbances and I was treated nice. :)

You can walk about 15 minutes from flushing main station subway. From this subway you can go to Central Park or the MET Bronx zoo and etc. around 1 hour by (URL HIDDEN) surrounded by lots of Chinese food and Korean food. I recommended Korean restaurant which is near Shiseido shop. You can buy reasonable Chinese food here. There are 2 laundries near this places. This place is really clean. The bedroom was renovated within their room, but you have your private. Host is really kind. He takes care guests really well and answer question really quick. He's really good guy.
房东一家十分好客,房间的配置绝对称得上物超所值,希望有机会还能造访
房间干净,房东人也很好｡
Chuck very gently and attend, perfect for 2 days just to sleep...hot shower and good bed... cheap, easy and fast.

很好的体验,正川非常热情也很容易相处｡房间干净,床也算舒适｡位置很方便｡如果你和我一样的背包客对豪华的装修没有要求,这是一个很好的选择｡
Overall a good experience. Zhengchuan is very nice and accommodating. Bedroom and restroom is clean. The location is very convenient. It is not romantic nor luxury place but an inexpensive place for traveler to rest.

Chuck's place was very clean and nice. Location was very close to the train station so it was good. He was very kind and I enjoyed my stay. This was my 2nd time staying at Chuck's so that should prove it.
nice place, worth the price, will come back
2nd time stay, good as before, will come back
좋음

Hôte ne parle que le chinois. Refuse qu'on lui téléphone souhaite communiquer que par écris car il utilise la traduction qui n'est pas toujours claire. L'appartement est à 15 minute du métro ce qui fait loin. La chambre n'est pas une vraie chambre les murs sont en préfabriqués la lumière et le bruit passe comme si nous dormons en peinture dans le salon le matelas est très dure dormir par terre serais pareil. Très mauvaise expérience. Pour le prix il est possible de trouver meilleur qualité et plus proche de manhattan.
很干净,房主很好很热心,住的非常舒服
雖然只住兩個晚上,但能感到鄒先生跟太太的熱情 ,能在異鄉遇見台灣人的感覺很棒,一切都像描述的一樣cp值很高,下次有機會還會去住,也推薦給其他人!
Very good place
位置非常优越,法拉盛中心,交通方便｡入住顺畅,适合短期留宿,性价比高｡

The price is okay spent 50$ for a last minute Saturday night but for a bit more you can get something way more comfortable. So first the host speaks Chinese I think and since I didn't need to communicate much it was fine with me. Room looks much nicer in photos. It's like a box 14x14 the room itself is just created with wooden walls in the living room and made into a room. The top of the walls are open so you can hear everything from the other room, kitchen and bathroom. Host was an old man and nice showed where everything was during check in. So the noise is an issue you can hear everything pretty much like there was no walls at all. The door had a lock and key but when I closed it and locked it I could easily pull/push it open and is pretty much not even a lockable door. BE AWARE The bed is hard as fk, I think it's just a mattress topper with no mattress. It was pretty uncomfortable to sleep and even lay down in. Room is a small box with lamp and a standing lamp. At night it got cold the heater didn't work in the room had to use all three blanket type covers to sleep. Bathroom was acceptable and kitchen didn't use much at all. Pros: cheap, location, visual privacy, nice host Con: Uncomfortable bed, not considered rooms more like cardboard boxes, zero noise reduction in rooms, unlockable door. Overall cheap place to crash for a night and the host told me to give them 5 stars  and good ratings. Think this place has good ratings because the host is an old man and didn't want to give an honest review.

房东叔叔很热情~阿姨也很和善~我第一天晚上要去接机~叔叔就给了我召车的电话~让我方便从机场来回~第二天我和朋友要出去玩的时候,阿姨正在厨房洗碗~我们和阿姨打了一声招呼后,阿姨就放下手中的事,主动帮我们来关门~晚上洗完澡,叔叔还热心地告诉我们街口洗衣店的位置,在得知洗衣店洗衣服要钱之后,叔叔告诉我们可以用手洗了~直接晾在厕所里~后来我也看了,厕所里确实有晾衣架~而且我朋友忘带毛巾了,但是叔叔提供了备用的毛巾给我朋友用,解决了她的麻烦~最后一个晚上,隔壁房间的住户说有点冷~那个时候已经十一点多了~但是叔叔还是出来帮他们检查窗户~路过我们房间的时候~主动问我们冷不冷,特别贴心~总之,整体体验还蛮不错的~推荐大家~

Had a good night of stay. The apartment was in the walking distance from the main st metro station and was pretty easy to find. We got there close to midnight, but the host waited and welcomed us. He gave us some suggestions on the nearby dining and shopping places the next day. The price is also very affordable and hard to beat in the flushing area. The only thing is that the walls weren't very sound proof and we could hear someone talking in another room, but that didn't bother us too much. Would love to stay there again next time we go to flushing, NY.
Clean. Comfortable. Friendly host. Very accommodating.
It was nice to stay there, the host treated me so nice, the place is clean and comfortable. That was a nice place to spend my nights.
好

My friend and I enjoyed the stay at 正川’s place! Everything was prepared and he was really accommodating with additional requests such as leaving the luggage at the airbnb earlier. We would definitely stay here again in the future!
Очень чистая комната, хозяин очень доброжелательный. Большие полки для вещей, личная мусорка, салфетка. Хоть и по мелочи, но все продумано. Нам все очень понравилось! Всем советую!

The host was great and polite. I don’t like that neighborhood had some sort of odor I could smell even inside, and sheets could be washed, no heat so I used blankets (3) but overall it was ok experience. And very important it is safe neighborhood.
有一晚空调没开还是坏了 冷死了 然后第二天跟房东叔叔说了 解决了 就好很多 走到main street 也要一段距离 但是性比价还不错啦 房间是很典型的中式房间 很大!一切都还可以!可以推荐!

Really good host . Friendly and comfortable environment. This is the good place to stay.
The room is pretty small but an awesome place to stay if you're in town for a couple days. The host was very kind and welcoming.
我跟朋友都很满意这个房间,很干净整洁,地理位置也很好,附近有早餐店和其他餐厅,步行十五分钟到达mai n st站｡Host夫妻都很友好很好沟通,推荐大家预定

Nice host, clean room ! Great stay
He is ever ready to make your stay enjoyable.
Very nice host. Enjoyed my stay!
nice place
I would recommend this place to anyone going to Flushing. He is a very helpfhl man and always available when u need him for something.
Highly recommend.

Amenities include the kitchen with this description: "space where guests can cook their own meals". This is not the case though. Only the long text with the rules mention that it's only for small meals. This important detail should be mentioned in the Amenities description. It's misleading, to say the least.
We enjoyed staying at this apartment. It's cosy  and close to Flushing town center. Accessible by bus or a short walk. Good Chinese restaurants nearby

name: Charming Private Bedroom on the UWS
summary: Want to stay in a beautiful apartment in a safe and quiet residential neighborhood and get the best possible feel about how real New Yorkers live? This is the place for you! Tons of restaurants and bars, one block from the subway, and close to Central Park and Columbia University. We provide clean sheets and towels. Please be aware that this is a shared space. You will have a private bedroom but a shared bathroom.
space: You can use the whole space!
description: Want to stay in a beautiful apartment in a safe and quiet residential neighborhood and get the best possible feel about how real New Yorkers live? This is the place for you! Tons of restaurants and bars, one block from the subway, and close to Central Park and Columbia University. We provide clean sheets and towels. Please be aware that this is a shared space. You will have a private bedroom but a shared bathroom. You can use the whole space! Living room, kitchen, bathroom, private bedroom. I always love to talk to my guests but I also respect privacy and their desires to be left alone. One block from the 1 train, and the M104 drops off directly in front of my building. It might take a while to find street parking, but there is a parking lot down the street. Subway is the easiest and cheapest way to get around the city. Come and go as you please!
neighborhood_overview: One block from the 1 train, and the M104 drops off directly in front of my building.
notes: Come and go as you please!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I have been an AirBnB host for slightly over three years now, and I absolutely love it! I have met so many amazing people from all over the world. In my first year, when both rooms were rented out, the two guests fell in love and are now living together in Europe! (Can’t wait for that wedding invite :) They send us pictures from time to time of their adventures!
We keep in touch with a lot of our guests through (Hidden by Airbnb) and have made some wonderful friends and connections. 
I am an original New Yorker, but left when I was 18 to attend Tulane University in New Orleans. I then went to graduate school at Griffith University in Australia, then went back to New Orleans for work until I moved back to New York to be closer to my family.

reviews.comments: Great for traveller that is out and about enjoying the city.  Comfortable bed. Convenient to transit. Good French pastries right around the corner. Safe neighborhood.
the are is very closed to Central Park.
Cali was very warm and helpful. She offered us breakfast in the morning as well as gave us recommendations around the city and how to get around. The apartment was very clean and homey
Cali was a great host. She stayed up late on my day of arrival to help me move in, and was kind throughout my stay.

Cali 는 정말 친근하고 친절한 주인이에요.
지내는 동안 정말 편하게 있다 갔어요.
아파트 위치가 정말 마음에 들었어요.
지하철, 스타벅스, 마트, 레스토랑이 근처에 있고
주변이 깨끗하고 안전하고 한적해요.
개인룸은 완전 안락하고 무엇보다도 큰 침대가 마음에 들었어요:)
Great host!

First experience using Airbnb and absolutely positive one! Full disclosure-I found and arranged the room as well as met Cali but the room was for my friend (while Cali and her boyfriend were away on vacation). When we met briefly for keys the day before Cali was very sweet, easy going and just as expected from great reviews. My friend (and this was his first time in USA) loved the neighborhood as it's easy for exploring Manhattan and just of Central Park, building is very New York-y, beautiful pre-war with large marble lobby and very spacious apartment located on the lobby level (so very easy if you have heavy luggage and very safe). Cali was away but accessible by text and all went very smoothly. Both my friend and I were very satisfied as all was truly great-Cali, neighborhood, price and apartment!
Thanks Cali!!

El lugar es exactamente como aparece en las fotos. El barrio era lindo y muy tranquilo, súper cerca de Central Park y justo en medio de dos estaciones de metro. Desgraciadamente no tuve la oportunidad de conocer a Cali, nuestra única comunicación fue por (Hidden by Airbnb) y algunos mensajes tardaban en ser respondidos :(

The neighborhood was nice and felt safe during the night as well, we found a great Bakery around, and it's just a few blocks from 1,2,3 metro lines. It was very quiet stay. The listing was quite accurate, also this apartment is smaller than the apartment shown in the picture.
We spent 2 nights at Cali apartment! The apartment was great clean and well located. The metro station is on the same street so it is easily to go downtown .

Cali was a great host. My parents needed a place to stay for my graduation and I booked this place because it was conveniently located. Even though she was in London, she stayed in touch by messaging me and ensuring that everything was fine. Her cousin came to help clean the place. The only issue we had was that the Wi-Fi wasn't working, but because we didn't need it too much, we didn't mind. My mother did say the sheets seemed a little unclean, but I didn't seem to see anything wrong with them - overall the experience was still great!

Great location, good value, easy access and terrific neighborhood.  Just a few block walk to Seinfeld's famous diner.  Cali was very attentive even though we didn't meet---she contacted us before we arrived, she and her cousin both responded quickly by text to help us figure out the WIFI connection, which, however, we weren't able to ever to connect to.  Apartment seemed kind of messy, bedroom dressers were cluttered, bed not neatly made, trash can in bathroom full of trash, used towels piled up in bathroom-----I realize we were sharing it with another guest, who came and went quietly late at night, but seems like it could've been better cleaned up.
Great location, excellent neighborhood. Whole stay was better than expected.
Nice communication, clean place!
Everything went smoothly.  Cali was responsive to my questions via email and text. The apartment was welcoming.  I would definitely recommend.

Questa è stata la mia prima esperienza con airbnb. Cali è stata molto gentile e tollerante con le mie richieste di check in e check out. La camera era spaziosa, tranquilla e pulita. La posizione ottima per le mie esigenze, conosco già il quartiere e questa è stata una delle ragioni della scelta. This was my first time with airbnb. Cali has been very kind with my request about time of check in and out. The bedroom is spacious, quiet and clean. Location is perfect, I already knew neighborhood I chose for that reason. I have been great.
Great location right between the 1 and A train! Easily accessible! Cali is really easy to get in touch with, made getting in the city smoothly!
Great place to stay
Cali's place was great! It was in a central location, the bed was comfortable, and the place was very clean.
Great place, in a great location. No hassle.
Cali was a great host. The bed was super comfy and it was perfect to visit Columbia university
The room is very comfortable. Cali is very enthusiastic.
If you want to travel to Columbia, it is in a great spot, otherwise, the location is located near the subway, so traveling isn't hard, but can be pricey.
Good place to stay in New York.

Ended up having a fine experience. Biggest complaint was that the guest room was also booked for that weekend for another guest, which would have been fine, but we were not made aware of this - little freaked when we heard someone enter in the middle of the night.
Great place. Very convenient to public transit and close to Columbia and Central Park.
Clean place, great location!
The location is very good. However,the room looks a little messy.
Super kind and flexible to check in

The place has an awesome locations Cali was very nice.
The location to central park and the subway are great and the little market to by groceries is wonderfull.
But the room is full of their stuff is like they live there and just walk out put some new sheets in the bed and thats it. The room has all places full of their stuff there is no place to put the suitcase.
I was traveling with my brother and we didnt mind it, but i would go there with my wife.
Contact her with check-in.
房子不错
It was a nice place to stay.
Great place!

Overall, the place was fine. Our main issue was the room itself was not very clean. The comforter was balled up in the middle of the bed. Items from under the bed sticking out. There was one towel laid flat on an ironing board and another sitting on a chair so we weren’t sure if those were supposed to be for us or not. We honestly were worried that someone had actually just slept in the bed and it had not been cleaned. The location is great - walkable and close to public transit. I just wish we could have been more sure the room had actually be cleaned prior to our arrival.
The place was easy to find. The room was cozy and cute. Cali was accomodating.
Great location! Close to metro and grocery store. But the room is NY style small. Cali responded to messages really fast. The common area is also very clean. Overall a good place to stay!

On the plus side, the apartment is well located for amenities and transport. The building is nice. On the down side, we found the apartment cluttered with the owner's belongings and unwashed items left in the kitchen for days. Attention to cleanliness and tidyness would make an improvement to the experience for guests.

The location is great, just a block away from subway station. And you can also take bus directly to MET.
The surrounding is convenient, love the restaurant nearby.
The instructions for key is terrible, and it took two hours for host to reply!
The bedroom is not so tidy when we first enter the bedroom.

Great location. Closed to bus stop and subway. Many good restaurants to eat nearby.

But there should be smarter ways to solve the key problems instead of letting different groups of guests communicate with each other to buzz others in.

And the heating system was noisy but the room was warm. That's good.
바로 근처에 맛있는 아침 카페가 있어요:)

Great location. Cali is very kind.
It is Cali's room and she rent her room, so there is a lot of her stuff in the room.
It was very good place to stay when you go to New York.
Great place , and Helpful. I recommend it
Cali’s place was great! The location is very convenient if you want to visit Columbia university or anywhere along the 1 line for the subway. Lots of good food options nearby too

Unreachable. Checking in was odd. Was supposed to check in at 3pm and was asked around 11am that same day if I could come at 6:30pm. I was on my way into the city and needed to check in at 3pm. She said she wouldn’t be home until 6:30pm but when I arrived around 3:30pm she was home and then I left around 5:30pm and she had never left. She was there the whole day. But told me she wouldn’t be home till 6:30pm. It also took her a very long time to respond to my messages when I was trying to tell her I needed to check in at 3pm. Which was just irritating. Then she said that she would message me instructions and leave a key. I never got any instructions and when I messaged her again because I was at the apartment she said she was home and to just buzz and come up. I did get in around 3 30pm so I was grateful she let me in but didn’t appreciate the stress of her possibly not letting me in until 6:30pm. I had tickets to a show at 7pm. If this had been discussed with me prior to that very day I would’ve made different arrangements. It took her two hours almost to respond to me and every time before that at least a half hour. And I was on a schedule. She also had a family member sleeping on the couch the whole time who in the mornings took an awfully long time in the bathroom. And then my last night there Cali herself was on the couch with her family member because she had rented out both her rooms. So instead of two people there were four. Which is just too much. And awkward. When I use Airbnb I usually stay in cheaper places out in queens and Brooklyn but thought I’d treat myself and spend a little extra money to stay on the island and on the upper west side. I’ve had infinitely better stays at the cheaper places and found this to be more stress than enjoyment. It was also clear that the room I was staying in had somebody else in it when I was not there, which I really did not appreciate. The bathroom was a mess. Hair all over the place. Crumbs and other dirt on the floor of the bedroom and kitchen. It was just a mess. She’ll say otherwise about all this and I can’t help that. But I’m not picky. I always leave 5 Star reviews because i just appreciate someone opening their home for me to stay in. If it’s a messy place at least make the person feel welcome. In this particular instance I felt incredibly unwelcome and felt more like an inconvenience than a guest paying to stay at the apartment. The area was incredible though. Very close to the train with lots of restaurants and shops around. So there’s that on...

Although she had a sprained ankle, Cali was very attentive to our needs. We came to NYC just what we needed to so we were out and about. No issues at all during our stay. The bed we stayed on had memory foam so it was very comfy!

Muy buena atención por parte de Cali en todo momento, muy atenta ante toda consulta.. el departamento siempre limpio.. tanto la habitación como el baño, respecto a la ubicación a mi personalmente me encanto, amen de que esta alejado.. sirve para ver como es NYC en sus barrios.. de fácil acceso a las lineas de subterraneo, por mi muy recomendable!
Nice and central location, close to columbia
Cali is a friendly host, she communicated well and did her best to accommodate us.
Cali has a nice place and communicated well prior to arrival. The location is safe and quiet for the city. Very nice host.
Very nice and spacious room.  Cali was quick to response every time . Enjoyed my stay.

The place is nice and quite, but not much of the host I have to say.

Do make sure to get the keys in person. My experience wasn’t that great - she left the keys in a lock on the grate around a tree on the street side, which was really hard to find with street parking and tons of trash bags around. I called twice, no answers, after standing downstairs for 20 mins she finally got back to me saying she was in a movie, and sent me a few brief directions. It was dark I can barely see anything around the tree. The trash bags were piled high around which didn’t help either. So I basically had to dig into the trash bags to search for the keys. People were giving me weird look it was quite embarrassing. Out of curtesy I texted her after getting in, to apologize I wasn’t able to keys in the first place, no response. And after I left the house the next morning, I text her that I left the keys in the room, no response again. Not quite sure if she’s purposely showing an attitude or something.
Cali is a perfect Host, nice, sweet, friendly and the place is perfect....

Cali’s place was more than wonderful! She was so hospitable and helpful in any way she could be! Her apartment is in a beautiful building in a wonderful part of the city!! So close to the subway and any sort of shop I may have needed! I only stayed one night, but I would gladly stay again! Easily one of my favorite places I’ve ever stayed in the city! Highly recommend to pretty much anyone!
Great!
Convenient.

Great location on the Upper West side and the place was as expected! Cali was a great host, very nice and accommodating! There were other guests in the other room as well, but I had absolutely no problem at all with anyone or anything. Everything was clean and stylish. My favorite thing about the stay was how quiet the apartment and area was!

Cali was super responsive and check-in and check-out was very easy. Her apartment was clean and easy. There was another person staying in the room next to us who we never ended up meeting, everything was smooth. The place did not have great natural light and felt a little gloomy but I'm sure would be great for people who close blinds at night. The only issue was that the bed linens had not been changed or apartment cleaned prior to our arrival - things we ended up having to do ourselves - but Cali was fairly clear about that from the beginning.

Cali is a very polite host however our stay at her house was below our expectations. The check in was quick and easy, and the apartment itself is nice and in a great location close to the subway. Our issue was with cleanliness. Cali said she has a cousin who cleans for her and she wasn’t sure if he/she had come to clean yet and we would be able to find a set of clean sheets on the couch. When we got into the apartment, it was messy and there were no clean sheets and I had to go through a pile of dirty laundry trying to figure out which sheets were clean, which was a very gross experience. The bathroom was not clean and the sink and shower do not drain properly and there was hair in the bathtub and the trash was not emptied. When cali arrived the day we were checking out she did apologize and cleaned the place and was nice enough to let us keep our luggage there for the day as we ran some errands in the city, but overall, it had been the worst experience in airbnb for me mainly due to the unsanitary conditions. There was also another 2 guests staying at the apartment who were equally as frustrated and asked us to clean the hair out the shower (it wasn’t ours as we are black and it was Caucasian hair). 

Overall, Cali is a nice person and apologized for the condition her apartment was in, however she did not meet expectations with her hosting skills and I would hope she would not let this happen again in the future.

Annoyance with the lockbox but other than that, everything was great and more than I expected. A clean home and a friendly environment nothing wrong with the place at all. I would definitely come over and over again

A great bed in a lovely room, but Host fell down on the job this time. Getting keys was a nightmare, the bedding wasn't fresh. Trash was full when I got there and stayed full for 2 days. Never saw Cali in person. Depended on kindness of other guest to help me get in. Wasn't offered towels or a washcloth. Thank God there was another guest there to help me. No coffee available for the morning.  But bed is nice, room is nice. Bathroom is a long walk down the hall. Best if you're young and fit and don't mind lugging your stuff across the street to get keys from a lockbox,  and not picky about garbage being full and dirty dishes in sink and counters. I had somethong stolen because I left it out on the sidewalk while I was lugging my other luggage in through two sets of doors. Thank God it wasn't anything important!

O lugar da Cali é bem legal! Houve um contratempo quanto ao check-in que, segundo ela, foi ocasionado pela hóspede anterior. No entanto, o quarto não estava limpo, nem a cama arrumada com lençóis e fronhas limpas. Pessoalmente tive que correr atrás para saber onde havia roupas limpas para colocar. Ela disse que foi um contratempo... se for isso mesmo, acontece e esta ok! Compreensível! 
Ela é simpática, atenciosa e responde por (Hidden by Airbnb) . O lugar é muito bem localizado, pertinho da Universidade de Columbia que é fantástica! Além disso é ao lado da melhor linha de metro de Manhattan pois corta a ilha de norte ao sul sendo fácil visitar NY. Também é próxima da ponta norte do Central Park! Vale a pena e indico!
Espaço incrivel

Cali is a generous and kind person. The apartment was decent, the location was perfect. Her place was insanely clean which I loved so much. She literally had whatever you want such as AC in every room which was very much needed... I had an amazing stay at the Bnb and amazing time in New York City.
Bonne expérience dans cet appartement. Il est bien situé, proche du métro. Cali est très réactive.
The place did not meet our expectations but otherwise was ok.
Great place!
Cali's a really good host and everthing was as we expected. Strongly recommend  to stay at Cali's home!

We had a great time at Cali’s place! It was only a short walk to the subway and we loved the area it was located in! Everything was clean and ready to go when we got there! Would definitely stay here again!

Cali est une hôte avenante, qui nous a attendu lors de notre arrivée tardive
Peut faire un effort sur la propreté et le linge de maison
Very bad experience. Check-in was extremely difficult as I had to find a lockbox at night.  The room was not cleaned after the previous guest left
Cali’s place was in a good location.
Cali was friendly and kind! Would def recommend. :)
It is a nice place , but Cali doesnt have  someone to help her , so if she is not able to do the cleaning, no one does.

Unfortunately, the apartment was not clean, and there were no clean sheets when I arrived.  Cali wasn't there since she was traveling.  The couple who previously booked the room were still there when I arrived, and they mentioned that the apartment was already dirty when they arrived 5 days earlier, and there had been no cleaning service at all.  They mentioned that multiple people had booked the 2 bedrooms in the apartment while Cali was out of town, so by the time I got there, both bedrooms were dirty, there were no clean sheets on the bed and the bathroom was dirty.   What's worst is that Cali seemed completely unapologetic for that.  Even the Airbnb support staff who reached out to her told me that she seemed unconcerned about the situation I was in.  Her attitude was pretty much: "oh well, please cancel".  She did not acknowledge the immense inconvenience of having to look for and book another place that same evening.  Airbnb support staff tried to help me find another place but there was no where else available that same night in the vicinity for the same price range that also had an elevator (I had heavy luggage to carry).  I therefore walked a few blocks to buy clean sheets and Airbnb reimbursed me for it.  Thankfully, I only needed to stay 2 days in the messy apartment.  The words "sorry for the mess" did not come out of Cali's mouth (via text) until the day I checked out.  The apartment is in a good location and relatively spacious by New York standards, but the lack of cleanliness and painful check-in process was not worth it.
Well described, great location, good neighbourhood with easy access to the sights of NYC. I would recommend this apartment as a base for your NYC stay.
My stay at Calis was good! The bed was comfortable and Cali was very kind :-)
The location is perfect and very close to subway station. There are some good restaurants around this area.

Cali’s place was amazing! Super close to subway station (1-2 mins walk), comfortable bed and superb atmosphere. Super safe and clean apartment. And there’s 24/7 supermarket just at the end of thr street! Cali was really kind and caring:) thank you for an amazing experience
Great location, great host!
A great caring woman with a lovely place in a perfect spot accessible to everything! Thanks for a great time, Cali!
Cali was great host the next time I go to ny I plan to airbnb with her again.
Es un apartamento confortable y apto para unos días en NY, muy bien ubicado
Cali was a terrific host for our musician who was in town to do a concert. Would definitely have people stay there again.

Cali is a great host & her apartment is just what you could possibly need. It’s in a prime location & close to Central Park, Columbia University & the 1 Train. She’s really nice & will respond quick. I highly recommend her place!!
Cali's place was perfect for what I needed: a quick stop in NY, good location, and nice host. I would stay with Cali again.

Cali is an amazing host and was very helpful and hospitable throughout my stay. Her place is in a great location and has very nice amenities. I couldn’t have picked a better place to stay. The room itself is very stylish and comfortable. Highly recommend this place to anyone!!

The location was good and had easy access to the subway. However, in my experience it was just a place to lay my head. The place was a little cluttered than what the pictures showed. It also was a little hard to ever use the restroom with another couple. The guest that were there before us left dirty sheets and towels in our room which we had to remove ourselves. the bed and pillows were a little uncomfortable to sleep on and there was a clicking noise all night from the heater that sounded like someone was trying to come in the room from outside. checkout didnt go as planned. however overall experience wasnt as expected compared to other airbnbs. But truly grateful to have found this place to experience New York on such short notice.

This is one of the best places I have stayed in. The whole process went so smoothly Cali makes the place feel really nice. It has everything you need in the kitchen. The bedroom is really big and the location can't be beaten. Really, really enjoyed my time. Cali was an amazing host with an even more lovely space :)

An amazing experince ,
great location.

host.host_about:
Hi Everyone! I am Bermal. I am a student at Boğaziçi University. My department is international trade. I am learning Chinese and Portuegese. I love traveling and making new friends. I have been the U.S, Brazil, China, Azerbeijan, France, Italy, Spain, Germany, Bulgaria,Belgium, Nederland and Serbia. I travel whenever I find a suitable time. I really enjoy with new cultures and new food. I have hosted many from all over the world in my place. If you need, I can be your guide in Istanbul or can pick you up from the airport. Hope you have a great time in Istanbul! 
Ps: Please do not hestitate to ask anything comes Your mind!

name: Chambre à louer- Plateau Mont-Royal
summary: Chambre pouvant accueillir 2 ou 3 voyageurs. Situé au coeur du Plateau, vous ne vous ennuierez pas dans notre appartement ; de nombreux bars, restos, boutiques etc. sont à proximité. En collocation avec deux québécoises, vous adorerez votre séjour :)
space: L'appartement, un 5 et demi, est situé au dernier étage. Il est charmant, lumineux et décoré au goût du jour. Vous pourrez profiter de la télévision, laveuse, Internet illimité, cuisine, etc. Faites comme chez vous!
description: Chambre pouvant accueillir 2 ou 3 voyageurs. Situé au coeur du Plateau, vous ne vous ennuierez pas dans notre appartement ; de nombreux bars, restos, boutiques etc. sont à proximité. En collocation avec deux québécoises, vous adorerez votre séjour :) L'appartement, un 5 et demi, est situé au dernier étage. Il est charmant, lumineux et décoré au goût du jour. Vous pourrez profiter de la télévision, laveuse, Internet illimité, cuisine, etc. Faites comme chez vous! Vous aurez une chambre privée (lit queen) et nous partagerons les aires communes ; Vous pourrez profiter pleinement de la cuisine toute équipée, de la salle de bain ainsi que du salon. Nous sommes deux jeunes professionnelles qui travaillons la semaine. Il nous fera plaisir de répondre à toutes vos questions et peut-être même de vous faire découvrir notre coin de pays. neighborhood_overview: Le plateau Mont-Royal est un quartier prisé à proximité des restaurants, des bars, des boutiques etc. C'est aussi la saison des festivals ce qui le rend encore plus animé.

reviews.comments: Jasmine and her roommate were extremely courteous and helpful.  They are friendly and super chill. Their place is clean and tidy. Comfortable and sunny. The location of their apartment is on a very charming and quiet street. The neighborhood they reside at is also amazing and is close to so many things. It's a walker's paradise. And if you like cats, there's a cat cafe is right across the street.

Jasmine and An-Julie made us feel very welcome and they were very hospitable. Their home was even nicer than the photos. Everything was as they described. The best part about our stay was the amazing location. I know doing air b&b was only a short term plan given their upcoming move, but if they ever do air b&b again in the future, I would  recommend them as hosts.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Yasmina à été très réactive avant mon arrivée. Les informations qu'elle m'a données ont été précises et m'ont permis de localiser facilement l'appartement. Mon séjour à été très agréable. Elles sont très courtoises, parlent français et anglais.

J'ai été très bien reçu, je suis arrivé en retard et Jasmine était un soir de saint jean. Le quartier est parfait entre Saint Laurent et Saint Denis, restos, shopping métro bus. L'appartement et la chambre est très propre.

name: Large room w its own bathroom (& bath)
summary: 3BR unit with its own entrance set back from a very quiet street. It is a split-level house with a bathroom on each floor, full kitchen, and full living room. The whole complex used to be a church, which explains the building's unusually high ceilings.
space: The room available (in the picture) is the only bedroom on the level and has its own bathroom (and bath!). It is a full size room with a full size bed, two huge windows, bedside table, walk-in closet and dresser, and it has a walk-in closet. I love this space - I can work but also chill peacefully in it.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood really can't be beat. The street is super quiet with lots of trees, local shops, cafes and bars. Some of the best restaurants in New York are just around the corner (Frankie's, Buttermilk Channel, Lavender Lake, etc.) - it's like living in a small town just across Brooklyn Bridge.  It's just about a mile from Prospect Park and a mile from Brooklyn Bridge Park, which makes it perfect to go to all the summer events in both parks. Gowanus Whole Foods is just half a mile away, and the only Trader Joes in Brooklyn is a mile away on Court Street. Also, there's lots of delis and **amazing** bakeries around.
notes: i live with two very nice and cool guys: a Canadian from Quebec who works in advertising, and a Philly native who teaches science at an elementary school. We all have our own bathrooms so really only share the kitchen and living room which we give all use and try to keep clean.
transit: The apartment is located less than five minutes walking distance from the Carroll stop on the F and G trains. You can also take the B57 bus to go to Downtown Brooklyn, and you can borrow my bike if you'd like.
access: It's a 3BR unit with its own entrance set back from a very quiet street. It is a split-level house with a bathroom on each floor, a full kitchen, and a full living room.
interaction: I will be away at a conference but will be reachable by phone, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or email.
house_rules: Just the usual, keep it as tidy as possible, clean the kitchen after each use and take out the trash every three days or so.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: A Mexican who has been lucky enough to live and travel in many places. Currently studying a PhD at the New School in NYC and working on a couple of research projects on urban issues. Running, reading and cooking fan, and a bit of a cleaning freak if necessary.

name: Boavista apartment
summary: Nice 2 bedroom apartment in calm aerea. Near Foz, City park and serralves museum.
space: 1 quarto - cama de casal 2 quarto - beliche + uma cama de solteiro
description: Nice 2 bedroom apartment in calm aerea. Near Foz, City park and serralves museum.
neighborhood_overview: Bairro Calmo habitacional
notes: Supermercados, cafés, bancos nas imediações próximas.
transit: Metro e autocarros.

reviews.comments:
Anfitrião simpático e sempre disponível. O apartamento encontrava-se limpo e arrumado e a descrição correspondia a realidade. Tinha carro próprio e achei q era de fácil acesso.

Infelizmente fomos obrigados a cancelar parte da nossa estadia, mas o Tiago foi extremamente compreensivo e flexível. Recomendo o apartamento e de certeza q tentarei reservá-lo em futuras ocasiões.

the flat was nice but the highway is very close. 
fortunately the windows are good.

I needed to quickly host 4 people who had come for my wedding and Tiago's apartment was the perfect fit for them. It is in a very nice neighbourhood, quiet and with local stores and supermarkets for my guests. There is also a lot of transportation nearby, so they felt quite free in moving around the city.

Recommended!
We spent interesting holidays @ Tiago's flat. We loved Porto area. The flat have all useful commodities ! Thank you Tiago ! See you next time, Cécile

Très bon accueil, Tiago et son papa ont été très gentils, très serviables et toujours disponibles et à l'écoute. Encore un grand merci à vous pour ce séjour inoubliable à Porto!! 
Le quartier est très calme,l'appartement de Tiago est spacieux, conforme aux photos avec tout l'équipement nécessaire. 
Le voisinage est très sympathique et chaleureux.  
Merci encore à vous, nous avons passée de superbes bonnes vacances!
Very Nice flat ! Thank you !

Appartement tres sympa et grand ! Idéal pour 5 personnes ! 
Tiago et son papa nous on accueilli tard le soir quand nous sommes arrivées et en fonction de notre retard d avion!

Logement très agréable, spacieux, confortable. Très bien situé par dans Porto, car plages à 5 minutes en voiture, métro proche, embouteillages évités, donc un gain de temps précieux en vacances! Le bémol: situé à proximité d'un axe routier très passant et bruyant. Mais on ne peut pas tout avoir! nous recommandons ce logement. Tiago, et son papa, qui nous a accueilli, sont très sympathiques.

It was perfect for us five.
The children felt at home.
Very good situation to travel in the country.
Very comfortable, just noisy the day (but the purpose was not to stay there).
Good location
thanks

name: ROOM FOR FEMALE FLATMATE
summary: fully furnished, clean sunny home. All bills are included. Non - smoking  area. Our house is 300m to south campus of Bogazici University.
description: fully furnished, clean sunny home. All bills are included. Non - smoking  area. Our house is 300m to south campus of Bogazici University.

reviews.comments:
This apartment is great on all accounts. Its location is also fantastic, very close to Bogazici University, Etiler and metro station. Unlike other places nearby, the room and the house were quite clean. 

Would definitively book again.

Bilge is a very friendly and colorful person. She was very welcoming and always asked me if I needed anything. The descriptions were less than what she provided.  She provided more. Live music both vocal and piano, towels, shampoo, delicious breakfast and the cleanest bed in the world...More than enough, huh?Thanks Bilge! Miss my stay with you already! hoping to stay there longer in my next visit to Istanbul
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I can't recommend this accommodation highly enough if you are looking for a place near Bogazici University or Bebek. Bilge is a delightful host, so pleasant and lovely to talk to, and the room is clean, pretty, light and airy. I asked to stay with almost no notice due to special circumstances and Bilge went out of her way to make me feel welcome. Wifi is fast, bed is comfortable and Bilge is always available with suggestions and insights about the area and Turkish culture. The location is also great, at the quiet end of a street with lots of nice restaurants and cafes that are popular with students and professors and close to bus and Metro stops. This would be a lovely rental whether for a few days or for a longer stay. AAAA++++!

name: Beautiful Tropical Oasis near beach in Kailua
summary: This is a one of a kind home with lofted ceilings just across the street from the beach access that leads to a peaceful section of Kailua beach, great for boogie boarding and swimming.  Large covered Lanai, solar heated pool, and spacious kitchen. Outside BBQ, beer fridge.  Kayak, 2 bikes, surf boards available.  All bedrooms have A/C.
space: Beautiful architecture, open air design in living room and kitchen is great for family time.  Enclosed garage for 1 car.  Pool can be fenced upon request to ensure safety for the little ones.  The lot features a tropical setting, with u-pick papaya trees.
description: This is a one of a kind home with lofted ceilings just across the street from the beach access that leads to a peaceful section of Kailua beach, great for boogie boarding and swimming.  Large covered Lanai, solar heated pool, and spacious kitchen. Outside BBQ, beer fridge.  Kayak, 2 bikes, surf boards available.  All bedrooms have A/C. Beautiful architecture, open air design in living room and kitchen is great for family time.  Enclosed garage for 1 car.  Pool can be fenced upon request to ensure safety for the little ones.  The lot features a tropical setting, with u-pick papaya trees. Guests have access to garage, front porch and pool area.  There is a private studio on the property that is not part of this rental and that has its own separate entrance, parking spot, and privately fenced yard.  You most likely won't even know it's there. We are usually available and would love to meet you or give you all the privacy you like. We are in a middle-class section of Kailua town, with the
neighborhood_overview: We are in a middle-class section of Kailua town, with the beach access across the street.  Grocery stores less than a mile away.  Lots of great shops and restaurants  only 1 mile down the road. We are located in the middle of Kailua beach bay about 2 beach access's north of a favorite beach spot called Kalama's.  There are 2 bikes in the garage, surfboard and boogie boards.
notes: We provide kayak, bikes, boogie boards, beach towels, umbrella, surfboard, beach wagon, cooler, pool toys.  We have a modest liquor cabinet we ask that if you use please make your own contribution.
transit: The bus system has a stop across the street and can take you anywhere on the island.  We also have 2 bikes to ride around town.
access: Guests have access to garage, front porch and pool area.  There is a private studio on the property that is not part of this rental and that has its own separate entrance, parking spot, and privately fenced yard.  You most likely won't even know it's there.
interaction: We are usually available and would love to meet you or give you all the privacy you like.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 4PM. Please take steps to avoid generating any complaints from neighbors.  We ask that you respect our neighbors by only parking on our property, please don't play music extremely loud, or let kids yell and scream a lot in pool area.  This is a absolutely NO smoking house.  If you smoke, please do it in front yard and safely discard all cigarette butts.  You are welcome to use the beach equipment and any other amenities in the house.  We just ask that if you break something please replace it.  There is a outdoor hot shower on the pool side of the house for washing off sand.  Please don't go in the pool or the house without washing off the sand.  We also would appreciate if you shake sand off of all clothes or towels before putting them in the washer. Please only use the A/C if you are home.  Do not leave A/C on if you plan on leaving for the day.  This particular house is actually our home.  We only rent it during certain times of the year.  We leave  food items in t

host.host_about: We strive to host people as we'd like to be hosted.  We have pride in our property and hope to offer value and a great base for your vacation.

reviews.comments: Lisa's home was a fantastic place to spend our vacation. It's very well set up for kids and fits 6 people very comfortably. Everything was there to make us feel at home. The location was perfect. Just a few minutes walk from an absolutely  gorgeous, quiet beach. Kailua is the way to go if you want to avoid too many tourists, crowds.

Thank you Brett and Lisa for having us stay in your amazing home.  It is exactly as described and was the perfect base for our Hawaiian paddling adventures.  We were quite a large group of 6 adults, a teenager and a toddler, so Lisa and Brett arranged the house to suit our needs.  The toddler had a cot to sleep in and plenty of toys to play with in the garden and the pool was fenced off which really helped with safety.  The large open plan kitchen/dinner/living room was great for hanging out in and we pretty much cooked on the outside grill every night.  The futon in the living room also provided a bed for the teenager at night.  

The house is a one block walk from the quiet end of beach, which meant we hardly put the pool to use.  

Brett and Lisa were super responsive to any questions we had.  They moved their family into the separate annex during our stay but we couldn't even tell they were there.

Thank you for making our holiday a trip to remember.

Mahalo, Steve and the Hong Kong paddling crew

Excellent stay in Kailua. The location of the house was great. 2 minute walk to local beach, 2 minute drive to Kailua park beach and 5 minute drive to Lanikai beach, 5 minute drive to town. The house was large and spacious. Tons of toys for kids and beach stuff such as snorkel kit, beach wagon, beach rug and kayak. Pool was great and had a nice kid safe gate. Lastly the host was a great help and easy to get in touch with. This was my best bnb stay so far. I would definitely stay again.
The host canceled this reservation 161 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We really enjoyed our stay at the villa. The location is great, only a few minutes to the beach and great space outdoors as indoors. 
Nice, warm and clean pool and lots of places to sit outside and to play for the children. Indoor had everything we could ask for. A big and well equipped kitchen/living room made it easy to pal around with the family. Everything you need you can find at the villa. We are more than happy about our stay and can only recommend it to others. If you need any help during your stay the owners are very accommodating.

There aren't many houses that you want to come back after staying for a couple of days. This was one of them. We are thinking about coming back sometimes in the near future. Super kids friendly. Awesome and careful host. The house is clean and located in the convenient area with 5 mins to the great beach.
Great home. Fab location close to beach. Clean. Big. Well maintained. Highly recommended. Will visit again.

The rooms and the swimming pool were very spacious and clean, so I was able to spend comfortably. I arrived at the sea in 5 minutes, so I was able to play a lot. Lisa kindly told us in advance to explain the house and was able to stay without inconvenience. Thank you for letting me have a wonderful time.

Wonderful private home.  Great for my family which included my baby granddaughter.  The home had large kitchen, wonderful gas stove, lots of good pans...perfect for cooking family meals.  Backyard pool lovely.  We very much enjoyed our stay.

We loved our stay. The house is large and well-designed for a comfortable stay. The private pool and proximity to a beautiful quiet beach made for the perfect Hawaiian vacation. Lisa and Brett were superb hosts, and made sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed.

name: Cosy room@ Avalon-near beaches,cafes & Pittwater
summary: A pint-sized room with style & comfort! The space is bright, airy & cosy with a separate entrance & private ensuite. The comfortable double-bed & quality linen ensure a great nights sleep.  The house is a 5 minute walk from beautiful Pittwater & a 20 minute walk from Avalon Beach & cafes.  Palm Beach is only a 15 minute drive away.
space: The room includes a selection of herbal & regular teas, coffee pods & a nespresso coffee machine.  A toaster & microwave are also provided & the bar fridge includes healthy breakfast options (muesli, fruit & yoghurt).   As well as bath towels, beach towels & beach bag are provided.  And of course, wi-fi is available . Whether exploring the Pittwater & Avalon/Palm Beach area or attending a special event such as a wedding or 21st, the space makes a great relaxing & peaceful base. Or you may just want to chill out & enjoy what the local area has to offer.  The room is naturally cool in summer & has central heating for winter.
description: A pint-sized room with style & comfort! The space is bright, airy & cosy with a separate entrance & private ensuite. The comfortable double-bed & quality linen ensure a great nights sleep.  The house is a 5 minute walk from beautiful Pittwater & a 20 minute walk from Avalon Beach & cafes.  Palm Beach is only a 15 minute drive away. The room includes a selection of herbal & regular teas, coffee pods & a nespresso coffee machine.  A toaster & microwave are also provided & the bar fridge includes healthy breakfast options (muesli, fruit & yoghurt).   As well as bath towels, beach towels & beach bag are provided.
