Or you may just want to chill out & enjoy what the local area has to offer.  The room is naturally cool in summer & has central heating for winter. As well as the room & ensuite, gues
neighborhood_overview: The house is situated between Avalon surf beach & Pittwater. Shops, cafes, restaurants, Pittwater Paradise Beach, Clareville Beach & Avalon surf beach are nearby.   Early risers can walk down to Avalon Beach to watch the sunrise or it's just a short walk from the house to watch the sunset from Pittwater.  Stand-up paddle board lessons are available at nearby Clareville Beach.  It's also a popular BBQ spot.
transit: It's a 5 minute drive or 20 minute walk to Avalon village & beach or catch the local bus from the stop opposite my house.  A 15 minute drive will take you to Palm Beach. The Northern Beaches can be a difficult area to get around if you don't have a car, however, at Avalon village you can catch a bus to the city (L88 & L90) & Palm Beach (L90). The L88 & L90 will also take you to Mona Vale where you can catch a bus to Manly.   There is also a limited bus service at the end of my street to the city.  If needing to travel by taxi to an event, it is advisable to book in advance.
access: As well as the room & ensuite, guests have their own courtyard, entrance & off-street parking right outside their room.  Laundry facilities are available on request.
interaction: We will greet you on arrival, get you set up with a key to your room & give you some tips on the local area. We respect your privacy but will be around if you need us.
house_rules: Check-in & check out by arrangement. This is a non-smoking household.  If you want to smoke, please do so outside. Please be respectful of noise, especially at night. No pets.

host.host_location: Avalon Beach, New South Wales, Australia
host.host_about: I love living in this area with my two adult sons & a somewhat lazy airedale. I enjoy the village atmosphere & being close to Pittwater Beaches & Avalon surf beach.

reviews.comments: Clean, basic accommodation and a convenient base during our stay in the northern beaches district of Sydney. Loved waking up to the sound of the birds! I recommend the short walk down to Paradise beach. Cathy, David and Max were great, and made sure we had everything we needed without making a fuss. Thanks!

Cathy is warm and honest.  The room is well priced, clean and practical.  The bed is very comfortable, with a lovely new bathroom ensuite.  The location was very practical for my needs, the breakfast was lovely, with a great TV to watch from the bed, and a lovely selection of teas and coffee.

Very comfortable room and Cathy had really thought of everything.  The coffee, yoghurt, fruit and fresh cut flowers were lovely.  Cathy was a very welcoming host.  We hope to stay again in the future.

Absolutely perfect in every way. I could not have chosen better! 

Thank you Cathy for making me so welcome in your home from the moment I arrived.

 The accommodation is beautiful, the bed was really comfortable with high quality organic bed linen. It was great to have a fridge in the room and delicious breakfast supplies provided. The area of Avalon beach is stunning. I cannot wait to come back!
Room was clean, amenities good and reasonably priced. Great for a quick getaway to the northern beaches. Cathy was friendly and helpful.

Great place to stay. Cathy was warm, welcoming, helpful and a wonderful host, happy to assist you with what you need. The room is exactly as described. It was clean, comfortable, practical and beautifully decorated. Bed was cosy and neatly arranged. You have everything you need: clean and private bathroom ensuite, wall-mounted TV and a delicious and healthy breakfast, which you can enjoy on a nice table outside the room. I would highly recommend this place to everyone staying in Avalon as it is perfectly located and well priced. We would love to go back to this quiet and lovely place soon.

Cathys place in Avalon is beautifully furnished with a huge very very comfortable bed. Cathy is a warm and welcoming host who made our stay very lovely. I would highly recommend staying here to explore the beautiful area.

We stayed at Cathy's place for a friends wedding over the weekend and absolutely loved it! It was perfect for a comfortable nights sleep, very clean, nice and modern. Cathy was lovely, making sure we had everything we needed and then leaving us to it. We were running a little late so had to rush in and get ready before taking off to the wedding!
The area is perfect too, just down the road from the shops and not too far to the beach. We will definitely be staying there again in the future if we are up that way and recommending to our friends. Thanks Cathy!

Cathy was a very nice and communicative host that helped us with some awesome and important tips and had many things to recommend in the area. Her place was only a 10 min. walk away from Avalon beach and an 15 min. drive to the gorgeous palm beach. The room was beautifully decorated and clean.

Cathy made us feel very welcome and went out of her way to help us on two occasions.

Avalon was beautiful. We discovered the street we where on is not only close to avalon beach but also a stone through away from paradice beach - which is a small beach on the pittwater side of avalon. Stunning! 

Thank you Cathy 
We loved our stay!!
Beautiful. Serene. Private and in a beautiful location.
Neighbourhood was peaceful and we really enjoyed our time in there.

Cathy was welcoming and polite and even provided a nice and healthy breakfast for me for the next day. The room looked exactly as pictured, I found it to be clean and comfortable.  It was in a quiet neighbourhood, close to Avalon beach and overall a very pleasant stay. Thank you Cathy.
The place was great - exactly what was on the description. Lovely room with lots of light, clean and cosy.

Cathy's fully self-contained studio apartment has the comfort and stylishness of an inner-city space. Step outside and you are graced with the stunning scenery of a wilderness landscape. Then head down to the Avalon shops and you have the atmosphere of a friendly village. 

I had the most magnificent mid-week break at Cathy's apartment. She and the sweet (and useless-as-a-guard-dog) Maggie were welcoming and friendly.

I can not recommend Cathy's place enough. It was rejuvenating. I live in the centre of Sydney, needed a break, so I headed north. The landscape, neighbourhood, people, food, everything was wonderful. And Cathy's kindness and her beautiful space just made it perfect.

I will be back. And soon.
Cathy is a beautiful soft natured lady. Was very helpful.
Cathy provided everything we needed for a great stay. It was a lovely room walking distance to the beach. I would definitely recommend!

Cathy is a lovely host that is providing a nice and cosy room in a quiet and relaxing area of Avalon Beach above Sydney.  A really comfortable stay, a short trip away to some amazing beaches!  Cathy provided plenty of useful local tips during our stay including helping us figure out our plans on NYE in Sydney relating to public transport.

We really loved our stay at Cathy's place. Location is very nice, close to everything but in a quiet surrounding. Cathy is a very nice lady who does everything she can to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Everything was very clean and she provided us with stuff for breakfast, towels.. Such a shame we had very bad weather. Perfect excuse to return one time :) We can really recommend Cathy's place! :)

Cathy was absolutely lovely. She made us feel welcome and completely at home! The room was immaculate - so clean and comfortable and plenty of space too. I loved the seperate entry to the room and so convenient being able to keep our car close by. Cathy looked after us so well, we are very grateful and look forward to returning some time soon!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Cathy's property for 1 night whilst attending a Wedding in Palm Beach. The rooms was clean, tidy, presented beautifully and although we didn't eat it, there was breakfast (muesli, blueberries etc) in the fridge for us. 
Cathy responded straight away, was very friendly and I would recommend staying her property.

Lovely apartment, just like the description / pictures. Off road parking and peaceful neighbourhood. 
Cathy was easy to communicate with and happy to help at any point.

Cathy met us on arrival and made us feel comfortable. As we were arriving back after dark Cathy left an outside light on for us. Decor in the room was tasteful and we had an enjoyable overnight stay.  We really appreciated the very comfortable bed and bedding and the delicious continental breakfast. Car access was great and we parked right next to our room. The room was well fitted out with everything we needed. We will be back.

As I was running a little bit behind my advised arrival time, Cathy checked in with me to ensure I was ok and to advise she had left a key for me, as she may not be home when I arrived. 

This simple gesture was very thoughtful and much appreciated.

Cathy was a perfect host, making me feel very welcome and if there was anything I needed to just ask.

The room was fresh, clean and tastefully presented, with everything you would need for a short getaway.

The location was perfect, private, quiet and peaceful. 

I will definitely be returning to this gem on the Northern Beaches.

Thank you Cathy =)
Cathy is a wonderful host. She is very kind and hospitable. She made sure I got what I need. The place is as described. I was able to relax and enjoy the beaches (Paradise, Palm Beach, Avalon).
We had a really nice stay at Cathy's place. It was pleasant, convenient and had everything we needed. We had a lovely breakfast there too. It was overall really enjoyable.
Cathy is a wonderful and generous host. The room is perfect for my needs.
Beautiful and clean room, facilities were really good and it was a great base for our weekend
I was made to feel very welcome through multiple texts and a personal greeting from Cathy.

Cathy was a perfect host.  We had strawberries, muslie, yogurt and milk in the fridge on arrival.  The room and bathroom were lovely and clean, with a very comfortable bed.

Cathy has considered everything in the room, my mum and I were very comfortable there.

The location is also perfect, the area is very peaceful and would highly recommend staying with Cathy.

Thanks Cathy for a memorable stay!

We had a couple of relaxing nights/days at Cathy's. Great but simple  set-up. It was quite homey and Cathy was a friendly and helpful host, and was quick to help us with a clothing rack, and made sure there was enough breakfast each morning. Thanks Cathy for your kind hospitality.

Cathy's room was just what I needed. It was clean, comfortable and quiet and only a few minutes walk from the sailing club where I was attending a wedding reception. It's not a big space but has everything you need for a short stay and I would readily recommend it.
Cathy was great with her directions and communication leading up to my stay. Oh and the surrounding area, all the huge mature eucalypts and down by the water are just beautiful. Thank's Cathy..
Anthony.
Cathy is a wonderful host

Nice welcome, quiet neighbourhood. For most people a car would be necessary. In my case I enjoyed the 2k walk down to the cafes and shops at Avalon. Cathy was a nice host and any requests were quickly attended to.

Cathy was a friendly and helpful host. The room, bed and bathroom were clean, comfortable and welcoming. The location was a beautiful quiet street. Cathy supplied milk and a great selection of teas. Just what I needed for my stay.  I would definitely go back.
Cathy is always a fantastic host - easy-going, flexible and a great communicator.
Lovely room in a great area with a wonderful and accommodating host!

Cathy was a wonderful host, the room was perfect- very clean, quiet and private, comfortable and great location. Cathy was super flexible when it came to check in time and her communication was excellent. The breakfast was a lovely touch and there are even beach towels included. An amazing place to stay if visiting Avalon and surrounding areas. Thanks again!
It was amazing staying in this lovely room, it is all perfect in there, everything is easy with Cathy. We really enjoyed our weekend in palm beach thanks to Cathy. Thank you

We had an amazing stay at Cathys place. The room has its own entry and is self contained with its own private bathroom, fridge and kitchenette. The place is very clean, bed very comfortable and Cathy was even kind enough to supply some fresh blueberries to go with breakfast. The location is perfect, we walked down to paradise beach which was gorgeous and 5 minutes away. Would highly recommend Cathys place for anyone looking for a weekend retreat!

My partner and I really enjoyed Cathy's space. It was in a peaceful area, easy 10,15 minute stroll to town. The room was clean with everything we needed. The bed was so comfy with the nicest sheets. Cathy was very nice and we had all the privacy we needed. The provided breakfast of yoghurt, muesli and blueberries was so yum! Great little air BnB :)
Very private, very quiet and lovely. The room was all I needed for a peaceful retreat.  Nice walking in the area, including down to Pittwater at Paradise beach.  Thanks Cathy!
The room was private,clean and comfortable. Cathy responded to all our queries promptly and made us feel very welcome.
Warmly welcomed and extremely clean room.
wonderful!!!!

Avalon Beach is a very scenic destination, not far from Palm Beach. Cathy's cosy room was as expected. Great to walk down to nearby Paradise and Clareville Beaches and watch the water craft on beautiful Pittwater. There was a warm welcome from Cathy, very helpful with everything. Hopefully I will return for another stay ...

Had a lovely single night stay here whilst in the area for a wedding. 
Room was comfortable, bed fantastic and breakfast (muesli, yogurt, fruit) fresh & delicious. 
Cathy was flexible with both check-in and check-out times. 
Couldn't have asked for more.

Ten out of ten. *****. The place is exactly as pictured - impeccably clean, bright and airy with all the facilities. Crisp white sheets, lots of pillows and a comfy bed complete the relaxing feel. I came here to rest and left refreshed and calm. Cathy was a perfect host. Her communications were excellent, prompt and relevant. I can't wait to return! Thankyou Cathy'

Beautiful little private room with ensuite under the main house. Cathy has set the  room up beautifully, in keeping with it's nearby beach setting. Good comfortable bed, nice bathroom, very clean and off street parking was offered right outside our door. In addition the room is decked out with lots of extras, a little breakfast bar, tea and coffee (espresso machine), a bar fridge with milk and breakfast items plus coathangers, powerboard for charging devices, travel books. It was more than we needed for a short one night stay to go to a nearby wedding but such a lovely touch. Cathy even left an outside light on and a note on our door for how to turn it off when we got home in a Uber after dark.

Perfect spot to stay to explore Avalon, Pittwater, Whale Beach, Palm Beach, the Barrenjoey lighthouse. Would recommend for couples.

Cathy made us very welcome and her cosy room is just that!
 Clean, comfortable, plenty of helpful amenities( tea/coffee, milk, lots of towels, very warm comfortable bed, reading material)
We would recommend anyone to stay in this quiet spot, a short walk to Pittwater.

The perfect experience for our first Airbnb stay!  Friendly and effortless welcome with all of the info we would need to immediately feel right-at-home.  Secure parking right outside our door and beautifully private.  The room and facilities were immaculate and very well appointed, conducive to a very relaxed two weeks which my wife and I thoroughly enjoyed.  Our host was always available for queries and a chat but never obtrusive.

Avalon should be on your to-do list when visiting Sydney with world-class beaches on one hand, beautiful Pittwater on the other and  boutique shopping and all the facilities one could require in between.  Conveniently situated within easy reach of all of these, Cathy's cosy room is an ideal retreat, cool and quiet on a hot afternoon with the sound of birds and the breeze in the tall gum-trees to enjoy as you unwind.

We look forward to another visit in the not-too-distant future, knowing that our stay would be just as pleasant and fulfilling as the time we have already enjoyed there!

This was my first Airbnb and it was everything and more that we hoped for. The room was as shown and described. Cathy was very helpful including volunteering to collect us from the Palm Beach Ferry if required. Cathy was also very flexible with check in and check out times which for us was a plus. The room was set back from the road in a garden with beautiful gum trees with off road parking available and a bonus was to be right opposite a bus stop. Fantastic.
I had a wonderful stay at Cathy's place. It was a great experience. Very accommodating and as described. Highly recommend!

Had a lovely stay at Cathy's place.
Close to beautiful paradise beach and restaurant in hilltop Rd ouzo was conveniently located with great Greek food.
Great place to stay and explore the Northern Beaches
We felt very welcome by Cathy. She was very easy going with the check in and out times. The crisp white sheets and a very comfortable mattress made for a sound sleep. Thank you Cathy.

We were only at Cathy's place for one night but it was really lovely - spotlessly clean, comfy with a great selection of tea/coffee. Cathy was kind enough to pick us up from the bus stop, and was very helpful throughout our stay.
Had a great and convenient stay at Chathy's. Super laid back and easy going. We would stay again! Thank you Cathy for your hospitality.
I enjoyed the privacy and it had everything I needed to enjoy my stay.

Cathy place is, private, clean and well equipped. Loved our stay, we appreciated the fan in the room to keep us as some days as it was very hot. Cathy is super nice and helpful! Public transport is near accomodation and Cathy is also happy to drop you to close locations. Would be happy to come back and stay. Overall a pleasant and affordable stay :)

Cathy's place is gorgeous! It was just what we were after - perfect for a  private getaway to the Northern Beaches of Sydney. Her place is located in a quiet and peaceful street between The River/Paradise Beach, and Avalon surf beach - we were able to walk to both.
A comfy bed, beautiful bathroom and great additions like beachtowels and brekky provisions made for a relaxing one night stay for us. 
Cathy was very kind in offering us tips on the local area and is quick to communicate with.
Will definitely stay here the next time we look into a trip to the Beaches.
Thanks Cathy!
Our stay at Cathy's was wonderful. Cathy was so accommodating and really friendly. A great place to stay and a lovely neighbourhood.

Cathy's airbnb is just perfect for a couple or solo traveler looking for privacy in a peaceful setting. With your own entrance, ensuite bathroom and the extra touches of soda water in the fridge, nespesso coffee machine, fruit yogurt and muesli for breakie and beach towels for use, it was a treat. The room was spotless, with modern bathroom and decorated beautifully. Cathy was even helpful enough to arrange a fan in the room for us prior to arrival as we had been having some very hot weather of late. Just fantastic!

Cathy's bnb was absolutely perfect. Private, beautifully styled, quality linens and appliances and the bathroom was brand new! So many beautiful touches, chilled water and a lovely breakfast which all made me feel very at home. Cathy was a really lovely lady, so easy to converse with. Will def. stay again if I am in the area.

We enjoyed our stay in Avalon with Cathy very much. Cathy coordinated with us when we needed to adjust our layover, and it was much appreciated. She is very responsive and accommodating. Her son was pleasant to talk to as well and was helpful with directions. The room looked great in the picture and was better in person. Very bright, white, clean, and prepared. All the amenities came in handy, as well: fridge, micro, and the light breakfast. Her place is near everything in the Avalon area, and the bus stop directly across from her place runs every hour and gets you anywhere you need to go, if you're like us and didn't hire a car. Avalon beach itself is a great holiday spot, with lots of shops in the village accross the way from the beach. and the nearby Palm and Whale beach make for a good getaway.
Cathy has done well to transform a basement area into a bedroom and lovely ensuite, but I think it needs a little more work as it was a bit musty when we were there, in very wet Sydney weather.
My daughter stayed at Cathy's place for a birthday week-end.  She enjoyed it immensely, and Cathy was a perfect host.
Comfortable and good location.  Communication was excellent.

We had a wonderful, relaxing stay at Cathys, she was an excellent host. Making sure we had everything we needed. We had three days in Avalon and enjoyed exploring the area. Our favourite spot being paradise beach for sun down. Which was very close to the house. The room was very well equipped with everything you need for a little break for two.
Well equipped and excellent location. The host was a pleasure to deal with from the outset.

Cathy was a very attentive host, taking care of everything to make us feel at home and our stay more comfortable. Unfortunately we didn't get to meet Cathy but communication was excellent before and throughout our stay. I would highly recommend staying here if you're ever in the area.
If you are looking for a fantastic place to stay in the Northern Beaches area Cathy s place is definitely a must.

Cathy's place was just what we needed!  The location was perfect for us as we could walk to town, and walk to our relative's home.  All the basics were there for a comfy safe place to rest our heads and have a wonderful and comfortable night's sleep.  Cathy was a great host, and offered great suggestions for our time in the area, and even drove us locally for our errands on our departure morning which was unexpected and very helpful to us!
We would stay again if the opportunity presents itself.
Cathy is a terrific host and the accommodation had everything we needed. The location is beautiful and only a short walk down to the water or into town.

It was a good short stay in Cathy's room, unfortunately we arrived too late (11PM) and departures too early (7:30AM) so the host and guests missed out each other, but Cathy left the door opened for us.

For future reference, I would recommend the guests who drive to the host, to park their cars at Cathy's front yard, as I parked my car on the street just outside Cathy's house and got someone intentionally scratched my car doors.

It's the little things, like breakfast muesli, fresh strawberries, great coffee as well as well presented, quite neighbourhood.  We really loved our stay and can highly recommend to others staying on the northern beaches of Sydney.
We had a perfect stay! Nice, comfortable room, very clean!
Cathy's place is very clean and comfortable and is ideally suited to short stays. It is located within walking difference to shops and restaurants etc. We were very happy with our stay.

The room was very nice and clean. We only stayed for one night, but felt welcome and comfortable immediately. Cathy is a very friendly person who gives you the privacy you need, but is also there when you have a question.
Lovely spot. Great host.

Cathy’s place is amazing! I ended up extending my stay an extra night (4 in total). An easy 20 min walk to Avalon Centre where you’ll find a few shops, restaurants, cafes and the beach. Highly reccommended!

Cathy,s place was very comfortable and clean . Cathy made sure that we were settled in and gave us plenty of information to make our stay (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a great location and make sure you wander down to Paradise Beach for sunset.Stunning. Cathy was a lovely ,friendly lady and made us feel at home.Thanks Cathy xx

We really enjoyed our stay in Cathy’s room! It offers privacy, is spacious and has a very comfy bed. There is tea and coffee provided, as well as a toaster and some fruits, yoghurt, milk, and muesli for breakfast. 

Cathy was a great host, and even picked us up from the nearest bus stop on our arrival! There are plenty of beaches, shops and restaurants around. Great place!

Cathy was a lovely host and her attention to small details made the stay most enjoyable. An affordable price and not a single thing that I could think off that Cathy didn’t provide us with. Would stay there again without a doubt and would definitely recommend it to others.
Cute and comfy stay! Cathy was great & ensured we had everything we needed for our night away.
Lovely neighbourhood, comfy bed, loved the fresh strawberries and yoghurt. Thanks Cathy.
Very nice room..clean and furnished! In a good queiet position!..and Cathy is a very good person! Recommended!!
A wonderful place and wonderful host. Perfect for us as we were going to a wedding in Palm Beach. Thanks Cathy for having us.

Cathy’s place couldn’t be more perfect! The bed and linens were incredibly comfortable, the room was beautiful, and a fan was cooling off the room on arrival. It also included a beach bag and towels, little kitchen set up, even yogurt and strawberries in the fridge. Along with Cathy’s wonderful recommendations for food in the area our stay couldn’t have been better. I would highly recommend staying here!

Great location, walking distance to Paradise Beach (awesome sunset), close to public transport.  Cathy is friendly and a great host. Shops and beaches are a short drive away.  The area is tranquil and I loved waking up to the sound of laughing kookaburras.

This place is quite small as described but was exactly what we needed. The room is seperated from the rest of the house so is private and you have your own bathroom. Everything was clean and decorated nicely. Shower was very good and the place was nice and cool even when 40 degrees outside. Cathy was lovely and let us check in and out at our requested times.
Location is great if you have a car with off road parking. If you have no car, the town and main beach are about 30 minutes walk and there is a quieter beach 5 minute walk away.

This place was just what we needed!
Cathy is a lovely host. Quick replies and always checks in to see how you are travelling. Cathy gives great local tips and offers a hand if in need. Quite a comfortable place to stay :)
Lovely spot and Cathy was very accommodating and responsive. Nice and clean room with personal touches which made the stay more enjoyable.
Highly recommended if you are looking for a place to explore the Northern Beaches. Great location and we had a lovely comfortable stay. Cathy was a great host!

We had a pleasant stay at Cathy’s place. The room is quite narrow but clean and well located at convenient distance from the beach and a couple of cafes. Cathy gave us a very warm welcome at our arrival which was great.

Cathy thought of everything.  It is a beautiful, clean room in a lovely setting.  Cathy was there if we needed anything and still respected our privacy.  
The room was very comfortable and spotlessly clean.  Excellent value for money. 
I would highly recommend.

Conveniently located between Clareville and Avalon village & beach, Cathy's space is as described compact and comfortable, ideal for a short stay being spotlessly clean, stylishly furnished and well appointed. We thoroughly enjoyed our brief stay with Cathy who goes out her way to ensure guests are comfortable and well informed.

We had one amazing stay at Cathy's. The host is incredibly mindful, making sure everything is available for the guests. Location was super practical, the room was clean and Cathy was lovely! She was very helpful giving us tips on where to go, and made us feel very welcome.
Nice space and easy enough to get to. The coffee machine and selection of teas was a lovely touch.

Home from home, beautifully presented room in a peaceful location. Cathy was a efficient hostess, warm and welcoming. We only got to spend one night here when attending a wedding at Whale beach; just wish we had longer! Thank you for having us!

Cathy's place was a great choice. It is well located, not far from public transport, sparkling clean and quite cozy.
She gave us quite a few tips on how to get around as well as to what to do and see.
The breakfast provided is good an simple.
Even though it is rightly described as  pint sized we felt comfortable and didn't miss anything. 
Cathy was happy to help whenever we need it.

Great value for money. Highly recommended.
good

The room was fantastic, just what we needed for a short stay in the area. We'd love to stay again and explore the area in more detail. Room was just as described and if we needed anything we only had to ask.

Great little space to stay if you're in this neck of the woods! 10-15 min drive to palm beach, so was perfect for us as we were attending a wedding there. 

Quiet location & while small, it has everything you need! Cathy is very friendly & accommodating to our early check-in request.
Just what we needed for a one night stay. Cathy was lovely and everything was so clean. Thanks again
Great little getaway with my partner
Peaceful and set in a wonderful part of the world. Stylish, warm and ticked all the boxes.

It is a small room, and you have to watch you don't hit your head on the staircase.  However, it was beautifully set out with a very comfortable bed, lovely homey touches and beautiful aromas, sparkling clean.  It was very convenient for us and within walking distance of where we needed to go.  Cathy is a lovely host and all went smoothly, it was just what we wanted.
Had a fantastic stay, everything you need and more!! Cathy was lovely and easy to communicate with to organise my stay.
Absolutely loved this place, perfect for what we needed. Cozy little place and close to shops and beach.

Cathy is a great host, she was very nice and helpful, flexible and always got back to me quickly. 
The place is really nice with lots of little touches, is a great location to beach and shops. Also excellent parking is right out front!
Thanks Cathy

I booked the place for 2 nights and I really loved the place, all the basic items are all provided, there were even fruits and breakfast in the fridge, the place was very neat and clean, also having a very relaxing vibe. Cathy is a very nice host and offered to pick us up personally.

This little studio space is absolutely lovely! Had a great stay. Was delighted to find fresh raspberries in the fridge for a yummy cereal breakfast. Great off-street parking and in an amazing tranquil location just up the road from the cafes and shops at Avalon. Thanks to the exceptional host for such a wonderful stay!
Cozy little room, we enjoyed our stay. There is a nice cafe 'Forage Cafe' just 5 minutes walking that has amazing food and coffee
Had a lovely 2 night stay at Cathy’s flat, warm, clean with everything and more that we needed. Thanks
We were very impressed with the hospitality and homely feel of this lovely little studio.

This was a lovely, charming place to stay. I absolutely loved it. The place was very clean and comfortable and I immediately felt at home. The bed was very comfortable, and there was an electric blanket underneath the linens so the bed was nice and warm (I was here in the winter so this was REALLY nice to have). There was also a little space heater, so it was very comfortable. There was a lovely breakfast set-up with cereal, tea and coffee, and a water boiler. There were fresh flowers on the table and Cathy had written a nice welcoming note. Cathy also drove me to one of my events (I was here for a wedding) when Uber didn't work. It was a lovely stay and I will definitely stay here again if I return!
Perfect place to stay!

Cathy’s place is lovely. 
A nice private space with EVERYTHING you could need for a stay in the Northern Beaches.
Cathy is EXTREMELY hospitable and took extra steps to make our stay wonderful.

I’m not sure what I can add - all the reviews are accurate - Cathy has created a delightful little spot. She has thought of everything. It was a great spot to stay for the night before going to a wedding at Currawong Beach. Very comfortable with lots of comfy pillows. You can hear people walking around in the house above but you would be hard pressed to find a quieter spot this close to Palm Beach.
Such a wonderful host and cosy place. Really enjoyed my stay and would definitely come back again
Awesome host and beautiful place. Definitely recommend

The room was perfect! It was clean, spacious and homely, exactly what I was hoping for. The bed was really comfy as well and also private from the rest of the house. 

Cathy’s hospitality was genuine and I found her to be friendly and easy to talk to. I also liked the warmth of the space and I felt very welcome. Would definitely stay again :)

I loved staying at Cathy's place.  A perfectly sized beautiful space with a super comfortable bed and gorgeous to touch linen.  Lots of cute details in decor and Cathy provides everything you may need for a short stay.
thank you so much for the stay, it was absolutely lovely! you have a great response time and your tips on eats are spot on.
Cosy room, nice and cool on a hot summer night. Lovely to wake up to the sound of birds. enjoyed the muesli  and yoghurt for breakfast. Plenty of walks around the neighborhood to the water.
Great little place for an overnight stay simple and easy experience with Cathie

This was exactly as described, and Cathy's extra touches made it a really comfortable stay.

The place was spotlessly clean, the bed linen was really nice quality, there was even shampoo and conditioner (which I appreciated, having forgotten to pack mine).  I also really appreciated the extra touch of providing breakfast -- lovely muesli, greek yoghurt, fresh berries and milk, and Cathy got in touch ahead of time to see what kind of milk I preferred. Extremely thoughtful.

Having stayed in a few places around this area, it was terrific to have off-street parking.

All in all, it was perfect for my needs as a sole traveller in the area for business; I would happily stay here again anytime.
Wonderful place to stay, beautiful room & Cathy was so helpful. Perfect for a weekend away!

Cute little place, lovely hospitality, comfort bed and flexiable check in/ out. 
Breakfast included.

This is perfect for a weekend getaway. It has everything you need, and Cathy is a very friendly host who is excellent at communicating regarding the booking. I would highly recommend this property and would stay there again.

This is a newly refurbished room, tastefully decorated with en suite shower and toilet all in pristine condition. Some welcome additional touches like availability of muesli, tea and coffee. Location was great: just down the road from my daughter who I was visiting. A very satisfying stay.
Not bad, the breakfast is considerate. It’s near garden so there are lots of small insects and spiders, if you don’t mind, it’s a good option. And it’s near shops and restaurants as well
Great location, off-street parking, very clean and comfy. Cathy even loaned me a phone charger for the weekend when I forgot mine. Perfect place to enjoy the area from

Cathy's place was perfect for our stay in Avalon, just a short distance from all the restaurants and beaches we wanted to visit. The place was very clean and checking in/communicating with Cathy was made very easy. She even provided breakfast bits in the fridge for us which was a lovely touch. Highly recommend for a weekend stay!
Nice place, good environment. We appreciated the sympathy and flexibility of Cathy.
We had a lovely overnight stay. Very comfortable and well equipped room which included terrific breakfast. Clareville shopping centre only a short walk away for a great cup of coffee

Wonderful place! Very clean and comfortable. Easy communication and check in. The amenities were very thoughtful. Grateful for a hairdryer! And lovely breakfast :) 

Cathy's place is about 15 mins walk to Avalon town centre and beach, which is beautiful!

We would highly recommend staying here. Thank you!

Cathy’s place is a delightful gem. I felt I was staying in a cosy Greek studio...close to the water, beautiful trees and a leafy terrace to enjoy an afternoon drink. 
Cathy’s local recommendations were spot on: sunset at nearby Paradise Beach; walk to Clareville Beach; French restaurant in Avalon and local shops were all excellent. 
My three days were just what I wanted, sun, swimming, long walks in beautiful bush and a charming village...I felt re-energised. Cathy is the perfect host: welcoming but not intrusive. The breakfast coffee, yoghurt, berries and muesli were a wonderful bonus. Many thanks, Cathy.

We had a lovely stay at cathy's place to get away from sydney. The place was cute and cozy. Cathy provided all the amenities we required for a comfortable  stay. She was always prompt and helpful in her communications.

Very cute little room. Perfect for a nights stay or weekend away. Had all the basics you need to keep your things and rest between enjoying Palm Beach/Avalon! Cathy was very communicative and helpful, but also gave us privacy which meant it felt like we were alone on a couples holiday.

Cathy is a wonderful host, the room was lovely with a fabulously comfortable bed and, unexpectedly, an espresso maker!
Cathy was brilliant on being touch and available if needed, everything was very clear and straightforward on arrival.
Would recommend highly and stay here again.
Very handy for the Forage, a great coffee shop.
Thanks Cathy.

What a gem! just a few minutes from the beach and a short walk to the shops. Cathy pulls out all the stops in terms of hospitality, providing us with breakfast and even a coffee pod machine. There were even beach towels and a cute little bag to take with us to the beach. She even provided the much-needed and often impossible to pack pair of scissors, which came in handy for 2 people who had flown in. 
The room has everything you could need, a comfy bed and pillows, a fan, a TV and a fridge. The bathroom also has a large shower. 
All in all, a great place!

name: Beautiful big room in modern house
summary: 1 large, sunny room in a lovely, light filled, modern & fully renovated house in the cultural hub of Sydney's inner west. Great cafes, bars & markets, a nice quiet street but with shops, restaurants and the train station all within a 3 minute walk.
space: Beautiful fully renovated home with all the mod cons, fully stocked kitchen, laundry and polished floorboards throughout. There's not a great deal of storage space but the bedroom is huge and the bed super comfortable.
description: 1 large, sunny room in a lovely, light filled, modern & fully renovated house in the cultural hub of Sydney's inner west. Great cafes, bars & markets, a nice quiet street but with shops, restaurants and the train station all within a 3 minute walk. Beautiful fully renovated home with all the mod cons, fully stocked kitchen, laundry and polished floorboards throughout. There's not a great deal of storage space but the bedroom is huge and the bed super comfortable. Linen and towels are provided, guests are welcome to use the washing machine (detergent is supplied) and all kitchen equipment as well as basic cooking essentials such as oils, herbs and spices. I will be overseas and you will be sharing with 2 very lovely and respectful men in their late twenties. Andy and Rob are often at work (including nights) and are equally happy keeping to themselves as they are having a chat and answering any questions you might have. Fantastic artsy, multicultural, friendly and safe neighbourhood with
neighborhood_overview: Fantastic artsy, multicultural, friendly and safe neighbourhood with Sydney's best fresh food markets and best pub/live music venue (in my opinion!) just around the corner (but not within earshot!). Marrickville oozes culture and character, I rarely leave it on the weekends and I wouldn't live anywhere else.
transit: 2 minute walk to the train station and 15 minute train to Central. Sydenham station is also a short walk away and the train will take you directly from there to Bondi Junction. Buses are also a 2 minute walk away and go to Newtown or to the beach at Coogee. Free parking.
access: Linen and towels are provided, guests are welcome to use the washing machine (detergent is supplied) and all kitchen equipment as well as basic cooking essentials such as oils, herbs and spices.
interaction: I will be overseas and you will be sharing with 2 very lovely and respectful men in their late twenties. Andy and Rob are often at work (including nights) and are equally happy keeping to themselves as they are having a chat and answering any questions you might have.

host.host_about: Hey, I'm Briohny, I'm a 32 year old lawyer who loves travel, yoga, music, dogs, people, olives and the outdoors. I've backpacked all around the world and lived in Canada, the UK, Spain and Turkey. I also like to have a friendly and comfortable place to call home with a nice, warm atmosphere. One time I danced on stage with Prince. Then I fell off the stage.

reviews.comments: This was a great house in a very cool area. It is in a super convenient location - trains and buses, grocery stores, cafes and restaurants all within 2 minutes walk from the house. The house is new and tidy, and full of plants and colour - it was a really nice atmosphere. The host was very helpful and made sure I had everything I needed, she even left me a little gift! The housemates were also really nice, they were friendly but did their own thing mainly, and that was fine with me. Overall an excellent airbnb experience. I would totally recommend it.

Briohny little house was a perfect start for our Australian trip. The house was clean and comfortable (specially the balcony in the back). Her housemates were also quite nice and friendly. The location is great too, strongly recommend!

name: King Loft Bed in Bushwick Loft
summary: East Williamsburg/Bushwick Loft Bed Private Room available in 3BD apartment. 2 minute access to M train, 10 mins to L and G
space: Three Bedroom Loft Apartment - right off the Flushing M, short walk to G and J!! The apartment is a 4th floor walk up with a super sunny and spacious living space with an open long kitchen (fully equipped), a dining table, ample couch room, a bathroom with claw-foot bath and a large storage area. The bedroom has two large windows, high ceilings and a lofted bed. There is plenty of room to stand under the loft. The room has clothes rack and an air conditioning unit. BONUS - we have a washer and dryer!
description: East Williamsburg/Bushwick Loft Bed Private Room available in 3BD apartment. 2 minute access to M train, 10 mins to L and G Three Bedroom Loft Apartment - right off the Flushing M, short walk to G and J!! The apartment is a 4th floor walk up with a super sunny and spacious living space with an open long kitchen (fully equipped), a dining table, ample couch room, a bathroom with claw-foot bath and a large storage area. The bedroom has two large windows, high ceilings and a lofted bed. There is plenty of room to stand under the loft. The room has clothes rack and an air conditioning unit. BONUS - we have a washer and dryer! The entire apartment Two other room mates are absolutely lovely, mellow and relaxed. Bushwick, brooklyn. Great area with bars/cafes a short walk away Close to the M, L and G Please water my plants!
neighborhood_overview: Bushwick, brooklyn. Great area with bars/cafes a short walk away
notes: Please water my plants!
transit: Close to the M, L and G
access: The entire apartment
interaction: Two other room mates are absolutely lovely, mellow and relaxed.
house_rules: Be respectful of other roommates! Treat others as you wish to be treated. Be quiet and please don't bring the party home

name: Maui Oceanfront Condo/Kaanapali/Kahana 2 Bedroom
summary: Maui is outdoor living at its finest! There is no escaping the view.  This condo does not border a noisy parking lot nor street - The view from this condo makes the ocean look like it's your swimming pool, its spectacular!  You can see the ocean while sitting on our tropical couch or cooking dinner in kitchen! - If you love the ocean, this is it! We have a first class fully remodeled condo with a top notch kitchen, full fridge, double ovens, microwave and granite counter tops.
space: Maui is outdoor living at its finest! Enjoy having breakfast lunch and dinner on your lanai staring at the ocean! Wake each morning to birds singing, swaying palm trees and the teal blue waters of the ocean.. there is no escaping the absolute OUTSTANDING view from this condo!  Condo's view is of the ocean, pool and the Island of Molokai, whether you're sitting on the lanai, on our tropical couch, or cooking dinner in our fully equipped gourmet kitchen, complete with double oven and full size fridge! ..Eat in, Dine out the choice is yours. Condo is minutes away from many of Maui’s famous activities, shopping areas, beaches, sights, restaurants and grocery stores. Enjoy Maui as you have always imagined...relax and set your own pace. We are conveniently located close to many restaurants, grocery stores, farmers’ markets, hiking trails, golfing and shopping areas. The hustle bustle areas of Whalers Village in Kaanapali and Front street in Lahaina are just minutes away, you will then rush h

This condo does not border a noisy parking lot nor street - The view from this condo makes the ocean look like it's your swimming pool, its spectacular!  You can see the ocean while sitting on our tropical couch or cooking dinner in kitchen! - If you love the ocean, this is it! We have a first class fully remodeled condo with a top notch kitchen, full fridge, double ovens, microwave and granite counter tops. Maui is outdoor living at its finest! Wake each morning to birds singing, swaying palm trees and the teal blue waters of the ocean.. there is no escaping the absolute OUTSTANDING view from this condo!  Condo's view is of the ocean, pool and the Island of Molokai, whether you're sitting on the lanai, on our tropical couch, or cooking dinner in our fully equipped gourmet kitchen, complete with double oven and full size fridge! ..Eat in, Din
neighborhood_overview: Condo is situated in a small 52 unit complex ocean front. Mingled among oceanfront condo's and multi million dollar homes, our complex has 3 buildings, and two levels
notes: Condo Nightly RATE INCLUDES State of HI Hotel TAXES of 14.42% many condo's don't quote taxes until you check in.  Relax at our condo or see the sites - lots of activities here on Maui, we are close to shopping, grocery stores, restaurants, hiking trails and top notch golf courses.
transit: A rental car here on Maui is recommended
access: Fresh water Heated Pool. View sea turtles all year around, or go snorkeling with the turtles, view whales in the winter months.  Free parking, in room safe, and free wifi.  2 acres of beautiful lawns, community pool and sea turtles right out front of this condo's grounds
interaction: This is an independent condo - guests can choose to mingle with the other guests at the pool, BBQ's or at sunset
house_rules: Quiet hours exist from 10pm to 8am - All Maui Condo's, hotels and public areas are smoke free

host.host_about:
Aloha, we live on this beautiful island of Maui.  We have owned our condo for 10 years.  Our prior residence was in Anchorage Alaska for 35 years.  We love the outdoor living here on this beautiful island of Maui, like the weatherman 
says "Maui has the best weather on the Planet"

reviews.comments: Deb went out of her way to make my birthday visit amazing! She is very helpful and quick with her responses. The house is exactly as pictured/described and get clean and pleasant. It is fully stocked and you are not in need of anything. I would recommend this place to anyone and would love to have the opportunity to stay again.

This is a great place to stay with a few friends. The view is spectacular. I took my parents and best friend and this place accommodated our needs perfectly. The place was stocked with everything we needed to cook as well as a nice balcony area facing the ocean to eat at. The beach area felt private and was great for laying out. We snorkeled out front and we saw 7 giant sea turtles!

Deb's place is exactly as portrayed in the pictures and descriptions. It has a lovely, unobstructed view of the pool and the ocean. It is wonderful to relax on the lanai and hear the waves break on the rocks. The beach is small and not for everyone as the lava rocks need to be negotiated, a bit tricky if surf is high. However, we found a wonderful beach minutes away with a grassy park, large welcoming sandy beach and wonderful snorkeling. I spent a half hour swimming along with a turtle one day. There are also turtle to be found right in front of the condo. Deb alerted us to local events, steered us to other beaches, stores and local events. The layout of the condo is perfect for two friends, the kitchen has everything. After dinner, it was lovely to go out to the lanai and enjoy the stars and the moonlit sea. Mahalo, Deb, for 9 days of delight. I will be back. Soon, I hope.
The host canceled this reservation 136 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We absolutely loved staying at Deb's!
Well equipped kitchen. Walking distance to local coffee shop and groceries. Comfortable beds. Turtles, turtles, and did I mention turtles?!
Quiet after 10pm (We loved this)
Residents were friendly. Our hostess was quickly responsive and went above and beyond in making sure we had everything we needed and she even informed us of pods of whales that would be coming by the condo.
Part of me doesn't want more people to know how great this listing is because it will be harder for me to get in, but it would a shame if you missed this condo. It comes with so much aloha!

What a beautiful place to stay, with so many special touches.  The kitchen had everything we could dream of in the way of cooking told and appliances.  The condo was spotless and beautifully furnished, and Deb was a pleasure to work with!  I would highly recommend this condo, and will definitely stay here in the future!  Thanks Deb!

The listing was very accurate and met all of our expectations. Deb answered questions promptly and offered many suggestions to make our stay even better. It was a treat to overlook the ocean and island mountains beyond and see the sea turtles at high and low tide. 
Lots  of information was prepared and left for us in a notebook which made it easy to understand how the condo complex worked. Overall it was just a wonderful several days to spend in West Maui
Our stay was wonderful! The place was lovely and the location gave us access to everything we wanted to do.

From the moment we booked Deb was fantastic. She was in good communication up to and during our stay. I had an accident the day before we arrived and I broke my wrist. Deb was genuinely concerned and offered lots of things to do in the area with this in mind.
The host canceled this reservation 185 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing ocean view.  All the amenities you would need for a family or a romantic getaway.  Deb was amazing and treated us so well.  I will be returning.
Deb's condo on Maui was awesome.  The view from the lanai rivals anything we saw during our stay.  It's a small complex right on the ocean so no big crowds.  Exactly what I was hoping for!

Great location. 8 mins to Kapula Bay and Kaanapali  (black rock). The condo is in a great condition and has everything you may need to have a comfortable stay. We loved having dinner on the patio and whale watching. The complex really observes quite time and gives that peaceful relaxing environment. Deb is an amazing host.

Deb was great! I had requested something special for our arrival to help us celebrate my sisters 21st birthday and she went over and above. We arrived to cake a balloon and some goodies and a fresh lei. Condo was fresh and clean and the views were breathtaking from the balcony. Thanks for a great stay x

Deb's place is great! The view is breathtaking and she is a SUPER welcoming host. Her response in communication is lightning fast.  The location was perfect too. We rented a car so it was easy to get around. The condo manager is great too! thanks Jeff.

Our stay was just as we imagined. Communication from Deb was great and made our holiday easy and fun. Driving is the best way to see Maui and the Condo is at a good location with beautiful views of the sea and sunset and we even saw turtles! on the private secluded beach. The facilities are clean and close to amenities - just a couple of minutes drive from a shopping area and restaurants. The condo is good sized and was awesome for my family of 4. Deb was a very welcoming host and I really appreciate her constant communication and tips. I would recommend staying here to anyone especially families...and rent a car- the best way to see Maui at your own pace. Thanks Deb :)
This home was the perfect location for my family. Beautiful views, clean and close to some of the most beautiful beaches and snorkeling. Deb is a great host.

Deb had been assisting our trip planning right after our confirmation of staying in her condo.  She has been a great landlord to actively provide information, suggestion, and help along the way.  Needless to mention that when she found out that we left our keys in the condo, she notified immediately that allows us to find solution to get it.  She helped to mail the keys to us all the way back to China.  We really appreciate Deb's great support to our trip in Hawaii.  We will definitely go back if we have a second visit to Maui next time!

Great condo and location. Perfect size for 4 adults. No beach access from the condo but amazing views from the lanai! Fully stocked to cook in every night, walking distance to the farmers market grocery store.

Deb and Tony are terrific hosts.  The provide great recommendations are incredibly responsive.  The unit is very much like the photos, except the view may even be better.  Our daughters loved the boogie boards, I liked sitting on the porch and watching the whales, and the turtles on the little beach in front of the unit were fun to see.

Deb’s condo was perfect for what we were looking for! The view can’t be beat. The condo had beach towels, beach chairs and the condo complex had beach toys you could use. The direct beach access is small and not ideal for swimming but it was great turtle watching. The condo complex is family friendly however observes quiet hours so if you have rowdy kids might not be the best fit. Deb customer service was impeccable. It was rather unusually humid during our stay and she offered to bring us an extra fan.

Perfect location, super comfy beds, beautiful decor, even a removable shower head perfect for rinsing off little ones after their pool time. Deb’s suggestions and communication were top notch. I’d come back here in a heartbeat!

The condo is clean and well appointed. You feel welcomed the moment you walk through the door. The beds are comfortable and you are supplied with all the towels you will need for your stay, including wonderful beach towels. Large walkin shower in the master bathroom along with a jacuzzi tub in the upstairs bathroom. When you stay at Deb and Tony's wonderful vacation condo, you become part of a lovely community. The permanent owners are so welcoming and the guests seem to be hand picked. The environment is friendly and very social. The grounds are impeccable and the views spectacular. Sunsets from the lanai while watching the tiki torches being lit were a special treat. You will not be disappointed.

Deb is a great host and we had an amazing stay at her condo. It’s very well located, has some stunning views and great amenities as well. Deb was very quick in responding to my queries and provided with very useful information and tips before and during  the stay. I would highly recommend the place!

Deb is the best of the best.
She was always available via text and kept in constant communication prior and during our stay at her beautiful condo.

This is the best alternative over any resort hotel in the Kaanapali area.  The location of her condo is perfect for excursions to the West side of Maui.  All of her suggestions for beaches to food were perfect for our little family.

The kitchen is stocked with all the amenities you would need to make your stay perfect.  She was even thoughtful to leave us a few welcoming gifts (loved the chocolates Deb!).  The only sad part about staying at her condo was that the trip was over way too soon.

The sunset/sunrise views are breathtaking, the ocean waves was a relaxing background to help us unwind and experience Maui like it should be.

We can't wait to come back to Maui and if Deb's condo is available we are staying here again.

Deb is a great host and gave us a lot of tips on what to explore in West Maui.
There is shopping and beaches nearby, no need to drive a lot, you can really relax
The condo is perfect size for a family of 4,  very well equipped, everthing that we need was there. 
The location and the view from the lanai is great, the kids enjoyed the pool very much and to make it perfect we could enjoy beautiful sunsets and rainbows and even saw turtles at the beach next to the unit.
We really enjoyed staying in Debs place and we hope to stay here again when returning to Maui.
Thanks a lot !
Deb is delightful and made our trip, from check in to local tips seamless. A special spot on the water in a wonderful community. Hope to make it back with the family to Deb’s place soon

reviews.comments:
El apartamento es maravilloso, equipado con todo lo necesario para pasar una estadía estupenda. Vale destacar la cercanía no sólo a la playa, sino también a restaurantes, supermercados y zona de bares y boliches.
Excelente departamento, altamente recomendable.
Excelente apartamento, exatamente como estão nas fotos! Anfitrião responde prontamente. Ótima localização próximo à Padaria, Drogarias e bares. Adorei a estadia!

A estadia foi ótima, a localização do apartamento é ideal e corresponde perfeitamente ao anúncio feito pelo Rafael. 
Não nos conhecemos pessoalmente,  mas isso não foi um impedimento. 
Como anfitrião e usuário do Airbnb eu recomendo.

O apartamento estava em perfeita ordem e qualquer coisa fora do comum, rapidamente era resolvido. O anfitrião é extremamente educado e atencioso e o apartamento condiz com tudo o que está na descrição. Fiquei super à vontade e adorei o ambiente. Se pudesse dar nota, de 0 a 10, daria 11! Está de parabéns em todos os quesitos!

O apartamento é excelente, limpo, organizado e aconchegante, exatamente como mostram as fotos. Além de estar no melhor lugar da Barra e próximo a supermercado, farmácia, etc.
A estadia foi perfeita!

Todo excelente y aún mejor de lo descripto. El departamento a nuevo. Impecable. Muy bien equipado con todos los utensilios y electrodomésticos. Muy tranquilo el ambiente y la convivencia con otros vecinos. Seguridad las 24 horas. Si bien no conocimos a Rafael se mostró atento y a disposición siempre a través de nuestros contactos en WA. Destacó la ubicación del edificio frente al mar en la zona de bares, restaurantes, supermercados, farmacias, parada de taxi y buses. Disfrutamos de la pileta, del gimnasio y los niños de la sala de juegos con Ping pong y metegol. Recomendado especialmente para familias
La casa es hermosa!!!, luminosa y muy bien ubicada. La gente de seguridad es muy amable y siempre predispuesta.

El departamento era tal cual las fotos: muy comodo y muy bien equipado. En la cocina no faltaba nada. El edificio es muy tranquilo y lindo, los encargados del edificio son muy amables. La pileta es muy grande y siempre tiene vigilancia. Esta literalmente en frente de la playa, solamente hay que cruzar la avenida. Las playas y la zona son hermosas!!! Playas muy tranquilas durante la semana y un poco mas concurrida los fines de semana. La zona es tranquila, no hay asaltos ni mucho movimiento. Hay bares y restaurantes a unas pocas cuadras! Super recomendable. Con Rafael no hablamos mucho porque no lo necesitamos, realmente cumplio en todo lo acordado!
Excelente ubicación. Juegos para niños, jacuzzi, pileta. Departamento muy cómodo.

Apartamento muy bien equipado, camas muy cómodas, seguro, muy bien ubicado. Todo según lo acordado. La playa espectacular!! La pileta es amplia y el gimnasio muy equipado. Cabe destacar la limpieza del edificio y el silencio. Cercano a numerosos bares y restaurantes así como  supermercados. La estación del metro se encuentra a menos de 10 cuadras. Muy recomendable!!!

Local maravilhoso, ótimo condomínio, completo com piscina, academia, brinquedos infantis, salão de jogos. Próximo aos melhores bares da região, drogarias e supermercados. O apartamento tmb é excelente e bem mobiliado. Infelizmente nossa estadia foi muito atrapalhado por conta do barulho dos ares condicionados. Foi impossível dormir. Apesar da tentativa do anfitrião o problema não foi resolvido. Achei que pelo alto preço e por conta da localização mereceria ar condicionado split ou outro menos barulhento.
Muy buena la verdad

10 puntos el departamento, muy bien ubicado, edificio con todos los lujos, piscina, gimnasio, hidromasaje, sala de juegos, salvavidas de seguridad en la piscina. Ideal para familia o 5 personas. El que lo alquile no se arrepiente y se lleva una gran sorpresa. La cocina muy bien equipada, lavarropas, etc. Excelente
Todo bárbaro igual que sale en la foto!!!Hermoso el lugar el barrio!!Rafael re amable!!Volveria
Apartamento confortable con todos los servicios, tal cual se ve en las fotos. Cómodo, frente al mar, tiene todo lo necesario para tener una estadía espectacular en Barra.

A estadia foi ótima. O apartamento é bem pé na areia, bem em frente à praia. O apto é exatamente como nas fotos, os quartos são confortáveis, todos com ar condicionado, sala confortável, Sofa aconchegante. Bom sinal de Wi-Fi. Valeu super a pena!
Un departamento muy cómodo,bien equipado y seguro muy recomendable ...
O apartamento é muito aconchegante,  bem limpo e organizado. Localização excelente.  Anfitrião prestativo assim como os funcionários do condomínio. Gostei bastante.

Rafael é um ótimo anfitrião. Sempre esteve disposto a tirar nossas dúvidas quando precisamos. Nos forneceu dicas a respeito do que fazer na região onde ap está localizado. O apartamento é uma graça, espaçoso e composto por tudo que é preciso numa hospedagem. O checkin e checkout foram super tranquilos, pessoal da portaria sempre muito atencioso. O apartamento fica bem próximo a avenida Olegário Maciel onde tem vários restaurantes e barzinhos. Voltaria a me hospedar em outra oportunidade.

Apartamento excelente! Super confortável, bem decorado, muito bem cuidado, organizado e bem equipado (TVs, roupas de cama e banho, utensílios de cozinha, etc). Realmente nos sentimos em casa! Ótima localização, em frente à praia, próximo a comércio, restaurantes e bares, e a aproximadamente 1km da estação do Metrô, o que possibilita um deslocamento fácil para outros pontos da cidade. Recomendo muito!
Great place, great location near restaurants and beach . We enjoyed our stay there very much!
Todo muito bom, nota 10

O apartamento fica muito bem localizado, o espaço é bom e condiz com as fotos e anúncio do site. Estava bem limpo e arrumado! O Rafael é extremamente atencioso e foi bastante prestativo com o que precisamos... Primeira vez que me hospedei na Barra da Tijuca e voltaria a ficar no local pelo apartamento. Muito bom!

Apartamento ótimo, em frente a praia, próximo de comércio! O Rafael excelente anfitrião, responde a todas as mensagens, muito flexível aos horários de check in e check out. Recomendo e voltarei com certeza!

Excelente y cómodo apartamento con pileta y gimnasio. Frente al mar puesto 2 en zona de exclusivos bares de kite surf. A una cuadra del centriño y cercano a dos supermercados. Seguridad las 24 hs. y excelente disposición del personal del complejo. Rafael muy atento respondió siempre y rápido a las inquietudes. Absolutamente recomendable!
Todo excelente

Muy buena ubicación..departamento completo... edificio con seguridad 24 hs. 
Sin dudas volvería!
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Buen departamento, con excelente ubicación.

Parabéns pelo belíssimo apartamento. Acomodação exemplar, comodidade em tudo, excelente localização, receptividade nota 10 da portaria, (Website hidden by Airbnb) exceção do wi-fi que não encontramos a rede, todos adoraram e saíram super (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza viraremos clientes e retornaremos em breve. 
Muito obrigado!
Lugar agradável e próximo de tudo. Certamente voltarei.
Great location and very clean apartment. Good value for a 3 bedroom.
O AP é exatamente como as fotos, tudo muito limpo e organizado. O Rafael foi atencioso, e com certeza indico a locação.
Foi um estadia curta, mas bem divertida na praia. Fomos a restaurantes diferentes e na Barra da Tijuca.
Ótimo apartamento, bem decorado, ótima localização. O Rafael é extremamente atencioso e flexível no check in/check out. Indico a hospedagem e com certeza nos hospedaremos novamente.
Local sensacional! Apartamento show, muito limpo e de bom gosto. acomodações super legais.
Excelente apto com localização privilegiada.
Ótima localização.
Perfect location!
Todo bien! La ubicacion excelente!

A 3 paradas de metro de la Sagrada Familia. neighborhood_overview: Barrio tranquilo muy bien comunicado con la red de transportes, servicios médicos, farmacias, supermercados.  Quiet neighborhood very well connected with the transport network, medical services, pharmacies, supermarkets.
transit: Muy bien comunicado con línea 2 de metro al centro y autobuses. Single room located 11 minutes from downtown by car and 20 minutes by public transportation, located 7 minutes from the beach by car and 15 minutes by public transport. A 3 stops from the Sagrada Familia metro.
access: Se puede usar tanto la cocina como el comedor. You can use the kitchen and the dining room.
house_rules: Normas de convivencia Si no quieres convertirte en el peor compañero de piso del mundo, sigue estos consejos: 1. Paga a tiempo lo acordado Si llega el día del pago del alquiler, no te retrases en hacer los pagos o transferencias. 2.  Mantén la limpieza y el orden en la cocina Cuando uses algo, intenta que se quede después tal cual estaba. Por ejemplo, si vas a coger una sartén y tú la has encontrado limpia, ¿se la tiene que encontrar sucia el siguiente? Si todos mantenéis esta regla en casa, la convivencia será mucho mejor. Ya que el apartamento dispone de lavavajillas, cuesta el mismo trabajo dejarlo en la pica que colocarlo en su interior y por supuesto colocarlo en su sitio después del lavado. 3. Haz lo mismo con el baño No hay nada peor en este mundo que llegar a un baño que es un completo desastre, lleno de pelos por todos lados, con miles de productos tirados por la ducha, la alfombrilla empapada en el suelo… Haz siempre el esfuerzo de dejar el baño como a ti te gustaría encontra

reviews.comments: I really enjoyed my stay at Javier place.  He is really a very good host and great human being .  I always had a homely feeling.  I recommend to visit Javier place and get  a memorable experience.

Javier was a fantastic host. He was very warm and welcoming, and tried his very best to recommend restaurants and places to visit in Barcelona, even with his limited English. The room was immaculate, just as described and shown in the picture. Everything else in the house was also very clean and tidy, including the washroom and the dining room. He even left me a bottle of water when I arrived. A great person and a great host. I highly recommend Javier for your stay in Barcelona!

Since I arrive at the flat, Javier made sure I felt welcomed and that I was happy with the bedroom, bed sheet,...etc.
He also gave me some clear instructions and provided maps so I knew quickly my whereabouts.... and a complementary fresh bottle of water.
Javier's might not be fluent in English, but with my basic Spanish and the help of (Hidden by Airbnb) translate we were able to communicate easily and it was a pleasure having some conversation around a drink or two.
The place is always tidy and clean and is actually not far from the centre (20 mns in metro).
If I come back to Barcelona for few days I know where I will stay and as you can tell I highly recommend staying at Javier's place!

Javier was an amazing host. Since I arrived, he made sure I was comfortable and felt like I was at home. The room was great, and so was the rest of the house. He gave me a lot information about the city and solved any kind of matter I had. I highly recommend Javier's if you're staying in Barcelona.

Хавьер очень гостеприимный и дружелюбный человек!
Спасибо ему за все!!!
Не было проблем  по времени с заселением и  выездом.
Все жилье соответствует описанию.
Квартира чистая и уютная.Находися в очень хорошем месте... недалеко море,большой торговый центр,и самое главное до центра Барселоны 30 минут пешком (рядом остановки метро,трамвая,автобуса)Мне очень понравилось!Настоятельно рекомендую!

I had a good experience staying at Javier's place. Hospitality is well taken care of and he's always checking upon your well-being. 

The room is not big but has everything you need. It's also not too far away from the center. 

For a relatively short stay, as was mine (1 week) I would definitely recommend Javier's place.
Nice and clean room.

The overall stay was very good. The flat is confortable and is full of natural light in the living room and the kitchen the whole day long. The exterior room is also light-filled, especially in the morning. The kitchen, although it doesn't look recently refunished, it has all the commodities and it's clean and confortable. There's a dish-washer, a senseo coffee machine, a washing machine which can be programmed to start even in an 8h time, oven, microwave, mixer, mincer and all you can need to make your cooking easy. It has heating and air-conditioning and the house gets warm very fast. The mattress is fine, you won't end up with a back-ache after sleeping there. You have a pretty spacious wardrobe and he will give you the towels and sheets for change without having to ask for them. The bathroom is very confortable, recently refurnished, clean and has a window. The temperature inside the bathroom is warm, the water goes out with good pressure and temperature and there's a hanger for the shower head.

The host is a generous, open and kind guy who will make you feel at home and will make you feel free to use all spaces at home, to turn on the heating (unlike other places in Barcelona) and use whatever you need as many times as you need. I happened to fell sick 3 days after arriving and he even went to do a small shopping for me to have sth to eat and he boiled some rice for me. He is flexible and willing to listen what whatever input you want to make. 

The house is located in a building with lift. The neighbourhood is safe, quiet, although humble and there's no neighbourbood feeling. Around the corner, literally, so 2-min away, there's a supermarket open until 21:00 and 2 streets away there's another Spanish supermarket which open until 1:30 in the night or so. 

Although you won't be right at the city center, the area is well communicated. The flat is 6 minutes away from metro line 2 which will bring you in 10 minutes to Sagrada Familia, in 15 min to the city center (Passeig de Gracia), and in 20 min to Diagonal - Provença, a key metro - train (Rodalias) hub. Very convenient.

You have to know that the bedroom window opens to the kitchen, to the sink, more precisely. You may need earplugs if you're not an early bird, but the host is very thoughtful and won't turn on the washing machine or the dish washer if you're in bed, unless you insist that it doesn't mind. Since you can spend all your time at home in the living room, this is a minor thing. Nevertheless, he has another exterior room you may choose, instead. 

Avoid this place if you are orange-colour averse! ;P 

Enjoy your stay! ;)

La estancia, por lo general, estuvo bien. Javier se esforzó en indicarme  qué zonas y eventos de la ciudad no debía perderme, y resolvió todas las dudas que le planteé. El piso y la zona cuenta con todos los servicios y transportes que pude necesitar. La habitación es suficientemente espaciosa, pero es ruidosa y no muy luminosa (cuenta con una ventana interior que da a la cocina).

I arrived to Barcelona three weeks ago.
Firstly I booked Javi's room for one week but as it is hard to find apartament for rent in Barcelona, I stayed for three weeks at Javi's place.

Javi's flat is situated in Sant Marti, near to Metro station Bac de Roda, it is quite central position and you can go everywhere by walk.

Javi is great host, very helpful. Everything in flat is there for your use, whatever you can think of. Wardrobe with two sets of bed sheets, umbrella, towel and much more.

I will recommend Javi to everyone who will travel to Barcelona (there is also second room to book).

I am sure we will keep in touch and one day, once I won't be in BCN anymore, I will book Javier's room.
Very happy with my stay here. Nice apartment and room with a comfortable bed, nice location close to a supermarket and metro. Javier did an excellent job as a host.

The appartement was clean ,a little bit far from the center but well connected with a lot of supermarkets and restaurants around !! Javi is really a cool guy ,my stay at barcelona was a real pleasure , so thank you for your welcome.

Javier's place is nice and welcoming. The room looks like on the picture, bathroom, living room and kitchen are nice and clean.
Javier is very friendly, he can help you with anything you ask: what to see, where to eat etc. 
I really enjoyed the area: apartments buildings, lots of trees, small cafes and supermarkets around. It's close to the metro, bus and tram stations. Only 20 mins to get to the beach!

The location is good and near to the station metro Bac de Roda. The house of Javier is really nice and all the services (kitchen, living room and bathroom) was clean and perfect. The only thing that I didn't like was about the window that is between the room and the kitchen so there was not so fresh air. I suggest to stay for a short period.
Overall the experience was very nice and Javier was really kind and nice with me! So thank you very much for all!

I spent ten days at Javi's flat and can recommend it to anybody looking for a clean, quiet place that is well located. The room is exactly as shown in the photos and in the flat you'll find everything you need to enjoy your stay. Javi is an excellent host and responds quickly to any questions that you may have. Muchísimas gracias Javi.

Javier and his friend Paco are very friendly and careful.
Nice room and appartment. I recommend fully.
Javier fue super amable en todo. La casa estaba super limpia y ordenada! recomiendo :)

E' stata una buona sistemazione per le mie esigenze. Avevo bisogno di un appoggio a buon prezzo a Barcellona per 2-3 settimane in una zona ben collegata. Il prezzo della casa è competitivo rispetto alle altre strutture in città e la posizione è ottima se non si ha bisogno di vivere in centro (metro a 2 minuti a piedi). La camera corrisponde esattamente alle foto, ma avevo sottovalutato il fatto di non avere una finestra che desse verso l'esterno. La camera è infatti completamente interna. Per far entrare un po' di luce è stata creata una finestra che affaccia sulla cucina, esattamente all'altezza del lavandino, per cui gli odori di cucinato inevitabilmente entrano e faticano e disperdersi per mancanza di altre prese d'aria. Questo sicuramente il limite principale della sistemazione. Javier è un host assolutamente raccomandabile. Tutta la casa è pulita e organizzata, e dispone di tutto il necessario, inlcusa una lavastoviglie, che se si ha intenzione di cucinare è una vera mano santa!
Nöjd med allt

Javier is a great host. I had no problems staying for about a month in his apartment. The apartment has everything you need. Very good equipped.
The location is perfect. A lot of supermarkets, cafes, bars around the house. 
Very close to metro L2 station, which will get you yo the city center. 
The window is not an external, but I had no problems with fresh air because the kitchen has a real external window right opposite the internal one.

Javiers place was an excellent stay  I enjoyed staying here because it was convenient to see many things  and it was easy to get to and from because of the bac de roda station.

One day I was also feeling sick and Javier helped me out for a second I thought that was very thoughtful. I would come to stay here again, it was a good stay.
Great and friendly host, very nice and quiet neighbourhood. No problem with check in and check out. Very clean apartments. Recommended.

Javier is very helpful and punctual. He can tell you about the best sights in Barcelona. His apartment is fully-equipped and clean, you can find everything you need. The room is small but cosy. The flat is close to the metro station Bac de Roda. I would definitely recommend you to stay here.

I had such a wonderful experience! The lovely apartment with views of the hills, the proximity to the metro and the beach, and the  kitchen and washer are enough for me to stay here again. But Javi's hospitality was beyond - from advice on getting into the city, sharing meals, and always making sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed, he was a fantastic host. I can't recommend him highly enough!
Best place in Barcelona I wouldn't doubt to be on Javier's place again!!

Pasé casi tres meses en el departamento de Javi & tras tanto tiempo nunca tuve algún problema: ni con él, ni con el lugar.

Javier es una persona muy amable, acomedida y amigable... Siempre está ahí sí lo necesitas y lo más importante es que también te da tu espacio. 5*

El cuarto es exactamente como lo describe, no hay ningún pero... 

Si vienen a Barcelona y necesitan un piso a buen precio se los recomiendo!

name: Cozy, quiet and comfortable 1BR
summary: Make yourself at home in this spacious one bedroom apartment in a historic brownstone. This place features exposed brick and is ideal for a couple. It has easy access to Manhattan and JFK.
space: This spacious  and clean apartment is on the top floor of our brownstone. The space is most ideal for a couple, though there is  an additional twin size couch option.
description: Make yourself at home in this spacious one bedroom apartment in a historic brownstone. This place features exposed brick and is ideal for a couple. It has easy access to Manhattan and JFK. This spacious  and clean apartment is on the top floor of our brownstone. The space is most ideal for a couple, though there is  an additional twin size couch option. Guests have access to Wi-fi, TV, fully equipped kitchen, clean linens and a sense of security knowing that we live in the house too, in our own private apartment.
