This apartment is entirely private, but we are available if you need us, just knock on our door. Bedford Stuyvesant is a classic Brooklyn residential neighborhood with beautiful architecture and tree-lined streets. It is a multi-cultural and diverse area appealing to people, who come for the community spirit, affordable rent, space, quiet and greenery. It is a friendly neighborhood with cafes and restaurants and easy access to subway or bus. The A/C train is close and convenie
neighborhood_overview: Bedford Stuyvesant is a classic Brooklyn residential neighborhood with beautiful architecture and tree-lined streets. It is a multi-cultural and diverse area appealing to people, who come for the community spirit, affordable rent, space, quiet and greenery. It is a friendly neighborhood with cafes and restaurants and easy access to subway or bus.
transit: The A/C train is close and convenient. It is a 20 minute ride to lower Manhattan, a 35 minute ride to Mid-town or JFK.
access: Guests have access to Wi-fi, TV, fully equipped kitchen, clean linens and a sense of security knowing that we live in the house too, in our own private apartment.
interaction: This apartment is entirely private, but we are available if you need us, just knock on our door.
house_rules: No smoking in the apartment, but is ok on the stoop.  Be respectful of our neighbors.  No parties or events. We appreciate shoes-off!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
We are a very welcoming family. We take good care of our guests and the property. We own the building with this apartment and make it available for travelers and guests. We moved here in 2004.
We also rent an apartment in Prague where Dana grew up. We keep this apartment for our family visits and make it available for others.

reviews.comments:
The host and her husband were very welcoming and provided me with some basic food items along with toiletries.

The location was great with easy to access Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn.

Small recommendations made were taken on board. Great experience for 1st Airbnb stay.

This apartment was fancy and comfortable. Internet was fast, all kitchen's equipment was available, like toaster or pans, and there are few subway stations nearby, and manhattan in 30 min away. Dana was very pleasant, met us with prepared breakfast after checkin, and helped us with every question or request. Thanks for happy first experience with airbnb!

Dana is a very good host, friendly & cordial. She is always ready to help you. The appartment was really clean.  

The subway is not far (5 min) and there is some shops to buy food around the appartment.

We genuinely can't say enough good things about Dana and the space she provided us during our vacation. The space was absolutely gorgeous, located in a fantastic neighbourhood, and Dana went above and beyond as soon as we walked in the door. In addition to stocking the fridge, pantry and bathroom with essentials, she *hand-drew* a walking map of the area that included her personal suggestions for restaurants, grocery stores and coffee houses (all spot-on, by the way). The apartment was beautifully appointed including Netflix access, towels, bedding...just everything we could possibly need. Dana and her darling son showed us around, gave us tips about the area, and Dana made herself 100% available to us at any time should we require assistance. 

We really enjoyed our time in New York, but our experience with Dana has solidified in us a desire to use Airbnb exclusively in all our trips to come. If you're headed to New York for any reason whatsoever, we cannot recommend Dana highly enough. You will *not* be disappointed.

Dana and her family were amazing! The apartment was WONDERFUL! Clean and chic. There are plenty of things to do in the surrounding neighborhood. Dana was kind to make a little travel packet for us to get to know the neighborhood. Thank you so much Dana for a great experience. Would DEFINITELY stay here again!!

This was my first trip to NY and I absolutely loved this place. Dana and her family were so welcoming and made us feel at home. I was visiting a friend who lives in NY and she loved it as well. We loved it so much we ended up staying an extra night. I would recommend to anyone.

What an amazing spot. I hope to stay here every time I come to NYC! A clean and spacious place to rest in the busy city. The bathtub was my favorite place to unwind. The bed also was so comfortable! The pictures were very accurate and Dana and her family were very helpful with the check in process and anything I needed. The train stop is close and there are multiple grocery stores nearby (I made breakfast daily in the kitchen supplied with pots and pans etc) Also some great bars and the neighborhood was lovely and full of families. I felt very safe and welcome in this beautiful apartment. Also there's netflix on the tv for those nights you just wanna unwind in your pjs! My favorite airbnb experience so far.

I absolutely loved Dana and Brad s place.  Their communication and accommodations were excellent.  They live in a very cool up and coming neighborhood..  This was my first time in NYC and I would definitely recommend staying here again.  We biked all day and loved coming back to the apartment to relax and watch Netflix ! Thanks again Brad and Dana!!

I had the best time at the Macon St apartment! It is absolutely beautiful and so comfortable, the neighborhood is really charming with great restaurants and bars and pretty close to the subway. Brad (and Dana) were very accommodating, friendly and full of great advice. I'd highly recommend this apartment for anyone wanting to explore Brooklyn and NYC generally!

L'accoglienza è stata ottima. Nonostante fosse via Dana è stata molto premurosa nel farci trovare la casa in ottime condizione, pulitissima.
La zona è tranquilla e in 5 min a piedi si arriva alla metro.
L'appartamento è molto carino e spazioso, ottimo per due persone e Dana è molto premurosa e accogliente e sempre disponibile per ogni evenienza. Consigliata per coppie che vogliano trascorre tranquillamente il proprio soggiorno a NY.

Me and my boyfriend tom had a lovely time .Dana was very welcoming and helpful.recommended lovely places to eat etc. The apartment was really lovely and not far away from manhatten. We really did have an amazing time .

We had the most fantastic stay in New York and absolutely loved staying in Brooklyn! Dana, the apartment was perfect- spotlessly clean and in a great location for the Subway and for some great local bars and restaurants. We really appreciated your suggestions of places to go and thank you for being so quick to reply with any questions that we had.

I would recommend the apartment and area to anyone and hope to be back again to visit soon!

Had a great stay with Dana. She was very friendly and helpful and made us feel very welcome. The apartment is in a great area, with excellent restaurants, food shops, and a great local coffee shop with very good coffee just around the corner.
The apartment is comfortable and spacious, with little extras that were much appreciated. 
As this is an apartment that is solely for rental it is unlikely the booking will be cancelled at the last minute

This is my first airbnb experience and it was great! Dana is very friendly and provide what I need for the stay. The apartment is very comfy. The location is close to the A/C line, which is convienent to both JFK and Manhattan. Dana recommend the restaurant nearby and I tried tow of them, they are really good. I enjoyed the stay.

Dana hat sich super um uns gekümmert Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld war perfekt. Die Wohnung war genauso, wie beschrieben.
Die Nachbarschaft und vor allem die empfohlenen Bars und Restaurants waren toll.
Wir würden jederzeit wieder Dana Wohnung mieten!

This felt like a real NY/Brooklyn experience - which is exactly what we wanted. The apt is very nice and well taken care of. There's nothing fancy about it but the comfort is certainly there. We had 2 subway stations close to us which means we could be in Midtown Manhattan in 30 min for $2.75. Very convenient.
Dana is great hostess as well, since she's always there to help with anything needed without in any way being intrusive.
Definitely recommend it and would stay there again.

Dana accommodated our early arrival, and also our late checkout the day of our departure since she didn't have anyone coming in until the following day. That was greatly appreciated! Dana went through, and left, an information sheet with a list of restaurants that she has been to, and highly recommends. And a hand drawn map of where these landmarks are at. It was a great way to discover the neighborhood. The apartment is as shown in the pictures - spacious, nicely decorated, and comfortable. We never got to see Dana through our stay, but we wanted that privacy, and it was easy to get a hold of her when we had to. Their home is in between two stops on the A/C lines which makes it pretty convenient. It was also a treat getting access to Netflix! Thank you again Dana and Brad!

Dana was a wonderful host in so many ways. We arrived late and she supplied a few basics to get us started in the morning. It was a very welcoming way to start our trip. The neighbourhood felt safe which was great because we used public transport. The apartment was clean with everything you would need. Including the Netflix for those quiet nights in. She reached out to make sure we were comfortable but wasn't too intrusive. We loved our stay and would go again in a heartbeat!! Thanks Dana & family for sharing ur home. Xx

Beautiful place in a good neighbourhood. Close to Shops, Subway and Bus. Within a good distance to Manhattan - it is great to Walk on Brooklin Bridge. Danas place has everything that is needed, she has thought of providing everything in this apartment that one needs to feel comfortable. We had a wonderful time and would return anytime! Thanks Dana!

I have recently returned from staying at Dana's lovely apartment in Brooklyn.  The apartment is in a beautiful Brownstone building and is within easy walking distance of two subway lines into Manhattan.  The apartment was clean and Dana was always available should we have a question or a problem with anything.

I would definitely recommend Dana as a great host and if I were to come to New York again, I would like to stay in the apartment again.

Dana was friendly and nice. The place is amazing, though I wish it was less dusty. Besides that, it was very convenient and a great stay. The area itself is alright but there are numerous good spots just a few stations away.

Dana is a welcoming host and we had a wonderful 8 night stay.  The unit was clean, quiet, and comfortable and large enough for both of us.  The kitchen has sufficient pots/pans to cook a variety of meals.  The unit is close to the A/C subway line, a large food store, and many smaller shops as well as restaurants.  We enjoyed Brooklyn and the beautiful brownstone houses.  Dana was very responsive to our small requests: colander, printing some tickets, and the booking of a taxi ride back to the airport on our last day.  We enjoyed discussing our impressions of our daily sightseeing with her.  Good value for New York area.

My boyfriend and I stayed at Dana's place for 6 nights and we had such a great time. It's in a wonderful location with some nice cafes and restaurants nearby and is close to the subway, which was helpful as we went back and forth the Manhattan a lot. 
The apartment itself was big and spacious and equipped with everything we needed - it felt like our little home away from home.
Dana was a very welcoming host, helping us with our luggage up the stairs and giving us tips and recommendations about her neighbourhood. Originally we were only planning to stay 5 nights but thankfully we were able to stay an extra night, as Dana was so gracious in allowing us to change our plans at the last minute.
Next time we head to Brooklyn we would definitely stay at Dana's again.

The space is very spacious and inviting. The natural lighting is unbeatable. The neighborhood feels safe and inviting as well, defiantly felt comfortable walking and getting from place to place The subway stop is an easy walk away, just a few blocks.  Dana was easy to get a hold and communicated through e-mail quickly, a quality a find most useful in my air bnb hosts.

Ms. Dana's apartment is really nice and cozy. Also 100% private apartment! if you are looking for quite and comfortable apartment with a wonderful host, here is the best choice for you.
Me and my boyfriend's schedule had many unexpected changed. Because of that, we arrived there later than we thought and we leave earlier than we thought. It might be not a good condition as a guest fot the host, but she tried to fit everything for us.
She will be always there if you need any help as she did for us.
It was first time to staying through Airbnb and it was great time to staying Ms. Dana's apartment. 
If I have to stay at NY again in the future, I'll choose her apartment again. Thank you so much Dana :)

Staying at this lovely Brownstone in Brooklyn was a highlight of our trip in NYC.  The apartment was clean, comfortable and in a great location near  public transportation that got you to Manhattan in 20-30 minutes and a wide variety of restaurants. 

Dana and her family were excellent hosts! She met us when we arrived, provided us with recommendations for local places to eat and information about the community in general.  She was easy to get ahold of it we had questions and, when our flight was delayed, gave us extra time in the unit.   Her husband also called a car service to take us back to the airport and made sure we were safely on our way.   

Small touches in the apartment like shampoo/conditioner and a blow dryer were a pleasant surprise.  Having WiFi and Netflix was also appreciated! 

I would absolutely stay here again both for the apartment and wonderful hosts and to have more time to explore this charming Brooklyn neighbourhood.

Par son accueil chaleureux, sa gentillesse et  sa disponibilité pour nous décrire l'environnement que nous allions découvrir:
boutiques, restaurants, transports,...
Le logement est parfaitement tel que décrit, confortable, équipé de  tout le nécessaire ( serviettes, savon, gel douche ,shampoing, etc... )

Dana is the most friendly and kindest person I've met so far from Airbnb.
She helped us in any way and told us where to go to spent a really good time in New York. 
The apartment was so nice and typically for Brooklyn what made us feel really comfortable and gave us a chance to check out the American lifestyle. 
We'd love to come again and we recommend this place for everyone! 
Clara, alex, klemens

Our stay at Dana's apartment was excellent! The apartment is bright, clean, spacious, and stocked with some basics such as shampoo and soap in the bathroom, and tea and coffee in the kitchen. There are restaurants, shops, and grocery stores within walking distance. The kitchen has some pots, pans, cooking utensils so we enjoyed cooking from home a few nights. We felt at home in the neighborhood and transportation was simple with the subway only 5 minutes away. Dana was friendly and allowed us to drop off our bags early before check in. I would definitely recommend this comfortable apartment for anyone looking for a home away from home feeling while traveling!
Výborné ubytování. Perfektní lokalita mezi JFK a Manhattanem. Hostitel byl ochoten pomoct, když se vyskytnul jakýkoli problém. Doporučuji.

The apartment was everything we could have asked for. In nice area, within walking distance to metro. Dana was great host and little things such as toiletries in bathroom made huge difference. Definitely place I'm going to stay next time I visit. 

Thank you for your hospitality Dana !!

A perfect place to stay in Brooklyn, the street was quiet, beautiful, and close to the subway. The apartment is spacious and comfortable. Dana was so welcoming, and provided great information about the apartment as well as the area.

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Woche in Danas Apartment. Es ist genau wie beschrieben: hell, sauber, gut ausgestattet und gemütlich mit Steinwand und Holzboden. Aus Schlafzimmer und Bad guckt man in die Gärten, morgens scheint die Sonne rein; aus dem Wohnraum guckt man auf die ruhige Straße. Geschäfte, Cafes und Restaurants sind in der Nähe. Das Viertel ist ruhig, freundlich und schön mit Brownstone-Häusern. 2 SubwayStationen nach Manhattan ( 20 Minuten nach downtown) in 5 Minuten zu erreichen. Besser könnte es nicht sein.
Everything was good

Staying at Dana's brownstone apartment in Brooklyn was an excellent experience. The neighbourhood was nice and the rows of brownstones are beautifully kept up. Dana was there to greet us when we arrived and showed us up to the apartment on the top floor of the building, which had plenty of space and all the amenities you could need. It was decorated very tastefully and the bed was really comfortable. Dana gave us lots of info - the best places to hang out and eat nearby (there's an amazing little breakfast place), as well as taking the subway which was a 5 minute walk, and a 20 minute ride into Manhattan. We really enjoyed our stay and Dana did everything she could to help us out. Wonderful place and host!

Dana is lovely and will help you as best as she can.  The place is exactly like the photos.  I found the apartment spacious, clean and conveniently located.  It is near two subway stations and easy to get around.  Dana will provide you with assistance about supermarkets, shops etc nearby.

I spent a lot of time in Manhattan and often traveled home very late at night (midnight or later).  As a single woman traveling around, I would however recommend exercising some caution if walking around the neighbourhood very late.  So I took an uber and taxi all over the place.  I know that Dana will tell you that it's quite safe and it probably is, but I felt safer uber-ing after midnight as I was alone and carrying many shopping bags!  Once or twice, when I came home very late, the roads were closed off by NYPD and we had to detour.  

I am a good sleeper but I noticed that you can frequently hear loud ambulance or police car sirens throughout the night and loud music (I think there is a club nearby or one of the neighbours is loud) so I found that closing the bedroom door helps drown the sound out.  I slept with the windows open and did not use the air-cond (even though it was humid) as I like the natural air and found it very pleasant.  This is New York and I think that it is common to have constant sound of ambulance sirens.  

Please note that the apartment I rented is on the top floor of a brownstone so be aware if you have heavy luggage or back problems/walking problems.  I had a light luggage when I arrived and split my luggage into two when I left, so it was not hard to lift them going down. 

There is a taxi service you can call that will take you to JFK (Dana will give you the number) but be aware, they only accept cash, so keep some handy (~$35 before tip).  Also Brooklyn is closer to JFK than Manhattan, so the trip is just over 30 mins.

The flat looks exactly like the pictures - spacious, clean, equipped with everything you need, and we felt really comfortable. We liked the neighbourhood, we found it safe even late at night. There are a few shops around as well as places to go for breakfast, dinner or drinks and Dana will give you some good addresses. It was well located, quick and easy to come from/go to the JFK airport. The closest subway is a 10min walk and the subway lines make it easy to go to Manhattan - about 20min for South Manhattan - which is not that long considering it's New York! Dana was a great host, very welcoming and helpful with everything. We would recommend her place without a doubt!

Dana and her husband were extremely welcoming when we arrived. The information regarding local amenities and eateries they provided us with was invaluable. Shops are relatively close to the flat. A smaller grocery store is around the corner (about a 5 minute walk), a larger supermarket about a 15-minute walk away. Dana was also more than accommodating on the day we left, letting us leave our suitcases in her hallway before we checked out and left the city. The flat was exactly as described. It was comfortable, clean and had everything we needed. The photos don’t really do the rooms justice. The flat is private, tastefully decorated and all facilities are in perfect working order. The immediate neighbourhood felt safe and travelling to Manhattan was very simple via the subway system. It takes about 20-30 minutes via the express line (from Utica) to reach lower Manhattan. Obviously, as in any big city, some caution should be taken when travelling the subway system late at night. I would also suggest familiarising yourself with the various exits and entries to the subway stations prior to travel, if you are not used to the subway system.

We loved staying with Dana in Bed Stuy. The apartment was clean and nice, and was perfect for the three of us staying there. The neighborhood was friendly, safe and welcoming. We especially loved the restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood that Dana recommended.

The apartment was excellent - all the amenities were exactly as described and it was very comfortable. Location was great with the subway nearby and good access to restaurants and delis locally.  Brad and Dana could not have been more helpful throughout our stay and I'd recommend staying there to anyone wishing to experience a combined Brooklyn/New York trip

Cozy, quiet and comfortable: Dana's apartment was exactly as described!
It was very clean, spacious, well decorated, with all the amenities you could need and a big comfortable bed.
Staying at a brownstone apartment in Brooklyn was a great experience.
It's a quiet area with a small grocery and some restaurants around the corner.
Subway was 5 minute walk and a 20 minute ride into Manhattan.
Despite being abroad, Dana was a perfect host: a lot of information and nice toiletries in bathroom.
We recommend this apartment!

We spent great time in this lovely place. Really good location and Dana is really nice. 
Strongly recommend.

Dana was an excellent host, she was always available, very nice. The apartment was clean, beautiful and very comfortable. We would definitely go again to her apartment and recommend it to our friends.

realmente disfrutar del departamento de Dana fue muy agradable ,y si era como estar en casa ,nos sentimos muy bien.En cuanto al barrio resulto tranquilo ,no tuvimos ningún inconveniente,aun regresando de noche ,lo único es que nos imaginábamos que estaría mas cerca de Manhattan, pero se dispone de excelentes medios de transporte (metro )que nos trasladaba hacia todos los lugares que teníamos planeado conocer ,llevándonos un poco mas de tiempo ,pero igual nos arreglábamos sin problemas .Las compras en el supermercado muy próximo al departamento también es una ventaja ,el barrio cuenta con numerosos restaurantes ,cafés ,y el traslado al aeropuerto en el regreso lo hicimos sin dificultad bajo las indicaciones de  Dana con un taxi que tomamos en la puerta del departamento

Dana made our visit to New York one that we will never forget.  Her apartment was exactly as described which made us feel warm and welcomed.  The neighborhood felt safe and Dana pointed out some awesome restaurants (tepache is a must try). The apartment is 5 min walk from Kingston/Throop subway stop which made our commute back and forth throughout the city very easy. Dana was an awesome host and we look forward to returning to Brooklyn again.

El barrio es preciosos y hay de todo cerca. El departamento es precioso, super luminoso, provisto de todo lo que una persona puede necesitar  tanto en la cocina como en el baño y en la habitación.
La anfitriona, Dana siempre estuvo cálida y atenta a nuestras necesidades.
Recomendamos  este lugar para cualquiera que quiera visitar NY ya que Brooklyn es un barrio precioso para vivir. Nosotros estuvimos 8 hermosos días allí!

Wir hatten einen großartigen Aufenthalt in dem tollen, ruhigen Appartement von Dana. Es ist unheimlich hell und sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Das Bett ist sehr bequem und es gibt eine richtige kuschlige Decke und nicht bloß diese üblichen Wolldecken mit Bettlaken kombiniert. Das bereit gestellte Shampoo, Duschgel und die Body Lotion hatten Lavendelduft! Die Küche ist sehr gut ausgestattet, wir haben dort abends ab und zu gekocht, obwohl sehr gute Restaurants in direkter Nachbarschaft sind. Dana war sehr gut erreichbar, sie und ihre Familie wohnen im selben Haus und sind total sympathisch.

Dana's place was beautiful, exactly as shown in the picture and very cozy.  The apartment was close to a lot on easy to get around. It was clean and she provided all the amaenatiies you may need.  We had a great time during our stay and would most defiantly recommend it. Communication with Dana was easy and she responded quickly.

Dana's apartment is a fantastic place to stay if you want to visit NYC or the Brooklyn area. It is quiet, clean, spacious in a safe area with a good selection of eating places or delis close by. Dana went out of her way to welcome us and see us off and provided a selection of foods for breakfast to get us started. We would definitely recommend this    apartment.

Beautiful clean apartment that looks better than the pictures. In a great location and short walk to the subway. Brooklyn is worth exploring as we loved it. Dana is a great host and we would love to come back and stay again

Dana hat uns persönlich empfangen und sogleich mit sehr informativen Details über die Nachbarschaft versorgt. Z.B wo gute Lokale sind, Bäcker, Geschäfte und wo es zur U-Bahn geht. Wir haben uns sofort gut aufgehoben gefühlt. Ein Eindruck, der unseren gesamten Aufenthalt über anhielt. Wir haben uns in der Gegend wohl und sicher gefühlt. Die Wohnung war sehr geräumig, hell, sonnendurchflutet, ruhig, sehr sauber und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Die Küche war gut ausgestattet und das große Doppelbett mit prima Matratze. Wir können die Wohnung vollen Herzens empfehlen. Uns hat es auch gefallen am Abend Manhattan zu verlassen und ins ruhigere Bedford Stuyvesand zu kommen. Hajo und Claudia

Wir sind gerade aus Brooklyn zurückgekommen - es war die beste Entscheidung , die ich je getroffen habe , in Danas Apartment zu wohnen. Wir haben uns so wohl gefühlt , in diesem gemütlichen und hellen Apartment. Da die Bewertungen ja alle positiv waren, hatten wir schon hohe Erwartungen. Aber die sind noch übertroffen worden. Ich glaube ich war noch nie in einer so sauberen und ansprechenden Unterkunft. Es war alles da, was man benötigt und noch mehr. Dana ist eine liebenswürdige Gastgeberin und macht alles , damit man sich wohlfühlt. Als wir Probleme mit dem Taxi zum Flughafen hatten , hat sie uns sehr geholfen. Die Kommunikation im Vorfeld hat super geklappt. 
Wer mal eine andere Seite von New York , abseits von Manhattan  kennenlernen möchte , ist hier sehr gut aufgehoben. Man muss zwar ein bisschen zur subway laufen, aber es ist gut zu erreichen. Auch sonst alles da, was man braucht. 
Wenn wir noch einmal nach New York kommen, was sehr wahrscheinlich ist, denn auch bei zwei Aufenthalten hat man noch nicht alles gesehen, würden wir auf jeden Fall wieder bei Dana wohnen wollen.
Dana was very helpful before our stay and as well during the stay. The apartment is exactly as described and Manhattan is only 30 min away!
Excellent spot to stay in Brooklyn. Hip restaurants all around. Dana is a fantastic host.
Really beautiful apartment, near to the metro (only 5-10 min by walk) and easy to reach Manhattan.dana is a kind host.

We stayed at Dana's apartment for one week. The apartment is really nice and big enough for 3 people, even though you have to go through the bedroom to access the bathroom. Manhattan is, depending where you want to get off, including the walk to the subway station about 30-40 minutes away. The neighborhood is relatively quiet and has some good restaurants. Dana is a very welcoming and friendly host and gave us some good recommendations. 
All in all, I can definitely recommend staying here.

The apartment was very clean warm and cozy.
We had a beautiful stay in NY, Thanks Dana.

Beyond what I expected!  Very Large, very clean, private,  quiet, comfortable bedding, wifi, tv, kitchen with everything you need, large closet, safe neighborhood, easy walk to train....but in addition to all that..Dana and her family are super people!  Highly recommend!
Great stay at Dana's place. She's a super host. The space is bright, spacious and equipped for every need.  Would return in a heartbeat.

We really enjoyed staying in the flat and being part of a local experience in Brooklyn, New York. Transport connections were really good  as well (walking distance around 15 minutes). Shops were close by and we discovered a great bar and restaurants in walking distance to the flat.

Everything I needed for a two week stay was available in the flat and I felt extremely comfortable. The flat is exactly as described. And I loved the brick stone design.

Dana is an excellent host. Communication was always prompt and all my questions were answered. Dana also took the time to ask how things were going during my stay. She deserves the title of Super Host!
This is a very clean, cosy and comfortable place to stay during your bussy city trip! The street is like a movie, fantastic! Owner very nice!
Great location, quiet and clean and Dana was an excellent host

L'appartement de Dana a été parfait pour notre séjour à New York. Très bien équipé et décoré avec goût il a répondu à toutes nos attentes . Dana qui habite au rez de chaussée est une hôtesse très disponible en cas de besoin.
Beautiful, comfortable place about 30 minutes from lower Manhattan (walk included), good restaurants in the neighborhood too. A great host, always there to help.
Logement agréable, environnement calme et reposant après l'agitation de la ville. Accueil simple et chaleureux

The apartment had everything we needed and more. The area was by far our favourite that we went out of everywhere we went all over the city! Dana and Brad are really friendly and welcoming hosts, happy to help you with anything you want or need, our experience wouldn't have been as good as it was without them. We had the most unforgettable time! Thank you :)
Dana is the great host. She is nice and helpful and very easy to communicate with! The apartment is the best!

Die Unterkunft entspricht der Beschreibung. Sie ist sehr sauber und großzügig. Dana ist eine freundliche und zuverlässige Gastgeberin. Die Weg zur Subway sind kurz und die Möglichkeiten des Viertel entsprechen den Beschreibungen.

A large, clean third story apartment in an area of Brooklyn that is safe.  The wife and I took the subway to and from Manhatten at all hours of the day and the commute was easy (30 minutes).  The neighborhood is quiet and we would definitely stay there again.  A solid place to rent for a visit to NYC!
The apartment was exactly as reported and was extremely clean and comfortable and a great location.
집이 깨끗하고 주인이 굉장히 친절합니다. 맨허튼에서 약 30분 내외정도 소요되니 참고하세요
Bel appartement confortable.... 10 min de une ligne de métro qui dessert très bien Manhattan. La a est très gentille et accueillante.

Appartamento caldo, ampio, per due persone perfetto ma utilizzabile anche in 3.
Vicinissimo a due fermate della subway (consigliabile la KINGSTON THROOPE, invece di UTICA), supermercato con ottimi prezzi a 10 minuti a piedi.
Vicini meravigliosi, gentili e calorosi.
Tranne la lavatrice (problema risolvibile grazie a 3 laundry nelle vicinanze), la casa ha tutti gli elettrodomestici necessari, compreso l'immancabile wi-fi.
Niente di cui lamentarsi, se non che il tempo - quando si sta bene - passa troppo in fretta...

Dana is a great host - she provided us with food for our first breakfast on our late arrival and even offered us to stay longer on our check out day. We can absolutely recommend staying at her appartment. It is very comfortable, clean, bright and supplies all you need to feel like at home. 
If you you do not mind the commute of approx. 40-50 minutes to get to Manhattan and love to experience the Brooklyn life style, than this accommodation is just the best!

Dana is amazing and so thorough! The apartment is very spacious and so clean! The neighborhood is so sweet, all of her recommendations for food and groceries are all fantastic! 10/10 would definitely stay again

Dana war eine wundervolle Gastgeberin und bei Fragen und Problemen stets offen und bemüht uns zu helfen. Wir konnten sie jederzeit kontaktieren. Die Wohnung entspricht vollkommen den Beschreibungen und Bildern. Bei unserer Ankunft war alles sehr schön hergerichtet und sauber. Wir bekamen tolle Insider-Tips rund um unsere Unterkunft. Die Gegend um das Apartment ist ruhig. Mit der Metro ist man in 20 min.  in Manhattan. Aber auch Brooklyn bietet tolle Ausgehmöglichkeiten und ist absolut empfehlenswert, vielleicht sogar mehr als Manhattan. Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt in Brooklyn sehr genossen und sind sehr dankbar für die aufgeschlossene und liebe Art und Weise mit der wir behandelt wurden. :-)

I really enjoyed my stay in Dana's lovely Brooklyn apartment. It had all the comforts of a hotel but the coziness of home. My favorite part was cooking dinner for my sons who live in Bushwick. We got to hang out, play cards, and talk. They were very impressed with the apartment! Macon Street is beautiful and the neighborhood had everything I needed close by. I hope I'll be able to stay with Dana again on my next visit to Brooklyn!
This apartment is a real gem. It is spacious, quiet, well equipped and has good transport connections. The area is save, even when coming home late at night. Dana is really a Superhost!

Wow such an amazing apartment which we felt at home in as soon as we met Dana. Our family of four loved waking up to a day of adventure in this peaceful apartment and after a day of walking we enjoyed a glass of wine in the apartment which was lovely and relaxing. The local area is great amazing resturant and fantastic cafes and a great wine shop. Dana is a great host and provides you with as much info as you need and is always available to contact if you need more help! Perfect place to stay in NYC we will be back.
Great!

Dana’s apartment is the perfect base for a trip to New York. My friend and I stayed for a week for our first time visiting America. The apartment had everything we needed, was lovely and clean, and the bed was so comfortable! 
The location is great - near two subway stations to get into the city quickly with loads of cool bars and restaurants nearby, but still quiet enough for a good nights sleep. 
Dana was a great host - her local knowledge and tips were so helpful!
Dana’s apartment is a great base from which to explore New York. It was very comfortable and a pleasant place to stay. Dana’s local tips were particularly helpful. I highly recommend the apartment.

Dana's appt is very comfortable, we had a great time. It is located in one of the nicest block in Bed-Stuy very close to some of Brooklyn best eatery. I recommend it highly and will love to stay there again in the future.

Dana’s place was exactly what we were looking for. A nice, clean one bedroom flat close to public transit with easy access to Manhattan. The subway is less than a 10 minute walk and the A train takes you right to 42nd street in about 30 minutes. There’s excellent restaurant options in the neighbourhood in case you don’t want to eat downtown. Supermarkets are also close, within walking distance (FoodTown had the best selection at best prices). 

The apartment had everything we needed as well. Dana made it easy to get settled and was there to help us with any questions we had. 

If you’re looking for a great place to stay while in New York, this is the one, you won’t be disappointed.
Extremely clean! Definitely worth it!

The flat was just perfectly located in the heart of Brooklyn with easy access to Manhattan and JFK airport.
The apartment has everything you need, very clean, making you feel at home. 
Dana is a great host. She was very flexible with check-in and check-out times and she was always very responsive to all messages that we sent before our arrival and during our stay in NY.
Logement spacieux propre proche des commerces et du métro. Accueil chaleureux. A noter l adresse et à garder précieusement!!!

Dana's place was beautiful! A beautiful brownstone. Our apartment was on the top floor and felt very private. The place was spacious, bright, nicely decorated, and very clean! We had everything we needed and loved coming back to it each night to cook dinner and hang out. The area was exactly what we expected and with the help of Dana's tips, we knew the perfect breakfast and bakery spots to go to before heading to Manhattan. We were spending most of our days in Manhattan, coming back to this apartment at the end of the day, to hang out in at night and relax. And it was perfect, felt very homey in a quiet area. The proximity to the A/C subway line is perfect! The subway stop is on both the express and local A/C line, so coming and going to Manhattan and other areas of Brooklyn was very fast and easy! ! Loved the experience :) Dana was also extremely fast to answer any questions, and was so helpful with our check-in times! Great host! Thank you!

This AirBnB is such a great choice! 

Almost 3 weeks in this beautiful apartment were absolutely perfect. Everything was so clean, we felt like at home. :) Dana was very nice & helpful host. Manhattan 20-30 min-so close, everything need around the corner. Highly recommended. Thank you for unforgettable honeymoon. :)

K&M

We came with a family of three on a short visit to NYC. The appartment is in the upper floor of Dana’s family‘s brownstone house in Brooklyn. The location is great. Dana is a very kind and caring host and had a lot of tips for us, how to get around in the area. The appartment was great, spacious, and had everything you can wish for , incl. fully equipped Kitchen. Overall, the best Airbnb. We definitely recommend.

Die Wohnung war sehr sauber, das Bett ist super bequem. Die Küche ist perfekt ausgestattet. Nachts ist es sehr ruhig, so dass man ungestört schlafen kann. Der Fußweg zur U Bahn beträgt 10 Minuten und von dort fährt ein Expresszug  nach Manhattan  in ungefähr 15 Minuten

It was a real pleasure our stay at dana's place. If u are looking for a nice stay in Brooklyn this is your place. Nice and comfortable. Metro was at 8-10 min walking. Manhattan centre at 20min with metro. Hoping the best for Dana and her family.

Dana is a very welcoming and warm host.
The house is perfect: spacious,  well furnished,  with all the comforts,  very clean.
It is New York style with a touch of European taste. Definitely my favorite home in New York.
Great stay! Thank you!
great communication, left tons of local tips, incredibly smooth check in/out. Dana was great. thank you!
This is a top-quality rental, and you will not be disappointed by how shiny and comfortable it is.We would be very interested in staying there again in the future.

This is a cozy apartment in an up and coming neighborhood that is quiet yet has everything you need. The metro stops are close. There are plenty of restaurants, deli's and small shops conveniently located a short walk away. We had a great time there and you could've ask for a better host. Dana was wonderful and everyone we ran into was very nice.

I stayed at Dana’s place for 4 days and it was remarkable. It was one of my best stays yet with AirBnB. Dana was great at communicating with me even before I officially booked. She answered my questions in a timely fashion and I felt immediately comfortable with booking. The price was unbeatable. I dreamed of staying in a Brooklyn brownstone for my first Brooklyn adventure and this place made my dreams come true. Walking distance to some cute places to eat and convenient shops. Definitely check out Tree House on Marcus Garvey St. The place was soooo clean! I slept like a baby on the full sized bed. I would stay here anytime! Seriously. The best! Dana also let me stay later than checkout since I was catching a later flight. She did this since it wasn’t booked. I appreciated not having to drag my luggage down the street anywhere. Awesome host!

I would thoroughly recommend staying here! Dana was very welcoming and gave us great tips on where to eat and shop in the local neighbourhood. The apartment is great, all the amenities you would need for a stay and also a nice place to spend some time. The location of the apartment is also a short walk to the A & C train which go directly into Manhattan. It is also a twenty minute taxi ride from Williamsburg which has great restaurants and bars. I will definitely be staying here if I return to New York!

This place is amazing! Dana is definitely super host! The apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable. great neighborhood. felt like live in NY. I want to stay here again when I back to NY. Thank you Dana!

Dana is an amazing host, this was our 1st Airbnb experience and it was faultless. The flat is as on the pictures, clean, cosy & contemporary with all the amenities you might need such as microwave, kettle, coffee machine etc. in case you decide to dine in. We’ve felt right at home. I am a light sleeper and struggle to sleep in any hotel or a new place but slept all the way through the 5 nights we’ve stayed! The connections to the Manhattan were great and trains easy to navigate, 2 local subway stations about 5-10 mins walk. Dana left us a map with local shops & places to eat which we dutifully tested, Saraghina Italian & Lunatico bar beat more expensive places in the city by a mile with the ambiance and customer service!  Communication with Dana prior and during our trip was great, prompt and she answered any questions we had.  % recommend!

Dana is an extraordinary host and is for sure recommended for everyone that wants to visit New York The place is located in a colorful neighborhood and is easy to move to different places in NYC with good subway connections Thank you Dana for the great time we had in your place and specially for your generous hospitality . If visiting NYC this is the place
Brad and Dana are super nice. Their place is so comfortable, warm and clean. We had a fantastic time there and it made our honeymoon even more unforgettable.

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Woche in NYC, und das nicht zuletzt wegen unseres Aufenthalts in Danas schöner Wohnung, in der wir uns sehr wohl gefühlt haben. Das Apartment ist so, wie in den Bildern dargestellt: geräumig, gemütlich und sauber. Außerdem ruhig gelegen. Der Weg zur Metro ist fußläufig innerhalb von 10-12 Minuten zu erreichen und von dort ist man fix und ohne Umsteigen in Manhattan. Wir empfehlen Danas liebevoll eingerichtete Wohnung uneingeschränkt weiter. Es fehlte uns wirklich an nichts.

Vielen Dank, Dana!

Kristiaan und Isabell

It was a pleasure staying at Dana’s apartment. It was comfortable, spacious and furnished with the daily necessities. As I often did cooking during my stay, the functional kitchen was perfect for me. The neighborhood was also very nice to live in. Dana and her husband were wonderful hosts; they were so kind and I appreciate their help. I hope to stay this apartment again next time.

Dana's place was a great place to stay for a few nights. Really well located and the apartment was super cosy! The only issue was that the old-fashioned steam radiators were quite loud but that's not Dana's fault. The apartment was so warm and cosy that we didnt need the heating turned on despite it being cold outside!

The apartment is in a very nice neightbourhood with good restaurants and a subway at 5 minutes walk. The apartment is very cozy and comfortable. It felt a bit like home. Nice to go to after a day of sightseeing in NYC. We appreciate the hospitality of Dana and Brad.

My husband and I was very pleased with our stay in Danas home. The apartment was clean, silent, spacey and  very nice. We stayed there for 9 nights and it really felt like home.
The neighbourhood was upcoming - on one hand very autentic Brooklyn and at the same time becoming hip. We found a lot of very nice and hip cafes and restaurants. Try the french restaurant L’Antagoniste on Malcolm X Blvd. Dana and her husband recommended it and it was excellent. Or the most cool Brooklyn café on Malcolm X and Halsey with fantastic coffee. Or hear some great jazzmusic at Lunatico at Lewis Avenue. Very nice spot.
You can easily walk to the subway and take the train to Downtown Brooklyn and Manhattan. 
Dana and her husband was so sweet people. Very helpfull and easy to talk to. Thank you so much for your kindness.
Dana’s place in Brooklyn was perfect. The decor and space are stylish and very comfortable. Really enjoyed staying here and would stay again in the future.

Die Wohnung von Dana ist perfekt! Die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und angenehm. Es gibt einige gute Coffeeshops und Delis. Dazu ein super italienisches Restaurant. Es gibt 2 U-Bahnstationen in der Nähe. Die Kommunikation mit Dana war immer sehr gut. Sie hatte uns gute Tipps für in der Nachbarschaft und konnte uns sonst gut aushelfen. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und schön eingerichetet. Sehr empfehlenswert!

A great space with an amazing family of hosts. They made us feel welcome, and any questions or concerns we had were quickly addressed. 

The neighborhood is conveniently located for travel with lots of little restaurants and cafes to enjoy. 

We wouldn’t hesitate to book again.

name: Sunny private room in Park Slope
summary: Private room with a shared bathroom. Fully-furnished with a spacious living area and kitchen. Within easy walking distance to several train lines (B,Q,F,G,2,3), next to shops and restaurants on 7th and 5th ave, and very close to Prospect Park.
space: The apartment is bright and sunny with wood floors, exposed brick, and intricate wood work.
description: Private room with a shared bathroom. Fully-furnished with a spacious living area and kitchen. Within easy walking distance to several train lines (B,Q,F,G,2,3), next to shops and restaurants on 7th and 5th ave, and very close to Prospect Park. The apartment is bright and sunny with wood floors, exposed brick, and intricate wood work. We're a pretty quiet, grandma-type group. We don't party often, or drink too much, except for a good single malt. We welcome good conversation and good company! The neighborhood is very family friendly, with lots of restaurants, cafes, and shops. Prospect Park is a great place for a bike ride, run, or stroll. The nearby trains are the B,Q, 2, 3, F, and G. We are also passionate about literature, comic books, and travel.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very family friendly, with lots of restaurants, cafes, and shops. Prospect Park is a great place for a bike ride, run, or stroll.
notes: We are also passionate about literature, comic books, and travel.
transit: The nearby trains are the B,Q, 2, 3, F, and G.
interaction: We're a pretty quiet, grandma-type group. We don't party often, or drink too much, except for a good single malt. We welcome good conversation and good company!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm a newly graduated acting major who enjoys traveling, meeting new people, trying new things, and having plenty of stories to tell at the end of it all. 

I like to do crossword puzzles, I enjoy telling stories, and I frequent coffee shops, taco stands and yard sales. 

I don't have a life motto at the moment, but I am diligently looking for one.

reviews.comments:
The place is in a beautiful building, nice stone architecture. It's a walkup, up three flights, so keep that in mind.

The neighborhood is beautiful. It's quite gentrified, but there are still some cheaper food joints. It's not totally soulless. Park Slope is also about as safe as you can get. It feels more that way than much of Manhattan.

The place is in the middle of the neighborhood, so it's a 7 minute or so walk from any of the three train stations, which is a bit far.  But those three stations offer five unique lines, so you can get to many places without transfers.  Certainly to the major stations in Manhattan. 

The roommates are extremely nice and welcoming. We chatted a few times and they do their best to make the experience a pleasant one. They said I could use their dishes, eat their food, watch Netflix on their PS4, and all that. Very nice, and not really expected from strangers!

The room is small but just fine. The main problem was that it didn't have air conditioning. There's no AC in the apartment as a whole, and nor is there in the room. There's a fan, but that doesn't go very far when it's over 80 and the air source (an alley) doesn't get wind and tends to stay warm. AC would make this an excellent listing.

name: Two Bedroom in a townhouse with a patio in Nolita!
summary: The Space  This is a two bedroom private space with a large outdoor patio located in Nolita/ Soho area. Each bedroom has a comfortable bed, has large windows, AC units. The kitchen opens to an amazing private patio with chairs, pillows, towels, and a barbecue. There is a good sound system for indoor and outdoor too.
space: Apartment located in the heart of Nolita and steps away from SOHO - one of the most hip and desirable neighborhoods in New York! The place is tastefully decorated, and clean.  This is our family townhouse, it has two separate floors and each floor is private, This floor has 2 bedroom and comfortable for 4 people. AMENITIES: Pretty much everything you would need! - Open kitchen with dishwasher  - Comfortable queen and full sized beds -Amazing shower, it has dual heads - Wireless internet - Large flat screen TV with apple tv (Espn, Netflix, HBO and more) -High quality indoor and outdoor speakers. -Has AC units in each bedroom. -Coffee maker, iron and hair dryer...  NEIGHBORHOOD: You cannot beat the location! Steps away from the best cafes/restaurants in New York. To name a few, you are minutes away from Egg Shop, Butcher's Daughter, Cafe Gitane, Balthazar, Grey Dog, Cafe Select, Dean & Deluca, La Esquine, Elizabeth st Garden, Whole Foods Great shopping, there are numerous boutiques on st
description: The Space  This is a two bedroom private space with a large outdoor patio located in Nolita/ Soho area. Each bedroom has a comfortable bed, has large windows, AC units. The kitchen opens to an amazing private patio with chairs, pillows, towels, and a barbecue. There is a good sound system for indoor and outdoor too. Apartment located in the heart of Nolita and steps away from SOHO - one of the most hip and desirable neighborhoods in New York! The place is tastefully decorated, and clean.  This is our family townhouse, it has two separate floors and each floor is private, This floor has 2 bedroom and comfortable for 4 people. AMENITIES: Pretty much everything you would need! - Open kitchen with dishwasher  - Comfortable queen and full sized beds -Amazing shower, it has dual heads - Wireless internet - Large flat screen TV with apple tv (Espn, Netflix, HBO and more) -High quality indoor and outdoor speakers. -Has AC units in each bedroom. -Coffee maker, iron and hair dryer...  NEIGHBORHO
neighborhood_overview: It is in the center of downtown Manhattan. Steps away from Soho, Chinatown and LES. You can pretty much walk everywhere in downtown Manhattan. The New Museum is 3 blocks away, tons of galleries and boutiques are all around. Best brunch places like Egg Shop, Butcher’s Daughter and Two hands are 2 blocks away.
transit: 6 train is 4 blocks from the apartment, on Spring& Lafayette st N/R/Q, on Spring and Broadway which is about 5 blocks B/D/F are 3 blocks away and  J/Z are all within 3 block radius
access: You have the entire floor for yourself including private patio. The building and the apt is very safe and private.
interaction: Im usually available by message on Airbnb or anytime wats up message too. I prefer you to reach me from wats up if im travelling at that time
house_rules: Smoking in the Patio only. Please take your trash out daily. We use the public trash bins outside. They are just on the corner. Please cover the banquet with its outdoor cover at the patio and take the pillows inside when you are stepping outside

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a really easy going and fun person. I like to meet with people who are from different countries with different cultures. That is why I love New York. I have a passion for art, love to take pictures and make movies. Music is a big part of my life and follows me everywhere. I'm happy, I live in a happy place, and I would like to share that with you.

reviews.comments: Esef is an amazing host! He showed us around the apartment and made us extremely comfortable, he gave us tips about places to go to and things to do in NYC. The apartment was absolutely beautiful. Cozy and spacious enough for 4 people. The most amazing part of it is though has got to be the patio. Good speakers and nice setup outside, the place was the most perfect place to reside for a group of young people. Sick place! Oh and it's in East village!

L'appartement est top avec une superbe terrasse ! Les lits sont particulièrement confortable et la clim fonctionne. La localisation est parfaite, et Esef est adorable et disponible. Super expérience, on reviendra !

We absolutely loved this apartment. The owner was very accommodating and provided all the information we needed in a timely manner. We liked the location because it was in more of a residential section, so, while still busy, it was out of the hustle and bustle of Soho and Midtown. The layout worked very well for our group of two couples and the bathroom was generously sized compared to some of the hotels we've stayed in near Times Square. We made use of the patio almost every night and it was such a nice feature to have. We've already recommended this apartment to several of our friends and we would definitely stay here again.

As a former New Yorker, I'm familiar with this general area.  
This is a great location to stage an attack on Soho, Noho, Nolita, east village, China town.  Less so the west village, but doable for eager walkers.   

The place is a perfect. Clean and decorated. amazing roomy arrangement considering the space and the patio is better than it appears in the pictures.    

I never got to meet Esef- but he communicated great over email and made all arrangements as promised.    Will absolutely consider returning here for my annual visits.
The place was clean and welcoming right when we stepped into the door. The location was PERFECT, so easy to get to whatever neighborhood you wanted to go.

Staying at Esef's place was a wonderful airbnb experience! Esef is a very kind and uncomplicated person and therefore the contact, arrangements when and where to meet etc. was very convenient.

The apartment is a great place to stay. It is very clean and you feel home right from the beginning. It has two bedrooms with king-size beds, a nice bathroom and a very comfortable living-open-kitchen-room. The patio is great too, although we did not really had the chance to use it since it was too cold. 

Also the area is very nice and you have lots of cafes, restaurants and bars right around the corner and also West village and all these nice areas are in walking distance!

I can highly recommend Esef's apartment when staying in NY! Thanks again!

Geen verassingen, geen onduidelijkheden. Wij kregen precies wat wij hoopten en verwachtten toen wij dit appartement boekten. Esef informeerde ons tijdig en op eigen initiatief. In- en uitchecken ging zonder enig probleem. Esef respecteerde onze privacy maar reageerde snel en adequaat op onze vragen. Prima ervaring. De keuken bleek niet bedoeld om te koken (geen pannen) maar gelukkig zijn er veel prima restaurants in de buurt.

Esef's place was just as wonderful as he was!  Great location in Soho so close to Chinatown and Little Italy. Great bagels and juices nearby. Two bars downstairs. Bowery and New Museum super close too!  The apt is way nicer than the pics. We stayed fri and sat night. Lots going on near by so a little noisy but NYC is noisy so it was fine. My favorite Airbnb so far!
Great place, fun to go outside, Esef wonderful to deal with, I'd stay again, five stars!

Esefs place was perfect for my recent trip to NYC.  The location was central and vibrant. The place was well equipped and comfortable and Esef was accommodating and friendly. Will definitely stay there again and hopefully it will be for longer than just a weekend!

We were a party of three girls and spent a week at Esef's apt.
The location is great, close to subways (10-20 min walk) close to grocery stores and to restaurants and pubs. Two pubs are right downstairs (a bit noisy at weekends night) but still very quite and nice area all around.
The house was very clean and big enough for three or even four. Not very accessorised to cook or have breakfast there (Esef told us!) but you can always ask Esef whatever you need. Bathroom is perfect and has a great shower, beds very comfortable and the terrace is fantastic, you can even see the Empire from there!!
Last but not least: he has a terrific music system there!!
Esef was a great host, we saw him only at arrival but he was very welcoming and helpful and always responded to our messages when needed.
We had a great stay at Esef's apartment!

The apartment was exactly as described.  The beds and bedrooms were comfortable, the bathroom (especially the shower!) was spacious, and the rooftop patio was a great bonus.  The apartment is in a great neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars, shops, and attractions within walking distance.  Highly recommend!

Very accurate description. The host made us feel very welcome. The place was very nice, clean, in a great location, and we thoroughly enjoyed it. Great communication from the host. Thank you so much and we would definitely stay there again sometime soon.
Esef was very quick with contact, and his place was incredible.  Very close to everything that you would like to see, and easy access to transit. I would certainly suggest staying here.

We enjoyed very much staying in Esef's apartment. It's very conveniently located, walking distance to many good places for dining and shopping, and it's close to multiple subway stations. We love how light and spacious the apartment is, which is not easy to find in Manhattan. We hope to stay here again on our next visit to NYC.

The appartment is exactly as appears on the images, very clean and nice decoration. Beds are incredibly comfortable! Excellent location! Communication with Esef was easy and clear, I will definetely come back to Esef place !

Great place to spend some chilled time in NY with easy access to the best bits in Soho. Clean, convenient with a lovely outdoor space. I'll definitely recommend, particularly to young professionals in search of a break.

Great host and great apartment !!!!
The apartment pictures on the listing are very accurate and i was very happy to discover the apartment was exactly as i expected it to be from the pictures. 
Esef is super responsive and solved every minor issue we had during our stay, waited for us when we arrived and provided all the needed instructions.
The location is fantastic, close to everything but in a relatively quiet area.
Really enjoyed my stay at Esef's place and i would definitely come back next time i'll be in NYC.

L'appartement d'Esef correspond très exactement aux photos présentées. Très confortable, super agréable et parfaitement équipé. Le patio extérieur est juste incroyable en plein New York. Quartier très sympa pour shopping, restos et facile d'accès.
Avant le séjour, échanges nombreux et très faciles avec Esef qui était là pour nous recevoir. Je recommande vivement et y retournerais avec plaisir !

La casa de Esef es maravillosa, la ubicación es inmejorable: estás a pocos minutos del metro, e incluso al salir caminando encuentras barrios y lugares hermosos. La casa es cómoda y bonita. Volveríamos a quedarnos allí! Muchas gracias!
Great place to stay! Highly recommended!
The apartment was perfectly in the middle of life in NY, it was really charming and the terrace really great. The very friendly owner is very accommodating. Thanks again for our cool trip.

Amazing location! The apartment was as described and perfectly situated to enjoy all sides of the city. Esef was always quick to respond to any queries in the run up to our stay. I would highly recommend and would stay here again for sure!
Lovely place as described. Everything was straightforward. Great location - I love the east side and it was a very short walk to the subway.

C'est de loin la meilleure adresse ou j'ai séjourné à NYC! Esef vraiment super sympa,Magnifique appartement très bien situé etc.. JE ne peux que vivement recommander cette adresse, un vrai petit bijou!
(Best apartment I've never been in NYC! Esef is very nice and helpful, the apartment is juste amazing and very well located. I Highly recommend this address!)
Great apartment with the best location!
Awesome place - perfect location, great shower, two bedrooms if you need them, exactly as described. Wifi was 30mb, which was great when I had to get work done.
Great experience staying at Esef's. Nicely decorated and cozy. Has everything you need at its doorstep. No complaints.
Esef provided great communication throughout and his location was just as described. Would stay here again

Lovely two bed apartment in a lovely fun area. We travelled as a family and did miss an oven or microwave but got by with eating out! Beds were super comfy and the bathroom was clean and with lots of towels along with a great shower. The apartment is above a bar that was noisy on the Friday evening but other nights not so loud. Esef was super helpful and always on hand if we needed anything. I would recommend a stay here an ideal place to rest up from sightseeing and enjoying the best NYC can offer.
Great experience awesome place in a perfect location. We enjoyed very much staying in Esef's (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very quick with contact.

Thank you Esef, for sharing your place with us - fantastic location and the patio is a treat. We had a great time!
You were readily available for questions and have been a great host.

Esef is an amazing host, very flexible and helpful.
Have stayed at his place before and would definitely book with him again. I would highly recommend anyone looking for a comfortable, clean stay in a great location with the perks of an amazing patio. Very pleased with my stays at Esef's. :)
Great space and quite comfortable. Very convenient location as well!
Esef's place was awesome! Centrally located and super close to soho and lower east side. Very cool.

Esef's apartment is in a lively location, close to restaurants, Little Italy and public transport. The apartment is up two flights of stairs (for those with heavy suitcases), has quirky furnishings, good for music lovers!
Bring your own iron if you need to press anything, the local dry cleaners are expensive.

The location was just perfect! I stayed with 3 more friends and the apartment was very comfortable for us. In matter of the space, rooms, and the patio that was really handy. The only thing to take into account that there is no elevator, which for us was just fine. But if you are traveling with a baby it can be challenging. Rather then that it was perfect!

Esef's place was top notch. It had a nice shower. The balcony was really fun. Great street parking for our friend that visited from Brooklyn for an evening. Really close to everything including the subway stop. Esef was easy and accommodating. He totally worked with our schedule. I would stay at Esef's place again, in a heartbeat.

We had a great stay in the apartment. It has a perfect location for exploring NY. The area is busy with a lot going on and good restaurants. We enjoyed having breakfast at the terrace, we bought delicious food at Wholefoods just a couple of blocks away along Bowery going north. Checking in went smooth and Esef answered all our questions swiftly.

Esef’s Flat is perfect for a NYC getaway. The location is incredible with literally everything you would want and need at your doorstep. The outdoor area was the perfect way to spend the summer afternoons. Soho is literally 5mins around the corner with great access to public transport. Esef was a brilliant host and made checking in and out very easy. I would highly recommend his flat to anyone who wants the nyc lifestyle away from tourist areas.
A really cool place in a top location!

Great stay in NYC for 9 days, with my partner and my 10 years old son. GOOD THINGS: Beautiful and very cosy home, with personality and style, better than pictures shown; Clean and comfortable beds, bathroom, shower;  My son loved the lights with adjustable intensity; For meals or a beer the patio is good (could be great if the owner takes more care of it); Good position, near some subway stops, in a lively area, with also excellent pizza shops in the nearby; Check-in and check-out in any time; Esef's kindness in communication (but not fast...). BAD THINGS: Very noisy, night and day (traffic, klaxons, street works, alarms); Many house lights not (or bad) working, with dozens of lights shops in the nearby!; Self check-in, problems with the keys and unclear instructions: we risked to stay out; Too few accessories: chairs, table lamps, table for meals (except a folding table that needed to be cleaned strongly); A total of $460 per night is too much for that area and flat. Of course most of those issues can be easily fixed by the host, next time.

Stayed at Esef's multiple times now, been my go to when visiting NYC.
Highly recommended, Best host!

God stil og fin indrettet lejlighed, med en rigtig fin beliggenhed - meget tæt på Chinatown, Little Italy og Nolita. Kommunikation med værten var også helt fin og indtjekning nem og uproblematisk. 
Gode senge og rimeligt roligt om natten. Rent og pænt indenfor!
Kunne dog anbefale værten at gøre noget ved patioen - det var skønt at kunne være ude, men møbler og indretning var gammelt og slidt. Især sofaen var ubrugelig.

Seed was incredibly communicative. He did a great job of explaining all of the check-in details and features of his place. He was kind and flexible with our check-in and out. Very clean place with everything you could need. We would come back again.

Our family of 4 including 2 teenage girls loved our stay. The apartment is nice and cosy. Feels at home. Best location in Nolita @ Elizabeth street which has all the great shopping and cafés, restaurants spots around the corner. The terrace is really a plus and we enjoyed it every day. Esef is very nice and very easy to communicate. We had 0 issues. Everything was really perfect! We will come back!

Esef’s place was great! Perfect location—safe and fun. Esef was easy to communicate with and very accommodating. The roof top patio is amazing. The apartment is clean, beds are very comfortable and the shower is wonderful! I hope we can stay there again sometime!

Nous avons passé une petite semaine très agréable à New York et l'appartement d'Esef est idéale pour découvrir la ville rayonner et profiter de ces quartiers uniques qu'offre New York.
Bref, une excellent adresse pour passer un bon voyage!

Esef's property is a wonderful flat in Little Italy with easy access to neighborhood restaurants and cafes with the galleries and shopping of SOHO a short stroll away. Check-in and check-out couldn't have been easier. The apartment was spacious enough for two couples. Highlights include a large shower, flexible common area, private outdoor deck and nearby subway stops. The space was clean, bright and featured live plants and all of the promised amenities. Communication was excellent and we hope to stay here again in the future.

Esef is a great host.  Easy check-in and check-out. The place is clean, spacious, the shower is a plus (especially after a long day of walking in the cold), and the beds are very confy.  Location is great with good local restaurants and bars. I will definitely rent Esef's place again.

Ideally located  - close to all the Metro you may need to discover Manhattan and further - Great restaurants and bars right next to it - nice spacious flat where you feel like being a "local" for the duration of your stay! GREAT place and Nice Host!
Thanks for having us!

Appartement très bien placé à 2 pas de soho, greenwhich et pas loin non plus de Brooklyn. Quartier super, hôte réactif, bonne literie et super terrasse !
je recommande...

This Austin creative family of four loved Esef's airbnb! It was an a GREAT location with easy access to subways, sights, restaurants, bridges, amenities and a do-able amount of stairs to climb home! As a mama traveling with kids (and someone that has lived in NYC before), I really need a lot of cleanliness and comfort - Esef's place made New York City easy ~ and that's no small task. Highly Recommend!

Esef's place has a great vibe to it. Very hip/stylish looking apt with everything you could need. Perfectly clean, very comfortable rooms and beds, spacious bathroom. Everything worked perfectly. Stayed here with 3 friends and we were all very comfortable. Comunication was great. Always got a prompt response to messages. The location is great too. Several subway station near and only 3 min walk to Little Italy neighborhood. Black Seed Bagels just half a block down the same street. Check in and check out couldn't have been easier. Would definitely stay here again

The apartment is really beautiful and in a very good and safe area.
Esef is a very kind and helpful person.
Subway is very close to the house.
If will be back in New York, we are going to choose Nolita/ Soho Area again!

This is a great apartment and a great value in the heart of one of Manhattan's hippest neighborhoods. Also, great location for accessing other parts of the city. Exceeded expectations. Highly recommend and will stay there again.

Esefs apartment is situated very nicely in Lower Manhattan, everything is acessible by foot or subway transport. The apartment is as nice as it looks on the pictures and is large enough for two couples. I would say the table is not perfect if you want to cook yourself or eat indoors, but who does that in NYC anyway? Communication was also fine, I can therefore only recommend staying in this apartment.
A very sparse kitchen but worked for 3 people.  Steep stairs with little lighting.  Great neighborhood.  Wonderful restaurants, close to subway.
Esef's place is lovely and in a great location between Chinatown, Little Italy, and Nolita.
Everything was perfect, super clean, good location and beds. Can’t wait to come back, will definitely recommend to all of my friends.

We had a wonderful stay. Although we didn't met Esef, he cared about everything very mindful and supported us in everything we asked. In the area you find a lot amazing little restaurants, shops, bars and galleries. Walking around its just awsome. In the night its very quite, only on st. Patricks day you heard some party People on the road. The everyday shopping you can do in Supermarktes 5 to 10 min away or nice cheap fruits and vegetable in China town just 5 min away. We wished to come back some day....High recommended.

Esef has a wonderful apartment in an excellent location. We were within 20 minutes of the Brooklyn bridge, 9/11 memorial, next to China town and several subway stops. The apartment itself looked even better in person than in photos. The bathroom was modern and spacious, and everything was very clean. I was worried about the apartment being too cold since we were there during a snow storm, but it was nice and toasty. Esef was easy to get a hold of and responded quickly. I highly recommend his place!

Es acogedor, cocina baño muy bien (falta microondas) y colchones muy cómodos pero tiene poco espacio para la ropa y en general. La zona es animada en bares, restaurantes y ocio y hay de todo cerca.
El Anfitrión está siempre pendiente.
Cozy warm apartment, comfortable beds, close to everything Chinatown, Little Italy, Manhattan Bridge and subway stations

The apartment is spacious and very clean - a great value! Esef works hard to make sure everything is just right (down to the flowers on the table), and is very courteous and quick to respond to any questions or concerns that may come up.
Esef is a great host , he has the best disposition with his guests, great communication and concern. recommended to all air bnb clients.
Excellent host. Easy checkin. Great location with an awesome rooftop patio. Very large place by NY standards, clean with a nice updated bathroom.

Amazing location, you really feel
like a local staying here. Very styly and clean and Esef was very responsive to any queries we had during our stay.
Great host and amazing location.

we’re frequent NYC visitors and we found this to be one of our best experiences with airbnb, hotels etc. 

Esef was very communicative and quick. Handled everything we needed including our unusually late check-in (2am).

comfortable beds. plenty of towels. we had wine and apps on his quaint veranda many nights. 

if you don’t know Nolita is a great centrally located neighborhood.

would stay again and recommend to all.

We loved our stay at Esef's place, he was so kind and responsive, we particularly appreciated his offering us a late check out so that our daughter, who was unwell, could rest in the lovely cool air-conditioning until we left for our bus. The location is fantastic, it's a great neighbourhood with plenty of bars, cafes, Broadway shopping, and eating in Little Italy and Chinatown. Many thanks to Esef for being such a great host.

Die Wohnung ist top gelegen, mitten in einer Gegend mit vielen kleinen Restaurants und Bars! 
Soho, Little Italy, Chinatown, East und Westvillage liegen um die Ecke! Wir haben uns mit unseren Söhnen (18/14) sofort wohl gefühlt!
Der Patio ist morgens und abends bei der Hitze in NY ein Highlight!!
Das Bad ist groß und modern. 
Esef ist extrem hilfsbereit (später check out) und antwortet schnell!
Alles ist so wie angegeben. Das Preis- Leistungsverhältnis ist top.
Alles in allem sind das 5 Sterne!
Excellent location, great privacy. Very funky patio

This is a generous sized two bedroom apartment with a great roof deck. It was very clean and the host communicated promptly.  However the apartment is on the second floor above a 24/7  VERY noisy intersection. Unless you are used to extreme noise at night or have great earplugs sleep will elude you!  Also two long flights of very steep stairs up to apt. I would not suggest you bring children that need to be carried. The location is great. Perfect base for exploring lower Manhattan
Great location. Responsive host. Stylish place. Exactly what u want from a Nyc pad
Great location and good communication !
We really enjoyed our stay here. Great location and value. Highly recommend.
Best location in Manhattan.
Fantastic location, endless bars, shopping and restaurant. Walking distance to Soho, Little Italy, and China Town.
Perfect location for seeing the heart of NYC.  Esef was very responsive to my questions.  Everything was as advertised.  Would definitely stay here again.
Nice location, a bit noicy
Cool, laid-back place in super neighborhood with bohemian and vibrant feel!
A great sized apartment in the perfect location. Comfy beds and good quality bed linen. Great communication with Esef, thank you for having us

Esef was a wonderful host-- we never met in person but he was attentive and responsive, making sure our check-in went smoothly and that we were enjoying our stay. Esef's space is clean and stylish, and the location is ideal-- the Lower East Side itself is right there for you to explore, and it is a great home base for quick travel to other parts of Manhattan. As Esef mentions in his description of the space, there is some street noise, including noise from the bar downstairs on weekends, but we didn't find it disruptive and slept fine. Thanks Esef for a great stay!
Esef was a great host who provided very clear instructions on how to check in and out and use everything in the unit. His place is lovely and a great location. Would definitely stay again!
Great place at an amazing location, needs to clean a bit more.
Great location, great communication

Esef was a wonderful host who gave clear instructions and communication. 
The apartment was in a really convenient location in a safe neighbourhood with stylish touches throughout. There was a great connectivity via wifi and the amenities were excellent. The terrace would be awesome in summer but for us served as a spot to check out the falling snow or check temperature for the day. Laundromat nearby as well as some trendy cafes and bars (as well as a short walk to both little Italy and china town). Would certainly stay here again! Location, value and state of apartment were excellent for us!

name: Large duplex West Village apartment
summary: Our duplex apartment is spacious and bright with a 16 foot high ceiling in the living room and three amply size bedrooms. It is ideally located near the Hudson River Park, the Highline, Whitney and loads of great restaurants and coffee shops.
space: We have a living room, dining room, 3 bedrooms and a small alcove home office. All are accessible for guests.
description: Our duplex apartment is spacious and bright with a 16 foot high ceiling in the living room and three amply size bedrooms. It is ideally located near the Hudson River Park, the Highline, Whitney and loads of great restaurants and coffee shops. We have a living room, dining room, 3 bedrooms and a small alcove home office. All are accessible for guests. We will be available via phone, text and email. Depending on timing we will greet guests when they arrive. Our home is ideally located in the far west village near the Hudson River Park, Highline, Whitney and many great restaurants and shops on Hudson Street. We’re also surrounded by the classic, leafy brownstone streets that the village is known for. If you have children you will have your pick of nearby parks, playgrounds and a water park. We are a 5 minute walk to the 1 train and 10 minutes to the West 4th Street station. We are one block from either crosstown or uptown bus. Parking is difficult but there is an underground garage across
neighborhood_overview: Our home is ideally located in the far west village near the Hudson River Park, Highline, Whitney and many great restaurants and shops on Hudson Street. We’re also surrounded by the classic, leafy brownstone streets that the village is known for. If you have children you will have your pick of nearby parks, playgrounds and a water park.
