house_rules: We have a strict no shoes policy in the house for both courtesy to our downstairs neighbors and to protect flooring.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Great experience in this beautiful apartment very conveniently located. Everything was working smoothly and the owners made sure everything went well with good recommendations. One should just know that it is on the 4th floor without an elevator.

Kelly was easily accessible via email/text in advance of and during our trip.  Provided 2 sets of keys which helped with the size of our party (6 people).  4th floor walkup was not a big deal.  The walk to Christopher St Subway Station (1 train) was easy & safe.

Kelly and Mathew's place was as cute as it was described, located in a trendy area of West Village surrounded by restaurants, pubs and little stores. We (party of 6) loved the retro feel of this duplex apartment. The bed in bedroom 3 was slightly smaller for 2 of our teenage children, but we were provided (upon request) with an air mattress. We didn't get to see Kelly during our stay, but Mathew was there to welcome us when we arrived on that late August night. Mathew also recommended us a place to get our basic grocery (milk, bread, coffee) that late night (when most stores were closed), for the next morning  breakfast. Overall we had a great stay and would recommend this place for anybody traveling in a group of 5 or less.

You can smoke. American kitchen. Heating. Washing maschine. Cooker. Fridge.kettle. Led television.Wifi.

reviews.comments:
Gokce is excellent 
She is very good at communicating she responds very quickly via e mail or telephone for any question you have 
She is on time 
She cares about quests 
She tries her best to help guests 
The Appartment was very clean and exactly the way we wanted 
We had very nice and unforgettable time in Istanbul with Gokce help
And we thank her very much

Living at Gökce's apartmant was very nice. The flat is very comfortable, nice and tidy. It is near to everywhere. 
Gökce and her friends are very helpful and cooperative. She replies immediately and give all possible supports.
I recommend this flat!

This is second time that Gokce helped us as host 
It was wonderful and had greet time 
Gokce is excellent host she is the best I recommend to everyone to stay at Gokce place and enjoy Istanbul

name: Visitez Montréal à vélo! (2 BIXI gratuits)
summary: Enjoy visiting Montreal riding 2 FREE rental bikes! To take advantage of this offer, please mention it at reservation time. Also, I provide access to my tandem kayak to paddle on the Saint-Lawrence River just across the street (note that you need to be 2 people to haul the kayak up the access slope - about 100 feet)  Entire 2-bedroom apartment located in a peaceful neighbourhood of Crawford Park on the island of Montreal, just 20 minutes from downtown. Free parking in front of the apartment.
space: About the Bixi rental bike rides: they are limited to 45 minutes each before having to stop and dock the bike to a Bixi station for one full minute. Then you can use the bike for another 45 minutes, before docking it for a minute, and so on.  The apartment includes 2 closed bedrooms. The largest bedroom has a queen-size bed. The other bedroom has a 2-place futon. The third bed is a queen-size sofa bed in the living room. When all 3 beds are used, the apartment can accommodate up to six persons.
description: Enjoy visiting Montreal riding 2 FREE rental bikes! To take advantage of this offer, please mention it at reservation time. Also, I provide access to my tandem kayak to paddle on the Saint-Lawrence River just across the street (note that you need to be 2 people to haul the kayak up the access slope - about 100 feet)  Entire 2-bedroom apartment located in a peaceful neighbourhood of Crawford Park on the island of Montreal, just 20 minutes from downtown. Free parking in front of the apartment. About the Bixi rental bike rides: they are limited to 45 minutes each before having to stop and dock the bike to a Bixi station for one full minute. Then you can use the bike for another 45 minutes, before docking it for a minute, and so on.  The apartment includes 2 closed bedrooms. The largest bedroom has a queen-size bed. The other bedroom has a 2-place futon. The third bed is a queen-size sofa bed in the living room. When all 3 beds are used, the apartment can accommodate up to six persons. You
neighborhood_overview: I lived in many neighbourhoods in Montreal and I believe this one is the most agreeable for its proximity with the St. Lawrence River and the Lachine Rapids (that you can ride with jet boating or rafting), the biking and running paths,  the parks nearby that make you forget that you are so close to the city, and the close distance to both downtown and the airport (we are basically midway between the airport and downtown). Wellington Street has many types of restaurants and cafés,
notes: The apartment is fully equipped, including a washer-dryer that you can use to wash your clothes, a dish washer, and air-conditioning in the kitchen and the small bedroom.
transit: The bus stop #58 is 200 meters away and from there it takes 9 minutes to get to subway station De L'Eglise on the green line, which takes you to downtown Montreal in 10 to 15 minutes, depending on which station you exit. Another option during summer is to rent a Bixi bike (the closest station is 200 meters away) and ride all the way to downtown, staying on reserved bike paths almost all the way. This will take you about 30-40 minutes, again depending on your destination. Or you can take the Bixi up to the subway station (about 13 minutes).
access: You will have exclusive use of the entire apartment. We use an electronic lock so that you won't need to keep the apartment keys with you. At the time of reservation, please tell us which 4 digits of your choice you would like to use and I will program them in advance of your arrival.
interaction: I live in the other apartment on the first floor and I am usually present during the evenings in case you need any help or information about the area.
house_rules: This is a familial neighbourhood with young families living on each side of the apartment and so no noisy partying will be tolerated. PLEASE READ: Unfortunately, once in a while, I host a group which comes in late from a party and starts speaking loudly in the apartment, disturbing everyone around them. In that case, I will issue a single warning and then retain the security deposit if the group doesn't quiet down. Thanks for your understanding.

host.host_about: I am an avid runner and this area is perfect for running. I am sure that you will appreciate that and all the other advantages of my neighbourhood

reviews.comments: Great place with an even greater host! Carlos was very thorough in making sure we were comfortable and had everything we needed. The apartment is in a wonderful location. It's the 2nd house up from the water on a quiet street. Bike paths following the water are a wonderful place to run, bike and walk. The apartment has a newly renovated kitchen & bathroom. The kitchen has great quality pots & pans, a drip coffee maker and a Krups pump espresso machine for us caffeine addicts. The wall AC unit was great and will be very useful in the summer months. The non-renovated floors are a bit creaky, giving you an authentic Montreal feel.  All in all a wonderful place with a wonderful host.
Carlos is an excellent host and he did everything to make you feel comfortable.

i loved the apartment everything was clean and in its place. The neighborhood is great, very nice neighbors and you feel safe. Carlos was a great host and there to answer your questions when you needed him to find you way around. thank you so much Carlos...

Our accommodation on Clemenceau was exactly as described and as pictured in the photographs. The apartment was very, very clean, and incredibly quiet. The pictures do not do the kitchen and bathroom justice; they were both beautifully renovated. The kitchen was well equipped. We we had everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  The location was excellent for anyone who enjoys cycling or walking; only steps from the  riverfront trail and bird sanctuary. There is a public swimming pool within walking distance that is very cool.   Although the apartment is not located in the heart of Montreal, there is a bus stop a few minutes away with a short ride to the Metro (subway) to take you downtown. Getting to the heart of Montreal is easy by car. There was ample street parking.  Our host, Carlos was downstairs and was very amenable.  We would recommend this accommodation.

The house is exactly as advertised, in my opinion this is a unique house. The house combines,  historic charm - Wood floors and antique cupboards etc,  and upgraded kitchen and bathroom, which are absolutely wonderful. 

The Location of the house is also great, it is right next to st Lawrence river, which is also perk. 

 Ample parking is available on the street. 

Had a great stay, would recommend to friends and family.

Thank you so much to Carlos for making our experience to Montreal so great. My Kids love his place and it is just across the street for a Beautiful park. we rent bikes and enjoyed the sun.

The apartment is bright, has an eclectic mix of antique-style furniture and a very comfy beds. it is roomy and well-stocked. Kitchen & Bathroom is recently upgraded and real brand new.

Carlos was quick to respond to all my messages & very helpful. Really we didn't need much during the stay as just about everything was ready and available.

It was a pleasure to stay in his place and I would certainly come back. Would definitely recommend!

Très bel appartement, correspond à la description. La localisation est parfaite dans un quartier calme, au bord du St. Laurent et assez proche de Downtown Montréal.
L'hôte s'est bien soucié du bon déroulement de notre séjour. Ce logement est vraiment à conseiller!

Carlos's apartment is one of my best airbnb experience ever.  There are two spacious bedrooms with comfy beds and one queen- sofa bed, which was better than described.  It's very very clean and well maintenance.The kitchen and bathroom is very nice and clean. The plus  is surrounding area is very nice during the summer time. Carlos was very responsive and helpful. He even brought us an iron in the evening upon asking. We have a very good time stayed in his place. Thank you so much.
Prompt response and very courteous.

Perfect location by the lake side. 20 mins to the old town and same distances to Sherbrooke at. Nice deco of kitchen and bathroom. Carlos provided lots of usefully information. Good choices of staying here.

This is a beautiful and spacious apartment with brand new kitchen and bathroom. If you have a car it is the perfect location as it is close to a beautiful  river, to a mall, to a supermarket and to the subway station. It is a very quiet and family oriented area. You leave your car at the subway station and in 15 min you are downtown, Montreal. We loved the convenience.

My husband and I stayed here for about a week while kayaking in the lachine rapids.  It was an amazing stay.  The apartment was spacious and clean.  The location was beyond perfect.  After a day of surfing we could simply take out and walk across the street to the house.  This is probably one of the best air bnb listings for Montreal.  Carlos was responsive, accommodating and super nice.

This is the perfect place to stay in Montreal.  Lovely, well-appointed apartment, very clean & comfortable in a quiet neighborhood by the river.  Carlos is the perfect host - he made sure everything was OK when we arrived and let us know he was readily available if we needed anything.  Flexible check in/out made this a completely stress-free experience for our family.

This House is very nice on a good location. 15 mins driving to downtown. It is very clean. Carlos is very kind and quick to my question. He had prepared everything for living. I had a pleasant time in this house. I hope to reserve again for my next trip in Montreal and also recommend it to my friends

Carlos was a caring and welcoming host. He was available in person, by phone or e-mail in case we needed anything.  The apartment was a gem. It was a wonderful blend of the old and the new. The kitchen and bathroom were modern; both were very well-equipped. The in-heat flooring was great. We loved the view of the river and park from the front balcony and living room window.  The apartment is away from the hustle and bustle of downtown  Montreal and is in a very quiet and peaceful neighborhood. We were impressed by how clean the apartment  was. It was spotlessly clean; everything, everywhere. My family  loved the apartment and we would  recommend  it and Carlos  highly.

Séjour très agréable chez Carlos. L'appartement est charmant, confortable, et très bien équipé. On a apprécié la tranquillité des lieux et la proximité du fleuve, magnifique à cet endroit. Accueil sympathique de notre hôte. On recommande sans hésitation!
Loved the place, neat and clean. nice view of river. Awsome weather. Calm place to spend your holidays.

Perfekt quiet Place,very sweet Appartement and a super host.
If you have the chance,please book!
We were 3 persons, stay 2 nights.
Everything was perfekt!

Carlos was an excellent host. He was very helpful, and I felt very much at ease because he lived in the apartment below and checked in via text throughout the stay to make sure everything was okay. The apartment was very spacious and had all the amenities one could need.

Carlos fut un hôte formidable et accueillant. L'appartement est tel que décrit. Tout y est, c'est parfait. Bien équipé et propre. Le quartier est formidable, tranquille, et les accès au transport collectif et bixi à proximité. Collé sur la piste cyclable, vue sur le fleuve. On a trouvé à stationné en face facilement. Pour les amateurs, il est possible de kayaker à proximité.
The location of this place is fantastic, one of the best i've been to. It's very clean and it felt great. Would recommend to everyone.

The host, Carlos,  had his beautifully appointed place ready for us and invited us to leave our suitcases even though we arrived early. He had suggestions for food,  activities and shopping.  The neighborhood is clean, beautiful and accessible for walking, running and biking. We wish we could have had a longer stay!

We had a terrific 2-night stay in Carlos' apartment.  There's a terrific park across the street that follows the river, and it's near Metro stations to help transport you around the City without driving.  With all the construction going on, it was great to take buses and the Metro (on a day pass).  Carlos' place is well-equipped with all that you'll need, and communication with him was excellent.  A great "home away from home"!

Carlos é stato davvero un super host! 
Ho passato due settimane nel suo fantastico appartamento insieme ad una mia amica e non potrebbe essere andata meglio di così!
Carlos é stato davvero disponibile per ogni tipo di problema e soprattutto molto gentile con noi.
Ci ha consigliato dove acquistare buona parte delle cose per la casa è come muoverci per la cittá, cosa molto semplice dal suo appartamento.
La casa é in un quartiere residenziale molto tranquillo, ma in 30 minuti con autobus e metro si arriva in centro dove si trova di tutto.
Consiglio a tutti!

Carlos est un hôte attentif et réactif. Il nous a contacté avant le séjour pour nous donner toutes les indications facilitant notre arrivée.
Son appartement est situé dans une zone résidentielle très agréable, à 100 m d'une magnifique promenade sur les rives du Saint Laurent.
L'appartement est joli, bien agencé et bien décoré, la cuisine est magnifique et super bien équipée. L' A/C dans la cuisine est suffisamment puissant pour rafraichir tout le logement.
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Carlos mais il s'est tenu à notre disposition à tout moment pendant notre séjour un peu trop court.
Une belle découverte, merci Carlos.

The host was very friendly and helpful. The kitchen and bathroom were beautifully renovated, very clean and spotless With lots of linens and towels. The only issue we had was the futon and sofa bed which were uncomfortable to sleep. We were in this apartment in hot days and A/C in the kitchen was not enough. The host also provided 2 more portable A/Cs. Although they were noisy but helped a lot .

Carlos is an extremely friendly and helpful host, he gave us lots of informations and he helped us in a bag delay problem. The flat is very clean and full of every furniture you need.
The neighbourhood is quiet and safe, there are enough bars and shops to have everything close. Montreal downtown is about 15mins by car (we didn't take any public transport but there were a tube station very close to the apartment).
Super recommended!
Carlos met us at the door and was very welcoming, informative and helpful. The apartment was very clean, well equipped, comfortable and well positioned for the sight seeing we planned to do.

The apartment was exactly as advertised. My family and I enjoyed our stay immensely, especially the neighbourhood, which is beautiful, with the water and parks so close by. Carlos was welcoming and very helpful throughout our stay.

The place was fantastic and Carlos was a very hospitable host! The place was clean, spacious and had everything we needed for the stay. Great location near lots of amenities and parks. If we ever come back to Montreal, we would book this space again. Highly recommended!
Carlos was very accommodating and responsive. The apartment had everything we needed for our week in Montreal!

Carlos was a great host, and the apartment was fantastic. Clean, comfortable, spacious, and perfect location right on the river. We had an amazing time and I'd highly recommend this spot to anyone taking a trip to the area!

Carlos apartment was very clean and so quiet environment.
All you need for a short or long stay there is at the apartment.
And at last, Carlos is the best host that I ever seen.
We had an amazing stay, the host was very helpful and knowledgeable! The whole area was well kept and clean in all aspects!

I hadn't have a chance to meet Carlos but, he was very attentive! The place is amazing! I stayed here with my family. The place is warm during night and the outside of the house is breathtaking! My family loves it! I would love to stay here again!

Carlos was a wonderful host! He paid attention to detail, and was easily accessible. Everything was ready to go for our arrival, and he even left toiletries for our stay. 

He left a thoughtful gift for our honeymoon stay and made us feel like we were at home.
The host canceled this reservation 78 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Carlos is the nicest host you can find! Immediate on replies and very helpful. 
Apt itself is spacious, two bedrooms and like two dining rooms (or one but just huge).
Kitchen is fully equiped and even more... heated floore is awesome!
Apt's located in peacefull, calm area. Very close to water and parks. 2 minutes to the bus stop. But better consider this apt with a car if you want to go to downtown every day. 
We enjoyed our staying there. Thank you Carlos!

Carlos is a wonderful host and he communicates really well. His condo is clean and had fully stocked kitchen and located in wonderful residential area with easy access to public park and river. My kids loved walking and riding bicycle at the park. The condo is also located close to downtown Montreal with easy access to the town. We really enjoyed our stay and we would definitely visit again.

In our 3 weeks journey through Canada, this appartmemt was the best we stayed at. Highly recommended! Carlos is a very sympathetic and helpful host. 
Appartment is top equipped with everything needed; all clean and cosy. Location is beautifull, close to river and park. To town: car, bike !, or metro, all possible.
Great stay.  All the amenities, prompt response, nice quiet street.  Highly recommended!
Carlos is awesome and very sweet. Highly recommend.

A clean cosy apartment and Carlos is an ideal host - responsive, cordial and helpful.  He helped us by providing Metro cards for our use which was most appreciated - the apartment is a few bus stops from a Metro station so the cards enabled us to use public transport and the underground. The apartment is   warm, comfortable and 200 yards from the river.

The place is great and exactly as described. Nice green space basically across the street and close to most amenities. Taking public transit downtown was a breeze. Carlos was extremely quick responding to inquiries. Would not hesitate to stay here again. Thanks Carlos!

We spent 2 nights at Carlos' nice apartment, and took full advantage of all the unusual highlights that the neighborhood offers: jogging along the Lachine rapids, cycling to Montreal downtown using the Bixi bikes, dancing at the public dance floor at the St Lorence river. Carlos is very welcoming and made our stay comfortable. The apartment is exactly as described, very clean and convenient. For a special Montreal experience by bike this is the ideal place to stay.
Bel appartement, très propre, bien situé, près du fleuve et des transports. Hôte très gentil.

Excellent séjour à Montréal en grande partie grâce à l’appartement de Carlos. Plusieurs points à souligner : 1) bien situé, juste au bord de la rivière Saint Lawrence avec plein d’activités dans la verdure, en complément d’un paysage à la fois reposant et pittoresque;  2) déco très agréable et équipement de la cuisine très complet et il y a tout ce qu’il faut dans la SDB comme à la maision; 3) prise USB pour la recharge, très appréciée par les visiteurs français (surtout par ceux sans adaptateur de prise de courant); 4) clim disponible dans chaque pièce, incontournable pendant la canicule ; 5) facilité de transport en commun, bus 58 et ensuite métro à proximité ; 6) il est également simple de se garer dans la rue où se situe l’appartement et last but not least la réactivité et la disponibilité de l’hôte. On le recommande définitivement !
Great apartment in a beautiful location. Right on the river.  The place is great, well appointed, and Carlos is a gracious host. Highly recommended!
Exceptionally clean, comfortable, well stocked kitchen.  Carlos is a excellent communicator.  High recommended!

We had a great time staying at Carlos’s place - the property is just as advertised & shown in the photos. 
It is very close to the riverside where you can walk or cycle. The included bikes are great & we used them to cycle in to the old town one day - it took around 45 mins but it was a very leisurely cycle. There is also public transport very near by & I would definitely recommend leaving the car at the house. 
All in all I would not hesitate in recommending this property to anyone.
Located not far from downtown in a quiet community. Steps away from St. Lawrence. About 1 km to the Rapids Park. Spacious appartment.

Carlos’ place is exactly as described. Awesome appartment with all amenities with a great location for bikes, walks, paddleboard. Biking distance to Old Port. Very very clean. We will go back for sure!
Clean, well appointed full sized kitchen, plenty of space in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Modern bath with skylight. Highly recommended.

Excellent! 
Whenever we will be back to Montreal we will use Carlos flat again. 
Hihly recommended!
Carlos’ place is very clean and comfortable, check in is simple and communication quick and clear. Recommend!

name: Absolute beachfront in Manly!
summary: Stunning point blank ocean views from our bright and modern 2 bedroom apartment. Spacious living and dining flows out onto large balcony with sunny but cool North East aspect. Off street parking for one car and easy access to city transport including iconic Manly ferry. You won't be disappointed.
space: Positioned right on Manly Beach with stunning 180 degree ocean and beach views, this bright and sunny 2 bedroom, third floor apartment with elevator is only a few footsteps to the world famous Manly Beach and kids play areas. And just a short 10min level stroll to Manly Corso, the cafes, bars, restaurants, ferries, aquarium, harbour beaches and all other attractions Manly has to offer.
description: Stunning point blank ocean views from our bright and modern 2 bedroom apartment. Spacious living and dining flows out onto large balcony with sunny but cool North East aspect. Off street parking for one car and easy access to city transport including iconic Manly ferry. You won't be disappointed. Positioned right on Manly Beach with stunning 180 degree ocean and beach views, this bright and sunny 2 bedroom, third floor apartment with elevator is only a few footsteps to the world famous Manly Beach and kids play areas. And just a short 10min level stroll to Manly Corso, the cafes, bars, restaurants, ferries, aquarium, harbour beaches and all other attractions Manly has to offer. With two large double bedrooms, both with queen sized beds and built-in wardrobes, the apartment is ideal for one or two couples or one couple with up to two kids. There is a separate bathroom and toilet, bathroom with large bath and separate shower, internal laundry with washer/dryer, open plan kitchen with sto
access: With two large double bedrooms, both with queen sized beds and built-in wardrobes, the apartment is ideal for one or two couples or one couple with up to two kids. There is a separate bathroom and toilet, bathroom with large bath and separate shower, internal laundry with washer/dryer, open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, dishwasher, oven and fridge/freezer and seamless living/dining areas leading onto your large balcony with BBQ directly overlooking the beach!  Other features include off street parking for one car, a 65 inch Ultra HD LG LED TV with Foxtel Platinum package and Telstra high speed cable broadband internet with wi-fi.  Transport options include bus at your doorstep to ferry wharf and all other destinations, regular fast ferry that takes 18mins to city, opera house and harbour bridge.
interaction: You will have access to a dedicated manager full time during business hours for any issues during your stay and for key pick up/drop off. After hours key pick up/drop off can also be arranged with enough notice.
house_rules: No smoking inside Respect the neighbours - please keep your noise to a minimum

host.host_about:
We are a married couple with a baby daughter who enjoy travelling the world. But we love our place in Manly - and while we are away, we like to offer it up for others to enjoy. We love the fantastic lifestyle that Manly has to offer and are fortunate to be able to live and work in such an amazing part of the world. 

We hope that you will come and enjoy it too!

reviews.comments:
Jamie's apartment overlooking Manly Beach was right on the Ocean .Very open and spacious. Also very handy for local restaurants and shops.
Jamie was most welcoming and we had a great stay , although we were unlucky with the weather for a few days.
Would recommend this apartment for anyone who likes being near a beach.

I really enjoyed my stay at Jamie's , the view from the balcony is amazing, had my morning cup of tea and glass of wine in the evening sitting there.  Found it close to shops and restaurants. Very clean and spacious. I would love to stay again some day

name: Private Bedroom in Beautiful Apartment
summary: A Private Guest Bedroom in our comfortably designed duplex apartment with a garden, in a traditional Brownstone located in Harlem. Minutes from all major bus and subway transportation to all of Manhattan and an easy walk to local restaurants and Harlem sites.
space: Our newly renovated Duplex Apartment is in a quiet traditional Brownstone. We offer a Private Bedroom and Bathroom in Harlem at a reasonable price. You have a separate/private entrance to the apartment on the first floor, which opens just across from your room. Come and go as you please.   Look no further if Harlem is where you want to stay! GUEST BEDROOM_ The bedroom is on the 1st floor, receives bright light and features polished solid oak wood floors, high ceilings, a full size bed, fresh sheets and towels.  Tastefully designed with Mid-Century modern furnishings:  Russel Wright bed, night tables and a small desk. The desk area is a perfect little work space.  There is  an oversized closet with hangers and plenty of room for all your luggage and personal belongings. YOUR PRIVATE BATHROOM_  Your private bathroom with soaking tub (take a warm bath and relax), is located downstairs on the Garden Floor next to the kitchen.   Fresh towels and shampoo are provided.  THE APARTMENT Our apar
description: A Private Guest Bedroom in our comfortably designed duplex apartment with a garden, in a traditional Brownstone located in Harlem. Minutes from all major bus and subway transportation to all of Manhattan and an easy walk to local restaurants and Harlem sites. Our newly renovated Duplex Apartment is in a quiet traditional Brownstone. We offer a Private Bedroom and Bathroom in Harlem at a reasonable price. You have a separate/private entrance to the apartment on the first floor, which opens just across from your room. Come and go as you please.   Look no further if Harlem is where you want to stay! GUEST BEDROOM_ The bedroom is on the 1st floor, receives bright light and features polished solid oak wood floors, high ceilings, a full size bed, fresh sheets and towels.  Tastefully designed with Mid-Century modern furnishings:  Russel Wright bed, night tables and a small desk. The desk area is a perfect little work space.  There is  an oversized closet with hangers and plenty of room for al
neighborhood_overview: Just blocks away from Central Park and The Apollo, this area is home to some of New York's most celebrated bars, cocktail lounges, restaurants and jazz clubs!   A friendly character filled neighborhood, nearby to some of the best restaurants in Harlem: Red Rooster, Social Corner and BLVD.  PARKS Morningside Park  Conservatory Garden Central Park Marcus Garvey Park ATTRACTIONS Apollo Theater  Studio Museum in Harlem  Museum of The City of New York El Museo Del Barrio Museum Mile Cathedral of Saint John the Divine  Grant's Tomb  Riverside Church  Columbia University  RESTAURANTS Red Rooster  Sylvia's Soul Food  Amy Ruth's Babbalucchi's  BLVD Social Corner Chez Lucienne FOOD SHOPPING The Harlem Market Best Food Whole Foods Pioneer Super Market CAFES Lenox Coffee
notes: The apartment is very quiet and peaceful. On our block is a beautiful neighborhood garden which is open to everyone.
transit: New York is a city to be explored on foot. Our first suggestion would be to walk to where you want to go, walk everywhere and anywhere in Manhattan. If you do want to use public transportation, we are conveniently located in Central Harlem to all major bus and subway lines and can take you to any corner of the city.      The Subway and Buses are both within few minutes walk from the apartment at the corner of 125th and Lenox Avenue.  You can take the 2 or the 3 Express train to Times Square in under 10 minutes • Subway_2 and 3 trains at Lenox Ave. and 125th St. • Subway_4,5 and 6 trains at Lexington Ave. and 125th St. • Subway_A,B, C or D trains at St. Nicolas Ave. and 125th St. • Buses_ On 125th St., Crosstown East or West • Buses_ On Lenox Ave., Will take you Uptown or Downtown.  • Other Transportation_Yellow Taxis, Green Taxis, Livery Cabs and UBER. • Citibike_Just on the corner, Citibike station. Best way to see NYC!
access: Dear Guest,      We want your stay to be  comfortable and relaxing. You are welcome to use all of the following areas and amenities in our home. Located on the Garden Floor: • Living Room  • Dining Room  • Kitchen, Dishwasher, Microwave, Range, Refrigerator.    • Private Guest Bathroom. Only for use by guest. Located on the First Floor: • Guest Bedroom • Complimentary Coffee, Tea • Complimentary WiFi • Fresh sheets and towels
interaction: Peter and I are available most any time to answer your questions. Peter has lived in New York for over 35 years and a great source of information about the city. Between the two of us, we speak English, Spanish and French.  If you prefer your privacy, we won't bother you, come and go as you please. We both live and at times work in the apartment. Florence travels to Europe and is not always in New York. If we are working at home, our office is in the back just off the garden.    Jolie and Duval are our pets, a beautiful Bengal cat and lovely old pug. Both are unobtrusive, charming and easy going. They'll be of no bother or disturbance to you. Relax, enjoy our home and your stay in New York.
house_rules: Welcome to Harlem and New York. We trust you'll enjoy your stay with us!      Here is a some important information during the time you are here.      Call or email with any questions or concerns. (email hidden) (phone number hidden) Best, Florence and Peter Dear Guest, Please take a minute to review the following. ARRIVAL and DEPARTURE 1. CHECK IN:  1pm - 8pm.  CHECK OUT: by 11:00 a.m. If these times are not convenient we will do our best to accommodate you. Please let us know what your needs are. 2. HOUSE KEYS: Three (3) Keys Total. One (1) front door key (for the Brownstone) and two (2) keys for your apartment door. 3. KEYS RETURN: Leave keys in your room. HOUSE RULES      Let's keep it simple. Please leave the apartment and your room as you found it and we ask you to do just a few things during your stay and just before you leave      Respect and be considerate of your neighbors. Quiet please after 10pm. 1. PLEASE STRIP THE BED: Leave on bed all used linens, sheets/pillowcases & tow

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
About Florence.
I am a French communication consultant, traveling between Paris and Harlem. 

About my husband, Peter.
I am a restaurateur, designer and artist working primarily in New York City. I've lived here for the past 30 years and have always considered this great city my home.
When you can't find us  in Manhattan we're either on Vieques or in upstate New York, where we a lovely historic Dutch stone house.

Life is about paying attention and how you choose to experience every moment, one day at a time.

reviews.comments: Great place, exactly as depicted in the photos. Florence and Peter are friendly hosts with good knowledge of local coffee and jazz spots. Large space with private entrance, good value, nicely furnished and only a few blocks from two subway stations.

Florence and Peter were wonderful hosts! They were so kind and generous with their home. They were not overbearing at all and give you as much space and privacy as you like. The entire home is very warm and inviting. The bedroom and private bathroom are very clean and quiet. The neighborhood is nice and has many cafe's and places to eat within walking distance. We definitely recommend this Airbnb!

Everything was wonderful - the district is legendary Harlem with a jazz atmosphere and nice people, the apartment is stylish place with cute vintage furniture, and fantastic owners - Florence and Peter! The best place - small and cheerful portal to real New York. Recommend it to all people with good taste:)

Wonderful hosts!  a NYC native and a Frenchwoman made for a home-like long term stay for me.  They allowed me to keep to myself and took care of every concern at a moment's notice.  they made a tough, competitive summer internship a little easier.

Felt very  welcomed and at ease in their home. They were great hosts, made sure we were settled and had everything we needed! 
Amenities were also very good. Very accurately described and represented in photos.

The hosts were flexible with my reservation when I decided to leave early. We had some misunderstanding about the layout of the space, and now they have updated their description to clarify it. 

The neighborhood is great and the apartment was nicely designed and clean.

Peter and Florence are great hosts. This was my first trip to NYC, and because of their welcoming hospitality, it will not be my last. Because we felt at home, my husband and I had a great time getting to know Harlem in celebration of our wedding anniversary.

Florence and Peter are excellent hosts. The room was better than what I expected. It was super quiet and very spacious. A real gem in NYC. Both Florence and Peter were available and easy to communicate with. Their home is very close to great restaurants and also close too the express subway to midtown Manhattan. A very easy and enjoyable stay!
Totalmente a gusto con mi estancia, Peter es súper amigable y su departamento es muy lindo, buena ubicación y el vecindario tiene mucha onda. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
Florence and Peter were great hosts! Always with a smile on their faces, and answers and tips about the city and the house. It was a great stay and definitely want to go back!

Excellent séjour chez Florence et Peter.
La chambre était aux attendus : propre et confortable et l'accueil très chaleureux. 
Florence et Peter étaient disponibles pour nous renseigner sur les endroits et visites à recommander. Tous les matins, un café nous été proposé.... un séjour "comme à la maison" qui nous a fait vivre une vraie expérience New-yorkaise. 
Le quartier est idéal pour se déplacer facilement dans le cœur de Manhattan.

Adresse à recommander chaudement !
Florence and Peter are amazing people, they were very helpful and friendly. The place was spot on and cozy, we had a five stars trip  and we can not wait to go back.
El departamento tiene mucho estilo, Peter y florence som excelentes anfitriones, siempre están atentos . Es muy seguro llegar a cualquier hora. Ampliamente recomendable.

O lugar é bem no centro do Harlem, perto do metrô, bem acessível e com todo tipo de comércio por perto. A casa é uma graça, o quarto bem bacana (no segundo piso, e o banheiro privativo no primeiro, há uma escada). E Florence e Peter são simpáticos e gentis.

Florence and Peter are excellent hosts. They will make you feel like their home is your home. Both make appropriate recommendations for things to do and where to get things around the neighborhood. They check-in with you, but are also very respectful of your privacy -- Their home helped get through a very intense summer school session. They have to pets a dog and a cat. Both are sweet and friendly. Thank you both!
The host canceled this reservation 61 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Appartement joliment décoré et très agréable à vivre. Péter et Florence parlent très bien français et nous mettent très vite à l'aise. Nous étions comme chez nous. Chambre et salle de bain personnelles. Situé proche de plusieurs lignes de métro pour se rendre rapidement dans le centre ou le Sud de Manhattan. Nous avons utilisé la cuisine pour nous préparer quelques repas. Les hôtes sont discrets au quotidien et se tiennent à notre disposition pour tout renseignement sur New York et Harlem. Très bon séjour chez eux. Nous recommandons +++

Hemos disfrutado de nuestra estadia en el hogar de Peter y Florence. Siempre muy respetuosos nos hacian sentir como en nuestra casa y estaban atentos a nuestras necesidades. Florence nos acompaño en todo momento, hasta en el detalle del transporte de vuelta y pudimos tener con ella  muy gratas conversaciones (a pesar de nuestras dificultades con el inglés). Los super recomendamos como huespedes y fue nuestra mejor elección para conocer la ciudad.

We have enjoyed our stay at the home of Peter and Florence. Always very respectful they made us feel at home and were attentive to our needs. Florence accompanied us at all times, even in the detail of the transport back and we could have with her very pleasant conversations (despite our difficulties with English). We highly recommend them as guests and it was our best choice to get to know the city.

A great space with a comfortable bed and good hanging space. The private bathroom was terrific and the shared area, very comfortable. Our host was very helpful with information and greeted us warmly. Buses and the subway were within a few minutes walk and Central park not much further.

Gorgeous, immaculate, and the location a few minutes walk from everything one might need:  transport, groceries, great restaurants,drug store, banks; and Peter was instantly responsive to any questions I had.  I’ll always be checking here first when I visit New York.  Just great.

name: Make Old Halewia Town Your Basecamp
summary: We rent 2 rooms in our wonderful three bedroom, two bath house located five minutes from Haleiwa Ali'i Beach Park and all the great sights around the North Shore of O'ahu. Animal lover and your own transportation are a must. Single/double rates available.
space: We have a wonderful fully rennovated three bedroom, two bath plantation cottage, located in the heart of Historic Haleiwa Town - five minutes from Haleiwa and Ali'i Beach Parks and the Haleiwa Boat Harbor. Even though we are in the heart of Historic Haleiwa Town, we are tucked away and surrounded by open space. We are within walking distance to all of the shops, grocery store, health food store, and restaurants around Old Haleiwa Town. We have 5 organic gardens, fruit trees, full kitchen, hot outside shower surrounded by orchids, claw foot bathtub, covered Lanai with outdoor seating, ample parking, 2 rescue dogs, and a few outside rescue cats. Pet friendly is a must and you should have your own transportation. Single and double occupancy rooms are available upon request and prices will vary. We do have two rooms available so check with us even if we appear to be booked - we may have space. Contacts can be seen at Foundwood.
description: We rent 2 rooms in our wonderful three bedroom, two bath house located five minutes from Haleiwa Ali'i Beach Park and all the great sights around the North Shore of O'ahu. Animal lover and your own transportation are a must. Single/double rates available. We have a wonderful fully rennovated three bedroom, two bath plantation cottage, located in the heart of Historic Haleiwa Town - five minutes from Haleiwa and Ali'i Beach Parks and the Haleiwa Boat Harbor. Even though we are in the heart of Historic Haleiwa Town, we are tucked away and surrounded by open space. We are within walking distance to all of the shops, grocery store, health food store, and restaurants around Old Haleiwa Town. We have 5 organic gardens, fruit trees, full kitchen, hot outside shower surrounded by orchids, claw foot bathtub, covered Lanai with outdoor seating, ample parking, 2 rescue dogs, and a few outside rescue cats. Pet friendly is a must and you should have your own transportation. Single and double occupa
neighborhood_overview: We live in a small, Historic town thats about a mile long and plays host to the fabled North Shore and the "Seven Mile Miracle " Global surfing mecca. Things get quiet around 9pm as all shops and food establishments shut down around that time. It is a very safe community but guest are urged to take precautions with valuables.
notes: We are an Eco-Friendly home. We ask that you be energy and waste conservative. We recommend a reusable water bottle - we provide filtered water for the house. If you don't want to travel with one we have one you can borrow. We like to compost all fruit and veggie waste and provide a container for that when you cook. We also have a huge clothesline - feel free to use it for your beach towels and swimsuits, and even for your freshly washed laundry. Smoking outside only and away from windows. Most homes in Hawaii are open air and do not have climate control. Every room has large double sash windows and ceiling fans. Air conditioning is available in August and September only with a window unit.
transit: Guests must have their own transportation. Parking is onsite.
access: There will be access to Wifi and a wireless printer, a full kitchen, washer and dryer, gardens of fresh organic fruits and vegetables in the yard, an occasional night time fire pit, bicycles, and loving cats and dogs. We have bath and beach towels for you so you don't need to pack them. Since we have two rooms available please check with us on availability even if we show unavailable on the calendar.
interaction: There will be interactions with guest. We are artists and have a backyard wood shop. We host occasional dinner parties and local celebrities will make appearances from time to time.

host.host_about: We are a well traveled, nature and ocean loving eco-conscious couple.  We love meeting new people, sharing local knowledge, playing with our animals and spending time in the gardens.  With backgrounds in marine biology and sports broadcasting, we are now wood workers (Foundwood) and run our business from home. We love to cook - especially the food we grow, hunt, or catch.  Come hang out with us!

reviews.comments: Tai and Jen were awesome hosts!  They were were incredibly welcoming and knew exactly when to chat with us about local tips and when to give us our privacy and space, as needed.  They are the epitome of true Hawaiian locals- they have a large garden, cook fresh fish, and exude the true aloha spirit!  Their house sits on a beautiful, lush space and is walking distance to all our favorite spots in Haleiwa town.

Great place, great people, clean and relaxed. Super close to all (Website hidden by Airbnb) easy walk anywhere.
This is where I'll be staying next time I'm on the North Shore.

I couldn't have asked for a better experience than the one I had with Jen and Tai. They were so incredibly hospitable and welcomed me not only into their home but into their lives. Their house is beautiful, clean, and spacious, with a gorgeous bathroom and perfect bedroom. I stayed there for over a month and it was exactly what I was looking for. Jen and Tai have pets, but my allergies weren't bothered at all the entire time I was there, even when I cuddled with the dogs! The location was absolutely perfect, since you're right in Haleiwa town, but also off the main road enough that it feels private and secure. Jen and Tai will make you feel like an insider instead of a tourist and will make sure you know the best things to see/do/eat while in Hawaii! They know everything and everyone in the area so they will take care of you. I will definitely be recommending Jen and Tai to any friends heading to Hawaii, and will absolutely be contacting them next time I am visiting!!

Tai and Jen are super super nice couple and so gentle, kind and (Website hidden by Airbnb) was awesome house.
They have many cats and dog which are so lovely and nice character.I really like cat and dog , so much happy to stay there. I will stay here next time.

Tai & Jen were wonderful and so accommodating. The place was very clean, and the outdoor shower was amazing! The location is near restaurants and shops. You will for sure need a car to get around. But loved their place.

Wer wirklich etwas über das Leben auf Hawaii erfahren möchte, ist bei Jen und Tai genau richtig. Warmherzig und großzügig haben die beiden mich an ihrem Leben teilhaben lassen. Besonders spannend war zu sehen, wie  ein nachhaltiger Lebensstil auch in Hawaii möglich ist. Das Zimmer ist - wie das ganze Haus - liebevoll eingerichtet, die Außendusche zwischen Orchideen und Anthurien ein Erlebnis. Natürlich ist alles sauber. Das Haus ist ein renoviertes altes Plantagenhaus in netter Nachbarschaft. Strand, Shops, Restaurants, Bars, alles ist fußläufig erreichbar. Trotz der tollen Lage mitten in Haleiwa liegt das Haus ruhig, etwas abseits der Hauptstraße. Es gibt keinen Durchgangsverkehr und Touristen verirren sich kaum hierher. Das Haus ist nichts für Tierhaarallergiker und man muss Hunde wirklich mögen.
The host canceled this reservation 100 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Tai and Jen are a lovely couple. They were welcoming and helpful with tips for things to do/places to go. I stayed in a clean, pretty, quiet bedroom and really enjoyed the outdoor shower.  Nice location within walking distance of shops, restaurants, and beach. They are very generous. They made sure ahead of time that I am comfortable with rescue dogs, which I am.

If you want to spend a great time on Oahu, living a real nice and relaxed Hawaiin Life at the north shore you have to go to Tai and Jen! There are great hosts, providing a lot of local information, are friendly and keeping a nice balance of spending time together and giving you freedom. You have to be pet friendly, as they live together with 3 dogs (Taco is barking quite a lot, but a lovely dog) and a few cats. We would always come back.
Wonderful place and great location. So easy to walk into town for food or drinks, and a short walk to the beach. Highly recommend and hope to come back soon :)

name: Great UWS Studio Apartment
summary: Come stay in this great spacious studio in Prime Upper West Side location... Beautiful tree lined street and very close to Parks, Restaurants and Subway (1 Train). Unit is on 1st floor and fully furnished... Please email any questions you may have..
description: Come stay in this great spacious studio in Prime Upper West Side location... Beautiful tree lined street and very close to Parks, Restaurants and Subway (1 Train). Unit is on 1st floor and fully furnished... Please email any questions you may have..

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: I was about an hour late getting over to Gino's place for the key handoff and he didn't blink an eye.  Gino checked in about mid-week to see how it was going, and when I texted him for the wifi password, he responded in minutes.  The place itself is a great, reasonably priced, apartment with a small private kitchenette and a small private bath.  Best of all, it is nice and quiet.

This was my first time using Airbnb and Gino provided a great experience. Gino responded to my reservation request in less the 30 mins. When I met Gino to receive the keys, he was very nice and accommodating. The apartment was very clean and offered exactly what a nice weekend in New York called for; being close to the subway by 2 blocks, Central Park, restaurants, movies and other activities within a very short walking distance. Gino was  very responsive to any inquiry during the stay and it was much appreciated. Gino even accommodated a later checkout than we originally discussed due to a slight change in my schedule. Overall, the apartment is in a very clean and safe neighborhood of NY. Thanks again Gino for making my stay comfortable, convenient and accommodating!!!

Worts host of airbnb
Worst place of airbnb

name: Lovely home with parking spot!
summary: Beautiful flat in an older (1928) duplex in the heart of popular Monkland Village area. 1300 sq feet; two bedrooms (one master, one child’s room), lots of light, wood floors throughout, big balcony in back with barbecue! Step away from shops & cafés.
description: Beautiful flat in an older (1928) duplex in the heart of popular Monkland Village area. 1300 sq feet; two bedrooms (one master, one child’s room), lots of light, wood floors throughout, big balcony in back with barbecue! Step away from shops & cafés.

reviews.comments: Lovely large airy apartment in a very good part of Montreal. Good transport connections. Everything nearby on Monkland, including a good coffee shop. Barbecue and back deck directly off kitchen so very pleasant. Initially not as clean as we are used to with air B and B, but Kristin sorted this as soon as we raised it sending the cleaning company, and was in touch throughout to check that things were Ok. There is a problem with the second bedroom window, which lacks an insect screen, a necessity particularly in summer. The 2 double bedrooms are fine, but the sofa/bed is not comfortable. Subject to these points being fixed, we recommend this.

name: The city cabin
summary: Have you ever stayed at a cabin in the woods or mountains? Thanks to AirBnb I have and loved it. My aim is to capture that simplicity and energy in the city that never sleeps. The apartment itself is in a 1930 building located in Ridgewood Queens' Historic District. Steps from the Myrtle Avenue shopping strip, minutes from Williamsburg and Bushwick and a quick train ride into Manhattan. This space offers a relaxing haven for guests while providing a straight shot into Brooklyn and the city.
space: My humble home which takes shape and form with each passing day. It reflects my appreciation for art, books, music and tranquility. A spacious apartment in a very quiet building. An escape from the busy lights but close enough to enjoy them whenever the mood strikes.
description: Have you ever stayed at a cabin in the woods or mountains? Thanks to AirBnb I have and loved it. My aim is to capture that simplicity and energy in the city that never sleeps. The apartment itself is in a 1930 building located in Ridgewood Queens' Historic District. I'm a text message away and normally check with guests to make sure they're enjoying themselves. Close to cafe's, restaurants, wine bars this is a quaint
neighborhood_overview: Close to cafe's, restaurants, wine bars this is a quaint and residential neighborhood. It's on the Brooklyn Queens border so you have the best of both worlds.
notes: It's a quiet building with very thin walls so noise must be kept to a minimum. No parties or visitors allowed.
transit: L train stop at Myrtle-Wycoff M train stop at Seneca M train stop at Forest  Close to bus hub at Myrtle-Wycoff

interaction: I'm a text message away and normally check with guests to make sure they're enjoying themselves.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I'm a laid back, clean and organized guy. I run my own business from home. Although I'm generally a very relaxed person, I like to keep a clean and tidy apartment where everyone is respectful of the shared space.

reviews.comments: Jerry was a great and attentive host. He was able to accommodate my last minute request. The space is well located near 2 subway lines, and is really comfortable!
Jerry was extremely helpful in checking and checking out and had a spacious place to stay close to many of the big attractions of the city! Overall a great stay!
The place was a great stay just hard to find parking

Jerry is a fantastic host who met me at the apartment. He was quick to respond to all of my questions.  The neighborhood is close to L and M trains making it easy to get around Brooklyn and to Mahatten. I will definitely recommend this location to my friends.
Location is the best if you don't want to see only manhattan.  Neighborought extrememy quiet wich is fine.

Jerry was a great host.. He was always available via text and responds within minutes, even super late on a Saturday night! The apartment is very spacious, nicely decorated, and is located in a quiet neighborhood in an old building built in the 1930s. Keeping that in mind, the floor creaks when you walk on it and the walls are super thin.. you can hear the neighbors in the apartment above you and right next to you so you often find yourself tip toeing and whispering to avoid making any noise yourself. Other than that, it was an overall pleasant stay, easily accessible by subway with the M train only a 5 min walk away and the L train only 10 min away.
Jerry and his place were great. Would recommend!
Its a good place to stay except the noisy neighbors

Jerry was the perfect host. Very easy to contact and quick to answer. The place is big, close to the subway and some delis where you can find food 24/24 ! I spent a very great time with my girlfriend :)
Convenient. Affordable. Easy communication.
Our accommodation was great. Jerry is attentive, the house was clean and close to the subway. The house has everything you need. We recommend.

Recomiendo al 100% este apartamento, esta muy cerca del metro y Jerry es muy servicial. La zona es tranquila y segura. Si vuelvo a nueva york volvería a alojarme en este apartamento. Gracias por todo Jerry!!!
Great

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay at Jerry's place. We took a little walk the evening we got there to grab some groceries and we saw little kids dancing on the sidewalk, and we knew we were going to like our stay. The neighborhood felt very safe no matter how late we got back. 

Jerry's place is huge. We utilized the office area and the wardrobe provided. The kitchen has everything you could need. The only things to consider would be that it gets pretty warm in the apartment in the summer, Jerry provided fans and we were pretty comfortable. Also, the shower is a bit finicky. But those are easy concessions to be made when it's so convenient to the train, many groceries and restaurants, and you feel safe. 

Last but not least, Jerry is awesome! Super easy to communicate with and a really nice guy. We didn't need his help a whole lot (except for when we accidentally unplugged the internet), but he checked on us and made sure we were enjoying our stay. I would definitely recommend Jerry's Place to anyone and everyone!
The Subway is a 15 minute walk and There were insects in the house.
Jerry was very nice! I spent an amazing in NYC with my girlfriend, we recommend this airbnb!

loved his place! very clean and well kept. lots of cool decorations, books and even had a plug to hook your phone to tv which was neat. nice area with restaurants and small markets within walking distance. easy to get around and felt very safe in his area even late at night. very responsive and checked in to make sure we had a great trip. jerry is an awesome host and would absolutely recommend for visiting in nyc!

Jerry's place was perfect if you don't mind (we didn't) a 10 minute walk to and from the subway. Jerry's apartment was huge, clean, and had everything you could need. The neighborhood is safe and incredibly vibrant. I would recommend this place to everyone looking to visit the city but stay away from the hub bub.

I had a great experience staying at Jerry's apartment. Jerry is responsive when communicating. The apartment is within walking distance to the L and M trains. Also close to grocery stores, coffee shops and laundry mats. It is a relatively quiet neighborhood. All cooking supplies (pots, pans, spatula, spices) were available. There was also a good quality blender for smoothies. An Apple HDMI adapter is there to watch movies on TV. Affordable price for someone who wants to stay in Brooklyn.

Jerry war wirklich sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Das Appartement liegt nah an der M und L Train, welche direkt nach Manhattan fahren (Fahrzeit zum Times square circa 40 Minuten). Die Nachbarn kann man jedoch hin und wieder hören, da das Gebäude schon etwas älter ist.
The apartment is decent. Some minor fixes can make it a lot better. The location is about 45 mins from Times Square and situated in a nice area in Ridgewood. Overall it was a good stay!

This apartment is in a good location in ridgewood, a peaceful neighborhood with a lot of families. The apartment itself is pretty calm and modest- there didn't seem to be wifi, the bed is ok. A good place to come back and fall asleep after a long day. Jerry is communicative and nice.

Jerry's place is perfect ! 
Near to metro, minimarket... Very clean, lovely.

And Jerry is nice and arranging ! 
I recommend this Airb'n'b.

Jerry's place was very good - very spacious for a New York apartment. The kitchen has everything you'll need to make quick meals and we found the house clean and tidy. The location is a bit far from the typical tourist spots, but I would absolutely recommend this place for anyone looking for an affordable place to stay.

Jerry's place was very clean, and very warm! Which was very nice since it was freezing outside during our stay. He met up with us in a very timely manner and even went out of his way to get us a bottle of champagne for the New Year. The place was very close the public transportation and it's in a decent neighborhood. I would definitely recommend his place to anybody!
Place is great, cheap, close to subway and big grocery store. Nice option to stay for a week or more. Jerry is very helpful and nice host!
It was a cute space, a perfect place to crash! Definitely warm and toasty even in the snow

Had an excellent stay at Jerry’s cabin - quirky and authentic decor and perfectly located for touring around Brooklyn / Queens and easy access to Manhattan!
Great communication, with easy pick up and drop off for keys. Thanks Jerry!

Thanks for the great accommodations, Jerry. The place was as advertised, homey with lots of interesting touches. The kitchen had a ton of things we were able to use when we cooked and the bed was comfortable. There were some audible noises coming from other apartments but even that had some old school appeal. My boyfriend and I also really enjoyed the neighborhood and tried a few of "Jerry's Picks" which were all very cool. Definitely would recommend to a friend.

Jerry is een geweldige host. We konden niet anders dan laat inchecken (vanwege het uur waarop we landen in JFK Airport). Hij maakte er geen enkel probleem van. Ook antwoordde hij onmiddellijk op mijn berichten en checkte hij af en toe of alles naar wens verliep. Zijn appartement bevindt zich dicht bij enkele metrostations (enorm handig om Manhattan te gaan verkennen) en is gelokaliseerd in een rustige en veilige buurt, voorzien van vele winkels, ontbijtzaken, etc. Je vindt er voor elk wat wils. Het appartement bevond zich in een oud gebouw met houten vloeren, wat wel zijn charmes had. Het was proper en voorzien van alles. Het enige minpuntje voor ons was dat we de verwarming niet konden regelen. Ze sloeg 's nachts plots aan en dan kon je niet meer goed slapen door de warmte (het was er verschrikkelijk warm). Helaas kon Jerry hier niets aan doen. Hij gaf ons wel de tip om de ramen open te zetten.
The place is well situated

Jerry's place was perfect for what we needed for a long weekend trip to Brooklyn. He was very responsive and helpful, and we arrived to a clean apartment with fresh towels waiting for us. Great host and location.

Great stay at Queens, the flat is cozy and has everything you may need. The neighbourhood is calm and with some delicious coffees and restaurants near by. From there is super easy to get to Manhattan or Brooklyn. 
Jerry is a great host, and super easy to communicate with.
Great location not too far from the train station and food spots.
good

Le logement de Jerry est situé dans un quartier résidentiel proche de 2 lignes de métro qui vont directement à Manhattan. Le quartier est calme, et les voisins silencieux.
L"appartement est petit et peu lumineux mais cela lui donne un petit coté cosy.
Depuis l'aéroport , l"accès n"est pas possible directement par shuttle, il faut prévoir soit un taxi, soit un shuttle sur Manhattan puis  le métro.
Jerry is great! Thank you so much!

Our stay at Jerry's place was great! It felt extremely homey. The only downside would be the closeness of an a commecting but blocked off apartment near the bedroom. Other than that, everything was perfect and convenient and Jerry was a great host!!
Jerry is a very personable guy who will make sure you are comfortable when staying in his place.

We enjoyed staying at Jerry’s place! It feels like a real home, not a hotel, and was clearly put together by people with passion for music, culture, and politics. 

Jerry was an excellent communicator. I would recommend his place to others, but beware that sleeping without air conditioning during New York summer is not for the faint of heart!
Jerry was awesome!!!! Thank you for everything, what a great, convenient place to stay!
Jerry es un gran anfitrión, la estancia estuvo de acuerdo a lo esperado.

Communication was excellent!
Jerry's place was just what we needed for an overnight stay.

Great apartment, I’ve been there 10 days with my gf to visit NYC. 

The location is fine, it’s less than 10min by walk to a metro who go direct to manhattan. And the neighborhood is fine you’ll not visit a lot of things just next to the apartment but it feel secure and have some useful shops.

The apartment is tall and clean, and I appreciate the fact it’s fully furnished, to cook for example.

And Jerry was a nice and accommodating host.

Anyway, I recommend !
It was a great place to stay for a reallly good price. Apartment close to the subway, around 40 minute to be directly to the rockfeller center

Unterkunft ist betagt. Nachbarwohnungen sind hellhörig.
Super Anbindung nach Manhatten. Vom JFK zur Unterkunft war es schwierig mit dem Bus. Fahrt kostet 11 Coins p.P., aber wir hatten nur Scheine getauscht und mussten das Geld erbetteln. Also falls ihr mit den Öffis fahren wollt, erwerbt vorher Metrokarten an einem Automaten auf dem FH und ladet die auf. Je Fahrt 2,75 USD. Jerry war super nett und hat auf uns gewartet, weil wir später kamen, weil der Flug und die Busse später kamen. Tausend Danke dafür! :-)

A warm and cozy cabin experience is exactly what this place offers. This is a great getaway from the pace of the city, providing well deserved rest after a full day. The feeling of waking up, walking up seneca and getting breakfast was a joy to experience.  

Additional amenities for my stay included toothpaste (rare) and puzzle. There was a ghostbusters puzzle in progress and taking time to place pieces towards the big picture was very relaxing. Maybe you who are reading this will be the ones to complete the puzzle!

I would absolutely recommend this place. The entire apartment is yours, including a private bathroom. There is a apple tv that includes Netflix so you have some entertainment. And most importantly, the apartment is very clean. My one minor take back is that the bedroom is connected to another apartments bedroom and is only divided by a single close door so, you can hear every single word and foot steps on the other side, and of course vice versa. But overall I enjoyed my stay.

name: B & W room close to Sydney CBD airport, Sydney Uni
summary: My four bedroom home is located centrally to city, beach, airport, walking distance to several music venues, restaurants, pubs and cafes. I share my home with my sons when they are not travelling and my cat  Jet. Also "Room Close to city and airport"
space: Conveniently located near train station with easy access to city and beach. Room has a double bed for two people. An additional single mattress can be provided for a small fee for an extra person if required. We have two bathrooms which are shared but often guests have a bathroom to themselves. Please check prior to booking if this is a preference. You might like to check my other listed rooms with more photos "Room close to Sydney CBD/airport" "Welcoming room close to Sydney CBD/airport"

Room has a double bed for two people. An additional single mattress can be provided for a small fee for an extra person if required. We have two bathrooms which are shared but often guests have a bathroom to themselves. Please check prior to booking if this is a preference. You might like to check my other listed rooms with more photos "Room close to Sydney CBD/airport" "Welcoming room close to Sydney CBD/airport" You are welcome to use our kitchen and space can be made available in the fridge. We have two bathrooms which are shared. You are free to use the lounge room and watch television or listen to music or just relax. Laundry facilities are available. An outdo
neighborhood_overview: Sydenham is in the Inner West of Sydney and a very cosmopolitan, multicultural, eclectic area. The train station is two minute walk from my home and a pub with a good restaurant and entertainment is just across the road from the station. A popular jazz venue Camelot, is a five minute walk. The beach is 15 minutes by car. It is 15 minutes by train to the city of Sydney for you to explore Darling Harbour, Circular Quay, the Opera House, the Harbour Bridge and all the nightlife and venues of this beautiful city. The airport is 15 minutes by car or 30 minutes by train. There are several music venues, restaurants, clubs, pubs and cafes within walking distance. Central station is 9 minutes away where you can take buses to the Blue Mountains, Jenolan Caves, Snowy Mountains and trains to country areas and outside the Sydney Metropolitan area such as Newcastle. There are bus services to Coogee Beach and University of New South Wales. There is a park in the rear of my home and Sydney Park is a 1
notes: We are under the flight path as we are very convenient to the airport. This means we have planes which fly low at times. Sydney airport has a curfew from 11pm to 6am so no planes fly at this time. We have never had a problem with people sleeping well here but it is important for you to know. Please note we have a cat. I also have another room available  "Room Close to City and airport." "welcoming room in home Sydney CBD,airport
transit: Sydenham is a major train station and buses, taxis and Uber are available. The airport is 15 minutes by car.
access: You are welcome to use our kitchen and space can be made available in the fridge. We have two bathrooms which are shared. You are free to use the lounge room and watch television or listen to music or just relax. Laundry facilities are available. An outdoor area looks out to a pretty park.
interaction: I am presently travelling though  you will be looked after by my co-host Dion. Together we can communicate and respond to your questions. Amelia and Dion are both very busy professionals and you may only see them running in between commitments sport and work but please say hi and they will be happy to help with information.
house_rules: We do not have too many rules. Price is for a maximum of 2 guests. No smoking inside but we have an area under cover outside. Please clean areas you use. I go out until late and leave early in the morning and will take care not to disturb others who may be resting or sleeping and ask you do likewise. No additional guests please. Please let me know of any breakages.

host.host_about:
I love dancing for fitness and socialising.  Travel is my next passion and enjoy staying in air bnb as much as being an airbnb host. I prefer to travel without an agenda and love cruising. So far my favourite places I have visited are Lapland, Savannah and Amsterdam.
I have met so many wonderful people in my travels and believe "Your vibe attracts your tribe."
Hope to meet you in my travels or in my home as a guest.

reviews.comments: Edi was very welcoming to her home.  She was very quick and responsive on taking us in on the very last minute. Thank you for your help.

Edi is a wonderfull person and a great host. She was so friendly and helpful and didn't hesitate to show us around. The room (very clean) and the location (really close to the station) are perfect. Totally recommended! Thank you Edi!
Edi has a clean neat home and she makes you feel very welcome. The bed was comfortable and warm. Great place to stay.
Wonderful experience at Edi's place! Nice and clean house, bed and room really confortable! And pretty well located next to subway and bus stations and Sydney central area! Tottaly recommended!!

Edi was an incredible host. She was super friendly and helped us with anything we needed. She showed us around her home and gave us suggestions of where to eat, drink and do our shopping! The house was super clean, and our room was great (bed was super comfy) lots of space to put your belongings and Jet (the cat) was super cute! We ended up staying longer than originally planned because we felt so at home at Edi's. The house itself was only a 3 minute walk to the train station where you can easily access trains to central etc. I would recommend anyone to stay here and I would to stay again! Can't thank you enough Edi :) *****
edi is a wonderful person, kind and hospitable. the experience in this house has been excellent. will definitely

This is an excellent accommodation located within three minutes walk to  a train station. The house is very clean and quiet. The host, Edi, is a very nice and helpful person. This is an ideal place for me to stay at any time I'm in Sydney and I would definitely recommend it to others as well.
Thanks Edi for the amazing stay and being so flexible with my timings! Really made the house feel like a home while I moved into something more permanent in Sydney.
Great location which near to train station. Convenient to go all around of Sydney. Great host which treated us like family.
房子近机场,但交通不算十分便利,早上飞机起降噪音相当大…!并且有蟑螂出没
Near to public transport and airport. And Edi is really friendly and warm person. Thank you very much :)
Edi welcomed us into her lovely home. She is great for a chat (honestly we could have stayed talking all day) and has loads of travel tips. Thank you!
excellent cosy stay, class to station and airport. very hospitable family who have been hosting for a while so they know how too give you space or interact with you.

Edi was super helpful from the moment I contacted her and Dion. Instructions were sent properly to access the house while she was away,and we even found the cat :) best cat ever I might say :) 
We really enjoyed how close to the station it was and close to the airport too. Location is great, security wise is amazing ,own keys for room ,plunger coffee and great stories if you around when Edi is there. Was delighted to wake up to Dion’s music and voice so thanks for that too. Will def return ! :)

We had such a wonderful time in Edi’s home. She’s a really friendly, inspiring woman who knows a lot about Sydney (and by the way, many other places in the world). She gave us the best ideas about where to visit and what to do in our stay. Her house is big, cozy, has a great kitchen to cook and the shower is great and warm. Just everything perfect! 
We felt like home, even so far away. Definitely recommend!!
The stay was very good. Very central, close to the train station. I can recommend.

Edi is a great host - she’s warm and tries to make you feel as comfortable as possible The house is located a 2min walk from the station, however is under a flight path (noting blackout period between 11pm-6am). I enjoyed the stay and would recommend especially for people who are looking for an easy location.

A very helpful host when dealing with an initial booking issue, Edi went beyond the call of duty ! Ease to come and go. Nice stay, although being on the flight path took a bit of getting used to. would definitely stay again, recommended
Very accurate description of the place. Great overnight accommodation. Came in very handy. Highly recommend

Edi had such a lovely home. I was there with her, her 24-year-old son, and an English guest. She was so sweet and helpful, and we all hung out for trivia or drinks. She was incredibly accommodating when I had to stay longer, and I felt like I had a real home in Sydney. Would absolutely stay here again and recommend to friends!

P.S. Her cat, Jet, is a real love!
just the perfect place to be edi makes you feel like home

I would really recommend this place as it is close to the public transport and it's affordable. Very clean and comfortable room. Edi is really friendly and kind, she gave us many tips where to go in Sydney and was ready to help anytime. The planes weren't an issue, we could sleep without any disturbing.
The house is great, easy to get into the city centre, Sydhenam station is just across the road.
Lovely place with a warm welcome by Edi! ideal if you need to travel by train or plane!

Edi made my stay in Sydney so nice... it was wonderful to chat with her and hear about her adventures. She gave me really good tips for exploring Sydney (which was very easy from the location) and it was a pleasure to stay at her place! I definitely recommend to stay with her as she is such a welcoming and caring person! Thanks so much Edi!

We stayed Edi's place to go to the airport next day early morning. location was very good to go to the airport as well as station. House is old style but nothing made us uncomfortable. Her cat, Jet was so adorable and friendly. recommend!
Exactly has described. Would stay again.
Edi is very welcoming and I was very comfortable staying at her place. Interesting and easy to talk to with a very clean homely feel. Thanks for the stay!

Edi is very friendly and nice! she let me know the best and cheapest option of travel from the airport to her place! its very helpful knowing that you are exhausted after travelling on planes and want to arrive at your accomdation conviniently and fast! she also tells me where to go for food and other which is very handy! also the house is only few minutes away from a train station!! overall it is a great experience and I really recommend to stay with Edi!

name: Oceanfront Ease & Elegance
summary: Like listening to the the waves as you fall asleep or enjoying time on a lanai relishing the view of Diamond Head and one of the most beautiful parks in the world? -This is the  luxury apartment for you.
space: My apartment is located on the quiet more upscale end of Waikiki. However if you're looking for the more Las Vegas type charms of Waikiki they are less than a 15 minute walk. Here you have access to the ocean without even crossing a road; surf breaks, swimming at more local beaches where sometimes Monk Seals come to rest. My apartment has been completely renovated complete with free standing bath tub I shipped from the UK. I've created a beach house vibe with open wraparound lanai, for indoor/outdoor living.
description: Like listening to the the waves as you fall asleep or enjoying time on a lanai relishing the view of Diamond Head and one of the most beautiful parks in the world? -This is the  luxury apartment for you. My apartment is located on the quiet more upscale end of Waikiki. However if you're looking for the more Las Vegas type charms of Waikiki they are less than a 15 minute walk. Here you have access to the ocean without even crossing a road; surf breaks, swimming at more local beaches where sometimes Monk Seals come to rest. My apartment has been completely renovated complete with free standing bath tub I shipped from the UK. I've created a beach house vibe with open wraparound lanai, for indoor/outdoor living. The apartment is fully furnished with artwork, objects and furniture from Europe. You will note I don't have a TV but there is superb internet access. But perhaps you'll decide on taking a break from the outside world once you're ensconced. As I'm often travelling sadly I doubt the
neighborhood_overview: The Gold Coast is the hidden jewel of the South Shore of Oahu. In the neighbourhood you'll find great beaches, walks, restaurants,and of course vistas. It is quiet though so if you are looking to be in the absolute centre of things this might not be the best option. I sleep very well here!
notes: I am looking to rent the apartment for at least six months from late July.
transit: There is a bus stop directly in front of the building. This is the airport bus. There are also buses to the beaches, sea world park, downtown Honolulu and beyond. Parking is available across the road in the park. It is metered during the day.
access: The apartment is fully furnished with artwork, objects and furniture from Europe. You will note I don't have a TV but there is superb internet access. But perhaps you'll decide on taking a break from the outside world once you're ensconced.
