interaction: As I'm often travelling sadly I doubt there will be little opportunity for much in-person access.
house_rules: Obviously this is my cherished home, and I've put a lot of time and energy and love into making it serene. So please treat it as you would your own home.  ABSOLUTELY NO SMOKING No pets permitted in the building.

host.host_about: I am originally from the Black Country in the industrial heartland of England but studied in Devon and then lived in Manchester and London before travelling around the world. I've been a resident of San Francisco for two decades but have homes in Italy, Hawaii and the Algarve, Portugal.

name: Gramercy Apt, Private Bedroom
summary: Newly renovated, freshly painted. Located in heart of Gramercy with many bars/restaurants. 6 and NR subway trains nearby. Priv bedroom, but sharing apt with 2 of my friends. Comes furnished with queen memory foam bed!
space: Brand new, super clean apt. 2 other roommates are male. Comes furnished with queen sized memory foam mattress! Ideal for someone who is visiting or will be traveling most of the day. Bed, towels, essentials are included. Large living room with renovated kitchen and bathroom.
description: Newly renovated, freshly painted. Located in heart of Gramercy with many bars/restaurants. 6 and NR subway trains nearby. Priv bedroom, but sharing apt with 2 of my friends. Comes furnished with queen memory foam bed! Brand new, super clean apt. 2 other roommates are male. Comes furnished with queen sized memory foam mattress! Ideal for someone who is visiting or will be traveling most of the day. Bed, towels, essentials are included. Large living room with renovated kitchen and bathroom.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Terrific host with welcoming and friendly roommates. Checked in consistently to ensure I was having a good stay (and I was). Room and whole apartment were clean and well kept. Would absolutely recommend for a stay in Gramercy.

If u ever have a chance to stay at Smit's place- don't hesitate! I initially booked a room for two weeks, but due to changes in my schedule I was extending my stay, and spent total of a bit more than three weeks. Smit was very understanding of my situation and did a great job to accommodate me. He was super responsive and everything went smoothly. If you book Smit's place you can be 100% sure that everything will go as planned. No fear of sudden cancelation or unpredictable surprises. That is huge since lots of Airbnb hosts tend to cancel on you without any explanation. Apartment is great, located in the middle of everything and Smit's room is quite spacious by NYC standards. Oh, and the best part of the apartment are Smith's roommates. They are smart, chill, respectable, thoughtful, worldly, and lots of fun. They really added a special touch to my NYC experience with their energy, music taste and stylish roof tops with gr8 cocktails. Two thumbs up for #44 Crew!     Long story short: Micheline 3-star place to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Excellent experience. Smit communicated very well, asked when I was checking in, and ensured his roommates would be there to receive me (while providing their contact information). The apartment is in a great location in Gramercy, the room is spacious for one and usable for two, with a good patch of common space, and the wifi works.

name: Charming apartment in Gracia
summary: Urban Charming Gracia is a lush holiday apartment with a great combination of modern elements. It is located in the heart of the beautiful district of Gracia and has everything you may need during your stay in the city. Licence number: HUTB-011643
space: This flat can accommodate up to 4 people, which makes it ideal for couples and small groups. It is also perfect for business trips thanks to its convenient location. The apartment has a spacious living room with a fully equipped kitchen and a double sofa bed. Moreover it consists of a double bedroom, a bathroom with shower and a nice balcony. On it you can enjoy a freshly made breakfast before exploring the city.  Licence number: HUTB-011643
description: Urban Charming Gracia is a lush holiday apartment with a great combination of modern elements. It is located in the heart of the beautiful district of Gracia and has everything you may need during your stay in the city. Licence number: HUTB-011643 This flat can accommodate up to 4 people, which makes it ideal for couples and small groups. It is also perfect for business trips thanks to its convenient location. The apartment has a spacious living room with a fully equipped kitchen and a double sofa bed. Moreover it consists of a double bedroom, a bathroom with shower and a nice balcony. On it you can enjoy a freshly made breakfast before exploring the city.  Licence number: HUTB-011643 Guests will be provided with an emergency number in case of problem during your stay. Gracia, it's only 15 minutes walking from the main attractions of Barcelona. In fact Park Guell, Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are less than 15-20 minutes away from the shopping streets of the neighborhood. With a few metro
neighborhood_overview: Gracia, it's only 15 minutes walking from the main attractions of Barcelona. In fact Park Guell, Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are less than 15-20 minutes away from the shopping streets of the neighborhood. With a few metro stops, you can easily reach Sagrada Familia, Las Ramblas or Plaza Catalunya.  Even with such a privileged location, the Gracia district has managed to keep the essence of the village and still keeps itself away from big crowds of tourists, like most of the central districts.
transit: The closest metro stations are Joanic (L4) and Lesseps (L3).
interaction: Guests will be provided with an emergency number in case of problem during your stay.
house_rules: ENGLISH  Late check-in fee:  From 21:00 till 00:00: 30€.  From 00:00 till 02: 00: 50€.  Security deposit: 303€ * (Please confirm for stays over 28 nights).  Tourist tax: 2.48€ per person (children under 16 do not pay the tax)  Please respect the neighbours and don´t make a noise from 10 pm to 8 am.  Utilities (water, electricity, gas, internet) are NOT included for stays of more than 20 nights (charged according to the consumption).  Additional services:  Airport transfer: from 45€  Baby cot/ high chair costs 30€  Pet fee: 30€  Penalties:  Loss of keys: € 50  Smoking in the apartment: € 100  ESPAÑOL  Suplemento entrada nocturna:  entre las 21h y 24h: 30€.  De 24h a 02h: 50€.  Depósito de seguridad: 303€* (Consultar para estancias de más de 28 noches).  Tasa turística: 2,48€ por persona (los menores de 16 años no pagan la tasa)  No es posible hacer fiestas y se debe mantener un nivel moderado de ruido de 22h a 08h.  Suministros NO incluidos para estancias de más de 20 noches (se cobran

host.host_about:
Soy extrovertido, alegre y amigo de mis amigos... Me encanta Barcelona, soy de aquí, he crecido, reído y llorado en esta magnífica e inacabable ciudad.
Ahora me gustaría ser tu anfitrión para enseñártela y compartir sus secretos.
Barcelona es única e incomparable, ven a conocerla... y te la enseñaré con mucho gusto!

reviews.comments: This place is beautiful!  The decor is awesome and the location is so walkable.  We enjoyed every second of staying in this flat.  The only issue we found was the sound from the pharmacy entrance bell downstairs.  But that was the only, tiniest complaint.  Loved the balcony and the street!
Nice cozy apartment. Great location.

Great apartment, great neighborhood. It's just a little bit away from the city center, which made it great. Many local taverns,  cafes, bakerys and fruit markets nearby. The apartment was clean and very functional. The hosts were very accommodating and helpful. With the Metro nearby it was very easy to get around, no need for a car. Because we were not in the city center things were much more inexpensive.  We would just walk the neighborhood and if something smelled good we'd stop for a meal in a local eatery, every meal we had was just great. Local fare and great drinks. Everywhere we went, the people were very nice and helpful, even when we couldn't speak the language very well. Barcelona is a great city with great people, even with the Independence vote going on. The general strike was kind of a pain, but we dealt with it. Very safe city as long as you didn't look like a pickpocket victim. We'd love to go back. Thanks again to our hosts. I recommend them highly to others, we will try to use them in the future.

What a lovely place to stay when visiting Gracia, Barcelona. The location is in a quiet, safe neighborhood with plenty of cafes and bakeries in walking distances. Ramon had his colleague arrange a Taxi service to come meet me at the airport. They came early and had a sign with my name on it. Excellent service. I was also greeted by another colleague when I arrived to the property. This is such a wonderful touch by Ramon to make it a stress free arrival. The flat itself has all the modern conveniences and is tastefully decorated. I loved it! Note, you are not in the hustle and bustle of the city. This is the best part. You get a chance to live the the life of a Catalonian. Park Guell is about 15-20 minutes in walking distance... it took me 20 because it is up hill. Truly, you are 15 minutes away from all sites. The Taxi service is very convenient and at great prices. In the late afternoons, I would take a break and return to the flat, open up the balcony windows and just sit and relax. Such a comfortable place. Ramon's colleague Maria also arranged a Taxi service for my return to the airport. Same gentleman, came early. I loved my stay at Ramon's place. Thank you!

Everything was great. It is a very nice and quite cosy appartment. Very clean and well equipped. The bed was very comfortable and soft ;). The area is great and well communicated. Its not the city center but close to a metro line and you get an authentic feeling of a real catalan neighbourhood. I would definately stay there again.

Ramon was very responsive and the key exchange was easily coordinated. I called when my flight got in and his colleague Julia met me promptly at the apartment.

The apartment itself was extremely clean and had everything I needed. I appreciate that soap and towels were included. Also, I didn't need it, but having an extra set of keys was a nice touch.

Location was perfect! So many good bars and restaurants within walking distance. Much preferred staying here than closer to the city center. Felt more authentic and less touristy in a good way.

Would highly recommend staying here!
The apartment is super clean, fresh and comfortable. Ramón was very responsive. The location is fantastic. Couldn’t ask for more! Highly recommended
Perfect apartment for 1 or 2 people. The location is also perfect in the charming and local neighbourhood of Gracia. Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to stay in Barcelona.

Ramon has been a wonderful host. Our flight was delayed a few hours and we arrived way after midnight, but the check-in was not a problem. The location is absolutely amazing - lots of shops and cafes nearby, also close to attractions. The aa RT meant unselfish is very clean, spacious and convenient (for a couple). Will be looking forward to staying here next time I’m in Barcelona!
Great place! Very clean and awesome neighborhood.

The check in and the communication was very good communicated. The district Gracia was like expected, not the city center but a safe and pretty.
However, all the walls were quite dirty which ruined the pretty apartment little. The mattress was quite old and way to soft, after 5 nights my back hurts little. Lastly, the hot water wasn’t sufficient enough for two people, which was quite annoying. All in all okay but space for improvement.

The neighborhood is very nice and calm. You can do many excursions on foot from there. Many restaurants and bars nearby. Also public transports. We received a friendly welcome and got some good tips from Julia. In the apartment there is everything you need to feel comfortable. Only two things should be mentioned: The bed is not kingsize, its maybe 1,40 m and the mattress was too soft for us. The balcony is very small - you can't have breakfast on it...Nevertheless we enjoyed our stay and would love to come again. Next time with a new mattress?!? ; )
Spacious apartment and lovely area, especially, Carrer Verdi.
Прекрасная квартира, очень уютная и стильная. Вернулись бы туда снова.
Turn right to find the local squares in Gracia and left to head into Barcelona city centre. Perfect location for the best of both worlds.

Schöne Unterkunft mit neuer Ausstattung. Wunderbar für ein reisendes Paar geeignet. Das Bett ist nur etwa 1,5 m breit und verfügt über eine gemeinsame Bettdecke. Für drei Personen finde ich die Unterkunft zu klein. Das Schlafsofa ist zudem im Wohnraum und bedingt den Durchlauf zum Badezimmer für die anderen Reisenden. Zu zweit super! Übrigens funktioniert dorthin auch wunderbar die maytaxi App mit Vorbestellung...

A small and cosy apartment in the relatively quiet neighbourhood of Gracia :) a comfortable holiday pod for 1 or 2.  Its kitchen is considerably well stocked. Although the aircon was rather noisy and the stairs up are quite narrow/squeezy, hence watch out if you're carrying heavy luggage to and fro (no fault of Ramon, though!).

A great apartment from which to enjoy our five nights in Barcelona.  The accommodation was modern, clean and attractive - perfect for a couple.  We easily walked and caught the metro into central Barcelona in a few minutes to all the major sights.  We especially LOVED the local neighbourhood and local residents as we visited the bars, cafes and restaurants in the plaza around the corner just a few metres away.  Shops, bakeries, supermarket, speciality cheeses and jamon everything just as the locals were doing.  It was a delight and we felt sad to leave.
The host canceled this reservation 346 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location and cute, updated apartment. The neighborhood is trendy, accessible and a really nice way to see the “real” side of Barcelona. Julia met us and was informative and very friendly. 
The only issues: The actual bed was a full, difficult for two people when one is pregnant (and when the listed bed was larger). The air conditioner was untenably loud when the fan went above the lowest setting (we noticed a previous review that reported the issue and it wasn’t fixed; in fairness, we did not report it during our visit).
Nice, professionally run listing. The neighborhood is fun and there are many places in walking distance.
Siempre maravilloso
Una estancia genial! Tanto el apartamento como el trato fueron excelentes!

Perfect little place! Looks just as the pics show, is comfy and cosy and in walking distance of loads of good places and close to metro stations:) Check in and quick replies to messages were the cherry on top!

name: Centric apart perfect familes 1.1
space: Poble Sec 1.1 is a design apartment with quality finishings together with the decoration create a contemporary atmosphere of comfort and well-being. This 70 m2 flat is located on the first floor (with elevator). It offers a spacious living and dining area with a double sofabed giving out on the balcony and a well-equipped separate kitchen. The television has digital channels and you can use internet wifi all over the apartment. The master bedroom with double bed includes a large built-in cupboard, just as the two single bedrooms with each a single bed and extra bed. The two pleasant bathrooms have a bath/shower combination.  The building has private parking.
description: Poble Sec 1.1 is a design apartment with quality finishings together with the decoration create a contemporary atmosphere of comfort and well-being. This 70 m2 flat is located on the first floor (with elevator). It offers a spacious living and dining area with a double sofabed giving out on the balcony and a well-equipped separate kitchen. The television has digital channels and you can use internet wifi all over the apartment. The master bedroom with double bed includes a large built-in cupboard, just as the two single bedrooms with each a single bed and extra bed. The two pleasant bathrooms have a bath/shower combination.  The building has private parking. By request: Supplement of 5€/day for highchair and cradle. Suplement of 17€/day parking car. Suplement of 9€/day parking moto. AIRPORT PICK UP: we can pick you up at Barcelona's airport. Receipt guests personally on arrival of the apartment . I offer all the necessary information around the apartment (include map of Barcelona). The
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is situated in Barcelona’s Poble Sec District, at the foot of Montjuïc Mountain. The apartments are less than 300 metres from Parallel Metro Station, where guests can take the funicular railway to the top of Montjuic.  This district has become a fashionable district, the building is surrounded by tapas bars and cocktail bars, typical cuisine restaurants and the most prestigious theatres like Apollo or El Molino Cabaret inaugurated in 1898. At a few steps you will see the city highlights like Las Ramblas, the Olympic stadium, the international trade fair, the Fundación Miró, the old harbour, the Guell palace and plaza España and the gothic quarter....
notes: Check in from 20h to 24h  and Holidays/Sundays have an extra charge of 30€  Check in from 24h to 7h have an extra charge of 50 € Price excludes Barcelona Tourist Tax. The price per person per night is € 2,48 in Barcelona, with a maximum of 7 nights. All children under 17 years are exempt from paying the fee. VAT included in the price. Nº HUBT: 7619
transit: The neighbourhood is very well connected thanks to the subway 2 and 3 lines (both will take you to central Plaza Catalunya and the prestigious Paseo de Gracia in 5 to 10 minutes), to the Montjuic funicular that takes you to the cable car that connects with the harbour and thanks to the buses that go to the airport.
access: By request: Supplement of 5€/day for highchair and cradle. Suplement of 17€/day parking car. Suplement of 9€/day parking moto. AIRPORT PICK UP: we can pick you up at Barcelona's airport.
interaction: Receipt guests personally on arrival of the apartment . I offer all the necessary information around the apartment (include map of Barcelona).
house_rules: Check-in is at the apartment from 15:00, however if the apartment is available an early check-in can be requested. For availability, please contact us as soon as you know your time of arrival. Check-out is before 11:00 in the morning. A late check-out (till 13:00) can be requested. Please note that this depends on the availability of the apartment. FOR YOUR OWN SAFETY. Never open the door to any person you don't expect to come. Please be reminded that the apartment is within a residential building so PLEASE, great care must be taken to ensure NO disturbance is caused. So: * NO parties are allowed. * NO loud music / TV. * NO noise on the stairways. Smoking is NOT allowed inside the apartament. Clean the dishes and take out the garbage. Take care of the equippement, everything is new and we want to keep it in good condition for our guests. Don't loose the keys, we'll charge EUR 30 in case you do.

host.host_about:
In love with my hometown, Barcelona. I like hanging out with my friends at restaurants and bars around the city or during the weekend go to the coast or mountains. 
My favorite hobbies are traveling and sport in general.
If you have any questions about the apartments do not hesitate to contact me.

reviews.comments:
jordi nos ayudo con el trasporte lo cual nos facilito mucho la vida, el aparamento es muy comodo y cumple con las expectativas, el anfitrion siempre estuvo pendiente de todas nuestras inquietudes. aunque la calle donde esta ubicado no es muy bonita, es segura y se encuentra muy cerca del metro y otras facilidades.
la pasamos muy bien, es un buen alojamiento.

Everything was great. Very nice flat with comfy beds and great air conditioning. Neighbourhood was nice and close to touristic places.( 5 mins walk to metro station and max 2-3 stations to centers like Espanya,Catalunya or Liceu) 10-15 mins walk to La Ramblas.Also many markets around to get daily needs. Never had any problems and our stay was perfect. I would definitely recommend this place. And by the way, Thanks Roman!  :)
This apartment was very well located and we were given some useful advice about the local area. Check in had no problems and there was plenty of space for four of us.

The apartment was very nice and the location was very central. 
Jordi is a very friendly person. I can recommend this apartment!

Very nice spacious unit close to everything. Lift available so no stairs to climb with heavy suitcases - bonus. People in the unit above were very noisy at 6.30am. Could hear furniture scraping on the floor above and people shouting. Television only has local channels in Catilan.  No tourist information available, just a map provided. Hair drier was supposed to be provided but couldn't find one.  Generally a good basic unit with no extras.

Le logement bien décrit (2 très petites chambre et une très grande avec une belle salle de bains), très, très bien situé ... et calme cependant ...
Quelques désagréments : il manquait une cafetière pour 5 personnes ... celle qui était à notre disposition était pour 2. Un lavabo était bouché et la salle de douche ne fermait pas à clé ...
Points positifs : la literie très confortable, l'appartement très propre et accueillant (linge de toilette et draps fournis)
L’accueil par Ramon a été fort sympathique ...

El piso está muy bien situado y bien equipado. En las habitaciones pequeñas apenas hay espacio entre las camas, pero a nosotros nos resultó cómodo. No volvería a utilizarlo porque sólo facilitan 1 llave. En nuestro caso éramos 6 adultos en un Congreso con horarios fistintos y fué horrible. Esperas en la calle. Desplazarnos pormedio BCN para recoger la llave. Tardaron más de un día en darnos otra copia, justo cuando se descodificó la que teniamos. Estuvimos tirados hasta que vinieron a abrir. Lamentable e insufrible. Recomiendo NO alquilarlo si no cambian esto

Buen apartamento se rige estrictamente por las cláusulas escritas 
Las fotos son reales

Excellent communication prior arrival! Very welcoming host explained the house rules and gave all information needed for the area with great tips as well! The appartment is just like the photos in a great location close to the center and next to many pincho bars! There is a bar across the street great to start or end your night! Parking in house is very convenient (extra charge). We were a party of four (one couple and 2 friends) and the appart was perfect for us. Master bedroom has its own separate bathroom! And the living room area is cosy! The sofa could be more comfortable but hey who visits Barcelona to sit in a sofa! There was a lamb missing and we couldn't find the remote control for the tv both of them were replaced after a simple sms to Ramon who by the way was very friendly and helpful!  I would recommend the place with ease!

Accueil sympa de Ramos (contacté par sms avant l'arrivée pour fixer le RDV; parle anglais) qui nous a fait visiter l'appart et nous a donné plein de détails sur le métro, la Rambla et... le FC Barcelone. 

Appartement moderne dans un immeuble récent. Assurez-vous d'être logé dans l'appartement B1-1 situé au 1ere étage (il semble que d'autres appart soient loués aussi), coté cours au calme car dans la rue, les espagnols peuvent veiller tard!! L'appart n'est pas totalement insonorisé mais nous avons déjà rencontré ce problème dans d'autres locations en Espagne. Tout dépend donc des voisins!

Très bien localisé. Proche d'une rue très animée le soir. A 150m du métro (achat facile de la carte T-10 au distributeur; on a utilisé la carte à plusieurs) desservant tous les endroits stratégiques de Barcelone en quelques minutes. 
Parmi les 3 chambres, les 2 chambres avec les lits individuels sont très petites. A n'utiliser que pour dormir.
Rien à reprocher concernant les couchages, la propreté, le linge fourni, les produits ménagers.

Seule remarque : l'appartement permet le couchage de 8 personnes (2 sur une banquette que l'on n'a pas essayé) mais il n'y a pas de couvert et vaisselle pour ce nombre, ni de chaise en quantité suffisante. Idéal pour 4.

Apartement not very far from las ramblas (1km)
We enjoied our stay and apartment was clean and calm.
Thanks Jordi for your flexibility on checkin time!

Très bel appartement très bien situé dans Barcelone, à 2 pas du Métro, à 10 minutes des Ramblas et de la Rambla del Mar. L'appartement est très propre et est conforme à l'annonce et aux photos, il est aussi très bien équipé (micro-ondes, grand frigo, lave vaisselle, combiné lave linge sèche linge)... Le linge de maison fourni était aussi très propre.
Résidence moderne avec ascenseur, un parking sous-terrain est disponible (17 Euros par jour), la résidence n'est pas très bien insonorisée, mais il n'y a pas eu beaucoup de bruit les 3 jours ou nous étions là.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Ramon le jour de notre arrivée, il a su nous venter tous les mérites de cette magnifique ville qu'est Barcelone, il nous a expliqué avec attention tout ce qu'il fallait savoir pour passer un bon séjour, le métro, les restaurants de Poble Sec, les lieux à visiter... Tout était parfait.

Notre première expérience de location sur AirBnB, et nous sommes ravis.

Merci beaucoup à Jordi et Ramon !

nous avons séjourné en famille (2 adultes et 2 adolescents) 2 nuits chez Jordi. Nous avons été accueillis agréablement par Jamon qui nous a tout expliqué et pris le temps de nous donner de bons conseils sur Barcelone, en anglais et espagnol. L'appartement est conforme aux photos, très propre, bien équipé (y compris le wifi), 2 salles de bains, 2 WC, 3 chambres pouvant accueillir 6 personnes. 
Un peu de décoration dans les chambres pourraient apporter un peu plus de chaleur. 
L'appartement est très bien situé, à 2 pas d'une station de métro et à 5 mn à pied du parc Montjuic.
Le parking en sous-sol, moins cher que les parkings aux alentours, est indispensable et très pratique, car trouver une place dans ces petites rues est impensable.
Le départ se fait facilement, il suffit de laisser les clés dans l'appartement.

Logement conforme à la description 
NOUS AVONS pu poser nos valises avant le check-in 
Logement bien situé près du métro Parallel

Accueil ponctuel et chaleureux par Ramon le jour de notre arrivée.
Le logement est conforme aux photos. Propre et lumineux.
Il est très bien situé dans Barcelone, à 5 minutes à pied du métro ligne verte. Quartier calme et à la fois proche des lieux de vie.
Je recommande ce logement.

Este alojamiento nos gustó mucho, la casa es nueva y está muy bien situada, a unos 10 minutos de las ramblas. La zona está muy bien para `cenar o alternar al regreso de las visitas. Nuestro vuelo llegó con retraso y Ramón tuvo la amabilidad de esperarnos. Volvería a alojarme en esta casa porque nos resultó muy cómoda, muy recomendable.
Muchas gracias

très bon appartement, modern, propre, lumineux, literie de qualité, ruelle calme, immeuble calme, rien à dire sur la prestation - bonne qualité/prix.
En plus, dans un quartier animé, très espagnole, rien à voir avec le quartier ´Ramblas' qu'on a trouvé crad, cher et tout sauf espagnole. Donc l'appartement dans un coin super et moitié moins cher que les quartiers dites touristique.
Par contre une clef et une carte pour six personnes trop limit pour l.organisation du séjour !
Had a great stay, Ramon was awesome! Place was clean and adequate.

The hosts where excellent and met us at the flat. The flat is exactly as pictured and one of the most modern I have stayed on airbnb.  Although the location is rather central, I wouldn't exactly say that it is idea for families. We did  not feel safe at night and one night we came home to a drugged out man urinating on the back of a parked car in front of the flat. It was a bit disconcerting for my 4 year old to say the least.

Nous avons séjourné 4 jours dans le magnifique appartement de Ramon et Jordi, nous étions 4 filles c'était parfait pour nous. Ramon nous a accueilli chaleureusement, il nous a expliqué comment prendre le métro, où aller etc. Très bien situé, dans le cœur même de la ville, à 5min à pied de la station de métro Paral-lel, qui mène à tous les endroits phares de la ville. De nombreux bars à proximité ainsi que des boites de nuits très sympa! Nous recommandons vivement!

Great and spacious apartment with generously sized bathrooms and even a small terrace. Very clean and well organised as well as a friendly and flexible host who was very understanding even when our flight was delayed. Good location, close to la ramblas- very much enjoyed our stay, do recommend.

We were met at the apartment and given a brief but thorough introduction to the apartment and the nearby vicinity. I definitely recommend. Apartment close to the beach and La Ramblas which is where we spent most of our days.

L'accoglienza di Ramon è stata molto cordiale e disponibile anche perché il nostro volo ha fatto ritardo e siamo stati in contatto con lui tramite utili sms. L'alloggio è ampio, tranquillo e confortevole ed è ubicato vicino alla metropolitana Parallel dove c'è anche la funicolare per il Montjuic; nella zona ci sono comodi negozietti di generi alimentari aperti anche fino a tardi -alle 23-  e buoni ristoranti. Ci siamo trovati bene!

L'appartement est bien situé par rapport aux curiosités de la ville, 5' à pied du métro "Parallel", 15' de Las Ramblas.
Le quartier est intéressant  situé en dehors des zones touristiques mais suffisamment  proche de tout. 
L'intérieur moderne est bien équipé pour 4 personnes, peut-être un peu moins pour 6, la literie est confortable.  Isolation un peu limite en regard de l'exubérance des voisins surtout au petit matin ...
Le petit balcon aurait pu être intéressant pour déjeuner comme nous a indiqué Ramon, pour autant qu'il y ait eu une table et pas uniquement deux petites chaises pliantes.
Les photos rendent par contre mieux qu'en réalité et nous avons été quelque peu déçus en découvrant l'appartement qui manque un peu de décoration, pas la moindre petite fleur ou plante comme sur les photos !
Le canapé et fauteuil  tous deux de couleur crème sont fort tâchés, ce qui est peu engageant au premier abord lorsqu'on rentre dans l'appartement.
Pas le moindre produit de base comme annoncé, même pas un savon dans les salles de bain !
L'appartement est cependant très propre ainsi que le linge fourni  mais mériterait plus d'attention entre les locations : étanchéité de la douche à revoir, ampoule au-dessus de la table qui ne fonctionne pas de même que dans la salle de bain...
Nous aurions aussi vraiment apprécié également ne fut-ce qu'une bouteille d'eau fraiche pour nous désaltérer à notre arrivée. 
Cela fait partie des petites attentions qui rendent l'accueil si sympathique comme il avait été mentionné dans beaucoup d'autres avis qui  avaient d'ailleurs contribués à notre choix !
Ce ne devait pas être notre jour ! Si Ramon nous a paru sympathique, il devait cependant  être très pressé ... !  Nous n'avons reçu aucune explication sur les environs, restos, visites et bon plans ...
Nous recommandons cependant cet appartement pour les points positifs mentionnés.
Beautiful place, close to metro and night life.

I was a little disappointed in this stay.  The furniture was stained and broken. The kitchen equipment was missing, broken or damaged. The bathroom grout was moldy. The host was not very responsive. It wasn't until a couple days after I notified the host of a broken hot water kettle and broken coffee maker plus the lack of towels, that someone left more towels and another kettle. When I again notified the host of the broken coffee maker, he never responded.  We were never able to start the morning with a cup of coffee in the apartment. Nor were we able to cook any meals since there were only two frying pans with badly scratched non-stick coating and a pot with burnt crusty scorch marks that made it unusable.
Séjour agréable,appartement proche du métro et à distance raisonnable des principaux centres d'intérêt à pied.Quartier calme et disponibilité des propriétaires.

The apartment was clean and spacious - we would definitely stay here again.  We opted to use the airport transfer service provided by our host and it made getting to the apartment convenient. Another plus was that our driver called our host prior to our arrival. Our host Ramon was at the apt. when we arrived and he took the time to walk us through the apartment and show us all the great places to eat and drink close by and also answered any questions we had regarding local sightseeing. The listing was as described and we would have no issue recommending and/or staying there in future visits to Barcelona.
Die Wohnung war genau wie in der Beschreibung, groß und modern. Gute Lage in einem authentischen Viertel.

nous avons été très bien accueillies par un ami de Ramon qui nous a même aidées à installer le code wifi sur nos appareils. Encore merci à lui.

Le logement est très bien situé à proximité du métro . 
A pied la Rambla n'est qu'à 10 minutes.
Quartier vivant avec bars et petits restaurants à proximité.
Nous séjournerions de nouveau avec plaisir dans cet appartement.

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans cet appartement idéalement situé pour profiter du centre de Barcelone et du port à pied ou en métro). Confortable pour 5 même si les couverts et verres mériteraient d'être renouvelés. 
Le quartier est calme et agréable, les petits commerces de quartiers bien pratiques. L'hôte très sympathique et communique de bonnes adresses où se restaurer. Nous sommes prêts à y retourner.

Ramon nous a très bien accueilli dans son appartement, en nous expliquant parfaitement le fonctionnement de celui-ci. Il nous a aussi fourni un plan de la ville en nous recommandant de ne pas aller manger à certains endroits de la ville. 
L'appartement est très bien situé, proche d'une station de métro et accessible rapidement à pied du centre et du port. L'appartement est conforme à la description et très agréable. Super séjour !

L'appartement était conforme à la description, très propre. Très bien situé  pour aller se balader dans le centre historique de Barcelone et pour prendre le métro.
Jordi nous a bien accueilli, il nous a donné un plan de la ville et des informations touristiques et pratiques.
Le parking sous l'appartement était complet mais nous en avons trouvé un autre sécurisé avec des tarifs corrects à 2 minutes dans une rue voisine. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour et avons envie d'y retourner.
Très confortable, l'appartement est bien situé et est conforme aux photos. Jordi nous à également très bien acceuilli. Je n'hesiterai pas à y retourner.
Nice apartment, worth a stay. Neighbourhood for night time great and still quiet! Clean and comfortable beds. Thanks Jordi.

We have reserved two of Jordi's flats for a Business Travel (this one and another one in the same building). We were very satisfied with the apartments and the services provided. For our next trip to Barcelona we will definitely reserve the apartments again :)

Formidable ! On a été acceuillis par Ramon et l'appartement est juste extra! Très propre, grand pour acceuillir aisément 6 personnes et parfaitement bien placé dans Barcelone! Je recommande vivement !!!
The apartment was ideal for 3 of us on business in Barcelona. With three separate bedrooms and two bathrooms. Extremely clean, tidy and has everything you need. 15 minute walk to central Barcelona.
GREAT !

Logement agréable, fonctionnel, calme proche du centre et de toutes les commodités de transports. La proximité du parc Montjuic est un atout idéal avec des enfants. Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Muy central el lugar. Estuvieron muy atentos a coordinar la llegada para recibirnos. Gracias

L'appartement est très bien situé proche du métro  Paral Lel.
Attention un ballon d'eau chaude pour 2 salles de bain.
L'appartement est propre.
Davvero un'ottima sistemazione per rapporto qualità/prezzo e posizione. Consigliatissimo

Very nice place. Good location. I would recomend it for everyone. The only thing that I didn't like was a lack of a kettle. It's only because I'm a teaholic . It's probably not very important for most of people.

Jordi arranged for every detail and made it very easy for us to check in. The location is excellent with public transportation everywhere. Metro station is within steps with Line 2 and 3 to all major attractions. Also, very close to the marina, plaza España and the art museum of catalunya! I will definitely use Jordi next time I visit Barcelona.
Très bon accueil, très bien situé, propre et accueillant. Seul bémol le calme n'était pas au rendez vous, l'appartement est très mal insonorisé

Jordi was an excellent host. He was gracious enough to help us into our apartment early especially after my family was effected by several flight cancellations and change to existing vacation plans. The home is in a nice and vibrant neighborhood with great tapa bars a block away. It was located nicely adjacent to the gothic quarter with a more budget friendly cost. I would stay here again! Gracias Jordi!

Jordi's apartment was in a fantastic location for us - close to many tapas restaurants and the Metro stop. Check in and check out was extremely easy. Apartment itself was very nice and well kept. We used Jordi's transfer service from the airport and found it very handy. All in all, a great experience for our first AirBnB booking!
Amazing place. Small but perfect and very close to the metro. Highly recommend!

The apartment was just like the pictures. It was clean and safe. Loved the neighborhood as it is close to the metro as well as many restaurants. Ramon checked us in and gave us great recommendations for food and drinks.  The decor was simple (not a lot of decorations) which was perfect for my toddler who likes to grab everything off of shelves. I recommend and would definitely stay again.
Great location.  Apartment was very spacious with big bathrooms.   It was very comfortable for a family of five.  We would certainly stay again.

The apartment is very clean, comfortable and is situated quite near form almost all the sightseeings. It is in the walkind distance from La Rambla, PLaza de Catalunia, Montjuic, Magic Fountain. We certainly will stay here again.

Jordi's place is well maintained and functional (wifi, full kitchen, private garage for a $17 fee per day), in a middle-class neighborhood close to Montjuic. It is very conveniently located in a quiet street close to Parallel and 5 mins away from the metro (direct line to Sagrada Familia). We would certainly return if given the opportunity.
One important note of caution for travelers: be sure to have Jordi and team explicitly state the amount of extra tax that they will collect at check-in. We had a communication prior to arrival that stated a given amount, and we ended up paying an extra 30 Euros. That was a bit of a letdown upon arrival and could be easily fixed by Jordi and team with better, more transparent, communication.
Great location and lovely apartment although a little noisy at night

Location, location, location!!
Very cute and clean apartment with a great location.
Bra leilighet. Veldig god størrelse, ingen problemer med seks personer. Leilighetskomplekset var ganske lytt, vi hørte veldig godt hver gang noen kom inn eller gikk ut av bygningen.
Great apartment ideal for our girls weekend in Barca. We had all we needed and the location was great. Building did get a bit noisy during the night but it didn't bother us.

We had a nice and comfortable stay at Jordi's apartment. He was very easy to contact as needed and very helpful! The beds were comfortable and the air conditioning worked great. The washer was a little tricky but after numerous messages to Jordi, I got it figured out! 
The area was great as it was close enough to walk to the touristy quarters but far enough away to avoid large crowds. There's a great little local bar on the corner which we stopped by every night before heading home. We felt so welcomed by the barmaid. 
The food in the area was incredible. We loved walking down Carrer De Blai going from bar to bar eating and drinking all of the delicious tapas and pinchos!

El departamento está a unas 15 cuadras de plaza Cataluña, bien ubicado! El problema fue que llegamos un sábado y estaban de fiesta en el departamento de al lado y NO pudimos dormir! Además había varias cosas rotas en el dpto (ducha de la habitación principal, faltaba luz en un cuarto y en el balcón, la manija del lavarropas estaba rota, estaba rota la correa de la persiana y no se podía abrir ni cerrar, estaba roto un cajón del feeezer, etc) y le mandamos msjs y jamás nos contestó! Si buscan tranquilidad NO es el lugar..

We spent almost a week at Jordi's flat in Barcelona.The flat was all spick and span and it was reasonably centrally located and the amenities worked well. There is a metro station very close by and it helped us a great deal to move around. 

I would recommend to get a taxi from the airport rather than a pre-booked one though.

Pros: Zentrale Lage (15 Minuten zu Fuß bis zur La Rambla), U-Bahn nur wenige Minuten entfernt, interessante Umgebung (viele Lokale, Geschäfte, Geldversorgung), sichere Gegend (nicht bange machen lassen, weil es nicht so ordentlich aussieht wie in Deutschland, das geht definitv in Ordnung), Wohnung geht platzmäßig für 6 (2 Badezimmer, 1 Doppelbettzimmer und jeweils noch ein Zimmer mit Bett plus Ausziehmatratze), guter Internetanschluss (nach Passwort fragen, ist nämlich nirgendwo in der Wohnung vermerkt - könnte man mal hinterlegen), Bad recht sauber, Duschen groß (ein Zimmer hat Dusch-Badewannenkombi), großer Balkon nach Norden in den Innenhof (so liegen auch die Schlafzimmer, mit südländisch typischer Geräuschkulisse, ich mag es), Check-in morgens um 1:00 war möglich (kostet ordentlich extra), großer Kühlschrank mit großem Eisfach
Cons: Balkonstühle wären nett (man kann die aber vom Küchentisch nehmen), Küche ist partiell nicht sehr üppig ausgestattet (gibt beispielsweise nur 4 Tassen, dafür aber viele Töpfe, Besteck ausreichend), während unseres Aufenthalts ging der Herd nur bis lauwarm (Jordi reagierte auf eine frühzeitige Reklamation meinerseits während des 6tägigen Aufenthaltts mit einem "sollte aber gehen", das war's)
Perfect location; perfect host. Highly recommend

It was ok. 
the accommodation is good situated.

The apartment is as described, very contemporary, clean and in an ideal location for a 10 min walk to La Ramblas and the Gothic quarter. It is in a very quiet block of new apartments in a peaceful area. We felt very safe both during the day and the evening with plenty of tapas bars only minutes away.
Great place and would highly recommend this apartment.

Jordi's place was great! We really enjoyed our stay and Jordi was very easy to stay in contact with, he responded very quickly. The location is fairly central, just a short metro ride to the city center or the beach. The apartment was very clean as well and everything we needed was there. We would definitely stay with Jordi again in the future!
Amazing location. So many great tapas places nearby. And club Apolo was a lot of fun and a 2 minute walk.

Great location, very close to Metro (5 min walk) and many, many great restaurants within walking distance. Only 5 minute walk to Carrer Blai which has tons of great choices. Apartment was clean and pretty spacious for Europe. Kitchen, dining and living area are quite roomy.  I think comfortably the max would be 4 adults in the apartment because of the bedrooms. 2 people in the main bedroom and 1 in each of the smaller rooms.  The smaller rooms do have a 2nd bed you can pull out but then you have no room to walk so it is a little tight, if it's kids then no problem, I think 6 adults would be a bit much. Beware of the shower, there is only a half glass so water shoots out all over the floor and there are no extra towels so that was a bit of a nuisance.  There was also a leak in the ceiling of the shared bathroom which they didn't have time to fix before we checked in but it only started leaking again on our last day. It looks like it has been an issue for some time with the stains on the ceiling. I have a feeling they have had a steady rotation of guests which is why they haven't properly fixed the issue.  Overall though, good option for Poble Sec.

We stayed in flat 1.2 as the flat I booked had a slight issue, so this review is for 1.2 which I understand is the same spec. The flat was very comfortable for the three of us that were staying there. Everything needed for a long weekend was available and best of all, we loved the immediate area around the flat. It felt like somewhere that the locals actually live - great cafes, bars, little shops, access to the city. We did find it noisy on one night, due to loud music - take earplugs just in case. Communication and checking in was super - easy. Thanks Jordi and Ramon.
Nice and homey
El apartamento estuvo muy limpio y nítido. Fue cómodo el lugar y agradable la estadía.  Buena ubicación, cerca de restaurante y de un metro.

The house is very comfortable and very well located, closed to the city centre. 
Jordi’s fathers who did the check-in to us is very nice and gave us a lot of advice for restaurants and place to visit. I really recvomend this house to anyone who is going to visit Barcelona!!

Stayed for two nights with a group of colleagues. Location was perfect to explore the city. Flat was clean and with all the facilities as described. Efficient checkin and communications would come back anytime!
Le métro est à proximité de bonnes adresses aux alentours avec des tapas très abordables.
Great place to stay and not too far from Ramblas etc
Buena ubicación y apartamento completo, sin embargo los cuartos pequeños cuando toca compartir con otra persona.

We loved the location of the apartment as it was walking distance to many great restaurants and bars. The apartment is great for a group of friends, and had all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay.  Would definitely recommend this place to friends traveling to Barcelona.
Very clean and comfortable space close to the centre of the city. Great place to stay!

We loved our stay here when we visited Barcelona. Ramon was there to welcome us into the apartment and was very helpful in giving us tips to get around the city. The location of the apartment is very good as it is within 2 mins walking distance to the Paral ' el metro which we used quite extensively. The apartment had all the amenities that we could have asked for. Although it may get a bit cramped for 6 people, there were enough beds for everyone. We would definitely recommend this apartment and will also look into booking again if we ever go back to Barcelona.
Big apartment to accommodate a large family! Location was very convenient to metro and tapas bars. Communication was great and tips provided of where to go and what to see was much appreciated!
Appartement heeft 2 redelijk ruime badkamers, een apart en een en suite aan de slaapkamer met dubbel bed.  De foto's zijn representatief.
Nice modern apartment on good location. Everything is close and you can walk to La Rambla and locations around it.  (cca. 15min)

Great apartment in Barcelona 
Close to las ramblas
Great place! Super clean, can't beat the location. We had a wonderful time exploring Barcelona and crashing here at the end of the day.

Posto bellissimo. Camere ben organizzate, letto comodo. 
Posizione centrale. 
Host disponibilissimo.
Very nice place and host! I suggest for a some days in Barcellona

We spent 4 nights in Jordi’s apartment. Everything was perfect. The apartment is very well located. It is no more than 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and the Gothic quarter. If you want to walk to Barceloneta, it is about 25 minutes. Parc Montjuic is also close. The apartment was cleaned and very quiet. No problem for the check-in. Thank you to Jordi and Ramon who did the check-in.
Great central location. Recommend occasional check of dead light bulbs and working appliances. It would have been a super super stay for us if not for those minor things.

Fabulous location. Numerous foodies within 5 minutes walk and great value. Apartment had everything we, a family of four adults, needed and expected. Plentiful taxis and Ubers that were well priced and we used for all of our travel, to and from beach etc.
Very excellent place to stay and Hosts were very responsive highly reccomend!
Great apartment with excellent local recommendations to match.
Très déçu...parking en sus et très excessif alors qu'il est très difficile d'y accéder...le prix de la location n'est pas ttc comptez des frais en plus
Make sure to have a phone number ready to call the friendly contact!
Would stay here again! Thanks, Jordi!
巴塞罗那的第一印象其实是好的,不知道是不是运气不好｡刚到晚上之后出去吃饭,回来之后wifi没了,然后整理床铺发现被子不够｡及时与房东沟通之后,可能由于周末,房东一直没有理我们｡晚上我们都是穿衣服睡得｡这样还是感冒了｡房东周一联系我们了,我们约了时间让房东送一下被子｡时间到了还没有出现,很失望｡过着2个人盖一床被子的日子｡

Jordi’s place is very close to various “must see” areas of Barcelona. The apartment is very secure and in a quiet area with plenty to do around the corner. Very responsive and got us and early check in with No hassle or up-charge. Will stay again next time!!

We had a great time at Jordi's place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located and although it’s a lively neighborhood the apartment is very quiet! Would absolutely recommend to stay there!

Jordi's place is nice and situated in a great location right by a train station and a main road. The apartment is clean and well kept, comes with several amenities, and is good value for what you get (in my opinion). Jordi was quite responsive when communicating, and Ramon was very hospitable as well. There were only two minor annoyances that I had: the wifi was spotty, and the shower doors didn't do a great job at keeping water off the bathroom floor. Other than that, my experience was good.
Just do it! It was great, neat and nearby everything you need.
Very good location

Jordi’s a great host. He did help fix issues we had during our stay, which I appreciate a lot. However My experience personally wasn’t great. I was given keys for a faulty lock and was locked out of the building the first night. The host fixed the issue the next day. But it was a stressful situation and ruined my first night in Barcelona. The house was not clean and we cleaned it. The host offered to bring a cleaner, but by that point we already bought supplies and cleaned the place up. The elevator wasn’t working, and he fixed that the next day which is great. 

The place is great for sleeping. We visited in November (low season) and found it a quiet place. It’s also a great location, it’s only 15 minutes away by walk/public transit from all scenic places.

The apartment is very close to a metro station (5 min walk) and a supermarket (3 min walk).  It is also within a walking distance (less than 30 min) from a lot of major attractions.  It has a decent-sized kitchen and living room for hanging out.  The apartment is clean, and pretty quiet, although the neighbors can occasionally be heard.  All in all, it felt like coming home after  long days of sightseeing.

The apt. is located in an amazing area full of great tapas bars and young people. The flat is big and perfect for 3-4 people. Flat have a big balcony. The communication to Jordi was very fast. At the end a big recommendation to this flat.

name: Victorian Home Mosman Cent. Rm 2/3
summary: We are situated in Mosman. Close to transport, the city, the zoo, Balmoral Beach, and our own village of boutique shops.  Our cosy home with open fire is circa 1890 with a stunning garden and 3 very comfortable rooms.  A continental breakfast is included. A minimum 2 nights stay
space: Both Ken and Robyn have the National Police and Working with Children check.  These numbers can be provided upon request.  We love to welcome guests into our home and we offer special rates for returning business people.  We have 3 beautiful rooms to rent in our large Victorian home.  Price is for two people only. This listing and booking facility is for the RUBY Room ONLY.  If you wish to book our other rooms you will need to do separately through this site.  If you have trouble locating please don't hesitate to email me.  The Ruby Room - has an oak slatted double bed. With French doors this room has a lovely ambience.  There is a small TV. This room accommodates two.  https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/6404761 Indigo's Room - looks out to the front leafy garden. This room has a TV and a comfortable brand new queen sized bed.  This room accommodates two.   https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/6080070 Emma's Room - the largest room situated in our attic which can accommodate 6 people. This roo
description: We are situated in Mosman. Close to transport, the city, the zoo, Balmoral Beach, and our own village of boutique shops.  Our cosy home with open fire is circa (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) with a stunning garden and 3 very comfortable rooms.  A continental breakfast is included. A minimum 2 nights stay Both Ken and Robyn have the National Police and Working with Children check.  These numbers can be provided upon request.  We love to welcome guests into our home and we offer special rates for returning business people.  We have 3 beautiful rooms to rent in our large Victorian home.  Price is for two people only. This listing and booking facility is for the RUBY Room ONLY.  If you wish to book our other rooms you will need to do separately through this site.  If you have trouble locating please don't hesitate to email me.  The Ruby Room - has an oak slatted double bed. With French doors this room has a lovely ambience.  There is a small TV. This room accommodates two.  https://www.ai
neighborhood_overview: We live in the centre of beautiful Mosman situated on Sydney's Lower North Shore.  We are 5 min walk to a beautiful village filled with exclusive shops, restaurants and cafes. Our house is the perfect location for visiting executives with a trip to the city only 15 min away.  The famous Balmoral Beach is a 15 min walk downhill. There is also a free bus to take you there and back.  Mosman is surrounded by a National Park with beautiful bush and coastal walks. Minimum of 2 nights
notes: We have 3 rooms available for rent at all times.  Please book each room separately as per links indicated.  https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/6404761 https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/6080070 https://www.airbnb.com.au/rooms/6405208
transit: We are only 2 min to buses which are direct to city, Chatswood, Northern beaches, Taronga zoo. We have a local ferry - 20 min easy downhill walk. Ferry goes to Circular Quay in the city.
access: Kitchen (please no cooking but available for basic food preparation, use of microwave and BBQ), dining area, outside sitting area, front porch, basic internet, TV.  Meals can be enjoyed in the dining room or outside in the beautiful courtyard.   A cot is available if required.
interaction: As little or as much as you want:-). We live in the house so we are around most of the time. We love having guests and we are very happy to offer you any advice you need.
house_rules: No parties or loud music. We are an older couple and love our home. We respect your privacy and quiet time so we would appreciate you respecting ours:-). No eating in the bedrooms please.  The carpet is new and a guest spilt tea  and left a mark which has been treated,hence strictness about no eating or food in the bedroomThe lounge area is a private space for the owners. In the Winter months reading in front of the open fire is allowed.

host.host_about: I am a retired teacher living in beautiful Mosman with my husband.  We have a big house and love to meet people so we would welcome you into our home.

reviews.comments: Listing description accurate
Lovely location close to everything we needed and also close to lovely beach. Room immaculate and comfortable though a little hot. Weather in Sydney was unusually hot.

Robyn and Ken were lovely. They both looked after us from the beginning and worked hard to ensure that our stay over NYE was as comfortable as possible even to the extent of driving us to a NYE fireworks viewing location... I would highly recommend Robyn and Ken and their beautiful Mosman house to anybody traveling through Sydney.

We received a very friendly welcome from Robyn and her husband Ken. Robyn gave us a cup of tea in the garden as soon as we arrived. We immediately felt more like friends than paying guests. The room was spacious, and the bed comfortable. Robyn also made available a continental breakfast at a modest additional charge. Being able to put through a load of washing was a big bonus.
Thanks both for a very pleasant stay!
So much appreciate your thoughtfulness Robyn, it was a great joy to stay with you, thank you

This is a wonderful place to stay! The house is beautiful and filled with character, the area peaceful and convenient.

Robyn and Ken were excellent hosts and made each guest feel very comfortable. All in all, this was a delightful experience and I wouldn't hesitate in going back if the opportunity arose.

This was my first airbnb and I think I struck gold. Robyn and Ken were the perfect hosts and made me feel at home from the time I first arrived to the time I left.
I would recommend this airbnb to anyone who wants the perfect hosts in a very convenient location.

Robin and Ken were the most charming of hosts, their home felt like a home away from home. Nothing was too much of a problem. 
Easy walk to Mosman shops and 20 min casual walk to Balmoral beach.
Would stay here again.
Robyn and Ken were the perfect hosts. Went way beyond normal host efforts to ensure our comfort of needs. Delightful experience and we will be back.
Robyn and her husband are so kind, like back to my home. you can not miss her and her home
Wonderful stay and lovely people.

Robyn and Ken were lovely hosts. We arrived late the first night and they kindly made arrangements to accommodate that. They also let us leave our cases on the day we left so we could go to the beach and collect them in the afternoon.

The house is on a quiet street, a short walk from the bus stop and some nice bakeries, cafes and restaurants. You can also walk or get the bus to Balmoral beach and Taronga zoo. Robyn and Ken even offered us a lift but we decided to walk down to the beach. We got the bus back as it's quite steep.

We actually stayed in their other double room, not the one in the photo, but the two rooms looked essentially the same. A nice, comfortable room and bed. The bathroom is shared but that wasn't a problem. There were other guests too but we barely saw them.
Robyn was very welcoming and made sure that I was comfortable and warm as it had just turned very cold! Cosy bed. Very good value. Good central position. Lovely host!

Robyn’s place is to n a wonderful location , a gorgeous house in Mosman close to everything! The room is very nice & the bed very comfortable 
Robyn & Ken are wonderful hosts & make you feel completely at home !!
Robyn and Ken were very accommodating and easy to communicate with. Great location and lovely house.
lovely house with lovely people
Enjoyed breakfast in Robyn's lovely garden. Very nice location and welcoming hosts!

Robyn’s place is as beautiful as described, including the amenities. The location is great and near to shops, public transport and walking distance to Balmoral Beach. Robyn‘s house is tastefully furnished and you can enjoy your breakfast in their beautiful garden. We enjoyed walking through different streets to get to and from the beach. We also walked from Cremorne Point to Robyn‘s place via Mosman Bay and it is so beautiful and highly recommended.
Beautiful garden to sit in for meals. Robyn makes sure you want for nothing.  A most pleasurable stay. Thankyou. Ann
I loved my stay here. The back patio, surrounded by plants, is perfect for breakfast . Robyn is a thoughtful and caring host.

name: Big 2BR loft in ❤️of Williamsburg-5min to Manhattan
summary: Live the full Brooklyn experience by staying in this spacious artist loft in the heart of Williamsburg. Surrounded by parks, shops and restaurants, and   being just one stop away from the city, this 2BR apartment is perfect for a family vacation.
space: Spacious 2 bedroom loft in prime Williamsburg location. Lots of light coming from the windows in the living room and one of the bedrooms.  Both bedrooms are fully equipped with queen sized beds, and guests will be received with clean sheets and towels. Open kitchen and dinner table, one nice and clean bathroom. There is a projection screen in the living room and a futon that can fit 2 extra guests. Cool renovated building with an old freight elevator and awesome roof with a great view of the Manhattan skyline.
description: Live the full Brooklyn experience by staying in this spacious artist loft in the heart of Williamsburg. Surrounded by parks, shops and restaurants, and   being just one stop away from the city, this 2BR apartment is perfect for a family vacation. Spacious 2 bedroom loft in prime Williamsburg location. Lots of light coming from the windows in the living room and one of the bedrooms.  Both bedrooms are fully equipped with queen sized beds, and guests will be received with clean sheets and towels. Open kitchen and dinner table, one nice and clean bathroom. There is a projection screen in the living room and a futon that can fit 2 extra guests. Cool renovated building with an old freight elevator and awesome roof with a great view of the Manhattan skyline. The building is just 3 blocks away from the Bedford Ave Subway stop (L train), and a couple blocks from bus stops and the East River Ferry. Guests will be handed keys upon check-in. It's a 3rd floor walk-up but there is a freight elevato
neighborhood_overview: Williamsburg is New York's hippest neighborhood, packed with restaurants, cafes, shops and galleries.  It has a lot of outdoor activities and plenty green space to see.
notes: This is a family building with kids in the adjacent apartments. Loud music and parties are not permitted.
transit: Just a few blocks away from the building you'll find the Bedford stop for the L train, which is just one stop away from Manhattan's First Ave and 3 stops from Union Square.  The East River Ferry is also a couple blocks away, and it will give you a very picturesque entrance to Manhattan, as well as access to downtown Brooklyn, Greenpoint and Queens. Bus stops are a block away and there's plenty of taxis in the surrounding streets, a taxi ride into Manhattan can be as low as $10 USD.
access: The building is just 3 blocks away from the Bedford Ave Subway stop (L train), and a couple blocks from bus stops and the East River Ferry. Guests will be handed keys upon check-in. It's a 3rd floor walk-up but there is a freight elevator in the building in case there is heavy baggage
interaction: When renting out the entire loft you will welcomed at check-in and will receive instructions and a set of keys.  Contact information will be handed and requested in case there are any needs during your stay.
house_rules: No parties allowed. Be mindful of our neighbors, loud music is not allowed after 11pm. No cigarette smoking inside the apartment, you can go up to the rooftop and get a smoke with a view! Pets are allowed in the apartment but NOT on the furniture or beds.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Clean, nice and respectful. Moved from Colombia to New York almost 10 years ago and been living in Williamsburg (Brooklyn) ever since. Love to travel, eat and laugh.

reviews.comments:
We were welcomed by Laura, Juan Pablo's roommate. She was very nice and explained a few things about the apartment. 
The apartment is awesome. It was our 5th time in NYC and it was the best, by far. Clean, spacious, nice decoration, quiet... 
Will definitely come back, thanks !!
Good place, fair price. Can be a bit cold.

Juan is a fantastic host and his apartment is a great value for the location. He was very accommodating and helpful during the check in and out process, providing extra detail and hospitality. 

I'll start with his apartment next time I stay in NY. Thank you Juan!

Juan Pablo's place is exactly what it looks like in photos and accommodating my friends and I for the weekend perfectly. Juan Pablo was out of the country when I visited so his friend let us in and answered any questions we had within minutes of texting him. The location is in a perfect part of Williamsburg and we were able to walk almost everywhere! I'd definitely recommend staying here if you're looking for a genuine Brooklyn experience. I felt like a local!

name: Porto Douro - Ribeira T2
summary: Apartamentos novos, com estacionamento público, mesmo ao lado do rio Douro e do Palácio da Bolsa, na rua O Comércio do Porto nº 25. Ficam a 3 minutos a pé da praça da Ribeira e da Alfândega, no centro histórico da cidade do Porto .
space: Prédio com  dois apartamentos. No 2º piso, apartamento com 3 quartos, que acomoda 6 pessoas. No  1º piso, apartamento com 2 quartos, que acomoda  5 pessoas. Ambos os apartamentos estão equipados com: cozinha totalmente equipada, para que se sinta como em sua casa. E ainda, televisão por cabo, Internet e ar acondicionado.
description: Apartamentos novos, com estacionamento público, mesmo ao lado do rio Douro e do Palácio da Bolsa, na rua O Comércio do Porto nº 25. Ficam a 3 minutos a pé da praça da Ribeira e da Alfândega, no centro histórico da cidade do Porto . Prédio com  dois apartamentos. No 2º piso, apartamento com 3 quartos, que acomoda 6 pessoas. No  1º piso, apartamento com 2 quartos, que acomoda  5 pessoas. Ambos os apartamentos estão equipados com: cozinha totalmente equipada, para que se sinta como em sua casa. E ainda, televisão por cabo, Internet e ar acondicionado. O apartamento situado no 1º piso, e que possuiu dois quartos (ambos com camas de casal). Na hora do check-in ou sempre que preciso. Os nossos hóspedes podem desfrutar das praças em redor, bares, restaurantes e visitar as adegas/caves do vinho do Porto. E ainda passear pela cidade. Acesso a transporte públicos , com paragem de autocarros e eléctrico mesmo ao lado. A estação de metro e comboios de são Bento ficam a 500 metros dos apartamentos.
neighborhood_overview: Os nossos hóspedes podem desfrutar das praças em redor, bares, restaurantes e visitar as adegas/caves do vinho do Porto. E ainda passear pela cidade.
notes: Check-out 11h00 Check-in 15h00 até às 20h00
transit: Acesso a transporte públicos , com paragem de autocarros e eléctrico mesmo ao lado. A estação de metro e comboios de são Bento ficam a 500 metros dos apartamentos.
access: O apartamento situado no 1º piso, e que possuiu dois quartos (ambos com camas de casal).
interaction: Na hora do check-in ou sempre que preciso.
house_rules: Os apartamentos são para não fumadores, e não  é permitido animais estimação. Os apartamentos ficam localizados num edifício antigo e charmoso sem elevador.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
Good place to stay 
Close to everything
Great location, beds good!

name: Individual room in city center
summary: Flat located centrally in the city center at 200 metres from La Rambla, 100 meters from the Rambla del Raval, near the port, Placa Reial, Montjuic, Palau Guell, Placa de Catalunya, Colon, Maremagnum, the Boqueria ... Ideal for tourism and explore.
description: Flat located centrally in the city center at 200 metres from La Rambla, 100 meters from the Rambla del Raval, near the port, Placa Reial, Montjuic, Palau Guell, Placa de Catalunya, Colon, Maremagnum, the Boqueria ... Ideal for tourism and explore.

reviews.comments: A great location and apartment. A very simple room and bed, but all you need to stay in barcelona. Darko doesn't speak much english but was very accomodating
¡ Todo fue perfeccionado y muy limpio! ¡ Gracias fue un placer!

Careful it's unit 16 not 14.  Airbnb has a typo when I printed confirmation slip.  Darko was an amazing host.  He went above and beyond, let me hold my luggage an entire extra day while I was exploring the city and waiting for a companion to make larger reservations for two. His wife even sowed my leather fanny pack that ripped on my way there.  Location! Location! Location! Close to metro station and right in the middle of all the action at La Rambla.  The roof top terrace was great for tanning and totally worth the flights of stairs up. Terrific value overall.  Would definitely stay there again!

Darko was een vriendelijke gastheer. Ik belde bij aankomst aan en hij kkwam gelijk om te helpen de koffers naar boven te brengen.Hij gaf gelijk aan van mijn huis is ook jou huis. Hij gaf bruikbare tips mbt superparkt, bezinswaardigheden. Locatie was perfect, 2 minuten lopen van La Rambla. Je kon lopend veel bezichtigen. 
We gingen samen naar Placa Espanya (Font Magica) en Montjuic. Het was echt prachtig en ook leuk dat hij het met plezier deed. Het was  eeen mooi gebaar. Ook bij vertrek bracht hij mijn koffer naar benenden en dat om 7 uur in de ochtend.
Darko bedankt.

Buena tardes,
Quiero contarles a todo mi experiencia en el tiempo que estuve hospedado en el apartamento de Darko. Realmente las espectativas se cumplieron, me sentí realmente en familia, el apartamento pequeño, pero organizado ,limpio y con una gran terraza, además puedes gozar de tranquilidad y privacidad. El apartamento es muy centrico, a solo unos pocos metros de uno de los paseos principals de Baercelona " La Rambla", el barrio muy tranquilo y con muyaccceso a tiendas y lugares historicos, como museos , etc.

Darco's sweet home is right in the old town center, location is so good and convenient. But it's on the topest of the building without elevator, you might think about it if you have huge and heavy luggage. Everything is good except the bathroom is a bit tiny. 
Darco is so nice though he speaks not much English, he is generous to share everything. Thank you so much for hosting and your hospitality, I really have a wonderful experience in Barcelona :D
Tout petit appartement, mais avec terrasse sur le Raval… Bien situé si vous voulez être à deux pas des Ramblas, du MacBa etc. Accueil super sympa.
Mi estancia fue buena. lugar limpio y el anfitrión amable.

After a delayed flight, darko welcomed me to his home with open arms. He immediately made it clear that is house was my house as we chatted and got to know each other. 
His flat was just what I needed and being on the small scale didn't matter one bit because of the large sun terrace that played a central part to the apartment.  The flat was in central raval and everything was in walking distance. It was more than a room in air b and b with darko making tea and coffee in the morning and pointing me in the direction of everything I needed.
Darko's apartment is lovely and it was really refreshing to have stayed for only a night. He has a excellent balcony for beers and conversation.

Darko's flat is very close to a lot of attractions( 15 mins to Gothic area, 2 mins to Palau Guell, etc).  

The  flat is on the sixth floor and there is no lift. The room is simple and good for the price.

Darko was a very good host. He welcomed me with a nice cocktail! I recommend Darko for travellers.

Staying at Darko's place was one of the best things in Barcelona. He is such a friendly person. I enjoyed the times we were sitting on the terrace and talking. Also the room was nice - clean and tidy. Also, the flat is directly in the city center. Perfect location, not far from la Rambla.
Darko was a nice hoste. We had a drink together on the amazing roof terrace. The room was small, but perfect. Thanks!
Darko is really nice guy. He made me feel as if I'm at home. The room is very cozy, it was really happy trip. I strongly recommend staying with Darco!

Darko was courteous from the very start as soon as I requested to stay with him. He made sure I could find the way to his place and made sure I was situated, even though he did not speak much English. Darko is extremely amiable and welcoming, which are traits of a great host! He was helpful with pointing me in the right direction in regards to sightseeing or just having fun around town. I highly recommend staying with Darko if you would like to live near a bustling area for a few nights. His rooftop terrace is definitely worth the climb up the apartment building.

Darko is a very great host. I spent six days in his flat and everything was perfect. I highly recommend his place for those looking for somewhere to stay while visiting Barcelona. His flat is ideally located - walking distance to La Rambla, the beach, and many other must-see tourist spots. 

Darko was all the time very friendly and ready to help. So I felt myself very welcome from the first step in the flat. I also really enjoyed the conversations with him on the amazing terrace. All in all, a very positive experience. I would be happy to stay again in his place when I come back to Barcelona! Muchas gracias Darko y hasta pronto!!!

I find the location is the best. The room also is as the photo.
But..
1- He doesn't speak any English. (He could have mention this before i arrive)
2- The appartment is in the 5th or 6th floor. (He could have mention this before I arrive)
3- He smokes in the appartment which isn't a good thing for me, or any other non smoker guests in the appartment. ( He could either mention that from the begining or smokes in the terasse while the non smoker guests are there)
4-There are two buildings in the street with the number 16. (He could mention that he is in the one that is nearer to the La Rambla)
Super central location. Great host and basic clean apartment. Darko and his wife were very cool and friendly.

После проживания у Дарко у меня остались только приятные эмоции. Создалось ощущение, будто я приехал к дяде на каникулы. При входе сразу услышал родную речь, от чего был приятно удивлен. Накормили, напоили, на море сводили. Дарко провел пару экскурсий по городу, посоветовал кафе, рестораны, где можно недорого и вкусно перекусить и приятно провести время. Отдых прошел на 5+

Очень маленькая комнатка, можно сказать, без окна. 7 этаж, лифта нет. Летом невероятно жарко, особенно спать с закрытой дверью нереально. В комнате есть маленький вентилятор. Душ и туалет находятся на площади 1 кв.м., так что крупному человеку сложно будет помыться. Дома очень чисто и хозяин крайне гостеприимен, приятен в общении. Пара минут до Рамблы и метро, это самый центр, расположение замечательное. 
Вариант для тех, кому важно недорого переночевать в дружеской атмосфере в самом сердце Барселоны. Спасибо Darko за быстрые ответы и гостеприимство!

I've had a very nice week in Barcelona and I stayed in Darko his house. I had a good stay and I had everything I needed and I could use everything I wanted. 

Darko is a very friendly man, he was a good host and he respected my privacy.

The balcony is very nice and a big plus for his apartment. 

He can't speak English, so I didn't talk that much with him, because it didn't go that wel haha but with some handsigns we always worked it out! 

The apartment is really close to the Rambla and placa reial, very good situated. I would recommend people to stay here. Although you have to walk some stairs to get to his place, but if you don't mind that, then it's not a problem at al!

Very good experience... thanks to Darko I spent very good holiday in barcelona. Very welcoming, warm and helpfull host. The room is as it looks like on the picture and very well situate ( close to the metro, the Rambla or close the coach station for the airport).
Darko ist sehr nett und freundlich Person, hilft immer

Le logement correspond aux photos ! La chambre est très petite mais très bien pour passer un week-end ou quelques nuits solo. La douche et les toilettes sont dans la même pièce. La terrasse est parfaite pour manger et se reposer ! Darko est un hôte parfait, il m'a aidé à monter mes valises, m'a fait sentir comme chez moi. Il est très accueillant et fait tout pour nous venir en aide :) Je recommande sans hésitation !
Good guy and good for relax!

Great location, and  very close host. 

This an excelent opportunity for someone who wants to explore the city and have secure, centric option to come back at night. 

Darko will give you a great welcome. 

Place is little bit hard to find the first time, but Darko will walkyou, literally, to the place.

great experience. Darko was a nice guy. he is so friendly helpful welcoming etc :) i really suggest to stay at his house. it's a private room. a little bit problem to talk in English but it's understandable. in a word i can say Darko and his place(near to Ra Lambla) is perfeccct perfect and perfect !
La estancia ha sido buena. Darko es muy agradable, quiere que te sientas como en casa. Para un par de días la casa esta bien. Esta muy cerca de la Rambla, muy centrico.
Dargo had some friends visit him until 2 am and he usually gets up very early. Also the flat has no a good soundproof.  It disturbed my sleeping.

Great guy
Decent room, has all the bare essentials
Evertything perfect.
Darko is a very nice guy, he offered me beer right after I arrived. The room is as shown in the pictures. Great terrace.
Great location and Darko makes you feel right at home. You're right at the hustle and bustle of Barcelona but nice and quiet above the roofs. Very good place!
Ev sahibi çok iyi ve yardımsever biri. Oda en üst katta olduğu için biraz sorun. Diğer her şey gayet iyiydi

Darko responded to all my messages instantaneously and offered me a drink on arrival. He made it clear from the start that his home is my home for the duration of my stay and that's how I felt. He's very friendly and his command of English is good enough for him to respond to my questions or to have some basic conversation (not sure why some people have picked on this as some kind of deficiency, it's not and he certainly tries his best). The bathroom is tiny but sufficient. His terrace offered a nice respite from the hustle and bustle of the city. Thank you Darko.

Darko é um host respeitoso e discreto.
Ele ajudou no que foi solicitado e deu as orientações de lugares bacanas pra ir.
A localização é ótima, perto da Rambla e de alguns museus.
O único problema, para quem não tem boa mobilidade, é o fato da moradia ficar no sexto andar, sem elevador. Por outro lado, o terraço é muito agradável!
La estancia en el departamento  fue bastante agradable. Personalmente recomiendo mucho el lugar por su ubicación y fácil acceso.
Todo correcto.

Darko has great personality and helpfull for his guests, also his place in the heart of this great city and la Rambla. Even you dont need to have public transports.. his flat have great terrace to Mt montujic (something like) Thanks him for all great welcome.

Darko was very nice, and greeted me at the doorstep.

The little outside roof is fantastic!
