En vacances avec mon fils, nous avons été très bien reçus par notre hôte, chez qui on se sent bien. Situé en plein centre, on a pu profité aisément de nombreux centres d'intérêt. L'appartement est dans une rue calme, avec une terrasse qui permet de profiter du climat, en oubliant l'effervescence de la ville juste en dessous. La salle de bain est petite certes, mais on retiendra avant tout, l'accueil et la gentillesse de Darko.
Darko is a friendly and welcoming host. The flat is clean, quiet and in a great location. All in all, a great choice for central bcn.
Con Darko mi sono trovato benissimo, una persona disponibile. L'appartamento era perfetto. Camera non troppo grande ma perfetta per le mie esigenze.

I contacts Darko straight after he accepted the booking to say that I had infact already found another room but forgot to cancel his booking and asked if he would kindly refund it and he said do it through air bnb which meant no due to the terms and conditions so my mistake. But If that's the case and I won't get a refund then by the same token I won't cancel the booking and give someone free money. My right.
Le logement est très bien situe et propre. C est très agréable. Dario est un hôte accueillant et sympatique, de bons conseils. La terrasse est un plus appreciable
Had a nice quick and short stay. Serves it purpose and cheap. Thanks
Great place, very central.
nice location
A gentle man. Great location.

Darko's place is in a great area. I rarely used the metro since Darko's place is well centered in the city. Darko was also a very helpful host. I travelled solo and it had been my first time in Barcelona, so his tips were greatly appreciated.
Excellent host.

Its a very good located appartment nearby Las Ramblas easy access to public transport. You have around plenty of restaurants, pubs, clubs, coffee shops or markets. Darko is very hospitable funny and permissive guy. I really enjoyed my 5 nights staying
Nice and clean place. Everything worked with Darko!

Darko was awesome and the room was perfect. It was really close to everything and Darko was super nice and helpful when it came to helping me find places to eat or visit. Its up 7 flights of stairs but totally worth it with an awesome view and hangout spot on the patio. Highly recommend this Airbnb

Darko is very welcoming, makes us feel at home, accommodating for arrival and departure. I didn't speak any Spanish, but we were able to exchange with a few words of English.
The room is small but the layout and decoration make it very comfortable. The bathroom is very small, but everything is clean. Located on the 6th floor (no elevator), in a quiet area, 5min from the cathedral, right next to the Rambla, it's very convenient!
I strongly recommend a stay at Darko's.

Darkos, 
Was a great host and amazing person to chat too. He made me very comfortable in his home and looked after me. His a decent and good person.
The place was great. Perfect area, safe, great view. Be wary of those stairs though, kicked my butt the first few ascents

El piso de Darko es a la vez muy silencioso y perfectamente situado, en pleno centro de Barcelona, con habitaciones sencillas pero limpias, y el lujo de una terraza espléndida. Otro lujo de ese piso sencillo es el mismo Darko. El y su esposa son huéspedes excepcionalmente acogedores y amables: Darko me esperaba abajo para subirme la maleta, durante mi estancia de 2 dias él y su mujer generosamente me ofrecieron café turco y sangría, charlas y sonrisas….Recomiendo el piso de Darko!
Darko have been very welcoming, helpfull and nice! The apartment is very well located and the building is quiet. The beautiful terrace is perfect for relaxing!

Best location in Barcelona, 2 min walk to the biggest street in town. Photos accurate, small bedroom but was perfect to sleep 1 night. Darko and his family were really sympathic, inviting me to chill on the nice terasse with them. Recommend!

Everything was perfect! The flat is on the small side but perfectly functional and there is a lovely terrace. The location is amazing, just off La Rambla and walking distance to everything. Dario was very welcoming and checking in and out was easy and friendly. Amazing stay!
A great location, nice place, friendly host

Chambre conforme aux photos, petite mais bien équipée avec un rangement, un miroir, un porte manteau et une fenêtre avec double vitrage. L'appartement est propre et la salle de bains petite mais fonctionnelle. La cuisine est fonctionnelle aussi et la terrasse est géniale pour les repas ou prendre l'air. Darko est un super hôte, agréable, arrangeant, je me suis vraiment sentie à l'aise chez lui. L'appartement est au sixième étage sans ascenseur mais Darko m'a aidée à porter ma valise. La rue est fréquentée nuit et jour mais la chambre donne sur une cour très calme. Les ramblas et le métro Liceu sont à 4 min à pied. J'y retournerai sans hésiter!

La habitación es básica. Para pasar una o dos noches o si se busca algo realmente económico en un sitio muy central. Tiene una terraza de fácil acceso,  no hay ascensor y son varios pisos (es altillo). Darko esta muy atento a la llegada, necesidades y es una persona amable.

The room at Darko's place is great! it's really worth the money. even though the stairs are high, the view at the balcony makes it all worth it. Darko is a great host and really made me feel welcome and comfortable. would definitely recommend this to everyone who likes to stay in the centrum of Barcelona
I am a solo female traveler who stayed for 1 night. For me, the experience was perfect! Great location, very clean, and Darko was kind and hospitable. Highly recommended.

Perfect place for a tourist! 3 minute walk to La Rambla and the subway. The room was clean and Darko was very kind and helpfull. There is a nice balcony to chill out in the evening. The only minus - one million steps to get to the apartment :)
El apartamento es un ático y lo único malo es que hay que subir cinco pisos por escalera, pero la ubicación es perfecta y el anfitrión muy servicial.

Darko est au top !
Il est très sympathique, souriant et très agréable .
L'appartement est très propre.
Je recommande +++
Merci Darko !
l'alloggio e' in ottima posizione con un bel terrazzino, Darko e' una persona squisita che fa di tutto per far sentire a casa gli ospiti.
Buena experiencia
Thank you Darko for your Hospitability, everything was ok from Darko.
I can not recommend Darko's place enough. It's in a great location with a great view, close to the city and the beach, and Darko is a wonderful host.
Darko es lo mas, me ayudo con todo y su apartamento es amplio, comodo y tiene una terraza espectacular. La ubicacion es ideal.

La ubicación es óptima, muy cerca de Las Ramblas y del metro. El único problema son los 6 pisos de escalera que hay que subir para llegar al apartamento. Darko es un gran anfitrión, dejando a los huéspedes bien a gusto.
Malgré la petite taille de la salle de bain, l'accueil est excellent, c'est bien situé.
Muchas gracias por el hospedaje, era exacto como estaba descripto, gracias por esperar incluso con la demora del vuelo!!! Saludos.

Darko went above and beyond to accommodate me! I was having trouble with directions and he came to meet me to help! He was absolutely a star! Would love to stay again at his place! 7 out of 5 stars due to his zero hesitation to help me!

Darko communicated well and was happy to allow me to check in when it suited me. He is kind and helpful. The location if his apartment incredible, it directly of la Rambla, you could not be better positioned. The apartment is at the top of many flights of stairs, I did not mind this at all, but if you have mobility issues, it would be a consideration. The bathroom facilities are clean but very small and basic, but the kind host and great location makes up for that.

Quarto confortável numa excelente localização! O anfitrião é muito simpático e disponível, respeitando o espaço dos hóspedes. Ajuda a carregar a bagagem até ao cimo dos 110 degraus que é preciso transpor até este sótão sem elevador. O terraço é divinal. O apartamento é todo pequeno mas não falta nada essencial, permite uso de sala e cozinha.

Room is exactly like in pictures, small but wirh enough space, same as bathroom. Terrace is a plus and position could not be better for that price
Darko is a very nice person and host.
Wifi works well.
Very good place to me. I never forget Darko's pleasure. Thanks a lot. Very good.

Quarto simples, num apartamento simples, que esta maravilhosamente bem localizado. O Darko é tremendamente prestável, simpático e responde rapidamente a todas as mensagens. O apartamento tem 3 quartos (2 Airbnb e outro do Darko), 1 wc pequenino (Mas que tem tudo o que é necessário). Tem Tb uma varanda com uma vista muito bonita sobre a torre de Colon. Uma opção relativamente econômica e certamente agradável pra ficar em Barcelona. Ter em atenção que fica num 6o andar sem elevador (pra mim nunca significou um problema). 

A casa é limpa e o ambiente é muito agradável. A 2 minutos das Ramblas, do Palau Guell, Liceo. Recomendo.
La casa de Darko es muy sencilla  con un cuarto de baño muy básico y una estupenda terraza. Todo está limpio y ordenado y esta a 2minutos de las Ramblas. Muy céntrico
Great and easy stay. Perfect for what I needed.

This was a really great value for the money. The location is incredible, close to so many things, easy to walk a ton of places and close to public transit for things further out. It is small and there are a lot of stairs but it's a small inconvenience. If you're planning on being out in the city anyways it is a comfortable and safe place to rest and keep your things. The host was very kind and welcoming, even when my flight was delayed, he was so accommodating the entire stay. This was a great option for staying in Barcelona. It isn't luxury but it is much nicer than near anything else you could find in the price range. Would highly recommend.
Excelente anfitrión super amable, sin duda volvería

Darko’s place was perfect for me.  Fairly small room but comfortable and close to a lot of good food and nightlife.  Darko was very friendly, fun and helpful.  I would absolutely recommend staying here.
Great place for a quick stopover. Close to all the main spots, easy check-in, and clean! What more could you ask for????
Great, I enjoyed it a lot! Darko is very kind and we had several nice conversations while drinking coffee on the terrace :)
Ottimo

Darko est sympa. Il vous met à l'aise.
Et puis l'appart' est juste à côté de la Rambla. Dans le quartier de Raval, un des plus vivants du centre ville.
La ubicación de la casa de Darko y su amabilidad hacen que este alojamiento sea genial para pasar unos días en Barcelona.
Darko was so accommodating with check in and really hospitable. His apartment has a beautiful terrace view and I felt really comfortable in it.
The location is amazing. Darko is a great host. The bedroom is OK but a little bit cold in the winter. And the shower space is very tight. The cost benefit is OK.

C est une place modeste et prope à petit prix parfaitement située dans le centre ville. Darko est cordial et chaleureux.
Dans cette gamme de prix avec en sus une jolie terrasse , c'est parfait.
Darko is a friendly person. He makes you feel at home. His place is in the city center. I recommend it

这应该住过最棒的小家了,就是主道上,旁边有营业到很晚的Pizza店,所以一个人旅行肚子饿也不用怕,距离兰布拉道非常近,很安全
房东是个很好的帅大叔,订完房间就立刻联系我了,把房子收拾的一尘不染,床单每天换,离开时留在阳台查讯息,大叔用了三个小时在收拾房子,好细心!阳台充满阳光还有房东看护的小鸟伴奏,好幸福!
Thanks for the great little chats and coffee Darko!
Thank u

This is a great value place in a wonderful location! Darko was very friendly and accommodating. The location is perfect allowing you to walk everywhere you need. The place was clean and comfortable, just as advertised.
층이 5층정도 되는데 엘리베이터가 없어요 참고하세요!
Amazing location in the Gothic Quarter. Walkable everywhere. Small, but totally fine bathroom and room. Nice patio for relaxation. Darko is a great host.
Great location if your wanting to get around the city, the stairs are a bit of a pain but worth it for the balcony. Also a Great host, very relaxed and accommodating. Highly recommended.
Overall 10/10 experience. Thank you Darko for being such a cool storyteller and great host. I will come back for sure :)

Darko is a fantastic host. The flat is quite cozy but if you're just using it as a small place to stay while you're exploring the city, it's perfect. There's a great little terrace that gets the morning sun, so if you're travelling in summer you can sip a coffee, or a sangrea, out there and take in the sounds of the city. One thing to note is that there's a second room which may mean that you're sharing the flat with others during your stay, but if you're up for meeting new people, again that shouldn't be too much of a problem. Also, if you're travelling in early spring like I did, the flat can get very cold. Darko gave me additional blankets and a storage heater so it was warmer, but just it's something to note. Either way, I would definitely recommend!

Darko is a super host!! Everything to the center, he gives local tips on where to go, place is clean, walking distance to a lot of things . He also have a rooftop where you can go have a drink which is nice. Book darko he’s Awesome
Muy buena ubicación, lugar amigable. De confianza.

Darko is a wonderful host and very accommodating in every way.  This is the perfect centralized location for seeing the sites and easy transportation around the city and to the airport. His terrace is amazing and beautiful to have a drink or morning coffee. Would return in a heartbeat!

Darko, прекрасный и гостеприимный хозяин! Легок в общении и в гостях у него максимально комфортно. Отличное расположение совсем рядом с La Rambla. Квартира небольшая, но очень уютная. Большая терраса. Комната и ванная комната небольшие, но очень чистые. Замечательно провела время. Спасибо!
Muy buena ubicacion y muy limpio. Darko es muy servicial y disponible. Estancia muy confortable. Gracias
Комната находится в самом центре, расположение удобное. Размеры комнаты и квартиры не большие, но это с лихвой компенсируется открытой террасой. Дарко очень гостеприимный хозяин.

Darkos welcomed me with a Serbian spirit upon arrival. The home is in a great location and very easy to get to all of the main attractions. The terrace is amazing and by far the stand out reason I booked Darkos home. Darko is very nice and check in and out was very easy. I would stay here again if I return to Barcelona.
Cheap room in a great location near La Rambla.  Very helpful and warm host.

Great communication from Darko. My flight was delayed badly and I arrived in the early hours of the morning. He was perfect and told me not to worry. Easy to find, just off La Rambla. Right at the very top of stairs. Great balcony for open air space. The place is small but adequate, a different sort of shower, bed was comfortable. Everything was clean and Darko was really kind and a very nice host. I found my stay to be just what I needed. Thanks Darko.
I stayed at Darko's for the Primavera Festival. Darko is the kindest of hosts, and the location is perfect. Would definitely come back.
Great location to explore the city
楼很老旧,公寓内也设施简单,卫生间非常小,但热水还足｡位置方便,楼下就有小超市,步行两三分钟就到兰布拉大街､Liceu地铁站附近｡在巴塞罗那性价比已经不错了｡因为是顶楼,能看见天和远处的蒙锥克山,每天听海鸥热闹的叫声和老城的钟声,一个人怡然自得｡

Darko is both laid-back and a gentleman, with a comfortable room in a great part of Barcelona -- right in the Gothic Quarter.  I enjoyed meeting him, felt at home while staying with him, and was right where I wanted to be within the city.
merdivenlerle probleminiz yoksa gayet guzel. darko inanilmaz arkadas canlisi, ailesi de ayni sekilde, kucuk ama hersey gayet temiz. lokasyon mukemmel
Everything was fine, nice location, Darko speaks a little english. Downside is that the bathroom is super small. It's a good place overall.

Bella e prima vacanza qui a Barcellona.  DARKO e' stato di ottimo aiuto per suggerimenti e ospitalita'.
Sarò sicuramente da lui il prossimo anno!
Great host and location. Bed needs to be replaced.

Hello guys, Darko place is located in the heart of city, 2 minutes walking from la-rambla. Darko place is very nice with a big balcony where I had chit-chats  and local tips from darko. This place is worth staying and I recommend it 100% . Enjoy your trip to .
Good located in Raval area. Eight floors up, good for the leg workout;)
great place and great experience with dark.

Darko is a really nice host and you will enjoy your stay at his place. The apartment is in the middle of the center and everything is within walking distance. Cons - climbing 6 floors up with no elevator.

Den Aufenthalt habe ich als sehr angenehm empfunden. Darko war sehr nett. Und auch die anderen Mitbewohner. Am Abend auf der Terrasse zu sitzen ist einfach super. Auch die Lage ist sehr gut, zu den nahenden Bars und Clubs. Die Wohnung ist einfach eingerichtet, hat aber alles was man braucht. Ein superextradetail: auf der Terrasse ist eine Außendusche! Also echt klasse bei heißen Temperaturen.
Ich würde wieder buchen!

Darko is a great host. I came later than communicated due to transportation issues but Darko waited and welcomed me with a great smile even though he was already late for his work. This place is on 5th floor, so be ready to have a good work out. I visited during peak summer time, so the weather was really hot and place being on terrace got more hotter.

Darko is a good host, helpful with suggestions as well as carried my bags  for me... the room was very small but adequate. It would have been helpful to know that the flat was soooo many flights up! Also, if you’re short, be aware that you might need to stand on top of the toilet to flush it as the flusher is all the way near the ceiling!

Darko est un super hôte, très accueillant et chaleureux.
Super arrangeant de l’arrivée au départ!
Toutes les intentions sont là.
Localement supert bien placé. 
Logement très calme, jolie vue sur les toits de Barcelone et grande terrasse! Logement propre et bien préparé pour le confort du visiteur.
Rien à redire.
Merci encore
Nice although a bit tiny place to stay at the center of Barcelona at reasonable price. Darko is a very welcoming host.
Darko es un anfitrión muy simpático y completamente fiable. Solo me quedé dos noches pero me hubiera encantado haber podido estar mucho más tiempo!
Lovely host and lovely place!  Recommended without reservation :)
Darko was friendly, communicative, and timely. The space isn’t huge (and it’s a lot of stairs to walk up), but it’s in a great location and the apartment was clean and a good value!

I stayed at Darkos' home for 5 nights. He was very hospitable, he even helped me with my luggage up and down the stairs at the beginning and end of the stay. The place is easy to find, just showed the taxi driver at the airport the (Hidden by Airbnb) maps location. The room was perfect for me as a solo traveller. Only 200m from La Rambles, heaps of great restaurants and bars just s short walk away. A great value place.

Darko is a kind, helpful host. The room is exactly as advertised. The location is unbeatable though, a minute away from Las Ramblas and public transportation. It was a great launching point to explore the city. The apartment is up about 5 floors of stairs.

Дарко прекрасный и гостеприимный хозяин. Сам писал, спрашивал во сколько приеду, встретил у подъезда! Если нам что-то требовалось-писала Дарко и через 10 мин все получала))) (тёплое одеяло, штопор и тд).
Расположение шикарное-в самом центре 2 минуты от Ла Рамбла. В пешей доступности все! Магазины, кафе, достопримечательности!
Комнатка маленькая, но не едут в Барселону чтоб сидеть дома)) 
Единственное, что стоит отметить: квартира на верхнем 7 этаже и нет лифта! Со спящим ребёнком 2 года подниматься было то ещё удовольствие... зато все наведённые калории сжигались

Satisfaite d'avoir séjourné dans cet petit appart mignon et fonctionnel et Darko est quelqu'un de sympathique, sociable, ayant le sens de l'hospitalité et du service. 
Le coin terrasse est MAGNIFIQUE!!! Que ça soit pour les petits-déjeuner du matin ou les soirées détente le soir. L'espace est grand avec des assises sous différents niveaux, du coup on peut profiter à plusieurs du beau/bon temps du sud tout en ayant en échos, l'ambiance extérieure.

Diese Wohnung von Darko ist sehr zentral gelegen. Alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind sehr gut zu Fuss oder per Metro erreichbar.
Die Beach und der Hafen nicht weit entfernt.
Barcelona ist eine wundervolle Stadt , jung, aufregend , spritzig und immer eine Reise wert.
Ich komme gerne wieder.
Great location and fantastic view!
Assolutamente consigliato. Posizione ottima, Darko è davvero gentilissimo, il balconcino è favoloso. La casa è un po’ spartana ma non gli manca niente. Ci tornerei sicuramente.
숙소 위치가 바르셀로나를 관광하기에는 완벽하였다. 그러나 시설은 낙후된 상태였고 엘리베이터가 없는 아파트의 꼭대기 층은 한국사람으로서는 적응하기 어려웠다.

Alojamiento cerca de La Rambla , un sector muy turístico. El departamento está en el octavo piso y no hay ascensor; habitación pequeña pero cómoda . El baño también es muy pequeño .Darko es bueno para conversar y aclarar dudas sobre la ciudad.
Perfecto!!

I had a good experience spending five nights in Darko's apartment. Darko is an excellent, very friendly host, who communicates very well . The location of the apartment could hardly be better, just off the Rambla in the heart of Barcelona.  The apartment is nonetheless very quiet, and there is a small roof terrace. There is even a TV in the room. But this is a rather basic accommodation that may not be for everyone. It is an older building, and Darko's apartment is the attic, up more than one hundred stair steps, no elevator. The toilet doubles as the shower, and it is tiny, barely over a meter square. Showering with the handheld shower without constantly banging into something takes a bit of practice. But if you are looking for a great location and basic accommodation with a friendly host, this could be for you.
Appartement très bien placé, et hôte très sympa ! Salle de bains un peu étroite mais fonctionnelle.

Le logement se situe au 6e et dernier étage mais ils se montent plutôt bien. Important à savoir : il n'y a pas de chauffage, ce qui est écrit dans la liste. Mais en hiver, il fait très (voir très très) frais (rhume). 
Darko est très disponible et très réactif pour tout souci, toute demande. 
Le logement bénéficie d'une terrasse bien agréable pour le petit déjeuner au soleil, surtout en hiver ! Fil pour étendre du linge.
Parfaitement placé pour découvrir le centre ville à pied (200 mètres de la Rambla, 10 minutes de la plage et 15 minutes du bus pour l'aéroport). Supérette Simply à 20 secondes et petits commerces pakistanais dans la rue.
Nice place in a very good location. Darko is a welcoming host and makes you feel at home. Recommend.

name: My Little Guest Apartment
summary: Bright and cozy little one bedroom apartment in a two family home. My family lives right upstairs and can help you with all your needs. Its a perfect place to relax after a long day of sightseeing. My two cats will most likely want to greet you too. The apartment is private but the front entrance and hallway is not. We cater to families with kids and can offer all the conveniences of home with your requests.
space: Sleeps 5 adults and a toddler or infant, I have a full size bed in the master bedroom, and bunk beds in the living room, and a toddler bed or pack n play for a baby or toddler and a sofa bed that turns into a twin bed for one adult. A small kitchen, not ideal for a large meal, but perfect for warming up food and preparing light meals. The bathroom is small and private. We have a large screen TV equipped with Apple TV. And a play area for kids.
description: Bright and cozy little one bedroom apartment in a two family home. My family lives right upstairs and can help you with all your needs. Its a perfect place to relax after a long day of sightseeing. My two cats will most likely want to greet you too. The apartment is private but the front entrance and hallway is not. We cater to families with kids and can offer all the conveniences of home with your requests. Sleeps 5 adults and a toddler or infant, I have a full size bed in the master bedroom, and bunk beds in the living room, and a toddler bed or pack n play for a baby or toddler and a sofa bed that turns into a twin bed for one adult. A small kitchen, not ideal for a large meal, but perfect for warming up food and preparing light meals. The bathroom is small and private. We have a large screen TV equipped with Apple TV. And a play area for kids. I like to cater to families with young kids. At the moment, I have available, a bassinet, a nursing chair, nursing pillow, a walker, toys, a
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is mostly Asian. Plenty of playgrounds to expend that extra energy before bedtime. Grocery store and pharmacy just three blocks away. There's a small deli and a laundromat around the corner. Sleep deprived parents have a great cafe right on the corner.
notes: If you are looking for a place to party, please look else where. This listing is in a family home and is family friendly. There are two cats on the property but they will not come into your apartment unless you leave the door open. I have two other guest rooms in this house that I share my common spaces with, your space is not shared.
transit: The 7 train is a 15 minute walk away at a nice slow pace. The Q65 stops just feet away from my front door. Take that to the 7 train in less than 5 minutes!
access: I like to cater to families with young kids. At the moment, I have available, a bassinet, a nursing chair, nursing pillow, a walker, toys, activity gym, and a glider, bed rails, and a bouncer. For daddy, we have a large screen TV and a Netflix account on apple TV.
interaction: I will definitely come down and greet you, but we live upstairs.
house_rules: I expect my guests to be considerate and respectful of my family and of my other guests. No loud music, no drunk frat parties, no smoking of any kind, no profanity that can be over heard by my two year old, and no shoes (they ruin the floor and other things). You can come and go as you please but do so quietly during sleeping hours. This is a home of rest and tranquility, not of WOOHOOOO! There are plenty of other listings to suit those needs.

host.host_about: Me? I'm a happy house wife with a 5 year old daughter , 4 year old son and two cats. My kids keep me very busy so i usually stay upstairs and you have the rest of the apartment to yourself. Come to Flushing and discovery Asian pastries, bubble tea, Korean BBQ, best vegetarian restaurants around, beautiful parks, interesting shopping, and hand made noodles. Come to Flushing and visit the Unisphere from the worlds fair. There's more to New York than just Manhattan you know.

reviews.comments: Linda and her husband were great hosts. They provided everything we needed: towels, plates, silverware, everything. Her husband was generous enough to offer to pick us up from the airport and answered any and all of the questions we had about New York. The apartment was cozy and private. We would definitely stay again!

Linda and Robert were very warm hosts who are very generous & gracious. It was great getting to know them in our small short stay of 17 hours :D.
The place was ample for my husband and I but can accommodate a family of four or perhaps some a group of close friends. I like how Linda is making this very family friendly for those with very young ones by including a bassinet as a sleeping space.
The room was in construction while we were there, but well put together for our stay. It's obvious that all will be arranged perfectly in the end. Linda shared great & warm personal decorating ideas that should leave guests remembering her space. 
Pops Diner was a great recommendation & walkable breakfast spot that features one of the Landivar's figurines - you gotta check it out! Plus the diner was great for food & prices. It shows that it's been an icon in the area. We trekked to the Queens Botanical Garden and ended that with a tea and dessert at Tous Les Jours - a must!!! Delicious & best croissants plus a moist sweet potato mousse cake - oh my! And I'm a sucker for Harney & Sons tea.
A stroll back to Linda's for picking up luggage that they were SO graciously guarding while we enjoyed the day. I like the location, so close to Laguardia. PLUS we were kindly driven to & from airports for a lot less than taxis. The best!
We hope to keep in touch with this passionate kind couple for future stays.
Linda and her husband have been very helpful to me and my friends. The apartment is clean and the price is reasonable as well. I would definitely recommend the place to everyone!

We were only able to stay one night but we loved it. We also came in a little later in the evening so Linda made sure that we had the door code and that my name was on the apartment that we were staying in.  It was very clean, minimal, and perfect for what we were looking for.

Very nice place for a family or  friends vacation. huge and privacy, and it has a kitchen which you can cook. the bus Q65 is just in front of the house and it takes you to subway 7.  Will come back again if traveling in the same area.

The apartment was exactly as pictured, check in was a breeze as we were supplied with entry codes rather than a personal key. Only mild issue is that our apartment door didn't come with it's own key, however there was an adjacent apartment of renters and the hosts were just upstairs so we felt secure without a doubt. The apartment is squeaky clean, and the kitchen is bigger than you expect! The room with bunk beds and the room with sofa tv and such are the same room, but a sizable living room//children's room. Linda was extremely personable and flexible when our checkout time needed to be moved in the morning, and they were getting ready to pick up the next renters from the subway! Excellent bnb, excellent hosts!

We spend 2 nights at the Landivars place. They were very friendly and welcoming hosts. Robert picked us up at the subway station near their house and only after we found out that we can take the Q65 bus in front of their house to go to the subway station which was very convenient. The neighborhood looked safe even in the morning while we waited for the bus to arrive. The house can accommodate 5 since they have one full size bed, one bunk bed and a sofa. It's 40 mins train ride to Times Square but the line has an express train which is much faster. Overall, the Landivars are great hosts. Thank you.

Stayin at Lindas place was great, she made us feel at home and was very attentive to our needs. There is ample space in the apt. We were a party of 3, and it's was more than enough space. We will definitely be contacting Linda again next time we're in town for an exploraation trip. Thanks.

Linda was welcoming from the beginning of our e-mail correspondence. She was responsive to my inquiries, and helped me feel reassured that I would have a comfortable stay at her apartment. The listing description was accurate, and met my expectations. I felt safe in the neighborhood, and found parking without a problem in the evening. She was a wonderful host. Thank you, Linda!
very large apartment. Three big beds. Big kitchen and bathroom. Great 70 " TV, very quiet place!
We like to stay in this kind of place rather than hotel. It's more comfortable to my family.

It was a success to get there cause we had too short time to find a place to stay. 
It is really a wonderful place with great hosts. There is everything in the room you may need. Everything is so clean and smart. While staying there our family was feeling the great care about all guests. Linda and Robert helped us with everything. They made us remember Queens in a warmest way!

we only stayed at the "little apartment" for one night and we arrived very late and left relatively early so the only time I dealt with Linda was electronically. But I must say she was very patient with me. The days leading up to our trip were chaotic in the extreme for my family, and I quite frankly did a poor job in communicating with Linda. If she was frustrated, and she should have been, it never showed, and in our previous communications Linda was quick to answer, friendly and informative. 

As far as the apartment it was very clean well stocked with everything you need and Flushing is a great ethnically diverse area with great affordable restaurants and easy access to Manhattan.In closing, Linda had some cute personal touches that showed to me that she enjoys the hosting experience and I feel bad that I did not get a chance to meet her and her family

Linda's apartment has everything you need to visit NYC on a budget. It is just shy of a 1 mile walk to the 7 train, which takes you into Manhattan. We were in town to go to a Mets game, and this place is particularly convenient for this sort of trip. There are plenty of yummy restaurant nearby, though be prepared for a pretty severe language barrier is you are an English speaker.

Though we did enjoy our stay, there were a couple of hiccups here and there. Our door-code was inaccurate, which led to a 15 minute wait outside of the apartment. The apartment was also out of toilet paper. There is free parking on Linda's street, but we did get a ticket because of street-sweeping (there was a well-hidden sign that we missed). The internet was a bit slow. Finally, it was a bit unsettling that you could not lock your specific unit when you left it vacant. The door-code gives you access to a building with 3 of Linda's units, but your specific unit can only be locked when you are home as you are not given a key.

Regardless of the above, I would stay again if I returned to Queens. The location may not be for everybody, but I loved it. Linda is a very attentive host, and appears to dedicate a great deal of effort to maintaining her properties.
the apartment was basic but clean and met all of our requirements

This is my 10th time to NYC and 4th time stayed in Flushing, but very first time to do Airbnb. I had to say i'm impressed. I've heard mixed comments from friends, and i expected much worse. The rooms are good size and very clean. Large kitchen, clean towels in the bathroom. Even the deco is to my liking. The whole unit can be for yourselves. Price is very compatible. Although we only met Linda when we were leaving, i can sense her warm welcome and hospitality.

We had great time staying at Linda's place. Her husband picked up from Laguardia airport. It is about 15 minutes away from their place. The house is about 15 minutes walk to the 7 train Main St station. We use it all the time. The apartment we stayed has one bed room, one kinda living room with a bunk bed and a HUGE TV,  a kitchen and a bathroom. The place is worth the price. The hosts are super nice. Their daughter is soo cute!!! Love her!!
Linda and her husband had prepared everything for us. Though it seems old, the apartment is very clean and comfortable. The television is awesome!!!! We had a lot of fun in New York and this place.

The apartment was great and we felt like home, with comfortable beds and big kitchen. Linda prepared a very accurate booklet about the flat and the area and I was very pleased with myself for finding a parking spot on the street! I'm a big fan of the Flushing area and it felt quiet [as far as NYC goes] and safe. Let's not forget the best Asian food around :)

The house is clean, spacious, cozy, bright and very beautiful. The neighborhood is safe and full of shops, restaurants and near a large park.
Not far from the apartment there's the stop of the train and in 25-35 minutes you can reach Manhattan
Linda and Robert are two wonderful people. When I asked something they quickly help me better than I could wish for.
Some hours before my departure I had a problem , I hurt an ankle and I could not walk so we phoned asking if they could pick us up and Robert came quickly.
I advise you to stay in their home!!!

Linda, She is very nice host, she wrote my name on the front door. And when I have some question she reply me immediately. The house very nice with 2 Bedroom and 1 kitchen. The house is very convenient. Thank you so much Linda. My friends and I have a good experience in Flushing. Hope to been there next time.

Linda and Robert were very responsive and welcoming.  Robert picked us up and dropped us off at the Airport for a very reasonable fee - making coming and going easy as well. Their home is quiet and comfortable and in a safe neighborhood.  The Q65 bus stop is a few houses down - so a 5 minute bus ride gets you to the 7 subway line for easy access to the City.  It worked well for us with it's kitchen and 3 beds.  I highly recommend staying with them.
Great experience and Linda was willing to help us with our issues! And Robert gave my friends a tide to airport as well! Thank you for being a wonderful host! Love this little apt! Thank you !

For the third year in a row, I have been a guest at Linda's for my stay in NY. I felt welcomed and very comfortable as I climbed the stairs and walked inside. We were able to catch up as she gave me a tour of the new room. All in all it was a great visit and I plan on coming back again.

The house is very clean and comfortable,also the host is very nice people too. When I have problem Linda will help me as soon as possible. If you want go to the Times Square,just walk a 15min to subway then take the line 7 and don't need to change. Just about 30-40min you can go to the Times Square.
房東Linda人非常好我有任何需要她都會即時幫助我,房子非常的乾淨及舒服｡從住的地方到時代廣場,先走個15分鐘到地鐵,在坐7號線就能直達,不需要換車,非常的方便｡
Linda was very helpful and accommodating. I would highly recommend staying here.

老实说 房子离地铁很远｡大概有2km左右,走路要花15分钟左右｡但是房子门口就有Q65坐四五站就在地铁口下车｡而且2小时内是免费换乘的｡房子有点旧,但看得出房东还是花了小心思｡
To be honest,the house is not near the subway. It will taken 15mins by walk. But we can takeQ65 which is in the front of the house,about4-5 stops to subway. It is free transfer within 2 hours. 
House is sweet,but little old. It is clean.

Linda and Robert were amazing hosts and extremely helpful. My wife and I were travelling with our 1 yr old which isn't easy - Linda thoughtfully setup a high chair and a few toys for our child. Our flight into LaGuardia Airport was delay to past midnight due to bad weather but Robert was helpful enough to come to the airport to help us. Their place is comfortable and very short walk to public transportation. The neighbourhood is nice and peaceful which is what my wife and 1yr old son needed for sleep. I highly recommend this place.

Great apartment, fully furnished w everything we needed. Close the the train to take into NYC, so it's perfect. The hosting family was terrific! Can't say enough good things. Very kind, outgoing, & easy to get along with. They helped us out w any questions we had & he even gave us a ride to Citi Field & to LaGuardia. Our trip went smooth in big part to them being great host....& of course a METS win helped too! :)  I would not hesitate booking this again in the future!

Linda and her husband were very nice. They made sure we had everything we needed and were available to answer any questions we had. The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe. Parking was on-street and not too hard to find most of the time. Would definitely stay here again.

Linda's place was cozy and when we arrived, the lights were on and the music from the Apple TV was playing. There are two very cuddly kitties that greeted us. The place is located about 20 minutes from the subway, or a shorter bus ride. If you walk, you can stop and get some fantastic Chinese food along the way at the Food Court. Time's Square is about a 45 minute subway ride away. Linda's place was quiet, safe, and they had umbrella's for us to use when it rained! I would definitely stay there again if I go back to NY. Very nice couple with two very quiet kids.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at My Little Guest Apartment. It was clean, had plenty of space for my brother and me, and had all the amenities we needed: huge TV, wifi, a nice desk to work at, a kitchen with everything provided, and a functional bathroom with plenty of hot water for the shower.  I was pleasantly surprised by the neighborhood; a short 5-minute walk away (on Kissena Blvd) was a two block area with a great Chinese bakery, a coffee shop, a medium-size grocery store, and a variety of small restaurants. I had a wedding to attend in Flushing, so it was really convenient location. Thanks, Linda!
It was a pleasant stay. I will stay here if I return to New York again.
The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Our experience was great, Robert and Linda are both very nice and welcoming.  Room was clean and it is exactly what we expected.  Highly recommended!

We had a great stay at Linda's Little Guestroom. We planned a short getaway to NYC's food heaven, Flushing. The place was clean and comfortable. Everything we needed. A short, safe walk to Flushing's Chinatown and the 7 train. Convenient bus stop, basically around the corner. Linda was accommodating and organized.

The family, Linda and her husband, were very welcoming.  We were there over the Christmas holiday and they left gingerbread cookies for us.  My son was welcome to play with their children and I spent time in their living space while they wrapped presents.  We stayed in both a room and the apartment and were very comfortable.  The home is a bit old and could use some repair (peeling paint) but everything works fine.  There is no door between the rooms in the apartment and parking is challenging after late afternoon.  
I strongly recommend their home if you need a warm and friendly place. It's convenient to mass transit and there's free WiFi and Neflix (but no cable tv).  
There are two cats that are also friendly.  
They are really nice people and very responsive if you need something.  Stay there.
Nice host. The space is enough for three or four. We actually had six. But the host kindly offered air mattresses. Great stay.

Linda was a great host and her apartment was just as described.  She was very helpful with directions and restaurant recommendations.  The location is very convenient, the bus to the 7 train is right outside the front door.
warm welcome, fantastic apartment, and very delightful service
It's a good place. The hoster is very nice and provided everything we need.

Yes, if you wish to stay in a safe place, then this choice is yours. Very friendly young family will provide you with all you need. We were staying here for 4 nights. It's a nice apartment with everything you will need to spend several days in New York. About 50 minutes to reach Manhattan by walk and subway train. There is La Guardia airport nearby. So, you will hear planes taking off and landing. However, we were sooo tired in the end of the day to hear anything. Place is good. We do recommend it to those who are not hunting for highly comfortable place for a low price. You will enjoy your stay. Especially if you love Chinese food and pleasant safe neighborhood.
Everything was very clean and ready. The place is close to Manhatan. We don't have any complaint. Nice apartment, clean beds, barroom and kitchen.
The location for where I needed to be in Flushing was good.  There are plenty of markets and restaurants within walking distance.  This is an okay place is you just need a place to sleep and shower.

The apartment was exactly as listed.  Linda and her family had left us a chalk drawing welcome message--a warming sight after our long drive!  We enjoyed coming home to our airbnb each evening after a long day of exploring NYC.  Linda and Robert provided some helpful tips about the town and traveling into the city.  We would definitely stay here again!

Linda was very accomodating when we got there. The neighborhood is quiet.The place is spacious and neat.  There is not enough parking space for our rented car. We have to wake up early to move our car to avoid parking tickets.

We're a family of 4 and stayed with Linda and Robert for 2 weeks. Robert picked us up from the airport. They were quite warm and helpful with regards travel information and the logistics to get to the different attractions. We rented 2 rooms with a private kitchen and bath. Their home is a good 45 minutes to Midtown (plus walk and bus ride of 10 minutes) and  another 25 minutes to Downtown. The location seems safe and the environment is family oriented. There's a laundromat a steps away and a bus stop as well. I would suggest though that the hosts would add outside locks in the rooms so as to ensure privacy. The toilet is quite small and the kitchen needs a bit of sprucing up. The rooms need more than a fresh coat of paint but the hosts' warm was made it worthwhile. We would definitely stay with them again in our next NYC trip.

The house is in the residential area but it also pretty close to the Flushing town and stores. The street parking was pretty easy. The place is matching to the descriptions. The place is very roomy with one big bed and one bunk bed. kitchen has stove and refrigerator. Overall the place is clean and comfortable.

This little appartment was perfect for the needs of three young adults visiting New York and surrounding areas! Ideal location for everything, Main Street local shops & dining, public transport and easy to access from the highway!

Must visit this area of New York, I definitively suggest it!

Linda was great. The place was perfect and exactly described and a great value. Really big space in new york for the price. The area in flushings and queens is most definitely a cultural experience. Right across from an enormous hindu temple as well. The enormous TV in the living room with netflix and apple TV was a bonus.
Yes house was nicely managed by linda and It was the same as shown in advertisement. So in short, this is a good apartment to live. Transportation is very good and area is also safe.

Great experience overall, Linda was very responsive. Great location, super close to some amazing food. Just a few blocks away is what looks to be just like Chinatown in Manhattan, but maybe even better. Super easy to get into Manhattan by subway, it's a direct shot. The only thing is that it can take some time, probably around 40 minutes or so. But not bad at all.

This was my first ever AirBnd experience and it honestly was one of the best experiences staying in a room. Linda was very respectful and she changed our check out time. Helped with directions and check on us. Great experience

Linda was an excellent host. The accommodation was exactly as described in the ad. Linda was extremely accommodating when our plans changed at the last minute and had to arrive a day earlier. Would definitely recommend!

The location was superb for things in the Flushing area, parking was NYC usual. A little work needed but not impossible. Linda and the family were welcoming when we met them. Nice space and made for a great stay for our time in NY.

Thanks to texting, we were in touch with our hosts before our arrival, and got in and settled very easily. 

The apartment was accurately described on the Airbnb site and was clean, airy (and cool in a heat wave), light and super comfy. 

We loved the neighborhood - we could walk to lovely Kissena Park and to the amazing Chinatown and Queens Botanical Gardens.
Very nice accommodations, lots of room for the 3 of us.  Nice neighborhood.  Parking is on the street and had no trouble finding a spot.  Chinatown nearby is definitely a  plus.

Our family of 4 wanted a New York neighborhood experience when we visited NYC for a wedding.   We stayed at My Little Guest Apartment and it was just what we were looking for!   The location was great!   There was nearby street parking, it was easy to get to the #7 train, and it was enjoyable just to walk around the neighborhood and check out the temples, Chinatown and historical buildings.  The beds were comfortable, and there was just enough kitchen so that we could eat some meals there rather than eat out.  Linda and Robert were responsive to our questions and requests as we traveled and while we were there.  We all wished we could have stayed longer!
Overall average experience compared to the price. Bit noisy.  Owners live upstairs and were responsive.
Linda's place was great! It's a very quiet area and only about a 10-15 minute walk to the subway. There are several great restaurants nearby. I would definitely stay here again!

Robert picked us up from the airport. The flat is nice and cozy and the ac works. I haven't slept in bunker bed since the 2005, nevertheless Linda's place is a great bargain for a family trip.  Everything is in walking distance. And thanks for the heads up lecture on how to use public transportation. And if you happen to speak Mandarin as we do, it's  double the fun

Thanks for a wonderful experience, Linda!  It was just like home. Your location was perfect, there was plenty of room to stretch for four of us. The kitchen had everything we needed and more. The umbrellas were great help. We took your advice and took the subway into Manhattan instead of our car, what an experience! Yes, we were aching all over the next day, but we will do it again in a heart beat! Much thanks!!

We had a pleasant stay. The apartment was clean, and Linda was very kind to accommodate our arrival and departure schedule. I had to contact her a couple of times about toiletries and the wifi not working and I wish she'd responded more promptly but I do understand that she's a busy mom. Overall, a good place to stay if you're visiting NYC. Transportation was very easy and we enjoyed the diversity of the neighborhood.

Linda and Robert kept in contact with us leading up to our travel date.  They met us on arrival and were  more than welcoming. Anything we needed they helped with,even to borrowing a guitar so my daughter could sing in Manhattan. Great people great stay.

Linda was a lovely hostess. The appartment was spacious and just right for our family of four with two small children.
We felt welcome and even could use the yard in these hot new york summer days. Linda always hat an open ear and many good tips to get around. 
So thanks a lot!
Todo genial.muy limpio y estupendo para cuatro (Website hidden by Airbnb) familia muy amable y la zona tranquila con buen acceso al centro en metro o bus.

First of all I would like to say how super friendly Linda was when we arrived and departed! Gave us lots of information about getting around the city and to the tennis (which is why we were staying in Queens). The space was great, clean and had everything you might need including toiletries, towels etc. This is an excellent place to stay especially if your looking for affordable accommodation in an expensive city! Thanks Linda :)

We went to NY to watch the US Open Tennis.  The location was very convenient.  A short bus ride to the subway station and 1 stop on the train brought us directly to the US Open.  
Linda was great, she gave us useful tips of the neighborhood, and even let us borrow her Metro Card (which we refilled at the end).  Parking was a challenge.  But then, it is NYC.  We decided to avail of the parking lot beside the hospital of $16 for 24hrs.
She contacted me to ask for my arrival time.  She was friendly by text and gave a good recommendation for a dim sum restaurant.

Linda was incredibly friendly and helpful.  She offered to provide us with extra baby accessories, and was available via email/text not to mention upstairs if we needed her assistance.  The rooms were spacious, and the location in Queens is safe and fun to walk around.  Parking was challenging, but this is expected in a busy Queens neighborhood.

Linda and Robert went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable and easy. We were traveling with a one-year-old and we could only take so many toys with us, but Linda left several toys in the apartment that kept our little one entertained during our down time. She also provided a pack-n-play for her to sleep in. The location was ideal for the wedding we attended at the Queens Botanical Gardens and is close to several parks and a Greenway all the way to Allen Pond Park (12 miles there and back), which was a great jogging route.

Great place to stay. Me and my friends had a pleasant stay in Flushing over the weekend. It was my 2nd airbnb experience and even though the owners live on the house upstairs, we were given our own space and it was very private. Apartment is also spacious and comfortable, overall I highly recommend it.
Linda was a great host and the apartment was perfect for our short trip.
厨房配备很好,Wi-Fi很快｡
Good location, the host is friendly
We had a good stay in Linda's home. We were very well received.

Great affordable place in a great location.
I stayed here while participating in a conference nearby and I really enjoyed my stay. The place is clean and was perfect for my needs. Hosts were very friendly and helpful

I will review based on a family of three staying, with a toddler. 
Communication was quick and easy.  Linda/Robert will make you feel very welcome.
For a minimal fee, pick up and drop off at the airport is included and that is hard to beat.
Th space was big and could easily fit more kids/people. Linda left a few children's toys that entertained my daughter well.  The beds are comfortable and neat. It is a space, especially, in NY that is hard to find especially if there is more than 2 in your company. 
They are updating the space as much as they can and it will show some parts (toilet/bath) are a little outdated but it is more than functional and clean, most importantly. With items/choices that you can use, e.g.: shampoo/conditioner, lotion, etc. There were some occasional odd noises at night and we figured out it was from the heater. 
It is a good walk to the subway station, maybe just 10 mins but would stretch to 15-20 due to heavy foot traffic. Then again, you could take the bus to make it quicker but we did not do that.
The convenience to food and restaurants is excellent! Food that is really good and cheap.
It is a safe, family friendly neighborhood  and a great place to stay after a day out in NY, and that was primarily the reason why we chose their home. And we do not regret it! Thank you Linda and Robert!
Nothing fancy but fine for what it is. Only complaint would be the heat. We had no way of turning it down/info on how to work it and it became very warm at night.
Safe neighborhood, lots of stores around and train station close by.

We had such a great stay at Linda's! It was nice and cozy! Her husband Robert picked us up and dropped us off at the Newark airport! They made are stay very convenient and easy! Bus stop and subway very close to the house! Great place!
Linda was very welcoming and provided a comfortable experience for our stay in Flushing. Definitely recommend her home if you are visiting for interviews at Flushing Hospital.

They are really nice host. Their kids are also nice and sweet. When I contacted with them, they gave me much information more than I have expected. However, I sometimes heard strange sounds like knocking. And when I took a shower, it was getting colder. But I could spend good time thanks to them! Thank you so much for your help.
The room has a good location with Q 65 bus to Main Street station. The facility in room is adequate and sweet. The room has a bad voice-blocking and it is a little noise from upstairs.

Quant apartment that offered me a quiet night of rest.  Linda had excellent communication with me and kindly answered all my questions.  I was greeted by Robert as soon as I entered and felt very comfortable during my stay.  Was able to get dinner after just walking a block.  Highly recommend!
Great spot. Very friendly

Great family home with your own private space in the apartment. Residential neighbourhood very close to Flushing Main St and 7 subway. Loads of great Asian food. Try Pops Diner on Kissena Blvd for a proper old fashioned diner. Linda was very welcoming and quick to reply to any correspondence before we arrived.

Space was clean and Linda was available to communicate with throughout our stay.  We were there over a very cold weekend and I would say it is a bit too far to walk to the subway (7 train), but bus was very easy to use to get there instead. I thick it would have been an easier commute if traveling without children.
The bedroom and bunk beds don't have a door separating them, but we found it was still enough privacy needed with the screen they have in the space.  
We felt safe staying there with a small child. And even with the bitter cold outside, the apartment was nice and warm.

Linda was nice host with good communication. Linda's apartment was little bit old, especially kitchen and toilet. Location is not near with train station. You would need to take bus in order to reach to the train station. It was extremely difficult for us to take bus early in the morning and late in the evening.

We had a wonderful stay at Linda's guest apartment! First off she's an amazing host and went out of her way to provide amenities to us like baby swing, high chair etc. She was extremely communicative and responded within minutes to questions, and check in was super smooth.

The apartment itself was perfect for our needs with a bunk bed and main bed. Everything was pleasantly set up, with slippers, towels, and linens all provided! 

When entering, the living room/bunk bed room is connected to the bedroom, which is then connected to the kitchen with the bathroom off to the side. One thing to note if privacy is an issue is that all the rooms are connected without doors in between (except bathroom of course), just to be aware~! It wasn't an issue for us but if someone wanted to watch TV and others wanted to sleep it may be difficult.

We had a great stay at Linda's apartment and would love to stay again! Thank you so much for a nice experience!!
aLovely house and great people. Provide us drop off service in 6am. So kind and helpful! The house is same as photo.
Good place for my overnight stay. Felt comfortable and safe to have my baby stay here. Willing to accommodate us with anything we may have needed for the baby. Also good on communication.

We had a wonderful time at Linda and Robert's place! Robert picked us up from the airport where our flight was 2 hours LATE! We arrived at past 12midnight and Robert was there waiting for us with patience and for that we are truly grateful.  Both Linda and Robert are very accomodating and helpful in every way.  Linda let us borrow a Metrocard and patiently taught us how to use it. The place was clean and cozy, complete kitchen with a big ref, stove to cook or heat food...  very importantly we felt safe in the neighborhood.  There are good places to eat nearby that is not that expensive (all are included in Linda's recommendations)... plus, there is a Laundry place a few steps away that you can drop off your laundry and come back for it already clean and folded for you... very convenient if you want to travel light.  Thank you Robert and Linda for a lovely time at your home!

Our family enjoyed the homey space very much! Linda is very helpful and explained everything we should know about the great TV, nice kitchen and bathroom. There are a cute living room and garden. Near a bus stop for metro station so very convenient when you have luggage.  Quiet neighborhood!

Great apartment that served our needs perfectly for our weekend getaway to catch a Met's game . We walked from the apartment to Citi Field in about 40 minutes .
Linda and Robert are great hosts and their apartment is clean and cozy .
Great cafe a few doors down for coffee , smoothies , and sandwiches .
Old-school diner a couple of blocks away .
Asian restaurants galore .
Safe neighborhood .
Look forward to returning for a future baseball game !

This is a wonderful place to stay if you are traveling with young children. We stayed here with our 2-year-old and 6-month-old and Linda provided a high chair, baby playpen, and some fun toys and offered other things that we might have needed for the children. The neighborhood is quiet and residential. Commute to the 7 train was simple. Comfortable, clean, and cozy.

Finding a family-friendly home on airbnb can be limiting, but here at Linda's place, a well-equipped, comfortable, clean, quiet and family friendly home is possible. Linda and her lovely family, went above-and-beyond making their apartment welcoming and inviting.  I traveled with my 3 year old (special needs) toddler and the first thing Linda said "I (Hidden by Airbnb) d yours son's diagnosis because I wanted to make sure he was well taken-care of".  Who does that??? It sure warmed my heart.  Her husband Robert, picked us up at last minutes notice from the airport and Linda was able to answer every question we had.  Every day in their home, showed me how much love and thought they put into it.  Thanks for providing us with such a memorable stay!
Linda is very friendly. We are very enjoy to stay here. We will come back here again.
Calm and cute little apartment. Great place to spend the night in NYC and visit the city. It is also near a Hindu temple. But street parking is a bit difficult.

Linda's little guest house was perfect for a week vacation for my family. Perfect for a family with children, small and very cute. She was very friendly and responded as quickly as possible. She had everything set up including towels and house slippers. Her cats were not a problem at all and this is coming my mother, ( has an allergy to animals). My family and I will definitely be coming back if we're ever in town again.
Safe neighborhood,the room was larger than we expected,Linda and Karl where very friendly and welcoming.

Linda was very helpful. She knew I was interested in booking a week prior and went above and betond to help me book the space .even when i was having some trouble to .
Her check in said 12 but she told me it was old so i had to wait a bit to get the proper check in time from her .

Upon going into her home it is as pictured. 
And the space i booked is as pictured. It was very nice . She even had the fathers day banner up and candles lit as requested before i got there . 
Looking at kitchen i was satisfied MINUS checking sink and realizing there were previous dishes..
Linda told me the previous guest cleaned them but she suggest i clean them....
One other thing was that i was cooking a fathers day lunch and decided to bake homemade biscuits .which winded up being a waste because i had to throw my whole batter out due to the oven not working .
Overall . Me and my family DID enjoy our stay . I do recommend them although for me it was a little distance.

If you are a family traveling to New York for anything you should stay at Linda's place. She will bend over backwards to make you feel like part of her own family. I booked a last minute night on Father's day so I could drag my 20 month old and 4 year old to a Mets game (two small kids with just dad). We drove up from MD and came back the next day. Staying with Linda was much cheaper and convenient than a hotel. If you want to feel like you are staying with family (the good kind) stay with Linda.
역에서 생각보다 멀었고 식기들이 좀 더러웠지만 친절하고 숙소도 나름대로 있을만합니다.

Linda is an extremely welcoming host, so kind and helpful in every way. The apartment was spotlessly clean, the beds very comfortable, and Linda was very responsive and accommodating for any requests. This apartment provides basic accommodations in a safe neighborhood, and we had a very relaxing and restful stay. I would gladly return. 

I also liked staying in a normal (non-touristic) residential neighborhood, where you get a feeling for how real New Yorkers live. Parking during the day is very easy, though  in the evening you may need to circle the block to find a space -- but I felt very safe walking around at any time of day. There is a charming cafe 3 doors down that serves delicious fresh sandwiches and salads and excellent smoothies. And a few blocks away is a huge Hindu temple with an excellent cafeteria open to the public that serves the best dosas in New York. Yum!

Very nice, clean space. Air conditioning units in both rooms work well. They have a very friendly cat (can be kept upstairs at your request)! Beds were comfy, sheets were clean.  Large TV in the corner. An excellent experience!

Very handy spot in a wacky culturally vibrant district with lots of amenities. Commute to central Manhatan was 35-40min max and walk was pretty short and handy. Space well loved and cared for and private with very welcoming cats to meet you at any hour of the day.

Linda and her family were great host. We drove all the way from South Carolina and because of road construction and traffic we arrived later then predicted. Linda left the light on for us.  She even put a pack-n-play in the room for us for my 1 year old.  Me and my sister both have babies.  My daughter is one and her son is five months and it was very comfortable for them.  I would definitely recommend this place for families..... You won't regret your stay!

Linda was a lovely host with great communication. The space was as advertised and was quite private. If you are not used to walking, you may find it challenging to get there from public transport but it's fairly straightforward. The location is walking distance to shops and transit, but is in a quiet part of town. The space was clean and spacious for a NYC location, and quite homey.
An unusually accomodating hostess, Linda made us feel right at home. Her kiddos are the cutest! It was great to come back to a lovely open space to sleep after running around in the city all day!

So glad we found Linda's place! It was perfect for our family vacation to NYC with two young children. 

The neighborhood was safe and generally quiet. Decent amount of foot traffic but not bad. Bus stop nearby if you don't want to make the ten to fifteen minute walk to the 7 train. 

The apartment was roomy and had everything we needed. There was a grocery store a couple blocks away so you can get things to stock up the fridge or anything to utilize the kitchen. 

From the start Linda answered all of our questions and provided great recommendations. We paid for Robert to pick us up from the airport and to take us back to catch our flight home. That was very convenient. 

Linda went above and beyond in meeting our expectations for this stay. We were sad to go and felt at home from the beginning. 

We highly recommend this place for families, or even a couple wanting extra place with a kitchen.
Linda was such an amazing host - it was so easy to communicate with her and she replies back very quickly. She was so willing to help out in any way. The place was very spacious and comfortable.
Just bring your own amenities and enjoy your stay. Quiet and safe neighborhood minutes away from the city.

Communication with Linda was perfect. 

We went to a concert at Citi Field and Linda's place was a great choice.  It's tidy, quiet and comfortable, and has a full kitchen and bath.  The neighborhood is safe and parking, which can be somewhat challenging, was found a block from Linda's place.  

Very close by is Sweet Haus, which is a very good breakfast/lunch place, with freshly made juice and other healthy options.  Tasty coffee and croissant sandwiches and panini grilled wraps. 

The bedroom is really pretty and we had a great time!

Great place to stay!! 
Easy to communicate :)

Linda was very helpful and easy to talk to. She made the place very kid friendly and had all the toys cleaned and ready to go! The place is nicer than her pictures and love all the IKEA furniture! Netflix and Apple TV were very nice bonus. The neighborhood was quite at night and felt safe.

We came to stay at Linda's place as it was a good base for us while we went to the US Open. We had a very friendly greeting by Linda and her lovely daughter. The apartment itself was functional and served us well for our stay. Linda maintained excellent communication throughout our stay and was always on hand to answer our questions, though never interrupted our privacy. I'd be happy to stay again should we return to Flushing.

Linda's place is nice, clean and quiet.  It has a private entrance and provides a lot of privacy.  It had  an Apple TV unit with a very large screen and free netflix.  We had a one bedroom with a double bed and there is a set of bunk beds and a full size couch in the livingroom. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen has a sink, a large refrigerator, stove, table and chairs.  There is a very small full bath with plenty of hot water. The place is a little rundown but everything works. The only problem was the burners on the stove.  They didn't all work.

Linda's place was close to the center of Flushing in a unique and vibrant neighborhood.  Linda was easy to in contacted with.  4 of us stayed there to go to the US open (tennis), and the location was extremely convenient.   The room was slightly outdates, but very nicely decorated, spacious , clean, and and quiet.  We didn't use the kitchen, but the spacious and comfortable kitchen with large refrigerator, sink, and stove will be perfect for a longer stay!! Linda's place  was perfect for our trip and I would love to return to her place.  Thank you so much, Linda :)
Cozy and quaint little apt in Flushing.  Everything I could have asked for and more!
The apartment was clean and was as advertised. I booked the place for my parents and they found the place cosy and comfortable. Thank you for the hospitality...We will surely book again!!!
Nice place with a lovely cat.U can get everything here.房东挺不错的,设备齐全,而且周围也方便虽然离纽约市中心有点远,但是还不错
Linda is super-sweet.  A great host.
If you need to place that you stay with your friends her house is perfect for that.
Accueil excellent, informations claires et précises sur la manière d'arrivée et les choses à savoir pour se déplacer en ville. Un hôte disponible et discret. Parfait

Communication with Linda was perfect. The place is tidy, quiet and comfortable, and has a full kitchen and bath. Safe neighborhood. Our every legit demand was fulfilled and the host was supportive. Netflix and AppleTV were the bonus. Robert dropped us to the airport on request. Had a great chat with Robert on the way to the airport, about their work. Nice people, with artistic and creative abilities. Highly recommended for families.
Linda and her husband were wonderful to us and made our stay very easy and we felt very much at home.
Linda's place was clean and cozy.  Would definitely stay here again the next time we're in NY.

What a great spot to call home for a few days while visiting the city with young kids.  Linda and her family provided us with anything we needed including snacks (warm cookies!), travel tips, and of course food recommendations (pops diner!).  Although a few minutes away from the nearest station, the walk allows you to appreciate the nice neighborhood and get a feel of how friendly everyone is.  I recommend this home for those wanting to bring kids to visit as there is ample room compared to cramming kids in the city.  She even helped and provided us with a pack and play, stroller, and toys to prevent having to travel with them!  Thanks so much for allowing us into your lovely home.

Linda and her family are soooo sweet! They have two little lovely children and cute cat. Her house is warm and the beds are very comfortable. We checked out a little bit late than 10am and she kindly let us stay until 1pm. Apple TV is really a plus point.
It really felt like a home away from home. It was a great place to stay.
Great place to stay! 100% recommend to everyone who might stay.

Conveniently located in a quiet street, but close to an area full of restaurants and stores. Linda was very friendly and it was extremely easy to communicate with her; she welcomed us and made sure that everything was ready when we checked in. We recommend her apartment for a couple or a couple with kids.

The room was just what we needed, we were out pretty much all day and only came back to sleep. The beds are comfy and the rooms are spacious. 

It’s about a 20min walk to the subway and it’s at the end of the line so it’s quite far from the tourist areas. However the neighbourhood is good with some cheap eats.
Great place loads of little touches that make it complete would be great for a family with young kids

It was a great stay for us. The apartment and the garden are perfect for kids. Linda and her family are very friendly. Everthing was fine and as described. The apartment was very clean and well equipped. There are a lot of things for babies and little children. Communication with Linda is easy. She was very helpful before our trip and answered all my questions within a minute. Check in and check out was no problem. We can highly recommend Linda, her family and the apartment. Thanks again for giving us a great time.
Very friendly hosts in a great location near Flushing.  Everything was as described and you'll be pleased with everything.
Great place to bring the family! It was very safe there, and Linda was incredibly welcoming.

Linda eas lovely gracious host. Apartment bright and clam and roomy. Neighborhood quiet gor New York. Flushing is great for Asian everything. Cocktails at the coop or leaf rooftop bar on the Hyatt. So close to 7 line for getting into manhattan or Brooklyn. This place was awesome
Really nice place with access to all of Queens

Linda's place at Flushing was a wonderful stay. The location was convenient for some yummy Chinese breakfast and close to the metro. We really enjoyed the decor and meeting their beautiful family. Would definately recommend this place to anyone!
Linda and her husband are very friendly and very thoughtful. We really enjoyed our stay.
Great hosts, awesome location with easy access to bus, and the 7 line into the city.  Quiet and safe neighborhood.  We had a great stay.  Thank you
Nice place for a family. Within easy walking distance to restaurants transport and shopping. Friendly host who will interact as much or as little as you like. Great setup

Linda was outstanding with her hospitality and was very helpful with every questions we had. We were unsure staying in Queens but it is good to say we would definitely be back and book with her again. Recommend any families with kids to stay here! Thank you for welcoming us into your home.
Great stay with Linda. She was responsive to all my questions and made the entire process seamless. Highly recommended.
Linda’s place was perfect for our family. There were toys available for the kids and plenty of space for our family. Linda and her family were welcoming and the space was tidy and clean.
Convenient and comfortable space. Host was very friendly and willing to accommodate challenges due to flight cancellations.

Linda and her family are definitely in a league of their own when it comes to Airbnb hosts!
Let me start by saying that this is a wonderful place to stay for anyone looking for a little more space and amenities than the average NYC Airbnb can offer (a private apartment with it’s own bathroom AND a full kitchen!), in a great safe neighborhood with a fantastic multi-cultural personality. Linda goes above and beyond-more than just offering a place to stay, she enables you to have the smoothest visit possible and offers a lot of great extras like parking and pickup options and really goes out of her way to make sure you have what you need. Clear, fast communication and a friendly and efficient host. So for anyone traveling to the city, this is a great Airbnb. 

But it’s particularly ideal if you are traveling with young kids. Linda and her family have set up the space to be comfortable for everyone in the family-lots of places to sleep, toys and essentials like packnplay, high chair, potty seats are available as well as thoughtful touches like childproofed furniture and device charging stations, removable soft floor surface for crawling babies and toddlers, etc. We were traveling with a 7 month old and the homey aspects of Linda’s place and her helpfulness in so many ways really made a trip that could have been very stressful much more smooth. What a lovely individual she is-we felt like friends rather than customers! 

I also loved the area-although some have mentioned noisy streets, this was actually rather quiet for a city neighborhood and the apartment itself was very quiet inside-we had no trouble with street noise at night. The area is very safe and on the many pleasant walks we took we felt like it was almost like being in a dozen countries at once with all the different cultures represented in businesses, restaurants and places of worship and the families we interacted with in the parks and common spaces. 

As far as getting into the city, I had business in Manhattan every day of our stay and found the commute very straightforward and easy-this line of the subway is easy to figure out and pretty fast since you don’t need transfers-a 30 minute subway ride after the 12 minute walk to the subway.

All in all a fantastic experience and we will definitely stay here again if/when we’re back in the area again!

Linda's place was really nice and cosy. it's a really nice place if you want to stay for a couple of nights in New York. Public transport to Manhattan is really good, you can take the express train. plenty of food in the neighboorhood. nice breakfast just around the corner. Linda has a nice eye for detail in her place (batterychargers for like every type available), toys for small children and tv with Netflix and Hulu. loved the small details

Had an excellent stay! Paid parking is right next door. Very clean! Little bit of a walk to subway line 7. Takes a while to get to Manhattan on subway.    Great Chinatown in Flushing. Asian Jewels may be best dim sum in New York.

Linda was so kind and hospitable. She saved us a parking spot on the street, helped us navigate public transportation, and gave a great restaurant recommendation. The apartment was clean and had everything we could have needed. We always felt safe and welcome. Thank you Linda!
Linda and her family are stellar! She instantly made us feel welcome and secure. Her Little Apartment was perfect for our needs, and she goes above and beyond as a host!

The house is about 40 to 50 mins by subway into the city. We thought the place was nice but could use some updates in the bathroom and kitchen.  Ideal for larger families that need more space and additional amenities such as a kitchen.

Família molt agradable.
45 minuts a Times Square amb transport públic.
Zona tranquil·la.
Flat big, quite and well connected to subway. Linda was always reachable and ready to help. Perfect house if you have children!!!
Linda was an excellent host, always responded promptly to all questions and concerns. Location is great as it is  very close to Chinatown.
We had great stay. Perfect location for the US OPEN in particular. Lovely apartment, and Linda's a great host. We'll be back again!
A great place to stay in a very hostile environment.

I chose Linda's space because it was advertised as kid-friendly, and I wasn't disappointed. After a long day of traveling on the road with my 16 month old, it was so nice to be somewhere that had toys to occupy her while I unpacked, and a high chair for her to eat in. The space was perfect for the 2 of us, quiet, and a comfortable place to stay for 2 nights. Thank you!

Linda is so kind and welcoming. She has a real passion and knack for hosting. The space is exactly as described. It’s perfect for families with small children, especially.
