The home is in a culturally rich neighborhood that is interesting to explore. It’s a bit of a hike into manhattan but totally doable with some planning ahead. Linda’s husband drove us to the airport for a small extra fee and was so kind and friendly. Such sweet and wonderful hosts!
不錯

El dpto es pequeño, pero acojedor. Nos quedamos solo una noche, por lo que no recorrimos mucho la zona. En la esquina hay un lugar para desayunar que nos encantó!!!
Pudimos dejar el auto en la calle sin problemas. Nos recibieron  muy amablemente. Gracias x todo!
There isn't much I can say that has not already been said. Linda is a wonderful host. The appartment is perfect for families with young children. highly recommended.

We had a wonderful time at the apartment and Linda was a great host. It felt like being at home.
Our son loved his room with so many toys to play with.
It is a perfect accommodation für a young family. The ride to Manhatten takes about 50 min if you walk to the train station- that was fine with us.
I would definitely stay there a second time.
Thank you so much, dear Linda!
Lovely place, lovely touches. Very comfortable and spacious. Great for families. Loved meeting Linda and her kids. Will totally come back again.
Very conveniently located. Friendly and well equipped. Easy access to public transit.  Loved the airport pick up and suggestions for alternate rides when necessary.

Linda, Robert and their family were the best hosts. We traveled to NYC with a three-year-old and a one-month-old for a family wedding. They were very easy to communicate with and worked out plans with us in advance to accommodate our small children. The space is perfect for having kids with a bunkbed, play space & bathtub. Linda also provided a highchair, nursing pillow, stroller, and pack n play for us to care for our newborn son in an unfamiliar space. On top of that, our toddler got sick while we were there and she even lent us some cold medicine. Every little thing that we could need was provided and they were just so kind and hospitable. The icing on the cake was the ability to pay for airport transport. Robert picked us up and dropped us off at the airport for an extra fee so we could avoid navigating public transit with 2 kids and 8 bags. We only wish we could have spent more time getting to know them but wanted to avoid our son spreading his germs around. Would stay here again in a heartbeat! Thank you!
Comfortable beds, kid friendly but I don’t like the sound of heating in the night
Our family highly recommend this place especially for those who have children. The amazing addition of items like a highchair makes staying at Linda‘s property that much more convenient
Very nice place and super confortable
If you have toddlers, this is the place to stay!
Great place to stay in Flushing. Plenty of space. And the hosts are very friendly!
Very nice place

Linda es súper amable, comunicativa y presta a lo que necesitamos. Nos esperó a darnos la bienvenida y a despejar cualquier duda. 
Un lugar familiar y para disfrutar.
Muy recomendable

Linda's apartment is great for families looking to relax after long walks in NYC, and down the road is all of Flushing's Chinatown to explore!  The bus stop to the subway is a few steps away; the trains (subway or LIRR) goes straight to the city; and there's a neat cafè at the corner for one's lazy breakfast.  Chinatown is either a short bus ride or a brisk 1-mile walk if you care for shrimp balls or dumplings for your meals.  We also enjoyed hanging around the apartment, and loved having a home-away-from-home to rest our tired feet at the end of the day.

Linda is a great and welcoming host, introducing us to her space and her kids even came to welcome us.
My children immediately felt comfortable with the place, playing with the toys as well as her daughter that just came back from school.
Location is great, walking distance to Flushing chinatown, lots of asian food options, and line 7 to get to Manhattan straight.
The place is clean and accurate as per advertised, with alot of personalised touches as Linda would first ask how old are the kids coming along so she could prepare.
Overall, great experience, and highly recommended.

Linda was welcoming and warm. She had many personal touches like slippers in the hallway and a private code for the front door. My 2.5 year old twin boys loved the play area and the bunk beds. She also had a potty seat available which made toddler toilet time much easier.

There were a few features that were challenging like some spaces in the bathroom and kitchen that were in need of remodel as well as the exposed radiators. The rooms also don’t have doors between them, so we had to go to bed at the same time as our toddlers (which was probably a good thing).

Overall, I’d stay again, but bring something to hang over the doorway and to make the kids room darker for nap time.

Good location 15 minutes walk to subway and great food. Much cheaper than staying in Manhattan or 2 hotel rooms. Clean.  Nice set up for kids. But apartment kitchen and bathroom are rundown and will not satisfy guests expecting modern furnishings.

The stay was really warm and cosy. I am really thankful to our host for that. The place is perfect if you are looking for the stay with your family. They even provided the toys for my Little daughter.

The communication was very smooth with the host and the location of the house was also nice. It's very near to big shopping malls like Target and Macy's if you are planning some shopping in New York. 

I requested to keep my luggage for few days and the good thing is that the host not even kept my luggage safe but they also dropped that off on time to airport. 

Would highly recommend it to anyone looking for few days stay in a quiet and calm atmosphere.
It was a very warm and cozy space. I booked pretty last minute and late in the evening and the host was very accommodating. Definitely would stay here again.

Linda was awesome with immediately communication from day number one  until our last day in the apartment.I travel with my 2 sons alone. Place was quit and peaceful. Place was cozy!  She help us with parking arrangements  for a reasonable extra fee. I will recommended this place for future guesses. Great place for families with children’s.

Linda & Robert's Little Guest House was close to a bus stop which we took to the subway to get into the city. Linda even had the pack & play and bathtub set up for our little one! Robert had a lot of local tips. The little touches such as phone charging station and music playing when we arrived made this space feel very warm and welcoming.

name: Master Ensuite - Rushcutters Bay
summary: Large Furnished Master Ensuite King size bedroom within a large 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Sydney's harbourside Rushcutters Bay. All amenities. Large balcony overlooking swimming pool, garden & BBQ area. Secure underground parking.
space: Large furnished Master ensuite bedroom within a large 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment located in cosmopolitan and harbourside Rushcutters Bay in Sydney. The apartment has a large surrouding balcony overooking Rushcutters Bay Park and the secure fob access Swimming Pool, BBQ area and gardens available for you to use during your stay. The ensuite master bedroom is spacious and sunny with plenty of storage space and contains a very large and comfortable King size bed, flatscreen TV, spacious mirrored wardrobes, bedside tables, lamps, sideboard and ensuite bathroom with large shower. The apartment has a large bright lounge area surrounded by floor to ceiling windows with flat-screen Smart TV, Large L-shaped sofa, dining table and chairs. The lounge is surrounded by the large balcony with access to both sides of the building which overlooks the swimming pool and Rushcutters Bay Park.  There is a separate kitchen with oven, microwave, toaster, kettle, fridge freezer, dishwasher, use of all c

Large balcony overlooking swimming pool, garden & BBQ area. Secure underground parking. The apartment has a large surrouding balcony overooking Rushcutters Bay Park and the secure fob access Swimming Pool, BBQ area and gardens available for you to use during your stay. The ensuite master bedroom is spacious and sunny with plenty of storage space and contains a very large and comfortable King size bed, flatscreen TV, spacious mirrored wardrobes, bedside tables, lamps, sideboard and ensuite bathroom with large shower. The apartment has a large bright lounge area surrounded by floor to ceiling windows with flat-screen Smart TV, Large L-shaped sofa, dining table and chairs. The lounge is su
neighborhood_overview: Rushcutters Bay is a lovely harbourside eastern suburb neighbourhood of Sydney, New South Wales. It is situated in a perfect location, close to the city centre. While the district is quiet, it is very close to one of the most iconic areas of Sydney, Kings Cross with loads of great cafes, restaurants, and bars. It is also surrounded by the suburbs of Elizabeth Bay, Darlinghurst, Paddington and Darling Point, Double Bay, and Rose Bay. Watsons Bay is only a bus ride away. The city centre central business district is only 3km from Rushcutters Bay which is approximately 30 mins walk or 10-15 mins by bus.  This area is ideal for tourists who like to live in a strategic location to explore the city and have a place to rest when at home or alternatively someone who possibly works within the city.
notes: There is an underground car parking space provided and also free on street parking available. Included own Key Fob and Keys for access to building, apartment and secure underground car park. There is also enough space for a blow up/air bed within the master bedroom should this be required
transit: Buses leave regularly from right outside the door of the apartment into the city and also the eastern suburbs. Kings cross and Edgecliff train stations are approximately 5-10 mins walk.  Quick and easy commute to Sydney CBD, Paddington and Bondi Junction. Bondi Junction is only a 10 minute train ride away.
access: Secure building with an outdoor BBQ, garden, sunbathing and entertaining area, swimming pool and secure underground parking space all with fob access. Wi-Fi, Smart flat screen TV, Dishwasher, Washing Machine and Clothes Dryer and utilities included.
interaction: The apartment is shared with two friendly females Gayle (29) and Beccy (26) who are both professionals working in Sydney who will both be happy to help or assist you if required during your stay.
house_rules: Smoking is only permitted outside on the balcony which is overlooking the pool.

host.host_about: I like to travel and i understand what people expect when they move into to a hotel room or an apartment when they are away from home.  That is why I tried to make my apartment suites as comfortable as they possibly can.

address.street: Wanchai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: It was a very good experience, I would really recommend this place, it is very well located, the place was very clean and tidy.
Good location but unfortunately host was quite unresponsive. This is the first time I've had this problem with an AirBnb host.
Place was lovely. Loads of restaurants right outside. Very close to transport. Would stay again.
Love everything about this apartment! Highly recommended!

Tiene una ubicación muy buena, muchos lugares buenos para salir a comer o bares, estaciones muy cerca. 
El alojamiento incluye limpieza cada semana lo cual es increíble! 
El baño es muy limpio y moderno, la ducha a comparación de otros flats, es bastante amplio. 
El aire acondicionado funciona muy bien, el wifi también es bueno, siempre hay porteros en el edificio.
La comunicación con el dueño del studio fue siempre muy rápida, siempre te ayudaban en todo.
La experiencia en general ha sido bastante buena.

The location is wonderful. The apartment is good, cleaned and modern. Daisy is fast to reply and to resolve problems. She is a good host. I and my wife stayed in three Daisy's apartments during 5 months in HK. We recommend two of them in Causeway Bay. Thanks Daisy!
The apartment is in a great Location  and Daisy is a good host quick to respond to issues. But beware if you are sensitive to smells or mold as the bathroom currently have issues with both.
The place was ok

name: Sunny top fl Private 1- BR with garden view
summary: The unit is large, sunny and spacious. We welcome one and all!  We also ask that you read the house rules and be clear and comfortable with terms before you book this property. Once your comfortable click and will happily host you and your party. All members must provide necessary background details of occupation, hobbies, and interest, clear photo/s of the faces of all members of your party.
space: Our Prospect Heights place is a lovely one-bedroom apartment located on a beautiful, tree-lined street. It is housed on the top floor of our townhouse,[ two flights up] conveniently located in what is now the center of the cultural hub of Brooklyn. This large sunny apartment is 1000 Sq ft. has a full-sized kitchen that is stocked with pots and cooking items, large living room with dining, a private bathroom, and one queen size bedroom.

We have wireless Internet access, TV with basic cable connections. We also provided these items that are commonly asked for: towels, bedding, iron and air dryer alo
neighborhood_overview: Well-situated, the location offers everything you could want: clothing boutiques, bookstore, Michelin-rated restaurants and bars, organic food markets on nearby Franklin Ave, Washington Ave and Vanderbilt Ave. For culture, we are two train stops to BAM (Brooklyn Academy of Music) and the newly constructed Barclays Center with performing arts theaters and stadium. We are a five-minute walk to The Brooklyn Museum and Prospect Park... just to name a few highlights. It is a perfect location for exploring the best of Brooklyn, within 20 minutes of central Manhattan.
notes: Infants 2 and under are charged a flat fee of $75 for the duration of your families stay. We provide a high chair, pack and play with sheets, toys, and books.  We ask that all traveling party member provide necessary details such as occupation, interest hobbies and clear photos of the face/s of all traveling members. Unregistered guests are not permitted in the house, bringing unregistered guests on premises for ANY reason voids your booking, and you will be asked to depart the premises. Please respect the house rules
transit: Travel to Manhattan is easily accessible via the 2, 3, 4, and 5 lines, all within a 5 to 7 minute walk from the house. The Q/B line is also nearby. If convenience without the walk is your preference, we are two blocks from the S train, which is a few short train stops for a connection to the A/C line, the 2/3, 3/4 and the Q/B.
access: We have wireless Internet access, TV with basic cable connections. We also provided these items that are commonly asked for: towels, bedding, iron and air dryer along with basic toiletries items.
interaction: My interaction with guests is limited, as folks who book a place with the word "private" into the description gently want alone time. That said, I’m available to answer questions as needed.
house_rules: Please Take note before you before book: All members booking the unit MUST provide clear photos of face/s. As well as basic background information such as occupation, interest, and hobbies. Do not book if you are not comfortable with the house rules including paying late arrival, early check-in, and baby fees. Valid photo ID is required on arrival for check-in for all member of your party. We are a strictly none smoking house. Other house rules are available in the guidebook in the apartment. No ordering any other shipping items using our home address. Please do not use our address for delivery of ANY items or products. We mainly ask that you treat our home with respect and care, conserve energy and preserve the good standing of the 100- year- old house. Please do not leave AC on while you are out of the Apt. A cat lives in the building but does NOT enter the guest apartment [  The apt has a separate entrance with its own door and lock]. We share a common front door leading to the stre

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I’m a freelance designer . We ownes the house and have been living here for over 10 years.

reviews.comments:
We had the most wonderful time at Demi's. It was our first trip to New York and everything was done to make us feel at home (well-equipped kitchen and bathroom, large bedroom, lots of storage...) 

The apartment is bright, clean and very calm: the perfect spot to relax after long days of walking across town. Prospect Place's location is really convenient to reach Manhattan (about 20 minutes by public transport) and gives the opportunity to discover a really nice neighbourhood in Brooklyn.

Demi is a very welcoming host, easy to communicate with, before and during our stay. We would definitely recommend her place and would love to come back there.

Beautiful appartment in Brooklyn in an up and coming neighbourhood with some brilliant bars (the Way Station for Dr Who fans) and restaurants (try the Sunburnt Calf Aussie-Asian resto on Vanderbilt). We had a bit of an issue getting in as the front doorbell was broken but after texting Demi she showed us to our flat which was great.  Good kitchen for making breakfast, a place to eat, good stereo and a huge light, bright bedroom).  All very clean.  Would recommend.

Had a really great stay here, Demi was really helpful and contact before the trip was good.

The apt was a really nice, spacious and just like the photos.

Overall would really recommend the apt after our experience.

Demi's place was great!  The location was very convenient with easy access to multiple subway stops and an easy walk to restaurants, bars, and shops.  The apartment had everything we needed.  Demi was also very accommodating, as our initial plans were foiled by Hurricane Sandy.  She made rebooking a breeze, and she was also gracious enough to let us check in early since there was no one staying the night before, which was a godsend after a redeye flight.  I would definitely recommend Demi's place!
Perfect in every way! Beautiful and clean apartment, great location to visit NYC. We were very comfortable and would definitely recommend the place.

Très joli appartement, dans une petite maison charmante. Très calme. Tout confort, beaucoup d'espaces de rangement et une très grande chambre. A cinq minutes du métro et de Prospect Park. Un endroit à recommander vivement.

We had a great stay here, the apartment was bright, spacious and comfortable and had everything we needed including a well equipped kitchen. The location was great with some good local bars and restaurants as well as mini-supermarkets if you want to cook. Short walk to the subway too which was useful. Demi was very helpful and accommodating; I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to stay in the area.

Demi´s apartment is a great starting-point for trips to Manhattan and also to discover great Brooklyn. The subway to Manhattan is 5 minutes by feet and on the way, you can visit the great an famous "Tom´s Restaurant", where you can get the best Pancakes and Breakfast in NY.

The Apartment is very quit and the large bed is very comfortable. Demi is terribly nice and if you want to undisturbed, you can. The Apartment is completely separated in the 2nd floor.

Demi's apartment is wonderful. Great light, very clean, spacious. I couldn't ask for a better place to stay. The pictures are a great representation of the space. Demi was a good communicator and getting inside the apartment was an easy process, even though it was a last minute reservation. I didn't need anything from Demi during my stay but I felt she would have been very attentive if I did. Can't say anything bad about the apartment!

Demi's flat is in an old beautiful building in a quiet part of Brooklyn. We very much enjoyed Prospect park 10 min away from the flat and the quietness at night. A different experience of NYC than busy Manhattan ! Still, several subway stations are within walking distance and can take you to Manhattan in 30 min. Lots of nice coffee place or good restaurant are also near-by (Flatbush avenue...). Demi was also a very welcoming host.

I stayed at Demi's place with my boyfriend, and we really enjoyed our stay!
The place is really cool, exactly as it looks in the pictures. The subway is a 5 minutes walk away, and there are many cafes, restaurants and supermarkets nearby. You also have Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanic Garden in the neighborhood. 
Taking the 2 or 3 subway lines, Manhattan is 20/30 minutes away.
Demi was a wonderful host, although we haven't met she left us comfortable enough to ask her for anything we need,
Overall, we really enjoyed our stay and do recommend Demi's place if your looking for a nice stay in Brooklyn.

I stayed at Demi's apartment in May '13 with my wife and our adult daughter.  We all thoroughly enjoyed our time spent there.  The apartment is great, as shown on the photos.
The double bed is comfortable with good quality linen.  Our daughter slept on the living room sofa and found it comfortable too.  I was pleasantly surprised by the low level of traffic noise in the bedroom which overlooks the street - although you are staying in the middle of a city, you could still hear the birds singing first thing in the morning.
Good selection of cafes, bars and restaurants in the local area.  Eastern Parkway / Brooklyn Museum subway station is a 5 minute walk away and from there it takes 20-30 minutes to get to Manhattan on Line 2 or 3.  We saw Demi once during our stay, she is friendly and helpful, a great hostess.
I live nearby and rented Demi's place for my mom and aunt visiting from Israel for 2 weeks. The apartment is beautiful, light and spacious and Demi could not have been a more generous host.

I had a great stay at Demi's appartement. I was there for 2 weeks and it was comfortable and convenient. The internet connection was a boon but not always cocnsistant. iIt was very hot whole I was there, a good fan in the living room and an air con in the bedroom which struggled to manage with the heat. All in all a great venue and I would go again.

Demi's rental was excellent and looked just as it does in the pictures. It was a bright, spacious rental in a neighbourhood with a lot of good restaurants, subways, and shopping nearby. Demi was a kind host, informative, and a good communicator--before our visit when we had questions about parking, she actually went over to a nearby parking garage to check out rates for us. I would recommend this rental to my friends and family.

The apartment was super dreamy. True to the pictures, it was airy, clean, and quiet with pretty light. Its close to plenty of eateries and  prospect park and the bk botanical gardens! Demi was really responsive and the key exchange was smooth. I would stay here again and recommend to fam/friends.

We really enjoyed our stay at Demi's apartment. A great location and great facilities. The apartment was really homely and spacious and the street was really quiet. There's good cafes and bars nearby with a few local stores too. Perfect for a city break!

Great apartment, bright + spacious.  Great location close to subway, Brooklyn Museum, Botanic Gardens, Prospect Park, cafes + restaurants.  A great Brooklyn experience.  Demi was a pleasure to deal with.

We loved Demi's Top Floor Apartment. This was our first airbnb experience so I was a little nervous but the apt was exactly as described and Demi was a really great host. She answered all my questions and even let us go into the apt early due to a redeye flight. The place was very comfortable and looks just like the pictures. She has a great eye for decorating. You have the entire top floor so with the windows open, it's a really nice breeze throughout the apartment on warm days. Everything is provided that you may need. Nice kitchen but we didn't use it due to all the great restaurants in the area. The apt is walking distance to Prospect Park which has a fun farmers market on Saturdays, many great restaurants, cafes and bars. It is also an easy walk to a few metro stations and the Brooklyn Museum. I would recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a centrally located comfortable place in Brooklyn.

We spent a couple of days at demi`s home in brooklyn. Such a wonderful place to get a rest after the long and hard days in New York City. The apartment is located in the second floor and was really clean and decorated as the pictures on airbnb displays it. Whenever we had a question or needed a safe bet, we could address oneself to demi. It was our first time booking an apartment at airbnb- but now we wouldn´t choose another way. It really enriched our time in New York and was the right decision. Betting is that we will come back- so we highly recommend demi´s place for a stay in New York. Thank you demi and all the best for you! Andre

This is the second time I have stayed at this delightful home but the first time that I stayed on the top floor.  It was incredible.....spacious, comfortable, well lit, colorful, homey, and warm.  Demi was so accommodating to our needs.  We came on the red-eye from New Mexico and arrived at 5:30am.  Because Demi had a check out the day before, we got to check in early and catch up on a bit of sleep.  I look forward to coming back!

We stayed 3 nights at Demis house. It is a beautiful apartement and corresponds to the images. To metro (different station) it is a 10 minute walk, from the station to Manhattan it is a 15 minute drive. 
Demi itself is very friendly and hospitable. We liked the apartment very much and we can recommend it.

My husband and I enjoyed 9 nights at Demi's lovely, bright and cheery apartment in Brooklyn. We arrived quite late but collecting the key was no problem. The apartment was ideally located to a number of subway lines and handy for local shops, coffee shops and restaurants. We arrived by taxi from the airport but on our return the subway/train trip to Newark only cost us $15 each! It was only 10-15minute walk to apartment from Brooklyn Museum subway, with all our luggage. We had fabulous sunny weather and the apartment made the most of this with a very sunny sitting room kitchen area. It is in a very peaceful area, and we slept soundly each night. The bed was very comfy. Shower was good too. Couldn't find any fault at all. We met Demi a couple of times and she was very obliging and let us leave our luggage for an extra 4 hours after check out time because we had an evening flight. We would be more than happy to stay again in the future!

Demi was a very helpful and responsive host. The apartment is in a great location in Brooklyn and provides wonderful respite from noisier Manhattan. I would absolutely recommend this apartment - we would definitely stay here again.

Garden View is een ruim en licht appartement met uitzicht op tuinen in een mooie rustige straat met 19e eeuwse brickstone/brownstone huizen, ongeveer 10 min lopen van de subway.
Slapen doe je er goed, je  bent volkomen vrij, maar als je iets nodig hebt staat Demi voor je klaar.

My wife & I used Demi's apartment for 4 nights whilst visiting friends in Brooklyn. 

The apartment is on the top floor of Demi's house. It's a great place and we'd highly recommend it. It's pretty quiet (by NY standards!) has plenty of space and is in really nice condition. It's just on the edge of the really nice areas of Prospect Heights & Park Slope with lots of good restaurants, bars, coffee shops nearby. It's also only 20 mins or so from Manhattan, so a nice location for a visit to the city.

Demi was friendly,  really helpful (with tips for local area) and responsive, arranging for keys to be left in a convenient place for us to collect after a delayed flight from the UK.

We were very pleased, and felt that it was much better value and much more spacious than pokey NYC hotel room. We like it that much that we have passed details onto our friends who live locally and often have visitors.

Thanks Demi!

Just perfect! Lovely airy, sunny accommodation, great neighbourhood with lots of good restaurants and bars within walking distance (such as Weather Up for cocktails and Mayfield for dinner), the street was very quiet and we slept well. We had everything we needed at the apartment and our host Demi was thoughtful enough to check up on us and provided some nice extra touches such as milk, fruit and bottled water on our arrival. Most definitely recommended.

My family stayed in the apartment while our floors were being redone.  It was a wonderful choice -- great condition, comfortable space, and convenient to subways.  Demi was a gracious and responsive host.  We thoroughly appreciated her thoughtful choices in furniture and amenities, and would highly recommend the apartment to anyone from out of town as well.

We loved Demi's place and could not believe how big the apartment, especially the bedroom, was. Beautifully furnished but still homely. 
The apartment was in a great spot and we had some great meals and cocktails close by, on recommendation from Demi.

We have spent 10 days during the period Christmas/New Year in the top floor apartment of Demi.  The apartment proved to be fully operational, clean and for us very satisfactory.  The positive aspects are that there is much natural light throughout the whole apartment, the large bedroom and overall nice decoration, and the overall atmosphere of the house and of the area in general is rather quiet.
The access to the metro station is not more than 15 min by foot.

Demi was an excellent host.  She made it easy for me to collect keys while she was away from the house.  She provided helpful instructions.  On the two occasions during our stay that our paths crossed, she was friendly, solicitous, and made us feel welcome.

The apartment is well-equipped in a quiet house on a quiet street, convenient to subway and shops.

My stay with Demi was comfortable and her flat was a great base for a long stay working in Brooklyn. Clean and well stocked, with a really lovely bedroom and good local supermarkets, this was a lovely place to relax away from the busyness of Manhattan.

Thanks Demi
We had a great time at Demi's beautiful townhouse. Super clean, great decor, wonderful location, friendly host! I highly recommend this place!

Staying at Demi's place  was the best one can hope  visiting New York. Great location, subway walking distance, nice restaurants and cafes, the apartment itself is a real gem: clean, confortable, spacious and so quite. Demi is the perfect host, friendly and laid-back.She helped with local recommendations and being great to communicate with. Would certainly rent again from her.

Last week we stayed at Demi's Top floor apartment. Knowing the neighbourhood from previous visits (having family living just around the corner from Prospect Place), we felt at home at once. The appartment added certainly to the feeling: beautifuly and colorfully furnished (remnants of the shop Demi once had), wooden floors, comfortable beds and sofa, huge trees on both sides, looking out on a tree-lined street on one side, a big garden at the other side, completely equipped with everything you could need (even a well stocked fridge and cupboard with - fresh - leftovers from former guests), toiletries, etc. etc. And it was spotless on top. It was nice talking to Demi, who leaves her guests at ease. But she is there when you need her and is always helpful. I would certainly recommend the apartment (and neighbourhood) from which you easily can reach Manhattan but also Coney Island. Our suggestions: our longtime favorite is Tom's diner, just around the corner, serving hefty breakfasts and lunches. Unfortunately we didn't visit the botanical garden in Prospect Park, we've heard it's a beautiful place. But we did make a bicycle tour, crossing Manhattan-bridge coming from Brooklyn, following the bicycle-path along the Hudson to the north, very nice.

We loved Demi's beautiful apartment. The apartment is very tastefully furnished and super clean, and exactly as it looks in the photos. It's roomy, certainly larger than a typical one bedder in Manhattan, and has everything travelers would need. Demi was very friendly and easy to communicate with. The apartment is located in a nice neighborhood, with plenty of restaurants within a 2 block radius on Washington, Franklin and Vanderbilt Avenues. (Chavela's on Franklin Avenue which Demi recommended was excellent - great vibe and great food.) Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Museum of Art are also close by. Overall, we would highly recommend the apartment. Thanks for a great stay, Demi!

Demi was very quick to reply and extremely helpful getting us sorted out for our trip. She gave us great advice about things to do in the area and had a great welcome pack for us. Her apartment is exactly as described and was very conveniently located near the subway.I will stay here again when i'm in Brooklyn or New York for sure. Thanks Demi!

Demi's Brooklyn apartment is absolutely adorable--a fantastic alternative to overpriced Manhattan hotels. Spacious and serene, the flat is in an ideal location--the best of Brooklyn is either within blocks or a short subway ride away. Getting into the city (Manhattan) is a mere 20-30 minute train ride, as well. After whisking through Times Square for eight days (we were in town for my daughter's dance competition), Demi's home was a welcome (and much needed) retreat. Lastly, the homemade candy our gracious homeowner set out for our arrival was promptly eaten by my dancing daughter; by checkout, Demi had delivered more--an awesome host, awesome home, awesome experience!
Neat apartment in Brooklyn really close to subway. Apartment has all the amenities you need, including coffee maker, full kitchen, etc! Demi was a very responsive host and we enjoyed our stay!

Demi had been an awesome host, and we did not have any problems with her. She can be seen tending to her small garden at the back at times, but she does not intrude into your private space. Questions posted thru airbnb were answered promptly.

Her apartment was a home away from home for us, and we were awe struck when we first enter. It was beautiful and perfect for 1 couple and a baby. Basic necessities were adequately provided. 

The neighbourhood is quiet and safe, away from the busy city life, but it was just a 10 min walk to the hip and trendy bars and restaurants. Deli and grocery stores are just around the corners. 

The shuttle is just down the block and can reach manhattan in 30 min. 

The only complaint I have is carrying our heavy luggages up 3 flight of narrow stairs.

We came looking for an authentic feel of brooklyn life and we got it. We sincerely thank demi for her beautiful home

I booked Demi's apartment for my parents to stay in while they visited me, and they were very comfortable. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to stay in a cool, clean, beautifully decorated and laid-out apartment at a reasonable price in Brooklyn. The neighbourhood is great, and Demi is super kind and helpful and has great taste!

We stayed at Demi's top floor apartment for a week in August and had an ok stay. On the up side, Demi was nice and responsive. The place was spacious, bright and funky as pictured. The neighbourhood was nice and close to a lot of amenities. Getting around was easy. On the less bright side, we found the place wasn't properly cleaned and Demi addressed that by binging in a cleaner a couple of days later. We also found a mouse running on the kitchen counter shortly after we checked in. We informed her right away, and she brought in traps 2 days later. Even though we appreciated that the mouse situation was out of her hands, these were nuisances that affected our stay and resulted in a lot of back and forth with her.

I live in the neighborhood and needed a place for my parents to stay during their visit and we chose this apartment.  Demi gave us a friendly welcome and a nice tour of the apartment.  The apartment is clean, well furnished, and has good natural light and a nice cross breeze when the windows are open.  My parents said that it was quiet at night and that the bed was comfortable.  Demi was a great host.  It was clear she was available if we needed her, but also gave my folks their space.

One point of information, the apartment is a third floor walk-up, so just keep that in mind. It was no problem for me or my parents but one should be prepared for a couple flights of stairs.

As someone who lives in this neighborhood, I can say that this is a great location, close to three or four good subway lines, the amazing Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and Museum, and a wide variety of outstanding cafes and restaurants.

This gorgeous apartment in Brooklyn was just what my friend and I were looking for. It is beautifully furnished and very conveniently located not far from several subway stations, restaurants, cafes, a museum, botanical gardens and other surprises I hadn't expected to find in Brooklyn. A great neighbourhood where we found people very friendly and felt safe returning to the apartment no matter how late/ early it was.

Demi is a warm and welcoming host who provided several small touches that made us feel right at home. This was our first time in Brooklyn and Demi recommended interesting things for us to do in the neighbourhood as well as giving us tips about the subway system and local shops.

I would definitely stay here again, this is a New York gem.

Demi was so welcoming to us on our arrival and told us all we needed to know about the apartment and the surrounding area. We stayed for labour day weekend and the carnival was so near to the apartment. Demi allowed us to have friends and family over for dinner on two separate occasions and made us feel so relaxed. On the day of checking out, Demi allowed us to store our bags at the apartment before taking the journey to the airport. I would definitely recommend staying at Demi's apartment as we were in such a central location and Demi was a welcoming and warm host. 

Thank you once again Demi, we hope to have the opportunity to stay again soon.

This apartment is lovely and perfectly decorated. I was definitely inspired to add more color to my own pad. There are lots of nice touches like shampoo and all the pots and bits you need to cook a proper meal. Demi was a great, very responsive host. The location is excellent and near a bunch of tasty restaurants and chill bars. My little family will definitely try to stay here again on our next trip to NY.

we felt very welcome like as our home!!!the listing was very accurate and our host did cater to all our needs naturally!!!it was splendid and we had a very nice time in this beautiful and calm neighbourhood.

thanks again to Demi and all the best to her!!

Our recent stay at Demi's place was great! Her apartment is roomy and the decor is very nice. Big windows allow lots of natural light as well. Demi greeted us on arrival and took us on a tour which was great. She was very nice and responded to all our questions quickly. The neighborhood was nice, right off of Washington where there are several bars and coffee shops. You will have to walk about 10 min to the subway which is the only thing we didn't like, as we spent a few days in Manhattan.  We also took uber when we got lazy. The street though is gorgeous and tree lined! She let us leave our luggage till 3 pm even though check out was noon, which she didn't have to do. Very accommodating.

Demi was a great host she made us fell welcome right from the start she even helped us get our bags up 2 flights of stairs and showed us around the apartment and made suggestions where to go shopping,restaurants and public transport would recommend this apartment for anyone who is traveling to New York

Very nice apartment and exactly as described. Great location, very close to subways.
The stairs are very steep, so I was glad we only had to climb them once each day.
Demi accommodated our early arrival and left the keys for us to get in and leave our luggage. We couldn't control the radiator heat, so it was hot one night and cold the next. 
We would stay here again.

My parents' stay with Demi was a great fit for our weekend and the proximity to my apartment made it just right. The accommodations were very Brooklynesque—with the the top floor apartment in a townhouse, the Caribbean-inspired décor, and ample space and creature comforts met the needs of my parents. I hope that we might use Demi’s airbnb space for a future trip to Brooklyn.

Everything was as seen before on the photos. The rooms are tastefully furnished.
Demi is very nice and helpful. 
We had a wonderfull stay at Brooklyn and I can recommend everybody to stay at Demis!

Demi is good housewife of the good house. This is a very old house. Soundproofing isn't very good. The street is as quiet enough and pleasant as a district. The subway isn'n far, than you have walk a lot)). For a week stay we saw the hostess just once))

We enjoyed our stay at Demi's top floor apartment.  It is as charmingly decorated and light as portrayed in the pictures.  Demi was both available and non-intrusive, provided great fresh granola, and lots of local interest and restaurant information.  The neighborhood is in easy walking distance to the Brooklyn Art Museum, Botanical Garden, and subway lines.  There are many good restaurant choices in a neighborhood that has some gentrification but still maintains it's local flavor.  We definitely want to rent here on our next trip.

This is a great apartment in a great location with loads of things to do and see on your doorstep and good transport links to the rest of the city. Demi is a brilliant host who made us feel very welcome and comfortable - we really appreciate her hospitality!

Mon conjoint et moi avons passé 9 nuits chez Demi et nous ne regrettons absolument pas notre choix. L'appartement est conforme à la description et aux photos, il est tout proche du métro S, dans un quartier tranquille. Prospect Park est à deux pas, il est très agréable de s'y promener ou d'y faire du patin à glace. Très bonne communication avec Demi avant et pendant le séjour, elle répond toujours rapidement aux mails. Elle ne pouvait pas être là à notre arrivée mais elle nous avait laissé des instructions précises, tout s'est donc déroulé sans souci. La cuisine est bien équipée, nous avons pu prendre nos petits-déjeuners et diners sur place. Une grande penderie dans le couloir permet de ranger toutes ses affaires. On a juste trouvé dommage de ne pouvoir régler soi-même le chauffage. Nous espérons avoir le plaisir de revenir dans cet appartement un jour, un grand merci à Demi !

We had such a great experience here! The apartment is wonderful - spacious, clean, and stylish. Demi was super friendly and helpful, but not at all intrusive. Can't wait to stay here again!! Definitely recommended.

Demi was friendly and very helpful. The posted photos accurately depicted the comfortable apartment, the bedroom was especially nice. We found the location to be just right for us. We enjoyed walking to the subway and to the restaurants nearby. Heating is a bit temperamental. We would certainly stay there again.

I loved staying at Demi's place! She was very welcoming and the apartment was just what I expected. You have a lot of privacy but Demi is there when you need help! I already knew the neighborhood and love staying there - lots of cafés, restaurants, close to the park and to the Brooklyn Museum. I would definitely love to stay at Demi's again!

The apartment was great. Nice and colourful. Its easy to find and we loved the area. We didn't actually get to meet Demi, but she responded promptly to any questions we had, so that wasn't a problem for us. Overall we highly recommend Demi and her apartment.

Demi is a fantastic host, very helpful and has loads of useful info and tips. She is also in the building if there are any problems. The flat is large, bright and clean. The area is great with lots of good food, bars and the park close by so my partner could continue his marathon training! Recommend!

Demi greeted us as soon as we arrived & made us feel welcome.  The apartment was very charming, clean, quiet and comfortable.  Everything was provided that we expected.  We would definitely like to stay our next visit.

The space was just as gorgeous and sunny as it looked in the pictures. It was very clean, and the cupboards even had some food which I hadn't expected.I felt very at home and would definitely come back.

Demi was very understanding, flexible, and responsive as a host. I had troubles navigating the reservation page and she worked with me to make sure I got what I needed. The only downside was that there were some issues with the electricity and the internet connection was very slow. I wouldn't necessarily recommend this spot if you have to get work done online, but if you are on vacation, then it's perfect.

I booked Demi’s apartment for my mom who was in town for a visit. The apartment is very quiet and well decorated, and it’s on the top floor of a great old house on a fantastic street. Demi was a very thoughtful host who checked in to make sure that my mom had everything she needed.

She had a great stay there, and we will definitely book with Demi in the future.

The apartment is exactly as described.  It's impeccably clean and well decorated.  It was stocked with some basics (shampoo, lotion, tea, coffee and water in the filtered jug).  This was a lovely surprise 
Its well located for getting to restaurants, shops and the subway.  

Its very private and I would recommend staying there.

Demi is lovely and very welcoming; the apartment is as described - perfectly clean, plenty of space, comfortable furniture (including very comfortable bed). Easy walk from Brooklyn Museum subway stop. Great find in Brooklyn!
Demi's upstairs apartment was wonderful. Great neighborhood, excellent decor, and very comfortable bed.

Demi greeted us at our appointed check-in time. She is courteous and helpful and through the trip was available to answer all of our questions. 

Demi’s apartment is beautifully decorated and comfortable. The place is bright and airy and located on a quiet tree-filled street.  We appreciated the amenities such as large bath towels, ample closet space (with several hangers), nice linens, and a collection of maps and menus. I agree with other guests’ reviews -   the bed is comfortable;  we slept very well. 

We enjoyed breakfasts at Porto Viejo and Milk Bar in the neighborhood. Franny’s (approx. 15 minute walk) is a fantastic spot for dinner and wine! Easy walk from the apartment  to the Brooklyn Museum and Botanical Garden as well. I highly recommend Demi’s apartment to anyone who seeks a tastefully decorated home away from home and is comfortable walking  5-15 minutes to access delicious restaurants, grocery stores, and subway service.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Demi was a wonderful host! She was very helpful and attentive. The apartment had plentiful resources and guides for navigating the city. We were very close to subway and transportation was not a problem. There were also many cute shops and restaurants close by. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to visit again soon!

We booked Demi's apartment for my girlfriends parents who were visiting us. Our guests had a great stay at Demi's place. The apartment is spacious, tastefully decorated and very clean. It is also well situated in a lively neighborhood with a lot of restaurants and bars nearby and a short walk away from major metro lines. We will definitely reach out to Demi again anytime we have out of town visitors.

We really enjoyed staying at Demi's place, it was a nice neighbourhood and it was easy to get around and to find the subway. 
Demi was a very helpful and nice host. We had a fantastic vacation in NYC - and we Can definitely recommend Demi's apartment. 
It was great to live in Brooklyn, which is a great borough and it was easy to go to Manhattan.

If yer looking for a place to stay in Brooklyn, this place is IT. Beautiful space, great location. My flight was delayed and Demi arranged for key pickup that worked with a very late arrival. Not only that, she was a lovely host, making sure to check in even though we didn't get to meet face to face. Thanks Demi!

My daughter and I stayed at Demi's lovely apartment for 4 nights in July while we were visiting New York. I chose it primarily because I appreciated the style and decor, an important thing I consider (along with value) when choosing a place to stay. The apartment delivered on all accounts. It is a top floor apartment, with a walk up a couple flights of steep winding stairs. We arrived amidst a heatwave, and Demi was kind enough to install an air conditioning unit in the bedroom which was most welcomed. The weather cooled the next day and it was barely needed at all. 

To be clear, this apartment lies in Prospect Heights, a vibrant and diverse neighborhood that lies just north of Prospect Park. It's about a 10-15 min walk to the Brooklyn Museum stop, and a fairly short subway ride to Manhattan from there. The neighborhood is still one in transition, something that does not bother me, but don't expect Park Slope or the West Village. It's still a bit rough around the edges, but I didn't feel unsafe with my daughter at all. We enjoyed the Brooklyn museum and Botanic gardens being so close as well as the quick subway ride to Coney Island. There are myriad great dining options within walking distance along with a couple bodegas that are open late. 

The lone downside was the deafeningly loud block party our last night, though that was far out of the control of our host. 

I would gladly recommend Demi's apartment to anyone who wants to truly experience the best Brooklyn has to offer.

Well, I think Airbnb should send Demi a check, because this was our first Airbnb experience.  Whereas a sub-optimal experience would have probably given us pause about Airbnb, after this initial experience NO QUESTION we will look to Airbnb again on future trips.  Nearly every aspect (namely cost, space, and unit features) of our visit was a huge upgrade over traditional hotels.  The apartment is spacious, well, located, and highly functional.  Demi was friendly, accommodating, and responsive to txts or emails within an hour.  The neighborhood is very nice.  All in all, full marks!

Demi is welcoming and the apartment is great. However, she has atendency to blame hosts for any issues that arise - she told us that the toilet seat was broken, the seat was dirty, the a/c was too expensive but she refused to take ownership or responsibility for the issues, or even get them fixed. 
It's also worth nothing that this is on the top floor of a family home so there are pressures from the host around staying quiet.
Demi is super organised. Lovely and clean :)

The place was very cozy and minus the cow print mat, it was exactly as the pictures. The apartment was very organized and clean. Kitchen, bathroom and closet well stocked with the essential. Demi was a great host, showed us the ropes on our first day, and gave us our privacy the rest of our stay. Check in & check out were simple. Shes a great communicator, available whenever you have a question. I highly recommend staying here, the neighborhood is quiet and only 7 mins away from the subway station. I will be staying here again.

Demi is a terrific hostess. We loved staying at her immaculate apartment. Everything was in order and she provided a map with suggestions about good places for groceries, restaurants and tips about the neighborhood. Demi's apartment on Prospect Place is situated walking distance to the subway, the Brooklyn Art Museum,
and the wonderful Brooklyn Botanical Gardens. It is an easy trip into Manhattan, but these days a lot is happening in Brooklyn so it is a perfect place to explore either borough. The street is lined with London Planetrees. We arrived about 3:30pm on a Monday just in time to find an alternate side of the street parking place which was good from Monday 11:30am to Thursday 11:30am; a great savings for us. We lived in lower Manhattan for 38 years, but today a lot of hip stuff is happening in Brooklyn so we loved it.  Demi's place was a great discovery we will be back.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I booked Demi's apartment for my parents during their visit to New York because it is close to my own place.
They stayed there for over a week and liked it at lot. The apartment was very clean, spacious with plenty of storage space and tastefully decorated.
Demi was a very amiable hostess, she was easy to communicate with and responded quickly to any questions and requests.
My parents felt very much at home at Demi's house and would definitely stay there again. Highly recommended!

Great stay in Brooklyn! Demi's place is spacious and welcoming. The bed was very comfortable and the decor was modern and warm. We really enjoyed being centrally located, close to all that Brooklyn has to offer.

This was our first experience with Airbnb and we were extremely happy.  The apartment was just as described and had everything we wanted within walking distance.  Our daughter lives close by which made it very convenient for our visit.  We appreciated that Demi made herself available to us when necessary but otherwise, allowed us our privacy.  I highly recommend this listing.

We had a great stay in Demi's apartment. Nice location, quiet a and well connected to Mahnhattan. For tourists like us it's really a good deal. Demi was nice and l welcomed   us although we arrived at 9 pm. The room were clean, and corresponding to he description. We are happy about our choice.

We came to New York with my husband to celebrate our 10th wedding anniversary and the trip was super. Demi is a great and attentive host and the place is just as described, spacious, light and beautiful. The neighborhood was peaceful and quiet but still there were loads of restaurants and shops within a walking distance. This was our first Air BnB experience and first trip to New York but it will certainly not be the last. We highly recommend this listing and Demi as a host!

Demi was a great host - the apartment was as lovely as the photos made it out to be, and the neighbourhood is great, close to the main subway lines, the Brooklyn Museum, and some lovely bars and eateries. We loved being in a quiet, residential area (that still had stuff going on) and being able to head into Manhattan in around 15 minutes. All in all, highly recommended!

The reason for our visit was to support our Brooklyn family who had a hospitalized child. Demi texted periodically to check on the status of our family. The place itself was clean and bright. Nice location for us.
Demi's apartment is comfortable and charming! We really enjoyed our stay and hope to go back when we visit family in Brooklyn!

I had a great experience with Demi and the apartment. It was private, well kept, and couldn't be more comfortable. There are lot of great restaurants and bars nearby and Prospect Park is a quick walk. Great time, highly recommended.

Demi was very responsive to our reservation request . The apartment is in a neighborhood that is accessible to much of Brooklyn and the building itself is a nice older townhouse. The photo could use an update in that the pretty wood floors have been covered with wall to wall carpet in the living room , but the apartment is generally as advertised. The  concerns were that the only light in the living room was an overhead ( when I asked how to plug in the table lamp I was told that it was "only decorative" until an electrician creates an outlet) and the heat was not working properly throughout the stay. ( The first night was cold outside and in , and we slept in clothes. After that,  the host provided a space heater and the weather warmed so it was not much of an issue. Demi said that a plumber would come after our stay.)

This is our second stay with Demi. She is always available for questions.  We are familiar with the area as our son lives around the corner.  There are plenty of grocery stores, restaurants, and shopping close by.  The Brooklyn museum and botanical gardens are a short walk also.  We are very comfortable in the neighborhood. The apartment is well appointed and very comfortable.  We will definately return.  Great place, neighborhood, and host!!

This was our second stay at Demi's one-bedroom, top floor (Website hidden by Airbnb) we noted on our first visit, it is clean, well-maintained, and very comfortable.  Demi welcomed us on our arrival and made sure that everything was fine.  Otherwise we had no contact with her or the opportunity to express our appreciation for her hospitality. We would be happy to stay there again.

Demi met us at the appropriate time and let us in the apartment. It is truly a walk-up but the railings are sturdy. House rules are a little more strict then published, permission for more than two people as visitors must be obtained. Ours was denied. A coffee pot was replaced right away when the apartment one quit.

The rooms were nice and clean, minimally set up. The bed is not on a frame. But the most distressing part for me is that there is no fire escape if there would be a incident.

The location was good and one can really enjoy Brooklyn and Manhattan from this location.

We staid at Demi's place for 7 nights and it was absolutely cosy and enjoyable. The place is really spacious and equipped with nice furniture, the neighborhood is great. Within a few minutes walking distance or subway ride you'll find everything you need.
We only met Demi very briefly during our check-in as we have been wandering throughout the city everyday. But we knew she was available when needed.  She also checked up on us after a few days which was very kind. The place is definitely highly recommended.
The place is great, just as described in a quiet neighborhood in Brooklyn. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend Demi's place.

We had a wonderful stay at Demi's Brownstone In Prospect Heights! Demi was very responsive to all our questions and was incredibly accommodating with our check-in and checkout times.  The apartment is located on a beautiful residential and quiet side street and is blocks away from Prospect Park.   The 2/3/B/Q and C subway stations are a few blocks away making it very easy to travel around Brooklyn or into Manhattan.  The apartment itself is charming, clean, well decorated and equipped with all the necessary amenities.  It’s a front-facing apartment so you get lots of natural light and come equipped with a full kitchen. Although we love exploring the city, it was nice to relax at night in the living room or very spacious bedroom (which has a smal TV) Overall, we’d highly recommend Demi's apartment.

We really enjoyed the stay in Demis apartment and she was very helpful and quick in answering any questions. The apartment is spacious, has nice furniture and had a good kitchen that we used, mostly for breakfasts, but also for evening snacks and one day for dinner. We could have cooked more if we had wanted to. The bedroom and the bed was great, nice view of the street which was quiet and not disturbing. There was lots of space to hang our clothes or put in drawers. Also nice not to have to bring shampoo, hair dryer or iron. A perfect place to stay if you're in New York. And it is so easy to take the subway to Manhattan.

Demi was not home when we arrived but left a key in an easily accessible lace.  She then welcomed us warmly when we returned and made sure we had everything we nee  This is our third stay in this bright, cheery, and comfortable apartment.

Demi was a wonderful host and her home was even more beautiful than in the pictures (and super clean and smelled good!). When we thought we broke her window, she came running up the stairs and fixed it like a champ. The neighborhood was quiet enough to ensure a good night's sleep but had enough people around at night to make it feel safe. Very convenient with all the public transportation options too. I can't say enough good things about her house!

Had a wonderful birthday (and Beyonce!!!) in NYC and it's partly to do with the awesome experience we had at Demi's place.  While we weren't able to meet in person, Demi was very communicative making sure we had what we needed and all instructions were super clear for accessing the keys, apt., etc.  The place is exactly as described / shown in the photos. Only reason I'm not providing a perfect score is that when we were actually in the apt during the day or winding down at night, the internet was slower than we're used to and the TV had only a few basic channels but this didn't hamper our time obviously as we weren't home that often.  I would recommend Demi's place in a heartbeat and when we're in NYC next, we hope to stay there again.

Spent 6 night's at Demi's apartment.  It is well-equipped, clean, the bed is comfortable, and we fund it quite spacious for the two of us.  It is within a few minutes walk of a couple of different subway stations.  We only met Demi once but she provided us with her phone number should we need to contact her about anything.

The photograph is slightly misleading because the room it shows is now carpeted not exposed wooden floors but that didn't concern us.

There were a couple of things that make it unlikely we would return.  

The apartment has no air conditioning and although Demi provides a couple of fans, they didn't help a lot, especially at night when trying to sleep.

There was an excessive amount of noise on a couple of nights, shouting, screaming, loud music going on until 2am or so.  While realizing that we were in a city, this noise was coming from people in the street itself, not from other houses.  It was almost like there was a street party going on so maybe we were just in the wrong place at the wrong time. 

Pete

Everything was perfectly clean and comfortable in the apartment (which is beautifully lit with lots of natural sunlight!). The neighbourhood is very easy to navigate and the options for public transport in the area is endless.
Demi was regularly in touch to make sure everything was going well and we were happy in the apartment.
We had a great stay, the apartment was larger than expected and had all required amenities. AC in the bedroom kept us cool as it was peak summer and very hot! Short walk to subway and local cafes.

Demi was very nice and friendly (she stopped up first day to say hi), and the location was really great—many restaurants nearby, as well as Brooklyn Museum. The apt. and is very nice, fresh and ultra-clean; quiet neighborhood and very spacious with all necessary items (hair dryer, toaster etc.). We ended up spending most of our stay in the one room with a window unit AC, but would certainly come back in a cooler month!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Demi.
L'appartement est spacieux, très propre et correctement équipé.
La chambre est superbe.

Demi est une hôte très disponible, à l'écoute et réactive, très agréable et pleine d'humour.

Nous avons fait plusieurs airbnb dans Brooklyn, c'était de loin le meilleur rapport qualité/prix.
We had a wonderful stay in Demi's apartment. It was perfect for a quick trip, on a great neighborhood, and had everything we could need. I only wish we could have stayed longer.

Demi's appartment met our expectations for a holiday trip to New York, providing the opportunity to visit and know the city beyond Manhattan. Conveniently located in a vibrant and central Brooklyn neighborhood, the appartment has all the amenities as advertised and is a confortable place to rest after long hours walking and sightseeing. Demi's attention to details makes for a very pleasent stay and you feel easily in touch with your host. She was very helpful providing in person all the information needed at the time to enter the appartment. She also help us to accommodate check out times with the schedule of our flight back home. Being a new Airbnb user the experience has been overall positive and we enjoyed our stay at Demi's place.

We spent 8 days there and really had a great time.
The apartment is really functional and well equipped. 
The neighborhood is safe and full of convenient grocery stores. You’re also close (10-12min walk) to the main subway lines that will take you anywhere you need.

Beautiful home, amazing location, and hands-down the best host we have ever had. We spent a month at Demi's when we moved to New York, and feel so lucky to have been introduced to the city by such a warm and welcoming woman. Incredible attention to detail, and the things that matter most. I could not thank her enough.

We stayed at Demi's beautiful home for our 6 year anniversary trip to NYC. Loved that it was far enough away from Manhattan to avoid obnoxiously crowded sidewalks. We were able to spend a lot of time exploring Brooklyn and felt like we got to experience a different side of the typical touristy NYC trip. At the same time, the subway stop was only about half a mile away so we could easily get to Manhattan if we chose (though it takes a little while). The apt was furnished beautifully and was comfortable and spacious. Demi even provided some fantastic homemade granola that I wish I could have taken back on the plane with me! I would recommend this listing.

This great apartment offers a welcome retreat from Manhattan madness. It is located just two blocks, (5 mins) to train which takes you anywhere you need to be. There are also great bars, deli, pharmacy, liquor stores etc, and restaurants in adjoining and parallel streets, that make a lazy night out close to home easy, and this is welcome after beating the feet all day. The two flights of stairs are worth the effort as once the bags are up there, you have light and space, a very decent kitchen and a comfortable bed in a large airy bedroom. The shower has great pressure and the added bonus of the bath was great. I have stayed in fabulous Airbnb apartments in Barcelona and Paris, and now New York is added to the list of wonderful homes away from home. Thank you Demi, for your kind hospitality and unobtrusive support. I know I am going to have to plan way ahead to come stay again as this place will be seriously booked!

Demi's apartment was exactly as described.  It was great for our small family because she has a pack n play for a small extra fee and there was enough room for my two year old to play. The neighborhood is great and there's a lot to do within walking distance.  Demi also leaves a delicious jar of granola for guests which we loved!  We would definitely stay again.

I absolutely loved my stay and Demi was a terrific host. She was very responsive and accommodating and went out of her way to make sure I were comfortable. The space is extremely clean, attractive and spacious. The neighborhood is great--lively, close to subways and full of great shops and restaurants. I cannot wait to return!

Demi's place was such a serene space, with sunny windows with lovely views. It's easy to walk to transportation, beautiful Prospect Park, or bagels and coffee. At the end of the day a good bed with the softest sheets awaited me. Demi was communicative, yet unobtrusive and respectful.
Demi was a great host! It was such a large spacious apartment and very comfortable. Convenient to multiple restaurants and the Metro. Highly recommend!

Goed gelegen in een rustige buurt op 5 min. van het station. Ruim appartement, goed uitgerust en comfortabel.
Goede locatie zowel om Brooklyn te bezoeken als Manhatten.

We stayed at Demi's apartment the week before Christmas and had a great time. The apartment was warm & cozy and was decorated with care. Demi was a patient and welcoming host, even leaving us homemade granola to enjoy during our stay. The apartment is located in a quiet street near Prospect Park and with several grocery stores and coffeeshops nearby. We really enjoyed the area and would love to stay at Demi's place again.
A lovely space and kind welcoming host. Special touch homemade granola by Demi and daily NY Times. A great location and quiet. And lovely light filled space. The best.

Demi is a kind and charming host.  There is delcious homemade granola waiting for her guests and glass bottles of water and glasses at the bedside.  The decor is comfortable and cheerful, a combo of shabby chic and mid century decor.  It's an older building with the accompanying charms and issues:  great molding and banisters, steep narrow steps, heat hard to control but Demi helped us with that, too.  We did have a 20 degree swing in temperature, so I don't imagine that would always be an issue.  Lots of closet space.  Comfy bed and very pretty bedroom.
Great location in a great neighborhood!  Clean, large apartment.

My sister and I stayed here while we were in NY for work. It was perfect to come home to after a long day of trekking around in the cold. Our only issue was the heater not working in the bedroom, but fortunately the place came with space heater that kept us warm at night.

Our flights were cancelled due to the weather, and Demo graciously offered us an extra night free of charge. She offered before our flight was cancelled! We're so thankful for her generosity, especially because it was my first actual experience with a snow storm. We're from LA and we will always remember the kindness she showed us.  

Thank you Demi!!!
Beautiful, clean, safe neighborhood, highly recommend.
Best stay I've had in Brooklyn! Hip, Great location, exactly what I was hoping for!
Always a great stay at Demi's place. Great neighborhood and comfy place.

Large third-floor flat, fully appointed, nice kitchen.  Great location on a pleasant street not far from Prospect Park and a number of interesting commercial districts.  Demi communicated quickly and was very helpful.  We would stay here again.
Great location, value and host. Some reviews talk about how heating was an issue - it was NOT an issue. I was there during the coldest couple of days in the year and it was nice and toasty indoors!
The apartment was clean, comfortable and beautifully furnished. It was easy to communicate with Demi and my folks had a great stay.
The apartment is lovely, very spacious, and located in a very safe area. Demi is also a great host. We really enjoy our stay and would definitely come back again in the future!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Demi's for a long weekend in NYC and had a great time. Demi was a fantastic host - she was very communicative before and during our stay and met us in person when we arrived to welcome us and show us around the apartment. We arrived in NYC pretty early, and Demi even coordinated it so we could drop off our bags before checking in.

The neighborhood and location are fantastic. We were within walking distance of lots of restaurants, coffee shops, the Brooklyn Museum, and beautiful Prospect Park (really great if you like running.) And we could get into Manhattan in 40 min by metro.

Wonderful place, would definitely stay again.

Nous avons passe 9 jours chez Demi et le logement était en tous points conforme aux photos. Chambre spacieuse, séjour agréable, cuisine fonctionelle. Logement a 10 mn des lignes de metro 2 et 3 super pratique! Demi a  ete disponible si besoin et discrète a la fois! Je recommande ce logement.  Enjoy your trip!

We had a wonderful stay at Demi's apartment.

The space itself was super clean, bright and much larger than expected from the photographs.

Everything we could ever need was provided and when the temperature kicked up dramatically Demi was quick to install the air conditioning unit in the bedroom which was so appreciated.

If you're looking for a relaxing stay in Brooklyn in a great neighborhood with a wonderful and welcoming host please don't hesitate in choosing Demi.

We stayed at Demi's for one week while we explored New York. The flat was exactly as we expected and a wonderful place to relax after a long day. Demi was super responsive leading up to and during our stay and even accommodated our late check in. The flat is reasonably close to the subway so getting to Manhatten was straight forward but there was also tons to do in the surrounding neighbourhood. The only drawback - and it didn't bother us much - is that the bedroom faces onto the street which meant sleeping in was a little difficult when we had the windows open. Fortunately ear plugs solved that minor inconvenience. Overall I highly recommend this cute flat and its super gracious host!
Demi was such a pleasure to deal with, before and during our stay. The apartment is extremely spacious and very comfortable! Would love to stay again when we are back in NY!
Great, tranquil spot in the center of bustling Brooklyn. The apartment had everything we needed and we had a wonderful stay.

The apartment is located on a very quiet street but right next to a busy area with fun bars and restaurants. There have been some comments about party noise from the street, but I heard none during my stay. Pleasant half mile walk to the subway station along pretty tree-lined streets. Apartment was spotless, cheery and very spacious. "Shabby chic" is a good descriptor, and fits the overall style of this vintage brownstone.  We had a heat wave (upwards of 95 degrees) during my stay which was a bit challenging, but the a/c unit kept the bedroom very comfortable. Very walkable to markets, restaurants, shops, Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Museum. 40 minutes door to door to Museum Mile on Manhattan's upper east side. Demi welcomed me upon arrival, and gave me total privacy after that, which is what I wanted.  I suspect she would have been very responsive had I had any questions or needs. I hope to stay here again on future trips.
I live nearby and my parents stayed here. They absolutely loved the place and Demi is a wonderful host as well. Felt at home.

Spacious, comfortable, well-kept apartment right in the middle of a bustling neighborhood full of restaurants, bars, cafés, and shops. Easy access to Washington, Vanderbilt, and Franklin avenues, but surprisingly quiet at night, which was great for sleeping. AC unit in the bedroom provided plenty of cooling power and was able to keep the rest of the apartment reasonable as well. Check-in and out was a breeze, our host was communicative and responded quickly and efficiently to resolve the single issue we had (a stopped up bathtub), and they provided a handy and informative neighborhood guide, along with homemade granola and fresh-ground coffee on our first morning. Easy access to a variety of subway lines, and a speedy walk to attractions like Barclay's Center, the Brooklyn Museum, the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park. My wife and I, former Brooklyn residents, felt right at home and would recommend this apartment without hesitation to anyone looking for a great location in Crown Heights!

Great please for 1-2 people - really nice, clean apartment in a cool neighborhood. Able to walk to tons of restaurants/bars and close to multiple subway lines. Getting the key was easy and Demi was great at communicating the whole time.

Demi's apartment is spacious and very quiet.  It's located near lots of restaurants and shops, the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, Museum, and Library, and Prospect Park.  Demi was very welcoming and great at keeping in touch during my stay, but also giving me my privacy.  Overall, it was a great place to stay!
Great place vet close to my daughter's home. The apartment is very comfortable and communications with Demi were easy.
We loved Demi's apartment. She was a friendly host. The neighborhood is cosy and safe. We highly recommend this lovely flat!

Departamento ubicado en sector residencial, cercano al subway, silencioso.
Muchas gracias por la granola hecha en casa, fue un gran detalle.

We have just returned from an excellent 5-night stay at Demi's in Brooklyn.  Demi's apartment was exactly as advertised but better.  We thought there was going to be an air conditioner only in the bedroom, but when we arrived, Demi had brought up an air conditioner for the living room as well.  This was very much appreciated because it was a warm week in NYC.  Demi greeted us just as planned and immediately grabbed one of our suitcases to help us up the three floors to our apartment. She was warm and welcoming and made us feel comfortable.  Help was at hand, but everything was so well set up and accommodating in the apartment that we needed no further assistance during our 5-day stay. The apartment was clean, spacious, light and quiet and the bed was very comfortable. It was super convenient for us as our daughter lives nearby, and we were a 5-10 minute walk from the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park and the Saturday farmers market at Grand Army Plaza.  Restaurants, markets and cafes abound in this lively, diverse neighborhood. We will return! Thanks, Demi.
Apartment exactly as pictured. Well located. Easy parking in the street. Very very clean, luminous and spacious. Confortable bed.  We enjoyed our stay very much.
We will be back! The whole top floor just for us, beautifully decorated in mid 20th c furniture and happy colors. Demi was welcoming and then we appreciated the privacy.

We were completely happy with our stay. The apartment is spacious, clean, well maintained and highly functional. It has a full kitchen, an eating area, a living room, lots of closet space, a huge bedroom and nice clean bathroom with a tub and a shower. It is on the third floor of the home and completely private. It also has an air conditioner in the bedroom and the living room, in summer it should be comfortable. The living room is on the back side of the building so it is quiet. The houses on the block open to gardens in the rear so it is light and airy in the living room and kitchen. 

Demi is a gracious hostess and was a pleasure to deal with.  

We highly recommend this place.

L'appartement  de Demi, a un charme fou et chose rare il est encore plus beau que sur les photos, vous disposerez de tout le confort possible. 
L'appartement se trouve dans une maison caractéristique de. Brooklyn, mais  il est parfaitement indépendant, une impression d'être chez soi. La rue est en outre calme. 
DEmi est fort sympathique et toujours disponible, en ce sens la communication est aisée. 
Le quartier regorge de restaurants, bref       Je vous recommande vivement l'appartement de Demi. 
Julie
Great location! The apartment is on the top floor of an old building so getting in and out is a bit noisy (due to the old wood floors and doors) and, I'm sure, disruptive to others in the house.
The apartment is very spacious and clean, the bed really confortable and the well equipped kitchen was very useful. Demi gave us privacy and the communication was easy. Really nice place!

Been there with our little daughter (20 month old) for 12 days. The check-in was very warm and welcoming. We felt really at home at Demi‘s as she also provided us a high-chair and baby bed. Thanks again! Would recommend to family & friends :-)
Demi was very easy to work with.  Communicated well with us along the way.  Place was quiet and clean.
