Great, spacious and light accommodation. Demi was fantastic with her communication before and during our stay, although she also allowed us plenty of space to keep ourselves to ourselves. There were some really lovely touches such as (delicious) home made granola and freshly ground coffee in the apartment. Would definitely recommend.

Very well located, spacious and light filled apartment.  We love to stay in Brooklyn because our kids live there, and it has such a neighborhood feel and much lower key than Manhattan.  However, you are very close via subway to everything in the city.  Bed was comfy, kitchen was well-equipped.

Het apartement is geweldig, de ligging is ideaal, vlak bij Prospect Park en Brooklyn museum. Het is een rustige mooie buurt met brownstone houses en allemaal kleine winkeltjes. Afstand tot metro is 10 min. lopen. Apartement is op 3e verdieping en er is geen lift dus ff flink trappen lopen met je bagage. Demi is een geweldige gastvrouw die je persoonlijk welkom heet en waar je alles aan kunt vragen. Ze heeft het apartement heel smaakvol ingericht, het voelt als thuis. Een echte aanrader!
Super cozy and cute! Great for a couple to stay. Way better than I expected and very clean. A little out of the way of most subway lines though.

This authentic place is located 10 minutes from metro and has special atmosphere of local neighborhood. It is obvious Demi made a lot to improve every detail within the house. Moreover she responses very quickly to all your needs.

Fantastic location, near many great restaurants, Prospect Park, the museum and several subway lines. Demi kindly ensured we had everything   we needed. The apartment is quiet and wonderfully sunny, and the bedroom very spacious for NYC! I loved all of the closet space.

Communicated mostly with Tammy, who co-hosts the property, during our stay. Check-in was super easy; Tammy was very flexible and met us at the door. The space is on the third floor and the floorboards are a little creaky so be mindful of your step! The coffee and homemade granola were thoughtful touches.
Demi and Tammy were both so easy to communicate with. The apartment was as pictured and very clean. Staying in Brooklyn was a nice retreat from the noise of the city. Would stay here again!
Nice quiet place.  Walkable to subway and other amenities. Comfortable bed and nice sunshine during day!
This is a great location and wonderful apartment.
I miei ospiti si sono trovati benissimo. L’appartamento è bello , pulito e ricco di dettagli confortevoli. Demi si è rivelata un’ottima proprietaria di casa

We loved staying here. It made our first trip to Brooklyn fantastic! The location was quiet, but close to everything we needed (restaurants, subway and Prospect Park). The room itself was comfortable, private and stylish; we really appreciated having a kitchen to make breakfast in before heading out to explore the city. We would definitely stay here again!
Amazing apartment in a really great location for local exploring and trips to Manhattan. Demi was a great host. Thanks for having us :)

Very cozy apt in a beautiful and quiet neighbourhood. Demi was a very good host and we had a wonderful time in Prospect Heights. We almost felt like we were actually living in Brooklyn, but we were still only a relatively short subway ride away from the hazzle-dazzle of downtown manhattan.

Great location, super quiet, top floor space with lots of light. Spacious, clean, high ceilings, well equipped kitchen with special touches like home made granola.  Comfortable bed. Great communication with Demi plus printed materials in the apartment for area things to do.  The furnishings are not over the top but are great for the space.  This is a third floor walk up on very creaky stairs and we felt guilty each time we used them but I am sure Demi is used to it.  We will be back!

Demi’s apartment has a beautiful vintage 50’s yet modern touch. It is very comfortable and quiet. A nice touch for people like me who wake up whenever light enters the room, the bedroom has inside shutters and drapes ! Demi is a wonderful host, discreet but caring. The apartment is located in a very nice brownstone block and you can easily explore Brooklyn and Manhattan from there. I recommend it without hesitation!
Demi was a friendly and very hospitable host. The apartment itself is clean, stylish and spacious - perfect for any couple visiting Brooklyn!

Loved our stay here! Demi is a very thoughtful host, who goes out of her way to make the home welcoming (like putting water carafes on the nights stands!). We were on a delayed redeye and she made it easy for us to get in easily while tired in the middle of the night. It’s a quiet but beautiful street and the closest subway stations are a about a 10 minute walk away.

This was a great place! It was my first stay at an Air Bnb and Demi made it a very positive experience, even making up some delicious granola for us. The neighborhood is super nice and it was easy for us to navigate all over NYC by public transportation and Citi Bike.

We travelled from Australia and stayed here for three weeks - chosen mainly for its proximity to our resident son. 
Demi's property was exactly as described - bright, airey and clean. The two main rooms are relatively spacious. The bed was comfortable. Great kitchen facilities - mainly used for breakfast with Demi's Granola. We found some  days and nights quite warm and very humid - so the two air conditioners were much appreciated.
There are plenty of public transport options to Manhattan, and lots do do closer to home ( "in the neighbourhood") too. Try Prospect Park, Botanic Gardens, Brooklyn Museum and Library, even a swim at Brighton Beach - if you have already seen the tourist sites and want to wind down a little.
Demi is a warm host, who likes to keep a fairly low profile, but is very responsive to txt or email throughout the stay.
We would not hesitate to return and are happy to recommend.

Great central spot to a lot of storefronts, bars & restaurants on Franklin Street in Crown Heights and Prospect Heights. The place is also located walking distance to lot of subway lines making it easy to explore the rest of the city.
The apartment is situated on a nice tree-lined street in Brooklyn and Demi is quick to communicate. The space is comfortable, but note is located on the third floor up narrow stairs which can be noisy, so it doesn't feel private if you're trying to keep to yourself. Also, we were asked to turn off our AC one night and the street can get quite loud after dark (even all the way up on the third floor).
I definitely recommend staying with Demi - it's a beautiful neighborhood and there's so much to do. Just remember you're staying in someone's home, so it's not as private.

My wife and I chose NYC as our honeymoon destination and we are so happy that we chose Demi’s as our base. What a great location. It provided us with ample opportunities to explore Brooklyn but as well explore Manhattan. Ideally located to 7th Av, we could take the Q into Manhattan anytime we wanted. And it offered us a quick trip to Coney Island for the Friday fireworks. A perfect location for those that want to escape the hustle and bustle of Manhattan. 
Demi was/is a great host. She was very accommodating to our travel needs and even met us with a great smile once we arrived many hours late (flight delays). She gave us our space during our stay but was very quick to respond to any messages I sent. She provides many guidebooks for the city and even suggested many great restaurants in the local area. It was so helpful to us outsiders. 
As for her place, it was clean, bright, spacious, and quiet. Not much noise from the outside life so we could easily sleep at night. She has all the requirements for dining in with many quality markets close by. Again, a central location. My wife and I even had the chance to run around Prospect Park, which has a great local market on Saturdays. 
We can’t express enough how great our stay was. We are so thrilled with our choice and Demi’s apartment. Would definitely return if we come back to this area.

The apartment made it the perfect base from which to explore Brooklyn and the rest of New York. Our toddler enjoyed the space and we could relax knowing he was safe in the space provided. The local area has some great play parks too. Demi was an accommodating host and we loved the home made granola we found on arrival. We would definitely stay again.

Spacious and very clean apartment on a quiet residential street. Excellent place for those wanting to explore Brooklyn and with fairly easy access to Manhattan. Lots of great restaurants and coffee shops nearby. Street parking was easy to find although we had to move our vehicle on two mornings to avoid ticketing.  Demi was responsive to all of our questions and requests. We were really comfortable during our vacation and would strongly recommend this place to others!
Another great stay at Demi’s.  The apartment is spacious, bright and quiet.  Demi is always very hospitable and responsive and we thoroughly recommend staying at her place.

We stayed at Demi's place twice within a three-week period. It is a delightful apartment, very clean, nicely decorated, with nice views, and airy ventilation through windows as an alternative to AC. It is also a great location for the Prospect Heights, Brooklyn, area. Both times, I told Demi that our travel connections would make us arrive late. Demi and I agreed that we could check ourselves in using her lockbox procedure without bothering her--but both times she was there to meet us anyway, which was very nice.

Demi was very helpful and understanding, especially with our slightly “out of hours” travel arrangements. The apartment was in an ideal location for us (we have a daughter living nearby) but will also be good value for anyone visiting NYC who is also prepared to walk for a few minutes to the nearest subway.
The apartment is very quiet (accepting the usual NYC sounds in the background). It’s a bit of a struggle up the stairs with heavy suitcases but thanks to both Demi and her daughter for help with that. The best thing is that the apartment is both comfortable and spacious for two people. 
The homemade granola left for breakfast was a nice touch.
Demi's apartment was exactly what we hoped for.  It was cute, clean and convenient.  Demi was super helpful and the check in and check out process were a breeze. We really enjoyed our stay.

The place was a great spot, clean and well decorated. Our host was very helpful and always answered to our messages. The location had also lots of options for foods and drinks. A great choice if you want some quiet but still close to the center by subway. Very nice place.
Great apartment, lovely host. We had a really comfortable stay and would definitely choose Demi’s apartment again.

This was a beautiful place to stay. A great first experience for my partner to really live like a local - catching public transport, walking the streets of Brooklyn, eating local! There’s a couple of gems around if you do go for a stroll. Thank you Demi for your personal touches, it really made our honeymoon special!
This place was great. Definitely recommend. Such a beautiful apartment , clean , bright , in a nice area. We got everything we needed. And Demi was super nice and helpful.

I was visiting NY with my husband and we really enjoyed this place. Well located, close to many train and bus options, many cool places at a short walking distance for coffee, a beer, or food. At night the place is really quiet, we slept like babies! Nice vibe overall.
I always try to stay at Demi's when I'm in town for work. Large, beautiful space. Very private. Short walk to trains. A+ every time.

Demi’s place was as portrayed. It’s spacious and very clean. It is on the 3rd floor and the stairs are narrow so carrying a Large suitcase was a little difficult. 
Demi very thoughtfully provide water bottles next to each side of the bed; and a tissue box next to the bed, as well as a loaf of bread and eggs. (There were also several spices and condiments and sufficient pots, pans, dish ware and utensils.) The closets were large with plenty of hangers! 
She has strict rules about no additional guests (so our daughters did not visit) but that was ok. 
Her location is close to subway stations and is on a nice residential street with brownstones. 
 I highly recommend!

Demi’s place is spacious and beautifully decorated. She went the extra mile to provide water in the bedroom and all of the amenities I expected were available (working and clean shower, bed and linens, fully functioning kitchen, etc.). This space is airy and bright, especially being on the third floor. I thought the stairs would be challenging, but it was no problem at all. It’s also in walking distance to some great restaurants like Cafe Rue Dix (French/Senegalese), Ample Hills Creamery (local ice cream), and Penny House (great for breakfast and coffee) and to the Brooklyn Museum. It’s about a 40 minute ride to midtown/Times Square, but if you’re comfortable being far out from Manhattan, I highly recommend Demi’s space.

Apartamento en zona muy tranquila de Brooklyn. Limpio, acogedor y con todos los accesorios basicos para una estancia vacacional. La comunicación con Demi ha sido fácil y se ha interesado por nosotros tanto al llegar como al dejar el piso. Nos ha dejado hacer late check out hasta que saliera nuestro vuelo. Recomendable!

Demi's flat was charming and bright and as past reviewers had reported, spotlessly clean.  The kitchen was stocked with breakfast basics to which we added a bottle of milk.  The bed was comfortable and the linens were soft.  Nice to find a good shower and plenty of towels and bathroom details.  It's easy to recommend this flat for all the good things.  We chose it because it was walking distance to my daughter's house.  That was the good news.  We did not do well on the 2 flights of stairs.  Our images were of our 25-year-old selves.  Reality check.  Add 50 years to our bodies and we huffed and puffed getting to our accommodations.  But we did! and we survived! and had a lovely time in our stay there.

Σε γενικές γραμμές το σπιτι ήταν άνετο και καθαρό , απλά είχαμε πρόβλημα με την θέρμανση και λιγάκι με την καθαριότητα του μπάνιου . Η ντεμι ήταν άμεση στην επικοινωνία και θεωρώ ότι προσπάθησε να μας λύσει τα προβλήματα θέρμανσης . Υπάρχει ένας κανόνας στη λειτουργία του σπιτιού ο οποίος δεν επιτρέπει την επίσκεψη ξένων πέρα από τους ενοικιαστές κάτι που μας δυσκόλεψε τις διακοπές μιας και είχαμε παει μαζί με ένα φιλικό μας ζευγάρι το οποίο δεν μπορούσε να μπει στο σπιτι . Θεωρώ πως ο κανόνας είναι λιγο αυστηρός  και σίγουρα αν τον είχαμε προσέξει πριν την κράτηση ίσως να αλλάζαμε γνώμη .

Nous avons adoré passé notre séjour chez Demi. L'appartement a répondu à toutes nos attentes et le quartier est super. Le métro est à côté et on rejoint rapidement Manhattan. Si nous revenons sur NY, nous serons heureux de revenir à nouveau chez Demi !

This apartment is a gem! I've stayed around different AirBnb's in Brooklyn and it's tough to find a perfect place but this is it :)

Demi was a great host and met us in person when we arrived to help us get settled. The place is on the third floor of a beautiful brownstone in a perfect location if you're looking to explore Brooklyn and have easy access to Manhattan. The place is stylish, well kept, clean, comfy, and quiet (again, hard to find in NYC). The neighborhood is awesome and near all the BK hot spots.

Highly highly recommend.
Great flat - very quiet and lovely location. Demi couldn’t be more helpful.

The BEST airbnb we have tested since the beginning ! Demi is an excellent host. Her place is very well-decorated, warm, sunny and peacful. It's very quiet and you can sleep very well and relax. Everything is furnish (soap, towel, hairdryer). The surrouding is so nice with delicious restaurants (mexican food, delicious cupcakes etc...). The access to Manhattan is very easy with differents lines of subways (you can access easily to the center of Manhattan in 15 min). Demi answers very quickly and was so nice. Thank to you and your daughter !!

Demi's space was so clean and comfortable. My parents really enjoyed their stay. The location of the apartment is perfect with lots of dining options around and close to public transportation. Definitely recommend Demi's place to anyone looking to explore Brooklyn.

name: Bright apartment in the Plateau
summary: A cozy room with a skylight in our spacious, classic Plateau apartment surrounded by quintessential Montreal architecture and culture. With our  cute and equipped kitchen, big living room and huge back terrasse we strive to make you feel at home!
space: Located right on Avenue du Mont Royal, one of Montreal's oldest and most vibrant streets, there are few places more "Montreal". Our apartment is complete with original 1900s mouldings and architectural details. Although we are located on a busy street, our huge back terrasse is quiet and refreshing - a lovely spot for coffee in the mornings or for dinner with friends in the evening. Our guest room has a classic bright skylight with a cover to block out early morning light should you desire. Our living room is a comfortable and cozy place to relax, with an air conditioning unit for the hottest of days - a great spot to catch up at the end of the day!
description: A cozy room with a skylight in our spacious, classic Plateau apartment surrounded by quintessential Montreal architecture and culture. With our  cute and equipped kitchen, big living room and huge back terrasse we strive to make you feel at home! Located right on Avenue du Mont Royal, one of Montreal's oldest and most vibrant streets, there are few places more "Montreal". Our apartment is complete with original 1900s mouldings and architectural details. Although we are located on a busy street, our huge back terrasse is quiet and refreshing - a lovely spot for coffee in the mornings or for dinner with friends in the evening. Our guest room has a classic bright skylight with a cover to block out early morning light should you desire. Our living room is a comfortable and cozy place to relax, with an air conditioning unit for the hottest of days - a great spot to catch up at the end of the day! We want you to feel as comfortable as possible in our space! We encourage you to use our kitche
transit: We are ideally located, a one minute walk from Mont Royal Metro Station, which connects you  to the whole city and also have a bicycle rental stop right on our corner (Montreal's Bixi bicycles are a great way to get around the city). We have grocery, fruit and liquor stores just down the street from our apartment and lots of popular cafes, bars and restaurants as well as great shops all the way along Ave Mont Royal and St Denis!
access: We want you to feel as comfortable as possible in our space! We encourage you to use our kitchen for cooking, with ample fridge space available to you. The back terrasse and living room are great shared spaces to relax in. Saint Laurent street with its infamous nightlife is a ten minute walk away, and Montreal's iconic Mont Royal is only five minutes further, with the mountain's famous cross viewable from our front door.
interaction: You would be sharing the space with two University students by the names of Emilie and Olivia, born and raised in Montreal now studying Fine Arts at Concordia University. We are in touch with Montreal's art culture and love our city - we would be happy to give you suggestions and advice for your stay! We are eager to share our fantastic city with you!
house_rules: We want you to feel at home in our apartment but we request a mutual effort between ourselves and our guests to keep our space a respectful and safe environment. Communication is key!

host.host_about:
I am a Montrealer born and raised and in love with this city!  By day I run an urban beekeeping company in Montreal called Alvéole and spend my summers looking after beehives and gardens on rooftops all around the city. By night I study art at Concordia University specializing in textiles and fibre art - I love every minute of it!
Montreal is an incredibly culturally rich city, avec nos deux langues officielles - with our two official languages - and our prominent music and art scene, I am happy to help share Montreal with anyone and everyone! Whether it be hitting up the festivals, taking in sunny Mont Royal, finding the best croissants in the city, attending art vernissages or going out for dinner and drinks on St Laurent, I'm happy to help you find your way around!

reviews.comments: Emilie & her roommate Olivia were amazing hosts who made me feel comfortable from the frist minute I arrived. The Apartment is located in a very Nice area with lots of Cafés and Shops. A Metro stop and a grocery store Are close by. They both gave me really good tips on where to go to & i knew I could ask them about everything I needed to Know for my stay! I totally recommend their Place with the beautiful backyard Terrasse!!

Très bel accueil, chaleureux et plein de vie. Super appartement avec une incroyable terrasse en pleine ville. Très bien situé (à 2 minutes de la station Mont Royal) avec une rue pleine de vie, de restos et de magasins. Emilie et Olivia sont deux jeunes étudiantes qui aiment parler et qui sont toujours partantes pour passer du bon temps. Que du plaisir!

Absolutely satisfied with my stay!! Look no further. This is the place to stay in Montreal!!! Emilie and Olivia are the friendliest, most welcoming hostesses you will find! I stayed with them for 11 days and it was the best decision I could have made. They are so kind, resourceful and well informed about every place in the city. Their pride and love for Montreal is expressed elegantly in every corner of their home. They truly make every accommodation possible and enjoyable  with impeccable taste and exceptional attention to detail. The room and bed are extremely comfortable and the closet space generous. Their spacious apartment is conveniently located near any available mode of transportation in the city within a city block's distance. It's prime  location in "le plateau" places you at the heart of one of the most exciting neighborhoods in the entire city with  restaurants, cafes and entertainment all around where you can enjoy delicious food, beer and great live music. The back terrace is a true refuge for when you want to kick back, enjoy the good weather and relax after a long day going about town. If you wish to travel hassle-free, meet cool people and truly enjoy  Montreal, stay here.

name: Tranquil Beach & Bush Cottage + Backyard Studio
summary: If you want to explore Sydney's nature and still be close to the city, this is the place! A few minutes from pristine Long Reef beach and marine conservation area, and the cafes of Manly and Dee Why, you can walk or cycle to the beach or  Narrabeen Lake bushland. For bright lights, get the bus to the city. Surf or swim at Sydney's best beaches then come back and relax surrounded by birds in this peaceful retreat with plenty of room for the kids to play.
space: Relax in this 2 bedroom character cottage plus modern one-bedroom studio with a sunny outdoor entertaining and garden, with a vegetable garden, worm farm and BBQ, you'll enjoy chilling in the backyard in between surfing, swimming and bushwalking. The modern kitchen and 2 bathrooms, dishwasher and laundry, vegetable patch and trampoline are all for your use. We can also supply a surfboard or 2 on request. For music lovers, there's a piano and guitar, and plenty of books to read in the bookshelf, and some board games! WiFi is also available, TV with access to a large number of digital stations, and an off-road car space. Wildlife commonly seen in the backyard includes Kookaburras, Cockatoos, Lorikeets (parrots), Red Parrots, wattle birds, blue tongue lizards (harmless!) and more. Transport nearby includes the bus to the city (about 30 - 40 minutes), plus you can walk or bike to Long Reef, Dee Why or Collaroy Beaches, and Narrabeen Lake - all around 20 - 30 minutes walk, 10 minutes by bik
description: If you want to explore Sydney's nature and still be close to the city, this is the place! A few minutes from pristine Long Reef beach and marine conservation area, and the cafes of Manly and Dee Why, you can walk or cycle to the beach or  Narrabeen Lake bushland. For bright lights, get the bus to the city. Surf or swim at Sydney's best beaches then come back and relax surrounded by birds in this peaceful retreat with plenty of room for the kids to play. Relax in this 2 bedroom character cottage plus modern one-bedroom studio with a sunny outdoor entertaining and garden, with a vegetable garden, worm farm and BBQ, you'll enjoy chilling in the backyard in between surfing, swimming and bushwalking. The modern kitchen and 2 bathrooms, dishwasher and laundry, vegetable patch and trampoline are all for your use. We can also supply a surfboard or 2 on request. For music lovers, there's a piano and guitar, and plenty of books to read in the bookshelf, and some board games! WiFi is also availab
neighborhood_overview: Collaroy Plateau is a green area with lots of trees and native birds, and national park and beaches nearby. If you're lucky, you'll spot native brush turkeys in the street as well as the beautiful King Parrots.  Collaroy Plateau is a quiet family area, but it's great location is catching on with film producers and media celebrities moving into the area. It's also close to bars, great food and coffee, and there's an Art Deco cinema just a short walk away. Dee Why is a 20 minute walk and Manly a15 minute drive. There's a great, character-filled Indian restaurant a short walk up the road, as well as plenty more restaurants a short walk - great Italian, Asian fusion and a pub. Tell us what food you like and we'll tell you the best food around! Cycling is also a good way to get around provided you can ride up hills! If you'd like to hire a car, let us know and we can help organise it.
notes: Ask about discounts for weekly and 2-weekly stays!
transit: There's parking on the street and a bus stop with buses that take you to Dee Why and Sydney city centre only 5 minutes walk.
access: You'll have access to the whole house and backyard, assuring privacy. we'll ensure there's someone on hand to help you out if needed.
interaction: We'll be away, but we have a friend who will be available for help and questions. We're also available by phone (free call).
house_rules: Given we live here, we expect guests to use only items as agreed and specified in our listing, and take the usual care they would as with their own house to avoid damage etc. If you have young children, the backyard is great place to play and is enclosed. They may still need some supervision, as there are a few high steps and places they could hide! It's a great garden for adventures and running about though. The front yard is not, and we ask children don't play there. This is a non-smoking house, and while pets are allowed, it's expected they'll spend most of their time out in the big backyard. This is a great house for families - note that there are 2 sets of around 4 stairs going into the property, and if you have an inquisitive toddler, things may need to be moved out of their way! Note that water is valuable in Australia, so please use water, particularly for baths and showers, sparingly where possible.  We are conscious of the environment, and have a worm farm for your scraps. We

host.host_about:
I love nature - walking, cycling or just being. Generally, when I travel, I come with my husband, Glen, and sometimes our son, Alex. We are all very much into the outdoors, peace and wildlife. 
At the same time, we enjoy great food and different cultural experiences. Glen and I lived and worked in Vietnam together, and I've lived in a few other countries, including Canada, the UK, Malaysia and Austria.
Alex is a very well-behaved well-travelled boy (not just saying that!), who has been with us to Europe and South East Asia. 
We all have itchy feet and love to travel and meet different people and experience different cultures, whether near home or far away.

reviews.comments: Very homely and unfussy house with a great garden and lovely neighbours. Belinda was very thorough about advice on local ameneties and very professional to deal with in all matters. They left bikes and a surfboard for my use too.

Belinda is a lovely host and their home is very welcoming & family friendly. You feel relaxed as soon as you arrive! Our kids loved the back yard and the trampoline and the other toys that Belinda kindly left out for us. Would highly recommend!

Belinda was a perfect host and made it really easy to check in and settle in her home. The house and garden are lovely and the garden studio very comfortable. The area is very quiet and close to lovely beaches. We enjoyed our stay  and felt right at home. Thanks for giving us a great Christmas break on the Beaches !

name: 2 BedRooms Apartment with Terrace #1
summary: The apartment is new, with 1 room with twin beds, another room with bunk beds, living room, kitchen, bathroom and a sunny terrace. It is full equipped for up to 6 people.  The area is Villa Olimpica, just 2 metro stops from Ramblas. License Number: HUTB-000847
space: This apartment is new, clean and perfect for a tourist stay in Barcelona. It is located in Villa Olimpica, the best area where to stay when visiting Barcelona. Almost everything can be visited by food, but also we have the metro very close.
description: The apartment is new, with 1 room with twin beds, another room with bunk beds, living room, kitchen, bathroom and a sunny terrace. It is full equipped for up to 6 people.  The area is Villa Olimpica, just 2 metro stops from Ramblas. License Number: HUTB (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) This apartment is new, clean and perfect for a tourist stay in Barcelona. It is located in Villa Olimpica, the best area where to stay when visiting Barcelona. Almost everything can be visited by food, but also we have the metro very close. The full apartment, with 2 bedrooms, living room, equipped kitchen, and terrace Please, contact me anytime, just when you need. I am almost always ready to answer my guests. Villa Olimpica is one of the best neighborhoods where to live in Barcelona. Close to the beach (5 minutes away), it is a quiet neighborhood close to the best restaurant areas, shopping, etc.. Best is by foot or by metro. Taxi is also cheap in Barcelona. CHECKIN: We do the check in at BOUTIQUE BED A
neighborhood_overview: Villa Olimpica is one of the best neighborhoods where to live in Barcelona. Close to the beach (5 minutes away), it is a quiet neighborhood close to the best restaurant areas, shopping, etc..
notes: CHECKIN: We do the check in at BOUTIQUE BED AND BREAKFAST. Address: Pau Claris St. 145, etlo. Telf + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: Best is by foot or by metro. Taxi is also cheap in Barcelona.
access: The full apartment, with 2 bedrooms, living room, equipped kitchen, and terrace
interaction: Please, contact me anytime, just when you need. I am almost always ready to answer my guests.
house_rules: No parties, not noise... This is a residential building, so we are very strict with disturbing the neighbors. Please, don't book if you come for party. CHECK-IN: We do the check in at BOUTIQUE BED AND BREAKFAST. Address: Pau Claris St. 145, etlo. Telf +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) LOCAL TAXES: All guests 17 or older are required to pay 2.48€ per day for lodging tax, at the moment of check in. ARRIVAL TIME: To be able to give you better service please inform us your arrival time one or two days before your trip.

host.host_about:
As a family-operated company, we try to offer an unforgettable experience to our guests, with a personalized attention to the welcoming and the assistance during the stay. All of our apartments are equipped to cover all of our customer’s needs, relax, leisure or business. 

For all people who want to visit Barcelona, we love our city and we are sure you will love it too!!!

reviews.comments:
Merci à Eduardo et son équipe pour la réactivité en terme de communication et la flexibilité. 
Nous - une famille avec 3 enfants - avons apprécié le logement clair et fonctionnel et l'accès par quelques stations de métro aux principaux centres, depuis un quartier très calme ... 
Nous sommes globalement satisfaits même si un petit supplément de charme, de chaleur et de convivialité aurait été appréciable.

Die Unterkunft ist sehr gut gelegen. Man ist in wenigen Minuten zu Fuss am Strand, hat Metro und Bus Verbindungen um in die alte Stadt oder zur Sagrada Familia (auch zu Fuss erreichbar wenn man gerne läuft=)).
Die Wohnung ist eine reine Ferienwohnung!! Das muss man sich bewusst sein. Solche Wohnung benachteiligen die Einwohner von Barcelona stark (Mietpreise steigen und Spanier können nicht mehr in ihrem eigenen Land wohnen!). Man hat auch nie direkten Kontakt mit dem Besitzer. Die Schlüsselübergabe findet in einem Hostel statt, die Angestellten sind dort stets sehr freundlich und geben gerne Auskunft. 
Die Wohnung selber ist ruhige gelegen, ist sehr sauber und verfügt sogar über einen Balkon. Die Küche hat die nötige Grundausrüstung aber auch nicht mehr. 
Wir hatten ein Problem mit dem Internet. Es wurde jedoch behoben und nach hin und her schreiben, kam uns der Gastgeber auch entgegen. Das ist sehr zuvorkommend und fair!
Danke Eduardo für den Beitrag an einen guten Aufenthalt in Barcelona (eine wunderschöne Stadt!)!
Gracias Eduardo por tu contribución a una muy buena estadía en Barcelona (una ciudad hermosa!)!

Lo mejor: la ubicació
Lo peor: para 4 personas es perfecto però para 6 cono eramos nosotros un poco justo.

name: Charming stylish loft  - Sagrada familia
summary: The unique apartment is located in the centric area sagrada familia and  is perfect for longer studying or working periods in Barcelona.  The neighborhood is a nice and quiet residential area in the center of Barcelona.  The famous Sagrada familia is in walking distance (5-10 min).   The place  is very comfortable and very well equipped. No elevator. Minimum stay 60 days.
space: The loft, in a typical old refurbished building , has approximately  60 sqm  including a small bed room,  big living room open space, kitchen in the gallery, full equipment, also air condition, heating, TV , DVD, dishwasher, washing machine and access to common terrace with amazing views to sagrada familia. The apartment is perfect for new starters in Barcelona or long  term rentals.
description: The unique apartment is located in the centric area sagrada familia and  is perfect for longer studying or working periods in Barcelona.  The neighborhood is a nice and quiet residential area in the center of Barcelona.  The famous Sagrada familia is in walking distance (5-10 min).   The place  is very comfortable and very well equipped. No elevator. Minimum stay 60 days. The loft, in a typical old refurbished building , has approximately  60 sqm  including a small bed room,  big living room open space, kitchen in the gallery, full equipment, also air condition, heating, TV , DVD, dishwasher, washing machine and access to common terrace with amazing views to sagrada familia. The apartment is perfect for new starters in Barcelona or long  term rentals. The neighborhood is nice and quiet, where lot of local people live. And you are really  close to the famous Sagrada familia. The neighborhood Gracia, with  lofts of bars, terraces and  restaurants , also with one of the best movie theater
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is nice and quiet, where lot of local people live. And you are really  close to the famous Sagrada familia. The neighborhood Gracia, with  lofts of bars, terraces and  restaurants , also with one of the best movie theaters (verdi cines ) is in walking distance 15 min.
transit: Next metro station is Sagrada familia , very central , excellent public transport. Really close to  the building is the bus station in Sant Antonio Maria Claret - Lepant with several bus lines.
house_rules: I am looking for serious people.

host.host_about:
Hola, 
 
I am renting my own apartment to nice people.

Sascha

reviews.comments: Fiquei hospedado no apartamento do Sascha durante três meses quando estive estudando e trabalhando em Barcelona. Trata-se de um apartamento muito bem localizado que está a aproximadamente 500 metros da Sagrada Família. Em frente ao prédio há uma parada de ônibus sendo possível se locomover facilmente para os principais pontos de interesse da cidade. Existem 3 estações de metro que estão a aproximadamente 500m do apartamento.  O apartamento é muito agradável, possui uma reforma recente e está bem decorado e equipado com todos utensílio necessários para uma temporada. Fica num quinto andar e não possui elevador, você terá que subir obrigatoriamente pelas escadas. O Sascha foi um excelente anfitrião e me forneceu todas informações importantes na minha chegada. Gostei muito do apartamento e com certeza voltaria a ficar hospedado nele. Recomendo fortemente este flat! Obrigado Sascha!
Sascha was very friendly and helpful in all communication and everything went perfect. We stayed here for around 4 months and was really happy about it. Can really recommend it.

El piso está en una ubicado en una zona excelente, cerca de la Sagrada Familia y del Hospital de Sant Pau. Estuvimos alojados durante 3 meses y volveríamos sin dudas. Muy equipado y completo, confortable, con buena calefacción, todo en muy buenas condiciones. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente.
Sascha muy amable con nosotros, nos mantuvimos en contacto por mensajes, le mandamos un gran abrazo.

Ariel y Jennifer

Met Sascha's friend who left me the key and also patiently waited for me to arrive. Sascha was always available and ready to solve any problems, if any, related to the apartment. The apartment is in a good location. It's on the 5th floor (american floors) and there is no elevator but I truly needed the exercise anyway. I would recommend this apartment to anyone (fits a couple comfortably) searching for a short-term rental in Barcelona.

El apartamento esta ubicado es una zona muy linda y tranquila, a pocas cuadras de La Sagrada Familia. Esta perfectamente conectado gracias a la cercanía del transporte público tanto metro como colectivos. Muy confortable y completo, respetando todo lo anunciado. Sascha fue un gran anfitrión, estuvo siempre disponible por cualquier inquietud, igual no tuve ningún inconveniente. Estuve alojada por 3 meses y sin duda volvería, es muy recomendable. Gracias por todo Sascha.

The well equipped, cozy and stylishly furnished flat is really close to Sagrada Familia as well as Hospital de Sant Pau in a nice area where you can also find a lot of restaurants. It is well-connected to public transportation, you find everything you need in the near surrounding and even though the area around is a bit busy, the flat itself is very calm and quiet. We enjoyed our stay very much and thanks to Sascha for being so quick in responding to our questions and so friendly and helpful in general! Muchas gracias! :)

Sascha's apartment is beautiful and spacious. We stayed for 2 months and found it to be very comfortable. The location is excellent - very near to Sagrada Familia, almost next door to the Hospital of Saint Pau, a moderniste architecture gem - all without being very touristy. There are several great grocery stores only blocks away. It's also a 15 minute walk to Gracía, a very "hip" neighborhood with excellent bars and restaurants. The view of the city from the roof is spectacular.

The location of the apartment is fantastic - it is within walking distance of a number of tourist spots and cultural venues, as well as close to plenty of amenities such as supermarkets and a range of transport options, principally bus and metro. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants nearby. The apartment is well appointed with most of what I needed, with plenty of bedding and towels as well as a range of kitchen appliances. It was clean and fully prepared for my arrival. It was great to be able to use the roof terrace a few times in late summer, with its view of the Sagrada Familia. Check in and check out were smooth with no problems.  As a landlord Sascha was personable, friendly and professional, responding promptly and fully to any queries. He also had left out some guide books to help me explore the city, as well as clear instructions for the operation of any appliances, where necessary. I would happily recommend his place to anyone looking for a temporary base from which to explore the city.

I stayed at Sascha's apartment with my girlfriend  for 3.5 months and we had a wonderful stay.

The place is very beutiful, fully equipped and wonderfully located, only 5 minutes away from Sagrada Familia but far away from the noise and the tourists. You have plenty of supermarkets and restaurants nearby, and also metro and bus stops.

Sascha was a great host, always fast to answer to any questions I had, and he even was nice enough to upgrade the Internet to a faster one when I asked (I work from home).

The only things I would improve would be changing the TV for a newer and bigger one, and adding some extra light to the living room, which can be a little dark at times. Also, the apartment is at the 5th floor, and there is no elevator. But these are all small things.

I would rent the apartment again for sure. Recommended!
