reviews.comments: She was very attentive and friendly!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

У меня была ночная пересадка в Стамбуле,  и мы с мужем остановились у Элиф. Комната чистая, красивая. Находится на 12 этаже без лифта (но этаж там на каждом лестнечном проходе, так что можно считать, что 6й этаж). 
Договорились, что Элиф встретит нас в аэропорту за дополнительную плату отвезёт домой и обратно в аэропорт. Элиф ждала нас около 2х часов и в 5 утра отвезла обратно. Очень благодарны ей за содействие! 
Кроме того, девочки приютили наших друзей, которые опаздал на рейс, покормили, погуляли с ними. Хорошие люди, рекомендую! 
-----
We stayed at Elif's room for 1 night, when we had a stop in Istanbul. The room is nice, and the whole apartment, too. The apartment is on the 12 floor, but it was OK.   
Elif met us in the airport (she waited for us about 2 hours) and really early in the morning drove us back.
We are really pleased having met Elif and her friend.  They are really good girls. 
Moreover, they met our friends who missed the flight, and helped them, too. :) 
Definitely recommend!

It was very easy to go to Elif's home from Ataturk Airport. It took me less than 30 minutes and the route was very short by subway and bus. She has a nice flat in a sweet apartment, where you can feel relaxed and restful. There were many restaurants, coffee shops, markets, shopping malls and many buses stops to the almost all points of Istanbul. Her apartment is very close to the sea, too. So you can walk and have rest at the seaside, too.
Her flat was very sweet, wide and clean. I felt as in my home. It is better than the photos she shared.
Elif was very nice to me during my stay. She was helping me to get some places and answers to any questions about Istanbul life. I was feeling fine and relaxed. We became friends during my stay there. We went to see many places, did shopping, had meals and coffee together in different parts of Istanbul. I had a great time with Elif and her friends during 4 days. Thank you for everything, dear Elif. Love you.

Elif's place is especially great for girl travellers. I had a good talk with her roomate. Their house is cozy and clean. I love that :) Also, the host is quick responsive. Long before we arrived, she had asked us the check in time. She still waiting for us even we arrived at midnight. Thanks a lot!
Elif’s home is very cute , tidy and clean. Elif is very helpful and friendly person. elif was very interested to me . I definitely suggest elif’s home

what do you expect from a home? a peaceful enviroment,a clear and tidy house.there are more of these in Elif's house.the hose is in a peaceful building which is in a pretty quiet,calm neighbourhood,but the most important thing is that because  of Elif is such a caring owner she makes you feel you are at your own home.Elif is the best caring owner with her guests that I have never seen and met in my previous accomodations.I intensly suggest Elif's house.because of lasting my accomodation second time,I had a chance to write with details.our paths are separating for now.I hope we keep in touch.Goodbye. Mala min mala te (mi casa es su casa )

name: Room in quiet village in Sai Kung
summary: ONLY ENQUIRIES IN ENGLISH WILL BE ACCEPTED, DUE TO THE  NEED TO EXPLAIN THINGS LIKE THE ALARM SYSTEM YOU MUST BE ABLE TO COMMUNICATE IN ENGLISH A lovely en-suite bedroom and a separate living room/second bedroom in 3 storey Sai Kung village house in a tranquil setting. There is great hiking right outside the door and plenty of beaches a short ride away. Our house is the perfect for guests who want to go hiking, enjoy some watersports, as well as explore the area's attractions and Sai Kung town.
space: THE HOUSE The house is a typical village house with three floors and a furnished roof with fantastic views down over Sai Kung and the sea. The house is in a very small village and is very quiet. The guest bedroom is on the top floor of the house along with our master bedroom. There are stairs leading up to the roof terrace. At the top of the stairs is also a fridge that guests are welcome to use to save them having to go all the way down to the kitchen to get a cold drink, milk for coffee etc. There is are tea and coffee making facilities in the bedroom. On the middle floor there is the living room / second bedroom. This room can be used as a living room if you are staying as a couple or an individual,or as a second bedroom if you are a party of 3 or 4. On this floor is also the second bathroom with shower, toilet and sink, and our daughter's bedroom.  The downstairs consists of the kitchen, a bathroom and the  living room / dining room.  THE ROOMS The guest bedroom is small but is ver
description: ONLY ENQUIRIES IN ENGLISH WILL BE ACCEPTED, DUE TO THE  NEED TO EXPLAIN THINGS LIKE THE ALARM SYSTEM YOU MUST BE ABLE TO COMMUNICATE IN ENGLISH A lovely en-suite bedroom and a separate living room/second bedroom in 3 storey Sai Kung village house in a tranquil setting. There is great hiking right outside the door and plenty of beaches a short ride away. Our house is the perfect for guests who want to go hiking, enjoy some watersports, as well as explore the area's attractions and Sai Kung town. THE HOUSE The house is a typical village house with three floors and a furnished roof with fantastic views down over Sai Kung and the sea. The house is in a very small village and is very quiet. The guest bedroom is on the top floor of the house along with our master bedroom. There are stairs leading up to the roof terrace. At the top of the stairs is also a fridge that guests are welcome to use to save them having to go all the way down to the kitchen to get a cold drink, milk for coffee etc. T
neighborhood_overview: The village is nestled in the hills above Sai Kung and there are some great walks and hikes right from the village. It is a lovely place to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city but still be near enough to enjoy all it has to offer. If you enjoy hiking, we have the Machelhose Stage 4 and the Ma On Shan trail right on our doorstep, and the Wilson Trail section 4 starts in Ho Chung which is a 10 min bus ride from Sai Kung.
notes: We have one dog (very sweet natured) and two cats who are rarely seen as they hide from everyone! Please note that if you are two separate people who do not wish to share a bed, you will need to pay extra for the second bedroom, which is the equivalent of a third person ($400 per night)
transit: Sai Kung town is only a 20 minute walk or you can get a minibus (10 min journey plus 4 min walk to bus stop). From Sai Kung it is very easy to get into Hong Kong Island, the journey time from Sai Kung by car or taxi is 30-40 mins or about 1 hour on public transport.   Sai Wan beach is a 25min taxi ride and then a 30 min walk. Trio beach is a 10 min taxi ride then a 10 min bus ride. Sai Kung beach, which is very small but has fantastic watersports rentals such as kayaks, wind surfers, paddle boards etc. is a 25 min walk from the house or a 10 min walk from Sai Kung town.
access: Guests are welcome to use the middle floor living room. The downstairs living room is the family room and is not a shared space. Guests are welcome to use supplies from the kitchen such as cutlery, plates  etc. if they would like to have a BBQ or breakfast (which they provide themselves) on the roof terrace, but it is our family kitchen so it is not available for cooking meals. There is also the roof terrace which guests are welcome to use if the weather is fine. This 700sq ft space has fabulous views looking out one side to the mountains and the other down to Sai Kung and the sea. There is a charcoal BBQ on the roof which guests are welcome to use, and a fridge just inside the door to the roof.  Please let us know if you would like to use the roof and / or BBQ so that we can get it ready for you as the cushions and umbrella are stored inside to to keep them looking nice. You can buy charcoal for the BBQ from one of the shops in Sai Kung (same price!) We have all the tools you need for
interaction: We will be very happy to help with anything during your stay and can also help organise or recommend trips to other parts of Hong Kong.  We do not speak Chinese so if you are coming from China and do not speak much English this will not be a good place for you as it makes communication very difficult and there are quite a few things we need to communicate about, like the alarm system, facilities etc. (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) translate is not very accurate and can cause problems, plus does not help with face to face!
house_rules: PLEASE READ THE HOUSE MANUAL THAT YOU WILL RECEIVE ONCE YOU BOOK. THIS HAS IMPORTANT INFORMATION. There is a no smoking rule in the house but guests are welcome to smoke on the middle floor balcony or on the roof. If you intend to use the BBQ please let us know in advance and tidy up the rubbish / food etc and bring inside any plates, glasses etc. afterwards, ie don't leave food out. We will clean up  Please take off your shoes and leave them in the cupboard under the stairs. We have an eight year old daughter whose bedroom is on the middle floor, so please keep the noise at night to a reasonable level, especially if you are staying during the week as she has to be up early for school.  The kitchen is not really available for use and we do not provide breakfast. However, there is a toaster and a Nespresso coffee machine in the Green room and you are welcome to have breakfast on the roof terrace and we have plenty of plates, cutlery etc that you may use. There are no shops near the hous

host.host_about: I live in Hong Kong with my husband and daughter, we have lived here for nearly 20 years most of that in the Sai Kung  area. We love Sai Kung for its beautiful hikes and beaches, The atmosphere and the people, and the opportunity it gives my daughter to grow up in the countryside

address.street: Sai Kung, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
It's very well experience in Tara's home.The facilities of the house are well-prepared.Tara's advices about Sai Kung are useful.Thanks to her picking us up in car,It 's easier for us to make a round trip from the house to the mini bus stop with baggages.Tara is very nice,and help us so much! The place is nature and quiet.And easy get to Sai Kung. I like the place so much!And also the lovely dog and cats.

房东很好人,约定地方开车接我们到她家｡并且热心为我们指导交通｡住处自然景观很好很安静,而且很方便到西贡｡我很喜欢这个地方,也喜欢房东家的猫猫狗狗^_^

We had a wonderful stay in Tara's house. She and her family are very nice and always caring about us to have a good time there feeling like in our home. They also gave us good advice to find the best spots and restaurants in the area. The house is located in a very quiet area where you can hear all day the birds singing and at the same time with very convenient transportation to Saikung village.
居所位于山上,空气､环境一流,山景房间内干净整洁,温馨舒适｡房东Tara和她的家人热情友善,并为我们的居住和出行提供最大的便利,特别要提一下她们可爱的女儿和友好的猫狗,我们孩子和她们玩耍的很开心,我们在Tara家度过了一个快乐的周末,下次来西贡还会选择入住这里!
帮两个朋友订的房,都说不错｡房东夫妇非常友好,细心介绍每个房间每项设施,还给她们提前开好房间的空调~

We had a very good and wonderful stay in Tara's house. Tara and her family is very nice and helpful. Thanks Tara for her warm welcome and taking care of, Thanks Ella and the doggy for leading us to the bus station. Also thanks for trusting us by giving us your house key. I've never been staying in such a lovely home. It should be one of my unforgettable experience.

We had a very good and wonderful stay in Tara's house. We received warm welcome and everyone in her home is very nice and so kind. I love Tara's home which is clean and well equipped and her hospitality. We enjoyed our stay very much!

It was a great opportunity to see something unique in Hong Kong. 
Owner is very kind and informative. She's always ready to help us and willing to do everything to make our stay awesome.
She came to pick us up by car in the front of Starbucks. She walked us through her house, kindly gave us some nice options to spend time and how to get there searching on web sites. We settled down unpacking our stuff, then she gave us a ride again to go to Trio beach. We enjoyed swimming there and had awesome seafood dinner at Sai Kung as she recommended. 
She and her family were out almost all day, so we relaxed ourselves in the living room, too. There's a helper who is very kind and friendly, which also made us feel comfortable.
The house was clean and lovely. It has a beautiful garden, fully equipped kitchen and spacious roof top overlooking great view. Our kids loved playing with the dog and cats in the rooms. We felt as if we had come to another country leaving busy, hectic life in a city of Hong Kong.
The house is located in a remote place, so make sure you know where to get off a cab coz we got totally lost after dinner!
We got off a cab on an ally next to the right one, but it's really hard to find out the house during night. Anyway, the helper came to find us so we finally arrived at home. Eventually, it made funny memory for us;)
Thank you very much!!
Tara这一套三层的房子非常漂亮,Tara一家非常的亲和,包括她们家可爱的狗狗Jewel和猫猫~Tara也帮了我们很大的忙,非常感谢她呢!在西贡留下了一段美好的回忆,当中就包括在她家的住宿!

The description is accurate, and Tara is friendly and nice. She showed us the way to get into the hiking trail since the primary purpose of my trip is hiking, and the house is located very close to the trail.
Experience was more like a bed & breakfast. European feel. Very nice and comfortable. Love the roof terrace!

It was a very memorable trip than expected. The hostess is very warm, and the room is very  comfortable. I offered no suggestions for improvement.We look forward to later have the opportunity to live in such a room.

A peaceful and beautiful place to stay, Tara is a great host who is patient and clear minded, with her kindly guidance, we've been rewarded a fantastic seeing sight of Saiwan Beach, but unfortunately for the storm weather we didn't see the ageing lok stream, I think we have to go again , thanks for Tara, I would highly recommend!

Philip is very warmhearted.

sai kung is extremely strange to us. As we got to his house  later at PM 7:30, we can't find restaurant .He take us with his car and help us finding restaurant.

when he awareed that  we was inconvenience to live in accordance with airbnb order, he give me a  additional big bed without any extra fare.

room is lean and his dog is very lovely.
非常棒的体验,Tara非常友善,为我们提供各种便利,贴心的煮好开水凉给我们｡语言沟通方面有点小小障碍,但对于住宿没有问题｡床上用品很干净,看得出他们一家很懂生活｡

We can highly recommend staying at Tara's place: She was a very friendly host and had lots of tips where to go in Sai Kung and how to get there. The room was just as described, we felt very comfortable. You can easily walk to the Sai Kung city center, also the house is the perfect hub to go hiking or to one of the beaches close to Sai Kung. We would have liked to have more time to explore the beautiful and quiet surroundings.

Tara was very warm, receptive and helpful in answering questions and orienting us to the neighborhood. Lovely little stream in the back of her house which the children enjoyed. The room was very comfortable and quiet. She was kind and thoughtful in helping to make our stay easier and more enjoyable.

The house is lovely. The guest room is cozy and the roof is a wonderful place to appreciate the beautiful, breezy night in Sai Kung.
Tara was considerate, joyful and kind. We really enjoy living here.
So happy to stay at your house with the nice facilities and environment.  BRAVO!!!

Fantastic place to stay, the views are even better than the photos and Tara was a wonderful host (even going out of her way to give my girlfriend a lift to work - thanks for that!)  Would highly recommend a night here to escape the crowds of Hong Kong..

Really nice experience! It's my dream house! Tara and her lovely family let us feel at home. The bedroom is well-furnished and cosy. The terrace with fantastic sea view leave us deep impression. I  highly recommend this house!

A quiet and delicate room. Good for one person or couples. The helper is nice and patient. It took a little bit long to find it the first time but it was worth staying for village view,ocean view and seafood. Tara even drove us to town center. Thanks!
Return visit to this great spot - not disappointed!
Great stay with wonderful hosts. Particularly love their thoughtful house manual. Fantastic advice on exploring the trails and beaches in this beautiful part of Hong Kong.
Wonderful place to stay for a night!
Fantastic stay in a beautiful spot - highly recommend.
Lovely en-suite room and warm and welcoming hosts

I had a really nice time in Sai Kung. Tara and her family were very welcoming and helpful giving me lots of information and a lift into town when I had all my luggage. The views from the rooftop are amazing and there is great hiking and beaches for swimming nearby. I also did a kayaking tour that I can highly recommend.

This BnB nestled up on the hills above Sai Kung was in my opinion a great and idyllic getaway within the boundaries of Hong Kong's SAR. Some have argued that it wasn't easy to reach and a bit too far out. But this argument proves illogical while they are comparing to anything else more urban - hence this be called a 'getaway'. However I find this to be a perfect solution to be out in the mountains surrounded by the full force of green vegetation all the while only a five minute taxi ride into Sai Kung town for all your amenities, enough choices for eating out and a convenient terminus to head into the city about an hour away. What more can you ask for?

The British family hosts are friendly and generous. Although I've always seen B&B's to mean 'bed and breakfast', this accommodation is more like a 'B', since breakfast was, as clearly defined on the site, not included. However their kitchen is free to use and one only needs to bring their own groceries up to the house to cover the stay. Rooftop BBQ was a promised highlight but the grill was so rusted out from under-use that my planned steak BBQ turned to a stove-top fry down in the kitchen instead.

Overall I still highly recommend this stay to anyone who wishes to find a nice quiet stay to gaze out in late afternoon/evenings under the stars on the rooftop or just to hunker down for a few days watching countless DVDs available or to hike on the plethora of trails that lead out and around the surrounding mountain sides. Whatever you end up doing, you'll come out fully rested and ready for another round from Hong Kong city's knockout attack on your whole being.
Tara的家好温馨,可爱的狗狗让我无法自拔｡房间虽然小但五脏俱全,床品很干净温暖,Tara是一位很nice的房东,没有刻意的服务于我们,把我们就像是多年好友般对待,很自由很随意｡
Lovely stay!
Loved our stay with Tara, her place makes any homesick expat feel like they have come home. Would love to go back again soon.

tara fut incroyablement accueillante, on se sent comme a la maison dés le premier contact, la maison est situé sur les hauteurs du village, 4euros en taxi depuis celui ci (le prix des taxis est vraiment pas chers) aussi une très belle ballade  dans une petite jungle urbaine en descendant de la maison au village...merci tara ce fut parfait

Thanks tara. We are local couple and I'm having a birthday celebration. The place is so British, lovely, warm and cozy. A while to take to drive some Sai Kung centre to there and parking is just next to the houses. We love the living room. Enjoyed a night with dvd. If have chance we will come back there for our city escape ;)
Very nice and get we a good memory

Nice stay with Tara and her cozy home.Tara is very nice and kind, and treat us just like an old friend.Her home is so clean that even there are lovely pets but we couldn't smell anything strange. There are lots of books and photos which show the owner's good taste and wonderful life experience. It's a pity that we have full schedule outside all day long that even don't have chance to talk so much with Tara. But I do believe I 'll be back soon with my husband and daughter. Thanks very much, Tara. See you soon. From  Jasmine
we'd a great experiencs here!Tara and her helpper re very friendly people further we hold opinon that…and her house is vrey warm and clean,just like at home!recommend u stay in need…
The housekeeper/helper was very helpful and welcoming. Very clean bathroom.

Amazing stay in Sai Kung! Great room and great host!
The room was really nice and clean, with a private bath. We didn't met Tara, but her house keeper was really nice and gave us plenty of tips and information about Sai Kung and made us really feel home!
We watched a DVD in the living room, had breakfast on the rooftop with an outstanding view and were able to use the large and well-equipped kitchen.
Thanks for the great memories!
We really enjoyed our stay.
Everything is good except it's not so easy to find the house.
Cozy room! Tara and her helper are very nice people, it was a great time there.

This is a wonderful tour with Tara's house  and her kindly help!
1. The house is very clean (even after standing with barefoot on the roof,our foot is still clean!) and warm (all people there are very nice, Tara is helpful and her beautiful daughter is quiet and lovely too)
2. Tara is very helpful and if she can, she would try to help us to fix all problems! Such as taking more care of my nephew who is only 3 years old and my parents who are more than 70 years old.
3. The BBQ is definitely a good highlight as it was a wonderful experience when we eating and relaxing on the roof with beautiful moon and many stars in the sky. Can you imagine we are in a modern city, HK, can see so beautiful night! BTW, I used to worry about the grill but it is very clean and not under-used at all.
4. "The house is not big but comfortable " and that is the comments from my parents.
We enjoyed the warm welcome of your house keeper. She was very friendly and helped us with everything.

Tara and her helper are very friendly. Very comfortable rooms, clean & neat, good towels, we had good sleep here. The house is in a quiet village easy to get Sai Kung center by Taxi or by bus in 10 mins. Very convenient for tour of Sai Kung - beachs, islands, seafood, etc. Hope could come again......
Lovely house in Saikung. Very convenient location near Saikung downtown. The roof area is perfect with very good sea view.
房东tara非常细心的为我们准备床铺,以及其他的生活用品｡与tara的家人相处很愉快,tara还提供给我们一些旅行路线｡tara的家依山傍水,风景极佳｡希望还有机会再次旅行｡

We took taxi from the airport, and it took us a while to find the house. The house is remote and cosy, very clean. Helper  Dee is kind and there are a black dog and two cats in the house. Sai Kuang is wonderful, highly recomended.
乡村生活,安静,从机场坐红色出租去要近些,约三百五十港币,但司机可能不熟悉路｡和房东及帮佣需要英文交流｡住这里很舒服,乘四元小巴去西贡,登岛或海边吃饭都方便｡
Tara and her family and helper are very nice! Her dog and cats are lovely. The place is very clean. Recommend!!!

Wonderful stay. The views are as described and in the picture. Tara gave us great ideas of things to do and was always interested on how the day went. would definitely stay again. Thank you for having us.

I had a great staying in Sai Kung, Private room and rules of the house are perfectly described, the house is very quiet, Tara and her family are very welcoming. I was mostly hiking in Sai Kung country park, it is easy to get to the park using bus 94 from Sai Kung bus terminal or using mini bus 29R  just in front of McDonald. You could also hike nearby the house.

There is plenty of good restaurant in Sai Kung for diner, A Starbuck for breakfast, Just loved the Matcha espresso Fusion offert in HK Starbuck, they are not available in Canada. 

Moni Stand coffee+record is my best coffee spot discovery of 2016 , I loved the spirit of that place and the hand drip high quality coffee is just perfect.

Jacques

I had a pleasant stay during my visit to Sai Kung in Tara's beautiful home. The view from the rooftop was amazing and the quiet and peaceful surroundings made for a relaxing atmosphere night or day. The bus stop was only a short walk away with very frequent mini bus service for a reasonable fee. Tara and her assistant Dee were fantastic hosts with tips and advice about sights, hiking trails and dining locations in the area. Thank you both for helping to make my experience in Sai Kung so memorable!
Tara's house is very quiet and the scene is very beautiful. The space is big enough for a family to live. Good privacy for couples. Recommend!

We had such a lovely time in sai kung. Tara's home was In a great location, amazing hiking right out of the door and easy to get into town on the minibus. Tara was incredibly nice and helpful, she had great suggestions for things to do and was very accommodating. The roof is an excellent place to watch the sunset!
Tara et sa aide domestique Bee sont très serviables et sensibles au confort des hôtes.

To me, this is what AirBnB is all about! Going to an beautiful place to meet great, accommodating people who are passionate about the area. For us, who didn't know the area having Tara explain the good spots made it all the better. Thanks and hope to see you again soon!
非常漂亮温馨的房子,主人及孩子们甚至狗狗都十分和蔼可亲｡按照指南的路线也能准确找到位置｡Tara非常热情地带我看了公车站点和步行线路｡

Tara's place was lovely, a cozy private room with a cozy private bathroom and access to the rooftop and the second floor living room. Tara is a very warm and inviting host, we had a great stay at her place!

It feels like home!
They're very artistic and creative.
Ate Dee is very helpful and always smiling :)
The dog is like a dream dog of any pet/dog lover, so quiet and sweet. 
The cats are always MIA. Didn't get a chance to play with 'em. Hehe
The view is awesome from the rooftop, we did stargazing there.
Just call Tara in advance to get the directions clear, it's not far but you might have a difficulty finding it for the first time, and Sai Kung has very limited accommodation. 


-Jenny & Lu with Lee & Ralfe

it's a great experience to spend a night at Tara's. Tara is very nice and her hospitality make us feel home. The house facility is good and comfy and we had a really good rest after all day hiking. Jewell is cute and give us big welcome even from out of the house.we will definitely choose Tara's if we revisit Sai Kung

Tara, her helper Dee and her lovely daughter Ella were such great hosts! From booking taxis, directions to the house, to sharing of toys, they were generous with their time and home. My daughter had such a fantastic time playing with Ella. The walk to the house is very relaxing. The playground quite awesome indeed! I would suggest washer access for longer stays, but otherwise, one of the most pleasant airbnb experiences I've had.

I loved the quiet location but so convenient to transport to town. It was perfect for our stay and Tara and her family are lovely. She was available to assist every time I needed it and offered some great suggestions on sightseeing! The home is clean and comfortable and I would absolutely stay here again if I return to this area of Hong Kong.

Staying at this place is perfect if you are looking for calm getaway from busy city life. I would especially recommend to do a BBQ on the rooftop, cause the view is stunning! I was completely happy with the stay and Tara is lovely host!

Lovely place, very quiet. Nice rooftop with barbecue. 
Tara and her family were very friendly and assisted us whenever needed. 
we will come back for sure.
Hiking with friends, four people together have a nice hotel experience, very beautiful and clean house, very friendly landlord…

It is a great experience we stay in this beautiful house!! It's easy to find the house by the way Tara told us. The beds are very comfortable. Hosts and helper are so nice. It's a pity that we can play with the beautiful cats and dog. Hope to come back again.
Beautiful house and quiet atmosphere.

是一個很棒的住宿點,很乾淨也很舒適,如同家一般的地方｡入住西貢雖然交通時間較長(但巴士很多班),剛好緩和忙碌的香港｡  This place is clean, quiet, and as comfortable as home.  It is a excellent place for stay in HK, because HK is a busy and fast city, Sai King can balance it.

Tara's place exceeded our expectations. Her home is stunning and provided the perfect weekend getaway for us. Her family was extremely hospitable and were incredibly helpful and welcoming our entire stay. Highly recommend this place to all.
Tara’s room are perfect and very cozy. The host and helper are very nice too! Worth to live!

Tara is a great host. Very clear instructions and easy to communicate with, and very nice. The place is very near to the hiking spot and she actually drove to show us the entrance and on the (Hidden by Airbnb) map, which was very kind. It made our day. I love our stay there.

Saikung is certainly one of theee places to experience nature and the "wild" side of Hongkong. Sure you have to be lucky with the weather but I managed on one of my "bad" days to get to the museums "downtown" in 1, 5 hours. Otherwise take the bus from near their place down to the boat from the ferry pier and head for the sharp island-trail!
Taras place is a nice house with a lot of privacy, netflix and if necessary-even a heater. 
I did not meet Tara but talked to her husband and enjoyed the company of their lovely and very helpful and interesting helper Dee. Special thank's to you, Dee!!!
環境略遠離西貢市區,所以環境安靜清幽,房間漂亮整潔,特別喜歡二樓廳房,既漂亮整齊,又有空氣清新機,空氣流通,和屋主溝通愉快謝謝讓我們有個舒適快樂的假期｡
安静舒适的一个房源,推荐给前往西贡休闲度假的旅行者,尤其是去麦径徒步的朋友们｡
Quiet spot above Sai Kung village.  Great hosts.

Nice house, very comfortable and cozy. Highly recommend guests to take a look at the instruction manual carefully before reaching there. Because we still overlooked the exactly way of the location. 
Tara is very kind and Phil explained all the instructions clearly when we arrived. Btw Jewel is super cute and friendly. 
We love Sai Kung and will definitely choose here again. Hope to see the hosts again. :)
Great choice for Sai Kung trips.
極力推薦!環境優美､乾淨舒適; 適合自駕者,但乘坐小巴亦方便快捷｡屋主Tara回覆速迅清晰､Helper Dee友善細心､小狗乖巧……!
This is a quiet and beautiful house. It is good for hiker. Room space is a little bit small

We had very nice and enjoyable weekend at Tara's place. The place is located in a very quiet area, about 10 minutes ride from Sai Kung pier and it's perfect for a quick weekend getaway. I have to say that Tara was a great host and we felt really comfortable at her place. We went there by motorcycle, so it was very easy for us to explore around. There are some wonderful beaches around this area and spending time there gives you an impression that you are not in HK anymore, but rather at some paradise beach in Southeastern Asia.  To summarize, it was a wonderful weekend and we would love to stay at this place again.

we really enjoy the night stay at Tara's place, nice and cozy. Lovely juice and cute white cat~ Please follow Tara's advice taking taxi or bus to the house. we cost nearly 40 mins walking there. Thanks Tara~

I like this place is very peaceful 
And Tara is a very kind and trustable person

It's a family house, but you get a very private environment. The room I stayed was on the top floor, and I had own shower and washroom. The room is very clean. The house is located 5 min walk from the bus stop, and I enjoyed walking the path along the river in green. The helper was very helpful. Great stay. Highly recommended.

as described, but very expensive for this particular shared room situation. you can't really use any  common area apart from roof, which was hot and buggy when we were there, so could only hang out in small rooms.  felt like invader in what is usually family space. would only rent if nothing private available, and camping unfeasible for weather reasons. is convenient to trails, clean, comms good.

Tara is a wonderful hostess!Thanks so much again for your help. We are so impressed by Sai Kong,not only for the hikes and beaches,but also the people, tara’s house is like a key to the wonderful community, we love  here!

Tara´s place is a laidback house in the hills of Saikung
Her helper Darleen was really nice to welcome us and make us feel at home

We stayed here for a night to get out of the city and do a little bit of hiking. The house is close to a couple of hiking trails and not far from Sai Kung town center (accessible by minibus). The room was nice, clean, and spacious and Tara was a great host. She gave us lots of good tips about where to go hiking and places to eat in the square. Would definitely recommend staying here!

Tara and Phil are very hospitable! I I especially enjoyed the roof top access. Grabbed a cup of coffee laid on the sofa on the roof top, the morning breeze, an ocean view and bird chirping in the background. It’s perfect for getting away from the city. I also went up the Maclehose Trail with Tara’s suggestions and it was fabulous. I would definitely come back and stay for longer when I come to Sabi Kung again! Thanks for everything Tara!

Stayed there for the second time in a year. Dee made it very easy again to enjoy my stay!
Thank you!!

Beautiful home away from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong city. It was slightly difficult to find the place initially, but once we found it, we felt at home. The room was very cozy and comfortable. If we ever needed another break away from the city, we won't hesitate to pick Tara's place again!

This is a comfortable home away from home for any trip to Sai Kung. The room is cozy, and the roof has a great view for breakfast. Dee, Tara’s helper, has a great energy and made sure we were well taken care of at all times.
We had an enjoyable stay at Tara's comfy place. Please make sure to ask for hiking tips in the area, great hike start start next to the place

name: La maison aux raisins
summary: Logé au fond d'un parc, petit appartement neuf,au calme excellent pied à terre pour un séjour découverte de Montréal. Proche du Jardin botanique, du Biôdome, du stade olympique, et du stade Saputo, à 5 minutes du métro pour rejoindre le centre ville.
description: Logé au fond d'un parc, petit appartement neuf,au calme excellent pied à terre pour un séjour découverte de Montréal. Proche du Jardin botanique, du Biôdome, du stade olympique, et du stade Saputo, à 5 minutes du métro pour rejoindre le centre ville. Dans un appartement en demi sous sol d`une maison Duplex isolée.Les voyageurs ont la jouissance complète des lieux et peuvent profiter  d'un endroit aménagé à l'extérieur pour se détendre .Les visiteurs ont un accès privé. Les hôtes occupent le restant de la maison et sont à disposition pour toutes questions. Logement calme situé devant un parc , commerce proches,, près de la piste cyclable. Jardin botanique et parc Olympique à deux rues. Proximité du parc Technopole Angus.  Possibilité de location de vélos a coté de la piste cyclable. A 10 minute à pied des stations de métro de Pi 9 ou Joliette. Possibilité de prendre un Bus au fond du parc pour se rendre a la station de métro Hôte artiste peintre . Il me fera plaisir de partager ma passi
neighborhood_overview: Logement calme situé devant un parc , commerce proches,, près de la piste cyclable. Jardin botanique et parc Olympique à deux rues. Proximité du parc Technopole Angus.  Possibilité de location de vélos a coté de la piste cyclable.
notes: Hôte artiste peintre . Il me fera plaisir de partager ma passion et qu`il sera possible d`acquérir des œuvres.
transit: A 10 minute à pied des stations de métro de Pi 9 ou Joliette. Possibilité de prendre un Bus au fond du parc pour se rendre a la station de métro
access: Dans un appartement en demi sous sol d`une maison Duplex isolée.Les voyageurs ont la jouissance complète des lieux et peuvent profiter  d'un endroit aménagé à l'extérieur pour se détendre .Les visiteurs ont un accès privé. Les hôtes occupent le restant de la maison et sont à disposition pour toutes questions.
house_rules: Tenir le logement propre, Vaisselle faite avant de quitter les lieux. Pour un séjour harmonieux , il est demandé de faire part de civisme, éviter le bruit, et se respecter. Pas de fête ni de soirées autorisées. Ne convient pas aux animaux Interdiction de fumer: tabac, cigarette, cigarette électronique, vapoteuse et cannabis

reviews.comments: This was our first air bnp experience and it was above expectations. The housing was nice, it is close to the metro (less than 10 minutes). The host was a nice man. It looks exactly like the pictures.

The apartment was clean, modern, confortable and beautiful. Philippe and his wife were very friendly and gave us all the support we needed during our stay in Montreal. The price is fair, the place is close to the metro, supermarket and close to everything. I strongly recommend this apartment, it was a wonderful experience for me and my family.

Superbe accueil et emplacement bien situé car le metro proche donne acces au centre ville tres rapidemement! Philippe est un hote serieux et son logement vraiment propre et le confort est de mise.Les photos refletent la realité et nous reviendrons sans hesiter! Merci Philippe.
Superbe experience!Je recommande Philippe qui est un hote très accueillant.Logement impeccable et bien situé.
Philippe's place was very clean and well furnished just as advertised. He was very cute ours and accommodated our arrival and checkout times. Parking and transportation was easily accessible
I really enjoyed my stay at "La maison aux raisins".  It is a quiet neighborhood.  The apartment is exactly like the pictures and totally spotless. The hosts were very nice. I would rent again.
Super appartement! Bien équipé, propre et bien situé. Un accueil très sympathique de la part de Philippe, très arrangeant sur les heures d'arrivées et de départ!
Le logement est confortable, bien aménagé et très bien situé. Je le recommande.
Une disponibilite irreprochable de la part de Philippe! Merci pour votre gentillesse! L'appartement est parfait et à recommander! Au plaisir

L'hôte était très organisé et gentil. Nous avons bien apprécié l'efficacité d'acquérir les clés et de nous avoir montré l'endroit qui était facilement accessible. C'était notre première expérience avec Airbnb alors on ne savait pas trop à quoi s'attendre. Nous avons aimé les petits détails rajoutés comme le journal édition Grand Prix sur la table à notre arrivée (la raison de notre visite). Très belle endroit que je recommande à tous! :)

L'endroit est parfait. Si vous cherchez la vie trépidante de Montréal, il faudra sauter dans le taxi, prendre un bixi (juste à côté) où prendre le métro...à 5 minutes de marche.

C'est propre et près des services. Parfait.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour chez Philippe, il a était disponible pendant les 19 jours de notre présence et à répondu a toute nos interrogations et questions! Le logement correspond exactement au photo et est très agréable a vivre, dans un quartier calme et proche du metro.
Je ne regrette pas mon choix et je le recommande grandement.
The place felt like home. It was very nice and clean. The pictures were accurate. Highly recommended.

Excellente experience dans cet appartement, très propre et bien équipé. Nous avons passé deux excellente nuit et il a été très facile de s'arranger pour emménager. Proche du métro et de commodités, c'est l'endroit idéal pour un court ou long séjour.
Felt great. Place was very quite and clean! Def recommended!

l'accueil de Philippe était parfaite. Bien que je sois arrivé assez tard dans la soirée, Philippe était là pour moi.
le logement était nettement au dessus de mes attentes. très beau, propre et très bien équipé.
En bref, je me suis senti comme à la maison.
Philppe is a great host! We enjoy staying at his place and we will probably go back in the futur!
Hôte accueillant et disponible, logement très bien équipé, emplacement parfait pour nos besoins, nous sommes très très satisfait de notre séjour et recommandons chaudement sans hésiter !!!
Très propre, très bien décoré et très accueilli.

Hôte bien veillant (accueillant et très arrangeant).
Logement conforme à la description voire même plus. Complet (électroménager, cuisine, salle de bain très propre et très pratique).
Il est situé dans un endroit très calme Nous le conseillons fortement.

Appartement qui ne manque de rien pour des équipements.
Proche du métro Joliette a 9 minutes a pied et d'un grand supermarché, Provigo a 10 minutes.
Philippe est très disponible aux demandes.

Appartement tous équiper . 
Propre 
Hôte très flexible
Philippe's place was beatiful just like in the photos. The apartment has everything you need and more and Philippe is very helpful
This place is awesome n the metro is close by place to park ur car as well. Will stay again.

The apartment was clean and equipped. Very comfortable, nice and in very quite neighborhood. The location is walking distance to the green line of metro station and brings you to downtown in 15 to 20 minutes. Some attractions of the city like the Botanic Garden and Olympic Stadium are walking distance also. Philippe was very kind on check-in. I definitely recommend the apartment.
The place is great. 20 min train ride from town. Pictures do not capture how nice this place is. Definitely recommend.

Lovely, cute little place. Had everything we needed and more. We were going to an event at the Olympic Stadum, and it was perfect, quick walking distance. Philippe was great, and quick to respond to any questions we had. Overall, great experience!

Philippe est très accueillant, il nous a aidé à porter nos bagages et nous a expliqué toutes les fonctionnalités du logement.
Le logement est très propre, très fonctionnel et tout équipé; on s’y sent comme à la maison.
Deux muffins au chocolat sont même laissés dans la cuisine à l’arrivee. 
Philippe est à l’écoute et très disponible.
Le logement se situe à 8 min du métro Joliette, il est facile de se rendre au centre ville.
En bref si vous souhaitez passer un bon séjour à Montréal, je vous recommande vivement ce logement.
Je recommande fortement le logement de Philippe.
C’était notre première expérience AirBnb et certainement pas notre dernière grâce à Philippe. Nous avons adoré notre expérience, tout était selon nos attentes et même plus!

Philippe's place is amazing. It is clean, comfortable, quiet, well-appointed....I could just go on. I think this is the first location I've stayed at which has everything covered. It's in a quiet area of the city, about a 5 minute walk from the Joliette metro station. Philippe was hospitable and helpful. This will be my first choice if I need a place to stay in Montreal again.
Always a pleasure to stay at Philippe's.

We really enjoyed our stay at Philippe's apartment - La maison aux raisins.  It was our first Airbnb experience so we were not sure what to expect.  Philippe was great to deal with.  He always responded quickly and even though French is his first language we had no problems communicating in English.
This apartment is about a 10 minute walk from two metro stations (Pie IX and Joliette) and if you have luggage you can take a bus to/from the metro station (the metro is down the hill from this house), the bus stop is right around the corner from the house.  When we arrived Philippe greeted us with the keys and gave us a tour of the apartment.  He thoughtfully had a small snack on the table for us and showed us lots of things he set aside  to help us out on our trip such as maps of the city and a booklet with information to help us find grocery stores, malls, etc.  
The apartment was cosy with lots of  things to make us feel welcome.  The kitchen was well equipped, although we mostly ate out enjoying the great food in Montreal.  There is lots of room in the fridge and appliances to make meals or reheat leftovers.  The bathroom was very clean and modern.  There is a nice sized storage area to keep empty suitcases and bags.  Everywhere we looked in the apartment we found things set out to make our stay a good one - there was a candy jar, coffee, tea, jams, bread in the freezer, a first aid kit, sewing kit and a laundry room.  There was even local art on the walls and lots of decorations around the place to make us feel at home.
I have nothing to compare this experience to other than hotel stays but both my wife and I were very impressed with both Philippe and Marie and the apartment.  If we are ever back in Montreal I will be sure to check the availability of La maison aux raisins.
Excellent séjour, comme à chaque fois!

Super appartement ! en demi sous sol donc éclairé mais quand même frais, très propre et bien équipé. dès notre arrivée nous avons très bien été reçu par Philippe qui avait laisser des muffins pour nous dans la cuisine. Le quartier est très calme, en face d'un agréable petit parc. Les hôtes sont extrêmement gentils et ont pleins de petites attentions très appréciées !
This listing did not disappoint.  It was well appointed, clean, and Philippe goes above and beyond to make your stay very comfortable.  Would recommend this Airbnb without hesitation!

Philip was a wonderful host. He provided many thoughtful touches like a binder with all the info you need about the place as well as visiting Montreal. Like many of the other reviews, he provided a nice snack as a welcome. The venue is clean and stylish with all the amenities you could ever need to live on comfort. It's close to main transportation, and will get you to downtown within half an hour. I would definitely stay here again for future trips to Montreal
Très joli appartement, agréable et propre. Peu lumineux car au sous-sol mais ça ne nous a posé aucun souci !

My husband and I spent a long weekend in Montreal for my birthday. We found Philippe's place to be a wonderful value for the money and it was a very comfortable apartment. It's a basement level unit with Philippe living right upstairs so the host is always conveniently nearby. We found that he responded to messages quickly.  We met him during check-in when he showed the apartment to us and pointed out where we can find items we may need.  He gave us the keys, showed us how to lock the doors and walked us through how to park. He was very pleasant. There were many thoughtful items left for us: a couple muffins for breakfast, water, juice and beer in the fridge, plenty of tea in the cupboard. The kitchen was well stocked with pots and pans, a variety of dishes, etc. The mattress was firm and while I like a softer mattress (my husband prefers one that is firm!) I found that I woke up well rested and comfortable.

We found the location of the apartment to be absolutely wonderful.  It was a short walk (about 5 mins) to the Biodome, Botanical Gardens and Pie IX metro station. The apartment is located on a wonderfully quiet residential street and we felt very safe leaving our car parked on the street. Near the apartment is a grocery store as well as 3 local parks that were beautiful to walk through. We couldn't have been happier with the location of this space.
A wonderful place with everything needed to stay a couple of days or longer. I‘ll be back soon
Bien situé avec tout l'équipement nécessaire et plus.  Merci.

This was our first Airbnb and it was wonderful! The apartment was beautiful, apparently new, and well-equipped, on a quiet street. Philippe went far beyond what we could have expected in helping us. When we were having trouble finding our way from the airport, he came and picked us up at the Metro. He was available every time we needed any help planning what we would do in Montreal. 

The most fascinating place we visited turned out to be the botanical garden, unlike any we’ve seen anywhere else, and the big chain of greenhouses with plants from around the world and information about them. They are a short walk from Philippe’s house, as is the Metro. There's a bus to a different Metro station that stops even closer to his house but we didn't use it.

Altogether, Montreal was a great vacation for us. The only downside was flight delays in both directions, to and from Boston. We could have gotten there much faster and easier by car, which is how we will go if we have a chance for a second trip.

This was our third trip to Montreal since our son and daughter-in-law got married, and Philippe'S home will be our go to from now on. Everything about the place made us feel like we had found a rare gem.  From the high end finishes in the kitchen and bathroom, to the linens and towels, and the yummy muffins and other thoughtful touches.  Philippe had a quick response to any question or need we had and truly made us feel welcome in his home.
A hidden gem in the AirBnB landscape! I’ll be back soon

name: Beautiful Room in the City Centre!
space: Hello everyone!  Very rare opportunity, in beautiful old style apartment (70 sq mt plus balcony, high ceilings) 5 minutes by walking to Asmalı Mescit / Tunnel, Tepebasi area , two nice furnished rooms, one extra storage room/cellar, clean bathroom, separate kitchen, collective heating.  There are two rooms (each room has own double bed and a table, chairs etc..) and a cellar room includes one sofa and a washing machine which can be used as a storage space.  The flat has a great balcony (not that big) with a great view of Golden Horn that you can have open air breakfasts and a perfect place to get some booze as well.  It is very convenient, reliable and safe place and it's in the safe neighborhood. Also literally 5 minutes to Istiklal street / Taksim / Beyoglu, right across from the Pera Hotel. You'll be living in the room with a balcony! Hope you'll enjoy being in Istanbul! Jan
description: Hello everyone!  Very rare opportunity, in beautiful old style apartment (70 sq mt plus balcony, high ceilings) 5 minutes by walking to Asmalı Mescit / Tunnel, Tepebasi area , two nice furnished rooms, one extra storage room/cellar, clean bathroom, separate kitchen, collective heating.  There are two rooms (each room has own double bed and a table, chairs etc..) and a cellar room includes one sofa and a washing machine which can be used as a storage space.  The flat has a great balcony (not that big) with a great view of Golden Horn that you can have open air breakfasts and a perfect place to get some booze as well.  It is very convenient, reliable and safe place and it's in the safe neighborhood. Also literally 5 minutes to Istiklal street / Taksim / Beyoglu, right across from the Pera Hotel. You'll be living in the room with a balcony! Hope you'll enjoy being in Istanbul! Jan
house_rules: For the guests arriving between 23:00 and 06:30am, 20 euro will be required for night and late/early check-in. Please take off your shoes and please feel like at home!

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a grad student, reading and writing mostly.

reviews.comments: Staying with Jan was a great experience. She helped out finding restaurants, shops, sights etc. She even fixed me a new place to live together with one of her friends when I wanted to stay longer than planed. The appartment is located on the other side of Tarlabasi Blv close to the stadium and only five minutes from Istiklal, the main street in Beyoglu. It has windows and lots of light and air from both sides, and a small terrace with a beautiful view up the Golden Horn. For those sensetive to noice, there is a minaret not far from the house, but then again, you're in Istanbul! There are two rooms, both furnished as bedroms, a small separat kitchen, a bathroom and a flexible room with no windows. I would definitely recommend staying at Jans, and its great value for the money.

I stayed with my boyfriend for one week in Istanbul at Jan´s flat. It´s a place I highly recommend to everybody who likes to discover the heart of Istanbul. With its two rooms it´s was more than enough space for us and we loved to have breakfast on the balcony with its beautiful view including the Golden Horn. And Jan is a very friendly host, we could contact her any time to ask her something or to get insider tips (restaurants etc..).

I had an excellent stay at Sinejan's flat! It is nice and clean, and it has everything you need. I didn't spend much time with Jan, as I was off sightseeing most of the time, but she was always available if I needed anything. Jan is very helpful and hospitable. Now I have a real friend in Istanbul! Highly recommend!
And by the way Jan is one of the most beautiful girl I saw in Istanbul!

The flat is in nice, silent area 10 min walk from main pedestrian street. On the corner it has convenience store open till 23 or later with very friendly owner and we felt very safe every time we returned home late. 
The flat was artistic and gave an inspiration for all the stay. The unique thing is - balcony with wonderful view over city and Golden Horn. Just keep in mind - you will have a minaret just 20 meters from the balcony - so a nice cultural experience 5 times a day. :) But we more enjoyed it, then felt disturbed.

The hostess Jan - was very nice and caring. Thank You a lot. :) 
Definitely a place where to return for inspiration.

Jan's place is very, very central to everywhere we needed to be in Istanbul. We were able to walk to all the major tourist sights, as well as tons of great restaurants, bars, etc. There's plenty of space in the flat, and Jan was generous with recommendations for both restaurants and galleries (which were also very close for any art people looking at this listing). Call to prayer is louder in the back room, so if you want to get some sleep, set up shop in the front room!

We had a very nice stay in Istanbul! The flat is very well located, in walking distance to most of the important sites. The flat itself is also really nice and equipped with everything you might need. The balcony is great! Finally, Sinejan was a very nice host!

A nice and cozy flat with an awesome view over the Golden Horn. Close to public transport and the very busy Istiklal street, nonetheless the flat is very quiet (obviously apart from the Muezzin from the nearby Mosque, but he's fortunately quite brief).
Sinejan was a great host and helped with some necessary phone calls due to missing luggage. We can recommend the flat (and her) wholeheartedly.

name: Wburg 1 bedroom - Spacious & Sunny
summary: 450 square foot 1 bedroom apartment located in Wililamsburg near many great restaurants, cafes, and shops. Close to McCarren Park and McGolrick Park. Apartment has queen sized bed, full-sized couch, and a queen sized air mattress if needed.
space: Stay in a authentic railroad apartment, which is the quintessential architecture of the neighborhood. This is a spacious one bedroom apartment. Very nice furnishings from ABC Carpet and Home and original artwork. Features an eat-in kitchen with bright afternoon and evening light. Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed with an organic mattress. There is also a queen sized air mattress available for a 3rd guest. Feather and down free bedding is available. Fire escape has potted flowers, herbs, and plants. There is no door separating the living room from the bedroom, just the archway.
description: 450 square foot 1 bedroom apartment located in Wililamsburg near many great restaurants, cafes, and shops. Close to McCarren Park and McGolrick Park. Apartment has queen sized bed, full-sized couch, and a queen sized air mattress if needed. Stay in a authentic railroad apartment, which is the quintessential architecture of the neighborhood. This is a spacious one bedroom apartment. Very nice furnishings from ABC Carpet and Home and original artwork. Features an eat-in kitchen with bright afternoon and evening light. Bedroom is spacious with a queen sized bed with an organic mattress. There is also a queen sized air mattress available for a 3rd guest. Feather and down free bedding is available. Fire escape has potted flowers, herbs, and plants. There is no door separating the living room from the bedroom, just the archway. 1 bedroom apartment up 1 flight of stairs. The building only has 3 other apartments and is quiet. I will either meet you with the keys or I have a lockbox on the fron
neighborhood_overview: The area has a neighborhood feel and you can feel the old and new interacting nicely in the neighborhood. There are plenty of restaurants, cafes, bars, and shops to enjoy. Everything you need is within walking distance, including parks and the bustling Bedford Street.  Free and ample street parking.
notes: There is a laundromat a block away called The Laundry on Graham and another 2 blocks away called Bubble Laundromat. There is also FlyCleaners, a laundry service with a downloadable app that will pick up and drop off your laundry anytime you want.
transit: Very easy and free street parking. Very close to BQ Expressway. Bus stop across the street. 6 minute walk to the  L train and 10 minute walk to the G train. 10 minute subway ride to Union Square, Manhattan. Uber, Lyft, and taxis are also easy to get from here. There is a citibike station right in front of the apartment with $10 bike rentals for 24 hours.
access: 1 bedroom apartment up 1 flight of stairs. The building only has 3 other apartments and is quiet.
interaction: I will either meet you with the keys or I have a lockbox on the front gate and you will get the keys from the lockbox.
house_rules: No smoking, no parties, no loud music. Use coasters on wooden furniture - tables, dressers, side tables. If you stay past the agreed upon check out time, you will be charged an additional $25 per hour.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Hello everyone and thank you for checking out my listing! If you have any questions, please feel free to contact me.
I'm a teacher.

reviews.comments: This was my first time using Airbnb and I could not be happier! Franky made us feel very welcome, leaving towels and an air mattress behind for us since we were going to have more people than would have fit on the bed. The place was exactly as listed, a spacious 1-bedroom in Williamsburg. The neighborhood was typical of Brooklyn neighborhoods and offered a variety of bars, eateries, and quick access to the subway. All in all, I wouldn't hesitate to stay with Franky again and was very pleased with the experience!

Franky was good at communication and follow up! Her place is an awesome location and very convenient to go into Manhattan.  Everything was very easy to find in the apartment.  She was a very gracious host and I would recommended anyone staying here.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Franky was very accommodating during my stay and responded immediately to any question I had. The apt is beautiful, convenient and very spacious.  Would highly recommend this space to anyone looking for a place to stay in NY.
The apartment was very clean and well kept. There are restaurants and transportation very close. I would recommend to anyone.

Everything was great!. 
Being a 5-10 minute walk from a subway station, Franky's home served as a great accommodation for our exploration of New York, both as a spacious, comfortable, and clean stay and as a centrally convenient location. Would stay again, and appreciative for Franky's hospitality.  =)

Le quartier est vraiment agréable et calme.  Mais nous avons été déçus par l'appartement qui aurait besoin d'un rafraichissement (pas visible sur les photos) et qui est malheureusement situé au bord de la voie express (bruyant)  
Malgré tout nous avons passé un excellent séjour.

Franky's place is EXCELLENT. Great location, really a lovely 1 bedroom apartment, and perfect communication.

Franky left a perfect note, making sure I knew how the locks worked and ensuring I wouldn't lock myself out, along with a free pass for 2 to the Whitney museum. AWESOME!

The big, comfy bed was perfect after the long nights out in Brooklyn. Being able to walk everywhere was phenomenal, but it was also dangerous. I couldn't say no to any friends due to distance or difficulty of travel! So I was out every single night at a great restaurant or bar or party. Wonderful location (sorry to mention it a million times).

For those of you that are crazy about their clothes being perfectly pressed: Franky does have an iron / ironing board at her place. I was so grateful for that.

WE LOVE FRANKY'S APARTMENT! Gorgeous space, perfect location (in the same building as a delicious pizza joint and a bar; within walking distance to excellent restaurants, shops, etc). We would stay again in a heartbeat. Franky left us a welcome note and passes to a close-by museum. She was a wonderful host with great communication and I would absolutely recommend staying at her place if you're looking for a space in Williamsburg.

Franky's home was very clean, tidy, efficient and cozy! The location is a brief walk to the subway, and close to several good bars and restaurants. I would recommend her space to anyone looking to hunker down in Williamsburg for a visit.
This was my second time reserving and staying in Franky's space, and it was as clean, efficient and welcoming as my first stay. It is great to have a reliable spot to stay during my trips to NYC!

First let me say I am an Airbnb super host (as they call us) in Brooklyn and due to booking guests and needing to be in town I had to find a place nearby. Back to Franky. I am very familiar with what makes a good host and Franky was a great host. The apartment was fantastic and suited my needs perfectly. It is super super clean and it is decorated very nicely.   While parking didn't come with it there is parking always available right under the expressway across the street.  There is a great little bar in the base of the building where they serve lovely cocktails and no need to worry about any noise coming from there either. Only noise I could hear was typical of a city. Cars etc. but that wasn't bad either. And lastly the bed was incredibly comfortable so I was fast asleep at night and didn't hear a thing. I highly recommend Franky's place.
It was a wonderful home away from home with all of the amenities of home. Franky is extremely communicative and helpful. A perfect place to stay for a weekend or an extended stay!

This was a perfect place for our stay in NY.  I loved that it was in a smaller area but just a short 10 min subway ride to Union Square. The best of both worlds!  The place is very clean and uncluttered and I loved the bohemian decor.  Super comfortable bed and pillows, perfect end to a busy day!

It is right by a busy intersection so you do get traffic noise, however, it was not much more than my stay at the Renaissance hotel in midtown. I think that's just the norm for that area and it did not interrupt my sleep one bit. 

About the area: Beaner Bar OMG!! It's a short walk just south of the apartment and the Mexican Hot Chocolate or Mocha is just bliss! About a 5-7 minute walk you can enjoy Lella Alimentari an Italian Cafe that really sets the ambiance and you feel like you are in Italy! I just loved that these gems are so close to Franky's apartment and there are so many more to discover. 

If I find myself vacationing in NYC again, I will be looking Franky up again.

Excellent value for money away from the hustle and bustle of manhattan, but still only a short ride on the subway (stop at top of street) to explore all the sites.

Franky was a lovely host, with excellent communication throughout my dealings. I would recommend this place no problem whatsoever.

Franky's place is accommodating and comfortable. She was quick to respond to any of my questions. The apartment is about a 15 minute walk to Bedford shops and restaurants. A bit of traffic noise from the near by overpass. Overall, really enjoyed the stay.

Franky was quick to respond to my requests and very accommodating. The place was very clean, and large for a New York apartment. It's an 8 minute walk to the L train and 5 minutes on the train to Manhattan. There's lot of restaurants, cafes, bars, and shops on the street, but it's still quiet in the apartment. It's also close to the shops on Bedford St. I really loved my stay and will book this apartment again on my next visit to NYC.
Great place, clean and cozy.  Thank you.
Lovely apartment, great hospitality and a good location in Brooklyn.
Such a darling and stylish place.  She has really cute taste in decor and loved all her house plants ! It was very clean and easy walking distance to shops and subway!

My wife and I stayed at this apartment for a full month. We really enjoyed our stay and being able to thoroughly explore Williamsburg and Greenpoint. Very close to a lot of great restaurants and bars. Would recommend!

Great place 
Excellent location
Simple effective comuincations. 

Would do again.
Franky's place was great for a quick weekend trip.
Lovely place! Amazing location x
Loved staying in Williamsburg - loads of fantastic places to eat and drink and this is a really comfortable flat.
Franky was a great host! The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Great value. Would stay again!

Thoroughly enjoyed our 6 night stay at Franky’s apartment. The location is perfect for exploring everything Williamsburg has to offer (great shops, restaurants & bars), and a short walk to the L train gets you into the city fast. The apartment is bright, clean, uncluttered and tastefully decorated. Loved the plants, art & books. The bed is super comfy, AC works well, water pressure good...all the things that make for a comfortable stay. Communication was prompt and clear, check-in a breeze. We especially appreciated the fact that Franky was able to accommodate our request for an early check-in due to our early arriving flight. Would recommend Franky’s place without reservation and would definitely stay here again!

Franky, not only supplied a bevy of amenities, but also had thoughtful touches like earplugs in the nightstand to drown out sound from the bustling world outside.  Franky was also lightning quick to respond to a question I had at 1am.  That’s hospitality!

Brooklyng is a very nice place to stay and live so too. 
Bed was good, we slept very well.
The but here is the noise. Flat is next to the way, and the window was not well closed due to an old conditioning air "installed" that let the noise come in. And of course, NY is noise. I recommend you to bring a good ear taps. 
Everything else was good. 
We didn't use the kitchen, so I can't evaluate that. 
Overall, good enough.

The flat is o.k, located in an old building near the highway (quite noisy).. the communication with the host was unpleasant- didn’t replay on time to my massages, and in general was not kind and helpful like other host of houses I have been..

Our stay at Franky’s was perfect! It had everything we needed and was in a great area with lots of food and easy access to the subway. We had a really nice time and are thankful we had Franky’s apartment to return to each night. Thanks!

name: Cozy&Church Terrace Room in Beyoglu
summary: Our building is only 300metres from Taksim Square, and a 1-minute walk from Istiklal Avenue. It offers stylishly decorated accommodation with a kitchenette and a satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the premises.
space: Just 400mto the Taksim Square, our building is 40m away from the lively Istiklal Avenue. It features self-catering accommodations with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.
description: Our building is only 300metres from Taksim Square, and a 1-minute walk from Istiklal Avenue. It offers stylishly decorated accommodation with a kitchenette and a satellite TV. Free Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the premises. Just 400mto the Taksim Square, our building is 40m away from the lively Istiklal Avenue. It features self-catering accommodations with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There is a kitchen, bathroom in our room. In addition, there is a TV, free wi-fi, air-conditioner, towel and shampoo the room. You can enjoy cooking in your room if you want, and have a rest after a fresh shower. We have a nearby office which is open 24/7. Taksim is a main transportation hub and a popular destination for both tourists and the native population of Istanbul. İstiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), a long pedestrian shopping street, ends at this square, and a nostalgic tram runs from the square along the avenue, ending near the Tünel (1875) which is the world's second
neighborhood_overview: Taksim is a main transportation hub and a popular destination for both tourists and the native population of Istanbul. İstiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), a long pedestrian shopping street, ends at this square, and a nostalgic tram runs from the square along the avenue, ending near the Tünel (1875) which is the world's second-oldest subway line after London's Underground (1863). Surrounding Taksim Square are numerous travel agencies, hotels, restaurants, pubs, and international fast food chains.
transit: Taksim Metro Station provides easy access to many sites of the city such as shopping malls and the historic Sultanahmet area. The iconic Galata Tower is a 20-minute walk away. Ataturk Airport is within 12 miles of the property. Airport shuttle service can be provided at a charge.
access: There is a kitchen, bathroom in our room. In addition, there is a TV, free wi-fi, air-conditioner, towel and shampoo the room. You can enjoy cooking in your room if you want, and have a rest after a fresh shower.
interaction: We have a nearby office which is open 24/7.
house_rules: Our rooms are non-smoking rooms. And the pets are unfortunately not allowed.=(

host.host_about:
Hello;
Our first interest is welcoming you here and show you the fusion of historical and modern patterns of this inspiring city.

Our keywords are : Communication, hospitality, being professional in hygiene, exclusivity in reasonable budgets, travel like a local, big smile and reflecting the energy of our team.

Our hobbies are : Offering you a coffee and give you the best directions to travel practically,giving very unique city tips, organizing events (Hiking tours, city tours, meals, extreme actions, shopping events, boat trips) and providing unlimited request which as much as we can make real.

Of course making our guest happy will be the best reason for us to have a BIG smile!

We provide cheap tours also, you can see our offers here.

reviews.comments: Great fun ! great place ! Amazing view and nice welcome...

After booking, I received a messaging saying that this room was actually booked for the weekend and offering me a different room. I ultimately accepted, but the room received was much smaller (no sitting room or terrace, nor was it on the rooftop). However, I still paid the rate listed for this room (minus a small cash refund received upon arrival). 

That being said, the room I did receive was rather nice with a small balcony overlooking the street (minus the mildewy smell in the bathroom). Plus, the location is fantastic, just off Istiklal and a short walk to the tram with goes to most of the major sights.
Yes he was really nice and welcoming and helpful. The room was clean and location is supper strategic.

Evrim  Bey tarafından çok sıcak bir şeklide karşılandım. Rahat ve temiz bir ortamda beklentilerimin karşılandığı bir konaklama oldu. Konum itibarıyle çok avantajlı bir yerdeydi.Evrim  arkadaşım rahat konaklamam için elinden gelen her şeyi yaptı. İnternette yazılan her şey doğruydu.Tekrar seyahatlerimde konaklama için yer aramama gerek kalmadı.Teşekkür ederim.
It was a great place with a lovely terrace with view and daily cleaning services. They were very helpful and prompt with our each and every need. Will definitely stay again!
Great place, friendly host and roughly 50 cafe's in walking distance (I love coffee!). Highly recommended!
Everything was just perfect. Stayed in this place for the second time and I am coming back for sure!!!
Great place  !! Evrim is very welcoming and the flat is cosy, well located and with a great view !
Kendinizi rahat ve güvende hissedebileceğiniz,çok merkezi olmasına rağmen gürültüden etkilenmeyen şirin bir ev.Tavsiye ederim.

Location is great and the service given by Evrim and Ilhaam is fantastic. 24/7 availability which is just fantastic. Always willing to help.

The apartment is on the 5th floor so some stairs to climb,  but if you're fit, you'll be able to do it.

It is also great being so close to Isitklal street where everything happens.

Only negative is that the bathroom could be maintained better. There's a constant sewerage smell coming from the drains which isn't pleasant.
Lokasyonu çok iyi. Merkezi yerde olmasına rağmen sakin ve sessiz. Temiz. Herşey istediğimiz gibiydi, tekrar konaklamak isteriz, çok memnun kaldık.
The location was great. Evrim was very helpfull and he helped us to make a beautiful place for our friends wedding night. :) thank you Evrim!
Nice host, beautiful location and amazing view... needs a bit more cleaning though :)
Konumu çok iyi. Sadece bir gece uyumak için kullandım çok detaylı birşey yazamayacağım. Tek sorun tuvaletten gelen koku

Nice location , great balcony and view. 
The room was like similar to pictures.
The pipes had a very very strong smell and the water was not running properly. The front desk is helpful for advises on where to go around this nice area. 5 stairs to climb are not for everyone.
Fotoğraflardaki gibi değil. Ciddi ötesi bir tadilata ihtiyacı var. Yazık olur paranıza. Ancak evrim bey ve diğer çalışanlar o kadar iyiler ki size bu durumu unutturuor

Great service and quick response from Evrim.  1 min walk from Istiklal street. If you are looking for something in the hub of that area, this is a great option to stay at. Close but the hotel was in a quite street
Это номер в прекрасно расположенном отеле на улице Истикляль, несколько минут до Галатском башни. Сам номер выполнен в стиле лофт, потрясающий интерьер
The location is really perfect and the rooftop so nice. The room is spacious and people at the reception very helpful. I recommand!

Lokasyon, teras ve manzarası gerçekten güzel, ayrıca kilise ve ışıklandırması güzel bir ambiyans oluşturuyor. Çevreden çokta rahatsız etmeyen bir müzik sesi duyuluyor. 

Yaşadığımız tek sorun çarşaf ve yastıkların çok pis görünmesiydi. Yıkanmışlar ama heryerlerinde siyah ve sarı lekeler vardı. Ve bir kaç kıl vardı.  Havlular da aynı şekilde bir sürü siyah ve sarı  leke ve ayrıca pas lekesi vardı. Değiştirmelerini istedik ancak yeni getirdiklerinin onlardan bir farkı yoktu. Kısacası nevresimlerini ve havlularını değiştirmeleri gerekiyor. Belliki artık çok eskimişler. Bir de terastaki bank ve masa çok eskimiş, güneşten ve yağmurdan yıpranmış, her an kırılacakmış gibi. Açıkçası biz korkarak oturduk. Bunlar dışında Evrim beyi hiç göremedik ama en azından telefonla ilgilendi.

Great location! A minute walk to Isliklal street and on the way there is great Shisha place right on the steps. We stayed in a terrace room on the 5th floor and it was great too, terrace is huge and has a decent view. Stuff on reception are super responsive, they were really helpful to answer every question we've got whether it's about the room service or nearest attractions. They spoke great english and even russian)
Overall it is great place to stay in Istanbul, the best we've stayed in for sure.
nice
Perfect location, calm and a beautiful view !
Well located apartment conform to the picture!

Great location and price, helped us with our luggage. However beware of 5 floors of stairs to climb if you are not in good physical condition or travel with kids. Sewage smell from the bathroom needs to be fixed, kitchenette should have a few more essentials and place would be five stars.

Konum ve manzara çok güzeldi. Her şey fotograflardaki gibi. Ev sahibiyle iletisimi kolay sagladik. Ev yeterince temiz degildi. Banyo ve tuvalet rutubet kokuyordu. Internette baglanti sorunu vardi interneti kullanamadik.
Excellent location but could be cleaner. We needed to ask them to put on the heating as it was very cold at night and the plug sockets stopped working another time.

İstiklal Caddesi (Independence Avenue), a long pedestrian shopping street, ends at this square, and a nostalgic tram runs from the square along the avenue, ending near the Tünel (1875) which is the world's second-oldest subway line after London's Underground (1863). They can reach to ferries in Kabataş, Karaköy and Eminönü easily and they also can take bus from Taksim Square to almost anywhere they want to go. It's very easy to go most of the places on foot as our suite is located in the center of the city, and it's possible to take any kind of public transportation.
