reviews.comments: Warmly recemmended, every thing perfect and Evrim had his friend are a very goid host...

The room was very clean and comfortable. View of the terrace was amazing that we didn't want to go out even the location was great as it is very close to Istiklal Street. Evrim is also really helpful and kind. I recommend this place to all!

We would be regretting if we had cancelled our trip do to recent suicide attacks in Turkey. The atmosphere was as good as we expected. Peaceful city and helpful people. That's why I love Istanbul more than anywhere else in the world. The hospitality, care, respect, food, sightseeing, transportation... all excellent. All went well. Electricity, hot/cold water, everything is as advertised. We have been given the keys and nobody disturbed us during our stay. The home had all necessities, including cutlery, dishes, bed sheets, toiletries etc.The place is around 2-3 minutes walking distance to "şişhane" Metro Station and around 3-5 minutes walking istiklal street..I would recommend it to everyone ...Thank you very much evrim

Oncelikle Evrim ev sahibi olarak cok sicakkanli ve icten birisi , Yer olarak cok merkezi bi yerde olmasi disinda metrodan sonra 3-5 dakika da ulasabiliyorsunuz . Balkonundan St.Antuan kilisesi gozukmekte ve hos bi hava veriyor . Yeme , icme eglence olarak zaten heryere yuruyus ile cok yakin bir mesafede  .
Oda da ocaktan ,mikrodalga firindan utu masasina ciftkisilik yataginakadar hersey mevcut ,Ayrica oda temizligi , buyuklugu ,dekorasyonu hersey resimlerde gozuktugu gibiyken fiyati bu beklentilere karsilik  uygun kaliyor 
kisa-uzun sureli konaklama arayan  herkese oneririm
Evrim is lovely and the room was perfect for us. The location could not be more central. We had a great experience in Istanbul. I highly recommend it.

We really enjoyed staying at this very beautiful place! Evrim was very helpful and made everything to make us feel comfortable. We arrived in the middle of the night and he was waiting for us to open the doors. The apartment has everything you need and even provides towels, shampoo, shower gel, house shoes, fully equipped kitchen,…and the location is amazing. Very central, but still far enough from the huge tourist crowd. It's a very nice part of istanbul, full with very sweet cafes and shops! I would definitely stay here again when I come back to Istanbul. In fact, my boyfriend is coming back to Istanbul and going to stay there another couple of days!
Our apartment was perfect! nothing fancy but has everything you need and in a great location with a 24/7 reception. I would highly recommend and would definitely stay there again.

Evrim and staff were welcoming and helpful.  My room was upgraded to a lovely suite, which was a nice surprise.  The room was clean, although not quite as modern as te photos suggest.  It is centrally located and, as someone who likes to explore by foot, I was able to walk to all major sites.  If you are able to climb stairs, this may not be the place for you.  I would recommend Cirus Suites.  A wondeful place to rest after a lon few months of travel.

A mon arrivée, j'ai trouvé Ilham qui est tout simplement merveilleux!!!
je n'ai rencontré Evrim que durant mes derniers jours mais il a fait preuve d'une bonne hospitalité, un accueil chaleureux assistance aussi en cas de besoin il n’hésite pas à faire le nécessaire

A noter que la description de la chambre et de l'emplacement .... correspond exactement à la réalité
Voyage à refaire, la ville est splendide

I have to say I absolutely liked this place. It's situated in the heart of Istanbul: 1 minute to Istiklal, 10 minutes to Galata bridge. There are a lot of cafes, restaurants, mini markets nearby. In my case it was an urgent booking request (3 days before the visit, so, Evrim, çok teşekkür ederim for approval). The man at reception, Ilham, was one of the most attentive, caring and hospitable man I've ever seen. It's absolutely the best value for money. Evrim, Ilham, Istanbul - I want to thank you all a lot for this chance to be there!

Hemos pasado un fin de semana estupendo en Estambul. 
Nuestra estancia ha sido agradable si bien, por las fotos, imaginaba que el lugar era de mayor calidad. 
Tuvimos problemas con el agua del baño y ruidos la primera noche pero enseguida nos ofrecieron otra habitación mejor y más grande. 
La zona donde está situado el alojamiento está genial. La calidad del mobiliario deja mucho que desear pero se suple con la amabilidad del anfitrión que se desvivió por hacernos sentir como en casa y nos ayudó en todo lo que le pedimos.

The place was nearby to restaurant, metro station and shops. We had a pleasant stay but our room was on the 3rd floor without a lift. Since we were traveling with a baby, it would be more helpful to have an elevator or lift. But after all, I like the room.
Very cozy and clean place, the host is nice and speaks good English, he helped us a lot on the travel guides.
Very nice pleace i will come back

Nice apart-hotel in a practical location right between Galata and Taksim. TomTom area has cute cafes and artsy hangouts as well as laundry and other convenient services/stores. In my 4 days of roaming the city I compared prices and found that if indeed you do have use for the kitchenette 30 bucks is a reasonable price for the room. WIFI was good and reliable, staff very helpful.
We enjoyed staying at this beautiful place.. The location is great, very central. Evrim and his friend were very helpful.. Hightly recommend it! Thank you))

Advantages: Great location, right next to the main commercial street. Surprisingly quiet at night. Reception desk open 24/7 with nice and helpful people, ready to answer all your questions. Disadvantages: not thoroughly cleaned and very little equipment in the kitchen (for example one knife and only 2 glasses and no coffee cups - don't count on cooking there but enough to have a breakfast). I'd still recommend it for the easy access and reasonable price!
Great location, 24 hour door service, free laundry, and the room has a fridge and comfy pillows.

I really did enjoy my stay especially I was able to park the car indoor and the place was perfect with a stunning view of the river. highly recommend it to any future guests. I met Zed and his gf last few minutes before we checked out as they were away during the new year and they seems really friendly and nice even with just talking with them for a short time.

I highly recommend Zed place, location is amazing, just 15 away from the city, the complex is plenty of green areas and water view from the balcony.  We love the flat.
Even tha t Zed were not around as He was in Europe, we got response very fast, He helped us with the late checking and also, very kind, He allowed us to stay one night more for free.
I would love to find a place like Zed flat for my next Airbnb stay.
Wonderful hosts, very warm and friendly. Absolute recommendation.

summary: Clean, bright, cozy and well furnished studio situated in the heart of Tsim Sha Tsui that away from noise. 24/7 supermarket, airport express shuttle bus, cafe and plenty of eateries just right downstairs. Great value and location suitable for solo or couple, travel or for business; amenities making your travel experience smooth and convenient. I'm sure you would love it!

notes: Shopping:  --- Harbour city, Miramall, IFC, Landmark (international shopping malls for branded stuffs) ----Ladies market, Temple Street, Mongkok Tung Choi Street, Gold Fish market,  Fa Yuen street market (True HK experiences, very local district) Drinks and entertainment: ---Lan Kwai Fong for night out or bar hopping ---Knutford Terrace (restaurants with terrace) just behind out building ---Mongkok street food ---Sevva (rooftop bar with excellent HK views) closes on Sunday ---Aqua (restaurant/ bar in front of Victoria harbour) Local life/ culture: ---as above ---Wong Tai Sin temple ---Central district (Financial district where many bank headquaters and 5* hotels located ---Cheung Chau Island ---Sai Kung for beautiful hikes and seafood ---Tai O (Old HK fishing port) Interesting places: ---The Peak (overlooking HK from the top) ---O Zone bar in Ritz Carlton hotel (the highest bar in the world) ---Ritz Carlton lounge situated on 103/F ---1881 Hotel (waling distance from apartment) ---Lamm
transit: 1) Taxi Estimate HKD$250 takes 30 - 40 Minutes (Recommend if you are more than 1 person and have heavy luggages)  * You may give the below address in Chinese to the Taxi driver to get to the meeting spot. Chinese: 尖沙咀金巴利道51號金興大廈 English: Kim Hing Mansion, 51 Kimberley road, Tsim Sha Tsui 2) A21 Bus / N21 overnight bus Adult: HKD$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) /Child: HKD$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Estimate: 70 minutes  Get off at "Kimberley road" station. There is a screen with a voice on the bus to indicate where to get off.  3) Airport Express     Adult: HKD$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) / Child: HKD$ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Estimate: 22 minutes + free shuttle bus *Airport --> Kowloon station --> free shuttle bus K4 (there's sign to guide you once exit the train) --> The Luxe Manor Hotel (the apartment is steps away from the bus stop) Please (Hidden by Airbnb) / SMS/ call me at + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Also, please call if you have any delays! Many thanks!
access: The entire room with private bathroom and kitchen.

host.host_about:
Hello there, I'm Carolina who has a passion for travelling, culinary, yoga, exploring different cultures. And I love meeting people from all around the world, sharing different experiences, cannot wait to host you and hear your story!

Please feel free to drop me a message if you need any help, I'll get back to you as soon as I can :)

reviews.comments:
Carolina was a great host - I was an hour late (arrived at 8pm instead of 7pm) to getting the keys off her but she waited patiently and took the time to explain everything before going to an wedding dinner. The AirBnB was in the middle of everywhere - ~5 min walk to TST MTR and <5 min walk to Knutsford terrace. 

Thank you for the stay Carolina
Great host, very friendly and accomodating. Apartment is very modern and stylish. Location is perfect, so central to everything you need.
Nice spot in Kowloon

Carolina was a very nice host, the room was clean and well equipped!
and very well connected
The host canceled this reservation 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
房間與圖片基本一致,房間面積比較小,不太通風,所以屋內有點悶悶的,但是設施還算齊全,有小廚房｡
Carolina was an attentive host, willing to provide help or suggestions when needed. i am quite familiar with Hong Kong so I did not communicate with her much. Overall a good host.

Carolina was quick to respond to my request and I made the reservation one week before arrival. 

It was possible to arrange for me to get access to the apartment a little bit before actual check-in. I met Carolina outside the apartment on the street according to what we agreed upon the day before my arrival.

The studio is as pictured and described, small but has what is needed. If anything to be said, you can clearly hear your neighbours. I did not find it as big of a problem, but you can more or less hear the neighbour speak which was kind of new to me. 

I had some problem with the Internet connection, Carolina was very accomodating to solve the problem which was sorted out fairly quick by her dealing with the internet provider.

For me it was at a good location, a 5 minute walk to the MTR, where I can easily get to other locations I wanted to visit. 

For me, this was a perfect match, it was as expected and since living in HK is compact, I also had to live compact. 

If I revisit HK I wouldn't doubt to get in contact with Carolina again or to stay in the same area / resident.

We booked Carolina's apartment for 11 nights. 
She was very unprofessional. She was being very late to meet us. When she finally arrived she informed us that the booked apartment is not available offering us a replacement, but we have to additionally wait until it was cleaned. 

When we finally checked in we saw that the sheets were very dirty with stains all over and the toilet flusher did not work.
Even then the only complaint we had was about disgustingly dirty sheets and she refused to replace them, instead convincing us that they are clean enough. We spent a night on our towels and left the apartment first thing next morning.

We had to involve Airbnb for refund since she was not willing to cooperate.
我住了一個月 房間雖然小但很乾淨 裡面什麼都有 除了洗衣服比較麻煩對於我長住來說 樓下有24小時惠康 去地鐵站5mins路程 到哪裡都方便 房東很nice 下很大雨也接我 以後到香港還會選擇這裡

Great host - very easy to communicate with & very friendly. Brilliant location - close to everything, plenty of eateries and shopping spots, 3 mins walking to MTR station, the flat itself is very clean, tidy, well-equipped and modern! We had a great time staying at Carolina's place and will definitely come back again! Thank you very much!
Great location is perfect, I just the apartment space is a bit small.
Just sleep is ok. Place is very good. Cost also good.
had a pleasant stay, clean n cozy place, well locationed, convenient access to bars and restaurant food or your choice. recommended..

Did not make us feel welcome because she was late and she never responded to.our texts and even asked us to get a local sim (bad timing since we were alr outside the building and very tired from travelling all day) so she could text or call whc means she didnt call or text bec the cost prohibited her. She could have been a good host if only she were not so thrifty with her telcom.expenses. or she could have said in the ad or to me privately that i need to get a local simcard . Not like that pls. Waited outside the building with our luggages for close to an hour. We were with our little 9 yr old daughter and she was getting tired and cranky so we called up carolina and even her host but she said she needed to call her cleaning lady to know where she was and that she will.call us back but asked if i had a local sim of messaging via airbnb... but i t0ld her i didnt have mobile data since we just arrived and she advised me to get a sim card from 7/11 . I said cant you return my call on my cellphone or text me because we are laden with luggage and a cranky kid due to travelling sjnce 3 am. She never called back and i had to call her again. Just felt bad because she was late and yet she did not want to spend anything, not even a penny for a call or text (:p), to make it better for her waiting guests or offer any apology. Place is good but the waiting and stress and inconsiderateness of the host is a turn off. 
Also the neighbors' kid cries 24/7 and you can hear their voices thru the wall especially when you are on the bed. 
Location and design are great but the host really ruined it all.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Had a hard time checking into the room. Ended up waiting to get into the room for 2 hrs only to be told it is not even ready and that I had to wait another 1-2 hrs for the room to be cleaned. I initially wanted to check in at 3pm which is past the designated time to begin with, I would have assumed that the room was at least cleaned. When I finally got into the room, it was as described but there was no wifi. The host arranged for the provider to fix the issue but I was left without wifi for 4 days out of the 6 I was staying. I think if you just need a room to sleep in then this would be fine but I don't think I will be staying again after my horrible experience.

This accommodation is functional rather than luxury, but, in my opinion, in the context of Hong Kong, offers great value. The flat contains everything that you might need, and, the bed is really comfortable. I loved the location as it really suited my purposes. I know Hong Kong very well but even a first time visitor will appreciate how close it is to everything. I would thoroughly recommend this flat to anyone with the proviso that it probably would suit a single traveler a little better than a couple.
이 숙소의 최대장점은 위치가 좋다는 것입니다. 근처에 편의점과 아침식사를 하기좋은 식당이 많고  너츠포드 테라스가 바로 옆에 있어 밤에 즐기기에도 좋습니다. 호스트도 친절합니다.

非常好,地理位置优越,房东人很nice,干净

Carolina’s place is a great value option for anyone that is looking for a spotlessly clean, quiet and convenient place in a well-connected location. I live in Hong Kong myself and booked the apartment as I had members of my family visiting. I found the size and condition to be better than other apartments or rooms nearby. My relatives were very happy overall and appreciated the many restaurant options in the area.
Will never stay at place like this terrible host never expected such things
It's a very good location, the place is cosy, the building not so much. Considerably short distance to metro and a few main atttactions in Kowloon. I can recommend that place.

Good location and convenient and many shopping malls, restaurant, bars and MTR.
Carolina is a good host she willing to help and fast reply to you whenever you need to look for her. 
I will be back again for my next trip. 
Thank you very much, Carolina.

Really a super host. Each and every house utilities readily available and host was very helpful and very quick to communicate and revert.
The home is at very good location.
good place for single or couple

5* Best Airbnb stay ever, exceeded our expectation in Hong Kong! Carolina is a fantastic host, very accommodating and her responses are always prompt and helpful (replies within mins). The location is tremendous - surrounded by plenty of eateries (low to higher end), short walk to Victoria Harbour for the amazing view, airport express shuttle bus, 24 hours supermarkets, shopping malls and laundries literally just downstairs, 5 mins walk to TST MTR Station, also short walk to TST East and Jordan stations, also the new West Kowloon Station for high speed trains to China, walkable to the Macau ferry terminal if you fancy taking a day trip there like we did. Most importantly the apartment is super clean, very cozy, feels just like home and you can see how she cares for her guests by the attention to details - very well equipped for a long stay, flat is relatively spacious in HK standards. The Wifi connection is reliable & fast. Lastly, she is very helpful, kind and enthusiastic, check-in was a breeze. Overall, every aspect of my stay was positive and I would definitely recommend her place to anyone! Thank you for the awesome experience!

name: Room near a Lovely Beach & Airport
space: Monterey Welcomes You The Area Located near Botany Bay, the area where Captain Cook initially landed when exploring Australia, Monterey neighbours Brighton Le-Sands providing ample dining and entertainment options.  There is a beach that stretches for kilometres on end, a perfect destination to relax on the weekends or after work. With a plethora of restaurants to choose from, you will never be bored from the variety of cuisine available. The Room  A delightful room awaits you which features:  a Queen size bed in a private room  Desk  Access to unlimited Wi-Fi Internet  Kitchen  Living room  Balcony with BBQ facilities provided  Private laundry Public Transport Situated close to a bus stop, whether you're heading to the CBD or  local train stations, Kogarah and Carlton, there are plenty of options to take when planning to visit the city or suburban Sydney.  The train trip to the CBD takes around 25 minutes while a bus ride usually takes 45. Please feel free to get in touch if you have

host.host_about: I am very easy going person, flexible who likes to socialize, travel and meet people from all around the world.

reviews.comments: The appartment is very nice, 2nd floor, 200 mt from the beach... Harnan is a very nice personat the disposal for any information that you need during my dungeon at home. I was like at home and never fails nothing. Muy buena onda :)

Hernan is a gracious host, pleasant and friendly in the short contact that we had. I arrived very late and he was amenable to receiving me though he had an early start the following morning. 
 I was attending a conference at the Novotel and it was close enough to have a pleasant walk along the beachfront and enjoy the ambience of cafes from several different "countries" such as Greece, Italy, Asia, an eclectic mix. 
Lovely area on the weekend with a festive spirit.
I enjoyed the many touches of RED in the unit and the luxurious growth of indoor plants. 
It is like home from  home, a nice feel of the neighbourhood.

The apartment is really lovely and clean and even close to the beach!
Hernan is a very nice, friendly and open-minded guy -and now a good friend :D 

Had a nice time with him: We did some barbecue and went to down town, etc -I'm very happy that I chose to stay at his place and that I met him!

May good times continue, THANKS Hernan
Hernan and his grilfriend are lovely couple. It was pleasure staying with them.  Thanks guys.

Hernan and Connie were wonderful and friendly hosts. Their appartment has a great vibe and is a short walk from the Bay Street shops and restaurants. Their place was an ideal place for me while I was attending a conference at the Brighton le sands Novotel.. Thanks again!

It has been a pleasant stay with Hernan and Connie. Lovely and friendly couple with great hospitality. Their place is really close to the beach with plenty of eateries nearby within walkable distance. With convenient public bus access to the metro station. A quiet area which is good for travelers who are looking for some peace.
Very nice neat clean accommodation. Host is a lovely person.

Absolutely lovely stay in the small cosy apartment. Walkable distance to the bus stops and beach nearby. The apartment itself was clean and tidy, and Hernan + his girlfriend was a polite host. Highly recommended. Cheers. :)
Great apartment with wonderful host. There is a beautiful beach  just 3 mins walk. The room has got everything you need,  Highly recommend.

Quiet and well furnished room, really close to the beach.
Since I arrived late and left early I didn't get to meet Hernan but he left me the keys in the mailbox and everything worked out perfectly.

Hernan and Connie are a very nice couple. We had a very good time at their apartment. They are generous, relax andd very sympathetic. The expression " mi casa es su casa" comes alive! Perfect room. Recommended!
Fantastic room and wonderful persons that are connie and Hernan
Thanks for this first night in Sydney. The Bed is very comfortable and Hernan and Connie are very nice people.
Very nice people, helpful and friendly. Cosy flat. Good shower!
Hernan and Connie were kind, welcoming and accommodating.  It was just what we needed after our long days walking around Sydney.  Getting to see lorikeets on their balcony was an unexpected bonus!
My second stay was as good as the first. Just overnight, but I arrived earlier and was able to catch up with a bit of TV news and then do internet and chat with some good music background.

Had an excellent stay! Hernan and Connie are excellent hosts and very welcoming. They're place is easy to find, get to, and great for the price. Unfortunately I only stayed for one night but I definitely recommend!

i stayed 4 days with hernan and connie both very nice and friendly,room very clean,comfotable big bed,bus Station 5 minutes away.
all in all: perfect

Hernan is a great and lovely host. When we had questions, Hernan and Konny help us, everytime!  For the week, it was like our second home. We missed the time, there. The appartment is in the near of the beach and there is a very good public traffic, to drive in the City.  It is a wonderful place.
And thank you, Konnie, for the last evening ! :)

Sebastian & Janine
Herman was a nice and easy person and his place is very welcoming. Nice and clean, you fill at home from the first moment. I would personally recommend to anyone.

We stayed at Hernan's place for give days and enjoyed every single of them. Such a nice atmosphere with Herman and Connie. They gave us good advices and made an awesome BBQ last night. Hopefully see you again guys.

Nice room and very friendly, helpful hosts.
Close to airport & beach, takes some time
to reach the city. But nearly unbeatable
concerning value for money :)
I found Hernant and Conni to be the ideal hosts- relaxed, attentive when it was required, with a lovely place which was clean and welcoming, but informal!
They are nice host. Room is clean and cosy.
Hi Hernan is the perfect host very polite and thoughtful

Hernan was a very accommodating host. This was my first airbnb experience, so I was a little apprehensive, but I had no trouble at all. The room was exactly as expected. The beach an easy walk. Sunday breakfast at a beachside cafe was very pleasant. 

I'd recommend Hernan's room to anyone without hesitation.

Hernan and Koni are a nice couple that know how to make their guests feel comfortable with their warm and easy going attitude. I felt like staying with friends if I could expend my stay I would stayed with them. Thank you guys
Hernan was a great host!! He told us how to get around the city and recommended good websites to get jobs. Very nice guy, we'd stay again!!

Hernán and Conni are a very good hosts. They gave me very useful valuables hints to go to the city and to take public transport. They loved to drink good wines so bring one and share it, for sure you will have a very talk with them.

Hernan's place is ideally located right by a beautiful beach and a short walk from caffes & restaurants. I was there only a couple of nights, but wish I could have stayed more, lying on the beach and watching planes take off. The hosts are very welcoming and helpful. Will definitely return.
Hernan was a great host. the room was clean and close to the airport. he was helpful and friendly. true to the motto: take it easy.
Unfortunately I did not get to meet my hosts in person. However, communication was effortless and quick, and I had a pleasant stay. Thank you!

The room is clean, close to the airport, and  to the (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a big bed and is just like its description.
Hernan is a great host, helps you with information about the area, and queries you may have about Sydney.
The reservation was canceled 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Hernan was a very friendly and helpful host. Thanks to him and Conny my three night stay was very pleasant. I would fully recommend them!

Hernan's place was clean and comfortable. It's close to the airport which was perfect for our last night in Australia. He is very quick to respond and help with any questions you may have - including my many inquiries about how to take the local pic lib transit. 

Thank you!
I can only join the other positive reviews. The room is lovely and has everything you could ask for. Hernan and Chanique are great hosts, interested and caring. I can definitely recommend this place!
Even I spent few time with Hernan, I had a very pleasant stay. The room is clean and very comfortable. Hernan is a very nice guy and qu definitely recommend him. Thank you Hernan :)

Herman and Conny are super nice! They are helpful all the time and made me feel at home. I didn't plan my trip in Sydney much. They recommended me a lot fun places to visit and I had a blast. I wish I could have more time talking with them. Thank you so much for your wonderful host. I will come back!
Really awesome view and closed to beach. The host is a really friendly and easygoing person. I really liked my time there.

I spent five out of ten days in Sydney staying at Hernan's comfortable apartment at Monterey (which is really within Brighton le Sands).

The Apartment :  Comfortable size for two bedrooms, bathroom, living/dining area, kitchen and balcony.   Hernan is very neat and organised, so that added to the comfort level.

The Bedroom :  Has a queen-sized bed, bedside table, small wardrobe, chest of drawers, writing desk.   More than adequate for a single traveller, though room size may be a little compact for two pax ... but there's always the living room and balcony area to chill in.

Transportation :  Not a problem because I had a car.   Public transport within walking distance.   Even if it is not smack in the city area, I have always encouraged travellers to experience the beautiful suburbs of Sydney.  Time permitting, travelling by bus (as opposed to trains) will allow you to see a lot more.

Surrounds :   Nice restaurants/eateries and a couple of large supermarkets are all within easy walking distance.   I managed to stock up on some groceries and had a few meals at "home".   The lovely beach is just a few minutes' walk away.   I would encourage guests who drive to explore other beaches and nooks to get a good feel of the district.

Thank you, Hernan, for your warm hospitality and being such a gracious and kind host.   I definitely recommend a stay at this apartment.
Hernan is a great guy.  The accommodation was also very good.  I would recommend this accommodation
Herman was a great host, very welcoming, helpful, very friendly and a great location! Thank you.

Hernan is a gem of a person, he is a fabulous host and makes sure you feel comfortable around. He is a good guide and a good friend. The unit is very clean and yes close to two beautiful beaches. I will definitely recommend him ! 
Thanks for the fantastic stay.

I've stayed at Hernan's appartment for 5 nights and I can totally recommend his place. Hernan is an easy-going, friendly host who does everything to make your stay as good as possible. The place is clean and the bed is comfortable, which is pretty important to me. The neighbourhood seems to be safe and everything you need is within walking distance. His appartment is also very close to the airport, that's great for people coming to or leaving Sydney by plane.

Hernan was extremely friendly and welcoming! It was a much-needed rest & recharge to stay at his place. Everything was comfortable, clean, and an easy walk to the beach. Hernan was very helpful answering questions and recommending places to go - thanks for a great stay!

I can thoroughly recommend Hernan as a host. He was friendly and helpful  and my stay there was just what I needed. My room was affordable,  clean and comfortable, as was the whole apartment. Excellent location close to public transport and good cafés and shops. A pleasant, hassle-free experience.
A great budget option near the airport about a $25 taxi ride away, and a friendly host Hernan.
It's a nice stay with Hernan and thanks for the tidy room. Convenient to city and you can get everything nearby
quite comfortable

I had an excellent experience staying at Hernan's place. He was very welcoming and friendly, and helped me making taxi arrangements, and made sure I was up early for my taxi to the airport. His apartment was comfortable and clean. Just up the road is a good place to find something to eat. I didn't have time to check out the nearby beach. The place is close to Sydney airport. A taxi ride during peak hour, from the airport to Hernan's, was around $41. It was significantly cheaper in the early morning, going to the airport.

We had a great stay with Hernan and his partner, he was very welcoming and let us use his place while away. The room is exactly as described and what the photos show. Within walking distance of train station and all conveniences. We would definitely stay with Hernan again and would recommend his home to anyone travelling to Sydney.
Bonne expérience pour une première

Everything was very nice. Its super easy to get to the airport and the beach is very close. There is also a kiosk nearby.
I would definetly stay here again, when Im in Sydney. Cause Hernan was a great host.

Room and apartment well kept  and clean. Hernan was a lovely host. room is located so  close to everything yet the noise  doesn't travel through for a good nights  sleep. plenty  of linen,  towels etc provided. 10/10

Hernan was a really nice and easy going guy. Arrived around noon and directly got the keys for the front door and apartment, so I was really flexible. The room was exactly like it´s shown on the pictures and in the description. For everyone who needs a room near the airport when just arrived in Sydney I highly recommend this place. Thanks again for your great hospitality Hernan!

Hernan rocks! Extremely laid back, friendly and welcoming. I really appreciated his help with coordinating my early morning (445am) cab to the airport - this including him setting up the appointment and checking in on me at 4:40am to let me know the cab was outside. Super responsive and I had everything I needed. I will definitely stay with Hernan again if I find myself back in Sydney. 

The only thing to note is cabs in Sydney are quite expensive and he's probably a $40-50 cab ride away from the city (or so I heard). That said, the bus stop is a short walk away from the house, and I took it several times to the train station and directly into the city. He also provided public transportation maps to make trip planning that much easier!

Just can't get over how awesome Hernan is!

Had a wonderful time staying with Hernan and would definitely recommend it to anyone! He's a super friendly, fun  and welcoming guy, going out of his way to help me find the nearest bus and train stations. 

The apartment was spacious and comfortable, and seriously the perfect location! So close to the beach, airport and city. If you're visiting Sydney I would absolutely recommend staying here!

Hernan is a very friendly person and an excellent host, I really enjoyed my stay. The room is clean and tidy, close to the beach and shops. Hopefully will stay with him again and recommend to anyone !

Hernan gave my daughter and myself a real warm welcome accommodating us and our travel arrangements. He gave us space to settle in and make ourselves at home and gave us good directions to the restaurants and beach area which was close to his home. We felt  relaxed and rested after our stay and would happily stay with him again. His home is up a few flights of stairs so be prepared for a bit of exercise. Thanks Hernan!!

I enjoyed my stay here, I stayed here to give myself a break from the traveling back and forth from home during my time of my placement at the nearby hospital. I will defiantly be back if I ever need to stay in the area again.

We recommend Hernan's accommodation for your stay

I stayed 3 nights. he was really nice and always smiled me welcoming. Hernan made me feel free at home. When I was in there, he was busy, but he never forgot me. (he prepared towel, tea and wine for me). And I got the home key from him and could come in and out freely.  And the room was exactly comfortable and tidy. The room is near by airport (about 15 min by car). It was perfect accommodation. I strong recommend you to go Hernan's home for your nice travel.

Hernan was a great host making it extra easy to arrange our arrival and departure, and quickly responding to all our requests including how to get there and arrange more transportation. The apartment was exactly as described with very nice decorating surprises (seashells and objects from Chile) that makes its feel unique. The room we stayed in was small but the living room is spacious and full of light with a great kitchen. We did not get to enjoy the apartment so much since we were only one day before a flight, but still had a chance to discover that the neighborhood (a quiet residential place with a nearby beach) had excellent restaurants (some of the best - and cheapest - seafood I had at Ocean's Heart). It takes 10~15mn to walk there along the beach. For us who wanted to stay in a convenient place before heading to the airport, it was perfect.

We have not had the chance to meet Hernan but he has made everything to make our short stay enjoyable in his home. The apartment has all that you need and is very well located.
The apartment was exactly as described .

Hernan is a great host. Cooperative, friendly and accomodating. The place is just as advertised. Neat, organised and all amenities properly provided. Me&my friend Karen stayed at Hernan's for only 1 day,but it was the funniest Airbnb experience I've ever had!Haha,I won't tell everybody here:)It took 15 min taxi from the airport to his home.(Just want others to know taking taxi during the night costs service fee)Hernan is such a nice host!He allowed us to stay extra half day at his house without paying extra money.And he gave us access to his fridge so that we could have breakfast and fruits.The most unforgetable is the Bontany Bay!The view there was breath-taking and the restaurants are great.

The place is conveniently close to the airport and pleasantly close to a lovely beach.  Hernan is a very nice guy, and made me feel at home right away. Hernan was fantastic, he answered any questions I had and gave great advice. Goes out of his way to help you. His home was just as described, perfect!! Great location, 2 minute walk to the bus stop and beach. Thanks for everything Hernan, especially the aquarium!
Warming department,tidy room,detail tips .Such a good experience in Sydney.Hernan is a kindly host.Hope to have a chance come again.

I was sorry I didn't get to meet him personally to thank him, but I really appreciated all he went through to help me book the room. The bed was so comfortable and the room was super spacious and clean. Hernan's place was easy to get to by bus or train, next time I'd love to stay longer, its right next to a beach! Stayed with Hernan for the second time in as many weeks – great host, makes everything very easy and the perfect spot to get a good night’s rest before a flight.

Hernan was an awesome host! This was my first time using airbnb and as a young woman traveling in a foreign country alone I was aiming for safety. His home was very comfortable and it has everything you could think you need. I give Hernan's place 5 stars. If you get the chance to stay here, do.

Hernan was an awesome host - accommodating of my jet lagged early arrival and helpful in getting my luggage up the stairs. His place was clean, close to airport, beach and bus line. Had a very enjoyable five night stay at Hernan's unit while in Sydney for a seminar. As a host Hernan, who is Chilean, was well travelled, friendly and a good conversationist with good local knowledge. Coupled with the location near the beach, good restaurants and a bus to the train station the unit is good value for money. Would stay again.

It was a great and pleasant one-week stay in Hernan's place. He welcomed us with warm regards and treated us very well. He concerned about our needs during the stay in Sydney and provided useful tips for traveling around. A nice place to recommend!

I had a great experience staying at Hernan's place. The place was easy to find; with a less than 5 minutes walk to the bus stop and the beautiful beach nearby. 

Despite I was out and about most of the time during my trip in Sydney, Hernan ensured he had provided everything I needed in the room and made me felt safe and comfortable during my stay. It was great to meet someone who's so easy-going and passionate about people! :)
The location is closed to airport, best for traveller. Also, you can walk along beach and go into a nice view restaurant. Hernan's space is very comfortable. I had a wonderful night there.

Hernan was friendly and easy to contact. The apartment is clean and in a convenient location. Parking can be difficult on the street as it'd quite busy. It's also noisy as it's close to a main road with traffic. All in all it is a good find and recommended.

Wonderful apartment with a well-equipped kitchen! The apartment is close to public transportation so it is easy to get around. Hernan seem like a really nice and likeable guy, didn't meet him that much but he definitely had a good vibe.

Good place to stay, I recommend it!

Hernan was a great host, he welcomed me warmly and helped me a lot to get started in Australia.

Hernan's house is real close to the airport and beach. I have stay there for 1 night with my boy friend and we find the house is very nice looking and clean. Hernan also very kind and help us to book the taxi for next day, we enjoy to chit chat with him and he willing to share information with us.

The apartment is clean and tidy, near to the beach and bus stop. Hernan is a really nice guy :)

Clean and cozy room close to the beach. Had a lovely stay in this space. Great value.

Didn't get to see Hernan. Overall room and the house is ok and close to everything. Downside saw a cockroach in the shower, found a ball of hair inside the bed, a little noisy from the car passing in front the house because it located on the main road. Overall I would still recommend to others.

Staying at Hernan's was a pleasure. Although only for two nights and due to Australia Day we didn't interact very much, he was very kind and helpful with directions and public transport. He makes you feel at home very quickly. His apartment is very clean and tidy and situated in a great area. Just walk out the street to the beach, lots of shops and places to eat and drink, very close to the airport. At the beach you can see the planes arrive and depart and ships sail into Botany Bay. The only thing one should consider is that his apartment is on the second floor, no elevator, so if you are not travelling light, then you need to be fit.
I had a great stay and hope to chat a bit more next time.

Great room, great location and great price- very friendly host. Will stay again if in area.
Good location for going to the beach and not far away from the Airport.

Only stayed one night but Hernan is a lovely guy and the room is clean and very comfortable. Very nice apartment in a very nice area. I really recommend this for anyone who wants a quiet night near the airport. It's in a nice area too with lots of options for eating. Cheers Hernan!
Hernan was really friendly and made us feel at home right away. He was really informative and had all the information leaflets to hand about excursions and public transport.

The place was a perfect size room about a 15 minute drive from the airport and about 45 minutes to Sydney by train. We had a blast. The place was clean and had everything we needed. The only downside was no air conditioning but there was a fan in the room so we hardly noticed. I can't wait to go back. I would definitely recommend!!

Hernan was just the kind of person who you'd want to visit--friendly, generous, and easy-going.  The place was simple, and had everything you need.  I walked down to the beach and it was a lot of fun just like all the beaches in Sydney.  A great place and a great deal!

Hernan's place was such a wonderful gem in Monterey! Easy access to bus routes (15-20 min ride to/from the airport via Uber), beautiful views from The Grade Parade (about one block away), plenty of food options AND such an easy going, welcoming and generous host! he apartment is clean and tidy, near to the beach and bus stop.Wonderful apartment with a well-equipped kitchen! didn't meet him that much but he definitely had a good vibe.

Hernan was very friendly and easygoing. The room was very clean and tidy, the only problem I had was that the shower gets cold after 5 minutes, as I've got long hair it's almost impossible to take such a quick shower, and I wasn't waiting for that, because I didn't know.

Hernan is really a nice guy that helped me with my route here and there. A very good memories in Sydney. Hernan is a very nice person, and he is very helpful. He and his girl friend are easy going, they drove me to the city in the first day. And his place is really closed to the beach and the restaurant. I will be there when I come to Sydney again.

Location was very close to the airport and Hernan was able to provide information on how to get to his home by public transport. Took me only around 30mins by bus. Really enjoyed my stay with Hernan! Would recommend it to anyone who wants to visit Sydney.

name: Kapalua Bay Villa 20g2 Beachfront!
summary: This beachfront villa overlooks the pristine Oneloa Bay with views that will take your breath away.  Two spacious master bedrooms each with its own en-suite offer luxurious comfort steps from the ocean.
space: We invite you to be carried away by this luxury beachfront villa overlooking the azure waters of beautiful Oneloa Bay. Our property is uniquely positioned above the beach in the most desirable location of Kapalua, the crown jewel of West Maui. This spacious contemporary home is just a short stroll to pristine beaches, sparkling pools, golf, tennis and the exclusive Montage Spa. As you enter the villa’s inviting great room, you’re mesmerized by the expansive view of the great Pacific Ocean and surrounding islands framed by wall to wall windows. Walking onto the lanai extends your living to the secluded warm sandy beach below.  Imagine relaxing on a comfortable lawn chair watching the sea life frolic, embraced by the warm ocean breeze, listening to the soothing sound of surf, and sipping that fine cocktail. For dinner, choose from the many fine dining experiences in and around Kapalua—Merrimam’s a short stroll along the scenic coastal trail in front of us is a favorite but you'll be temp

neighborhood_overview: Why Kapalua Bay Villas:  Kapalua Resort is surrounded by 22,000 acres of natural wonder. Situated between two wild life preserves, Kapalua is home to a variety of tropical birds, exotic plants, fish, and giant sea turtles. During the months of January through April, Kapalua Bay and surrounding waters are playgrounds for an abundance of whales and their young. The Unique Benefits at this Villa:  Walking distance to world class beaches, championship golf courses, tennis, dozens of restaurants, and shopping, Kapalua resort offers something for everyone. For the wild life enthusiasts, there are miles of scenic walking trails. For the adventure enthusiasts, zip line through the lush tropical landscape. If rest and relaxation is the goal, rejuvenate mind and body at the exclusive Kapalua Spa or simply stretch out in the comfort of your private lanai and let the tranquil sights and sounds of your island paradise melt your every care away.
notes: Bedrooms: 2 Bedrooms, Sleeps 4 adults and 2 young children.  King bed in second master can be configured as two single beds. Bathrooms: 3 Bathrooms
transit: Most Guest rent a car. However If you'd like to skip the walk to your favorite restaurant, beach, resort activity, or adventure, we'll chauffeur you. You'll have a FREE DOOR TO DOOR RESORT SHUTTLE at your service.
access: Included also are the following amenities:  Resort Pools | Tennis Courts  Password protected Wifi  Beach Chairs | Beach Towels  FREE local shuttle  Convenient parking behind your villa **pamper yourself at the luxurious Kapalua Spa Montage (daily fee). **Of course we pamper our golfers! Just let us know if we can reserve your T times. Our guests enjoy the BEST GOLF DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE for the Bay and Plantation courses as well as all other island golf courses. Just mention it when you are reserving your villa!
interaction: Included also are the following amenities:  Resort Pools | Tennis Courts  Password protected Wifi  Beach Chairs | Beach Towels  Mid stay towel and linen service when you stay 10 days or more FREE local shuttle  Convenient parking behind your villa Onsite manager available 24/7 **pamper yourself at the luxurious Kapalua Spa Montage (daily fee). **Of course we pamper our golfers!  Our guests enjoy the BEST GOLF DISCOUNTS AVAILABLE for the Bay and Plantation courses as well as all other island golf courses.

host.host_about:
We are Aloha Vacation Villas, a family owned business that grew organically through our great love for Kapalua and West Maui.  We had made the area our vacation destination of choice for most of our lives until one day, we decided to put down our roots and call this magical paradise,... home.

We proudly oversee 50+ privately owned homes in West Maui, Hawaii.  Following our dreams years ago and becoming a part of the island was the best decision we ever made. 

Welcome to paradise (Website hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.comments: Wow! This villa is exactly as pictured, and those views are no exaggeration. What an incredible place to spend a long weekend. The unit was easy to find with clear directions on how to get in. Once inside, it is very spacious and comfortable, and there really are panoramic views of Oneloa Bay, where you can swim or boogie board. If the water is relatively calm, you can also snorkel there. We enjoyed sitting on the lanai and watching turtles bob around in the surf. You can also walk the coastal trail to Kapalua beach and continue on to Napili--both have great snorkeling and swimming. This villa is also within walking distance to several restaurants--Merriman's was the standout for us. I would absolutely love to return to this gorgeous villa someday!

It was amazing. The apartment, the view, the location and the neighborhood are just amazing. The pictures do only reflect part of what you experience. The apartment offers everything you need and the  beach is only 1 minute away. Great place!

name: Bright Atico in Born with the perfect roof terrace
summary: My place is in the heart of gothic Barcelona close to Picasso Museum, Catedral de Barcelona, Portal del Ángel, El Xampanyet, and Els 4Gats.  You’ll love my place because of the light, the mezzanine bed, the bright open kitchen that opens out directly onto the roof terrace.  It is the perfect atico to spend time relaxing in, enjoying a drink on the terrace before heading out to see more of the city.
space: My atico is the perfect way to experience the real side of Barcelona. It's located in heart of the city but the rooftop location means you can relax in perfect peace and quiet before experiencing the best of what the cuty has to  offer.

host.host_about: fhlfhaslfhalkfh

address.government_area: Sant Pere, Santa Caterina i la Ribera

reviews.comments:
We had a great stay at the apartment of Jonathan. He picked us up at a central place to guide us to the apartment and gave advice on good places to eat.

Good location close to the restaurants and starting point for sightseeing and at the same time not far from the beach. Nice place in Barcelona if you want to have breakfast on the terrace.

Only disadvantage are the stairs to the apartment/bed which is not recommended for in bad shape :-). But if you want a terrace on the roof, it's the only way.

Bonjour,
Jonathan est une personne très disponible qui nous a reçu à 23h. Nous ne parlons pas beaucoup espagnol et anglais et il a adapté son dialogue à notre niveau pour que nous puissions le comprendre. Il a pris de nos nouvelles durant notre séjour. C'était très agréable. L'appartement est situé dans une petite ruelle, au dernier étage. Il est très silencieux. La vue est très agréable. Il est grand et très fonctionnel. 2 ou 3 points sont à revoir et nous en avons fait part au propriétaire. Pour les visites, il est très bien situé... Bus touristique et métro sont à proximité. Il y a des supermarchés ouverts 24h/24 juste à côté pour faire les courses. 
Le séjour a été très agréable.

name: Cosy Room in Kadıkoy
summary: The apartment is right in the middle of the center of Kadıkoy. There are hospitals, public transportation, school and shopping centers around it. If you're looking for a clean very comfortable common areas and a beautiful balcony, then this one is for you 5 minutes walk to Metro and Marmaray and 15 mnts walk to Ferry. In a very convenient location where lots of foreigners living close by. Stores, bars and cafes are all very close to the house,You can reach anywhere- anytime you want.
space: The flat is located  very close to Metro and Marmaray station just 3 mnts by walk and also 10 mnst to Ferry station..

reviews.comments: The hoster was so helpful and his place so calm and sweet) its located in 15 min walking from the bus station and the harbour or 5 min by dolmush. Clean flat and complete consultation about Istanbul we got, absolutely satisfyed)

name: Huge one bedroom apartment
summary: Cute and huge one bedroom apartment only 5 minutes walk from the subway (takes 20mn to reach Manhattan). It is located on a quiet street, just a few blocks from Prospect Park, the Botanical Garden and Franklin avenue (full of restaurants and bars).
space: Great sunny space with all amenities (toaster, microwave, air conditioner, WI FI ...) and a fun swing chair :).  Also, the building has washers and dryers!
description: Cute and huge one bedroom apartment only 5 minutes walk from the subway (takes 20mn to reach Manhattan). It is located on a quiet street, just a few blocks from Prospect Park, the Botanical Garden and Franklin avenue (full of restaurants and bars). Great sunny space with all amenities (toaster, microwave, air conditioner, WI FI ...) and a fun swing chair :).  Also, the building has washers and dryers! I love Crown Heights! There are many new great chefs that have decided to open up restaurants in this great borough especially on Franklin avenue. My favorite place to go for brunch is called Chavelas (try it you won't regret). The Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens and Prospect Park are all a couple train stops away or a 10 min walk. It is very easy to get to the city from the apartment. You can take the 3 train (only 2mn walk) or the 2, 5, 4 trains ( only 6mn walk).
neighborhood_overview: I love Crown Heights! There are many new great chefs that have decided to open up restaurants in this great borough especially on Franklin avenue. My favorite place to go for brunch is called Chavelas (try it you won't regret). The Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Gardens and Prospect Park are all a couple train stops away or a 10 min walk.
transit: It is very easy to get to the city from the apartment. You can take the 3 train (only 2mn walk) or the 2, 5, 4 trains ( only 6mn walk).

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Chouette appartement, très spacieux et lumineux, dans une rue tranquille faisant l'angle avec une avenue de commerces et à 2 pas de la station de métro, super pratique !
Quartier vivant et authentique.
Concernant l'accueil, on a beaucoup apprécié la bouteille de vin qui nous attendait sur la table de la cuisine. Et un grand merci pour nous avoir déposés avec nos valises à un arrêt de métro sur la ligne directe pour l'aéroport. 
On vous recommande ce logement !

name: Comfortable and sunny double room
summary: Fantástica habitación doble exterior y con mucha luz, situado en uno de los barrios residenciales y muy tranquilos de Barcelona, a tan solo 2 min del metro con excelente conexión  de 10 min hasta el centro y la playa, piso muy limpio y tranquilo.
space: Agradable apartamento completamente exterior  y muy luminoso, limpio y tranquilo, nos gusta cuidar de nuestros huéspedes haciéndoles llevarse un maravilloso recuerdo de esta estupenda cuidad del sol y alegría. Muy bien ubicado, en un agradable barrio con muchos comercios y supermercados a su al rededor.
description: Fantástica habitación doble exterior y con mucha luz, situado en uno de los barrios residenciales y muy tranquilos de Barcelona, a tan solo 2 min del metro con excelente conexión  de 10 min hasta el centro y la playa, piso muy limpio y tranquilo. Agradable apartamento completamente exterior  y muy luminoso, limpio y tranquilo, nos gusta cuidar de nuestros huéspedes haciéndoles llevarse un maravilloso recuerdo de esta estupenda cuidad del sol y alegría. Muy bien ubicado, en un agradable barrio con muchos comercios y supermercados a su al rededor. Pueden usar la cocina, el baño y la terraza para agradables desayunos o comidas durante su estancia. Proporciono toda la información necesaria referente a la cuidad y los lugares de interés, durante el día suelo trabajar, pero mi pareja se haría cargo de todo necesario para ellos, los fines de semana estoy libre y les puedo dedicar el tiempo que deseen! Agradable y tranquilo barrio residencial de Barcelona cuidad a tan solo 150m de la boca del
neighborhood_overview: Agradable y tranquilo barrio residencial de Barcelona cuidad a tan solo 150m de la boca del metro que le conecta con el centro  y la playa en tan solo 10 min, la vivienda esta rodeada de muchos supermercados y bares de comida casera, barrio muy tranquilo y seguro.
notes: Tengo un gatito, aviso por si acaso alguien fuera alérgico, por lo demás todo en perfecto órden.
transit: La vivienda esta a escasos metros de la boca del metro tanto de la linea azúl, como amarilla, paradas de bus  y zona gratuita de aparcamiento en su entorno.

house_rules: No molestar a los demás, Respetar la tranquilidad de otros,  Mantener la limpieza y orden con el que se encuentra el huésped al entrar Sentido común

host.host_about:
Soy una persona muy abierta y alegre, me encanta entablar nuevas amistades y conocer gente interesante de todas las culturas, me encanta cuidar de las personas que me rodean y hacerles llevar un agradable recuerdo de mi y la estancia proporcionada por nosotros!
Encantada de antemano y bienvenidos!!

reviews.comments: Beautiful room! Wonderful apartment owners! We are very glad. Room is near metropolitan. A lot of shops and bars is near to apartment. Very calm street. We used the metro to get to the center of Barcelona everyday. It is not too far. Karina ,  Mercedes and David  are amazing people! We was very happy meet with them ! Thank you for wonderful  vacation!
The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We truly can’t say enough wonderful things about Karina’s place. First off, Karina and David themselves were wonderful. They are respectful and helpful, kind and understanding. I felt like we (my partner and I) were staying with friends the whole month. By the time we left Barcelona, we both felt equally as sad leaving Karina and David. 
   It is important to note, first, that the bed in their room is the most comfortable bed (and pillow) I have ever slept on! I have been searching, to no avail, for a pillow like theirs since I left. Also, there is a desk space in the room, which is not always the case in many airbnbs. I appreciated this as I was doing a bit of work from Barcelona for the month. There is also a chest of drawers and clothes bureau which has ample space for both a single occupant or couple. My partner and I fit all of our things in there no problem – and we stayed for a month.
   Also, Karina and David keep their house very clean and tidy which makes for a very comfortable stay. And they helped us with things we needed around the house at any time. They were also available via text or phone at any time if we had a question when they weren’t home. We never were left needing something for long. 
   Equally as important, they live extremely close to many metro stops. One was just a short stroll down the street. Very convenient for getting around Barcelona!
   But I have now written too much without mentioning their two beautiful kitties Sofia and Mimi. Mimi is lazy and calm and will, at most, curl up behind your head on the couch. Otherwise, she likes to spend her time sleeping on cool surfaces or on the porch (which is also a wonderful space in the house!) Young Sofia will steal your heart too. She loves bothering Mimi and playing in the porch flowers. I still ask Karina to send me pictures of them so I stop myself from going out and adopting two cats just like them!

   In sum, we have left Barcelona with more than touristy memories and Sagrada Familia souvenirs. Thanks to Karina and David, we felt we experienced the real Barcelona because we experienced the thing that makes the city so great – the people that live there. 

Thank you both for everything :) we will back!

name: Ipanema Great 2-bedroom Cozy Apt
