host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
I'm authentic CARIOCA (born in Rio de Janeiro). I'm  graduated in business administration. I've been helping tourists to find accommodation in Rio for over 15 years. I have made many friends from all over the world. I'm also a citizen of the United States. 
I'm waiting for your contact and hope to be given the preference of your business.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: A experiência foi de acordo com a promessa, não tivemos nenhuma surpresa ou sobressalto. O apartamento oferece mesmo tudo o que precisamos e estava devidamente limpo e organizado. Ótimo para um casal. A localização é excelente, perto da praia, lojas, restaurantes, bancos, farmácias e tudo mais o que você possa imaginar. O horário de check-in e check-out foi flexível, o que facilitou demais e o processo de pegar e entregar a chave foi muito prático. Voltaríamos, com certeza!
Clean and safe apartment, perfect location and professional host

The apartment is exactly as it is on the pictures. It's like living at home as it has everything you expect. Washing machine (clothes), wifi, fridge, TV (with cable) and air conditioner are all working perfectly. The locations if the best (in the heart of Ipanema) and Marcos was great. Extremely helpful and organized. It was very easy to get the keys and information from him. I really recommend this place and Marcos!!!

Facil e simples Check In and Out.
Facil comunicação.
Localização muito boa. 
Recomendo e voltarei.
Marcos apt was clean w all the amenities, it is very simple and in a good location. The rental process was hassle free, and I was accomodated on a later checkout. I would def rent again from Marcos.

The location of this apartment is the best! Stores and restaurant just below, close Ipanema beach, and comfortable transportation. The apartment is exactly as seen in the pictures, very roomy with all the needed appliances. Marcos was very kind and helped us with some good advices. If we decide to come over again, we'll choose this apartment again.

Excelente! O Marcos foi foi muito atencioso, Fiquei no apartamento de parede azul, com ótima localização, muito perto da praia, confortável, espaçoso, limpo e muito silencioso! Nenhum ponto negativo. Recomendo!

Great apartment very convenient location (restaurants, shopping and beach very close). Marcos was very helpful and always responded quickly when asked for help.
Only little drawback for sensitive people might be the noticable traffic from R. Visc. de Pirajá (but totally normal for such a centrally located apartment).

This apartment is perfectly located in the heart of Ipanema. The unit is spacious, with a comfortable living room and spacious main bedroom. As a couple, it was really helpful having the spare room with single bed, to keep our luggage in. I'd agree with past reviewers about the sound of the traffic, however it is Ipanema, and we quickly got used to it and it never affected our sleep. For any GLBT travellers, it's really close to a great bar for drinks (just around the corner) which was good fun, and just two blocks away from the gay beach. Amenities in the flat worked well (wifi, laundry, hot water, etc) and the block felt very safe. I'd recommend this spot to any friends who were headed to Rio!

We stayed in a different flat due to there being an issue with this one which we were told about in advance. Both are in the same building which is in a great location in Ipanema and is secure with a front desk staffed 24/7.

Place just as described, fantastic location. 2nd room small if you need a lot of space but if you are like me i just slept on the comfortable bed and closed the sliding door. Would stay again. Marcos is a reliable and responsive host, cheers.

Le logement est exactement tel que décrit et tel que les photos le représentent. L'accueil de Marcos fut très sympathique et l'appartement était très propre à notre arrivée. Il est idéalement situé, à deux pas de la plage et du fameux Posto 9 ainsi que des meilleurs restaurants d'Ipanema.
O Marcos é um ótimo anfitrião. Adoramos o apartamento e a sua localização. Pretendemos retornar outras vezes.

What a great place and excellent host!  The vibe in Ipenema is as cool and cozy as Marco's condo is. It is plenty spacious, very neat and tidy and  the location can't be beat.  Settle in for a few days and enjoy all the gifts this darling area has to offer. You won't get the song (Girl from Ipenema) out of your head and the restaurant where it was written to 2 blocks away.  Eat at Crusto's, though, right around the corner.  Do yourself a BIG favor and rent this cool, cozy pad.  Thanks, Marcos!! Abrigada!

The apartment is in a great position in Ipanema. Very central and not far away from the beach, the Hippie market and many cool bars and restaurants.
The apartment was nice, as described. The handover and check out was smooth.
Thank you Marcos for our great stay in Rio! OBREGADA

Marco was very helpful and called several time to see how things are. Great aparment, two blocks away from Ipanema beach. Good infrastructure in the local street. Aparment very clean, air condition in every room. Apartment offers everything needed. Thanks a lot Marco, cheers Juergen

We stayed in this apartment during the World Cup and had a great experience. The location is perfect, the apartment is exactly like in the pictures and Marcos was always very helpful and attentive to whatever we needed.
Marcos is a very nice guy, his apartment is perfect to stay in rio. The location is perfect, close to everything: beach, restaurant, buses and metro station... We had a real pleasure!
Muy lindo departamento, mejor que en las fotos ya que tiene heladera y microondas nuevos, muy buena ubicacion y la atencion y predisposicion de Marcos es excelente. Muy recomendable.

O Marcos foi muito receptivo, sempre tirou todas as dúvidas que tive com rapidez e passou todas as instruções em relação ao apartamento assim que cheguei. A flexibilidade de check-in e check-out facilitou muito a estadia. O apartamento é ótimo, limpo e muito bem localizado. Sem dúvidas voltaria a este apartamento.

O apartamento do marcos é ótimo! Localização perfeita em Ipanema, na principal rua do comércio do bairro, próximo a lojas, restaurantes, mercados, praças e da praia! É confortável, espaçoso, limpo, organizado e seguro. Foi uma ótima experiencia!
O apartamento de tem excelente localização e o anfitrião foi bastante atencioso conosco.

Our stay couldn't have been better! Hassle-free from start to finish. The apartment is located two blocks from Ipanema beach and, even though it's on a busy street, it's not noisy. If you close the windows and turn on the AC or fan (which is in every room except the kitchen) you don't hear a thing. The photos are a true picture of the place. I'll definitely rent this place again and recommend to friends and family. Thanks Marcos!
Great apartment, very much enjoyed it, would stay there again
Apartamento muito bom, super bem localizado e a parte interna é  exatamente como aparece nas fotos. Além disso, todas as combinações de horários e limpeza  foram respeitados.

My husband and I stayed at Marcos' place for 4 nights and loved it! Marcos greeted us with a welcome call in the apartment and was always available via phone or (Hidden by Airbnb) for any questions we had.

The apartment is well-located, just a couple of blocks from Ipanema beach and at the heart of a bustling shopping area with plenty of eateries just a few steps away.

The apartment itself was safe in doorman building. It was well maintained and clean, and was a comfortable fit for the two of us.

Marcos was just the host I would ask for. The listing was very accurate. His place was clean and he accommodated me for a late check-out.  Marcos was warm and responsive and when I go back to Rio, I would love to stay at this property. It is a couple of blocks from the beach and lagoon on the main thoroughfare in Ipanema beach. You can't beat it. The only drawback is that the second room is very small compared to the master bedroom but for the price and location you could not ask for more
Bom apartamento, correspondendo as expectativas, sendo muito bem assistidos pelo Host do apto.

The apartment's location is great - a 5 min walk to Ipanema beach. There are also several restaurants / bars right around the corner. The apartment is the 4 floor and facing the street where many buses to other parts of Rio run - which is great, although this means it was quite loud with the windows open which didn't bother us since we were mostly out. 
Marcos was very prompt with his response and the check-in and check-out process was easy. He also provided an extra mattress for another friend who was with us for the first night (we were three persons for 5 nights in total).

Just a note, the toilet paper is provided just for the initial use - so if you stay for more than a few days, you might need to buy your own. There's a convenience shop opposite the street.

Marcos was friendly and responsive, 2-3 blocks to beach, nice shower with wood and stones, safe building, lots of restaurants, grocery stores, pharmacies and banks, nearby. Traffic and buses on street can be loud at night but I sleep with earplugs. Overall a nice visit.
Apartamento confortável e com excelente localização! A estadia foi muito agradável!
Apartamento ótimo, bem cuidado, localização excelente.

Todo puede describirse en una palabra: espectacular. La ubicación es genial, a dos cuadras de la playa y sobre una de las calles principales de Ipanema. Rodeado de negocios y de opciones para cenar y salir. El departamento es tal cual lo que se ve en las fotos. Super confortable y equipado con todo lo necesario para que la estadía sea amena.  Sin dudas es una gran inversión para vacacionar en una ciudad maravillosa como Rio. De mas esta decir que el anfitrión siempre esta atento a lo que uno pueda necesitar. Lo recomiendo ampliamente!

Muy lindo departamento, en el medio de la movida de Ipanema con todas las comodidades. Marcos es un muy buen anfitrión y está siempre bien dispuesto. Se escuchan un poco los ruidos de la calle ya que, justamente, está en el medio del bullicio de Ipanema y algunos ruidos del edificio. De todos modos es un lugar muy recomendable.

The apartment was in a fantastic location, two blocks from Ipanema beach and Posto 8, with heaps of restaurants and bars around, as well as being only a short 5 minute walk to the subway! It was a perfect location for a few days in Rio!
I didn't actually meet Marcos, but he was very quick in all communication and made sure we knew everything we needed for our arrival and stay!
The apartment was clean and bright and the kitchen had everything we needed to cook. 
Comfortable beds and a quiet apartment given its central location! 
Recommend.

Everything worked very well with Marcos. We arrived early and had no trouble leaving our bags in the apartment before it was ready. Since it was carnaval Marcos also offered to help with tickets to the Sambodromo. The location of the apartment is awesome. It's right on the main shopping street in Ipanema and only two blocks from the beach. Apartment was clean and we had everything we needed. Thanks for the stay!

Great place in Ipanema. Really well located, clean, aircond is working super well. Fits 3 people correctly, even if the small bedroom is very small. We didn't meet Marcos, but he was always very responsive and arranged everything for us to feel at home. Recommended.

Our stay at this apartment was great! The location is right in the middle of the Ipanema area, had lots of nice shopping, and we were only a five minute walk from Posto 9 - one of the most recommended beaches to go to in the city.  The apartment itself was exactly as pictured and everything worked as it should. We didn't get to meet Marcos in person, but we spoke over the phone and via (Hidden by Airbnb) - he was super response, very welcoming, and helpful with tips and recommendations for visiting Rio. Would highly recommend staying here!

The flat was great. Identic to the pictures. With a really good situation : close to the beach, restaurants and shops. Marcos helped us with our luggages before and after the check-in/out. Thank you for all

Marcos nos dejó las llaves en un sobre que nos entregó el portero porque él no nos podía recibir. Hablamos por teléfono al llegar y tras consultarle la hora en que podríamos abandonar el apartamento el día de nuestra salida, tuvimos que volver a preguntarle de nuevo porque no nos respondió durante toda la semana.

Lo mejor del apartamento es su ubicación, en una zona con muchos comercios y restaurantes, muy cerca de la playa. Para dos personas, es cómodo; aunque una de las habitaciones es pequeña, hay espacio suficiente. 

Como negativo: los ruidos, tanto de fuera (tráfico) como de dentro (aire acondicionado) y la cocina es algo antigua, pero con lo necesario. Aunque no sabemos si es circunstancial, nos hemos encontrado hormigas en la cocina y en el baño.
Great place to stay in Rio: close to the beach, shops, bars. Really safe and comfortable. The flat is clean and the forniture quite new. I suggest it for your holiday!
Marcos was easy to get in touch with and prompt at responding. The apartment was comfortable and had what we needed. The location for me was fantastic. I would recommend .
O Marcos foi ótimo! O apartamento estava exatamente como descrito no perfil e a localização perfeita! Praia, Lagoa, mercado, bares e tudo o mais que a gente precisou por perto. Voltarei com certeza

Marcos' condo was absolutely perfect. The apartment was very clean and just as described and pictured. Convenient to many great bars and restaurants. Very short walk to the beach and metro. The neighborhood was very safe and comfortable. Marcos was friendly, very helpful and made himself readily available for assistance.  I will definitely seek out his place again when I return to Rio! Thanks so much Marcos!

notre hôte a été très soucieux de notre arrivée et de notre confort.
l'appartement est très bien situé par rapport à la plage, au quartier qui est agréable.
on s'est senti tout à fait en sécurité.
l'appartement est spacieux pour 2à 3 personnes.
nous avons apprécié la qualité des matelas , de la douche et de la climatisation de toutes les pièces.
Adorei a estadia! O anfitrião deixou a chave com o porteiro, quando chegamos ele ligou para o apartamento dando dicas e solícito perguntou se tínhamos alguma dúvida.

Tive uma ótima estadia! O Marcos se mostrou super acessível desde o início, me ajudando no que fosse necessário. 
O apartamento é muito bom, mesmo! novo, exatamente como no anúncio! A localização também é ótima! Não tive problemas quando precisei andar a pé, perto de supermercados, restaurantes, tudo! Não usei o transporte público mas tem um ponto de ônibus bem na frente e uma estação de metrô a alguns quarteirões de lá. Do lado da praia (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza ficaria lá novamente!

El departamento es muy lindo, limpio y tiene todo lo necesario... La cama es cómoda, el internet funciona correctamente, la cocina esta muy bien equipada, el portero esta presente las 24hs y la ubicación del dpto es excelente... en una zona muy linda y cerca de la playa.... Marcos se mostró muy atento con nosotros, si bien no nos conocimos personalmente. En fin, estoy super conforme y lo recomiendo 100%.

This is a perfect location for a tourist or someone very familiar with Rio - close to Metro, beach, restaurants and banks - both local and household names like McDs, Starbucks and Citibank.  The apartment was just as advertised and Marcos was  very responsive to email and phone calls.
Great location, right where you want to be and for a great price. Highly recommended.
Marcos was a great host, the apartment was located in a really great, safe area, very close to restaurants. The apartment was beautiful. Marcos had really great communication.

We arrived late and Marcos made sure our arrival was seamless. The apartment is exactly as advertised; it's clean, well-appointed, the bed is comfortable, everything works. The neighborhood, in mid-Ipanema, is terrific: a short walk to absolutely everything. It was great!

The apartment is very well located in 3 min walking distance to Ipanema Beach. The street is a nice mixture of shops (fashion and others) and cafes (local and Starbucks) and normal apartment buildings. A lot of restaurants (for all kind of tastes), breakfast locations and bars are in the neighbor streets. It is a save area and the subway station is in 5 min walking distance. 
The apartment looks exactly as on the pictures. It is very well kept and tidy and suits best 3 persons to sleep (2 bedrooms) and has an extra living room and kitchen. 
It is a nice location for people to enjoy Rio live day (at Ipanema beach) and evening (going out for eating and fun): a singles or as family
Excelente!

Ficamos no apartamento por três dias. A localização é excelente, sempre que visitamos o Rio gostamos de ficar nessa área de Ipanema. O apartamento é bem cuidado, limpo. Um fantástico custo benefício. Recomendado.

Had a pleasant short stay at Marcus's place last week. The location is fantastic, 1 block from the beach in a safe building. The flat itself is spacious and very bright my advise is to bring ears plugs if you are very sensitive to traffic noise as the bedroom faces a busy street but it wasn't an issue for me at all and I probably will stay there again next year!

idéalement situé, lumineux et agréable.
tres bonne communication avec Marcos.
je recommande.
El apartamente tenía las características y el equipamiento adecuado, sin faltantes.
Muy lindo departamento, tal cual las fotos excelente ubicación, ideal para pasar una buena estadía. No tuvimos ningún inconveniente

Simple perfect space. All your basic needs plus right in the area you want to be. I have been to Rio more than a dozen times and have had my fair-share of Airbnb's and there is a reason why this booking is always full. 

Kitchen is large and has a table for eating and/or working on the computer, WiFi was fast, lots of light in the living room and bedroom, Air conditioning in every room, new washer, and a comfortable bed. Really great place and if it wasn't for other guests coming in the day I left I wish I could have extended my stay. 

Thanks Marcos!
The flat is perfect, very near the beach with good wifi and aircon.

Adoramos o apê, curtimos muito a localização. Os porteiros são ótimos extremamente profissionais.
Check in e checkout super tranquilos e organizados.

La ubicación es muy buena. a dos cuadras de la playa y sobre la Visconde de Pirajá tiene muchos negocios, tiendas etc. cerca de todo. El departamento esta bien, sin lujo pero todo correcto. LA atención de Marcos de 10.

Marcos' spot is great. Big, well-lit apartment. AC and wifi work well. There's a kitchen that I used to make breakfast several times. And Marcos was a great host--he was very responsive at all times, and he answered all of my questions and provided lots of great recommendations. (He made sure I was aware of local supermarkets and other essentials in the neighborhood upon arrival as well.)

I highly recommend Marcos and his apartment.

A really cute condo in a great location. Lots of restaurants and stores nearby and it is 2 blocks from a great spot on the beach. This is probably ideal for a couple or a few friends, as the master is big and the other bedroom is small but comfortable.

Marcos was an excellent host.  The check-in instructions were clear, and he was very accommodating to our requests for early check-in. As soon as we got to the apartment, he gave us a phone call to give us some further instructions and to offer recommendations for restaurants, etc.  The apartment was clean, comfortable and very well-located.  We would definitely recommend Marcos's apartment to anyone planning a visit to Rio.  We would definitely stay there again.

O apartamento é como nas fotos espaçoso , limpo, e com todas as facilidades precisas para uma temporada no Rio .
Marcos é uma ótima pessoa comunicativo e compreensivo .
Foi bem flexível com o meu checkout também.
Super recomendo!

Vanessa
A hospedagem foi incrivel! O apartamento é muito bom, localização, limpeza, tamanho, tudo otimo e o Marcos é incrivel, muito atencioso. Voltarei com certeza!

The apartment is located in a nice street in a good neighborhood near the beach. The beds are good and the room is well darkened. You can hear the street below you but no drunk, screaming people or ambulance route. we haven't met Marcos, but he is a fast (Hidden by Airbnb) responder :)
Ubicacion ideal. Limpieza y calidez. Lo recomiendo. Gracias Marcos. Eres muy amable

The appartment is exactly like the pictures show.
The location is excelent, walking distante from the beach, bars, restaurants, stores.
Marcos was extremelly helpful since before we got there, super available, ofering help and making sure everything was ok.
The place is clean, good towels, good bed, great showet, with an elevator and a lot of facilities.
I recommend this place with no reservations.
Thanks Marcos, we had a great time there.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, próximo a bares, lojas e restaurantes. Anfitrião muito prestativo e educado. Voltarei com certeza!
Excelente piso, muy buena ubicacion
Marcos é super atencioso, o apartamento muito bem localizado, equipado e super arejado. Sem defeitos. Recomendo.
Todo perfecto :D

Todo fue según lo acordado. La ubicación es exelente, y el departamento muy cómodo y lindo. Todo es como en las fotos y según lo acordado con el anfitrion. Unos detalles son que los muebles y los artículos de cocina no son de gran calidad, pero hay que destacar que hay de todo lo que uno pueda necesitar. Otro detalle a mejorar es la ducha que no tiene buena presión de agua, y es muy difícil regular la temperatura; al abrir un poquito el agua fría se apaga el calefon. Muy bueno en general todo.
Todo muy limpio, muy buena ubicación del departamento. Pasamos unos días hermosos sin problema. Gracias Marcos
La ubicación es perfecta en ipanema cerca de las playas y restaurantes. El apartamento es muy como y marcos es siempre atento y con una respuesta siempre amable y rápido.

This apartment was in a fantastic location in Ipanema close to the beach, banks, restaurants, supermarket, the park and the lagoa.  the host was very nice and helpful.  the apartment was sunny and bright,  very spacious, the kitchen fully stocked with all necessary cooking items, the refrigerator very new and beautiful.  Internet and TV was also very good.  I would definitely return and stay again with this host and apartment.  thanks again
Ótimo.

O apartamento é igual as fotos. Me senti segura na região, caminhei facilmente para o metro, bares e praia e paguei barato o Uber para diversos pontos da cidade.

Adorei e voltaria :)

Anfitrião atencioso e flexível, foram dois dias maravilhosos e com certeza seu apto foi essencial para que tudo desse certo.
Indico demais...
Moderno, limpo, ótima localização! Fui muito bem recebido! Recomendo!
Gentileza e respostas rápidas.

El departamento tiene todo lo necesario para pasar unos días con comodidad en Río de Janeiro. La ubicación es muy buena, aunque tiene como "negativo" que es una zona muy transitada, lo que la hace un poco ruidosa a la noche. La cercanía a la playa y a servicios (transportes, supermercados, farmacias) son muy valorables. La limpieza era muy buena. Marcos fue muy amable y se mostró dispuesto en todo momento a ayudar y dar indicaciones. Lo recomiendo, sin duda.
Ótimo  apartamento,  as fotos que estão disponíveis  refletem bem como é  o ap, super limpo, localização muito boa! adoramos, indicaremos e voltaremos!
Apartamento muito bem localizado, limpo, bem cuidado. Recomendo.
Ótima localização e apartamento espaçoso

Nuestro hospedaje fue genial. El departamento tiene todo lo necesario, limpio, seguro y bien ubicado. Marcos como anfitrión excelente, nos respondió rápido siempre que necesitamos consultarle algo. Muy recomendable!

Tudo muito bom,  o quarto individual que é muito estreito, na foto parecia ser maior. O único detalhe foi que esquecemos um óculos de sol (o que ainda não tinha percebido; descobri pq fui perguntar de outra coisa e ele falou sobre o óculos ), que estava com o cantinho da lente um pouco lascada/ quebrada, mas que era um óculos que eu usava pra tirar fotos.. e não aparecia o quebrado. Tinha comprado na Europa, apesar de quebradinho tinha um apreço por ele, encontraram e jogaram fora.. sem ao menos me perguntar. 
Fora isso tudo excelente, o apartamento tava com um pouco de areia no piso; mas por conta das hóspedes que saíram, que zonearam o ape.
Excelente ubicación.
Die Wohnung entspricht den Fotos, ist aber mittlerweile schon etwas abgewohnt. Die Lage der Wohnung ist super!

Entrega o que se compromete. Marcos é muito gentil e disponível. O apartamento é bem localizado. Nos sentimos seguros. Local simples, porém limpo e com conforto necessário para rápidas estadias na capital.
Excellent location and nice apartment with 24h doorman.

Confortável e estiloso, ótima localização , anfitrião prestativo e atencioso 
Foi uma ótima locação!
Marcos é um ótimo anfitrião! Super recomendo, a localização é excelente e o apartamento é extremamente confortável!
Muito bom apartamento, no coração de Ipanema. Fomos em 4 adultos e Marcos nos ofereceu um colchão extra. Tudo muito bem limpo e cuidado. Voltarei com certeza!

Excelente localização.
Muito bem cuidado.

O Marcos é um anfitrião muito atencioso, e que fez de tudo para nós proporcionar a melhor experiência possível.
O apartamento estava muito limpo, tudo funcionando. E a localização é ótima.
Quando voltar ao RJ ficarei lá novamente!
Excelente ubicación. Barrio hermoso.  Todo tal cual se describe en la publicación .
Excelente en todo sentido, el departamento cuenta con todo para que tengas una gran estadía y la atención de marcos es excelente

name: Charmant 4 demi
summary: Situé sur le plateau Mont-Royal, à 5min du métro Laurier et à 10 min du métro Mont-Royal. On peut tout faire à pied, trés joli quartier avec  plusieurs commerces, restaurant et parcs. L'appartement est très ensoleillé, avec internet, téléphone, câble
description: Situé sur le plateau Mont-Royal, à 5min du métro Laurier et à 10 min du métro Mont-Royal. On peut tout faire à pied, trés joli quartier avec  plusieurs commerces, restaurant et parcs. L'appartement est très ensoleillé, avec internet, téléphone, câble

host.host_about: Femme professionnelle

reviews.comments:
Bonjour Alice,
Merci pour le séjour, votre appartement est très bien et bien situé.
Au plaisir

name: E-House Relógio - 2C
summary: Amazing house, completely refurbished and decorated with a youthful style. 4 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, laundry, cable tv, balconies and a lot of outdoor space. 10 minutes to city center, served by metro and bus.
description: Amazing house, completely refurbished and decorated with a youthful style. 4 bathrooms, fully equipped kitchen, laundry, cable tv, balconies and a lot of outdoor space. 10 minutes to city center, served by metro and bus.

host.host_about: We are from Porto and would be glad to be part of your adventure in this great city! We would love to share our experience and knowledge of Porto as to making your stay as genuine and wonderful as possible!

reviews.comments: Luis m'a bien reçue, à l'heure où j'avais annoncé mon arrivée bien qu'il ne vive pas sur place. Le quartier est agréable si ce n'est la proximité avec la voie rapide pour ma chambre.
Todo ha sido perfecto, la casa muy bien, los huéspedes muy respetuosos, la habitación amplia y limpia, todo perfecto la verdad.

Thank you for having me around the house--it's been a pleasure! I really appreciated your hospitality and help. Next time I'm in Porto--I'll definitely contact you! :)

All the best!
Très bien. Un peu éloigné du centre-ville mais la station de métro est proche. Bon accueil, pas de problème

Vert Nice host and willing to help. 
The house is big and recently renovated. As there are a lot of rooms and people thé cleanliness is a bit poor un the common parts as bathroom and kitchen. For the price  i recommend.
It was great location, like 5 minutes to the metro, and 20 minutes walking from the Stadio do Dragao. The host was great helping me with directions,and was very comfortable place.
It's a great option to stay in Porto, nice, friendly clean house where the hosts are really helpful. Great price for your own room too.

Una casa muy bonita, muy limpia e iluminada, es un barrio muy lindo. El metro está a solo dos cuadras lo cual es buenísimo. Olga me recibió muy amablemente, me mostró la casa, los servicios y me dijo cómo llegar al centro y algunas recomendaciones más.
Totalmente recomendable.

El alojamiento es una casa antigua reconvertida en hostel. Aunque no está céntrica, está muy bien comunicada a 10 min y cerca de la salida del metro. El chico que me entregó las llaves muy amable, me dio todo tipo de explicaciones sobre los espacios comunes y como llegar al aeropuerto. 

Aunque la habitación no correspondía a la de la foto, estaba igualmente bien. El único inconveniente es que está cerca de la autopista, por lo que hay un poco de ruido por la noche si tienes el sueño muy ligero.

Muy recomendable relación calidad-precio.

Casa totalmente reformada para hacer que tu estancia en Oporto sea genial y puedas descansar. Genial casero, donde te abre la puerta para enseñarte toda la estancia y te aconseja sobre la ciudad con una sonrisa. Recomendable
Lugar perfecto para ir en pareja

The woman who was in charge let me in and showed me around the entire house, putting me at ease. The listing description was accurate; I got a private room with a nice comfy bed and a desk, which was all I asked for for one night's stay. The neighborhood was peaceful and open, very quiet and residential. The communal food area was great, I didn't have to buy rice or pasta to make meals because it was already there! I left something behind too, for other people after me to eat.

Obrigado pela simpatia e pela comodidade! Tudo impecável! 
O local é muito perto da estação de Salgueiros, o que significa que está perto de tudo (o metro do Porto é muito abrangente). Casa com óptimo ambiente. Definitivamente uma estadia a repetir!

Obrigado!
Todo fue correcto, cocina y baños limpios, buen wifi.. recomendable
muito receptivo, atencioso, me deu muitas dicas do que deveria visitar e dos pontos de interesse da rendondeza
Great location and facilities. It is not far from metro and I can acess down town only 10mins. In addition Nunu is very kind and wamrly welcomed.

Nuno was great with receiving me and giving explanations to get everywhere from the house. The house is very comfy, although it's about 15 min from the city center. It's also located right next to a highway, so it's a little noisy to sleep (your ear plugs can help with this).

Das Haus hat mir sehr gefallen. Ich hatte mein eigenes Zimmer mit allem was man braucht. Ich war froh über meine Ear-Plugs, da direkt neben dem Haus die ganze Nacht Autos auf einer Schnellstraße vorbeifuhren. Aber von dem Lärm abgesehen war ich begeistert. Das Haus wirkte sehr gemütlich und sauber. Auch wurde ich herzlich empfangen und bekam dazu auch noch gleich ein paar Tipps, wie ich am besten in die Altstadt komme und was ich mir unbedingt anschauen sollte. Das Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist meiner Meinung nach äußerst gut. :)
Affordable bed in Porto, close to the metro. Nuno welcomed me after arriving late at night, he seemed like a sympathetic guy.

I wanted to see how the e-house worked and was set up.  It was a great experience having the elevated IKEA bed in a small room. Room is better than picture with a desk under the bed. The simple, efficient room worked well for keeping my stuff. Kitchen was well equipped. Host was very clear in communication and available for questions. I will go back and recommend e-houses when you need a room in Porto.

Buona accoglienza e disponibilità del proprietario. Nuno fa il possibile per venire in contro alle esigenze degli ospiti. La casa è grande e accogliente anche se purtroppo è ubicata praticamente su una sorta di circonvallazione con traffico sostenuto anche di notte e quindi molto rumorosa.  Per il resto tutto come da descrizione.
Der Gastgeber war hilfsbereit und nett. Das Zimmer war klein, aber fein und so, wie ich es mir vorgestellt hatte. Der einzige Nachteil war der Verkehrslärm.
Excelente atención, Nuno el afitrión excelente disposición, el servicio de la casa muy bueno, recomiendo ir el fin de semana ya que el metro funciona las 24 hrs. Recomendable y mucho.

Nice and clean place, a bit far away from the city but there is a metro station 5 minutes away. I walked most of the time from the city and to the city and was a nice walk. On the way many things to explore.
Perfect house with big spaces and not far from center! Everything was perfect! Just a bit noisy because it is close to the motorway! Very frienly staff and guest! Love it!

name: Square Saint-Louis.
summary: Opening on to a peaceful street at the front and a flowery alleyway at the back, the first floor of a warm, centuries-old house awaits you, at the heart of the action in the city of Quebec. Sherbrooke Metro station is 656 feet away from the house. Bus stops may be found a few hundred feet away from the building.
space: Three elements make our apartment stand out: The ideal location, the area, and the apartment itself. Montreal is a city which is easily accessible on foot, but you can also cycle, and public transport is ok... if you are staying in an area that is well connected to the shopping districts, academic institutions and the city center. Which is the case for our apartment. The Plateau Mont-Royal area is renowned. It is huge. The neighborhood of Carré Saint-Louis is without a doubt the most popular area because of the perfect blend of charming houses, vibrant streets and incredible green spaces. Nestled between the Lafontaine park and the Mont-Royal, our local square, with its fountain and its pavilion where you can enjoy an espresso, is unique. It opens on to the pedestrian district of Prince-Arthur which connects the popular streets of Saint-Denis and Saint-Laurent.
description: Opening on to a peaceful street at the front and a flowery alleyway at the back, the first floor of a warm, centuries-old house awaits you, at the heart of the action in the city of Quebec. Sherbrooke Metro station is 656 feet away from the house. Bus stops may be found a few hundred feet away from the building. Three elements make our apartment stand out: The ideal location, the area, and the apartment itself. Montreal is a city which is easily accessible on foot, but you can also cycle, and public transport is ok... if you are staying in an area that is well connected to the shopping districts, academic institutions and the city center. Which is the case for our apartment. The Plateau Mont-Royal area is renowned. It is huge. The neighborhood of Carré Saint-Louis is without a doubt the most popular area because of the perfect blend of charming houses, vibrant streets and incredible green spaces. Nestled between the Lafontaine park and the Mont-Royal, our local square, with its fountai
neighborhood_overview: Sorry for the other listings, but it's true: there is nowhere better to stay in Montreal than this part of the Plateau, between the streets of Saint-Denis and Saint-Laurent, and Sherbrooke and Mont-Royal.
transit: The Metro is 495 feet away. The taxi rank is 410 feet away. The self-service bike stations are only 330 feet away. 165 feet away, there are two bus stops. And less than a foot away are your feet, which are by far the best mode of transport in this area where there are hundreds of stores, cafés, museums, galleries, restaurants, and bars all within a perimeter of 3km2.
access: The apartment enjoys its own private entrance, at the front and the back of the property, both entrances are very secure. It features its own intimate private terrace.
interaction: We know the city perfectly well and what's going on, but we can also suggest things to do outside of the city.
house_rules: Les fumeurs sont priés de se prêter à leur activité à l'extérieur de la maison. De plus, nous offrons à nos hôtes un environnement paisible que nous souhaitons préserver. Aussi, en retour pour le voisinage exceptionnel dont nous vous faisons bénéficier, nous n'autorisons pas la réception d'invités qui risqueraient de nuire à cet environnement.

host.host_about:
Montréal, Québec
Occupé, aime voyager

reviews.comments:
Richard et sa femme m'ont très bien accueillie en m'indiquant tous les magasins proches et les musées intéressants sur Montréal. L'appartement est bien meublé avec beaucoup d'équipements, il est situé dans une rue très calme mais proche du métro et de la rue Saint-Denis et il dispose d'un petit jardin bien agréable quand il fait chaud.
J'y ai passé un excellent séjour.

Des hôtes très courtois et professionnels qui offre un superbe logement propre, confortable et très bien situé.
Séjour agréable assuré !

Gran experiencia.
Richard y Martina han sido unos anfitriones maravillosos.
El apartamento es aun mejor que en las fotos. El baño también está muy bien, aunque no aparezca su foto.
Esta muy bien situado, cerca de todos los lugares importantes para visitar.
Muy limpio y con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días estupendos.
Totalmente recomendable!!!

We had a great time staying in Richards apartment. Great location (close to everything, but also very quiet and peaceful), well equipped and very comfortable. The hosts live upstairs and were always helpful, respectful and very accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!
Excellent! Great apartment for two couples, neighborhood full of good restaurants and stores, near the metro station. The host was very nice with us, and gave to us useful tips.

Richard et Martine, qui vivent au dessus, sont accueillants, discrets et ont ete conciliants sur les horaires ( nous avons pu rester plus tard ayant un vol le soir). L appartement a du charme, est bien équipé, et dispose d un cour extérieure. La rue est tres calme tout en étant à proximité d un quartier sympa et animé (restos, boutiques....) excellente adresse pour un séjour à Montréal.

Nous avons passé un superbe séjour Montréalais, en grande partie grâce à la situation idéale de l'appartement (une petite maison en réalité car nous avions un jardinet). Nous pouvions tout faire à pied et surtout profiter de l'animation sans égale du Plateau. Accueil extrêmement chaleureux de Martine, appartement très bien équipé, nous ne manquions de rien et nous sentions chez nous. Notre plus belle expérience Air BnB à ce jour. Nous recommandons sans aucune hésitation. Merci beaucoup.

Nous avons passé un très agréable séjour (6 jours fin aout début septembre 2015), dans le charmant appartement de Richard. Idéalement situé dans le quartier résidentiel de Montroyal et dans une rue très calme, mais également jouxtant le centre ville et le quartier latin, cet appartement a tous les avantages que l'on peut espérer : spacieux, arrangé avec beaucoup de gout et de personnalité, tous les équipements possibles pour la cuisine et le confort, avec des chambres très calmes, un petit jardin ensoleillé où l'on peut prendre son petit déjeuner et repas en se sentant vraiment en vacances. Nos hotes ont été prévenants et discrets, si nous revenons à Montréal, nous espérons pouvoir à nouveau habiter dans ce merveilleux appartement.

Communication with the host was excellent.
The listing was accurate.  Great neighborhood, very convenient to metro, bus, shopping and plenty of variety for places to eat and drink. .  Next to a beautiful park in a safe neighborhood.  Very comfortable mattress and bedding. Bathroom was newly remodeled.  Very clean and comfortable.

Logement très agréable bien équipé et idéalement situé sur le plateau Mont Royal.
Produits de première nécessité disponibles sur place 
Richard et Martine sont accueillants et trés discrets
Un bémol avec le cinquième couchage qui est proposé :le canapé lit est tres vétuste et inconfortable (matelas taché)

Thank you to Richard and his wife for hosting us in Montreal, it was a lovely week. The house was clean and well equipped with a rustic hardwood-ambiance, located on a quiet street. Richard took the time to ensure our car was parked correctly on the highly regulated Montreal streets and his wife was incredibly sweet and lent me a travel backpack for our biking excursions. The beds were wonderful, as was the bathroom and water pressure. The house is very well situated by a lovely square and close to the Metro and several shops, restaurants and cafes. Anyone would do well to spend their vacation here.

Richard is an amazing host who made us feel welcomed in his beautiful suite. He gave us a detailed tour and valuable directions & info about the neighbourhood. Both bedrooms were confortable and the condo had everything you could think of to make you feel at home.
Great people and place.

Tant avant d'arriver, par les échanges de mails, qu'au moment de notre arrivée sur place, Richard et son épouse ont été attentifs à nos interrogations.
Leur accueil a été très agréable.
L'appartement est très bien situé sur le plateau et à proximité du métro.
Il est très propre et entretenu, et parfaitement équipé.
Nous nous sommes sentis chez nous.

Richard nous a bien accueilli mes collègues et moi lors de notre arrivée. Le superbe logement est situé dans une petite rue tranquille d'un quartier très central de Montréal. L'endroit est idéal pour les voyageurs qui veulent découvrir la vie montréalaise à pied et sans tracas. Des hôtes attentionnés à visiter!

Richard was a fantastic host! To start off, he was very accommodating with check in and allowed us to access the home beforehand. He also told us a bit about the neighborhood history and gave us lots of tips and recommendations in Montreal. When we arrived at the home, it was beautiful and clean just like in the pictures. The home was equipped with everything we needed to feel right at home. The neighborhood is also very centrally located, close to a lot of restaurants, shops, and a grocery store. We slept four very comfortably in the home, I definitely recommend Richard's home if you are visiting Montreal!

The apartment was in a nice central location on a quiet street.  Everything you could need for a few days stay was available.  We appreciated that the place was clean, tastefully furnished, and well maintained.

The parking available is on the street.  Montreal experienced moderate snowfall, which made parking a little adventurous due to changes in the parking rules to accommodate street clearing.  Was not really a problem for us, but for those unfamiliar with the cryptic parking regulations of most cities, this could be a little daunting.

This place is a jewel! Fantastic location: near restaurants, transport links, bars, shops, and the lovely parc La Fontaine. It is spotless, well-equipped, and quiet. I stayed there as I needed to be near L'UQAM and la grande bibliotheque for work, and I have friends in the neighbourhood. It was really perfect for me, and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again.

This is a wonderful place to stay. It is clean and safe, plus centrally located on Le Plateau. I was within walking distance (20 min.) to McGill U and 10 mins to Le Metro. The apt is spacious and warm. St. Denis is a 1/2 block to the North with plenty of Restaurants. I loved this place and can't wait to stay again!

My friends and I had an amazing stay here! It is in the perfect location, just a minute walk from the nearest metro station, a wonderful bakery and a 24 hour grocery store. The apartment was furnished with everything we needed and was incredibly charming. The Plateau neighborhood was very friendly and has countless restaurants and bars to offer. Parking was also free and very convenient on the street directly in front of the apartment. Richard was also kind enough to help us remove our car from the snow when it got stuck as we were leaving from our stay. Overall, I could not have asked for more hospitality, or a better place to stay in Montréal!

Richard's apartment is located in a wonderful neighborhood in Montreal, and within walking distance from at least two amazing bakeries and numerous restaurants and cafes. The apartment itself is beautiful and super comfortable. It has everything you could need for a great stay, including a fully outfitted kitchen. Richard and his wife are so kind and helpful. I would highly recommend staying here, and intend to do so as long as it is available the next time I am in Montreal.

Les dialogues sur internet, son savoir sur Montréal et ces environs, ainsi que la documentation que nous avons trouvés sur place.
Logement bien situé et facilité de trouver les transports en commun.

Richard and his wife were wonderful hosts during our stay in Montreal. They were always helpful in recommending places of interest and giving directions. I was travelling with my 11 month old daughter during our stay and Richard went above and beyond to ensure we felt right at home, even provided a portable crib and high chair. The apartment itself is equipped with anything you could possibly need and just minutes from metro, bakeries and grocery stores. Situated in the plateau on a quiet street. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Richard responded promptly to our questions and provided easy access.  The listing was as pictured only nicer. The kitchen was equipped with everything imaginable.  For anyone with mobility issues this is the perfect place.  Everything you can ask for:  comfy beds, individual room controls for heat, updated kitchen and bath with ample hot water, and charming décor.  Spotlessly clean.
The neighborhood  seemed perfectly safe.  Parking is city parking so be sure to read the signs.

Richard est un hôte de qualité! 
Echanges faciles avant et pendant notre séjour, partage de bons plans dans les environs, accueil très sympathique!

Le logement est parfaitement situé, très bien équipé, propre, fonctionnel...Rien à redire!

En résumé, une location à recommander pour visiter idéalement Montréal.

We had a  lovely week long stay in the first floor apartment.  It was beautifully and thoughtfully furnished with a small garden in back and very convenient to the Metro, shopping and restaurants.  Richard greeted us our first night and gave us useful information about local shops and restaurants.  We would gladly stay here again.
Service and amenities were fantastic. The place itself is incredible and of course the location is great!

We spent a week in Richard and Martine's place in Montréal and found it everything we could have hoped for.  Situated close to transportation or for walking to and about Le Plateau and surrounding areas, it is a the type of lodging Montréal is famous for.  If you know the city then you already know Le Carré Saint-Louis and its ideal location.  And if you are new to Montreál, you will not find a greater introduction to really living like a local while still having all the tourist areas so close at hand.  I have been to this city countless times for my work and for personal pursuits and would choose this apartment far above any other place I have stayed.  Thanks Richard and Martine for providing such a lovely home away from home.

Perfect apartment, perfect location, perfect hosts! We stayed in Richard's stylish and cozy apartment for a week in early July, and have nothing but praise. The location in Plateau Mont-Royal is great. In a quiet street with two-story buildings, close to a nice park in a vibrant and great neighbourhood. Downtown is only a 30 minute walk away. With Plateau and Parc Mont-Royal within walking distance in the other direction. And a metro stop close by if you need to go further - or if you don't want to walk. Richard was very helpful with advice and tips, and made us feel very welcome. We travelled as a family of four, with two boys in their teens. The apartment worked out very good for us. On an evening with unexpected rain, we had no problem retreating to the apartment to relax there. Plateau was without doubt the right district to stay on our first visit to Montréal. Relaxed, informal and easygoing. Full of charm and character. Picturesque buildings, good restaurants, and an area where we felt totally safe. If this is what you're looking for, we're pretty sure you will be just as satisfied as we were with this apartment.
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Un grand merci à Martine et Richard pour cette location en plein cœur de Montréal. Nous venons de passer 15 jours dans cet appartement qui fut notre "camp de base" pour découvrir une partie de cette merveilleuse province qu'est le Québec.
L'appartement est idéalement situé, dans une rue paisible de "Plateau" donnant sur l'adorable square "Carré Saint-Louis" et à proximité des rues animées du centre-ville et du Vieux Montréal : tous les incontournables de Montréal sont accessibles à pied et/ou en Bixi !
L'appartement offre tous les équipements d'une habitation très confortable et la literie est excellente. On s'y sent vraiment bien !
Martine et Richard sont des hôtes remarquables par leur hospitalité, leurs conseils avisés, leur culture et leur gentillesse.
C'est, sans aucun doute, l'adresse que nous choisirons à nouveau lorsque nous reviendrons à Montréal et nous la recommandons sans réserve !

Excellent accueil de Richard et sa femme, très bons conseils de restaurants, visites etc...
L'appartement est très calme et confortable, une véritable perle !
Je recommande vivement pour un séjour dans cette superbe ville de Montréal.

Nous avons passe une très agréable semaine à Montreal. Le quartier est particulierement agréable proche de tout. La rue est très calme.
Le logement est très agréable et bien équipé.
Nos hôtes ont été très agréables

Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine .Le logement très bien placé  prés du métro, dépanneur ,resto, pas loin du centre ville. Quartier  très tranquille .Il y a tout ce qu'il faut dans l'appartement et c'est très propre. Le propriétaire très sympa .

Richard goes out of his way to welcome you to his apartment. He makes himself available so you are not isolated in a new city. He gives you helpful hints about what Montreal has to offer. He is interested in hearing about your concerns or needs. I really liked the location near the Square Saint-Louis; it is very central and there are so many places within walking distance. I appreciated the dishwasher and the tastefully decorated space. The beds were comfortable and I used the back outdoor sitting area for a good read.

Richard was an amazing host. He was accommodating when are arrival plans changed, and extremely helpful in providing us his thoughts on best places to see around Montreal. The space was perfect; clean, welcoming, and the location can't be beat. Will be recommending Richard to anyone looking to visit!
the apt is clean, close to the Metro, many shops around, good communication, good beds, nice and quiet neighbourhood, and if you need there is good heating.

Un incroyable séjour si je devais résumé nos 5 nuits passées !

L une des mes plus belles location d air bnb a ce jour !

- l appartement en lui même :
 Très bien situé , a 5 min du métro Sherbrooke au cœur même de Montreal et a mi chemin du mont royal et des rues animés/ marchés de la ville !
Pratique et commode à souhait .
Description parfaite de l appart , grand scpacieux et fonctionnel , très bien équipé nous n avons manqué de rien !

Les proprio :
Très aimable et nous on fournit des conseils sur la ville ( merci pour le match de football Richard :) )
Très arrangeant et flexible suite à des faveurs demande .

Je recommande cet appartement à tous les futurs visiteurs de montreal !

El barrio es muy lindo y queda cerca de todo. Está muy bien ubicado. La casa es cómoda, coincide perfectamente con la descripción del anuncio. Tanto Richard como Martine fueron muy hospitalarios y amables en su trato. Nos brindaron información que nos resultó muy útil.

Nous avons passé un super séjour !!!
Notre hôte a été très agréable et de bons conseils. Le logement est très bien situé, proximité du métro, des commerces.....
Nous recommandons vivement !

Richard a toujours était à l'écoute de nos demandes, il a vraiment facilité notre arrivée et nous avons été heureux d'échanger lui . Le logement se situe dans un endroit très charmant et calme. Le métro est à peine à 2 minutes à pied. Tout est mis en place pour passer un agréable séjour.
Merci encore pour l'acceuil
Appartement spacieux, confortable et tout équipé! Un havre de repos situé au cœur de l'action montréalaise. C'est un plaisir à chaque fois.

Richard was very welcoming and accommodating. The apartment has every amenity. The location couldn't be better -- just off one of the most charming squares in the city and dead central. Even our Montreal friends were impressed by the place.

The house is excellent and comfortable. It is very close to the metro station and has several restaurants close by.

In a matter of space, the house bears two couples comfortably. We did not miss any household utensils and the heating system was able to handle the low temperature.

Richard, is a nice and helpful person. We helped in everything that was needed, in addition to demonstrating an excellent knowledge about the city and the history of Province.

If I return to Montreal, I will definitely try to stay there again

Logement très bien situé et exactement avec tout ce que nous avions besoin. De plus Richard est très courtoie et très attentif au gens qui loue chez lui. Il nous a très bien acceuillit et à répondu a toutes nos questions.

Je recommande cet appartement à tous. Nous avons séjournée à 3 reprises et à chaque fois c'est le même constat, parfait pour nous. Lorsque nous en aurons l'occasion, nous reviendrons chez Patrac avec grand plaisir.
The place is incredible as well as the hosts. The house was well furnished and contains everything you need. The house is also well located, near downtown but far from the noise! Awesome trip!
Très bel emplacement et très agréable séjour au cœur de Montréal avec un hôte attentif, très sympathique  et prévenant. Merci

Excellent séjour chez Martine et Richard ! Appartement typiquement Montréalais, très bien situé et particulièrement bien équipé. 
Richard et Martine se sont montrés très accueillant et attentifs au bon déroulement de notre séjour.

Très bon emplacement, proche du Métro.
Rue très paisible.
L'appartement est très bien adapté à une visite touristique de Montréal.

Richard was an amazing host! He was very helpful and accommodating. The apartment is a great space. It was very comfortable. It was clean, awesome layout and close to everywhere you want to be! The street is quiet but it is exactly where you want to be from downtown & the plateau. I highly recommend staying here and hope to return this summer.

beau logement, très bien situé.
très bon accueil de Martine & Richard.
Fantastic flat in a great convenient location. Richard welcomed us gladly with loads of local history and suggestions. Montreal and Montrealera were super friendly and festive .

We really enjoyed our 9 nights stay here. Very quiet, perfect for 2 couples.  Clean with plenty of room and had everything you need for a pleasant stay.  We took part in the Go Bike Montreal Festival and the apartment was close to starting points.  Limited street parking but we managed to park close by most days - be wary of the confusing parking signs.  Host was very helpful.  We definitely recommend this place!!
Martine & Richard after great hosts that will help you navigate the neighborhood. Fantastic city Anne we'll return soon

This is a great place for two couples to stay and still have privacy as the bedrooms are separated. They're also quite spacious. There is only one shared closet, but we managed just fine. Richard filled us in on the history of the area and the house when he greeted us right after our arrival. The kitchen had everything we needed (except a teapot!). The bathroom is a good size. There was lots of space everywhere in the house so we weren't tripping over each other. It was great to have a private outdoor space. Everything is on the ground floor, so there were no flights of stairs to climb. We very much enjoyed our experience in our first stay in an AirBnB. We would highly recommend this unit for anyone looking for a great place to stay in a historic area of Montreal.

Richard and his wife's place was great! Three of us were attending a scientific conference downtown and wanted to have a true Montreal experience so we wanted to stay in the Plateau region. Their place is located in a beautiful neighbourhood and on a quiet street. Popular Saint Denis St is just around the corner and a convenient Metro stop (Sherbrooke) is nearby. Communicating with Richard was spot on and the apartment itself surpassed expectations. I would highly recommend their place to anyone. Merci!

This apartment is a real gem. It's in a fantastic, walkable neighbourhood and close to all the amenities you could want, including transit. The space was exceptionally clean and very comfortable. The beds were really comfy too. Richard was a great host. Even though he was out of town at the time, we had no issues accessing the apartment etc. This was hands down one of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.

Location parfaite, très propre, dans une rue plein de charme et près de tout.
Très bonne communication avec Richard. Très bon accueil. Richard est très disponible et très réactif au moindre problème (petit soucis de wifi réglé très rapidement).

Concernant le parking, il est en effet possible de se garer dans la rue, gratuitement. Mais il faut savoir que les places sont très rares et qu'il faut changer la voiture de côté 2 fois par semaines car la ville nettoie les trottoirs.

Logement bien situé comme indiqué dans la description de Richard. Malgré sa proximité du centre ville, il est situé dans un quartier très calme. Martine et Richard sont de très bon conseil pour bien visiter Montréal.

Richard est juste généralissime !! Jamais vu un host aussi parfait !! C'était un plaisir immense de discuter avec lui et de vivre dans son logement !

L'emplacement est au top du top, juste à coté de la rue Saint Denis (la partie piétonne) et du metro SHERBROOKE ! SUPER calme et y'a même un chat et un hamster qui sont venus nous rendre visite. :)

Je recommande à 1000 % !

The apartment was clean and incredibly conveniently located. There are many restaurants and cocktail bars nearby.  The metro and several bus lines are less than a 10 minute walk away. Richard has also compiled an extensive list of things to do, eat, and see. Great place. I would definitely stay here again.

Emplacement en or 
Appartement très agréable

The apartment was spacious and very comfortable. The location was so central and the neighbourhood is beautiful. The host Richard was very accommodating, it was the best AirBnb stay that we have ever had. I highly recommend it!

Une adresse à recommander à plusieurs titres. 
D'abord car l'appartement est idéalement placé, à seulement une centaine de mètres du métro Sherbrooke, à deux pas de rues typiques de Montréal comme Saint Denis, Saint Laurent ou la partie piétonne de Prince Arthur, le tout juste à côté des splendides demeures XIXe du square Saint Louis. 
Ensuite parce que l'appartement est irréprochable : tout confort, propre et superbement décoré. A noter: l'absence de télé, déplorée par les enfants, applaudie par les parents.
Enfin, les propriétaires sont à l'image de la réputation l'hospitalité des Québécois : chaleureux, gentils et accueillants. À leur contact, vous profiterez de mille et un conseils et anecdotes sur Montréal et le Québec.

Bien des choses positives à dire sur ce séjour : on se sent chez soi dans cette agréable maison située au coeur d'un quartier animé et très central, mais dans une rue calme et tranquille. L'appartement est au rez-de-chaussée, ce qui nous a semblé bien pratique (et par contre le rend assez sombre, son seul inconvénient). Espace, confort, de quoi cuisiner vraiment. Tous commerces à proximité, ainsi que le métro. Les propriétaires se sont montrés très accommodants et nous ont conseillés à plusieurs reprises (activités, lieux). Lieu idéal pour 2 couples.

This is a great apartment located on a quiet side street with a nice park steps away, a vibrant shopping area in the other direction and only a couple minutes walk from bus stops and a Metro station which will get you just about anywhere you want to go. The hosts live next door and will be there to assist if needed but otherwise let you enjoy your privacy. Particularly desirable for our 9 day visit was the fully equiped kitchen which allowed the option to eat out or not.
Great place, very well equipped with everything you'd want. Fantastic location, very easy to get anywhere. Came with some great recommendations of places to visit as well
Lovely apartment in a terrific neighborhood, close to bus and metro. Amazing host. Good kitchen space if you want to cook.

Fantastic home and location. Everything we needed was walking distance and the neighbourhood was perfect. Richard and his wife was a fantastic host and very helpful. Richard introduced himself the next day we checked in and provided us with lots of information about where to access things and how to get there. Thank you Richard it was the best air Bnb experience we had

We (my husband, my daughter, 16 years, and I) came from Germany to visit Montreal for sightseeing. 
The apartment is fantastic, the decor is very individual and beautiful, it fits perfectly to the house. It is very well equipped with everything you want. 
Richard has made the extra effort and picked out for us individual tips for sightseeing. He is very helpful and  friendly. The communication was absolutely perfect. Thank you so much!
The entire neighborhood is the most beautiful area of Montreal, so sightseeing starts directly at the front door of the apartment. I liked the area and the apartment and everything very much and would definitely book the apartment again whenever I come back to Montreal. 

Claudia

Montreal is a wonderful city. Richard and Martine made our month-long stay in Montreal better. They provided great local information and historical perspective of a marvelous city. The apartment was everything we could have hoped for. We enthusiastically recommend this place and its hosts. Merci!

Richard’s place is in a fabulous location and we loved exploring the area. We hardly left the neighbourhood and enjoyed all that it had to offer. The accommodation wa so clean and had everything we needed. We had two younger children with us and it was wonderful to have all the cooking and laundry needs available.  Richard was extremely helpful when we arrived with lots of tips and helpful suggestions on where to go and what to do. We would definitely return when we come back to this great city!
The AirBnB is perfectly located in the hip Plateau neighbourhood that features awesome restaurants. The neighbourhood architecture around St Louis Square is gorgeous. It was like being in a postcard.
Everything you think to have at home is available, too friendly people, accessible for all your needs, you feel at your own home.

Espaço formidavel. Perto de muitas opções para comer, se divertir, etc. Richard é bastante atencioso e sabe muito sobre a cidade, com dicas incriveis! Pudemos conhecer o verdadeiro espirito de Montreal. Certamente voltariamos, havendo a oportunidade.
Richard est un hôte parfait qui aime sa ville et son quartier et sait les faire aimer. Une adresse à recommander chaudement

I recomend Richard's house. Clean, confortable and close to everything in town.
Thank you Richard...

Une superbe adresse très bien placé et proche de tous. Richard et sa femme son très accueillant.
L’appartement reste très calme et il est à côté des meilleurs quartiers de Montréal. Je recommande a 200%

Bel appartement dans un très beau quartier. On peut  visiter Montréal centre ville, vieille ville et parc Mont Royal à pied. Le métro n’ est pas loin non plus. Richard nous a donné beaucoup d’informations utiles sur des restos, magasins etc. Parking facile dans la rue.

This apartment is ideally situated close to a metro station, has many restaurants within walking distance and has a host who manages to find the perfect balance between attentiveness and discretion. A great place to stay!

Excellent logement à Montréal avec une entrée facile grâce à un casier a code pour récupérer les clefs.  Richard et sa famille sont tres accueillants. La propreté du logement était excellente et l'emplacement idéal sans voiture. Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir !

Richard's place was exactly what I was looking for. On returning in the evenings after being out and about, walking in always felt like "home". A lot of care is put into this dwelling to make guests' stay comfortable, pleasant and easy. 
The location is perfect - I walked to Old Montreal every day, about 20-25 minutes - depends on what you wish to do along the way. Parking was also very easy and Richard's explanations/instructions were precise and correct.
I would definitely stay here again for the value, aesthetics and location.

We very much enjoyed our stay at Richard's apartment. It was the perfect space for our family (two bedrooms, kitchen, and laundry in particular). We loved our purchases from Mamie Clafoutis - thank you for the recommendation - and we were similarly thrilled with the walkability of the neighborhood and proximity to public transit. Thank you!

une très bonne communication
un logement très très propre
une décoration impeccable
équipement parfait
emplacement top
bref allez-y les yeux fermés

The place to be à Montreal :) ! Parfaitement situé, à proximité des lieux à visiter, des bonnes adresses, souvent recommandées par Richard, pour goûter à toutes les spécialités de cette province riche et généreuse. Un accueil particulièrement sympathique donc avec en plus un petit coin de jardin pour y prendre le (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande vivement!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here!  Richard was a wonderful host,  very friendly and helpful. The apartment is in a perfect location!  It's a five minute walk to the metro.  The place was comfortable and the kitchen had everything you need.  We would definitely stay here again.  We especially enjoyed being able to sit in the Square St. Louis, enjoying beautiful weather and relaxing from a day of sightseeing.

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans le logement de Richard et Martine.Le logement est idéalement situé dans Montreal un quartier trés sympa. Nous le conseillons. Richard et Martine sont des personnes intérresantes et plein de bons conseils.

Richard's listing is a lovely apartment on a quiet street that is still close enough to the action that everything is walkable. Though there is a metro station that's less than a five minute walk if you don't feel like walking. Richard and his wife Martine were very helpful when we checked in, and gave us a tour of the listing and offered lots of great advice for seeing the best parts of Montreal. They were also available whenever we needed them. I highly recommend this listing for anyone coming to Montreal. You'd be hard-pressed to do better.

Richard was a fantastic host. The place was clean and had everything you'd need. Close distance to the Metro made things so much better too. The neighborhood is awesome with a lot of restaurants and shops in the area should you not want to stray too far. You'll make a great choice staying here!

This is a lovely rental- incredibly central and yet very quiet ( with some footsteps and early morning activity), use of the back garden for morning coffee, a great selection of pots and pans and a homey feel. An amazing bakery is located close by and we were very comfortable with our family of 4. The comfy chair in the living room could use replacement soon. We would stay here again!

Richard's apartment is clean, eclectic, and easy to get to. It is in an ideal location in the awesome Plateau neighborhood but is within walking distance of Old Montreal, Downtown, and other neighborhoods. Everything we needed was at the apartment along with a sweet backyard patio to enjoy a break from the day. Richard is a really nice guy and he even took the time to give us a bunch of great recommendations about what to check out in Montreal, many of which we did end up exploring. We would highly recommend staying at Richard's place and hope to return someday!

so convenient. It is just a very short walk to the Metro and sooo easy to get around. Lots of great places to shop and eat within easy walking distance too. We walked up Mt Royale our last morning--fantastic.
Estuvimos muy contentos, es un lugar muy agradable para pasear por Montreal.

Un emplacement unique au milieu de toutes les commodités. L’appartement est propre et permet d’accueillir deux couples ou un couple avec enfant. Un hôte remarquable et soucieux de nos demandes. Séjour vraiment top.
Richard est un hôte très sympathique qui a plein de bonnes adresses et d'anecdotes à donner à ses hôtes. L'appartement est idéalement placé à côté du square st-louis. C'était un super séjour.
Parfait

Idéalement placé , au calme , l'appartement de Richard et
Martine est décoré et équipé avec goût et des matériaux de grande qualité . Sans compter leur acceuil exceptionnel  et conseils avisés qui donnent  du relief à ce séjour à Montréal. 
Nous recommandons vivement ces hôtes.

Super appart dans un quartier parfait, proche du métro, de plein de restaurants et bars.
Accueil très chaleureux de Richard et Martina, plein de bons conseils et à l’écoute de leurs hôtes.
Beaucoup d’équipements dans l’appartement, tout le nécessaire pour un super séjour.
Allez y les yeux fermés!

tres bel appartement dans une rue calme proche du square St Louis, du métro et de la gare routière. La literie est extrêmement confortable et la cuisine hyper équipée. Richard est très prévenant et nous a donné de bons conseils lors de notre escapade à Québec. Je  recommande son logement idéal pour 3 personnes.

Hello Richard and Martine! 

Your accommodations were ideal and the location of your apartment was the perfect starting point for our adventures. We loved our visit to your beautiful city!
great place! location...location...location...great!!!

Absolutely great location five minutes to the subway with local bakery, depanneur, bar etc. Lovely apartment, very cosy with bedrooms at opposite ends which was nice for privacy. A truly authentic Montreal neighbourhood. Highly recommend.

This is a lovely apartment and great location for exploring Montreal.  Very close to the orange line and walking distance to many outstanding restaurants. The hosts were fantastic and made every aspect of our stay outstanding. I would highly recommend the Richard's place.

Richard's apartment is well-situated in the Plateau, very close to Sherbrooke metro station and all amenities.  The place was perfectly clean and beds very comfortable.  I especially appreciated Richard accommodating my earlier than expected arrival and prompt email responses.  I will be staying there again!
Belle maison , bien située. Bon accueil.
Très bel endroit, situé stratégiquement pour découvrir Montréal. Nous y avions séjourné 2016 et nous n'avons que de bons mots cette année encore.
Very clean and well located place. Richard is a very good host!
Nice appartement, good location and great recommendations from the host!
Excelente ubicación, buenas recomendaciones de parte de Richard, quién estuvo siempre atento a nuestras necesidades.

What a perfect place to see Montreal from.  Richard and his wife went the extra mile to make our Christmas holiday perferct...complete with real Christmas tree.  The apartment was completely and thoughtfully finished so we could cook a modest Christmas meal.  The apartment is centrally located to walk and metro throughout the entire city.  Everything was comfy and cozy.  We would stay again should we return.  Many thanks.

Richard‘s apartment is clean and well-organized, with plenty of towels, toilet paper, sheets, and room to live. On top of that, they answer questions quickly and in detail, and the location is convenient.

name: Gallery´s Street House
summary: Art spot! Miguel Bombarda is the Porto Art street, it has 20 art galleries, that makes it the main cultural neighborhood in town. You´ll find also some of the most trendy second hand, vintage & designer clothes stores. Next to coffees, amazing restaurants, tea houses and supermarkets. A 2 minutes walk form Crystal Palace, a gorgeous park with romantic gardens, free art exhibitions, free concerts and with some of the bests views in town. Quiet during night and local live during day time.
space: Our rooms are sunny, romantic and private. The main room is large and the high selling is unique. The house is form 1869 and has the charm of a old Portuguese house with the outside and inside tiles. The inside stairs have natural light. The Bathroom is private. And the second room has a sleeping sofa, perfect for a group of four, two couples, friends or a small family. We have a fridge, a microwave , a toaster, a kettle , cups, cutlery, plates and mugs. We have also a baby bed and if you need something extra just let us know that we will do everything in our had to make it happen! :) There is an Art Gallery in the ground floor, with a lovely garden that you can use when the gallery is open. If you are an art lover or an artist this place is for you!! :)

You´ll find also some of the most trendy second hand, vintage & designer clothes stores. Next to coffees, amazing restaurants, tea houses and supermarkets. neighborhood_overview: Bombarda Street is one of the main cultural arteries of Porto, comprising of dozens of Art Galleries. There are simultaneously inaugurations of new exhibitions every six weeks, attracting crowds of artists and art lovers, indeed the street puts the Portuguese contemporary art scene on the map. The street is also known for its independent shops with alternative and retro-cool furniture, decoration and design. This is a vibrant street where you can feel the cosmopolitan atmosphere running through old buildings. The street stretches from opposite to the Crystal Palace street to Cedofeita street, so it is also very convenient to go from the blooming gardens of Palácio de Cristal to do some shopping at Cedofeita area. Miguel Bombarda street is lovely, with diversity of spaces, alternative shops and restaurants, making it quite unique. It is also a local neighborhood, so you can live the Porto life here. There is Centro Comercial Bombarda (Bombarda Shopping Mall) an small unconventional spac
notes: We have also some extras: -Airport transportation. -Yoga classes. -Porto tours. If you need any additional services, please let us know.
transit: Direct bus from/to airport [bus 601 - exit at Palácio de Cristal or bus 602 exit at Miguel Bombarda]  Carolina Michaelis Metro Station: 10 minutes walk.  São Bento Train Station (16thcentury): 18 minutes walk  Palácio de Cristal (Gardens): 2 minutes walk  Avenida dos Aliados (downtown avenue): 15 minutes walk  Casa da Música (Boavista): 17 minutes walk  Ribeira and Douro river: 20 minutes walk  Bars and clubs: 7 minutes walk
access: The check in is after 3.00 pm and flexible until 21 pm, but we always need to plane it on advanced.  The check out is at 11.00 am, flexible if we don´t have any guests arriving. We will try to find a way to storage your luggage before check-in or after check-out .
interaction: We are happy to give tips to our guests. We will provide the informations that you need and a Porto map; tourist buildings, places to visit, the trendiest bars and restaurants.  We love to make our guest feel like home, so if there is something that is missing or not in your pleasure, please let us know!
house_rules: We want to believe that you will take care of our home as it yours.  The house is in a quite neighborhood, so please be careful with noise after 10 pm. Please, turn off all lights and heaters when you leave the room. No smoking inside. Thank you!

host.host_about: We are a couple of artists, a painter and a photographer. We love to travel, meet new people and cultures. We love all kinds of Art forms. We enjoy to live in Porto and experience what the city can offer. We enjoy going to art shows, to dance,to the cinema and the theater. The house is from 1869 and is where we work. The is an art gallery in the first floor, a photography studio in the second floor, and a painting studio on the third floor. We have a Vw beetle for private tours in Porto.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments: I am absolutely in love with Porto. I could live there. And we chose a fantastic place. Upon our arrival the room wasn't quite yet ready, so Mariana's mother took us, by car, on a tour around the city. It was fantastic, as we were able to see more than we would have been able to cover on foot in two days. The apartment itself was lovely: simple, clean, and decorated with Mariana's own beautiful artwork. There is no kitchen, but M&J provided some fruit and water, and it's a five minute walk to cafés and restaurants. The apartment is above their gallery and located in a wonderful artistic district. We spent one wonderful day in particular exploring the old city, walking the bridge, riding cable cars, and tasting port across the river. We also ate a fantastic dinner at a restaurant called Portugalia (on the beach, near where the river meets the sea). M&J were very attentive, helpful, and friendly. You will enjoy staying in this little, artistic piece of Porto :)

Fomos recebidos com muita simpatia e atenção. Os anfitriões colocarem-se à disposição para qualquer necessidade. O apartamento é muito aconchegante e tem ótima localização. Porto é uma cidade lindíssima, com muitos bares, gente bonita e lugares para visitar.

The flat is exactly the same in the picture, very nice and well located. We only used old tram to go to the coast, the rest of the city can be explored by walk. But the only negative point is the insulation which is quite bad, so it's noisy during the night.
Mariana is a very nice host and takes care of us. She is welcoming, disponible and gave us advices about things to see, to do and to eat :)
We recommend this flat to you !

Mein Freund und ich haben eine Woche in Porto bei Mariana und Joao verbracht - und es war toll!
Mariana war so nett uns spätabends vom Flughafen abzuholen und brachte uns direkt unsere Unterkunft.
Diese ist in einem wunderschönen alten Haus im Stil von Porto und war genauso wie auf den Bildern und in der Beschreibung. Außerdem war es sehr sauber und Handtücher lagen für jeden bereit.
Mit Marianas Tipps, Heften und Büchern, die extra dort auslagen hatten wir am nächsten Morgen schon eine perfekte Grundlage um uns in Porto zurecht zu finden.
Die Lage der Unterkunft ist perfekt, denn sie liegt auf einer Straße mit vielen kleinen schönen Läden und in Fußweite schöner Bars und Cafes. Die meiste Zeit waren wir daher auch zu Fuß unterwegs.

Abgesehen davon, dass die Unterkunft top war, war die Bereitschaft von Mariana u Joao uns bei Fragen weiter zu helfen, immer da.
