An unserem letzten Abend in Porto war außerdem ein großer Feiertag und wir wurden von der Familie eingeladen, den Abend mit Ihnen zu verbringen. 

Mariana und Joao würden wir jederzeit bei uns aufnehmen und genauso ihre Unterkunft jederzeit wieder buchen.

Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Mariana et Joao.
Ils nous ont donné beaucoup de conseils et se sont pliés en 4 pour nous faciliter la vie. Des super hôtes que je recommande vivement!
L'hébergement au dessus de la galerie d'art est très sympa et bien situé : au calme et à proximité de la plupart des centres d'intérêt de la ville.

Mariana and Joao have been very nice and helpfull with us. We really recommand them as hosts.
The accomodation is charming, quiet and is walking distance from most of the touristical spots of the city.

La casa es tal y como se muestra en las fotos: cómoda, práctica,  acogedora y de buen gusto. La localización es perfecta, al lado del centro de la ciudad y de las cosas más importantes para visitar, y de fácil comunicación con el aeropuerto y la playa.

Mariana y João son muy cercanos, han estado muy pendientes de que estuviéramos a gusto, proporcionándonos todas las facilidades y consejos que pudiéramos necesitar.

Sin duda una experiencia muy recomendable para todo el que esté pensando pasar unos días en Oporto, te dan ganas de volver pronto y repetir, sobre todo con estos fantásticos anfitriones. Tan sólo se me ocurren buenas palabras para ellos y sobre la casa.

Mariana and Joao were the perfect hosts! Friendly, welcoming and very informative (in terms of things to do in Porto). The apartment is lovely - distinctively decorated and perfectly positioned. It's situated within the 'art' area and just a short walk from the city centre.
Definitely recommended, we'll certainly go back if we visit Porto again. There's a nice cafe just along the road for breakfast and a mini-supermarket opposite for any essentials you need. A couple of minutes walk in the opposite direction is a great Burger Restaurant. All in all...highly recommended!

We stayed in Mariana & João's flat for one night in July 2015. It's a beautifully decorated, clean flat; just above Mariana's gallery in Porto's art district. Mariana was very helpful, from giving us advice where to park our care nearby to giving us some great insider restaurant and bar tips. It's a pity we were there for just a
one day, we would always come back again!
We enjoyed staying to Mariana, the place was great and Mariana was a wonderfull host. We were not desapointed.

Mariana and Joao were really nice hosts. They  have a good arrangement regarding transports from airport to there place. Joao picked me up even tho I had a big delay. 3 am and ready for me is, I think, a big proof that they are here for us. The apartment was clean and perfectly matching the pictures. On a quiet street and very close to all the center of Porto. Very nice if you want to hang out at night. Very safe neighborhood ! 
I will come back here if I come to Porto again. 
I will also show them Paris with a big pleasure if they ever want to come.

Nous avons eu un séjour très sympa à Porto, l'accueil de Mariana était très chaleureux et elle nous a indiqué plein de bonnes adresses.
L'appartement est simple, agréable et calme. Il n'est pas loin à pied du centre et tout près d'un parc avec vue sur la ville et sur le fleuve. Il y a un petit restaurant très bon tout près dans la rue !

Appartement tres sympathique comme mes les proprietaires. Situe dans la ville haute mais tres bien situe dans une rue calme. Restauration bin et paw cher a cote. Et de nombreux tableaux pour les amateurs. Attention pas de cuisine.
Superbe appartement bien placé et bien décoré. Accueil chaleureux de Joao et Mariana.
Me ayudó en todo lo posible.

Had a wonderful stay at the gallery street house.  Mariana and Joao are friendly hosts that were super helpful with restaurant ideas and places to see.   A beautiful flat with attention to detail.   Hopefully be back soon!
the area is very charming.

We stayed in Mariana & João's flat for only one night in July 2015. They are great hosts, welcoming and helpful. The flat is nice, well located, perfect to discover the beauty of Porto. We recommend this flat to you!

Marina and Joao's flat is a really nice place to stay in Porto. It is a clean and well situated flat with a lovely decoration. We were glad to meet Mariana who gave us good advice (on what is to be seen, and the place  where you can eat and hang out). She did her Best for us so we can enjoy our stay in her city. We definitely recommand this place ! Thank you Mariana

Mariana & João's place is an excellent base for your holliday in Porto and they are great hosts! Together with their daughter they met us at the train station the night we arrived and had plenty of tips for restaurants and places to see. The flat is charming and well located. We would like to come back one day and will recommend Mariana & João's flat to you!
Great apartment, really central, lovely street with good places to eat. Comfy bed. Mariana great at answering all of my questions quickly - thanks!
We had a woundeful stay in your house and enjoyed our time alot! Mariana & joão took care of us very well! I would highly recommend them and we will come back again:)

We were welcomed by Mariana's mom. She was very nice and friendly and speaks well french. The flat is lovely decorated in an artistic way. We had also on the table some tea and some biscuits. The neighbourhood is interesting. There are 5-10 art galleries in the street and some nice paintings on the walls around. 
Nonetheless, there were some little minuses. The mattress is thin and not that confortable. The bathroom is a little bit old. And there isn't any kitchen.
Globally, it was a very nice stay and I would recommend that flat.

Aunque Mariana y João no estuvieron disponibles para darnos las llaves, La madre de Mariana estaba allí y fue muy amable. Nos enseñó la galería, que era muy bonita y espero en casa a que fueramos a por las maletas, además de darnos un mapa de la ciudad. 
El segundo piso que era el apartamento es muy acogedor y limpio. La casa es antigua pero tiene mucho encanto, la zona es muy tranquila y no está lejos del centro.

Pasamos cuatro días en casa de Mariana y Joao. Antes de nuestra llegada Mariana respondió todas nuestras dudas rápidamente. Aunque ella no pudo quedar con nosotros cuando llegamos, nos avisó unos días antes de que lo harían sus padre. Muy atentos con nosotros, nos dieron un mapa y consejos de sitios donde podíamos ir que nos fueron bastante útiles. La casa es como se muestra en las fotos y está en un barrio muy bien situado. Hay muchas galerías de arte, restaurantes y se puede ir andando a todas las zonas turísticas. Además llevábamos coche y pudimos dejarlo en la calle sin problemas. Pensábamos que tenía cocina pero fue fallo nuestro porque en las especificaciones sí está indicado. Aún así cuenta con microondas, sandwichera, tetera y algo de menaje. Lo peor fue el ruido que hacía el frigorífico que por las noches era un poco incomodo. La estancia en general ha sido bastante positiva y agradecemos a Mariana y Joao su acogimiento.

We totally enjoyed our stay in the lovely appartment. The house is ideally located really close to the very heart of the oldtown and the Douro river. It is quiet at night although lively at daytime. There is a romantic park with a terrifc view around the corner.
The apartment is clean and neatly outfitted. There is no kitchen but a fridge, microwave, water boiler and some dishes fullfill basic needs. Even more as there are many wonderful places to eat on the street.
Marianna an Joao are nice hosts, who give great advices for the perfect start in your Porto experience.

This place was great. The location was near some beautiful gardens and central to everything in Porto. Mariana & João were really friendly and gave us detailed advice on where to eat and see art. Their recommendations were perfect. I'd definitely stay here again if I come back to Porto.

Mariana and Joao are great hosts. They were very helpful, open and pleasant. We got from them a lot of useful tips on sight seeing. They are very responsive and answer very fast via app/phone.

The apartment itself is in very good location for tourists and it has good, reliable internet connection. It was also very clean and bright, perfect for us.
I can highly recommend Mariana and Joao when you're staying in Porto :)

Everything was perfect! Joao picked us up on the airport and gave us tips where to go and what to do. They are a nice couple and did everything they could to make our stay felicitous! Everything is in walking distance and the neighborhood is beautiful!
Es war alles super! Wir hatten eine schöne Woche und Mariana hatte viele Tips für uns! Vielen Dank dafür!

Very nice place and people, welcoming and helpful.
The room has something of the boutique hotel feeling with the high ceilings wooden floor and paintings on the walls. 
It's a lovely feeling to be living in an art gallery and the location is perfect to enjoy Porto's restaurants and nightlife. Very good experience!

Маріанна була дуже гостинна, зустріла ас в аеропорту, дала дуже багато корисних порад)
дуже дякуємо за прекрасні дні у Порто!!!

idéalement situé dans un quartier à la fois proche du centre historique de la ville, tout en étant calme et branché cet appartement a en outre énormément de charme. La gentillesse de Marianna et Joao ajoute au plaisir du séjour a Porto

We loved a lot this building and we can't find the proper words to describe it! So it's better to see it in real life by making a reservation and make sure that it looks much better than the photographs! The apartment is very warm and cosy with the appropriate equipment, all that a couple needs for a few days in Porto. Mariana & Joao are great hosts and they respect a lot your privacy! They gave us many informations about the city and Mariana gave us also a ride with her car from the airport to their lovely apartment! We visit her galleria at the ground floor of the building and we saw some great art from Portuguese artists with theme the Swallow "Andorinha". We will definitely visit them again.

Mariana was a great host! Communicative, easily reachable and outgoing! She was quick to reply to my very last-minute request and both check in and check out went smoothly.
The room was squeaky clean, beautifully decorated, charming, cosy and the bed extremely comfortable!
Nice shops, galleries and bars nearby, the artistic vibe is very present which matched perfectly with our expectations!
We enjoyed our stay and would recommend the room to anyone!
Great place & great couple :-)

Très bonne accueil et adaptabilité à nos horaires d'arrivée et de départ.
Logogement très sympa et bien placé. Attention : pas de coin cuisine (juste micro-onde)

Les hôtes nous ont très bien accueilli, très avenants et à l'écoute.
Ils nous ont donné de très bon conseils. La chambre est très agréable. Nous avons bien dormi. La chambre est très bien située dans Porto.

We stayed in Porto for 5 days. Mariana and Joao are very nice, welcoming and friendly hosts. They gave us tips (bars, restaurants, monuments...), which were very helpful. The apartment is very functional and in a good location in order to enjoy the Porto's life. 
We truly recommend this flat ! Aurelien and Celine.

La casa es fantastica, cuidada y Mariana muy atenta, ademas de una gran artista. Los cuadros son geniales.El barrio es centrico, la calle esta llena de galerias de arte y tiendas vintage. Estuvimos muy agusto.
We had a very plesant stay at Mariana's flat. I clearely recommand this nice appartment very well located in Porto. Mariana is a charming person very helpful and reliable :) !

We loved our stay at Mariana and Joao's lovely gallery apartment! It is very homely and welcoming and in a great, artistic area. We couldn't recommend this spot more for value and  comfort either. Thank you so much for having us! We hope to return soon :)

A lovely couple who are always looking to make staying at the "Gallery" a better experience for their guests. Mariana was a very good communicator, with quick responses to SMSFs, e-mails & phone and, kept me well informed. I appreciate very much the effort she put in, organising a good deal on a river cruise up the Douro river. The accommodation has what you need to have an enjoyable stay. The location is a convenient base, from which to see the city, plenty of bars, cafe, restaurants etc close by to suit your needs. You can understand why travellers vote Porto one of the top cities to visit in the world. The San bento main train station was only a 10 minutes walk, Ribeiro around 20 minutes, the Carolina Michaelis metro 20 minutes, with heavy luggage. Sad to see the gravity of the graffiti vandalism in Porto in general, particularly, in the  old city, historical sites included, the   bone fide artists colony around Bombarda street was also not spared.

Mariana & Joäo are a lovely hosts, who are always looking to improve the experience of their guests at the gallery. The
communication was excellent, with quick replies and, information given to all of my questions.   I have to thank Mariana for her time and energy taken, to get me a good deal with a Douro River cruise through the wine region to Regua. The accommodation is in a convenient location, from which to walk around and see What Porto has to offer. There are plenty of cafes, pastry shops, restaurants and bars, close by. It doesn't take long to see why the  city of Porto is rated in the top few of the most liked places to visit in the world. A negative feature in Porto, is the sight of graffiti vandalism particularly in the old city,  on historical places of importance especially. It is an eye sore, and, sad to see. Even the area around the bone-fide artists colony, hasn't escaped this problem. 
The "Gallery" has it all to make your stay an enjoyable one. I am sure that anyone coming here, will made to feel welcome, and, only have positive feedback for the Mariana & Joäo Airbnb house.

Everything was perfect!  mariana and joão are sooo nice! We spent a couple of amazing days in Porto. The house is lovely, just like in the pictures, the location is good and we could walk to all the places we wanted to see. Mariana and joão gave us very good tips and ideas.  Super recommended!!!!

The room is in a quiet street in the gallery's neighborhood. It's an old house and there is a lot of space. Mariana is very welcoming and ready to speak about art. Her gallery is downstraits. She's helpful in case you need some advices (I had a phone issue and she suggested me a company to have a portuguese number).

El apartamento está fenomenal, es tal y como se ve en las fotos del anuncio. Muy bien situado, en una calle llena de galerías y a 15 minutos andando de la Ribeira.
La casa no tiene cocina, pero hay microondas, cocedor de agua y sandwichera. La habitación muy acogedora.
Mariana, una anfitriona estupenda. Nos recomendó muchos sitios donde ir.
Repetiría sin duda! Totally recommended :)

Mariana foi muito simpática e atenciosa. Sentimo-nos muito bem recebidos e confortáveis. Além da hospedagem ser muito bem localizada, limpa, arquitetonicamente interessante e etc., ficamos muito contentes de poder apreciar um pouco da arte que estava sendo exposta no piso inferior da casa.
A localização também foi muito interessante.

Mariana has been very kind to us and helped us being at home even with a young Child.
She advised us on things to see in town, how to get by bus, things we could like and any question from her knowings of the town.

The place is identical as shown on the photo, just a small problem with blowing fuse that should be fixed by now.

Thanks a lot for welcoming us, it has been a wonderful holiday i recommend as people are very nice, town is beautiful, food and wine are good and not to expensive. We even get to forget the more than rainy period we had.
 I recommand Mariana and her place in a nice area.

We had a really nice stay. Mariana is the perfect host. Kind and personal. This is why we use airbnb: the best tips of what to do and where to go and above all to meet people! Thx for everything and who knows we will meet you again.
The apartment is perfectly located and Mariana and João made a great effort in setting it up. It's easy to see that everyhing is made with love and care and you will feel at home in this cozy place.

We stayed for just 1 night, but the place was nice and indeed just like how it looks like on the advertisement. It was nice and convenient especially for our short stay that it was near shops and bars/restaurants. Also the room/house was private, we liked that. Unfortunately we couldn't use much electricity because there were problems with the electricity and we got some short-circuits when we wanted to use the heater, so it was kinda cold during the night. But they're working on that. Mariana was nice and gave us a few tips about activities and spots in the surroundings.
Mariana was a nice host. The flat is very comfortable and perfectly situated ! We had a very pleasant stay. I heartwarmingly recommend this host !

Had a great stay at Mariana's and João's apartment! It is a really cozy place located im between of many beautiful art galleries, just a few minutes walk to the historical city center and the river. 
Mariana and João were very kind, always there when there was a question and happy to help with everything! 
I loved to stay at their apartment and am very happy to have chosen this place :)
Mariana and Joao sont très sympathiques et accueillants. L'appartement est lumineux et agréable. Une adresse à essayer!

The apartment was extremely cozy and comfortable. The neighborhood war very artistic and beautiful. In the night it is also very peaceful. Mariana welcomed us to the house and she was very helpful. She explained us the city and she proposed us a lot of beautiful places to go. It is an excellent choice!

Mariana's House is confortable, cozy and very friendly. The street have a lot of beutiful place to visit (gallerys, coffes, art stores..) and you are in the center of the city but not in the middle of the crowd. I's perfect!

Mariana was great. Communication beforehand was quick and clear and she met us at the apartment with the key, a map and loads of really helpful suggestions of places to visit, restaurants to eat in etc. 
The apartment is on a quiet street full of galleries ( it is above Mariana's gallery). It's really close to the centre and has some lovely cafes, shops and parks near by. 
The rooms were clean and comfortable. Good bed. Nice bathroom with stencils on the walls. Great shower. 
There's no kitchen as such, but there is a fridge, microwave, kettle etc. which was fine for our needs. 
The apartment is light and tastefully decorated with brilliant, original art by Mariana on the walls. 
Mariana let us leave our bags after check out, which was really useful. We'd definitely stay there again.

Começo por enaltecer a extrema amabilidade da Mariana, que nos acolheu muito bem. A casa está muito bem localizada e é muito agradável, confortável e acolhedora. Será, novamente, a escolha mais provável para uma próxima estadia no Porto.

Charming hosts in a charming quirky apartment. A great location to walk all of the attractions nearby. There's also a really lovely tea house just opposite. There's no kitchen but a fridge kettle and other useful bits and bobs means you can knock up breakfast and store ingredients for a yummy picnic in the park round the corner.
We had a very nice trip to Porto. The apartment is very nice. We enjoyed it very much. Mariana was very kind, friendly and helpful. That's why we really can recommend this apartment.

I had a lovely stay in Porto at Mariana's place. It is such a cozy place, which gives you a really authentic feeling of the city. The area is very nice, everything is in short walking distance. Mariana is very welcoming. She replied immediately to messages, which made everything so easy before arrival and during the stay.

Todo resulto muy bien, si usas GPS es fácil de encontrar la calle al llegar a Oporto, es un apartamento con dos zonas y el baño está en la habitación principal, todo muy limpio y con lo necesario. se puede ir andando a cualquier lugar, pero recordar que es una ciudad en cuesta, por lo que la vuelta se puede hacer cansada si has caminado todo el día. El apartamento muy recomendable y los anfitriones siempre disponibles

We had an amazing stay at this perfectly situated apartment, it was within walking distance of everywhere we wanted to go and really helped us to have a great time in Porto

Mariana gave us some great recommendations on where to eat and what to visit on the day we arrived which helped us really enjoy our stay.
L'appartement était froid et pas très accueillant, dommage car les photos donnaient plutôt envie. Le quartier était très sympathique.

Mariana was very nice and hospitable! Got me some tips, told about "must see" places. 
The apartment was very cozy and looked like on pics, even such better. The apartment made in enique style with lot of disign and fashion  stuff and furniture. Everything was clean.
The location is very good, in the center with lots of cafes, sightseeing and galleries.
Highly recommended!

Mariana and João have a gorgeous little place in the art district of Porto, nicely kept and very homely and welcoming. On Arrival Mariana took the time to guide us to must sees and nice restaurants including tips & tricks. Also they were always available for any questions we had during our stay. We had a wonderful stay in their house in Porto!

Mariana et Joao sont très sympas. Très bon accueil. Tout cela en anglais. Ils nous ont orienté sur quoi faire et quoi voir à Porto. Le quartier est très agréable. Très bon emplacement pour visiter la ville. La chambre est très agréable. Seul bémol, c est un petit peu bruyant le matin à cause de la rue. Et le logement entier n en est pas vraiment un car la cuisine se résume à un micro onde et un gaufrier. Je recommande néanmoins le lieu

I had a wonderful stay at Mariana's flat. She was very accommodating of my arrival time and provided me with a detailed overview of Porto's geography, as well as her recommendations while in the city. Her helpfulness throughout my stay exceeded my expectations. Though a little removed from the centre of the city, Mariana's apartment is located in a wonderful enclave of independent art galleries and cafes that I enjoyed quite a bit.
Very nice indeed. Cosy and clean apartment in a great location. Very friendly hosts. Absolutely no complaints. Muito Obrigado!

Charming apartment in excellent location. Just outside the busy city centre but close enough to be able to see everything on foot. Mariana is lovely, taking good care of her guests! 
We only missed a kitchen, that would have made the apartment more complete, now it felt like a room.

Mariana időben érkezett, kedvesen felvilágosított minden fontos információval kapcsolatban, de látta, hogy rohanni akarunk a városba nézelődni és kedvesen elengedett minket. A lakás nagyon hangulatos, ha legközelebb Portóban járok, biztosan itt szállok meg újra.
Mariana's place is very cool and spacious. The flat is well located and we were able to walk to all attractions within 20 mins or less. Great value for Porto! Would definitely stay again.

Absolutely great experience. Everything went perfect from start to the end. Mariana is THE perfect host and a great artist. She made ourselves feel at home, provided a lot of tips for visiting the city and even came to pick us at the airport! The house itself is very well located (in the city center), in a super quiet street and great wifi (for the internet addicts). It is a really neat & charming place, very typical. Lot of bars, restaurants, sightseeings accessible from the house in 5 mn walk. I truly enjoyed my stay at Mariana and João 's place. I'll definitely come back soon guys :)

It was a lovely little apartment, in a really nice neighbour hood!
Not far from the city centre! All you need. Nice contact via mail and really friendly at the check in!

We were met straight away by João and given a tour of the city. We were made to feel at home straight away and couldn't have asked for a better introduction. We were staying for the Primavera festival and the place was perfect, comfortable beds with easy transport links. We couldn't have asked for better a host/hostess throughout the whole trip and the neighbourhood was amazing - full of lovely places to eat and drink as well as walking distance to the river and the best views of the city (as instructed by the host/hostess). Would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a trip in Porto.

Mariana's warm welcome with all details what you can do in the town and where to go in the neighbourhood was a delight. The house is clean and very nice with an artistic touch. The neighbourhood is nice and the location is not far from the town centre. I would highly recommend it for 1-2 persons staying in Porto for a couple fo days.
Our stay at the Gallery's Street House was excellent! The room(s) were nice, bright, and clean and the location was perfect (close to everything). Mariana was an excellent host!

L'appartement est cosy, fonctionnel, charmant et bien situé dans un quartier vivant et artistique pour les amateurs. Notre hôte a été très sympathique et accueillante. Ce court séjour a vraiment été très agréable grâce à toutes les petites attentions de Mariana. Nous recommandons grandement ce lieux pour une visite de porto.
Lovely place  full of charm and comfort, great location we had a great time there and would recommend it to anyone!

Mariana and Joao were great hosts. They explained the flat and gave us a lot of tips and information about lovely Porto. The flat looks exactly like in the pictures, really nice and spotless. Everything we needed was there - even a bottle of water and some coffee to brew! The best thing for us was that we could bring our little one without any fuss - Mariana and Joao even provided us with a cot for him. The flat is also situated in a very nice street: not far from the center, but not too big or in the touristic hotspot and with a lot of galleries, a supermarket, and nice cafés. 
All in all, the place couldn't have been better for us! Thank you so much! ;)

It was a fantastic experience! Mariana was really attentive and made us feel really welcome from the start! Communication before we arrived was great, quick and easy. And the welcome was even better. All her indications and recommendations were brilliant. The apartment was really nice and clean, and in a fantastic location to explore the city! Highly recommended and we hope to be back real soon!

Mariana hat uns sehr herzlich in Empfang genommen und uns gleich die Highlights von Porto erklärt und im Stadtplan eingezeichnet. Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral gelegen im Galerienviertel mit vielen Restaurants in der Nähe. Das Apartment hat genau der Beschreibung entsprochen und ist für den Preis absolut empfehlenswert.

Very friendly and professionnal welcome by Mariana, very arty and decorated with taste place, located within walking distance from town old center.
All fine!
Lovely place and good location! Mariana & Joao are easy to communicate with, very nice hosts!

I really enjoyed staying at Mariana's lovely home. Unfortunately, she and her husband were out of town when I visited, but her mom met me at the apartment and gave me an excellent introduction to the apartment and the city. Was about a 10 minute walk from the center of town, in a quieter area along a street of art galleries. A few great cafes/tea houses within 1 block radius. Would definitely stay here again if I return to Porto.

Our stay at Mariana's was amazing. The room was perfectly clean with beautiful details and artwork made by Mariana herself. We felt at home right away. Mariana was very helpful and attentive and gave us some really useful advice for the neighborhood. She made sure that every little detail was taken care of. When we left she even gave us a lift to the closest metro station. I'd definitely stay there again!

We had a fantastic stay in Mariana & Joao's apartment. Mariana met us when we arrived from the airport and was very friendly and helpful. She gave us lots of recommendations (including for a fantastic burger place on the same street). The neighbourhood is busy and interesting, with lots of bars and stores nearby. We were also really close to the city centre and were able to walk everywhere. A great stay!

Stayed for one night. Couldn't possibly imagine a better option in Porto for the value! Very traditional yet comfortable apartment! Although Mariana herself was on vacation, her parents welcomed us with open arms. The beds were comfortable. Noise was minimal. Location was perfect (10 minute walk to the city center)! Will definitely recommend to anyone travelling into the area! Thank you for being such great hosts!

this was a joyful experience ! Communication with Mariana was smooth throughout and even though, unfortunately, we didnt meet her until we were leaving because she was on holiday herself, she was constantly responsive to my messages and made sure that that the apartment was ready for us and somewhere was there to meet us to hand over the keys. Initially, i was going to ask for her Porto tips of where to visit and eat but we had fun working it out ourselves and there was a TimeOut guide to Porto in the apartment which was our valuable companion for our 3/4 day stay. 

As everyone has pointed out, this is in a great area, in a groovy street of galleries,  really lovely cafes and a restaurants a fabulous tea house across the road and some really interesting shops. Also we walked everywhere from here, only caught the tram once to go Foz and the bus back to the airport. 

The apartment has the most lovely feel with its solid walls, sense of history and original creative style. Its a perfect city apartment, uncluttered but still put together with flair and love. The basic food preparing facilities are just enough for this kind of trip and staying here for myself and my 11 year old son was really great fun. It is exactly as it says but the experience itself, in this apartment, in this street in this wonderful, old, vibrant and inspiring city was more of a delight than we had anticipated. If you err to the more creative and bohemian, you will really love this place!

We stayed 4 nights at Mariana and João's place and had a wonderfull time. It was the perfect place for us to explore Porto, just outside of the touristic erea (but close to it). 
On the street there are nice cafes, resturants and cute boutique shops. The appartmet is also 5 minutes walk from the Crystal Palace gardens, where there are free concertes during August.
We arrived late at night so João offered to pick us up from the airport. He gave us usfull tips. We also met Mariana, who showed us the gallery and her beautiful paintings. They were both very kind.
We definitly recommend staying here and visit this lovely city.

Absolutely perfect! Mariana welcomed us personally and showed us her inspiring gallery and garden. She also provided is with precious suggestions about the city and some typical restaurants (don't miss Bricks and A' Tasquinha!).
The flat is huge, spotlessly clean and beautifully decorated with Mariana's works of art. The neighbourhood is quiet, close to many places of interest and art-souled. 
Not only we'd stay at Mariana&Joao's again, but we'll come back to Porto exclusively when their place is available. 
Muito obrigada!

The space was stationed in a cool area, slightly removed from the bulk of the tourists but still accessible. The apartment itself was light and bright, thoughtfully laid out with all the amenities. Great spot!
Die Wohnung ist sehr schön eingerichtet und gut ausgestattet. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Lage ist super. Mariana hat uns sehr herzlich empfangen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
Nice apartment great location. Very nice guys as well.

We really enjoyed staying in this apartment and it was a lovely quiet arty area. It was also walking distance from the centre of Porto which was helpful on nights out. Mariana was always in contact and provided us with recommendations and other things as requested. The room was light and clean and there was a local supermarket to buy some food which we kept in the fridge provided. The area felt very safe and while in Porto you will be spoilt for choice on restaurant options. I would recommend this location and flat to others and Mariana's hospitality made the stay even more enjoyable.

The appartment is perfectly situated ! Between a great park (where we had the surprise of a jazz concert on sunday night, very lovely), great restaurants and not far from the tourist attractions. 
The appartment was very clean! We recommand highly this place ! 
Thanx for everything

I had a very nice stay at Mariana & Joao's apartment. The location is above a gallery/exhibition space in the art district in Porto. I found the location to be handy enough and was able to walk to all the areas I wanted to visit. The Port houses were only a 20 minute walk away and the famous book shop is about 7 mins. The street is covered with excellent, tasteful and thought provoking street art which made wandering around even more enjoyable. 

Mariana was incredibly helpful and even took the time to sit down with me for 20 minutes recommending local restaurants, bars, and things to see by marking them on a map. This was such a nice touch and I really appreciated her going out of her way to do it, especially as she was in the middle of setting up for an exhibition that began the following day. 

The space itself is perfectly adequate, the bed is comfortable and the shower is powerful. Noise levels weren't a problem as the street is perfectly quiet. I would however describe it as more of an ensuite room than an entire apartment, as it is quite small and there's no separate kitchen facility. This was not a problem as there are lovely coffee shops and a really nice breakfast spot further down the street. 2 breakfasts with coffee for less than €10!! 

All in all I would happily stay there again. The location and the hosting was unbeatable.
Excellent experience. Great hosts very easy to coordinate and available for helping out and giving suggestions. Excellent location and very beautiful flat. Completely recommended.

I would definately recommend this place for two persons. As we were with kids and a grandma the flat was not spacious enough for us, though we asked. The 2nd bed is in a walk through room between 1st bed (which leads to the toilett) and exit. Also garden use is only possible when the host is in the gallery. Still, the flat is nice and fine decorated and you can find plenty of opportunities to eat or drink or watch close around. The host knows the area pretty well and has pretty good recommondations. As it happend, a board of a table came down when we put a daily bag on it and we somehow stained a towel (which somehow stained another towel) with coffee. so, of course, we had to compensate the host. so, at the end, we paid pretty much for a medium experience. but, as it goes, not really to blame the flat or the host.

Muito obrigada Mariana, you made our stay great.
Your a good woman, may you be happy :) 
thanks a lot !!!

Perfectly situated in the city's up and coming art district, this apartment was spacious, clean and inspiring. We really liked being surrounded by the energy and creativity of this place. Mariana was very welcoming and took the time to make us feel at home.
Every thing was ok. The bed wasn't to comfortable though. I mean I recommend you to buy a new mattress guys.
We really liked the apartment, the location is really nice in the middle of the art area ! João even picked us up from the airport for a small fee. Recommended!

The best experience ever!! 
Mariana and João were the perfect hosts! Friendly, welcoming and very informative. They took the time to explain Porto, giving us a map and all the recommendations we needed. The apartment is lovely, charming and distinctively decorated with Mariana´s beautiful Art works. The bed is super comfortable and the shower has very good pressure. The apartment is clean and spacious. It's situated within the Art area, in a very safe and quiet neighborhood. Great shops, Art Galleries and Restaurants. Next time, we will be staying here for sure! 
Highly recommended!!  :)
That's fantastic place! And Mariana and Joao are amazing! Very helpful and easy going. The place it's just perfect and very inspiring, clean and in perfect location! Love it!
This place was great, above a nice little gallery and in a very quiet and artsy neighbourhood. And the hosts were very nice, we even got a nice wine bottle as a present. :)
We had great time in Porto, thanks to Mariana & João’s place, we could reach everywhere easily. The flat is in center of Porto, cosy and comfortable. Looking forward to be there again !

We really enjoyed our stay at Mariana and Joao's place! It's a nice apartment, spacious and clean, located above a gallery in the middle of the arts area. Mariana was very welcoming and provided us with many good suggestions for eating and what to see in the city. A warm recommendation.
Très bon accueil malgré un retard imprévu de notre part... Merci beaucoup de votre être adapté, et l'appart est très bien. Ate mais !
A great apartment in a fantastic location. Arty feel and a lovely host.
Very good. Think you very much !!
We were at Mariana en Joã's house for just the night. It is a nice old place to stay. The hosts are very helpfull.
great apartment, fantastic area, hosts are lovely and friendly, great communication. super clean and cosy! i recommend!

One of the best streets in Porto to stay! Close to galleries, restaurants, downtown, public park, design stores! It's the art street of Porto! This apartment for instance, is inside of gallery! So you can sleep and visit some art! :) Would stay there again!
Fabulous area..very trendy. Great shops and galleries and love the tea shop /house across the road.

A estadia na casa da Mariana e João foi muito boa. O local é bem central e com bastante personalidade. Mariana foi uma host excelente e passou muitas dicas sobre a cidade, todas ótimas. Só faltou uma cozinha um pouquinho maior. Foi uma ótima escolha e certamente voltaria.

Mariana & João are very nice people: they sat with us and gave us all the best tips about sights, restaurants, pubs etc.
Their place is a perfect spot for reaching all of Porto. The house does not have a kitchen, but that's easily explained: if a continental breakfast for 2 costs 5Eu, you don't wanna bother preparing it yourself.
A very nice, and quiet place tot Stay, and Discover and enjoy the city of Porto! And a very nice welcome!
La casa es preciosa! Y esta muy bien ubicada! Mariana es un amor

Thanks to Mariana, our vacation in Porto was perfect.
The apartment is very well located, inside a gallery(with beautiful paintings), very comfortable and clean.
Mariana was a great host, she gave us useful tips and things to do in the city.
I highly recommend her place.
(And don't forget to ask her about olive oil).

한적하고, 조용한 골목에 위치하고 있네요. 치안이 안 좋은 곳이라지만 숙소 앞엔 유치원이 있어 아이들 웃음소리가 끊이질 않았어요! 오래된 곳 같긴 하지만 만족했어요! 가까운 곳에 식물원, 도루강, 파파비노스 레스토랑이 있어 즐기기 좋았습니다~~ 호스트에게 궁금한 점 메시지로 물어보면 빠른 답변이 와서 좋았어요~~ 마지막엔 맛있는 식당도 알려주었네요. Thank you. Mariana!

A last minute change in travel plans led to the need for a place to stay in Porto. We were so very fortunate to end up in Mariana and Joao's lovely flat. It is located near everything you need- restaurants, attractions, bars etc. The apartment is clean and airy, and the kettle and microwave allow for preparing a simple meal if desired. Mariana patiently shared local knowledge and gave us a 
wonderful list of good places to eat and view the city. We would definitely stay in this location again!
O espaço de Mariana é muito bem localizado, cheio de charme, muito limpo e ela nos recebeu muito bem nos deu muitas dicas.

My friend and I had an absolutely perfect stay in this apartment! Mariana was a very kind and gracious hostess, taking the time even to talk through the map of Porto and give us recommendations. The apartment is adorable and very centrally located - anyone would be lucky to stay here!
Super great neighborhood - Mariana gave us really awesome recommendations and we had such a lovely time in Porto! Definitely check out the super cute cafe with an amazing back garden Rota do Cha!

this place is a GREAT find! joão and mariana are considerate, attentive and kind hosts with a lovely apartment available. comfortable, artsy, spacious and quiet with big windows facing the street — a very beautiful place to stay. the neighborhood is residential but still interesting, just a quick walk from downtown and a 20-30 min bus ride to the beach (we were in town for a music fest and getting back and forth from the beach, where the fest was, was no problem). highly recommend staying here if you're in porto.

The apartment is located in the artists' quarter and it is really close to many commodities and to the town center. The room is very good and decorated with a fine taste and everything is nice smelling. I would recommend this place for a number of reasons: first above all, the kindness of the host!

My stay at the art gallery was perfect.  The location makes it easy to get around with walking, but far enough from the madness to get a good night's rest.  It is right next to the gardens, and there are some lovely places to eat local nearby, as well as a grocery.  Mimi was spectacular and gave some of the best recommendations of any of my hosts for food, nightlife, and things to see and do.  Getting to the home was easy from the airport, though I did have some difficulty with the bus there on a Sunday.  I would recommend this place to anyone and would stay here again for the comfort and the location.

Mariana and Joao are amazing hosts and we would highly recommend them and their place. The space was very comfortable, clean, and walkable to all major sights and nightlife. They picked us up from the airport and gave us a great many tips on places to see, things to do, and restaurants / bars to eat and drink.

Please make sure to read the fine print about the extra charge for use of the second bed! The place was a bit smaller than I expected, it's always hard to tell from the pictures (and unfortunately Airbnb does not list apartment size in square feet or meters to help). We thank Mimi for being so accommodating to our needs during our stay.

We had a wonderful time at Porto. Mimi is very kind and she made us feel like at home. She gave us a lot of great suggestions about the city, and showed us almost everything we need to know on the map. Her place is absolutely one of the best apartments i've ever been to on Airbnb. The location is very good, next to a very quiet street, and about 15 minutes walk to Sao Bento station and the old town. It's very clean, and we owned the entire building during the weekend. :)

If i go to Porto again, i'll choose her place for sure. Thank you for hosting us, Mimi! Let me know if you are coming to visit Boston in the future.

The gallery street house was the perfect humble abode for a romantic retreat. My boyfriend and I had an absolutely lovely stay in Porto. Upon arrival, Mimi explained in extensive detail and showed us all of the lovely monuments, local restaurants, tea houses, bars and beaches, including the lovely fishers village on the other side of the river. This was incredibly helpful with this being our first trip to Porto. The gallery street house is quite central, being only a 10-15 min walk down town. The house itself was incredibly clean and cozy. It was big and airy and located in a quiet  location not too far from a few nice bars and shops. Would greatly recommend this airbnb to anyone! Thank you Mimi.

The three of us had a great stay at Mimi and João's place, located above their art gallery in the heart of the quiet art district. It was a nice neighbourhood that was still reasonably close to main attractions and walking distance (20mins) to the riverfront. Check in and out was easy and João gave us some great recommendations for places for us to visit and eat and drink!
Mimi is a great hoast and artist. The location of her apartment is central and interesting. You will find many other galleries and shops close to her place.

The appartment is located in a very good area, near to the city center and shops. Joao was very helpful and gave us lots of tips. Porto is a great city, I would recommend it to everybody! Lovely appartment in a great area for art lovers.
A great, quiet space away from the noisier parts of town yet still close to some greats bars and restaurants. The space flows and is conducive to being inspired. Great hosts, good value, great place.
Todo bien

Lovely room in a nice central part of Porto. I would not say it is an entire home as in the description, and the garden is not accessible as in the photos. The second bedroom is also not really a separate room as it has the only entrance. Other then those inconsistencies in the description it was perfect.

Mariana and Joao were very nice and helpful with a lot of interesting recommendations. 
The neighbourhood is beautiful, with some cozy restaurants and pubs in the area as well as nice design shops.

I strongly recommend this place!

João hat uns sehr freundlich empfangen und sich über eine Stunde Zeit genommen, um uns Tipps für die Erkundung der Stadt zu geben. Die Wohnung war sehr sauber, ist toll eingerichtet und hatte alles, was man braucht. Die Wohnung liegt zwar nicht direkt im Zentrum, aber es war alles in Gehdistanz erreichbar. Wir würden diese Unterkunft jederzeit wieder buchen.

I can highly recommend Mariana and her Street Gallery House. The location is amazing - quite and clean with a lot of galleries, nice shops and restaurants in the surrounding. It's also very near to the city center and other hotspots.

The accommodation is cozy and stylish at the same time and includes everything needed for a short trip.

The communication with Mariana was easy and fast, she gave us superb tips and her friendly and kind manner made our stay one to remember.
Excelente local, a enaltecer os anfitriões, com bom gosto e sempre prontos a ajudar

We stayed in Mimi's beautiful, cosy apartment for three nights. It was exactly as advertised - clean, spacious and very well located (around five-ten minutes walk to some great sights and downtown Porto) - and Mimi was kind enough to provide an excellent, thorough guide to the (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was quick and consistent throughout and it was excellent value for money. I would definitely recommend Mimi's apartment to anyone looking for a place to stay in Porto.

Buscabamos un apartamento limpio y cómodo donde poder dormir tranquilos y eso fue lo que nos encontramos. La casa es tal y como aparece en las fotos, y las camas muy cómodas. En la calle apenas hay ruido y es un lugar ideal para descansar y recuperar fuerzas.

La atención de Mimi fue muy buena. Fue muy atenta y nos recomendó varios sitios donde comer y para visitar. Además sus respuestas ante cualquier duda eran inmediatas. Solo tuvimos un problema con el calentador del agua y nos ayudó a resolverlo muy rápido.

En cuanto a la zona, queda muy cerca de todo y puedes recorrer todo Oporto andando. Las zonas más turísticas quedan a unos 15/20 minutos paseando de la casa, y las zonas de bares y fiesta también.

Solo un consejo, si vais en coche mejor aparcar en un parking privado. La última noche dejamos el coche en una calle paralela (Rua do Breiner) y cuando nos despertamos nos habían roto una de las ventanas del coche.
Quiero dejar claro que esta mala experiencia no tiene relación con el apartamento ni con Mimi.

En definitiva, 100% recomendable.
Mimi foi muito atenta e agradavel. Voltaria  sem duvidar.

Espaço incrível. Decoração impecável, com um toque pessoal que me fez sentir como se estivesse em casa. A localização é maravilhosa, um bairro super charmoso e muito perto do centro histórico. A Mariana é um amor de pessoa, ficaria um dia inteiro conversando com ela. Amei tudo.

Die Wohnung ist in einem schönen, Künstler-Viertel gelegen. Sehr ruhig und doch nah an Restaurants.
Wir haben super viele gute Tipps bekommen nachdem João uns vom Flughafen abgeholt und zur Wohnung gebracht hatte.
Alles in allem machen die beiden das sehr gut! Danke noch mal für eure Gastfreundschaft!! Wir kommen gerne wieder. ( Wenn das Wetter besser wird ;) )

A beautifully decorated and super cozy place! The location is fantastic and very quiet, yet a close walk to everything. Mimi is a wonderful host and has great tips on where to go and what to do. Thank you! :)

Staying at Mariana and João's place was one of the best decisions I made while traveling in Portugal. The apartment is clean, cozy, comfortable, and super cute. Plus, they go above and beyond by leaving coffee, cookies, and a large bottle of water in the room. 

But the best part about staying here was Mariana. (I'm sure that João is wonderful as well, though I didn't meet him.) She greeted me at the apartment and gave me tailor-made tips, drawing them out on a map and she explained. She truly loves her city and it shows — she's passionate about sharing Porto with her guests. We even met up and she took me to the modern art museum (which is especially interesting to attend with an artist). I'm only sorry that I didn't stay here longer.

Mimi was a great host, very kind and helpfull.
the flat is only 10min to walk to the most tourist attraktions and in a nice and sure part of the city with original little shops, gallerys and nice food.
thanks a lot!

Alojarse aquí casi forma parte de la experiencia de descubrir Porto. Es una casa-galería de arte antigua, con encanto ¡y en pleno centro! Perfecta casilla de salida para empezar a perderse por la ciudad. Mimi y Jõao se mostraron muy amables y atentos, contestando casi al instante cuando contactábamos con ellos por cualquier motivo. El nivel de higiene de la habitación y baño es excepcional; y, por pequeños detalles, se nota que le ponen mimo al preparar la llegada de sus huéspedes. Lo que sí nos quedamos es con las ganas de ver/disfrutar el pequeño jardín de las fotos. Pero, en resumen: es totalmente recomendable.

Dit is een topplek! Mooie artistieke wijk, rustig gelegen maar toch in het centrum. Mimi was een ontzettend goede gastvrouw die ons uitgebreid van tips voorzag waar we veel aan gehad hebben. Het huisje is niet al te groot maar zeer praktisch, leuk ingericht en goede bedden. Een absolute aanrader!
Um lugar perfeito para visitar a cidade de Porto para um fim de semana.

porto ist eine lebendige, interessante stadt, wir haben sie zu fuß erkundet und dazu war mimis unterkunft ,umgeben von kunst, design, second hand,cafes und kneipen, ein schöner standort und bestens geeignet. das alte haus mit bedacht renoviert, die wohnung liebevoll eingerichtet, wir hatten alles, was es braucht. mimi hat sich alle zeit genommen, unsere fragen zu beantworten und tips weiter zu geben, sie war sehr hilfsbereit.

+ host
+ cleaness
+ location
+ quiet 

Felt very welcome and had a great stay. I can totally recommend it!
Mimi’s place was great in a great location and she was awesome super helpful with tips and super friendly !!

If you are an art lover, the area is perfect for you as it is beautifully decorated with tasteful street art and nice little places waiting to be found. The place is walking distance from the baixa (centre). I stayed with two other people and we found the rooms cozy and perfect for a couple in the bigger room and a sole friend in the smaller room.
An atmospheric apartment in a great part of town. Mimi was there to meet us and provided some great ideas on what we should see around Porto. Good walking distance to everything.
terrific location and very stylish apartment with only basic amenities.

I stayed at Mimi’s place for three weeks and everything was perfect. 

The location is on a quiet street with nearby fun. Directly across the street are two cafes with back patios that feel like an escape from the hustle and bustle.

For those considering this place for business travel, WiFi and workspace were excellent the entire trip. The connection allowed for uninterrupted video conferences and streaming Netflix on my laptop.

And Mimi is great! She was overly communicative throughout my stay and had many recommendations.

If you’re looking for a place to rest your head after enjoying the beauty of Porto, stop looking — this is the place for you !
This appartment is super if you want to live in a friendly and interesting neighboorhood:) Highly suggest it!
Perfect location to visit Oporto, right at the streetart area and to a walkable distance to the main spots, also the place is very charming and confortable!

Una casa de artistas en una calle llena de galerías y tiendas de arte, decorada con mucho gusto y personalidad. No pudimos conocer a Mimi en persona, en su lugar conocimos a Joao, que fue muy atento y nos dio todo tipo de indicaciones sobre la ciudad. Son una pareja encantadora.  Repetiríamos sin dudarlo. Un diez!!

We had a great time at Mimi's place. The location is perfectly located within the city to reach the hotspots, it's very clean and spacious. Mimi's recommendations what to see and where to go were great, too.

Had a great stay at Mimi's apartment.
It is well located and surrounded with art shops as well as plenty of shops and restaurants for comfortable stay. 
Apartment is clean and cozy.
Great place to discover Porto.

we had a very nice (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was good and she was there to great us upon our arrival. the apartment is above an art studio and has a laid back feel to it. there was plenty of space for both of us. it is nicely located in porto with parking nearby if you have a car. a very good experience overall.

name: Wonderful Waikiki Skytower  DH/mountain views
summary: Sit out on the lanai for sweet breezes and ocean views.  Super mountain and Diamond Head views from all rooms.  Ocean views from the lanai.   Comfortable king bed in the bedroom. Queen sofa sleeper in living room.  Great restaurants nearby.  Free wifi.  Free secured, assigned, covered parking stall.  No resort fees....  NON SMOKING BUILDING. Managed by Tiare Dutcher, Principal Broker with DW Realty.
space: This is a NON smoking unit.  NO SMOKING on the lanai or inside the condo.   Well maintained high floor unit with great Diamond Head and mountain views.  Ocean views from the lanai.  Sit out on the lanai with your breakfast and feel the sweet morning air. Large bedroom with king bed.   Kitchen has lots of pots and pans for your gourmet cooking.   Living room has queen sofa sleeper.   Washer and dryer in the kitchen.   ACs in both the bedroom and the living room. One secured covered parking stall.  FREE.... Large salt water pool (less chlorine), pool deck, and BBQs.  Men's and women's sauna.    Only two blocks to the best beach in Waikiki.  Surf and sun.  Close to the bus lines and shopping.  Only four units per floor, so you will have lots of privacy.   Free wifi and HD TV. If you do smoke in the unit or on the lanai, there is a $200 charge.  Please do not smoke in the condo or anywhere on building premises. Lost fob and key is an additional $80 charge. NO resort fees.
description: Sit out on the lanai for sweet breezes and ocean views.  Super mountain and Diamond Head views from all rooms.  Ocean views from the lanai.   Comfortable king bed in the bedroom. Queen sofa sleeper in living room.  Great restaurants nearby.  Free wifi.  Free secured, assigned, covered parking stall.  No resort fees....  NON SMOKING BUILDING. Managed by Tiare Dutcher, Principal Broker with DW Realty. This is a NON smoking unit.  NO SMOKING on the lanai or inside the condo.   Well maintained high floor unit with great Diamond Head and mountain views.  Ocean views from the lanai.  Sit out on the lanai with your breakfast and feel the sweet morning air. Large bedroom with king bed.   Kitchen has lots of pots and pans for your gourmet cooking.   Living room has queen sofa sleeper.   Washer and dryer in the kitchen.   ACs in both the bedroom and the living room. One secured covered parking stall.  FREE.... Large salt water pool (less chlorine), pool deck, and BBQs.  Men's and women's sauna.
neighborhood_overview: You will be so close to the beach.  Just two blocks away---about a 5-7 minute walk away.  Restaurants and shops are close by too.  And it's always fun to watch the tourists pass by on Kalakaua Avenue.
notes: NO SMOKING IN THE BUILDING.  If you do smoke in the unit or on the lanai, there is a $200 charge.  Please do not smoke in the condo or anywhere on building premises.
transit: Close to buses if you decide not to rent a car, and bus transportation is cheap and easy...
access: Pool and sauna are on the fifth floor, along with BBQ grills.
interaction: I'm always available via phone (text or call) and email...
house_rules: A late check in charge may be requested.  Check in after 9:30 pm is $50.  Check in after 11:00 pm is $100.  Thanks for your understanding.  According to the house rules for the Waikiki Skytower, all guests must be met in person by the host, or someone designated by the host, no matter what time of day or night. Hawaii State taxes (Transient Accommodation Tax--10.25%-- and General Excise Tax 4.712%) are included in your price.   Lost fob and key is an $80 charge.  If you forget your keys, a lock out charge of $50 may be asked. Our beaches are eroding, so please help to save every grain of sand at the beach.  Please shake out your sandy towels and clothes at the beach, and please wash your feet and other sandy body parts at showers or water spigots at the beach.  This is important, as sand isn't good for the washer and dryer, the vacuum, or the plumbing. This is a NON SMOKING unit. No smoking in the condo or on the lanai. This is a strict rule I have, plus the building is a non smoking b

host.host_about:
My main profile picture shows the Tiare Tahiti, a flower also called the Tahitian Gardenia.  It smells great...   One of my favorite flowers

I'm an artist with an MFA from the University of Hawai`i, but I became a real estate broker in order to support my disabled husband of 57 years.  I manage these thirteen great condos, all in the Waikiki Skytower, only three short blocks from Waikiki beach.   I own a small real estate company, DW Realty, so if you want to buy something here, I can help with that too.  I have helped a lot of people find their special place.  

I love helping people find a great place to stay on their vacation.

I love living in Hawai`i, and I live in Waikiki, so I'm close to the vacation rentals I manage.  I'm pretty much always available...

For three years, in the 1960s, before GPS, my husband and I sailed around the South Pacific on our 38' sailboat--no kids then, just our cat.  Finally, we came to Hawai`i, and we have pretty much been here ever since.  Both our kids were born here.  All of us are Hawaiians at heart.

reviews.comments: Fabulous place to stay! Great location - walking distance to the beach and shopping. The view was unbelievable. When our friends visited they would always comment on our amazing view! It has all the amenities you could want including a washer/dryer, dishwasher, balcony, cable TV, iron/ironing board, hairdryer and even beach towels. Excellent security. Even the elevator requires your key. Our friend is a Honolulu police officer and said it is a safe neighborhood.  The parking spot was invaluable as our friends paid $30 a night at a hotel to park their car.  Unfortunately the pool was closed when we were there for construction but it looked clean and well-maintained and even had barbecues! I would definitely recommend the Waikiki Skytower to anyone staying in Honolulu.

We enjoyed our stay at this property.  It was clean, right on the bus route and very close to all of the amenities such as Safeway.  The view from the 25th floor of this apartment was spectacular.  The location also made it easy for the hosts we engaged to pick us up for activities such as kayaking, snorkeling, hiking, rides to the airport etc.  It was great to have the parking spot on site for those days which we had a car rental because parking was scarce in the Waikiki area.  I enjoyed running around the Ala Wai Canal and golf course most days of the week which was right behind the apartment and the beach was only a few blocks away.  The kitchenette and the washer and dryer were helpful.  I liked the fact that a fob was required to "work" the elevator for security reasons.  The apartment did not have WiFi and so we would just walk down to Starbucks to access the internet to help us coordinate activities, review and/or respond to emails etc.  The apartment had a television but no cable television or DVD player.   I was grateful we brought our own laptop and the necessary cables which allowed us to watch  movies on those one or two evenings that we just wanted to stay "at home" because we were too tired to do anything else.  The apartment was fully furnished including toasters, blenders...

I would stay at this property again.

The Skytower is fantastic place to stay, and Tiare is a terrific host. Tiare was responsive and helpful before and during my stay, and when Tropical Depression Flossie rearranged my travel plans at the last minute, she was flexible and accommodating. The Skytower is spacious, spotless, and breezy -- and the view is absolutely killer. Having a parking space in Waikiki is also incredibly convenient, as is the Skytower's location near beaches and amenities (but it's on a small side street, so you miss out on a lot of the noise). I would stay here again in a heatbeat and can't recommend it highly enough. Five stars!
We had an excellent stay. The apartment is very pleasant, very well placed and equipped well. We recommend this rent. We thank Tiare.

The apartment was very comfortable. It has a homey feel to it. The view was fantastic, as it was on the 25th floor. The kitchen and laundry/dryer was very useful. The building was very secure, as a transponder is required to open the garage door, the building entrance, and to use the elevator. The parking stall was easy to get in and out. The location was great. Five minute walk to the beach. The apartment building was only a few hundred feet from Kuhio Ave, yet it was very accessible by car, as it is situated on a secluded street. Internet access was an additional cost. I would definitely stay there again. Thanks Tiare!

As experienced travellers, like myself along with my family you have the ability if choosing any number of accommodation options. Even as a first time traveller the accommodation selection process can be a little daunting and is often handled by a travel agent. 
BUT........If you are looking to travel to Hawaii at any time and for any reason I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this apartment at Waikiki Sky Tower!
From the initial booking stage to arriving in Hawaii, Tiare was extremely helpful every step of the way. Tiare was very easy to communicate with and has a passion for the area as well as ensuring our stay at the apartment was stress free! As we arrived  on a mid morning flight, Tiare met us at the apartment early and provided access to be able to store our luggage - no stress!
This apartment is situated in the absolute heart of Waikiki, with everything at your doorstep. The apartment is in a quiet street only one block from the beach - and the view from the 25th floor is sensational. 
 One (of many) standouts for choosing this apartment was its security. Access to the building requires a security fob, as well as access to the lift and car park. (We hired a car during our stay and the ability to park the car for free, in a secure parking area within the building was FANTASTIC.)
This apartment has everything you need for a 'self sufficient' type of holiday that no motel 'room' can provide. The apartment is has every appliance and utensil  from a washer dryer, to the coffee pot and the knives and forks to the air conditioner you won't be found wanting anything!!
The location of this apartment is another of it's many benefits. With only a few steps from the building you can catch any one of the many 'trolley' transports, find a supermarket, dine at any number of restaurants, shop at so many diverse locations (retail / markets / boutique) and of course access Waikiki beach - it is all right there!!

We loved our stay in this apartment and can't recommend it highly enough - thanks Tiare!!

I and my husband stayed five days during our Hawaiian vacation first week of March. We had a fabulous time in Oahu thanks to Tiare's fantastic apartment and her incredible kindness. She allowed us to check in directly when we arrived and we were able to check out later than we needed to because her next guests  were not arriving until a day later. I mention this because this meant she would have less time to get the apartment ready for the next people but she took that inconvenience upon herself to accommodate us and make our stay wonderful. Her apartment location can't be beat. It is in the heart of Waikiki, only half a block from buses, 3 short blocks from the beach, incredible balcony overlooking the ocean and the city which we enjoyed very much during breakfast and some evenings we decided to stay in. Within the apartment, the bed was very comfortable, the bed sheets so soft, and the kitchen stocked with all the cookware we needed, and more channels than we cared to watch on the TV, and overall very clean. The other huge plus was the free parking. We rented a car the last two days of our stay so that we could drive around the island and explore more of the city, and her parking spot came in handy. Overall, we LOVED staying in her apartment and if we ever return to Oahu, we will definitely contact her if her place is available and if its, we will see no need to check elsewhere.  Thanks, Tiare! Birtu

Tiare's condo on the 25th floor of Waikiki Skytower was wonderful. It was spacious, comfortable and well fitted-out with all facilities, including a spacious lanei. It had superb views of the mountains to the North, Diamond Head to the East and (some) ocean to the South. The location was absolutely perfect; in a quiet side street but less than a 10 minute walk to the beach. There were also plenty of basic food stores, shops and restaurants in the area. It was right next to a main bus route and there was a car rental nearby. All in all highly recommended. Tiare also provided an efficient 4G wi-fi facility at a nominal additional cost .
Nice location, decent place, clean, no problems.  Having secure parking at no extra charge is a plus if you have a car.  Good view from 25th floor.

We LOVED our stay at the Wonderful Waikiki Skytower.  It was everything and more than we expected.  Tiara is an absolute joy to work with.  Upon our arrival the unit was clean, well stocked with lots of ammenities your typical hotel would not have had, and the best part was the free parking.  

We were happy to find a bunch of beach toys and accesories (snorkeling gear, boggie boards, floaties) all clean and ready to use.  There are dozens and dozens of towels including beach towels.  There's little knick knacks that you don't considering packing but once you get there you realize you need (ziplock bags, wipes, etc.).  We can tell Tiara is very thoughtful and considerate of guest, young or old.  I'm huge when it comes to attention to detail and Tiara knocked it out of the ball park.  

Lastly the location is fantastic!  Two blocks from the heart of Waikiki beach, 5 minutes from the main freeway to get you to any other part of the island.  We spent probably only 15% of our time in Waikiki and the rest exploring the island (the North Shore, Kailua, the Lagoons by the Disney resort) and having such easy access around town was phenomonal.  

We look forward to our next stay here again!

The Waikiki Skytower was beautiful.  It's a great location, easy to get to the beach which was important to us.  The view was beautiful and the view was relaxing, especially at night.  Tiare was extremely kind and easy to communicate with.  

The condo has everything that you need.  We appreciated the full kitchen and cooked a lot while there.  We enjoyed having our breakfast on the patio in the morning and typically ate the fruit from the close farmers markets each morning.  DELICIOUS!  

We were fortunate to have a parking space that came with the facility.  A plus for sure!

Tiare was very accessible during my stay in Waikiki. The condo was lovely. The bed and pillows were amazingly comfortable. I didn't turn on the ac units that often, but when I did they cooled down the place very quickly. I didn't spend a whole lot of time in the condo (hello, I was in Hawaii and adventuring!) but when I did, I was very at home. The space was clean, there was ample dishes, towels, etc. for my use. I had a lovely experience and would recommend this place to anyone looking for a great stay in Waikiki!!

Tiare was so easy and wonderful to work with! She gave excellent instruction and everything was up to expectation and in many cases even better. Good AC and the washer and dryer came in handy. I also ended up needing a package delivered and she was able to help me get that worked out. The place was very clean. There are plenty of drawers and closet space to store your things and the bathroom was very nice. When we left here we went to Big Island and I got a call from Tiare that I had left a ring and car keys behind. I found out later my daughter had put them in a drawer and we operated from our luggage so I hadn't realized they were gone. Tiare was awesome and mailed them to us on big island which really saved our bacon!

We would definitely stay here again next time.

Our stay in the Waikiki Skytower was great. The unit offers beautiful views of the Ala wai canal, Diamond Head and of Waikiki. While we opted to not have wifi, we visited Starbucks which was 3 blocks away nearly every morning. The unit is immaculate and air conditioned. While not on the beach, it's not a long walk to the beach. Our daughters were there every  day and not once did they complain about the distance. Advice for families. Even though they didn't complain, it was a bit small for our teenage girls to be on the sofa bed in the living room. We had a very nice week in the Skytower.

FOR THE PAST 7TH YEARS WE HAVE BEEN COMING TO HONOLULU FOR OUR ANNIVERSARY AND STAYING AT ONE OF THE RESORTS. THIS TIME WE TOOK OUR CHANCES TO TRY STAYING AT THIS CONDO. OUR STAY AT WONDERFUL WAIKIKI SKYTOWER CONDO WAS AWESOME.
LOCATION, VIEW, CONVENIENCE OF HAVING GARAGE, SAFETY OF BUILDING AND SO MUCH OTHER THINGS ALL WERE SUPERB.OUR HOST MS. DUTCHER WAS A HONEST, KIND, CARING AND WONDERFUL PERSON.WE LIKED IT SO MUCH THAT WE WOULD LIKE TO STAY WHOLE MONTH THERE OUR NEXT VISIT. THANK YOU TIARE

What a fantastic place! Short walk to beach and shops. Loaded with everything you need! Even had extras like soap, sunscreens, lotion, face wash... I think left by other travellers but still cool to have! Great view and plenty of space to relax! Would love to stay again in the future!

My stay with in this condo was amazing and probably the most blessed because it had everything i needed and when i asked for a blender, she got me a blender!  amazing! There was plenty of parking and location was perfect!  Tiara met all of our needs at every moment and was more than accommodating and i would love to come back to this unit again very soon.

Appartement très propre et très bien décoré , avec classe et gout.  Lits très confortables, linge de toilette en abondance, placards de cuisine garnis. Cuisine équipée moderne. L'appartement de Tiare est parfaitement placé au coeur de Waikiki et la vue est dégagée. Nous étions sous la menace de deux ouragans et Tiare a pris de nos nouvelles avant et pendant notre séjour, en nous proposant des solutions de secours au cas où nous en aurions besoin. Elle avait même fait un stock d'eau en bouteilles pour nous au cas où les intempéries entraineraient des coupures d'eau. Tiare a répondu à mes demandes de conseil très rapidement, elle a toujours une réponse adaptée ! Franchement nous avons été chouchoutés !! C'est un plaisir de loger à la Waikiki Skytower ! Elle est  vraiment wonderful et Tiare aussi !

I had an absolutely wonderful experience staying at this Condo in Waikiki at the Waikiki Skytower.  The Condo is on a high floor with basically floor to ceiling windows on 3 sides from the living room.  The views are amazing with the rainforest/mountains/and canal on one side, Diamond Head on the other, and Waikiki Beach on the other!  The Condo is nicely furnished and very modern yet classically "Hawaiian" feel and is clean and comfortable.  The host, Tiare was great and readily available for any questions I had.  The location is also excellent and is literally a 5 minute walk to Waikiki Beach.  Though I do not cook, the kitchen is well stocked with lots of pots and pans etc. I will be back!

Everything is perfect at Tiare's flat.
Location of the skytower is excellent (very close to Kalakaua Ave. and Waikiki),
and everything including even safeway card :) is provided.
I've really enjoyed Oahu thanks to the comfort of the unit.

Our holiday was all that we expected.  Check in - check out was simple. The apartment was well stocked and was with in a short distance to the beach. Tiare was easy to contact and we will not hesitate in staying again or recommending to friends if coming to Hawaii. The apartment is in the ideal location, with great veiws over looking the Ala Wai Golf course.  Regards Ron and Pam  Christchurch  NZ.

Everything that we need was located in few minutes such as beach, car rental and famous restaurants. The room and furnitures were so clean. Check-in process was simple. Host is very kind. Wanna visit again at next chance.

This is wonderful condo, they providing everything than you expected. I stayed there with my husband, my son and my parents, they are all loved it. Thanks. It's so continent and have good view. Expected to stay again.

This apartment was perfect for a number of reasons.....a couple of blocks to Waikiki Beach.....close to bus stops....close to convenience stores.....plenty of "stuff" to make life easier eg beach towels, parking space, toiletries etc.
Thanks Tiare.

Waikiki Skytower was a great way to experience living like a local. It is in a very well managed, secure and centrally located condominium off the busiest tourist streets but close enough to be at the beach or shopping within minutes. There is an excellent supermarket within a couple of blocks and loads of restaurants nearby. Tiare made my stay even more enjoyable just by being so open and accessible whenever I needed to contact her and by going out of her way to ensure I was not encountering any problems. She was always available at a moments notice via a quick text or phone call. When my departure plans had to be adjusted she was extremely helpful and went out of her way to ensure everything went smoothly. Mahalo Tiare and Waikiki Skytower for a great Aloha experience!
We had a great time at the condo. Great views and great location if you would like to stay near Waikiki. Wonderful experience overall.

My family and I stayed at Tiare's beautiful place for 7days. 
The reservation was very smooth. Tiare replayed to all my questions in very short time periods. 
The place was amazing. The place was clean, and it's view was so pretty. The location was perfect, very close to all the main streets but very very quiet. 
We were getting tired of going out everyday so it was so nice to be able to cook.
I recommend everyone to consider renting from Tiare!
Enjoyed the place. Beautiful views. Convenient location. And Tiare was easy to work with. We would stay again.
大変素晴らしい景色と､ﾜｲｷｷの中でも静かな場所に位置するｽｶｲﾀﾜｰでした｡1ｹ月が素晴らしく早く楽しく過ごせた環境に驚き､ﾎｽﾄであるﾃｨｱﾚに感謝します｡本当に有難う御座いました｡

Tiare's place was very clean and well equipped with full kitchen and so many towels. Bedsheets where clean and we felt right at home.
Apartment is great proximity to all things waikiki, the actual street itself is dull. But your 2 short blocks away from all the action. I would recommend this place to all.

Location, location, location; perfect for our stay in Waikiki for our niece's wedding.  The view was spectacular, condo had ample space for the two of us.  Plenty of towels, linens, etc.  Condo was spacious enough, wi fi, tv, supplied kitchen, etc.  We would stay here again given the opportunity.
Tiare,  Thank you for the wonderful stay. The condo had all the amenities we could want and more.  Your precise and prompt responses to our questions were extremely appreciated.
Just as described. Nice place, great view. Very close to beach.

We had fantastic 5-day experience with this condo. Here's a list of things that we found extremely good and convenient:

- 5-min walk to Waikiki beach. This needs no more explanation - just compare with the hotels nearby. This condo beats hotel rooms in every aspect: size, amenities, large patio, etc..

- Parking space included! Note that this is at least $35 value per day if you park outside. Not to mention the hassle of finding an available space along the street..

- A *usable* kitchen. Unlike some other airbnb rooms, the kitchen in this condo was fully equipped. Plenty of dishes, pans, silverware, etc.. We even found a mixer.

- Wonderful view. The pictures in the listing tell the truth. But we found the view at night was more wonderful.

If I'm to be nitpicking, then the only thing not that good was the amenities were a little bit old. Don't get me wrong, they were well maintained and working perfectly.

This condo was clean, spacious and very comfortable.  Our views from our lanai (patio) on the 25th floor afforded us many postcard photos. We got up several mornings during our stay just to watch the sunrise over Manoa and Diamond Head. The pool was perfect, as was the secure garage parking and the location cannot be beat. Our host, Tiare, was attentive and quick to respond.  We would stay here again.
Awesome location and a great place with wonderful views. Tiare was very helpful and accommodating. I would love to come back and stay here.

This apartment is fantastic - centrally located within walking distance of shops and beach, very comfortable and spacious, and the fold out bed feels like a normal stand alone one!  Tiare was a great host, with regular communications she made us felt like we were welcome and was always available to answer questions and make sure we were comfortable.  Thanks Tiare!

This unit is amazing.  The view from the top of the building are special.  The unit was clean, organized and comes with parking as well as many amenities including parking!  Located in central Waikiki means easy walks to the best spots.  It's a sweet spot!

Waikiki Skytower is exactly as pictured, very clean and  comfortable, with  spectacular partial Waikiki, Ali-Wai  canal, and Diamond Head views.  The decor is tasteful and the location is perfect for anyone who loves the beach - 2 blocks from surfers paradise at Waikiki. And it is close  to many great restaurants, a big supermarket (The Food Pantry), rental cars, and shops.
