We never met  Tiare, but she was great at communicating via e-mail and we had a seamless check-in/check-out.  Thank you for everything Tiare.   We highly recommend.

Tiare's apartment is magnificent. Beautiful views of the mountains around Honolulu and the canal, you can even spot a glimpse of the ocean and beach, which is just a short walk away. 

The apartment itself looks as on the photos and has all amenities, including a fully functioning kitchen and washing machine. We had breakfast on the balcony every day, and the neighborhood has a lot of nice restaurants to go out.

Check-in and Check-out were really convenient and uncomplicated, and Tiare was always available, very helpful and friendly, in particular when we had to get a replacement key on short notice.

I highly recommend this place, excellent location, we only used the car to go to other parts of the island as far as Waikiki it was walking distance from everything, very nice place with all amenities, the price is   Tiare is a wonderful host! Definitely coming back again... Mahalo Tiare!  Simone

The location of this rental is great. All that Waikiki has to offer is just steps from the front door. The unit itself was very comfortable, clean and fit our needs nicely. The view from the lanai at night is lovely.
Tiare was very pleasant to work with. Her directions on how to check in were very easy to follow.

We had a great time in Tiare's unit!!!
It's very cozy and clean and comfortable!!
View is good and location is good!!!!
Thanks to Tiare

Exceptional view from this sky tower. 3 minutes walking to Wakiki beach area. Free and easy parking. Clean and beautiful decoration. I would definitely recommend this place to stay in Honolulu and hope to come back!

Excellent stay.
Tiare was an amazing host. Always responds to messages quickly and always very helpful. 
The flat is lovely. Comfortable accommodation. Amenities as described. Only four flats on each floor so plenty of privacy. Location is great, short walk to Waikiki beach. Two blocks to nearest supermarket.
Great to have a pool which we used daily!
Would thoroughly recommend staying at the Sky tower.

The host Mrs.Tiare is very  very friendly and very good person . The place is very clean and relaxing and we love to come back again to this place. I will definitely recommend this place to some of my friends who wish to spend their vacation at Hawaii.

It's my first B&B experience.  And it's really beyond my expectation.  This is a nice apt with everything in one unit.  More convenient than staying in hotel.  Walking distance to Wakiki beach.  Grocery store is minus away.  Free parking is at ground floor garage.  Whole building including garage is gated.  You need key tag to get in and out.  It's a very safe place.  I highly recommend.

This stay also can be very relaxing , I was able to spend meaningful time . Have attentive also cleaning of the room , delicate mindfulness is I was feeling . Mrs.Tiare also a very friendly person , our family and I was able to stay in peace . I would like to thank sincerely to all of that .

As a first time user of airbnb, I couldn't have asked for a better host experience! Tiare was so welcoming and accommodating and made sure our stay was comfortable and enjoyable. She really made us feel like we were home away from home! Thank you so much!

We Had a very good Time in the wonderful waikiki Skytower, the view is really amazing, the apartment is close to everything ( beach, stores and restaurant), it's the place to be for visîting waikiki, i really recommend it, the apartment is very clean and you can find everything you need to have a good trip.
Tiare was very helpful with us, she answered all our questions

Tiare was responsive but non-intrusive. I was travelling with a few girlfriends and it was our first time on the island. This apartment was secure and very safe. The home was lovely and provided great views of the surrounding mountains--the sunset and sunrise views were breathtaking! Plenty of room for everyone, all necessities covered, and we made it a point to spend at least an hour on the porch sipping tea and hanging out to soak in the lovely atmosphere :)

My Fiancee and I had a great 6 night stay at the Wonderful Waikiki Skytower. Tiare was very thorough in her check-in instructions and recommendations. The condo was nice and clean and had amazing views with big glass windows and an outdoor lanai. In the bedroom was a nice big King bed. The unit has a washer and dryer as well as a dishwasher and plenty of China to use. Also, the unit is 5-6 blocks from Waikiki beach, which provided just enough solidarity from touristy areas while still being walking distance to the ocean. There are also toiletries, beach chairs and many extras in the condo. Overall we really enjoyed our stay. Thanks Tiare!

This place was great.  Just as described - centrally located near the channel, only a few blocks from the beach.  Great views overlooking the mountains, with a bit of a view of the ocean from the balcony.

The washer/dryer made it easy to travel light - we brought just a couple days clothes and washed regularly.  The well-stocked kitchen made it easy to go to the supermarket (a couple blocks up the street) and buy food and supplies instead of eating out every meal.  Rather than eating at a restaurant, it was far more pleasant to buy a plate dinner and some salad and fruit from the farmer's market, bring it back to the condo and eat out on the lanai with some beer and wine.  

Overall, a wonderful stay, so much better than a hotel.
Tiare was very responsive. The apartment is conveniently located and offers many amenities such as washer/dryer with laundry soap, towels, detergent, dishwasher.. These made my trip a lot easier.

We LOVED this place! It was so comfortable and had plenty of space for me, my husband and our ridiculous amount of luggage! The bedroom was large and had a lot of closet space as well as a dresser. The king bed was phenomenal. It was so nice to have a full kitchen for nights we wanted to prepare a meal at home. The condo is a quick walk from the beach and all the Waikiki hot spots. We rented a car for a few of the days and the parking garage was very convenient.  Tiare provided many things we hadn't thought of (beach chairs, beach mats, umbrella) and was very responsive and helpful! Would absolutely stay here again!

Tiare was great during the whole vacation process and was available when I had any questions. The location was perfect and walking distance from Waikiki. I loved the view and everything worked great. The building was very secure and I loved that we had a reserved spot and don't have to worry about parking. I like that it also came with amenities. I would recommend this location to anyone who is traveling.

This was a really nice place. Spacious. Fabulous views. Nice lanai. Windows to open for fresh air. Nicely furnished. Great location within two blocks of major beach hotels and restaurants. Tiare was really nice and responded to any questions immediately.

My first stay in Hawaii (and first use of Airbnb) was a wonderful experience, in great part due to Tiare's accommodations.

Check-in instructions were spot on, couldn't have been simpler. 

The condo exceeded expectations, and I had high expectations going in. My two friends and I slept comfortably, had ample space to stretch out and relax after a long day on Waikiki, and loved having the ability to cook ourselves a laid back breakfast each morning.

Location was perfect for us, with a market, too many restaurant options to sort through, and, of course, Waikiki, all within a few blocks. We only needed the rental car when we explored other parts of Oahu, and I loved having free parking awaiting us upon our returns. 

Thank you, Tiare, for a wonderful week!

Tiara accepted our stay request immediately after we have to scramble a place due to problem of previous place. Due to short notice, she was nice enough to greet us at the property and showed us everything. She was a nice person and the place was fully equipped. She mentioned that she cleaned the house herself and the house did indeed very clean. Overall, she is nice, responsive and professional.

Tiare was very communicative and quick to respond. She provided clear instructions on how to check-in. The listing was clean and neatly decorated. It was very well-equipped with a comfy king sized bed. The view is spectacular. The washer and dryer came in handy. The parking spot is convenient and glad that it was included. The brief walk to the beach was a breeze with yummy food nearby. We enjoyed Marukame Udon and Iyasume Musubi.  My parents and I had a wonderful stay. I highly recommend Tiare's listing. Thank you again!

My Experience was awesome! Tiare's directions is clear and she is easily reachable and very responsive! 

Her place is equipped with EVERYTHING that you possibly think you need. Shampoo, conditioner, towels, hairdryer, all the pots and pans and much more. Her place is close by to everything and the best part, own parking spot. It was so nice to be there. Felt very at home for the week. Great for small families or something that's homier than the hotel. Highly recommended!

The location of the condo is great, in the heart of Waikiki with everything within walking distance. The condo itself is very well equipped, with plenty of kitchen and bathroon amenities, and even some beach toys for kids, etc. (For avid cookers, the pots and pans are a bit on the old and scratchy side.) Tiare is very friendly and helpful, and was responsive to all our questions. We loved our stay here and would definitely stay again!
Great place to stay. Spacious enough for 2 couples. Close by to everything. Walking distance to the wonderful Waikiki Beach, shopping, and awesome food/restaurants. Would definitely stay here again!

My wife and I stayed here for 17 nights and enjoyed every minute of it.  The condo was perfect for our needs and included everything that we thought we might need for such a relatively long stay. A gorgeous high floor view and a fully equipped bathroom, kitchen, living room and bedroom with a washer and dryer that came in very handy once we started going to the beach (we reserved our first week for activities and started our short walks to the beach on our second week there). Tiare was an excellent and highly responsive hostess, giving clear directions for getting there and simple instructions upon our departure.  But the best part were the extras like her offering to print some documents when I needed that or responding within the hour to a washer problem that we experienced.  Tiare came in person to inspect and immediately called the technician who came and fixed the problem also within the hour.  This also gave us the wonderful opportunity to meet her in person which was very nice!  All in all a very positive experience and an excellent condo that not only I highly recommend to others but that I would definitely be booking again next time we visit Honolulu.
Tiare gave thorough instructions and made the whole experience smooth. The unit itself offered a great view of the mountains as well. Would go back again.

Tiare was a fantastic host. We had some trouble finding the key to get into the place, but Tiare was there on the dial and actually came to help us out. Tiare's place is clean and organized, and is a hidden gem near the beach.

My first airbnb experience was great. I stayed 14nights with my family include 3years and 10months children.The condo was well equipped, location was great, close to beach, supermarket, bus stop.We were able to enjoy and relax during our stay in Hawaii based in this condo. And Tiare was a nice host, kind and always helpful. 
We will stay there again next time!

Tiare is one of the best Host I've had. 

She respond to email very quickly (within hours) and allowed us to check in early. The place is at a great location, just a 5 minute walk to the beach. There are also great restaurants nearby.  Our favorite is Marukame (Udon noodles). I highly recommend this place and highly recommend Tiare.

The tiara is best.

This condominium is this time, the 4th time.The one rented from a tiara is for the first time.
It's so far and cleanest.
room is clean.
Well.You could have time comfortably.I'd like to rent from a tiara.
Thank you very much.

Tiare is the best, from arrival instructions, during, to see if we needed anything etc, she was excellent. The building had a power issue and at 6pm she was running round getting power leads for us, nothing was a problem. the apt itself was as described, amazing, the view, appliances we would stay there again, maybe next year?? location is great a few minutes walk to Waikiki beach, food pantry, and shopping.
She was very nice and accommodated us well.  Certainly would recommend this to another person and will visit again.
Every thing was as expected.

The apartment is as described. On the 25th floor. Great views over canal to golf course and mountains. Filtered views of ocean and Diamond Head from lounge and balcony. Good size with well appointed kitchen. Very clean and lots of extras provided to make stay easy.
Three blocks, 5 min walk to middle of Waikiki and beach.
Two airconditioners, good kitchen, comfortable bed and sofa lounge.
Supermarket and restaurants close by.

Had a great time!  Our first airbnb and Tiare made it painless.  Very convenient location.  Love the fact that it's closed to center of Waikiki and beach is literally 5-10 walk away.  Love the fact it has parking.  Last time we visited had to $30 for parking at a hotel.  

Place has a lot of little amenities not mentioned.  Washer/dryer was very useful to have.  Don't know why we would ever do hotels again if airbnb places like this are available!  Thanks again Tiare!
Great location near the Dukes statue in Waikiki. Night markets close by and wide choice of restaurants. Nice place for a family of four with children who are happy to share the comfortable sofa bed.
The condo felt very safe and had a great view of the city. We appreciated the two air conditioning units and parking stall!

My wife and I stayed at the Waikiki Skytower for our first visit to Honolulu. The location is great, exactly what I was hoping for. Less than 10 min walk to the beach and surrounded by lots of restaurants. There is also a gated parking on site which made it easy since we had a rental car. Tiare is a great host. She is super detail oriented and sent me check in/out instructions days before our trip. We had a great time there. I highly recommend it.
Good communication on the details of checking in. The place was nice and has wonderful views of the city.

Tiare provided complete directions and all needed information in advance.  This is a fabulous condo located within minutes of Waikiki Beach and all the shops and restaurants.  The garage makes it especially a bargain given the shortage of parking in Honolulu.  You won't go wrong booking with Tiare.  Wonderful view, too.

My husband and I had a great time during our week at the "Waikiki Skytower."  The one bedroom unit was perfect and comfortable for our needs. We loved the openness of the condo.  Being on the 25th floor afforded a great view! We could see the mountains on one side, partial view of Diamond Head on another and from the patio (lanai) a partial view of the ocean.  The value was great, especially when you take into consideration that there are NO daily resort fees and NO charge for parking in the covered, gated garage. You are only two blocks from the beach and right in the middle of the downtown action of Waikiki.  Although we didn't use it, there is a pool on the 5th floor that is visible from our room. Our host, Tiare, was friendly and accommodating and very responsive to our texts.

We had a great time at the condo! The unit is beautiful, and it is in a great location, easy to walk anywhere in Waikiki. We would definitely stay again if we go back to Waikiki! We did not meet Tiare, but she is incredibly responsive via airbnb message (which we had to you since our phones don't work in the US), and I imagine that if there were any problems she would be available to help right away.

The apartment is located one street off Kuhio so you couldn't ask for a better location unless you absolutely need beachfront property.  Tiare had excellent communication and was extremely flexible in her ability to accommodate requests from us, including a late checkout.  The space was large enough for three adults, the pull out bed was comfortable, the shower was very pleasant, and having parking in Waikiki was a premium benefit.  The view was also amazing, facing diamondhead for sunrise every morning was a real treat.  Plenty of extra towels and beach equipment was provided.  It was a great place to stay, we'd stay here again for sure if we come back to Honolulu.

The process of booking with Tiare was fabulous from start to finish. She is warm, friendly and professional, sends excellent directions in advance, answers questions quickly, and provisions guests generously with all the amenities and then some (there were even teas and condiments on hand). Secure garage parking is available on site. The condo is spotless, a short walk to the beach, restaurants and nightlife, and equipped with washer/dryer and a well stocked kitchen. I didn't hear a bit of neighbor noise. The great mountain and city views are a real plus! Her listings book up so quickly, it can be hard to get one, and I'm betting you can see why! But keep checking back until you nab one of her listings, because it will be totally worth the effort.

The process of booking with Tiare was fabulous from start to finish. She is warm, friendly and professional, sends excellent directions in advance, answers questions quickly, and provisions guests generously with all the amenities and then some (there were even teas and condiments on hand). Secure garage parking is available on site. The condo is spotless, a short walk to the beach, restaurants and nightlife, and equipped with washer/dryer and a well stocked kitchen. I didn't hear a bit of neighbor noise. The great mountain and city views are a real plus! Her listings book up so quickly, it can be hard to get one, and I'm betting you can see why. But keep checking back until you nab one of her listings, because it will be totally worth the effort.

Tiare is a wonderful host. The whole process from check-in to check-out was simple and seamless. Tiare provided us with detailed instructions and was very helpful over all. The place is clean and cozy with a wonderful view of Diamond Head and Waikiki Beach which is just a couple of blocks away. It is situated on a quite one way street yet it is in close proximity to all the hustle and bustle if Waikiki (including a lot of dining, shopping and entertainment options. Coffee machine, cups, plates, utensils, towels, even rice cooker were also provided. I would highly recommend to stay at Waikiki Skytower as it is a perfect place to stay and explore what Oahu has to offer. Thank you Tiare!
nice view, good location, clean room, comfortable kitchen, free parking....I will stay here again!!
The condo is nice.  Tiare is an excellent host.  Thank you.
Everything was great and would likely stay here again!
Great communication, value, location, and cleanliness. I'd definitely stay there again

Tiare, was absolutely wonderful, and the condo was beyond our expectations. We stayed for a week, and enjoyed the property. I highly recommend this condo for the location, the cleanliness, and the over all friendliness and promptness of the property manager. As this was our first time using AirBnB, one word of advice, pay attention to the check out time. We were having such a good time, that we let the 11:00 a.m. check out time slip by us by an hour an a half. Tiare was gracious enough to let give us the extra time to check out. She truly is a wonderful, kind and responsive property manager. Again, I highly recommend this property and working with Tiare.

The condo just as nice as the picture.. great views, to diamond head and Waikiki beach. 5 mins walk to the beach, 5 mins walk to Waikiki mall and to famous Matsumoto fresh make udon! Best place in town for family and couple. Very homies!
I would recommend Tiara! Had a fab time. Everything was according to online. The view is amazing!

I stayed at Tiare's place from May 18 to May 22 and it was a great place to stay at! The pictures looked exactly like it did in person. Was very spacious, great views, and the washer/dryer was great as well to keep our towels/clothes clean! Walking distance from shops and restaurants. It's also not in a loud neighborhood or lots of people, but it's literally just a few blocks away from the awesome scenes! 

Great place, I'd stay here again!

Tiare kept communication perfectly, everything was clear from the beginning. This condo has almost 180 degree beautiful view of Waikiki. Very quiet, you will sleep well. Air conditioner very strong, will keep cool immediately when turned on. Comfortable bed. Nice kitchen with washer/dryer, very convenient for washing after swimming. We love the many towels that were stocked in bathroom. The shower was wonderful, very strong power pressure. The TV needs to be bigger. Elevator was fast going up and down. Parking downstairs was great, also gated. Great short walking distances to Waikiki beach and all the shops.

We stayed as a family of three and this was a great choice. The apartment met our needs beautifully and the host was very attentive. I would recommend especially the stunning views of Waikiki and the very comfortable bed!
This is a very clean place with beautiful view. Tiera is very very nice and very responsive.
Awesome place and host!

This condo is perfect to explore waikiki!  Perfectly located you can walk to everything and ala moana is just a short uber ride away.  Huge comfy bed and the pool is lovely for when you need a bit of a relax away from the beach.  Definitely will be back
Great location, close to beach and shops. Clean rental with plenty of towels. Check in was a breeze.

Very convinient location
Very helpful host.

This condo is amazing.   You can't find a better place in Waikiki.  Tiare is  a great manager and she is on top of everything!   For me cleanliness is very important and the place was spotless!   The location is with in 2 blocks from the best places in Waikiki and very close to Duke's beach.   Attention of details were mazing in the condo and you could find everything that you needed to have a very comfortable stay.   I strongly recommend this place and I will go back very soon.

Very beautiful apartment with stunning views of the mountain and partially ocean, apartment with all amenities, parking included, very good location, shops, amazing Waikiki beach just few steps, ... Tiare was very welcomed, despite our delay on arrival, she waited for us and took the time to explain everything. In this accommodation you do not need anything, everything is there, I highly recommend. Thanks Tiare, Aloha

This place was amazing, certainly one of the highlights of the trip itself. Tiare was very responsive in communication, met us and was very hospitable. She also gave us great tips on things to check out. The highlight of this place is the view though, indisputably. It is breathtaking and I'd absolutely stay here again. Very nice touches including towels, in house washer and dryer, and plenty of toiletries.

I cannot recommend Tiare's place enough. It is perfectly located, just blocks away from Waikiki (but far enough to avoid the crazy foot traffic) and down the street from a super nice grocery store. The view cannot be beat, my husband and I spent many hours just sitting on the balcony watching the city and ocean. Tiare has thought of everything, beach towels, cooking aids, you name it. The space is quiet (like super quiet, I'm one of those people who is super bothered by people playing music in rooms next to you or any random noises in my home space) and incredibly clean, and the breeze is so amazing that you never need to turn on the AC units. And Tiare is great, friendly and very communicative. Seriously, with the free parking this spot can't be beat on the island. We will totally be booking here again in the future!

Great location 5 minute walk to Waikiki beach. Lots of shopping within walking distance. Host was in constant communication with me and made our check in very fast and easy! I really recommend this place

Had an amazing stay at Tiare’s place. The location is central to Waikiki but also just behind the Main Street so it’s nice and quiet. The house is big for around 2-3 
people and everything you need is supplied. The only thing is the air conditioning is quite loud so if your a lite sleeper this may affect you but for me it was fine.

We loved our stay in the sky tower. It had great amenities and walking distance to everything we needed, I.e. city life, mall, beach and abc stores. Communication was great and Tiare was flexible with our requests. I traveled for a girls trip and our experience at the sky tower was one for the books. I highly recommend the sky tower! ;)

I enjoyed how central it was to everything, walking distance and 10 minute walk to the beach. I felt the house had more than what we could have asked for and the space was super clean and very well organized. You can tell that Tiare was thoughtful in how she managed all the supplies in the house. You can honestly just show up with a small suitcase because everything you need is in the house.
Great stay with good views. Thank you

Tiare was an amazing host!! Excellent communication throughout our entire trip from check-in to check-out. The place has everything you need. Conveniently located within walking distance to all the shopping malls, restaurants & Waikiki beach! We throughly enjoyed our time here at the Waikiki sky tower & will definitely be back again. Mahalo Tiare from us x
Great apartment right where you want to be in Waikiki. Great views, clean and very comfortable! Tiare was very communicative and helpful.

We loved this apartment! We stayed in Tiares beautiful space for the first few nights of our honeymoon and felt so comfortable. Tiare has catered for everything and we didn’t find ourselves missing anything at all. The place has all you need with amazing views, a great host and is only a short walk from Waikiki beach. We were able to cook our own meals, wash clothes and feel right at home! Tiare is lovely, and made us feel very welcomed to Hawaii right away. We really wish we could have stayed there longer, and would definitely book again without a doubt! Thankyou Tiare. What a special place! 
Aloha :) 
Lauren + Liam
Tiare is amazing and wonderful, and her condos are always sparkling clean and ready for you! I've written many previous reviews for her rentals, feel free to refer back for more details.
The condo was in a great location for walking to the beach and other shop and dining options.
Space was spotless upon arrival. Has lovely views of Honolulu. Well equipped with towels and snorkels, perfect for spending time at the near by Waikiki beach.
We loved Tiare’s apartment - what an amazing view!The kitchen is well laid out and had everything we needed, bed very comfortable. Handy to everything, with a nice residential feel.

Tiare was an excellent host. This is our second time staying at Waikiki Towers and became easily familiar with the area. The location is walkable to everything with the beach being a short 10 minute walk. Check in and check out was easy. We had our privacy and it felt like it was our own little place. Everything you need is provided including beach towels, chairs and beach toys for the kids. The only thing the building is missing is a workout center which would have been the cherry on top. However, all the walking you do will definitely takes of those extra calories from being on vacation. I would say this is a great rental for families. My kids loved it. Not to mention, the building is very secure and you also have gated garage parking. Its safe to walk at night, there’s so much going on all the time. I would highly recommend this rental and would come back to stay again. Thanks Tiare!

We stayed in the condo for five nights and found it to be a comfortable and convenient home base for our visit to Oahu. Tiare met us promptly when we arrived at night and check out was easy. The parking space was nice as we had a rental, although it’s a very tight spot! We used the washer and dryer, shower pressure was good, and the condo is stocked with lots of extra towels and beach towels. A great stay!

It is in a great location if you are looking for the liveliness of Waikiki .Walking distance to many great restaurants and beach. Wonderful views from unit. Kitchen was well stocked . We cooked in a lot. Tiare has beach chairs , mats tubes, kids sand toys , snorkel and flippers for your use. It was a great experience for first time Airbnber's!

We were so happy to be in this unit. We had used Tiare before, but for a unit on the 10th Floor (also worthwhile), but being on the 25th makes it even more special. The unit itself is wonderfully decorated and we were pleased with everything.

We would most highly recommend this unit, and would be happy to stay here in the future.
Tiare was very responsive and the condo was very clean. Will definitely stay there again.

This was our first time to Oahu and didn't know what to expect.  The condo is absolutely in the  best location!  It was 2 blocks to the beach and main strip, within walking distance to all of waikiki and the views were amazing.  The photo's you see are are exactly what you get.  The condo also had everything we needed, lots of towels, beach chairs, toys and snorkelling equipment.    We had a car the entire time which allowed us to do day trips to all of the beaches and attractions on the island.   Access to the rest of the island was easy to drive and allowed us to do so much more.  Having access to parking was a great asset.  If you don't have a car, there is a grocery store a block away and lots of places to find happy hours and reasonably priced food.   I would definitely recommend and return to the condo.  We were there 10 days and enjoyed every day!

Tiare is an awesome host who looked after us so well, and we loved our stay in the heart of Waikiki. You really have everything you need including a full kitchen and laundry so you don’t have to eat out every night if you don’t want to. Fantastic views, including of the fireworks from Waikiki beach. Tips- the nearby abc stores sell ice cream mochi, and Kai coffee on 2424 Kalakaua ave (at the Hyatt Regency), a 5 min walk, has excellent coffee as demonstrated by the fact that it is well patronised by Aussies. Can’t wait to come back!

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! The location of this apartment is seriously perfect. It’s a short 7 minute walk to waikiki beach and right next to the best udon spot on the island. If you’re renting a car, FREE parking in the complex!! The apartment itself is spotless and immaculate. The lanai (balcony) has a gorgeous view and is perfect for meals made in the apartment. Tiare is a fantastic host, super responsive and attentive. All your questions will be answered or anticipated in her directions. The elevators are a bit slow but honestly not that bad. Will definitely come back to this apartment and Tiare.

Convenient location and comfortable place to stay. Tiare arranged to meet us when we arrived to show us around and she is a wonderful host. We only stayed 2 nights and there were 4 adults and everyone was pleased here. We all enjoyed spending time on the lanai for morning coffee and at night. The views are great. The only downside to the home is the air conditioning is a bit noisy both inside the rooms and outside on the balcony. I would like to stay here again despite the air conditioning noise. The location, amenities, and view make up for it.
This space was the perfect base point for discovering Oahu.  Clean, convenient and comfortable!
Tiare’s place is exactly as described. Great location for the price!
Amazing place, close to everything and the host was very friendly.

Fantastic place and fantastic location! With both view over the mountains and the beach. This was a wonderful pick. Tiare was very nice and helpful and the condo was exquisite. Fantastic overlook and location. Great to sit on the lanai and eat breakfast with a view. Had all the inventory you would need. Overall a very high-end feel. Would easily stay there again!
어른2, 아이2이 지내기에 좋은 곳이었습니다. 주차시설이 있어서 렌트하여 다니기 편했고, 와이키키까지고 걸어서 이동가능했습니다. 아이들 걸음으로 10분정도? 물놀이용품도 이용할 수 있고 아침은 늘 해서 먹고 다니고.. 빨래도 자주하고 아이들 있는 집은 괜찮을듯하네요!^^
Great location and amazing view at night. It’s very quiet and close to the Waikiki beach. Tiare is very kind and sweet.
Perfect location, great price!

立地がとても良い｡部屋からの眺望も昼も夜もとても良かった｡
生活するためのものはほぼ全て揃っていました｡
自分の洋服だけあれば十分だと感じました｡

Tiare was amazing and super friendly! She even got us a new coffee maker right away when the old one broke! Location was great and the apartment was perfect for what we needed - very clean and had everything! Would totally stay here again!

Stayed a week with my family and we all loved it. The amenities we loved were the beach sets such as the chair, parasol, sand play set for the kids, and a wagon to carry them all and more! We had not been able to have as much fun as we did if not with these items so very thankful. 
Walk to Waikiki beach was really only 5 or so mins and access to all the fun was walking distance. 
Also loved the free parking, we just need a car anywhere so this comes with a couple hundred bucks saving compared to a resort hotel. 

We would definitely consider coming back to Waikiki Skytower :)
nothing to add

Tiare’s place was just as described. It was a beautiful, 25th floor apartment with amazing views to both the mountains and the beach. The space was larger than we expected and had everything you would need for a vacation. We loved having a washer and dryer to be able to do all of our laundry before heading back home. 
On check in, Tiare spent time showing us all the facilities in the building as well as showing us around the apartment. Communication was easy and she was very responsive. 
On checking out and at 5.30am, we accidentally locked ourselves out of the apartment and Tiare came to our rescue within about 15 mins and was extremely helpful! She saved us from missing our flight home! :)
Would absolutely stay here again.

Tiare was an amazing host. Being there during the hurricane was a frightening experience and her reassurance and support was great. 
The apartment had everything we needed for our stay. Would highly recommend this apartment and would stay here again.

管理が行き届いた部屋でした｡
ｵｰﾅｰさんも気さくな方で､ﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞの仕方から部屋の中の説明､洗濯機の使い方など 細かに教えてくださいました｡
ｱﾒﾆﾃｨが沢山あり､ｼｬﾝﾌﾟｰやﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｰｿｰﾌﾟ､ﾎﾞﾃﾞｨｰｸﾘｰﾑや日焼け止め…ﾏﾆｷｭｱまで置いてありました｡

ﾀｵﾙも沢山置いてありました｡ﾋﾞｰﾁ用具も全て使って良かったので､私たちはﾋﾞｰﾁﾁｪｱを借りて海へ行きました｡

保冷ﾊﾞｯｸや保冷剤もあったので､お借りしました｡

なんでも揃っていたので､本当にたすかりました｡

唯一大変だったのは､立地です｡遠回りしないとﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞには入れなかったので､狭い道を車で入っていくのに少し大変でした｡

This was the first time i have used AirBnb so I was a bit skeptical. But looking at hotels on Waikiki this place is a was too hard to pass up! Not only is the price much cheaper but it comes with free parking, a large space, fully supplied kitchen, washing machine, towels... Its better than my first apartment I lived in! 

It's a 5 minute or less walk to the beach and Waikiki shopping center. My doubts when booking were mainly cleanliness worries. But once I got there the place was clean, neat and great. If I ever go to Waikiki again I would get this same place without a second thought.

전망좋고 위치좋고 깨끗하고 호스트 친절합니다.
다만 큰차를 렌트할경우 Full suv 등
주차장 천장이 낮아 주차가 어렵습니다.(가능은 합니다)
숙소는 그리  크지 않습니다.
좋은 위치 합리적인 가격
Four non couple adults may find this a bit crowded.
Tiare’s place was great! Just as described. Had a wonderful stay! Thanks Tiare!
Excellent location! Close to the beach and lots of restaurants within walking distance. The apartment had everything we needed and even included snorkeling gear! We would definitely stay here again.

Great location 
Apartment has all the facilities you need. 
Parking space very handy if you have a car
Lovely host and lovely apartment! Amazing location, very close to all the shops and the beach. Very clean and comfortable place.

This place is like a home away from home, only BETTER!  Imagine this:  an amazing panoramic view of the mountains, city lights and Ala Wai Canal from the 25th floor of a high rise condo is a dream come true. Then enjoy your coffee as you take in the lovely view of the azure ocean.  
Tiare as a host ranks #1 in our book because of her professional conduct, kindness, understanding, and thoughtfulness.  She provided everything you need to feel at home (the essentials AND the extras like a blender, toaster, tea kettle, condiments, detergent) and the beach (chairs, umbrella, snorkeling gear, cooler, beach towels, sunscreen and even a cart to haul it all).  Tiare is a friendly and hospitable host whose mission is to be sure your needs are taken care to your satisfaction, yet not be intrusive.  
Without a doubt, whenever we return to paradise, we'll stay here again and again!
Excellent location. Great mountain and city views. The host was very hospitable and accommodating.

夫婦2名で7泊滞在しました｡
調度品のｾﾝｽが良く､室内ﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰとﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞ付だったのでTiareさんのお部屋に決めました｡実際に滞在すると､とても室内が広く清潔で快適でした!
日焼け止め･調味料･ｹﾁｬｯﾌﾟなど細かい備品も揃えていて何かと便利です｡
ﾄｲﾚｯﾄﾍﾟｰﾊﾟｰの予備5ﾛｰﾙも助かりました｡
ﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞは便利な位置に停められるのでお部屋･外･ﾊﾟｰｷﾝｸﾞの行き来が楽でした｡
また機会がありましたら滞在したいです!!
It was great experience staying at Waikiki sky tower. We all loved this property.

Tiare's place is located perfectly -- very close to everything at Waikiki.  The condo came as expected and described at AirBnB.  It included all amenities one needs for a comfortable stay.  And, Tiare is just amazing!  Thank you, Tiare.  Being very helpful, Tiare would assist and correspond quickly.  I would highly recommend staying at Tiare's place.

와이키키비치와 가까운 거리에 위치하고 있어서 도보로 주변 관광이 가능했고
주차가 무료로 가능했습니다
시설과 뷰는 사진과 동일했으며
무엇보다 호스트가 친절하고 응대가 빨라서  불편함이 없었습니다

The host is so nice . She wi make sure you are good at all times . I really enjoyed my stay in Hawaii thanks to her. Airbnb is close to ever and having a parking space comes in handy for when you want to venture off .

name: Central, Soho High Fl. Bright View
summary: Bright, Very Central Apt. with 2 Queen Bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and living/dining room.  New Aircon in July 18. On Aberdeen Street (by Hollywood Rd in Soho)  Great Med. or Long Term HK Home. European tasteful furnishing, newly fully renovated, big bathroom & wash mach.
space: Perfect for a 1-2 people seeking a long term home in HK in a great location.  The Apt. has been completely redone with European taste, including a new Kitchen and new furniture.  Because  of renovation no pictures are available quite yet, but you can make an appointment to view the great space anytime.   The APT.     Bright, Very Central Apt. with 2 Queen Bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and living/dining room has just been newly renovated with European taste. On High Floor, bright and airy with a great open view over Soho, Central and Sheung Wan. The apt has a Large Bathroom with large shower and washing machine inside. The fully renovated Kitchen is new, clean and practical, with all necessary appliances for preparing light meals. The building is well equipped with a fast modern elevator, guards, trash collection and our cleaning lady etc.      The Apt. is fully furnished and will be ready to move in with suitcases.  There is ample storage in closets, and furniture for a medium to long te
description: Bright, Very Central Apt. with 2 Queen Bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and living/dining room.  New Aircon in July 18. On Aberdeen Street (by Hollywood Rd in Soho)  Great Med. or Long Term HK Home. European tasteful furnishing, newly fully renovated, big bathroom & wash mach. Perfect for a 1-2 people seeking a long term home in HK in a great location.  The Apt. has been completely redone with European taste, including a new Kitchen and new furniture.  Because  of renovation no pictures are available quite yet, but you can make an appointment to view the great space anytime.   The APT.     Bright, Very Central Apt. with 2 Queen Bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom and living/dining room has just been newly renovated with European taste. On High Floor, bright and airy with a great open view over Soho, Central and Sheung Wan. The apt has a Large Bathroom with large shower and washing machine inside. The fully renovated Kitchen is new, clean and practical, with all necessary appliances for preparing li
neighborhood_overview: The building is in the heart of a dynamic and enjoyable neighborhood… Soho and a short walk from the business center Central with easy connections to all of Hong Kong. Many of HK's best places to eat, drink, shop, enjoy performances, art and culture are located within a few minutes’ walk. The building entrance is in front of PMQ (the first two photos), with great restaurants, shops and events.
notes: It is a perfect place to be based for living or exploring HK! The apt. is VERY convenient and Central.  It is in the heart of the enjoyable Soho (SOuth of HOllywood) area with boundless restaurants, galleries, shops, bars, culture etc.
transit: Getting To & Around the Area Easy access to Central and Sheung Wan MTR. It is a few minutes' walk to the Central Escalator and a 5-10 minute ride down to the IFC Building and the Airport Express Train in Central. Along the way is easy access to Central office buildings, Hollywood Road and Sheung Wan. It is also easy to access the MTR Central Station D2 exit and Airport Express. Taxi's are plentiful outside the front door. It is easy to walk to Central, Admiralty & Sheung Wan, and for the more adventurous you can hike to the Peak.
access: Guests have full access to everything in the Apt.  There is wifi and television as well as facilities for cooking light meals and washing clothes and some nice amenities.
interaction: We are always pleased to be in contact with our Guests and to help them with their needs and questions throughout your stay.
house_rules: As a basic courtesy for the neighbors, we request no loud noise and no smoking.

reviews.comments: Andrea just a wonderful host - polite, sympathetic, delicate. Accommodation in her apartment was an ornament of our Hong Kong trip. The apartments are conveniently located between the MTR stations Central and Sheung Wan, right across the street from the PMQ. The apartments are not very big, but they have two bedrooms, a living room, a spacious bathroom and a kitchen with everything you need. New furniture and linens, kitchen utensils, each room is air conditioned and very clean. My husband and I were very pleased.
Central Soho apartment was bright and comfortable. We had the best location, close to escalator and easy walk to MTR thanks Andrea we will be back

Andrea was an outstanding host.  She sent detailed notes prior to our arrival in Hong Kong giving advice on how to get to the flat from the airport, details of local shops, restaurants and guidance about local transport around the city.  
The flat is a real gem!  It is located on the 14th Floor in an area surrounded by a variety of restaurants, and bars.  However it was extremely quiet.  We couldn't hear any street noise from inside the flat.  The building had a doorman and felt very safe.  Neighbours were extremely quiet and were very friendly.  The flat had been recently decorated and was beautifully presented  It is small which is normal for a flat so central but was ideal for three people.  The air conditioning, showers, washing machine etc worked perfectly.  Andrea was there to meet us on arrival and over the course of our 6 week stay was prompt in dealing with our queries.  We asked for an iron and ironing board and she delivered one the same day.  We had a cleaner every week and clean sheets and towels were provided.

The flat gives very easy access to all the sights of Hong Kong.  It is situated minutes from the Central Escalators and it takes no more than 20 minutes to walk to Central mtr , the Piers and to the Peak Tram.  It is about a 10 minute walk to the tram to Pacific Place/Causeway Bay area.

I would recommend this flat and would have no hesitation in staying there again.

We actually didn't get to stay in this apartment in front of TMQ.  There was a water problem few days before we arrived and it couldn't be fixed by the time we get there.  Instead Andrea offered a newly refurbished apartment on Po Hing Fong.  It was bit far from where we originally wanted to stay but turned out to be a very nice neighborhood.  8 minutes walk to Sai Ying Pun A1 exit (remind you from A1 exit you will need to walk another 8 minutes to get to the platform with the help of moving sidewalk). If you walk back to the apartment, you need to climb some slopes and stairs.  It's not something we enjoyed after eating and drinking much.  

Many of the taxi drivers know how to get to Po Hing Fong, but when you go out you will need to go down to Tug Hwa Hospital or Hollywood Road to catch a taxi

So one reminder is when you leave the apartment with big luggage, it is not very easy to go down.  You may want to ask Andrea for the number of taxi company if you are travelling with many luggage or kids.

The apartment itself is very clean and nice with 2 bedrooms just enough to fit double bed in each of them.  Kitchen was small for any real cooking but we really didn' need to cook in Hong Kong.  Bathroom - I wish the toilet bowl was a tad bigger.  Showerbooth was ok with the water pressure on the weak side.  The heater provided very hot water so that helped.

Bed - the mattress was firm - just the way I liked it.  I kept my windows open and did not need to turn on the aircon.       

Andrea was a great host.  On our first night, because the unit was still newly refurbished, there was no wifi installed, yet.  So she offered me to use her office nearby and her husband offered his iPhoneto be used as a hotspot.  I couldn't take it but it was a great gesture.

We actually didn't get to stay in this apartment in front of TMQ. There was a water problem few days before we arrived and it couldn't be fixed by the time we get there. Instead Andrea offered a newly refurbished apartment on Kee Onn building which is end of Hollywood road, as per Andrea this appartment is actually bigger than the original 1 but still is very small, we understand appartment is usualy small in HK and we always out for sightseeing so it is not an issue for us. Overall the place is clean and just bit far from the mid level escalator but you can always take cab to central, it cost you less than HKD30. Andrea is a great host , she will ensure you got everything you need during your stay!

Thanks Andrea

We were offered another apartment on Hollywood Blvd, because there were problems with the water in the originally booked apartment. Both apartments were nearby.

Our apartment had just been renovated, was clean with all the necessary facilities. Great neighbourhood, calm, but still with enough shops, bars and restaurants nearby.

Andrea sent someone to meet us at the apartment, and we were able to check-in before 2:00 pm since our flight arrive early.  The Apt. is small but it's in good condition, and all the necessary stuff are there including wifi access.  Location is very convenience, restaurants, 7-eleven, and MRT are within walking distance.

Henry
Nice and cosy apartment. Central location but still quiet.

cozy and cute yellow interior with extremely fantastic location between Soho and LanKuaiFong. Also there is an arcade of new designer's stores and cafe just opposite side of the apartment which was so great. i definitely would like to stay again !!
대체로 좋았어요. 비행기 연착, 택시 대기줄 때문에 도착예정시간보다 훨씬 늦어서 미안했어요. 아쉬운 점이라면 예약 전에는 답장이 빨랐는데, 게스트 수 변경 요청(일부환불) 했을때는 몇일씩 걸렸던 점. 그리고 생각보다 집이 좁아요. 저흰 2명이서 사용했는데, 최대 3명까지는 쓸 수 있을것같아요.

The place is in a great location.  Lots of good action right off of aberdeen st and you're right there in the middle of SOHO/LKF.  Lots of bars/restaurants etc.  Definitely a tourist spot which was perfect for us.  

As far as the space. ..pretty tiny tbh so it's just as well we didn't spend much time there.   The shower is spacious and great and the water is piping hot.  Andrea was swift and helpful with all enquiries.

What a wonderful place Andrea has, a cosy 2 bedroom located on the 14th floor(actually 8) across from the PMQ! It is centrally located right at the edge of SOHO just a very short walk to all the great bars and restaurants! Met Andrea who just flew in from the US and it was a very simple handover of the keys to the place. These are 2 air con units. One in the main bedroom and the other in the living room. There is a 711 just right around the corner for your daily necessities like water or in our case, an umbrella! (Andrea does provide an umbrella in the apartment)
Wonderful place. We will return!

Andrea is s great host.  The apt is well equipped with everything you need - toaster, microwave, washing machine, pots, towels, Cable TV with many channels.  Shower has good water power which is not always the case in Hong Kong.  Sheets and towels are freshly washed and ironed.  Of course, you cannot find a better location in the heart of SOHO and 7 minutes to Central MTR.  Walking distance from airport express too.

Clean and well located apartment with all amenities. 
As we were only staying for a 1 night stopover, we found this perfect.
Would definitely stay here again next time i visit HK.

Andrea was wonderful.  She made sure we knew where to go and how to get there and answered all our queries.  The apartment is extremely well located and has everything you need for a fantastic stay.  Would definitely stay there again.

This apartment was a great place! I always consider the location as most important, when you choose a place to stay, and for that, the location can't be better! It is just in the heart of Central and Shengwan, surrounded by cozy restaurants and bars but also close to the local HK life. It is also close from the midlevel escalator, so you don't need to worry about the steep hills.
The apartment is a typical small HK style apartment, but it is clean and cozy with a good view over the new PMQ shopping area. (14th floor with elevator). The small kitchen was nice, and bathroom was clean as well. All linen and towels were also freshly washed.
It was my very first airbnb experience, and even I was worried how it will turn out, it ended to be a very pleasant experience! 
I didn't have a chance to meet Andrea (A nice lady waited for us at the entrance, to open the door), but I really want to say thank you for smooth correspondence over mail, and very detailed explanation of the place and transportation. I felt she was just next to me when I needed her! Thank you :)

Andreas place was great. Probably one of the best locations in Hong Kong. We had a small mishap and lost the key at a restaurant, and Andrea kindly met us (Very late/Morning) to make sure we got into the apartment. Couldn't have asked for a better host or place to stay. Thank you for everything. Would def recommend for all!

Andrea responded quite fast and was really helpful with our early check-in request (as we took red eye flight and reached early morning), we got to meet her and she was nice enough to do a quick tour of the place.

The apartment is exactly what you see in the pics. Typical Hong Kong small space apartment, however the mirror placements and decor helped a lot without the claustrophobic feel. Bathroom is spacious with hairdryer (which all of us ladies appreciate it so much).

The neighbourhood is AWESOME, close to many attractions and great bars. But follow Andrea's advice and take taxi there from MTR station (Hong Kong or even Central) because with the luggage it was super challenging with the steep hills! If taxi driver doesn't get the address (we even got scolded by them, so much for Hong Kong 'hospitable' service), tell them "Aberdeen Street - PMQ". Easiest milestone is a pressed juice shop on the corner.

7-Eleven is just around the corner, Gage street fruit market is nearby, and we can just walk to famous food place (Tsui Wah, Mak's Noodles, etc). We even walked to the Hong Kong Macau ferry terminal. That saved us dollars for transportation :)

Thanks Andrea for the memorable stay!

Thank you Andrea for a lovely stay at your place.  It was so nice to meet you. We were very comfortable there. The location is ideal for exploring Central. The space is bright and clean. We appreciated the restaurant recommendations.

Apartment is located near cafes, restaurants. You can't go hungry and you don't need to cook! The place is clean and any queries were responded promptly over (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Check in and out were easy. Directions provided were clear! Enjoyed the stay.

帮朋友预订的,朋友表示非常满意,谢谢 Andrea的照顾, Andrea会说中文,推荐
Reservation for friends, friends say very satisfied, thank you Andrea care, Andrea will speak Chinese

Andrea was very accommodating re our late arrival and very helpful with other things.  Check-in was smooth.  Perfect location!  Close to the escalator and Soho restaurants.  The apartment was clean, stocked well, and the perfect size for two women travelers.  I would stay here again.

Overall experience was fantastic! Andrea was super responsive and prompt throughout the stay. We had some problem with keys as we arrived at the apartment, but she got it resolved within a very short time and ensured we had no hassles. The apartment was cute and clean and had all the requisite amenities. Highly recommended!
Cool place for 1-2 guests in lively neighbourhood (SoHo) with lots of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques; close to PMQ.
房间非常好    房间设备也很好   房主很nice  交通不是很方便  离地铁站有一段距离

Great location.  Perfect as there are not many two bedroom apts. on airbnb which was a key for selecting this place.  The one bedroom has a really great view. Its in the heart of soho so you are in the night life of the city.

The whole booking process was fast and efficient. Andrea also helped us find accommodation the night before with very short notice. The location was convenient and all amenities inside were  included. Thanks for all your help in making our stay enjoyable!

Andrea was an extreme pleasure to work with - I would happily stay in another of her listings again! The location of the apartment was in a wonderful spot in SoHo and the space was just enough for 2 adults for one week. I would have no hesitations recommending this listing or this host to a friend.
Great

Andrea's place is perfectly located in Soho and within walking distance to all the city has to offer, including LKF. The apartment is cosy, clean, and has aircon in each room. It is not a huge apartment (this is HK after all) so if traveling as a group plan to be out for most of the day. 

Andrea was extremely communicative throughout the process  and was even kind enough to loan me a power bank when my phone was dead. Highly recommend the apartment to anyone visiting Hong Kong.

We really enjoyed our 10 days stay in this lovely apartment in one of the best locations in Hongkong!
The apartment is really cute and has an amazing view from the master bedroom. The bathroom is really spacious,too.The check-in was really friendly and uncomplicated,too. 
We can highly recommend to stay in the apartment  (:
房子很棒｡空间小但装修绝赞,生活用品一应俱全｡但印度姑娘迟到了十分钟,然后拿着一大串试了半天不对,又跑回去拿钥匙,离约定入住时间晚了半小时｡希望服务方面今后改进｡
Andrea was very prompt to reply and provided clear instructions on everything related to the apartment. Great location!

Location is perfect - right in the middle of Soho and within walking distance to the mid level escalators and MTR. If walking isn't your thing, it's quite easy to grab a cab from in front of the apartment building. 
The apartment is cosy, with a spacious bathroom. Andrea was also quick to respond to any queries and requests and check-in/ check-out was uncomplicated. We certainly enjoyed our stay here.

Very convenient and central to anywhere in Hong Kong - central station and ferry about 15-20 mins walk 
The flat is ideal for those who want to do a bit of self catering 
Excellent chinese restaurants which are very affordable in nearby Wellington  Street
Great location. Small apartment, but just right for two people who like to adventure out and eat out and stay out. Clean and comfortable.

우선 홍콩섬의 지리적인 특징부터 알려드리자면 홍콩섬은 언덕(a.k.a 엄청난 경사로 & 수많은 계단들) 및 비좁은 일방통행 도로, 보행자로가 많습니다 이 점을 유의하지 않고, 지도에서의 위치만 보고 이 숙소로 예약을 하였습니다. 짐이 크지 않고 무겁지 않다면, 살짝 돌아가더라도 (호스트가 미리 알려주듯이) 미드레벨 에스컬레이터를 이용하는 것이 그리 불편하진 않습니다. 그러나 짐이 크고 무겁다면 미드레벨 에스컬레이터를 이용한다 할지라도, 미드레벨에스컬레이터에서 숙소까지 이동할 때 비좁은 보행자로와 계단들로 짐과 사투를 벌이며 숙소에 가야할 것입니다ㅠㅠㅠㅠ.... 18도정도의 기온에 흐린 날씨임에도 불구하고 땀나고, 성격도 순간 더러워질 뻔 했었습니닼ㅋㅋ 이렇게 이동하는 것도 체크인 전 날 센트럴역에서 미리 시뮬레이션해보았음에도 불구하고 이렇게 힘들고 살짝 헤매었어요......ㅠㅠ이동거리가 꽤 되니(센트럴역에서 약 20분 소요,미드레벨 이용시) 미리 참고하셨음 좋겠습니다^^ 숙소 자체는 홍콩 현지인은 이런데서 생활하겠구나 싶어 좋았습니다 뭔가 체험하는 것 같고 ㅋㅋ 실제는 사진에서 보이는 것보단 조금 좁지만 여자 3명이 쓰기에는 전혀 좁게 느껴지지 않았고, 주방, 거실이 있어 진짜 집에서 생활하는 느낌이 들어 좋았습니다. 화장실이 주방 및 거실에 비해 넓었던 반면에 두번째 방은 딱 더블침대 하나로 꽉 차는 그런 방이었습니다. 주방에도 식기 및 주방도구들이 다 있어서 간단한 조리 및 과일 먹기에도 수월했었습니다. 드라이어, 수건, 옷걸이 등 필요한 물품들은 대부분 있었지만, 멀티어댑터가 없어 공항 통신사 데스크에서 빌려간 멀티어댑터를 사용했습니다. 주변 교통편은 버스는 이용하지 않아 잘 모르겠지만 대부분의 여행자들이 그렇듯 지하철이나 트램을 더 많이 이용할 것 같습니다. 지하철, 트램은 도보로 10분 이상 걸어나가야 하는데, 언덕이 꽤 가파르고 골목골목 돌아가야해서 주변 교통편이 좋다고 생각되진 않았습니다. 특히나 숙소로 돌아가는 길이 지름길로 가면 너무 힘들어서 미드레벨을 꼭 이용했었습니닼ㅋ 그래도 주위에 유명한 식당들 베이커리들이 다 있어 관광에는 정말 좋았습니다 5분도 안되는 거리에 린흥티하우스, 카우키, 신흥유엔 등이 있고, 소호도 가깝고, 밤에 란콰이퐁에서 걸어오는데도 많은 술집들이 늦게까지 사람들이 많아 위험하단 느낌 없이 잘 돌아올 수 있었습니다. 이제부터 단점인데, 여행 가기 전부터 호스트와의 연락이 잘 되지 않았습니다. 에어비앤비 메세지는 잘 확인하지 않는건지, 아니면 확인하고도 답변을 안하는건지 (아마도 후자라고 생각....) 호스트 답변률이 95프로라는 것이 심히 의심스러울 정도로 커뮤니케이션이 잘 되질 않습니다. 마치 자동메세지같은 말만 보내고 거기에 대한 궁금점이나 답변을 보내면 돌아오는 답변이 없습니다. 그리고 체크인 전날 체크인에 도움 줄 자신의 동료 홍콩 핸드폰 번호만 띡하니 알려주고 "도착 20분 전에 연락을 줘야 동료가 제 시간에 도착할 수 있다."는 메세지를 보내줍니다. 제가 여행을 떠나기 전, 에어비앤비 메세지로 연락이 안되어 불안함을 느껴, 알려준 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 먼저 연락을 했는데도 답변이 없더니, 전날 밤인가 당일 오전에 그런 연락을 보낸 것이었습니다. 보통 이런 에어비앤비를 이용하는 여행자들은 현지 유심을 구매하거나, 로밍을 해가거나, 포켓 와이파이정도를 가져가서 쓸텐데(아니면 가난한 배낭여행자라면 이마저도 아끼려고 무데이터여행으로 떠날지도 모르는데) 여행 일주일 전도 아닌 거의 당일날 홍콩 현지핸드폰 번호를 알려주며 최소 도착 20분 전에 연락을 하라니..... 저는 이 메세지도, 2시에 제가 미리 호스트에게 2시에 체크인할거라고 알려준 그 시간에 도착해서 미리 마중나온 사람이 없는걸 알고 에어비앤비 어플에 들어가서야 확인할 수 있었습니다. 다른 호스트들은 미리 이런 사항을 예약 시 알려주거나 최소 1주일 전에 알려주는데, 정말 여긴 연락도 안되고.............아 진짜 ................ 호스트와의 연락과 소통을 중요하게 여기시는 분이시라면 이 숙소는 비추입니다. 또 소통이 정말 안되었다고 느꼈던 다른 일은 1인 추가비용을 내가며, 3명이 이 숙소를 사용할 거라고 메세지로도 보내서 수건 최소 3개를 제공해달라고 해서 이 거에 대한 답변까지도 늦게나마 받았었는데 결국 준비되어 있던 수건은 2개뿐이었습니다. 이 점에 대해서 호스트에게 연락할까도 했지만 어차피 답변도 늦거나 없을 것 같아 포기했었습니다. 멀티어댑터가 없는 건 그리 문제가 안되지만(미리 챙겨가세요!) 첫번째방에는 전기코드 위치가...

The location of this apartment is fantastic. Right in the heart of Central/Soho with a million places to eat and drink. Could not have asked for a better place to be based. This is fortunate as the apartment is not adequately equipped to cater in. The kitchen is very small (think cupboard rather than actual room). The rest of the flat is fine. Flats in HK are not large by any means and I would guess that this apartment is about average. Good bathroom. One good sized double bedroom with wardrobe and one double bedroom with no space other than the actual bed. The beds are extremely hard! The living room area is fine, not spacious but OK for three people (too small for 4). The sofa is comfy but do not think that someone could sleep on it (it is a two person sofa).

Overall, I would recommend this apartment but that is almost entirely down to the location. The host was friendly and seemed nice however was difficulty to get in touch with prior to the stay. She did, very kindly send through two long notes about how to get to the apartment  and what is in the vicinity immediately upon booking which was very useful. 

I stayed for 4/5 days which is about the longest I would have been able to have stayed.

Andrea was such a friendly and accommodating host. 
Her place is located in the middle of Soho and in Hong Kong terms, an excellent location. It is located on a slope but there is always the mid levels escalator to save you from most of the climbing. 
Spacious and clean bathroom, comfortable beds, convenient location are just what you need for a good stay in Hong Kong.

Location was ideal - near the midlevel escalator, so easy to arrive w. luggage without walking up too many hills! 2 bedroom apartments in this part of town is often hard to find, so we were pleased to book it. Easy access walking to Central MTR, Macau ferry, trams & buses.
Apartment is just as it looks in the photos & while kitchen is small (as per most HK apartments) it is easy to prep simple meals & reheat leftovers. 
Host was quick to respond via AirBnB for any queries that arose during stay.

We had a pleasant stay .. it was a nice cosy n convenient place to stay. Ideal for 2 or a small family ..The kitchen has everything basic required.  Excellent location. Also a big thanks for arranging to keep our luggage for a couple of hours .. that was very helpful !

Andrea's apartment was in a really great location - close to tons of must-go restaurants and eateries, and not too far from both Sheung Wan and Central MTRs. The place was great too, small as with most Hong Kong apartments but enough for three of us travelling. There was a small issue with the bathroom door but it was solved with a quick call - thanks for being responsive! Will definitely look to stay here again the next time we visit Hong Kong.

The unit was clean, but a lot than expected. The photos were taken a certain angles which suggest the place is bigger than is perceived. The cable TV was difficult to manoeuvre. Washing was in the unit, but it did not work. Very easy to find. Very central.

Traffic to the apartment is convenient and the apartment itself is easy to be found. There are lots of restaurants and store around the place. But the way to there slopes increasingly and if you reach the apartment with you luggage you will feel lil bit tired. personally I prefer another apartment of the owner's--the one few blocks away.

We had a great stay at Andrea's place. The location couldn't be any better and the apartment itself is well equipped and more than convenient for up to 2 couples staying for a few days. Andrea was very welcoming and showed great flexibility when we arrived more than 2 hours later than announced due to a  unexpected flight delay. Thank you vry much for everything, Andrea.

perfect location, appartment just as described and very quiet for the district.
very efficient host as discret as organised!
Excellent location with good restaurants, nightlife, and shopping. The apartment is very cold in the winter, however, so be sure to pack warm.
Nicely placed apartment at the happening place of Hong Kong. Neat and clean rooms,    the owner has kept every small thing you may need during the stay. Loved staying there.
Great location
Andrea is a great host. The apt is well located.

Our stay at Andreas apartment was very nice and will be remembered. The apartments location is very central and there are many small restaurants, as well as supermarkets just around the corner.
It was very clean and tidy and we really enjoyed our stay in Hong Kong.
We would definitely come again!

This place was perfect for me. The location is wonderful... perfectly situated in Soho, easy to access yet quiet. The apartment is quite small (typical HK size), but definitely enough room. The bathroom is pretty roomy which is a plus if you're going to be sharing the space! Beds are quite firm but not as hard as some Asian mattresses I've slept on... one of the bedrooms has a fairly large closet with hangers and a hanging shoe rack, which was great for me. My favorite thing about the space is how bright and airy it is. It was a great sanctuary after walking around the city all day.

The only drawback was how humid it was in the apartment.... sheets and clothes constantly felt damp, which was pretty unpleasant. However, this is obviously beyond the host's control and is probably typical of every apartment in HK during humid weather. Just a thing you may need to  prepare for. 

Andrea was a wonderful host and provided ample, helpful information that made getting to and from both the airport and the apartment a breeze. I would easily stay in this place or another one of hers again!

The apartment's location is really great. Lovely neighbourhood, mixed style of east and west, a ideal place to feel really HongKong. Easy access to everywhere, can find good food by walking distance. The apartment itself is quite spacious, nice for 3 people.

Quaint Apartment in the heart of SoHo, Hong Kong - the location is what makes Andrea's apartment great, walking distance to all amenities, nightlife, metro stations and the mid-level escalators. We enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend it for a short visit!
Great space in the middle of Soho!  Excellent choice for a weekend in the city!

Very nice location, just across PMQ. Easy walking distance to Sheung Wan and Central stations. Just around the corner you have a convenience store. Internet connection is great. The apartment was spotless too and have all needed. Kitchen is small but functional. Mattresses are a bit on the hard side. Would definitely book again if I need to visit HK.

The location is great, located in a very lively and convenient part of HK. However, the apartment was older and the rooms smaller than expected and smelled a bit musty. It was difficult to reach the host prior to the reservation, and we only got in touch on the day of our reservation. If you're mainly looking for convenience this is it, but if you're looking for greater comfort maybe consider elsewhere.

Andrea and her daughter are great hosts, both very friendly and helpful. The apartment is perfect for a short stay in the city, clean and comfortable, with a location that couldn't be better. Definitely recommend!
Great location in Soho. Very close to nightlife and restaurants without being noisy. Large bathroom for hk. Would stay again.

First thing to take note of is the narrow and steep flight of stairs in front of the apartment block. Once you enter, you'll have to climb another flight of stairs before you reach the elevator. 

The apartment was much smaller than I expected but nonetheless true to the pictures, and cosy with just enough room for my friend and I. There's even a little kitchen. 

Although he had to endure a cold shower in the morning (despite flipping both switches as instructed), my friend reckons that for Hong Kong, this little apartment scores an A. 

The apartment is located right opposite PMQ. I can imagine how nice it would be to stroll through the building and enjoy a cuppa had we more time. There are shops, eateries and convenience stores all around so first-time visitors will have a nice introduction to the city just within the vicinity.

The apartment is in a great location, lots of restaurants nearby and close to Central and LKF. Love the sunlight, spacious bathroom and the full sized beds, which is rare in Hong Kong. Andrea had great communication and was very helpful.

My 3rd airbnb experience in HK, and by far the best. It's hard to beat this location - close to tons of great restaurants (Ho Lee Fook is literally around the corner) and nightlife. An easy walk to the pier and public transport. The apartment itself was great - not gigantic, but reasonably spacious with 2 nice bedrooms and a quite large bathroom by HK standards. The host was super helpful and made everything from reservation, to check-out a breeze. I'd certainly stay here again!

Andrea's place is in a really convenient location and she is easy to communicate with. It's really nice in Central to have 2 double bedrooms but if you don't know Hong Kong you will find the living space and kitchen really small, we were 2 adults which was fine, 4 would be tight. The bathroom is nice and big. The apartment was clean and tidy and the few things I asked about were sorted out quickly. Thanks Andrea
This Aberdeen Street 2-bedroom is in a perfect location in Central and, yet, private.  It's also across from the historic PMQ which adds to the charm.

The apartments location near the mid level escalator is very convenient. The apartment itself is comfy and cooled well. We were very happy that Andrea arranged a custom check-in time. We enjoyed staying at her place very much.

Good:
The 2 rooms(queen size bed), living room(sofa, tv, aircon, wifi), kitchen, toilet(spacious!).
Environment is quiet!
The owner is responsive to queries and help. She even dispatch her helper to help us check in and explain the apt surrounding.
Not so good:
The Aberdeen street is VERY STEEP! Not an issue for youngsters, but it will be a challenge for family with elderly. It was a big challenge for my dad(80++years old) entering and exiting the entrance everyday.

Overall:
Still a good experience! Everyone should give it a try for this apt.
It was a great place to stay, close to subway and restaurant and Andrea was  really nice and convenient with the check in/out. I recommend the place :)
Great location, small place but it was perfect for us as we weren't there much and didn't intend on cooking ourselves.  Place accommodates 4 people, but no space for luggage.

The apt is well decorated and makes me feel at home.Rooms are cozy but (Website hidden by Airbnb) surrounded by shops,galleries and resturants.But it's really quiet in that area.However,since it's in uphill,it really reqires physical fitness to get to.

Do not expect for a super big apartment here in Hong Kong. However, Andrea’s place is quite spacious compared to others, it can fit 3 to 4 people here. But for older people, it might be a bit hard to live here since the road is uphill. 

Andrea was a really great host, the communication is super easy! During my stay, the aircon is suddenly broken but when i contacted Andrea, the response was pretty fast and she did her best to fix it! Love the service & hospitality :) thank you Andrea, we’ll surely come back here when we visit Hong Kong again in the future
Great location with good room.

The apartment is centrally located and easily accessible by public transport. Although many restaurants and bars are nearby, it is pleasantly quiet. The rooms are, as usual in Hong Kong, relatively small, but the bathroom surprisingly large. The apartment is comfortably furnished and all that is needed is available. The contact was uncomplicated and nice. The check in worked great. We felt very comfortable and can recommend the apartment unreservedly.
Straight bang in the middle, but nice and quiet for the central location. Super safe and convenient!

Very central, near to Man Mo temple, Lan Kwai Fong. Very good local food such as Yat Lok roasted goose, Kau Kee noodles, Lin Heung dim sum... Andrea is very nice, quick response. The apartment is clean, accurate as the picture. Thank Andrea for your hosting. I will come back and recommend for my friend.
Very nice place, close to many important and interesting things, very clean, highly recomend it.

Very nice location! Near Central, Hong Kong (Lan Kwai Fong, etc) and you're surrounded by good bars and restaurants too. It requires a little "hiking" though, as it is located in the middle of the hill. Landmark is PMQ - it is just in front of PMQ. So you may tell the cab driver "Central, Aberdeen Street, infront of PMQ"

Andrea is a very good host, this is not my first time staying at her apartments. Always very good communication and she responses right away. Enjoy!
Great location, doorstep to great nightlife and Hollywood road

Excellent location(many nice bars/restaurants/cafes are around, easy to get to LKF), inside of the apartment was neat, clean and comfortable. Andrea always responded quickly so we didn't have any problems during our stay:)  highly recommend this place!
爬坡很累,不过挺适合3-4人住的

The location is superb! We love lively Friday and Saturday in this neighborhood. Easy to find a bar and restaurant! PMQ is just next door, as well! But not recommend for elder because you have to climb so many stairs in SOHO to reach apartment. 

The room decoration is nice. But some wall and ceiling paint were peel off. But overall is great. 

Host a little bit hard to reach but the instruction is so clear. Therefore there is no problem during our stay. 

However, we wish to stay here next time! The location and price is unbeatable!
Andrea was a fantastic host. Communication was great. While the flat is quite small, it served it's purpose by providing 2 good bedrooms and an incredible location.
The house is cozy and delicate and opposite of the PMQ. Its easy way to check-in. Even though we don’t meet Andrea, but everything is great. We have nice HK holiday! I recommend this !
Great value for the location

We had a nice time staying at Andrea’s place, enjoying the coziness of the apartment and its great location. Also the value for money was the best we could find in Hong Kong. 
The only point of criticism would be that Andrea was not reachable when w had an issue halfway through our stay. It was bit too grave a problem so that turned out fine. However, it put a dent in the very good impression we‘ve had from our previous contacts with Andrea. If she worked on her responsiveness, that will further improve the good experience of staying at her place. 
All things considered we would come again!
Really enjoy the nice shopping and local restaurants neaby. The location is definitely superb!

We stayed 5 nights at Andrea's place and it was very good. We haven't met her but we had no problem to found the key and to settle. The location is great (a lot of interesting spot at walking distance) and it's pretty quiet. The appartment is small but cute. It was perfect for what we needed. 
The only small problem we had was to use the water heater to take our shower. It was sometimes tricky and we had to try several time before having hot water. Anyway this place is a perfect place to stay to discover and enjoy Hong-Kong.

[位置]元创方右侧,一家白色为主调的餐厅隔壁,兴扬大厦,鸭巴甸街上(因为高德定位是错的,而且香港的门牌号真的好难看到,希望可以帮助到大家)
房间宽敞,30左右平方包含两张150的大床和小客厅以及厨房洗漱间｡房间内设几乎为宜家采购,被褥枕头睡着很舒服｡
洗漱间的热水器有时不是特别灵敏,希望房东可以检修一下｡房间内不提供拖鞋和牙刷,需要入住者自备｡
房东很好,回复及时,可以帮忙寄存行李,虽然我们最后存在了时代广场｡会跟朋友推荐,比住任何酒店都要舒服很多｡
Great location!

The apartment is much like the pictures and clean. Bathroom is huge compared to other HK apartments! We had some trouble getting the hot water in the shower to work, but figured it out in the end. Andrea replied quickly, but not very elaborate. 
We did not meet Andrea, but check-in was easy using the code to open the door and we could leave our luggage before check-in time.
Last but not least: excellent location in Central. Close to MTR stations and bars/restaurants around the corner.
This place is in a great location! It is clean and the host is really easy to get a hold of. Definitely would come again.
房子性价比超级高,在HK能找到这样的套房很棒｡房东非常热情｡
The location was amazing, but the apartment was not cleanly. The air conditioning did not work to the point that two out of four guests had to move out.

Andrea’s place is in the best location in Soho. Go to Any restaurant nearby...you cannot go wrong. The building was relatively new with a nice elevator, very spacious bathroom, and good amenities. There were a few small hiccups, but Andrea was quick to respond and solve the issues. We were 2 people staying in the apartment, but if you are two couples, it will be tight. Probably best for a small family with kids. The kitchen is mini and cute and completely usable for small meal prep. Overall, I would very much recommend Andrea’s place.
Cute little apartment about a 6 minute walk from the Sheung Wan station. Tons of little restaurants and bars nearby too!
Great place in the heart of Central! Plenty of space which is hard to find in HK.
在中环的中心,楼下很多酒吧非常适合夜生活丰富的游客｡性价比比较高,房东很好人,不过一间的空调不太制冷,需要改善一下｡

Wonderful stay, loved the place! Location was excellent and close enough to bars and restaurants yet in a tranquil area right around the corner. The apartment itself is charming - loved the yellow hues and the decorated stools - with great views as promised; everything was clean and convenient. Thanks so much!

A super convenient location for travelers who want to explore the urban locale of Hong Kong Island. The surrounding area is filled with cool bars, small shops and eats, galleries. The apartment was small but very clean. A comfortable stay that I would highly recommend!

This place is in the best location but needs maintenance before it should be rented. 

The A/C unit is currently being replaced because I requested Airbnb step in when it was not working. Looks like other guests mentioned A/C in the past but, it wasn't replaced at that time despite being under warranty. Other couple things to be maintained, broken door knob on bathroom door, holes in walls, dirty bathroom grout, and some lizards hanging around inside. 

Host was not very responsive when addressing these issues. Took ~24 hours to get a reply for our request for more toilet paper. 

Beds are super hard but I think this is typical for HongKong. Im used to a temperpedic. 

For some positives...the location doesn't get any better. Its in SoHo and a 2 min walk to LKF bars/clubs. Walking distance to most everything actually. There are 2 actual beds in 2 separate rooms which is nice for such a small and inexpensive place. The bathroom is a very good size for Hong Kong and the shower has good water pressure with hot/warm water.
在香港,有这样的民宿已经很不容易了,总体体验还可以,就是洗漱用品跟拖鞋这些都没有｡希望改进｡

This is an EXCELLENT flat. Clean, central and full of light. It is the perfect location for a short stay in HK and explore the city. Communication with Andrea was excellent, and this was a great experience. Thoroughly recommended!

Awesome location on the edge of Soho opposite PMQ. Decent space for central Hong Kong. Easy access to food, drink, restaurants. This is a place to stay for a semi expat view of Hong Kong with a bit of local culture thrown in. Would stay again.

The house is larger than what i have imagined,clean and bright,fully-equipped. The air conditioner is helpful is such a hot day. The bed can hold 2 each and the qiult is warm.The security is good.We really enjoy our stay here.Thank you Andrea!

位置很好,就在元创方对面｡香港寸土寸金的地方也算性价比还不错的了｡
房东回复比较及时｡
入住晚了一个小时,房东的菲佣带我们进了房间,才开始打扫卫生｡
总体上,还算可以｡

Such a nice accommodation, it was quite comfortable, accessible from main stations. 
Sadly, one thing I have to share to all is that please pay a lot attention to Andrea when communicating with her. Basically she is nice and kind  but this time, even though one mistake happened by the poor arrangement of host side, I was yelled by Andrea over a phone... of course I am not a native English (Website hidden by Airbnb) was so shocked.... Hope that this behavior toward customers should be cleaned up.

It's a cosy little apartment perfect for a couple of days with a family of 4. The location is great; right in the middle of nice bars, cafes, PMQ,  little shops and a few minutes from the escalators. We had a great time!

Perfect stay in the perfect area.Easy self check in. 
Great address.
Excellent space right int he heart of Soho. The apartment is small but not by Hong Kong standards as it was plenty big enough for 2 of us plus our bags

The place is at a good location. 
But that’s the only good thing about the apartment. 
There was bare minimum facilities and equipments.
The curtains don’t close completely because of the window-AC; and it gets super bright by 6AM
The place was falling apart- the door knobs of all the doors were broken.
