It is much MUCH smaller than what it looks like in the pictures.
For the price- it didn’t have much value...
房间小巧而设施一应俱全,洗手液沐浴露等等都有｡床品整齐干净｡空调给力,略微有点吵｡洗澡用的是电热水器水很大水量充足｡唯一一个问题就是离开地铁站有些距离且需要在鸭巴甸街走个大上坡,带行李的话几乎是崩溃的｡｡建议大家走半山电梯上去｡加咸街下来,这是我们总结最省力的路了｡

Andrea’s place was great. The location was perfect, near a lot of fun stuff to do. It is on a hill, so there was a lot of walking upstairs and downstairs. Also, kinda random but the shower was 10/10! All the other Airbnb’s we stayed at in China had low water pressure and not much hot water. Andrea’s shower was great, lol. The beds were a little hard, but it was still a great place because of the location. Also, it was very easy to check in and find the place. I would recommend others to stay here, mainly because of the location!!
总体感觉还行,位置挺好

The premises needs attention- broken door knobs, the paint is peeling off and the wooden floors are broken. We could have lived with all of that, but the biggest fault was the hostess. Never mind the fact that we didn’t get any tips or recommendations, the host just didn’t answer when she didn’t feel like it. She gave us her number, but when we wrote to her via whatsup, she said to only contact her via Airbnb. I made a mistake and booked an extra night- she answered she was busy and she will write later- which never happened. We asked to stay later on our last day- it took her a day to answer. In other words- the host didn’t host us at all. We arrived after a long flight, exhausted from it, there wasn’t even a tea bag in the kitchen. She blamed other guests for stealing the power adapters when I’ve had 5% battery. Eventually we don’t recommend this listing at all.
Great location and excellent communication.

Amazing location, near fabulous bars/restaurants of SoHo and near Central MTR. Small but adequate accomodation with lovely views, lots of light  and big bathroom for Honk Kong. Clean and met our needs perfectly.
Good location, place was clean and decent.
See previous answer.
Andrea’s place was perfect for our stay in HK. very comfortable and the location is unbeatable. Very easy check in process too :)
Great place in an amazing location right in the heart of central Hong Kong. Would definitely consider staying again.

Andrea's place was great. Best part is the location! We had 3 guests in the end and it was tight but we didn't spend much time in the apt - and it's HK so we knew what to expect. We had all coffee and meals out but were happy to have a true 2 bedroom place to rest at night. Andrea was very responsive it was so easy to check in and out on our own . Would definitely recommend for anyone who wants a great place in an amazing location!
Très agréable séjour ched Andrea. c'est tout petit mais très sympa et très bien placé

The location is great - Walking distance to shopping and food and MTR for getting pretty much anywhere you need to go... Good size for two people, might be crowded for four... Great size bathroom! Definitely recommend if you are looking for a place in Central!
Clean and tidy flat in a fantastic location. Excellent hosting and clear communication. Looking forward to using it as a base for a HK visit in the future.
Nice place to spend weeks in Hong Kong

Andrea’s place was simply amazing. It was everything we hoped it would be; clean, spacious, accessible, affordable and in an amazing location. PMQ is literally right outside the building, alongside a host of other great places to visit. Andrea was alsoquick to respond to any messages. I highly recommend this place for people looking to enjoy more of HK’s nightlife, food and attractions.

Great mid-levels location. Streets are steep, but the mid-levels travelator is close. Two bedrooms,  although note only the larger bedroom has a wardrobe. Lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Kitchen is as described - light cooking, with hot plate, microwave, and kettle. Who needs to cook with all those restaurants?! High floor, and with a low-rise building across the street, the apartment is bright and has a view. Shower works well. Didn’t use clothes washer, but there is one in the apt. Found the apt mostly quiet even though area is busy. Like the neighborhood; very nice stay.
房间位置非常好,在中环中心,周围很多好吃的,坐地铁方便,不过很多上下坡,有太多行李不是很方便｡床和床品舒服,浴室很大,洗浴用品齐全｡来港岛玩是不错的住宿选择｡
Location is good in the central of the city. Many restaurants and good bars nearby. Even the place is small but spotless clean. Suitable for family. Highly recommended!
没有牙刷牙膏 上坡真的很累

name: Art Gallery  in Harlem
summary: Welcome to Art Gallery in Harlem, a stunning 1 bedroom in Harlem, NY.    This home features beautiful artwork from across the world on display for your viewing pleasure.   Modern Amenities throughout. This home also features a library/study.
space: In addition to the bedroom and library, there is a proper living room, with streaming videos, a full/renovated kitchen and a beautiful bathroom that make for a truly remarkable find in NYC.
description: Welcome to Art Gallery in Harlem, a stunning 1 bedroom in Harlem, NY.    This home features beautiful artwork from across the world on display for your viewing pleasure.   Modern Amenities throughout. This home also features a library/study. In addition to the bedroom and library, there is a proper living room, with streaming videos, a full/renovated kitchen and a beautiful bathroom that make for a truly remarkable find in NYC. Guest have full access to enjoy this beautiful space.   Whether you want to read a book in the library, admire the current art installations on the walls or just relaxing from a busy day in the City on the plush bed.  Enjoy! Feel free to call/text if you have any questions. Harlem is a vibrant melting pot of everything great about New York, and this home is in the center of it.   Walk to nearby restaurants, parks, with some of the best views in the city. Local cafe's serve fresh pastries and coffee to get your day started right.  15 min walk to local treasures,
neighborhood_overview: Harlem is a vibrant melting pot of everything great about New York, and this home is in the center of it.   Walk to nearby restaurants, parks, with some of the best views in the city. Local cafe's serve fresh pastries and coffee to get your day started right.  15 min walk to local treasures, Apollo Theatre, Studio Museum and Strivers Row.
transit: 3 min walk to 1 train and C train, make getting around NYC easy.  Additionally feel free to user your Uber app to get around town.
access: Guest have full access to enjoy this beautiful space.   Whether you want to read a book in the library, admire the current art installations on the walls or just relaxing from a busy day in the City on the plush bed.  Enjoy!
interaction: Feel free to call/text if you have any questions.
house_rules: Enjoy the house, enjoy the city, but after you leave, i have to return here, so please show as much respect as you would to your own home.    The art throughout the home is to be seen not touched, and destroyed.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Nicholas was a great host during our weeks' stay at his beautiful, clean  apartment. He accommodated us for a late check-in by sending a friend to greet us, show the apartment and hand the keys. Nicholas communicated with us through text and was always available.
The location in Harlem is very convenient. My wife and I would stay happily at his apartment any time again.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The air bnb was perfect for my needs. A great place for someone looking for a nice space that’s simple and convenient to going into Manhattan.

name: Private Park Slope Brooklyn Hideaway
summary: A completely private basement hideaway in gorgeous Park Slope. Includes a separate entrance, private bathroom, spacious studio, and a backyard patio garden. A unique (and cost-effective) studio apartment in a beautiful Brooklyn neighborhood.  Includes air conditioning and climate controlled heating.  Steps from gourmet restaurants, Prospect Park, and the subway. Perfect for 2 out-and-about guests!  It's a great landing spot in an accessible, cute, and safe neighborhood.
space: A beautiful basement hideaway in an historic brick townhouse in gorgeous Park Slope. The entire home has been recently renovated and finished with style. Your completely private space includes a separate front entrance and access to our  backyard patio and garden.  The backyard patio includes a dining table with 6 seats, a bench loveseat underneath a flowering Japanese maple, and a growing garden in the spring, summer, and fall. The large, fully furnished basement includes a queen bed, as well as a large sofabed to accommodate 1-4 guests. In addition, there is a stylishly appointed full bathroom with a comfortable standing shower.   For your convenience, there is a dresser to organize your belongings, a mini-refrigerator to store food and beverages, a microwave to heat up leftovers, a toaster oven for simple meals, a Keurig coffee maker, an iron, a hair dryer, and an English teacher's personal library to browse.  (We've even purchased brand new hotel-style pillows direct from Marriott.
description: A completely private basement hideaway in gorgeous Park Slope. Includes a separate entrance, private bathroom, spacious studio, and a backyard patio garden. A unique (and cost-effective) studio apartment in a beautiful Brooklyn neighborhood.  Includes air conditioning and climate controlled heating.  Steps from gourmet restaurants, Prospect Park, and the subway. Perfect for 2 out-and-about guests!  It's a great landing spot in an accessible, cute, and safe neighborhood. A beautiful basement hideaway in an historic brick townhouse in gorgeous Park Slope. The entire home has been recently renovated and finished with style. Your completely private space includes a separate front entrance and access to our  backyard patio and garden.  The backyard patio includes a dining table with 6 seats, a bench loveseat underneath a flowering Japanese maple, and a growing garden in the spring, summer, and fall. The large, fully furnished basement includes a queen bed, as well as a large sofabed to acco
neighborhood_overview: Park Slope is a beautiful, landmark neighborhood, including tree lined streets, gourmet restaurants, easy access to transportation, and Prospect Park - the largest public park in Brooklyn. In 2010, New York Magazine selected Park Slope as the finest neighborhood in New York City, citing its overall safety, fine dining, eclectic nightlife, local shopping, and close proximity to public transit, green space, quality housing, and creative capital.  In 2007, Park Slope was named one of the "Greatest Neighborhoods in America" by the American Planning Association "for its architectural and historical features and its diverse mix of residents and businesses".  And in December 2006, Natural Home magazine named Park Slope one of America's ten best neighborhoods, citing area greenspaces, neighborhood gathering spaces, local farmer's markets, strong public transportation, and interesting locally owned businesses.
notes: Please note a few pieces of feedback we have received from our guests: 1) There are stairs leading down to the basement studio.  The stairs are easily accessible, but the listing is not recommended for elderly or disabled guests. 2) There are mechanical pipes just below the basement ceiling.  The pipes do not impact your living space in any way, but they are visible in the room. 3) The garden is wonderful when the weather is nice.  Please note, though, that the garden is less comfortable during our winter from November though early March.  You will always have access to the backyard, but New York can be quite cold outside during he winter. 4) The flat is private, and you will have private access through a personal electronic code.  Unfortunately, we will likely not be available to greet you at arrival.  However, you will receive detailed instructions with a private passkey in advance of your arrival.  Please read the instructions included in the listing, as well as the details I will s
transit: We are steps from the F, G, and R trains at the 4th Avenue / 9th Street station.  It is also easy to connect to additional trains two stations away at  Barclay's Center / Atlantic Avenue, a transportation hub that allows transfer to the 2/3, 4/5, and B/D, N, and Q trains - and access to every neighborhood in NYC. In addition, we are close to every convenience, including 2 24-hour pharmacies, several major banks, 2 full-service grocery stores (and Whole Foods, too), as well as scores of delicious restaurants and neighborhood taverns.
access: All guests receive a temporary access code for keyless entry.  Guests enter the building through a locked entranceway on the first floor.  You enter the garden backyard through a private door at the south end of the building.
interaction: We are available to help at anytime.  We live immediately upstairs, and we can quickly solve any concerns or answer any questions.  We regularly monitor our AirBnb messages, and we can also send and receive text messages for local guests.
house_rules: 1) Please remember that the flat is connected to our family home.  The listing is reserved for respectful visitors only. 2) The listing includes three doors: a front exterior door, a front interior door, and a back exterior door.  All doors should be manually locked when you enter or exit the building. 3) Please enter and exit the building quietly.  Please also keep the noise volume at respectful indoor levels. 4) If you would like to invite additional visitors, let us know in advance. 5) Pets are not allowed in the home. 6) There is no smoking in the home. 7) Candles, incense, or other items that use fire are not allowed in the home. 8) Only registered guests.  No guests are allowed in the flat at any time.

host.host_about:
Samantha and I are both educators in New York City schools.  I am Head of School at a new independent middle school in Brooklyn; Samantha is a dance instructor at a renowned elementary school in Lower Manhattan.

Every year, I set a new goal to learn and develop a specific skill.  In the past, I have learned a new language, started a new business, learned to bake artisan bread, and more!  This year, I have learned to make - 3D printing, soldering, woodwork, and engraving.

We're happy to host you.  We are committed to making sure you have a wonderful stay.

reviews.comments: This is an excellent private unit very close to the subway in Brooklyn, the price is one of the best deals in NYC! The bathroom is completely remodeled and there's plenty of space, with the new comfortable bed it's a true gem.

Andrew was super nice, über responsive and very accommodating.  The “Hideaway” just has a great vibe… I was safe, comfortable and I slept VERY well — those are my requirements, and it was all good.  Loved the awesome library; the WC was lovely; the large room was clean and there's a mini-fridge!  The place is completely private with an entrance in the front and direct access to the back yard too.  You are in a great neighborhood and on a nice street, I would stay there again in a heart-beat.

Andrew was a warm and receptive host. The basement apartment is as described comfortable queen size bed extremely quit, beautiful decor and an awesome bath. There are plenty of shop, rite aid, taverns within a walking distant. I will definitely put this down as one of my favorite short time rentals.

Andrew was extremely accommodating with our early check in. We had a nice chat when we arrived to pick up the key, and after that we never saw him or anyone else in the house. Check out was easy and convenient to our schedule. The space is extremely private, quiet and clean. The basement room has very little daylight except for a back door leading to the shady garden, which makes it perfect for staying out late and sleeping in during the day! A little rumble from the nearby subway train is no big deal. The bed was very comfortable. We loved our stay there. I have family living on a nearby street, and I have already told them to refer people to stay at Andrew's house. I would definitely stay there again. The only down side to this place is that I had no cell phone reception inside, and had to go outside to the patio to make calls and check text messages. Luckily the weather was nice, and the patio was private.

Andrew and his family are very friendly and helpful. He was always available for any questions I had.
The apartment is located perfectly to explore New York City, since the metro is only a few minutes away.
The space works great to use as a base to discover New York. If you have a day where you would like to take it easy, they also have a great space outside where you can sit and relax. On top of this, there are a lot of small shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. This means that you can easily just stroll around the area and enjoy a good meal without having to go far.
I would definitely go back here, although I would stay longer next time. New York City has a lot things to offer that I feel I missed out on this time. I guess I’ll have to come back sometime soon! Thank you again for your hospitality, Andrew!

I came back to NY with my mom for my graduation ceremony in the city. We came in very late the first night (I'm talking 2am), but this was no problem as there is a keyless entry. Andrew's place was conveniently close to the F/G/R trains (just down the same block!) which made getting around very easy. As far as the room, it was very spacious, the shower was hot (shampoo, towels, and soap provided), the bed was firm, and we were happy. You do hear the train roll by ever so often, but it is a distant sound and did not interrupt our sleeping. The location is convenient and safe - many food stops/banks/drug stores close by.

As far as the host himself - Andrew provided me with information before I arrived and he was very keen on answering all of the (many) questions I had before we arrived. During our stay, he made sure to ask us if we needed anything. Though I didn't meet him in person, I felt welcome and taken care of. 

I'd recommend this place for someone looking to stay within a stone's throw from Manhattan and have the autonomy to come in and out without bothering the host. Thank you!

We had a very nice stay at Andrew's place.
The neighborhood is great and the place is very quiet.
Subway is right around the street corner and it takes around thirty min. to go to Manhattan.
Private access to the room is very convenient and the backyard/garden is also very nice to chill-out after a busy day in the city.

Andrew was the perfect host and promptly answered every question we had. The location is spot on for going in and out of Manhattan. There is a 24 hour Rite Aid on the corner, an excellent bagel shop across from it and a very charming little cafe around the corner for a good coffee. It helps to keep your travel costs down to grab a delish breakfast and come back to bask in the sunshine on the private patio garden. The bathroom is great with a large shower. Downside for some is the absence of a TV (not for us) and a large book collection to peruse if you left your book at home. The private entrance and keyless entry is just one more thing to simplify your trip. Did I mention that the subway station is a block away? I love this neighborhood and you will too.

I had a great stay. The location is great and has easy access to the subway and plenty of nearby food places. The keyless access to the room is very convenient and the room itself is comfortable and clean.

Nous n'avons pas rencontré notre hôte mais nous avons eu de nombreux contacts par mails. il s'est révélé très disponible et très agréable. Le quartier est "sécure" et nous n'avons absolument rien craint la nuit, quelle que soit notre heure de retour. Le métro est à deux pas. Concernant la chambre, je ne m'attendais pas du tout à ce qu'elle soit en sous-sol ni sans fenêtre. Même si nous avions accès par un escalier à la cour, la chambre a de toute évidence été créée dans la cave. Je pensais être logée à la rigueur en rez de jardin. Très déçue donc par le logement même si Andrew s'est révélé, par mails et SMS, une personne très agréable et accomodante.

This was perfect for us. Fantastic location - a block from the F, G, and R trains. We had plenty of room, the bed and couch were both very comfortable, and Andrew was a thoughtful host (though we never met him). There's no air conditioning, so - it being the summer - it was a bit warmer than one would want. But because it was the basement apartment, it kept the heat from being out of control, and Andrew had a pretty good set up of fans and ventilation from the back door. I thought the value was excellent!
We actually didn't meet, but Andrew was there if I needed advice. We communicated very well via mail. Everything worked fine and the sunny backyard is very nice for having breakfast. Thanks.

El lugar es muy cómodo y amplio, estaba limpio y ordenado. El baño está nuevo. 
Además está muy bien ubicado, muy cerca del metro y es un lugar muy tranquilo.
Andrew fue muy atento y gentil e hizo que tuviéramos unas vacaciones muy gratas.

Andrew was a wonderful host who was very accessible. The place was very clean and well stocked for visitors. The location was perfect for getting to Manhattan and was walkable to many shops, places to eat and a 24 hour Rite Aid. My family enjoyed the weekend and found the basement to be very comfortable. My only complaint was that there was no air conditioning and in the summer it was definitely hot down there. There are fans, but on a warm day the room was very hot. I would say putting in a wall air conditioning unit would be a great addition to enhance a persons stay in the summer months. Andrew was fair and reasonable when some things went awry with his water heater and when my child damaged a plant in his back yard-- I REALLY appreciated that. I thought he was an excellent host and would stay here again! I I would also recommend this spot to friends who would like to come to the city. Andrew has done a great job turning a basement into a terrific vacation get-away!

Notre séjour chez Andrew a été parfait. Nous avions notre propre espace indépendant avec notre propre salle de bain et une entrée à part. Tout était très propre, il y avait même un frigo avec un espace pour cuisiner. 

Andrew à été vraiment génial durant notre séjour. Très disponible et très arrangeant. Il a pensé vraiment a tout concernant l'accueil des voyageurs. 

Le lieu est bien situé, proche du métro et de Manhattan. C'est très calme et il y a pas mal de magasin et de restaurant à coté.

Je conseille vraiment cet hôte si vous allez à New York

It was a pleasure working with Andrew from start to finish: he is prompt, responsive, accommodating and periodically makes sure that you are happy with your stay.  My parents stayed at his rental for two weeks and enjoyed the experience.  The unit is located in the basement with access to the courtyard, is on a quiet street close to transportation, and is furnished with all you need, including humidifier, fans and a Brita.  No TV but has wifi so you can watch Netflix etc.  Overall, a great experience.

Wonderful stay in very safe, quiet neighborhood. Less than one block from the subway was a real bonus. Neighborhood has good restaurants and shopping. Andrew was really nice and quickly responsive to any questions. The pictures acurately reflect the room.

O local era de excelente localização, a meio quarteirão do metro com varias linhas parando no local 24 horas por dia. O local correspondeu a descrição e as fotos, sem nenhuma surpresa desagradável. Andrew foi muito gentil e atencioso, sempre se colocando a disposição pra qualquer tipo de ajuda. Ele conseguiu um ótimo colchão inflável que solicitamos e providenciou todas as amenidades (toalhas, roupas de cama,  shampoo, sabonete, etc) descritas no anuncio. Obrigado Andrew, todos nos gostamos muito!

Absolutely fantastic place to stay! For two people it was more than enough room.  Andrew was an incredible host, very accommodating and always there to provide you with anything you need.  The location was perfect, in a very safe neighborhood that you can walk around at any time (even late at night) without any worries.  It is only a few minutes walk from the subway which makes it super convenient to go anywhere (and conversely, easy to get back to at any hour).  The private entrance makes it easy for you to get in and out of the room discretely without having to trouble the host, which is perfect for us since we would spend the entire day exploring all of NYC.  The bed was very comfortable for two people, we slept like a baby and woke up refreshed everyday.  The bathroom is newly renovated and very modern and comfortable.  There is also a dehumidifier which is sorely appreciated (Andrew thought of everything). All amenities were included, and when we ran low, a simple message to Andrew was all that was needed and he would take care of it.  He honestly wants to make sure you are having an enjoyable trip and is always there to make sure that it happens. When we come back to visit NYC we will definitely come back.

Four of us stayed here for three nights and it was an excellent accommodation in a great location. Andrew communicated all necessary information before our arrival. At one point I asked about additional bedding and towels and he brought them immediately. He was an attentive and respectful host.

The whole place was clean and comfortable. It would be very spacious for two or even three people, but if you use the convertible sofa as a queen-sized bed, there's not much room left in the main part of the apartment. The bed was very comfortable, the hide-a-bed mattress significantly less so. 

The location is excellent -- less than a block to the subway station, a short train ride to lower Manhattan, and plenty of excellent restaurants, coffee shops, and other amenities around any corner.

We did not use the patio. It was fairly cluttered and therefore less inviting than it appears in the listing. 

Overall, it's a very nice place, reasonably priced, and I recommend it highly.

Un lieu très agréable et efficace pour visiter new york : proche du métro et très bien desservi pour manhattan. Chambre très propre ,salle de bain  tout confort . Andrew est extrêmement serviable. Je recommande sans aucune reserve.

I really enjoyed my stay here. Excelent reception! The place is very cosy, very quiet and clean! Good heating, very confortable beds and showers! Andrew replied to me right away every time I texted him. I felt safe. Lovely place and very good location, with all kinds of shops nearby. Plenty of subway too. Very close to Prospect Park! Just next to YMCA swimming pool too. I hope to come back many times!

Beautiful loft style hide-away!  This spot is less than a block away from the subway and right in the middle of a hip, up & coming neighborhood.  If your looking for a quick ride on the subway into Manhattan, I would look elsewhere but if you want a localized and private spot, this is your place!!

The loft is totally private with keyless entry (awesome!) and you have a beautiful patio all to yourself! The bathroom is newly remodeled and there are humidifiers and a heater/ac to keep you comfortable.  The bed is cozy, the towels and sheets are new and the fully stocked keurig and "snack bar" are quite a lovely surprise!!

I didn't see Andrew the entire time, but he made it known he was available, should I need anything at all.  This was entirely made possible by his sweet keyless entry system. I came and went as I pleased, I had all the privacy I could want and the location was spot on for what I paid for/ needed.

I would absolutely stay here again.

Had a wonderful stay at Andrews!  Upon arrival, I immediately noticed the snack tray (snickers, coffee, gum, mouthwash, etc.) and was sure to take advantage of them.  After many AirBnb trips - this was the first that felt more like staying at a hotel than staying in an extra room!  The private entrance was great, walk to the subway (FGR) was less than a block, lots to check out and do right off of 5th Ave, and overall an extremely comfortable and hospitable experience.  Would HIGHLY recommend staying here to anyone.

Great place to stay - very comfortable home away from home.  The studio is completely private, fully equipped with everything you might need (description accurate) and extras such as coffee, tea, snacks and toiletries.  Andrew was extremely thoughtful.  Before I arrived text/email with all the information I needed about the studio.  In the studio was a printout of things to do in the neighborhood (great neighborhood) with maps.  The studio is only one block from the train.  During my stay he texted me again to make sure everything was OK.  I strongly recommend the Park Slope Brooklyn Hideaway.
This was a nice place to be able to come back to each night during my stay.  Clean and simple, having easy access to the subway and near prospect park.

Terrific hosts who went the extra mile to communicate and make sure travelers had all they needed. Hideaway as described in great neighbourhood. Having private ensuite bathroom is a big plus ! Would definitely stay here again.

Andrew and his wife Sam were great! They always checked in to see how we were doing and offered anything to make our stay comfortable. The location is perfect! So convenient and literally in the middle of everything! Subway in walking distance on the same block and right off 5th ave with TONS of restaurants, bars and things to do. They left a printed guide of things to do, recommended places to eat/drink and a cute little welcome care package. The space itself was small, but comfortable and easily accommodates 2 people. They were also flexible with accommodating our late flight (with regards to our check out time) and offered to store our bags during our walk over the Brooklyn bridge! I definitely recommend this place and appreciate their hospitality! Thank you for making our NY stay perfect!

Andrew's place was very nice, it was like a little hidden cave and we never lived in something like that before. So it was a very new experience for us. The actual living quarters were very clean and neat and full of interesting books one of which we purchased from Andrew!  The bathroom was immaculate and there was an abundance of amenities and the bed was very comfortable. The location is right next to a train station and a 24 hour pharmacy as well as several bars which are open late which we found very convenient. Andrew and his wife were very kind and welcoming and we would be happy to stay with them again.  -Ivan

My family and I had a great stay at Andrew's place. Everything was convenient and comfortable, especially the bed! I truly appreciated the welcome basket as my flight arrived late at night and I wasn't able to grab any food between the airport and arriving in Park Slope. We used to live in in the neighborhood and were so happy to find this listing because we knew how close it was to some of our favorite restaurants, playgrounds, Prospect Park, and the Subway. I don't think you could ask for a better location. The stairs down to the apt are a bit steep, but neither my four year old son nor my own bum knees had a problem with them. What Andrew wrote about the library is absolutely true. It is an English teacher's dream, and we all enjoyed the added bonus of some great new books during our stay.

The area was great for brunch and very near the subway. We didn't meet the host, but contacting him was very easy and we received speedy responses to our messages. The room had been set up for two rather than three guests but Andrew sent a neighbour with additional pillows and sheets straight away and apologised profusely. The room was comfortable and warm and was not damp despite being underground. The wi-fi was great, the shower is powerful and the hot water was good, and we appreciated the coffee machine very much. However, the room is rather cramped for more than two guests and we found that it was very noisy at night, thanks to noises from the pipes that run through. It also does not have a window, so there is very little natural light except through a pane of glass in the door. It can also get very hot at night (even in December).

It's quite small for four of us, bur it was a cozy place. Andrew was kind of us and anytime, he answered me. 
We had a small happening at the moment, but he solved the problem. 
The best thing is the place was near subway station. And prospect park!!!! (That is my favorite park ever! ) 
Thanks.

One of the best (if not the best) place I've stayed at with Airbnb. The location is great, very close to the subway and nice coffee stores. Andrew was great about communication, everything was clean, had a kettle that I think it's worth 5 stars because I drink tea all the time, there was also a coffee maker and a few snacks that is very thoughfull. I only stayed 2 nights but loved my stay and will look in the future to stay again.

I had a great stay at Andrew's place in Park Slope Brooklyn. The space is totally private with keypad controlled entry which was great because I never had to think about the keys. The room felt like a nice hotel suite with a big bed, a couch, coffee table, fridge, microwave and really nice, very new bathroom with a great stall shower.

Andrew was very responsive to any questions I had and was flexible with check in and check out.

Highly recommended.

Checking in was super easy - Andrew has definitely done this before. Access codes and wifi logins were all ready and he had laid out a nice spread of welcome goodies that made things easier (my back was killing me from the drive and the Advil was much appreciated ;-)

The house is on a quieter side street off 5th - the area is very nice with loads of restaurants and a park nearby for the kids.
Such a great stay and host, Andrew provided detailed instructions and provided an excellent home. I'll definitely be staying again, and the guest book was an excellent touch

The room was very spacious and private. Everything was cleaned, organized and ready for our arrival. The host was able to accommodate our late departure, which we really appreciated. Highly recommended!

We didn't get to meet Andrew but he was available and responsive any time we needed help.
The apartment is very private and comfortable. It's equipped above average with a coffee machine and water filter. The bathroom is very nice and clean, everything works perfectly. Andrew left a basket with some thoughtful amenities like shampoo, toothpaste, instant oatmeal and even a chop stick! Very much appreciated!
The space is not as bright and spacious as it seems in the pictures but it's very clean and comfortable. It's obvious that the owners have put a lot of thought in equipping the apartment.
Location is just perfect: just a few steps to the subway station for F, G and R lines which take you to Manhattan in about 20 mins. The area is safe and full of cozy restaurants and shops (24/7!). Perfect location for exploring both Manhattan and Brooklyn especially if you want to feel like a local.

This basement rental is great! The location is ideal for a relaxed time in Brooklyn, but also a block from at least 3 subway lines. Andrew is an incredible host that checked in on us via text and was very helpful. We loved our vacation and this rental.
We found the accomodations clean, safe and comfortable.  A perfect place for respite and sleep while spending our days with relatives living close by.  We will be returning.

It's a great experience! Andrew had all things prepared before we arrived. The passcode for the doors, the wifi password, he let us know before ahead. We had some difficult to open the door as we were not familiar with the lock, but Andrew was so helpful (tho we never had to meet him). The location is just 3-5 mins walk to subway, it's really convenient. This is the first time I try Airbnb, was nervous and I heard some bad experience from my course mate (from other host), but it's all above my expectation. 
Definitely recommend this place, nice, cozy, comfy, and especially just came back from crowd, this is the place that can rest well and fully relax.

Andrew was a fantastic host and we had a great stay.  We stayed for a full three weeks and the Hideaway was perfect.  The location is great, right by the subway, and the studio very warm and comfortable.  The hosts went that extra mile to make sure we were comfortable, which we really appreciated.  Highly recommended!
Great location half a block from the subway. Andrew was the perfect host. Nice touches in the room, as well as communicating with us right away. Had a wonderful time. Will return again, thank you!

Très bel accueil d'Andrew, de bons conseils, et prévenant pour que nous soyons au mieux dans son logement et à New York. Le logement est pratique, très propre, il y a tout ce qu'il faut. Il est calme et situé très proche de lignes principales de métro.
Loved staying here. Attentive host, super accommodating, super nice and was flexible with our leaving time. Loved it! Also location was fab. :)

Great Hideaway in Park Slope. We were walking distance to everything and took advantage of all the neighborhood has to offer. 24 hr Rite Aid a building away, great bagels across the street from that, the metro station a block away and then Prospect Park just a few blocks further. We always felt safe and could park the car for the week and only had to move it for street cleaning...crazy how that works but I was thankful for parking!!  The pictures are spot on and Andrew did an awesome job of making us feel welcome. He left a care basket with snacks and toiletries that were so welcome. The listing did not say hair dryer but they had that and a toaster oven and filtered water.  I would certainly go back!!

Andrew’s apartment has all the comforts of home. The apartment is close to the subway and the location is just superb (walking distance from anything you may need). Andrew was truly an excellent host and very helpful. The apartment is clean, safe and has everything you may need. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and would definitely book again.

The location of the apartment could not be better. Close to the subway station and just off the eclectic 5th Ave of Brooklyn. Andrew did everything to make us feel welcome and was quick to reply on all of our questions. One remark as I am above average in height is that the ceiling is below standard height. Clean and nice over all and good value.

I enjoyed my stay at Andrew's very much. The neighborhood is very nice and close to Prosspect Park and the terrace behind the apartment was lovely. The metro is nearby (full disclosure: the building kinda rumbles when the trains go past.) The apartment is dark, but has everything you might need. While I didn't interact with the family, Andrew was very helpful when asked.
Clean and silent room in a beautiful neighborhood. Two steps from metro station and close to shops and bars. Andrew is really kind and discreet. We had a great time in brooklyn!!

Andrew's place is super well located, 1 min distance to a subway station that takes you right into the heart of Manhattan. Park slope is a super dope  neighborhood with tons of bars, restaurants and lovely shops.. Not to mention prospect park, which is not walking distance (maybe 25 ') but still close.
The place was clean, located in the basement (thus a bit dark, but good for sleeping :-) with all the facilities you need. Perfect jumping-off point if you want to explore BKLYN and Manhattan. Would definitely return.

We had an excellent stay! Andrew was awesome! So hospitable!!! We will be coming back next year! This get away was much needed and Andrew's accommodations were fantastic! Love the bed and the wonderful towels! See you next year!!!!!  Oh.....and the price was right!!!!!
lovely place to stay,  nice genuine people, nothing was too much trouble. Great area with a subway direct to Manhattan 2 minutes walk away.  loved every minute of our holiday

Andrew did a great job communicating with us. From the very beginning he was quick to respond, sending us timely information and upon arrival provided a warm welcome to his home.  Everything was as expected, true to descriptions and pictures. We enjoyed our stay at his lovely apartment and would not hesitate to recommend it.

Andrew was very helpful during our trip and gave us quick response to our questions. Moreover he provided a nice welcome package with small gifts. I would definitely recommend staying at Andrew's place. 
We were 3 people and space was adequate.
Thank you for hosting us. :)

We had good dialect with Andrew prior to our arrival via email. 
The apartment did not meet our requirements .
We kwamen midden in de nacht aan maar het appartement was heel netjes en er was een welkomspakket. Fijn dat de airco aanstond ook.

Andrew responded quickly to any questions I had throughout the entire process-from reservation to check out. He took the initiative to make  contact prior to my arrival just to make sure I was comfortable with the process. "Hideaway" is uniquely located such that a left turn out the door leads you through quaint residential streets, while a right turn out the door and you're in the heart of Park Slope' s eclectic business sector.

Die Unterkunft von Andrew liegt 3 min von der Subway entfernt. Von hieraus ist Manhattan super zu erreichen. Die Unterkunft selber ist im Untergeschoss und für drei Personen super geeignet. Andrew war immer sehr hilfreich und gut zu erreichen.
chambre confortable super bien placée! à 2 mn des lignes express pour manhattan; quartier sympa, accueil par Kenneth, le voisin, super, merci pour les petits dépannages!

Logement bien pour 2 personnes, un peu étriqué pur 4 comme c'était le cas avec nos deux enfants. La localisation tout près des métros et très pratique et pemettent de parcourir la ville et relier Manhatan facilement (30 à 40 minutes de trajet)

We had a very nice stay at this place! Lovely garden and very close to the subway so in 20 minutes you're in the middle of the big city! The neighborhood is also very nice.  Restaurants and different kind of shops are just around the corner. I would definitely recommend this place!

Nos alojamos en casa de Andrew 9 días. La casa está muy bien ubicada, a unos pasos del metro línea F que te lleva al centro de Manhattan en unos 20 minutos. Andrew se preocupo por nosotros para que nuestra estancia fuera lo más confortable posible. Tiene entrada independiente y un estupendo porche con una mesa y sillas. Sin duda, repetiría!!

The location is good (close to metro, restaurants, park, etc.) and the price is attractive compared to a hotel in the area. Nevertheless we were disappointed by the studio. There is no natural light, the air does not flow naturally hence it was smelly and humid and the ceiling is low which is quite overwhelming. Also we could hear the foot steps, toilet flushes, television, etc. of the people living on the ground floor including late at night and very early in the morning.

A perfect place to stay when exploring Brooklyn and NYC, clean and comfortable accommodation, very close to subway, nice safe area with shops etc. Andrew and Sam were perfect hosts, very accommodating and nothing too much trouble, a lovely family. Thoroughly enjoyed staying in their home during our fantastic trip to New York. Definitely recommend..

The host was not there to meet us and we never met the entire stay, the nanny did not know we were arriving and had to make a phone call to find out what was going on which was disappointing.  There was no information left in the studio about the subway etc which would have been helpful.  We also heard lots of noise upstairs in the mornings, there was also a smell of damp in the studio, there was no point in complaining about this as there was nothing that could be done.  there is no way more than 2 people could stay here as it is very small.  i do believe Andrew called the night we arrived but after a long haul flight we were in bed early, he did email to ask if everything was ok.  The fact that we spent so little time there was probably a bonus, i was disappointed that we could not hold the room for longer the day we were leaving not even to leave our luggage there was not helpful, we had to be out by 11am and our flight was at 9pm that night, they did not even come down the day we were leaving to say goodbye.

My friend and I had an excellent stay at Andrew's flat. I never end up meeting Andrew - as no keys were required to get into the flat, but he has been very nice with us, and often check in with us to see if everything is alright.

The flat is small but fully equiped and very well situated to explore both Brooklyn and Manhattan (and probably the Queens, while we have not been there). It is a basement flat so don't expect a lot of natural light, but this should push you to go outside and enjoy the city (that is what you are here, right ? ;) ).

Andrew's place is great, so easy to get around New York as the subway is just down the road. The only thing I would say to be aware of is that there is no windows. We couldn't really use the backyard at the time so made us feel a little boxed in. There was 2 of us staying which was great, not sure how 4 people would go in such a small space. But I guess when you're in NYC who wants to spend time inside anyway?! I would recommend this listing. Very good communication!
Great, very private accommodation with all needed amenities, and then some.  Excellent Park Slope location.  Attentive and helpful host.
The place is cozy, close to train and stores, easy acces, clean, quiet and all you need. Andrew is communicating all the time worry as a good host

The apartment has very good location: 2 minutes to subway, 25-30 minutes to Time Square, 10 minutes to Atlantic Terminal. The neighborhood is quiet, safe and nice, there are lots of cafes and shops: mcdonalds, tacos, bagels, supermarket and others.
Room has separate entrance with electronic locks, which is absolutely great and convenient! We were able to access the room just when we arrived. Main room and bathroom were very clean, cosy and modern, it has absolutely everything we needed and even more: hair dryer, safe, fridge, toast oven, AC adapters and more! W-Fi was fast and stable!
As this is basement the ceiling was lower than I am used to, but it wasn’t a problem for me. Also sometimes there were a bit noisy at evening and night, but still it was okay and didn’t disturbed much, we had a good sleep at that large bed!
Andrew is very friendly and sympathizing! We enjoyed our stay and very gratefull for helping us making this trip come true! We are absolutely satisfied and give it all 5 stars out of 5! Thank you!
Andrew's place is comfortable, clean and easily accessible to the subway. He was great about checking in with us during out stay to make sure we had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend!
The perfect stay for a weekend getaway or extended stay. Andrew is a great host and very accommodating. When back in town, we are definitely staying again!
Nice place, nice location. Easy access and great communication.

I had to find a place for my family to stay while we had some work done on our apartment in Brooklyn. We knew we wanted to stay close to our home for convenience purposes and also because we love this neighborhood and knew that we could have anything we wanted/needed at our fingertips. 
Andrew's home was warm and inviting while easily sleeping my family of four. He and his family were very responsive when we had questions or needed something. We even had a safe place to keep our strollers.
My kids love to read and all of their favorite books were there in the flat for our pleasure! Lots of great grown-up books, too. 
We even got to enjoy the beautiful backyard a little bit! 
The location of Andrew's home is so close to convenience stores, restaurants, subways and  our favorite, Prospect Park!
Highly recommend this location! Happy travels!

A fantastic spot in a great part of NYC. I could go on and on about the restaurants the night life the proximity to everything - it's a great spot and Andrew and his family run a very nice AirBnB. The place is quiet, whilst still being in the mix and it's very close to transport in every direction. A highly recommended place to stay for a very reasonable price.

Nous avons passé 5 nuits dans ce charmant petit studio à 3 personnes qui est plus adapté selon moi pour 2 par manque de place. L'appartement était très propre et les sanitaires agréables. L'appartement très bien équipé avec le micro-onde , grille pain , cafetière , bouilloire et un frigo.
Le studio est très bien situé à 2 minutes du métro avec ses nombreuses lignes et 1 minute d'un supermarché ouvert 24h/24. Le quartier est très agréable et surtout très calme !
Andrew est un hôte très attentionné et très gentil.
Je vous conseil ce lieu.

muy buen alojamiento. 1005 privado y accesible desde cualquier lugar por su ubicacion . a una cuadra de una estacion del metro y un barrio muy seguro.
excelente
Nice place, great shower.  Recommended if you want to stay near Prospect Park and close enough by subway still to Manhattan
Great apartment with private entrance in Brooklyn. Ideal for a couple
The basement apartment is located very near to the metro in Brooklyn with easy connection to Manhatten, Long Island, etc. Facilities are homely with plenty of hot water and wifi connection is good.
Excellent location to train and restaurants. Andrew was very responsive to our needs.
Very nice basement, good for a short trip, very close to everything specially to the train station, very convenient, no Tv though :(
We would absolutely resommend this place to anyone. It was quiet and dark so we slept great. Very convenient because it was close to the subway. Andrew was a great host.

Wir hatten eine super Zeit in Andrews Haus und konnten Ein- und Ausgehen wie wir wollten. Die Anbindung an die Subway ist perfekt und gleich um die Ecke hat man einige Möglichkeiten sich zu Verpflegen. Bei Fragen haben wir in kürzester Zeit Antworten und Tipps bekommen. Wir würden auch wieder die Unterkunft wählen. Vielen Dank!

Pros:
1. the host is extremely responsive and responsible when the problem occurs. 
2. the bathroom is clean and nice.
3. the room looks like the description.
4. there are some good restaurants around the apartment. ex. a good Thai food, a nice brunch.
5. five minutes to subway station.

Cons:
1. the water came in to our room during heavy rainy day. (but Andrew refunded our stay afterwards.)
2. there is no window in the room (but if you don't stay indoor for long then it will be fine.)
3. the electricity of the room goes overload sometimes particularly if you turn on the oven.

Ubytování je v klidné bezpečné lokalitě, tři minuty od zastávky metra, za 30 minut jste na Times Square, v tomto ohledu bylo vše perfektní. Pokoj a koupelna by ale zasloužila pořádný úklid, rozkládací sedačka vyčištění. Nebyly k dispozici ručníky ani deka a polštář pro třetí ubytovanou osobu, pouze prostěradlo. Díky klimatizaci bylo v pokoji příjemně, i když venku bylo horko. Wi-fi fungovala bez problému. Celkově na přespání, vzhledem k poloze a ceně doporučujeme.
Andrew's place is comfortable, and easily accessible to the subway.  Would stay again.

Andrews flat is located in a great area, plenty of pubs, restaurants and shops.  The subway is a two minute walk away from the flat and 30 minute ride to Manhattan. Any time we needed to speak to Andrew via email, he answered in a reasonable amount of time.  Because it is a basement suite there was a bit of a musty smell. 
We two women felt safe at all times

El apartamento cumplía con lo esperado, una habitación en el sótano con dos camas, un baño y electrodomésticos. Lo mejor de la casa es su ubicación, con una parada de metro muy bien comunicada (a 15 minutos de Manhattan) en la misma calle. Si tu el objetivo de tu viaje es pasar poco tiempo en el apartamento y centrarse en visitar la ciudad, este es tu sitio.
Respecto al anfitrión, ha sido correcto en todo momento y no nos hemos sentido desatendidos, pero no ha hecho acto de presencia en ningún momento.

Gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältnis: nur ein paar Schritte zu mehreren Subwaylinien nach Mannhattan (ca 30 Minuten). Geschäfte für den täglichen Bedarf und Restaurants um die Ecke. Das Zimmer ist perfekt für 2 Personen und für 4 Personen OK ( wir waren 2 Erwachsene und 2 nicht mehr so kleine Kinder).  Sauberkeit auch OK.  Wir würden wieder buchen.

Nice flat next to a subway station. There a stores near by.
You reach manhattan in 30 minutes by walking and taking the sub.

Die Wohnung lohnt sich sehr als Ausgangsort, um Brooklyn, aber auch andere Gegenden New Yorks, zu erkunden. Die Lage ist in jeder Hinsicht exzellent. Auch ist das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis im Vergleich zu anderen Angeboten super. Es ist auch interessant, mal ein typisches Haus in Brooklyn kennenzulernen. Die Wohnung selbst bietet sowohl aufgrund ihrer Keller-Lage als auch hinsichtlich der Gestaltung/Ausstattung allerdings keinen Anlass für Begeisterung. Sie ist aber sauber und gut als Übernachtungsort geeignet, wenn man über ein kleineres Budget verfügt. Der Gastgeber Andrew, den wir persönlich nicht kennengelernt haben, ist sehr gut erreichbar und kümmert sich umgehend.

It was the perfect place to stay and get to enjoy what makes Park Slope so wonderful! The space was very clean and comfortable. Andrew was a wonderful host. So easy to communicate with. He made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay fantastic.
El cuarto cumple todo lo que dice, y es limpio, lo recomendaria para maximo 3 personas
Well located. Area has many amenities and it’s close to public transport.

Everything was great about this place. It was very comfortable (the new air conditioner was a big plus) and very quiet, given it is in a bustling part of Brooklyn. The area was very convenient. Plenty of options for food or bars. And the local subway station was really handy. We'll stay here again next time we're in NYC!
Lovely place and located conveniently close to the subway and stores

Andrew's place was great. Perfect location. It was an easy walk to plenty of bars and restaurants, and also a block for the subway. Prospect Park is just a short walk. Andrew was also responded quickly every time something came up. I would stay here again.

My husband and I spent 8 days in New York. We arrived a Saturday night and checking- in  was very simple.  The room is very accessible and privet. We loved having the ability to come and go freely without disrupting Andrew and his family. I was happy to see that the room was just as the pictures; clean and in order.  It had a all the essential (mini fridge, coffee maker, toaster oven , microwave) he also provided us with towels and some toiletries. There is no TV which I was a bit upset about at first but that's just my personal way to relax after a long day, you don't need a TV after everything you get to see in the city.    The location is perfect, it's just a short walk to the subway that takes you right into the city.  The community is great I fell in love, just around the corner you have a full street with lots of restaurants and shops. We also walked to Prospect Park ( about 5 blocks)  the walk is very relaxing and the park is amazing. Andrew is very friendly and  great at answering in a quick  manner. Over all our stay was fantastic and if we get the opportunity to visit NY again we will definitely think of staying here again.
Prima plek in mooie wijk

Staying at Andrews place in Park Slope, Brooklyn was a wonderful experience. We found everything as described in the description. 
Andrew made sure we had everything we needed and checked-in with us several times during our stay. The location itself is perfect if you want to experience the "Brooklyn" life and still visit Mamhattan. 
Thank you Andrew and your family for your generosity of sharing your place!

Definitely one of my favourite Airbnb experiences! Andrew replied to messages promptly, with helpful and detailed instructions (for check-in, various amenities for the apartment, etc.). The flat itself was great – clean, with an easy-to-use locking system, lots of fantastic amenities (coffee maker, microwave, mini fridge, toaster oven, hairdryer, Brita filter water dispenser).  The neighbourhood itself felt very safe, plus the apartment is conveniently close to a metro station, shops and places to eat. I'd recommend staying here to anyone wanting to check out Park Slope/Brooklyn, and I personally wouldn't hesitate to stay here again for a future visit!
This was a great stay for a quick stop in NYC. It was a simple, clean, quiet, and safe space.

When I first arrived there was no hand soap or bath towels, but once I communicated to Andrew of the missing necessities, he was quick to respond and also apologized with a bottle of wine.
The place is conveniently located to public transportation and in a very safe neighborhood. This is a good value for the price. It's hard to find a private bathroom in many NYC AirBnBs without breaking the wallet.

I'd never used Air B&B before, and this was a fantastic introduction to the experience! The space was private and allowed for us to come in and out as we pleased; very cute and clean, with really nice touches like snacks and toiletries (as well as the coffee machine and kettle, which we made great use of). It was quiet and very close to the subway, which made exploring the city very easy. Our first night we had a minor issue with a broken bed slat and Andrew took care of it immediately, and made a great point of being communicative and checking in to make sure we had all that we needed.

Perfect location in Park Slope, which is a very nice and safe neighborhood, excellent for families with kids. It is very close to Prospect Park, nice stores, restaurants and a subway station, with easy access to Manhattan and other areas of Brooklyn. The place is exactly as shown in the pictures and very clean. Andrew, our host, was always very attentive and responsive.

Andrew's place is the perfect location for all of NYC- you can easily get anywhere quickly, plus all the necessary amenities and interesting restaurants are close by. The room is quite big and nice if you want to have some down time as well. Andrew is beyond responsive and helpful. Definitely worth staying here.

The location was perfect! Close to public transit and plenty of restaurants and shops. Andrew was a wonderful host! He was always quick to respond to any messages and checked in on us everyday! Anything we needed, he made sure to provide quickly. It was a great experience! Thanks, Andrew!

Andrews place was the perfect little hideaway in park slope. With your own private space downstairs and access to a super cute backyard, it felt like it was my own little home away from home. Very comfortable bed and fridge that stocked with a few drinks and other ammenities, small touches like that made Andrew stand out as a host from others I’ve seen. The best part about this place was the location. Close to anything you could possibly need in a safe and cute area. Would definitely stay here again!

The service and response speed of Andrew are great! And the room is as clean as expected. The location is good for both subway and eating. But I was a little bit disappointed for the fact that the room is underground. Besides, sometimes the room is noisy because the upper floor makes some noise, even after midnight. And you can feel the noise which is made by the subway train.

The apartment was great, very clean. The bed was comfortable, and the bathroom was clean and modern. There are nice touches like a Keurig with K-cups and a PUR water filter, plus snacks and dishes. The location is great -- close to several subway lines, plus shops and restaurants. There is a Rite-Aid a few doors down, plus a bagel place, pizza places, and bodegas nearby. Andrew and his wife were very responsive. The stairs down to the apartment are very narrow and steep, so you may have difficulty if you have a heavy suitcase or problems with stairs. Otherwise it's very comfortable.

Andrew's basement apartment is very cozy and clean. The location is amazing with great bars and restaurants and very good access to the subway system. The self check in is very convenient and although I did not meet Andrew, he made sure I was comfortable and had everything I needed. He was great to deal with throughout the process.
Great location. Comfortable bed. Great water pressure. Right around the corner from the Bagel Pub! Thin walls, but nobody goes to Brooklyn to hang out in their AirBnB anyway, right? :)
Awesome place! It was very nice! Andrew is awesome as well.

Andrew is a great host. He checked in frequently and responded really quickly.  The room was very clean and the bed is comfy. The neighborhood has plenty of restaurants and stores a block away so it was very convenient.

Andrew is a WONDERFUL host. Just amazing. He gave us the space we needed, actually, we didn't even see each other and still was so present at the same time. He had all of our needs covered, very diligent, respectful, always quick to answer, very clean place, towels and sheets smelled fantastic, beautiful bathroom, even had a little welcome basket for us. I have never felt so at home. Even the couch was comfortable. I was so pleased and happy I would definetly stay and recommend this place to others. Train is just down the block, literally steps away. It was my first experience with an Airbnb and I LOVED IT. Thanks for being a wonderful host.

Andrews place was great! Park Slope great neighborhood if you want something less hustle-y bustle-y —a lot of young families and great places right around the corner for a quick bite or if you need anything. The actual space was very comfortable (the AC unit was a huge plus, and the bathroom was spotless) however you do hear the subway pretty much at all times, which is to be expected for the location. The space also felt very large and very private. it’s a  quick 20 minute train to downtown, and to get uptown takes you about 45, which doesn’t seem so bad if you’re familiar with public transit. Overall would recommend to anyone who is very comfortable with public transit and familiar with NYC, otherwise your uber’s may cost you a lot.

Andrew's place was exactly what we were looking for: clean, centrally located and within walking distance of a lot of different restaurants and bars, and private. Andrew was communicative throughout but otherwise gave us space, which is just want we wanted. Thanks for a fantastic stay!

My partner and I had a great stay at Andrew’s place! It was just as pictured depicted and being right next to the subway was so nice. It was extremely easy to get anywhere in the city. The place is the perfect size for a couple. The neighborhood is totally safe and I would say this place is a steal for the area. Overall a great place!

La ubicación del alojamiento de Andrew es perfecta, muy cerca del Subway a pie. Es pequeño pero muy cómodo, el baño es espectacular y muy limpio. El único problema fue el ruido de la gente que caminaba en el piso superior hasta tarde. Pero aun así lo recomendaria! Precio / calidad. Gracias Andrew.
This is a wonderful space in a perfect Brooklyn location. Andrew was very kind and responsive and I would recommend his place highly!
Great host who went out of his way to make our stay in NY very comfortable. The space is super close to a train station and perfect for city explorers.

Perfect place for a weekend getaway. Location was fantastic, very peaceful neighborhood, walking distance to metro and park. Apartment was clean and easy to access. 
Only issue was the noise at night - there are multiple machines (which you could turn off) which made the room loud. Unfortunately if it rains there's a loud pump that turns on every few minutes which made it hard to sleep through the night.

Andrew's place is conveniently located on the subway lines. Andrew is friendly and responsive.  His apartment is roomy and well appointed with amenities that make it feel like home. We especially appreciated sleeping in a quiet, private space in New York City!

El alojamiento de Andrew es una opción genial si quieres visitar la ciudad sin alojarte en Manhattan, tiene parada de metro justo al lado, se tarda más o menos 30 minutos en llegar al centro. Muy recomendable.
Andrew is a great host ... We enjoyed our stay at his place. The area is super walkable and the train station that can take you to Manhattan is 5min walk away.

Nice, clean and spacious basement flat. Great location - minutes from the 4th Ave /9th Street subway (about 20-40 minutes into Manhattan) and minutes to loads of bars, pubs, restaurants and convenience stores. Only downside is that it is underground with no natural light. However the AC and dehumidifier keep it cool and dry - but these can be noisy at night, as can the fridge. Although there is a fridge and microwave it'd be hard to do more than breakfast or make sandwiches as there's no counter space or kitchen sink. Andrew's hospitality was fantastic - he replied quickly and got us replacement pillows straight away as I'm allergic to feather pillows. I recommend if you're looking for an affordable base from which to explore NYC.
Great location. Super convenient. Can recommend and will definitely stay there next time in Brooklyn

We stayed at Andrew's place for a few months during the summer. Even though his place is a studio, we found it comfortable to be in for a longer stay. The place has AC and a dehumidifier so it was pleasant to stay in even during the hottest summer days. It's also close to a couple subway lines which was convenient for getting around. Andrew is super nice and would always check in with us to make sure we were enjoying our stay and would always be prompt with his responses whenever we had questions and concerns. We loved our stay and would highly recommend it!
We loved the neighborhood! There was so much to see and do. The space is small, but very cozy and comfortable for two people. I loved the patio space out back. Very satisfied with this experience!
Close to the subway station and easy to get to other parts of New York! Clean and spacious for two. We spent most of the time exploring, so was good enough for what we needed.

Really comfy, quiet place to rest in Brooklyn. A great space with all the amenities you could need. Andrew was great and responded to queries really quickly, and was very accommodating. The location is great, only a few minutes walk from the subway and a lot of shops and restaurants around. Would definitely recommend Peppinos pizza and Cafe regular for coffee - both mere seconds walk from the apartment. Great place to stay, thanks again Andrew!
Good place to explore Brooklyn. Easy accessible, close to subway and some restaurants. Thanks!

This is definitely a great option for 2 people. Place is comfortable and the location is GREAT. We stayed for almost a week and moved in the subway every day with no problems. The subway station is literally one block away. 

Andrew is a great host. We had some request that he gladly was able to help us. Recommended 100%
We enjoyed our stay at Andrew's flat. Thank you for having us, and for the fast communication. The Check-in was uncomplicated and the flat has been clean. Thank you!

We enjoyed our stay in Brooklyn. The place is super close to two different train stations a a quick walk to lots of bars and restaurants. 

Overall, the place is nice but my husband and I weren’t super comfortable in the bed. Also, you can hear a lot from the apartments above the space. The noise didn’t bother us too much (we live in a city) but it may bother some. 

Andrew was great with communication and also let us drop our stuff off early before check in which was so sweet. It was affordable and a great location.

Andrews Appartement is very close to a few major subway lines that take you to midtown Manhattan in about 35 minutes. The apartment is located in the basement with a steep staircase, but has everything you need for a stay close to Manhattan. There are also some good restaurants and possibilities for grocery shopping around the corner.

The apartment is in a perfect place, near a subway station which gets you to Manhattan. The place was clean, quiet and cozy. Although I didnt meet Andrew, unfortunately, we stayed in touch every day, helping me with my doubts not only for the aparment ones, but for the city and transport too. I would come back. Highly recommended.

Great hosts who responded to our questions very quickly. 
Location is a stones-throw away from a Subway station that has lines accessing the heart of New York. Very easy for first timers to get to and from the best sites. 
Property was clean and stylish. Would highly recommend.

Increíble ubicación con acceso al metro a media cuadra, en un vecindario muy tranquilo y seguro, definitivamente la mejor opción para los que desean conocer NYC y buscan un lugar cómodo para pasar la noche y dejar sus pertenencias. Además que la atención de Andrew es inmejorable, hasta fuimos a un partido de la NFL juntos. Súper recomendado.

We had a great stay in Brooklyn.
The accommondation ist very basic, but there ist everything you need for a few days. These is a Subway right across the street and lots of Restaurants in the neighborhood.
Andrew as a Host is really great! He cared of us all the time!
Happy with our stay. A little warm in the evenings and obviously as it’s a basement no natural light. Overall very happy with our stay.

This place is amazing! So close to the subway, local dining and services. The hosts were so accommodating, helpful and friendly. Our messages were responded to quickly and we had a wonderful stay! Definitely recommend staying here!

Nice flat with enough room for two persons, really close to the subway and stores (Pharmacy, Starbucks); maybe the stairs could be a little narrow if you have a big suitcase. Andrew was a nice host, any question we had he responded to us quickly.
Good stay it was pretty close to the subway station and next to a great bagels shop! Nice quiet area that felt really safe!

Great place, great location close to R and G subway lines. You can also usually find street parking after a while. Great food around (South Side Eatery) too and pretty nice family oriented neighborhood. Andrew was great with communication. Thanks again!
This was great!

name: Lindo studio e perfeita localização
summary: Lindo studio em excelente área, muito próximo ao metro, a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana e a 10 min a pé de Ipanema. Temos 1 cama box, 1 sofá cama, ar condicionado, tv32", WiFi, fogão e geladeira.  Limpeza e hospitalidade sao nosso mantra.
description: Lindo studio em excelente área, muito próximo ao metro, a duas quadras da praia de Copacabana e a 10 min a pé de Ipanema. Temos 1 cama box, 1 sofá cama, ar condicionado, tv32", WiFi, fogão e geladeira.  Limpeza e hospitalidade sao nosso mantra.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Plusieurs échanges de mails avant l'arrivée, on a été bien accueillis. L'appart est très bien situé pile entre Copacabana et Ipanema et à quelques blocs de la plage seulement avec métro, bus et supermarchés à proximité.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado e confortável. O Glauber foi bem flexível com relação aos horários de entrada e saída. Os problemas que surgiram foram pequenos e resolvidos com facilidade! Com certeza eu me hospedaria de novo!
Excelente, sempre atencioso deixou tudo em ordem. Recomendo.

O apartamento é muito bem localizado a 2 quadras da praia, perto de supermercados, padarias, farmácias e fácil acesso. O sofá cama muito confortável onde acomodou perfeitamente meus 2 filhos. O único inconveniente é que o apartamento estava sujo, não percebi assim que cheguei pois dei uma olhada rápida. O banheiro estava imundo e antes de usar tive que fazer uma limpeza. O proprietário me garantiu que isso nunca tinha acontecido antes e se prontificou a ir ao local, mas eu já tinha limpado. Fora isso foi tudo ótimo

O que realmente se destaca nesse apartamento é a sua localização. Próximo do metrô, de supermercados, restaurantes, farmácias, etc. Esse aspecto facilita bastante a viagem. Em relação ao interior do apartamento, se trata de um espaço limpo e confortável. O único problema que encontrei foi o ar- condicionado, que estava empoeirado, não esfriando o ambiente adequadamente. Mas se tratou de um problema mínimo, que não causou nenhuma dor de cabeça. Enfim, recomendo bastante o apartamento.
Bel appartement modern.  Très bien situé à côté du métro et de la plage de Coppacabana. Quartier sécuritaire. Glauber m'a grandement aidé suite à la perte de mes baggages .  Je recommande .

Muy buena ubicación y conectividad. El alojamiento es muy de acuerdo a las fotos publicadas y tuvimos flexibilidad en la salida pues nuestro vuelo salió tarde.
100% recomendable sobre todo para parejas que quieren ir a Rio en una onda relajada y sin preocupaciones.

El departamento está en una excelente ubicación, en Copacabana, cerca de Ipanema, comercios varios alrededor, todos los medios de transporte cerca, edificio con seguridad las 24 hs. Sin duda recomendable. Glauber y Maria siempre a entera disposición.

O espaço de Glauber é bem localizado e estiloso. Ele possui checkin e checkout flexível, o que foi muito importante para nós! Obrigada. Tivemos um contratempo com a Dona Maria, a senhora que fez nosso checkin e checkout, que nos tratou com certa grosseria alegando que nós tínhamos recebido uma amiga a mais no apartamento sendo que estava combinado com o Glauber. A sensação que ela nos deu é que estavamos roubando algo. Tirando esta falta de comunicação a estadia foi ok.

name: Burgundy Affordable Spacious@Centre
summary: Clean, quiet and bright, shared apartment just a stone throw to the OSMANBEY subway station
description: Clean, quiet and bright, shared apartment just a stone throw to the OSMANBEY subway station

host.host_about:
We are native Turkish, but excellent English speakers who are very interested in meeting people from other cultures. As professionals in business lives, we are flexible and happy to assist guests to get to know Istanbul. You can contact us with any questions. We offer you great service and you will feel yourself at home!

Insta istanbulmeeting
